Gɔ masarɛ mafɛ ara wagbe manyɔ gbidii ne, Petro ɔta ɔya ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Manyii, ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, mi mɔmɔ ɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i mi ndɛ̃ sɔ losɛ loaɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe si mafɔ maɖe.
Ɣaa gɔ nɣe maturi situ ame ne, ɔɖi ɔte sɔ ɔfɔ ma gɔ ɔtã ma Siwarã Bielea lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔtã bo.
Ɔ̃ipia ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ i bo gu ma ndɛ̃, alasɔ ɔfɔ ma i ma kafɔkaɖe iso, fiɛ ɔsu ma akpi ɔtsɛ ma lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔtsɛ bo bo are.
Be ɔso mito mibie sɔ miala Ɣaa minyɔ kumɛgɔgbe? Bo gu bo mawa iiwo ato wagbe ɔsore! Be ɔso fiɛ mito misu wã misia i mafɔɖedze magbe iso?
Ɣɛɛ bofɔ boɖe sɔ bona iɖi iki i Bosate Yesu nnyainyɔ ame lɛ kumɛgɔ ma wũ mana iɖi.”
Ma ɔɖuɖu ka malo makã atsue awawãra siare wa i Banaba gu Paulo ɔɣere ma sɔ Ɣaa ɔbara ɔkigu i ma iso ɔtã mma loiɖe ma Yudase.
Gɔ maro ɔɣɛ ne, Yakobo ana ɔta ɔya ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Manyii, mikã atsue si minɔ.
Simon Petro ɔɔnyigira bo kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔɖi ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔte mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ ɔɖi mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛgu i ma ndɛ̃ ɔtã so.
Itɔ̃me nɛ i ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze ɔɣɛ masɛ ɔkotegu Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ loɣɛ sɔ,
‘Nnɛgbe kama ne, loaledza
Igara David ayoku itara.
Loaledza ara wa lonina
sɔ aakpese alɛ.
Mmɔ i mma lokuti
gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu fiɛ lokpere ma sɔ maaɖe wũ maturi aanyɔnyɔ me ne.
Ɣaa ɣe ara wagbe fiɛ ɔtã maturi ɔtsue wã ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.’
“Ne ɔso mme Yakobo nto loɣere mi sɔ, mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ masu so matã Ɣaa ne, midaatã botɛ̃ ma ɔri i kuira ame.
Ɣɛɛ ne, mitã botsɛrɛ ɔko botã ma sɔ manyua so ɔpukutura iki i aɖera wa masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ iɖe gu marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go isiai. Madaaɖe mabɔi ma manyɛdɛ̃ simɔ maɖoe si manyua ima iɖe ana.
Alasɔ ta kokooko ne, ara wa i Mose ɔtsɛrɛ ɔsɛ ne, wã ame masɛ maka matã bo ɔwi biara i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ ku Iwarãyi fiɛ masɛ maɣɛ ne ana i simagɛ̃ ame ne.”

Katɔ̃memasɛdze gu makpakpa gu mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ma losakanya ɔnɔ karɔ̃ sɔ maaɖi maturi mawɛ̃ masiaira Paulo gu Barnaba sɔ maakɛlɛ Antiokia. Maturi inyɔ ma maɖi nɖe mafɔɖedze makpakpa Yuda gɔ marɔ ana sɔ Barsaba gu Silas.
Ɔko gɔ matsɛrɛ matã ma mato ame atɔ̃me nɖe sɔ,
Nnɛgbe lobɔrɛ i katɔ̃memasɛdze gu makpakpa ma nɖe mi manyii i Yerusalem kɔrɛ ne. Boya manyii ma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ mabɔrɛ i Antiokia gu Siria gu Kilikia.
Bonɔ sɔ mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i bo ndɛ̃ ngbe maba maatsɛgu mi kakpadzɛ̃ ise i bo ma Yudase sirɛrɛ̃ itu iso. Ɣɛɛ ne, boipia ma sɔ maba maaɣere mi ara wamɔ igbã.
Gɔ bosɛ iti ame ne, bosese bo ndɛ̃ makpakpa inyɔ sɔ masiai bo manyii ɖɔɛse Banaba gu Paulo maba mi kɔrɛ.
Masu ma ngbã matsɛ ala Bosate Yesu Kristo ɔso.
Yuda gu Silas ana to maaledza mi ara wa iso botsɛrɛ mi ɔko ngbe iɣere.
Alasɔ bo gu Siwarã Bielea kuɖɔɛ kuɖe sɔ boibasu ato siare kuawɛ̃ bosia mi iso, iɖo ara nyaa wagbe sɔ,
Misɛ̃ ara wa masu masɔrɛ ala aɣɔ iɖe gu ima iɖe gu mabɔi ma manyɛdɛ̃ simɔ iɖe. Miɖi so i marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go isiai akpi ame. Si mimɔɛ̃ ara wagbe mila ne, ibua ilɛ.
Ɣaa isobuɛ itã mi.
Ne ɔso mapia marɛrɛ̃ magbe Antiokia. Gɔ mabo ne, makpere mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu masirakanya. Ne masu ɔko gɔ mabɔrɛgu i Yerusalem matã ma ne.
Mma ɔɖuɖu mpia mmɔ ɔna isoɣɔ gbaã i katetere atɔ̃me wa maka maɖi i ɔko ame iso.
Gɔ Yuda gu Silas ana ɖe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔso ne, maka ma ku atɔ̃me gbodzoo mapia katetere gu ɔle.
Ayi kɛkɛĩ kama ne, mafɔɖedze ɔɖi ma ɔri sɔ makpese makɛlɛ Yerusalem ku isobuɛ.
Ɣɛɛ Silas ɔkpese ɔwe i mmɔ.
Paulo gu Barnaba gu mamama ɔkpese mawe i Antiokia mate ara fiɛ maɣɛ Bosate Itɔ̃me.
Gɔ ayi ɔsia kɛkɛĩ ne, Paulo ɔɣere Barnaba sɔ, “Tã boakiki i bo manyii ma mpia i simagɛ̃ dzɛ ame bowe boɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea bofegu si bonyɔ kumɛgɔ mato mamɔ i Ɣaa ame.”
Barnaba ɔnɔ karɔ̃ ɣɛɛ ne, ɔbie sɔ maakɔ Yohanes gɔ marɔ Marko makɛlɛgu.
Ɣɛɛ Paulo iitɔrã ɖuɖuuɖu! Alasɔ ɔwi gɔ ɔsiai ma masɛ Pamfilia ne, Marko Yohanes ɔkpese ma i kama, ɔ̃iwe maro karabara.
Ma inyɔɔ ɔkpadzɛ̃ so i Marko Yohanes itɔ̃me iso gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ itã sɔ masame so iso. Barnaba ɔkɔ Marko maki i ndu iso makɛlɛ Kipro.
Paulo ɔ̃ wũ ɔkɔ Silas, ne gɔ mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔsu ma mapia i Bosate nrɔɔ̃ ame ne, marui.
Ɔsɛ ɔ̃aki i Siria gu Kilikia ɔto ɔpia mafɔɖedze akuri ɔtɔ.
Paulo ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ simagɛ̃ dzɛ marɔ sɔ Derbe gu Listra. Mmɔ iɖe ɔsɛ ɔ̃anya fɔɖedze gɔ marɔ Timoteo ne. Ɔ̃ ɔnyi ne, ɔ Yudase ɔɖe fiɛ ɔfɔ Kristo ɔɖe. Ɔ̃ ɔse ɣɛɛ ne, ɔ Grikise ɔɖe.
Mafɔɖedze ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i Listra gu Ikonion ne, masɛ mawarɛ Timoteo kukaakɔ.
Paulo ɔbie gbaã sɔ ɔ̃akɔ wũ ɔbua so iso. Ne ɔso ɔtu wũ sirɛrɛ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i ma Yudase mmara ɔte, alasɔ ma Yudase ma mpia i ndɛ̃ mɛmɔ ɔɖuɖu ɣe sɔ ɔ̃ ɔse ne, ɔ Grikise ɔɖe.
Gɔ mata ne, maki i simagɛ̃ dzɛ ɔɖuɖu i mmɔ ame, maɣere ma ara wa i katɔ̃memasɛdze gu makpakpa ma i Yerusalem ɔsia ita sɔ mabara iso.
Ne ɔso mafɔɖedze ɔɣe masia iyi biara fiɛ mawe ɔle i kafɔkaɖe ame mabua.
Ne kama ne, mafe makɛlɛ Frigia gu Galatia, alasɔ Siwarã Bielea iitã ma ɔri sɔ maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i Asia karɔ̃ iso.
Gɔ masɛ maabo Misia ne, mabie sɔ si mabo Bitinia karɔ̃ iso. Ɣɛɛ ngbe ana ne, Yesu Siwarã iitã ma ɔri sɔ makɛlɛ mmɔ.
Ne ɔso maledza ikpese iki i Misia fiɛ masɛ maabo ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Troa.
Kasɛ̃ gamɔ ne, Paulo ɔnya kaɖikate. Ɔnya ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ lobɔrɛ i Makedonia gɔ ɔɣɛ ɔto ɔtã wũ iti sɔ, “Wara ba Makedonia ngbe si aba aabuai bo so o-o!”
Kaɖikate gagbe ɔso ne, ɔluwɛ̃ ne boledza so borui bokɛlɛ Makedonia. Alasɔ bonya sɔ Bosate to ɔbie sɔ ɔpia bo sɔ bosɛ boaɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i mmɔ.
Gɔ bobo i ɔkolo ame i Troa ne, bofe bokɛlɛ Samotrake. Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, bosɛ boabo Neapoli.
Bobɔrɛ i mmɔ bokɛlɛ Filipi gɔ nɖe Makedonia ɔmagɛ̃kpakpa fiɛ ɔɖe ma Romase kasɛkɔ̃ ana. Ne ɔso bowe i mmɔ ayi kɛkɛĩ.
Iwarãyi iso ne, bobɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame bokɛlɛ ɔwore kuruɛ i ngbegɔ bobu sɔ mmɔ i maturi sɛ masɛ maakparama kayi. Bosɛ i karɔ̃, ne botsɛ marɔ̃go ma loba mmɔ Bosate itɔ̃me iɣere ne.

Ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ ɔwe i ma ndɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Lidia. Ɔsɛ ɔrɔdɛ̃ sikati rɛtɛa fiɛ ɔbɔrɛ i Tiatira. Ɔɖe ɔturi gɔ nsɛ ɔnigã Ɣaa gbaã. Gɔ ɔsi ɔto ɔkã nnɛ boto boɣɛ atsue ne, Bosate ɔbusi wũ adzuni sɔ ɔfɔ atɔ̃me wa ɔɖuɖu i Paulo ɔɣɛ ɔɖe.

Ne gɔ ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔfɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara ne, ɔtã bo iti sɔ, “Si minɔ karɔ̃ sɔ Bosate fɔɖedze loɖe gbaã ne, miba miawe i wũ kɔrɛ.” Ɔkpadzɛ̃gu bo itɔ̃me nɛgbe gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ bonɔ karɔ̃ sɔ boawe i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
Iyi iwɛ̃ gɔ boto bokɛlɛ boakparama kayi ne, bosarɛgu ɔsande bitɛ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ame i siwarã lalaa pia fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔpɛ sibɔ. Ɔsɛ ɔbara sikã kukaakɔ ɔtã makɔse.
Ɔbitɛ gɔgbe ɔsiai bo gu Paulo ɔto kulu sɔ, “Mmagbe ne, Ɣaa gɔ i kuɖokpo marabaradze maɖe fiɛ maba mate mi ɔri gɔ miaki miana ngbã!”

Nnɛgbe ɔkɛlɛ i katɔ̃ ayi gbodzoo. Gɔ iɔɖa Paulo ɔnɔ ne, ɔfiniki ɔɣere siwarã dzɛ mpia i ɔbitɛ gɔgbe ame sɔ, “Losa-ɔ loɖi i Yesu Kristo iyere ame sɔ bɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame!” Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, siwarã lalaa ɔbɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame!
Gɔ ɔ̃ makɔse ɔnya sɔ ma karana ɔbieri ɔɔyu ne, mamɔɛ̃ Paulo gu Silas makpadzɛ̃ ma makɛlɛgu matɔ̃meɣɛdze kɔrɛ i itiri ndɛ̃.
Maɖaɛ ma kanya i matɔ̃meɣɛdze kɔrɛ sɔ, “Mmagbe ne, ma Yudase maɖe fiɛ maba mapia manina bo ɔmagɛ̃.
Mapia mate maturi ara wa lota aya ma Romase kubarara gu mmara iso.”
Maturi gbodzoo ɔki malɔ Paulo gu Silas, ne matsɛ ma ikpakpadzɛ̃ ne. Matɔ̃meɣɛdze ɔkpadzɛ̃ awu maɖi ma iso fiɛ ka matã ɔri sɔ mapɛ ma kama.
Gɔ mapɛ ma kukaakɔ ne, masu ma masɛ maapia i iyo. Maɣere ngɔ nto ɔdzuɛ̃ mayorɛdze sɔ ɔdzuɛ̃ Paulo gu Silas kukaakɔ.
Kumɛgɔ maɣere wũ ɔso ne, ɔsu ma ɔpia ta iyo kame pelepele fiɛ ɔpia ma i akpo ame.
Kasɛ ndɛ̃ gɔ Paulo gu Silas to makparama kayi fiɛ mato maka aka male Ɣaa ne, mma nrɛ i iyo mmɔ to makã ma atsue.
Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, karɔ̃ ɔti teteree, iyo ɔɖuɖu ɔti ta karɔ̃ ame sɔ ne akui ɔɖuɖu ɔsese fiɛ akpo wa ame mapia mma nrɛ i iyo ɔɖuɖu ɔfɛfɛ̃ aɖi ma.
Gɔ iyo dzuɛ̃se ɔta i sirɛ fiɛ ɔnya sɔ iyo akui ɔɖuɖu ɔsese ase fiɛ ɔbu sɔ mayorɛdze ɔɖuɖu ɔɔtere mabɔrɛ ne, ɔsu ɔ̃ ipɛmi sɔ si ɔɖoe so.
Gɔ Paulo ɔnya nnɛ ɔbie sɔ si ɔbara so ne, ɔfã ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Daabara! Bo ɔɖuɖu pia i ngbe!”
Ne ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔkpere sɔ masu ɔkaniɛ mabɔ wũ. I iti pɛ̃ gu ifɔ̃ lalaa nɛ lomɔɛ̃ wũ ame ne, ɔtere ɔkɛlɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Paulo gu Silas katɔ̃.
Ne gɔ ɔkɔ ma ɔɖi i iyo ame ne, ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Tete mɛrɛ̃, be iɖe loabara fiɛ loana iɖi?”
Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ Bosate Yesu ɖe, si fɔ gu fɔ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu aana iɖi.”
Masɛ maaɣere ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu Itɔ̃me Bielea.
Kasɛ̃ gamɔ ame ame ne, ɔwiri ma aɣɛi wa maɖi ma, ne ka ɔtã ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔfɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara ne.
Gɔ ɔkɔ ma ɔpia iyo ame ne, ɔtã ma aɖera maɖe. Isoɣɔ ɔba i ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu ame gbaã, alasɔ mafɔ Ɣaa maɖe.
Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, ɔmagɛ̃ matɔ̃meɣɛdze ɔpia makpakpɛ̃dze sɔ masɛ maaɣere ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔdzuɛ̃ mayorɛdze sɔ, “Nyua mafɔ mamɔ si makɛlɛ!”
Ne dzuɛ̃se gɔgbe ɔɣere Paulo gu Silas sɔ, “Matɔ̃memaɣɛdze sɔ ka lonyua mi si mikɛlɛ. Ne ɔso ka miawo ɔkɛlɛ i isobuɛ ame.”

Ne Paulo ɔɣere makpakpɛ̃dze sɔ, “Mapɛ bo i maturi ndɛ̃ gɔ maiɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me, ana ne, masu bo mapia i iyo ame. Ɣɛɛ ne, ma Romase boɖe! Kiniɔ ka mabie sɔ borui i iwɛrɛ ame? Ooɣo! Ma mɔmɔ si maba maaɖi bo.”
Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpese masɛ maaɣere matɔ̃meɣɛdze katɔ̃me gagbe. Gɔ manɔ sɔ Paulo gu Silas ne ma Romase maɖe ne, ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma gbaã!
Ne ɔso mata makɛlɛ masɛ maapɛ ma nrɔɔ̃ fiɛ makɔ ma maɖi i iyo ame. Ne ka mapɛ ma nrɔɔ̃ sɔ mabɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne.
Paulo gu Silas ɔrui makɛlɛ Lidia iyo. Gɔ manya mafɔɖedze tsɔra ne, mapia ma ɔtɔ mabua fiɛ mabɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
Gɔ maki i Amfipoli gu Apolonia ne, masɛ maabo Tesalonika ngbegɔ i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ kawɛ̃ pia.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Paulo sɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔbara ne, ɔkɛlɛ kasarɛkɔ̃. Awarãyi atɛ wa losiaidzo ne, ɔte Ɔko Sekelea ame atɔ̃me.
Ɔɖiɖi karɔ̃ ɔte inyɛwe nɛ maɣɛ masɛ koko sɔ Kristo aba ɔ̃anya gu kumɛgɔ ɔ̃aledza ita iwe ngbã. Paulo ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Yesu gɔ iso itɔ̃me nto loɣere mi ngbe nɖe Kristo ne.”
Atɔ̃me wagbe ɔfinikira ma Yudase mawɛ̃, ne ɔso mafɔ maɖe masiai Paulo gu Silas. Ma Grikise gbodzoo mawɛ̃ ma nsɛ manigã Ɣaa gu marɔ̃go ma masɛ mawarɛ gbodzoo ana ɔsu so matã Ɣaa i ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
Ɣɛɛ anɔmi ɔrɛtɛ ma Yudase. Ne ɔso mabie kuturipɛmi masakanya i ɔmagɛ̃ ame sɔ si mapia kulu. Makɔ kulumapiadze magbe masɛ maaki malɔ Yason iyo sɔ mato mabie Paulo gu Silas si mamɔɛ̃ ma makɛlɛgu itiri.
Gɔ maina ma mamɔɛ̃ ɔso ne, mamɔɛ̃ Yason gu mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ makpadzɛ̃ ma makɛlɛgu kasarɛkɔ̃. Mato kulu sɔ, “Marɛrɛ̃ ma nto mapia kulu i kakɔi biara ɔɔba maabo i ngbe ana soo!
Yason nɖe ngɔ lofɔ ma ɔpia i ɔ̃ iyo. Mmagbe lota maɣɛ i Igarakpakpa Kaisaro mmara iso mato mate sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Yesu ka nɖe igara ne!”
Gɔ mma losakanya gu ɔmagɛ̃ makpakpa ɔnɔ ira nɛgbe ne, situ ɔtsue ma gbaã.
Ne ɔso matã sɔ Yason gu ɔ̃ maturi ɔtã sikã maɣedza so i kama fiɛ manyua ma.
Kasɛ̃ gamɔ ame ne, mafɔɖedze ma i Tesalonika ɔsu Paulo gu Silas materegu makɛlɛgu Beroia. Gɔ masɛ maabo mmɔ ne, makɛlɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ sɔ maaɣere ma Itɔ̃me Bielea.
Beroia maturi ɔte sɔ makpa anɔ maɖo Tesalonika maturi. Makã atsue kukaakɔ manɔ nnɛ mato maɣɛ. Iyi biara kɛkɛ ne, mato manyɔnyɔ Ɔko Sekelea ame manyɔ sɔ nnɛ i Paulo to ɔɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe.
Ne ɔso ma Yudase gbodzoo ɔfɔ maɖe. Ma Grikise marɔ̃go gu marɛrɛ̃ gbodzoo ma masɛ mawarɛ ana ɔfiniki i ma situ ame.
Ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ i ma Yudase ma mpia i Tesalonika ɔnɔ sɔ Paulo pia ɔto ɔɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i Beroia ne, makɛlɛ sɔ maapia ikpɔkpɔtɔ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
Mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔta ɔluwɛ̃ makɔ Paulo makɛlɛgu ɔpo katɔ̃. Ɣɛɛ Silas gu Timoteo ɔkpese mawe i Beroia.
Mma lokɔ Paulo maruigu ɔsiai wũ masɛ maabo Atene. Gɔ makpese mato makɛlɛ ne, Paulo ɔsia ma kanya sɔ masɛ maaɣere Silas gu Timoteo sɔ mapɛ siwa si maba maatu wũ i mmɔ.
Ɔwi gɔ i Paulo pia i Atene ɔsia Silas gu Timoteo mɛrɛ̃ ne, so ɔma wũ gbaã gɔ ɔnya kumɛgɔ i ɔmagɛ̃ ɔyi ku aɣɔ.
Ne ɔso ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɖiɖi ara karɔ̃ ɔte ma Yudase gu mma nsɛ manigã Ɣaa i ma kasarɛkɔ̃. Iyi biara ne, ɔla ɔ̃ɔɖi ara karɔ̃ ɔ̃ɔte mma ɔsɛ ɔnya i itiri gu mma nto mafe i siri iso.
Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, mma mpia i Epikuro gu Stoa akuri ame ma nɖe kayiiso manɔgbadze ɔtsɛ kakpadzɛ̃ ku Paulo sɔ, “Be iso i ɔrɛrɛ̃ kutsuɛɣɛdze gɔgbe to ɔɖe ika?”
Ne mawɛ̃ ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ibara lɛ karɔ̃ mama aɣɔ iso itɔ̃me ɔto ɔɣɛ.” Mmamɔ ɔɣɛ ngbɔ, alasɔ manɔ gɔ Paulo to ɔɣɛ ara i Yesu gu makpise ita iso.
Ne ɔso makɔ wũ makɛlɛgu ngbegɔ masɛ marɔ sɔ Areopago fiɛ iɖe makpakpa kasarɛkɔ̃ maɣere wũ sɔ, “Bobie sɔ boatsue ara ɣɛtɛ wa ato ate ngbe.
Ara wa ato aɣɛ to abara bo ɣaa, ne ɔso bobie sɔ bonɔ wã karɔ̃.”
Atene maturi ɔɖuɖu gu mafɔ ma mpia i karɔ̃ gamɔ iso ɔɖuɖu ne, maba kɔrɔ̃ matã ara ɣɛtɛ iɣɛ gu wã inɔ ɔwi biara.
Gɔ Paulo ɔta ɔya i kasarɛkɔ̃ i ma katɔ̃ ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Lonya sɔ mi Atene maturi ne, mipia i kasumu ame gbaã.

Alasɔ gɔ lopia loki i mi ɔmagɛ̃ ame fiɛ lokarã inɔ ne, lonya itĩ iwɛ̃ nɛ masɛ masɔrɛ fiɛ matsɛrɛ i ne iso sɔ, ‘Ɣaa gɔ boiɣe ɔkpɛ i ngbe ne.’ Ɣaa gɔ miiɣe fiɛ misɛ misɔrɛ ne, ɔ̃ iso itɔ̃me iɖe loto lobie sɔ loɣere mi kiniɔ ne.
“Ɣaa gɔ lobara kayiiso gu ira biara nɛ mpia i kã ame, ɔ̃ nɖe kato gu karɔ̃ Sate ne. Ɔ̃isɛ ɔsɛ i iyo nɛ matsue ala ɔturi nrɔɔ̃ ame.
Fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔturi loasu ɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ ɔbara kuira ɔtã wũ lɛ ngɔ i ira ɔnya alasɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ lotã ɔbiara ngbã gu iwarã gu nwa ɔɖuɖu nsɛ anya ma.
Ɔ̃ lobara maturi ɔɖuɖu iki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ iso fiɛ ɔtã sɔ maɣa makã kayi ɔɖuɖu iso. Ɔ̃ lotã kaɖe biara kɛkɛ ngbegɔ masi. Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ losɛ ɔwi gu agbanayi ɔtã ɔbiara kɛkɛ.
Ɣaa ɔbara nwagbe ɔtã bo lɛ ɔ̃ maturi sɔ si boanyɔnyɔ wũ bonya wũ atoa sɔ tee ɔ̃idzorogu bo kuwɛ̃ fiɛ.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɔ̃ ɔso boba ngbã boto bopɛpɛgu so fiɛ boawe ana.’ Fiɛ mi agbã mapɛdze mawɛ̃ ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɔ̃ mabi gu mawa boɖe.’
“Gɔ Ɣaa mabi boɖe ɔso ne, midaatã bobu sɔ Ɣaa kumiamia se lɛ ara wa bobaragu ala sikãrɛtɛa, ɣee ala sikãfudza, ɣee ita, ɣee ira nɛ mawe.
Ita i kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ iba iabo ɔwi gɔgbe ame ne, Ɣaa iikpadzɛ̃ maturi atsue sɔ be ɔso maiɣe wũ. Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ɔto ɔkpere maturi ɔɖuɖu sɔ mafiniki.
Alasɔ ɔ̃ɔsɛ iyi nɛ iso i ngɔ ɔɖi ɔsɛ aaba ɔ̃aɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me i ɔri iso. Fiɛ ɔɖi ngɔ ɔsia ikparĩ ɔsɛ ɔte bo sekelee gɔ ɔtara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame.”
Gɔ manɔ Paulo ɔɖe ika i makpise ita iso ne, mawɛ̃ i ma ndɛ̃ ɔtsɛ wũ ima. Mawɛ̃ ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Boabie sɔ aaba aaɣere bo itɔ̃me nɛgbe ku iyi mama.”
Gɔ iba ngbɔ ne, Paulo ɔrui ɔnyua ma.
Ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ ɔsiai wũ, mafiniki makpese mafɔɖedze. Ma ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ nɖe Areopago ɔturi gɔ marɔ Dionisio gu ɔrɔ̃go gɔ marɔ Damari gu mamama ana.
Ne kama ne, Paulo ɔrui i Atene ɔkɛlɛ Korinto.

Mmɔ iɖe ɔsɛ ɔ̃anya ɔ Yudase gɔ marɔ Akwila fiɛ maɣe wũ i Ponto. Ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ ɔre Priskila gɔ lobɔrɛ i Italia ɔba mmɔ iidzoro, alasɔ Roma Igarakpakpa gɔ marɔ Klaudio ɔɣɛ sɔ ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu si mabɔrɛ i Roma. Paulo ɔsɛ ɔ̃atu ma,
ɔwe i ma kɔrɛ ɔbuai ma ku mabɔi siko ikã karabara alasɔ ɔ̃ wũ karabara gamɔ ɔsuã ne.
Iwarãyi biara ne, Paulo sɛ ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔ̃afafarɛgu ma Yudase gu ma Grikise ɔɖuɖu Itɔ̃me Bielea sɔ si maafiniki.
Gɔ Silas gu Timoteo ɔse i Makedonia maba ne, Paulo ɔna ɔwi kukaakɔ ɔtã Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣɛ gu ara ite ma Yudase sɔ Yesu nɖe Mesia gbaã.

Gɔ ma Yudase ɔta maya Paulo iso fiɛ maɣɛ anyakpi i ɔ̃ iso ne, ɔkpakpa so ɔte ma ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Si mikpi miwɔ ne, wũ nrɔɔ̃ gu wũ ngba na i ne ame, loɔbara wũ karabara. Ita i kiniɔ ne, ka loakɛlɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase kɔrɛ loaɣere ma Itɔ̃me Bielea.”
Gɔ ɔrui i ma kɔrɛ ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔwe i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ loiɖe ɔ Yudase fiɛ marɔ wũ Tito Yusto gɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ Ɣaa fiɛ ɔsi ɔmatã ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
Kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔkpakpa gɔ marɔ Krispo gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔfɔ Bosate maɖe, ne mafɔ Ɣaa itupie ne. Itã sɔ maturi gbodzoo ɔfɔ maɖe ne mafɔ Ɣaa itupie i Korinto mmɔ ne.
Kasɛ̃ kawɛ̃ ne, Bosate ɔɣere Paulo i kurɛ ame sɔ, “Daanigã! Daanyua itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔɣɛ.
Alasɔ lopiagu-ɔ fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iibawo-ɔ ikpi kuiwɛ̃ ɔbara. Maturi gbodzoo pia i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe ame gɔ maɖe wũ mare.”
Ne ɔso Paulo ɔwe i mmɔ ikɔ ku awa akuɔ ɔte ma Ɣaa itɔ̃me.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ Galio ɔba ɔ̃akpese Roma abã ɔkpakpa i Akaya ibuiti iso ne, ma Yudase ɔbara kanya kawɛ̃ makpadzɛ̃ Paulo makɛlɛgu atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃.
Maɖaɛ wũ kanya sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe to ɔte maturi Ɣaa kasumu i ɔri gɔ loikotegu bo mmara iso.”
Gɔ Paulo ɔbie sɔ si ɔɖi so kanya ne, Galio ɔɣere ma Yudase sɔ, “Si ira nyanyarĩa irere, ɣee mmara itu iɖe misu mibɔ ne, loana ɔtu lokã mi atsue.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ kakpadzɛ̃ siefe ga lose i mi atɔ̃me, ayere gu mmara iso iɖe ne, mi mɔmɔ misɛ miaɣɛ. Iiɖe me nɖe mi atɔ̃meɣɛdze i ara wamɔ iso.”
Ne ɔso ɔsa ma ɔɖi i atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃.
Ne iturikuri nɛgbe ɔsɛ maamɔɛ̃ Sostene gɔ nɖe ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ tɔ̃ɖedze mapɛ wũ i atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Ɣɛɛ Galio iipia ma kanya.

Paulo ɔwe i Korinto ɔmagɛ̃ ame ayi gbodzoo. Ne kama ɔkala mafɔɖedze fiɛ ɔ̃ gu Akwila gu Priskila ɔki i ndu iso makɛlɛ Siria ne. Ɣɛɛ si ɔ̃arui ne, Paulo ɔtã sɔ mafiɛ ɔ̃ iti i Kenkrea ala ma Yudase kubarara kuwɛ̃ gɔ ɔbara ɔso.
Gɔ ɔso i Efeso ne, ɔnyua Priskila gu Akwila ɔsɛ i mmɔ. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ ne, ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ sɔ ɔ̃aki i ara awɛ̃ ame ku ma.
Matã wũ iti sɔ ɔwe i ma kɔrɛ ɔbua, ɣɛɛ ɔnya sɔ ɔna ɔwi.
Ne ɔso gɔ ɔto ɔrui ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Si Ɣaa ɔtɔrã ne, nto loaledza ikpese iba mi kɔrɛ.” Ne ɔkpese ɔbo i ɔkolo ame fiɛ ɔrui i Efeso ne.
Gɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo Kaisarea ne, ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Yerusalem ɔsɛ ɔ̃aya mafɔɖedze. Ne ka ɔfe ɔkɛlɛ Antiokia ne.
Gɔ ɔwe i mmɔ kɛkɛĩ ne, ɔledza ikɛlɛ isɛ iaki i Galatia gu Frigia karɔ̃ iso. Ɔwi gɔgbe ɔɖuɖu ne, ɔwe ɔkiki i mafɔɖedze ma nto masarɛ ɔpia ma ɔle.
Ɔ Yudase ɔwɛ̃ ɔba Efeso gɔ marɔ Apolo, fiɛ maɣe wũ i Aleksandria. Ɔɖe ɔturi gɔ nɣe ɔko kukaakɔ, fiɛ ɔɣe Ɔko Sekelea ame atɔ̃me ana.
Kɔra sɔ maɔte wũ Bosate iso ara fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɣɛ Yesu itɔ̃me ikote kukaakɔ ku ɔtɔ ne, Yohanes itupie iso ara kere ɔɣe.
Gɔ ɔta ɔya ɔto ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me ku katetere i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ fiɛ Priskila gu Akwila ɔnɔ ne, makɔ wũ makɛlɛgu ma iyo masɛ maɖiɖi Bosate itɔ̃me ame mate wũ kukaakɔ mabua.

Gɔ Apolo ɔsia ita sɔ ɔ̃akɛlɛ Akaia ne, mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Efeso ɔpia wũ ɔle matsɛrɛ ɔko matã wũ sɔ ɔkɛlɛgu mafɔɖedze ma i mmɔ sɔ si ɔba ɔ̃abo ne, mafɔ wũ kukaakɔ. Gɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo ne, ɔbuai maturi gbodzoo ma lofɔ maɖe iki i Bosate abualɛra ame.
Ma Yudase iina kayakpa i atɔ̃me kanya alasɔ ɔsu Ɔko Sekelea ame atɔ̃me wa lote sekelee sɔ Yesu nɖe Kristo.
Ɔwi gɔ i Apolo pia i Korinto ne, Paulo ana ɔki i ngba ɔri ɔfe ɔkɛlɛ Efeso ɔsɛ ɔ̃anya mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃.
Ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Ita i ɔwi gɔ mifɔ miɖe ne, miɔfɔ Siwarã Bielea?”
Ne matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ooɣo! Be nɖe Siwarã Bielea? Boinɔ ne iso kuira.”
Ne ɔledza ma ikarɛ sɔ, “Ne iyɔ be Ɣaa itupie mifɔ?”
Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Yohanes itupie itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɣɛ iɖe bofɔ.”
Ne Paulo ka ɔɖiɖi karɔ̃ ɔte ma sɔ, “Yohanes ɔpie maturi ndu sɔ mafiniki mabɔrɛ i ma akpi ame. Ɔɣere ma sɔ ngɔ nsiai wũ ɔto ɔba si mafɔ maɖe. Ngɔmɔ nɖe Yesu ne.”
Gɔ manɔ ngbɔ ne, matã ɔbara ma Ɣaa itupie kubarara i Bosate Yesu iyere ame.
Ne gɔ Paulo ɔsu nrɔɔ̃ ɔsia ma iso ne, Siwarã Bielea ɔba siayi ma ame ɔɖuɖu, fiɛ matsɛ siɖe agbãagbã iɣɛ, maɣɛ Bosate itɔ̃me ana.
Maaɖe lɛ marɛrɛ̃ iweo-inyɔ ɔɖui.
Paulo ɔla ɔ̃ɔsɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔla ɔ̃ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me ku ɔle awa atɛ, ɔɖiɖi ara karɔ̃ ɔte ma si ma adzuni si afiniki i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso.

Ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ ma loikã Itɔ̃me Bielea atsue ɔta maya Bosate itɔ̃me gu ara tea iso i kaɖe ɔɖuɖu anɔ. Ne ɔso Paulo ɔrui i ma kɔrɛ. Ɔruigu mma lofɔ maɖe makɛlɛ Tirano kasarɛkɔ̃. Mmɔ iɖe ɔla ɔ̃ɔte ma ara iyi biara ne.
Ɔte ma ara akɔ anyɔ. Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔki ikã Asia abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame, ne ɔso ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana ɔnɔ.
Bosate ɔtã Paulo ɔle siare gɔ ɔsu ɔbara awawãra.
Ne ɔso si masu ɔ̃ kuɖukui gu awu masɛ maapɛgu manyɛse ne, masɛ masarɛ, isɛ iwo siwarã lalaa ana ɔsa ɔɖi i mma ame sipia.
Ma Yudase mawase ma mpia maki ɔbu sɔ maawo Bosate Yesu iyere ɔsu ɔsa siwarã lalaa. Masɛ maɣɛ sɔ, “Losa mi i Yesu gɔ itɔ̃me i Paulo to ɔɣɛ sɔ mibɔrɛ i ngɔgbe ame!”
Ma Yudase sɔrɛdzekpakpa gɔ marɔ Skeva mabirɛrɛĩ ikɔdzɛ nto mabara nnɛgbe.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ masɛ maaɣere siwarã lalaa siwɛ̃ ngbɔ ne, sikarɛ ma sɔ, “Loɣe Yesu, fiɛ loɣe Paulo ana. Ɣɛɛ mi ne, mi nɖe mabe?”
Ngɔ iso i siwarã lalaa si ɔta ɔbo ma iso ɔpɛ ma! Mafɔ agbɛ fiɛ matere mabɔrɛ iyo isɔ̃isɔ̃ ala ɔkɛkɛ ma awu!
Ira nɛgbe ɔki ikã Efeso sɔ ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame ɔɖuɖu ɔnɔ. Itã sɔ ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma gbaã fiɛ masu kuwarɛ matã Bosate Yesu iyere mabua.
Mma lofiniki fiɛ mafɔ maɖe ɔba maabusi ma akpi maɣɛ i maturi ndɛ̃.
Ne mma mpia i ma ndɛ̃ maɖe mawase ɔsu ma sisɔbɛ gu siko dzɛ ame matsɛrɛ ma awara mapia mabɔ maatsuedza i maturi ndɛ̃ ne. Siko dzɛ matsuedza mmɔ kuɣa aaɖe lɛ sikãfudza kukpi siru ɔɖui.
Ne ɔso Bosate itɔ̃me ɔki ikã gu ɔle ifɔ ndɛ̃ mmɔ ɔɖuɖu.
Nnɛgbe kama ne, Siwarã Bielea ɔtã Paulo ɔsia ita i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame sɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aki i Makedonia gu Akaia fiɛ ɔ̃akɛlɛ Yerusalem. Ne ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Si lobo mmɔ ne, loto loafe lokɛlɛ Roma ana.”
Ɔpia ɔ̃ mabuaidze inyɔ, Timoteo gu Erasto, sɔ maɖe wũ katɔ̃ makɛlɛ Makedonia. Ne ka ɔkpese ɔwe i Asia kɛkɛĩ ɔbua ne.
Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, kulu siare kuwɛ̃ ɔba i mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Efeso iso iki i ma kafɔkaɖe iso.
Ngɔ losɛ kulu gɔgbe karɔ̃ nɖe Demetrio gɔ nsɛ ɔsu sikãfudza ɔpɔ ala Artemi kuɣɔ iyo wiriwiria. Ara wagbe irɔdɛ̃ sɛ ibɔ ma gu ɔ̃ mabuaidze kusia gbodzoo.
Iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Demetrio ɔkpere ma gu mma nsɛ mabara karabara ɔsirakanya ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Wũ manyii, miɣe sɔ bosɛ bona kusia gbaã i bo karabara gagbe ame.

Mito minɔ, fiɛ mito minya kukaakɔ kumɛgɔ i Paulo to ɔbɔ bo karabara karɔ̃, alasɔ ɔ̃ɔfinikira maturi gbodzoo adzuni sɔ aɣɔra wa boto bobara ɔɖuɖu iikote sɔ maabɔ ati karɔ̃ matã! Ne ɔso i bo karabara ɔɔba karɔ̃ ne! Fiɛ iiɖe Efeso ngbe kere ito iba ngbɔ. Ɣɛɛ ne, Asia karɔ̃ iso ɔɖuɖu!
Ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe bo karabara ɔnɔwɛ̃ kere loanina! Gbagbaã ne, bo kuɣɔ Rɔ̃gokpakpa Artemi iyo siare gu ɔ̃ kuwarɛ ɔɖuɖu ana to kuayu i Asia gu kayiiso ɔɖuɖu!”
Gɔ manɔ Demetrio ikaɖe ne, sikpã lalaa ɔmɔɛ̃ ma matsɛ kulu teteree mato maɣɛ sɔ, “Efeso kuɣɔ Rɔ̃gokpakpa Artemi nɖe ɔkpakpa pelepele!”
Kulu siare gɔgbe ɔki kukã ɔmagɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu ame. Ne ɔso masakanya lɛ ikuri fiɛ masɛ maamɔɛ̃ Paulo masiaidze inyɔ ma marɔ Gaio gu Aristarko ma lobɔrɛ i Makedonia makɛlɛgu ɔmagɛ̃ kasarɛkɔ̃.
Paulo ana ɔbie sɔ si ɔkɛlɛ mmɔ, ɣɛɛ mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ iitã wũ ɔri.
Ta makpakpa ma nto manyɔ ibuiti nɛmɔ iso fiɛ maɖe Paulo malaa ɔpia wũ ɔturi sɔ matã wũ iti ne, ɔdaasɛ mmɔ ɖuɖuuɖu!
Iyo ame ɔɖuɖu ɔyigu kulu fiɛ mma loba maasakanya ɔbiara to ɔɣɛ ɔ̃ ire. Ma kasɛ siare kɔra iiɣe nnɛ ɔso fiɛ maba mmɔ.
Ma Yudase ɔli Aleksandro masɛ maaɣedza i katɔ̃ sɔ ɔɣɛ nnɛ loba. Ne ɔkɔlɛ nrɔɔ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ malo kulu si ɔɣere ma ira iwɛ̃.
Gɔ matsue sɔ ɔ Yudase ɔɖe ne, mala kulu teteree lɛ iɖɔwũ inyɔ buu mato maɣɛ sɔ, “Efeso kuɣɔ Rɔ̃gokpakpa Artemi nɖe ɔkpakpa pelepele!”

Ɔwi kurukutu ame ne, abã ɔkpakpa ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃ɔwo ma ɔlora sɔ, “Mi Efeso maturi, mi ɔbiara ɣe sɔ Efeso ngbe i kuɣɔkpakpa Artemi iyo pia fiɛ ɔ̃ ita nɛ lokpase ibɔrɛ i kuɖokpo bosɛ bosɔrɛ ana ne, bo ndɛ̃ ise.
Kuwɛ̃ na gɔ ɔ̃awo nnɛgbe ɔsɛ̃. Ne ɔso mina ɔtu si sikpã si siɣɔ mi.
Alasɔ mma mimɔɛ̃ mibɔ ngbe ne, maiyu kayu i kuɣɔ iyo fiɛ mainina kuira i Artemi iyere ana iso.
Si Demetrio gu ɔ̃ matorese laa ɔnya sɔ maba itɔ̃me irere gu ɔrere ne, boba matɔ̃meɣɛdze. Fiɛ boba ayi wa iso masɛ maɣɛ atɔ̃me ana. Maawo ma akpi ɔɖi ɔte mmagbe iyɔ maɔtã maɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me i ɔri iso.
Ɣɛɛ si ira mama pia mito mibie sɔ miaɖi mibɔ ne, misu misɛ i matɔ̃meɣɛdze katɔ̃ si maaɣɛ ne i mmara kanya.
Boto boamɔrɛ̃ si maɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me i nɔme kulu gɔgbe iso alasɔ bona nnɛ boasu boɖi so kanya.”
Gɔ ɔɣere ma nnɛgbe ne, ɔtã masame.
Gɔ kulu gɔmɔ ɔba kualo ne, Paulo ɔkpere mafɔɖedze ɔsirakanya ɔpia ma ɔle i kafɔkaɖe ame, ɔmala ma so fiɛ ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Makedonia.
Gɔ ɔɣo ɔri ne, Paulo ɔki i abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame ɔtã ma kuka gbodzoo ɔsu ɔpia ma katetere gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔbo Akaia.
Ɔwe i mmɔ awa atɛ. Gɔ ɔto ɔledza so sɔ ɔ̃arui ɔkɛlɛ Siria ne, ɔnya sɔ ma Yudase mawɛ̃ ma mpia i mmɔ to mabie sɔ maaɖoe wũ. Ne ɔso ɔbara adzuni sɔ ɔ̃akpese ɔki i Makedonia.

Gɔ ɔto ɔkɛlɛ ne, mma losiai wũ mawɛ̃ nɖe Sopater gɔ lobɔrɛ i Beroia fiɛ ɔɖe Piro ɔbi gu Aristarko gu Sekundo gɔ lobɔrɛ i Tesalonika gu Gayo gɔ lobɔrɛ i Derbe gu Tihiko gu Trofimo ma lobɔrɛ i Asia abuiti gu Timoteo.
Mmagbe ɔɖe bo katɔ̃ sɔ masɛ maawe masia bo i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Troa.
Gɔ Boɖoboɖo Gɔ Loita Iɖe Iyi ɔfe ne, bosu ɔkolo i Filipi. Ayi aru kama ne, bosɛ boatu ma i Troa fiɛ ka bowe i mmɔ ayi akɔdzɛ.
Ɖapɛ iyi ɖeakatɔ̃ iso ne, bosakanya sɔ boasɛ ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃. Ne kumɛgɔ i Paulo to ɔ̃arui ku kaɖesɛ̃a ɔso ne, ɔɖe ma ika isɛ iabo kasɛ̃ ndɛ̃.
Matsue sikaniɛ gbodzoo masɛ i iyo nɛ ame mapia i kato.

Ɔporoporoi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Eutiko fiɛ ɔsi i fesere iso ɔtsɛ sirɛ itua gɔ Paulo to ɔɖe ika. Gɔ ikaɖe to ikarã ne, sirɛ ɔsu wũ. Ɔkpase ɔbɔrɛ i iyo nɛ matsue masia ikpɛ itɛ iso ɔba ɔ̃awuĩ i karɔ̃. Gɔ masɛ maaputa wũ ne, manya sɔ ɔkpi.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ Paulo ɔso ɔkɛlɛ fiɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ ɔpia so ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midaapɛ sikpabo ne ɔpia ngbã!”
Gɔ Paulo ɔledza iya iba kato mmɔ ne, bosɛ ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃. Ne ka ɔledza ika iɖe gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ fiɛ ɔrui ne.
Maturi ɔsu ɔporoporoi gɔ mpia ngbã makɛlɛgu iyo fiɛ ɔtu ɔɣɔ ma gbaã.
Paulo ɔki i ngba ɔri ɔkɛlɛ Aso, ɣɛɛ bo mma nsɛgu wũ sɔ boasɛ wũ ɔri ɔsu ɔkolo boɖe wũ katɔ̃ sɔ boasarɛ i mmɔ fiɛ ka boasu wũ lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔɣɛ.
Gɔ ɔba ɔ̃ɔtu bo i Aso ne, ɔbo i ɔkolo ame fiɛ ka bokɛlɛ Mitilene.
Kaɖesɛ̃a ne, bokɛlɛ Kio. Ne kaɖesɛ̃a bokɛlɛ Samo. Iyi tɛare ne, borui bokɛlɛ Mileto.
Paulo ɔtã sɔ boiki i Efeso, alasɔ ɔ̃ito ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃ɔnina ɔwi gbodzoo i Asia. Ɔsia ita sɔ si ɔ̃awo ne, ɔ̃abo Yerusalem ku Pentekoste iyi iso.
Gɔ bosɛ boabo Mileto ne, Paulo ɔpia Efeso mafɔɖedze makpakpa ɔturi sɔ maba maanya wũ i mmɔ.
Gɔ maba ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi ɔɖuɖu ɣe kumɛgɔ losɛgu mi ita i iyi nɛ loba Asia karɔ̃ iso iba iabo nɔme gɔgbe.
Minya sɔ losiai Bosate i karɔ̃ ibɔso ame atoa sɔ lona inyɛwe gu nnɔmɛ iki kumɛgɔ i ma Yudase ɔbie sɔ maaɖoe me ɔso.
Gbaã ne, loisɛ̃ sɔ loaɣere mi ara wa loɣe i Bosate iso i mi ayo gu ɔgbami. Lobara ngbɔ alasɔ lobie sɔ mitsue ara wa loaɖe mi kusia.
Kakɔi biara ga losɛ ne, loɣere ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɔ manyua ara nyanyarĩa ɔbara si mafiniki masiai Ɣaa si mafɔ Bosate Yesu maɖe.
“Kiniɔ ne, Siwarã ɣɛ me iso sɔ lokɛlɛ Yerusalem atoa sɔ loiɣe nnɛ loabɔrɛ me iso i mmɔ.
Simagɛ̃ dzɛ ɔɖuɖu ame loɔkiki ne, Siwarã Bielea to sitã me lotsue sɔ iyo irɛ gu inyɛwe se isia me i Yerusalem.
Wũ ngbã iisu me kuira, nnɛ lonya me iɖo nɖe sɔ loabara karabara ga i Bosate Yesu ɔpia me sɔ lobara. Fiɛ nnɛ ɔpia me sɔ lobara nɖe sɔ loɣere maturi Itɔ̃me Bielea sɔ Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ bo nnya.
Loɔwe lokiki loɣere mi Itɔ̃me i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, loɣe sɔ mi kuwɛ̃ iisibanya me minya.
Nto loɣere mi nɔme sɔ, loisibatã mi kuwɛ̃ ngbã akɔnta.
Loɔɣere mi ira biara nɛ i Ɣaa to ɔbie sɔ mitsue.

Ne ɔso minyɔ so kukaakɔ gu mma ɔɖuɖu i Siwarã Bielea ɔsu sipia i mi nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ mikɔkɔ. Miɖe matɔ̃ɖedze sɔ miakɔkɔ mma i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã mi sɔ mikararã. Midzuɛ̃ ma kukaakɔ alasɔ Ɣaa ɔsu ɔ̃ Ɔbi ima ɔfere i karɔ̃ sɔ si ɔɖi ma.
Loɣe kukaakɔ sɔ si lorui ne, maturi to maata maya mi iso masamarã mi lɛ kumɛgɔ i ɔgidi sɛ ɔkpɛ̃gu masɛrɛ fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔnyɔ ma nnya.
Mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ana to maasu itɔ̃me sɛɛ mapɛyu makɔ maturi gbodzoo maayura iki ma mila ara ite ame.
Midzuɛ̃ so si minyigi kumɛgɔ lobiɛ i mi iti gu kumɛgɔ lote mi ara kasɛ̃ i kakɔme akɔ atɛ wa lowe i mi kɔrɛ ame.
“Kiniɔ ne, losu mi nto lopia i Ɣaa nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ ɔdzuɛ̃ mi i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ nsɛ ibuai maturi si ipia mi kafɔkaɖe ɔle, itã sɔ miaɖe mma loaɖe sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ara gu mma ɔɖi ɔsɛ so.
Anɔ iirɛtɛ me i kuwɛ̃ sikã ɣee sikati ara iso.
Mi mɔmɔ ɣe sɔ wũ nrɔɔ̃ mɛgbe lobara ala karabara fiɛ loɖe ara lokuti losu lonyɔ mma nsiai me iso.
Lobara ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu lote mi kumɛgɔ ikote sɔ boabuai mawɛrɛba fiɛ si lonyigira mi Bosate Yesu itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Kusɛkusɛ pia i ara itã ame iɖo ifɔ.’ ”
Gɔ Paulo ɔro ikaɖe ne, ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ ku ma ɔɖuɖu ɔkparamagu ma kayi.
Ma ɔɖuɖu ɔpɔrɛ wũ matsɛ kaku ala kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔmala ma so ɔso.
Nnɛ lotã so ɔkɔ̃ ma kɔra nɖe kumɛgɔ ɔɣere ma sɔ maisibanya wũ manya. Makɔ wũ masɛ maabo ɔkolo katɔ̃.
Gɔ boro so ɔmala ne, bobo i ɔkolo ame bowara bokɛlɛ Kos. Kaɖesɛ̃a ne, bosɛ boabo Roda fiɛ ka bobɔrɛ i mmɔ bokɛlɛ Patara.
Mmɔ iɖe bosu ɔkolo ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔkɛlɛ Foinike ne.
Gɔ bonya Kipro karɔ̃ bosese ne, boki i kã kala isɛ bofe bokɛlɛ Tiro i Siria ngbegɔ masɛ maaɖi ato wa mpia i ɔkolo ame.
Gɔ bonya mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ne, bowegu ma akpɛnɛ akɔdzɛ. Siwarã Bielea ɔki i mafɔɖedze magbe iso maka Paulo sɔ ɔdaakɛlɛ Yerusalem.
Gɔ bo ayi wa boawegu ma ɔɔsɔ̃ fiɛ ka boarui ne, mafɔɖedze gu ma mare gu mabi ɔkɔ bo makɛlɛgu ɔpo katɔ̃, ne bo ɔɖuɖu ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ bokparama kayi ne.
Gɔ bo mala ma so boro ne, bobo i ɔkolo ame, ne ma wũ ka makpese makɛlɛ ma ayo ne.
Gɔ borui i Tiro ne, boba boatui i Ptolemai. Bosɛ boaya mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ fiɛ bowegu ma ikpɛnɛ iwɛ̃.
Kaɖesɛ̃a ne, bota bokɛlɛ Kaisarea, bosɛ boabo Itɔ̃me Bielea ɣɛdze Filipo iyo. Ɔ̃ wũ ɔpia i mabuaidze ikɔdzɛ ma maɖi i Yerusalem ndɛ̃.
Ɔba mabirɔ̃gomi ina ma loiyiri marã fiɛ maɖe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze.
Bowe i mmɔ ayi kɛkɛĩ fiɛ Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Agabo ɔbɔrɛ i Yudea ɔba.

Gɔ ɔba bo kɔrɛ ne, ɔɖi kafiami ga mpia i Paulo ɔsɔ ame ɔnyi so nrɔɔ̃ gu ngba ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Siwarã Bielea sɔ ngbɔ i ma Yudase ma i Yerusalem aanyi ngɔ kafiami kaɖe i ngbe fiɛ maasu wũ mapia i mma loiɖe ma Yudase nrɔɔ̃ ame ne.”
Gɔ bonɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ne, bo gu mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔɖuɖu ɔtã Paulo iti sɔ ɔdaakɛlɛ Yerusalem.
Ne ɔɣere bo sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ mito mibiɛ mifɛfɛ̃ me nrɔɔ̃ ngbɔ? Loito lonyɔ ɔri sɔ iyo kere maapia me i Bosate Yesu iti, ɣɛɛ lotɔrã sɔ maɖoe me i Yerusalem ala ɔ̃ ɔso.”
Gɔ bonya sɔ boibawo ɔ̃ adzuni ɔfinikira ne, bonyua wũ boɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa si ɔbara ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ.”
Ayi kurukutu kama ne, bosa bo ara kanya boɣo Yerusalem ɔri.
Kaisarea mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ana ɔsiai bo. Makɔ bo makɛlɛgu ɔ Kiprose fɔɖedzekpakpa kuere gɔ marɔ Mnason sɔ si bosɛ boasora i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
Gɔ bobo Yerusalem ne, mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔfɔ bo kukaakɔ.
Kaɖesɛ̃a ne, Paulo ɔkɔ bo bosɛ boanya Yakobo gu Yerusalem mafɔɖedze makpakpa ɔɖuɖu.
Gɔ boya so boro ne, Paulo ɔɣere ma ara wa ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa ɔbara ɔkigu i ɔ̃ iso i mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃.
Mma ɔɖuɖu lonɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ɔle Ɣaa, maɣere Paulo sɔ, “Bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse, aɣe ma Yudase kukpi gbodzoo ma lofɔ maɖe fiɛ makpese mamɔɛ̃ Mose mmara mato teteree.
Manyiiɔ ɔɣere ma sɔ ato ate ma Yudase ma mpia i abuiti sɔ madaasiai Mose mmara gu bo mawa kubarara, fiɛ aɣɛ ana sɔ madaatu ma mabi sirɛrɛ̃.
Be boabara kiniɔ? Alasɔ mato maanɔ kokooko sɔ aba.”
Ne matã wũ adzuni sɔ, “Boba marɛrɛ̃ ina mawɛ̃ i bo ɔmagɛ̃ ame i ngbe gɔ makã ndamu.
Kɔ ma si mikɛlɛ ma Yudase isɔrɛyo si misɛ miasekelera so, si abuai ma ku ati ikparɛ̃ kuso. Ne loatã maturi ɔɖuɖu aatsue sɔ sila siɖe mala maisia-ɔ iso ku ɔwi gɔ ame amɔɛ̃ Mose mmara ato kukaakɔ ne.

Ɔwi gɔ lofe ne, botsɛrɛ ɔko botã mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ mafiniki makpese mafɔɖedze sɔ manyua ara wa masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ ɔɖe, manyua ima ɔɖe, si madaaɖe mabɔi ma manyɛdɛ̃ simɔ maɖoe, ana ne, manyua marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go kasɛ ga loikote.”

Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, Paulo ɔkɔ marɛrɛ̃ mamɔ makɛlɛ masɛ maabara so ati ikparɛ̃ kubarara. Ne kama ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase isɔrɛyo sɔ maatã masɔrɛdze itsue ayi wa iso i ma ati ikparɛ̃ aaba fiɛ maasu ma karatã mabɔ maasu makpakpa so.
Gɔ iɔkuti kɛkɛĩ fiɛ maaro ayi akɔdzɛ wamɔ ne, ma Yudase mawɛ̃ ma lobɔrɛ i Asia abuiti ɔba maanya Paulo i Isɔrɛyo. Masa maturi gbodzoo kanya, ne mamɔɛ̃ wũ ne.

Matsɛ kulu i mmɔ sɔ, “Israel marɛrɛ̃, mibuai bo soo! Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe pia ɔki ɔɣere maturi ɔɖuɖu i kakɔi biara ara nyanyarĩa i bo kaɖe gu Mose mmara gu bo Isɔrɛyo iso. Ana ne, ɔkɔ ma Grikise ɔba ɔ̃ɔbogu i kakɔi sekelea gagbe!”
Maɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, manya sɔ Paulo gu Trofimo gɔ nɖe ɔ Efesose sɛ i Yerusalem. Ne ɔso mabu sɔ ɔkɔ wũ ɔbogu i Isɔrɛyo ame.
Kulu gɔgbe ɔtara ɔmagɛ̃ kuɣedza, ne ɔso maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔtere masɛ maasakanya i Isɔrɛyo. Makpadzɛ̃ Paulo maɖi i Isɔrɛyo masɛ̃ akui ɔɖuɖu ɔluwɛ̃.
Ɔwi gɔ mabie sɔ si maɖoe wũ ne, ma Romase makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔnɔ sɔ ma Yerusalemse ɔɖuɖu to mabara kulu.
Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔkɔ makpakpɛ̃dze gu makpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa mawɛ̃ makɛlɛ ngbegɔ mato mabara kulu. Gɔ kulu mabaradze ɔnya makpakpɛ̃dze gu ma tɔ̃ɖedze ne, manyua Paulo ɔpɛ.
Makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔmɔɛ̃ Paulo ɔtã mapia wũ kugbagɔrɔĩ kunyɔ. Ne ka ɔkarɛ sɔ si ɔtsue ɔturi gɔ igbã ɔɖe gu nnɛ ɔbara ne.
Mmagbe ndɛ̃ ɔbiara to ɔɣɛ ɔ̃ ire. Ne gɔ makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze iito ɔnɔ itɔ̃me suɖea kuiwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛgu i ma kɔrɛ ala kulu ɔso ne, ɔtã masu Paulo maapia i makpakpɛ̃dze iyo ame.
Gɔ mabo kayogodɔ̃ ne, ipia sɔ makpakpɛ̃dze aaputa Paulo, alasɔ maturi situ to sitsue ala ɔ̃ ɔso.
Mma nsiai ma i kama to mala kulu teteree sɔ, “Miɖoe wũ! Miɖoe wũ!”
Ɔwi gɔ mabie sɔ si masu wũ mapia i iyo ame ne, Paulo ɔɣere makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze sɔ, “Lobie sɔ loɖegu-ɔ ika kɛkɛĩ.”
Ne makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Nene ato anɔ Griki siɖe?
Iiɖe fɔ nɖe ɔ Egiptese gɔ lokɔ maturiɖoese kukpi kuna ma lota maya i abã iso ɔwi gɔ lofe ngbe fiɛ matere makɛlɛ fafuĩ ame?”
Ne Paulo ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ooɣo, ɔ Yudase loɖe. Maɣe me i Tarso i Kilikia karɔ̃ iso. Ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ne, iiɖe ɔmagɛ̃ kosoi ɔɖe kɔra. Ne ɔso lotã-ɔ iti tã loɖe ma ika.”
Tɔ̃ɖedze gɔgbe ɔnɔ karɔ̃ sɔ Paulo si ɔɖe ma ika. Ne Paulo ɔba ɔ̃ɔya i sitĩ iso i kayogodɔ̃ ɔkɔlɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɔ̃ kato sɔ maturi si malo. Gɔ malo kananana ne, ɔɖe ma ika i si Yudase ame sɔ,
“Tete mɛrɛ̃ gu wũ manyii ma losakanya, misɛ o-o! Mitã loɖi so kanya si mi ɔɖuɖu si minɔ.”
Gɔ manɔ sɔ si Yudase ame ɔto ɔɖe ika ne, maledza ma kulu ibɔ karɔ̃. Ne Paulo ɔɣere ma sɔ,

“Ɔ Yudase loɖe. Maɣe me i Tarso i Kilikia karɔ̃ iso. Ɣɛɛ ne, Yerusalem ngbe iɖe losɛ suku. Gamaliel kayirinɔ losuã ara fiɛ mate me bo mawa mmara, ma kubarara gu ma akisi ɔɖuɖu kukaakɔ. Losu wũ ɔtu lotã Ɣaa lɛ kumɛgɔ i mi ɔɖuɖu to mibara i ngbe kiniɔ.
Ita i ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, lotsɛ ikpɛ̃gu mma nsiai kafɔkaɖe Ɔri ɣɛtɛ gɔgbe, lobie sɔ maɖoe ma, ne ɔso lomɔɛ̃ marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go lopia i iyo.

Sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele gu kasarɛkɔ̃ makpakpa aawo nnɛ loto loɣɛ ngbe ɔtsue, alasɔ ɔwi gɔ loto lokɛlɛ Damasko ne, matã me ɔko sɔ lokɛlɛgu ma Yudase ma i mmɔ si lomɔɛ̃ mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ, lonyi ma lobɔ Yerusalem si makpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue.
“Gɔ loto lokɛlɛ fiɛ iɔkuti kɛkɛĩ loabo Damasko fiɛ iaɖe lɛ kakɔme ndɛ̃ ne, ɔluwɛ̃ ifiɛ siare iwɛ̃ ɔfiɛ ibɔrɛ i kato ifere me iso!
Lobɔrɛ lofere i karɔ̃, ne lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Saulo, Saulo, be ɔso fiɛ ato akpɛ̃gu me ngbɔ?’
“Ne lokarɛ sɔ, ‘Bosate, fɔ nna aɖe?’
“Ne ɔtã me mmuai sɔ, ‘Mme nɖe Yesu Nasaretse gɔ ato akpɛ̃gu ne.’
Mma nsɛgu me ɔnya ifiɛ nɛgbe, ɣɛɛ mainɔ silɔ dzɛ loɖegu me ika.
“Ne lokarɛ wũ sɔ, ‘Bosate, be iɖe si lobara?’
“Ne ɔledza me iɣere sɔ, ‘Ta, si akɛlɛ Damasko. Mmɔ loate-ɔ karabara ga ɔso lokpere-ɔ ne.’
Ifiɛ siare nɛgbe ɔbiɛ me anɔmi, ne ɔso mma nsiai me ka lomɔɛ̃ me i kɔrɔ̃ fiɛ bosɛ boabo Damasko.
“Ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ pia gɔ marɔ Anania. Ɔɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔnigã Ɣaa, fiɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ bo mmara ana ɔto teteree. Ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu ma mpia i mmɔ sɛ mawarɛ wũ kukaakɔ.
Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔba ɔ̃ɔya i wũ kɔrɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Wũ ɔturi Saulo, busi anɔmi!’ Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, wũ anɔmi ɔkpa sekelee lonya wũ!
Ne ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Bo mawa Ɣaa loɖi-ɔ sɔ si aatsue ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ, aanya ɔ̃ Ɔbi Sekelea fiɛ aanɔ ɔ̃ kanya ame itɔ̃me.
Fɔ loasɛ aaɣere maturi ɔɖuɖu i kakɔi biara ara wa anya gu nwa anɔ ɔɖuɖu.
Kiniɔ ne, kuira iisikuti. Ta si afɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara si akparama kayi i ɔ̃ iyere ame fiɛ aafɔ fɔ akpi isu itsɛ.’
“Ne kama ne, lokpese lokɛlɛ Yerusalem. Gɔ lopia i isɔrɛyo loto lokparama kayi fiɛ ibara me lɛ sirɛ nto sisu me, ne lonya kaɖikate kawɛ̃.
Mmɔ i Bosate ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Pɛ siwa si arui i Yerusalem, alasɔ ngbe maturi iibakã-ɔ atsue manɔ wũ itɔ̃me nɛ aaɣɛ.’
“Ɣɛɛ loɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Bosate, ma ɔɖuɖu ɣe sɔ me lola loɔmɔɛ̃ mma lofɔ-ɔ maɖe sɔ boapɛ ma, bopia ma i iyo i kasarɛkɔ̃ biara.
Ɔwi gɔ mato maɖoe fɔ ɔɖabo Stefano ne, lopia kɔrɔ̃ i ne ame, fiɛ loya lodzuɛ̃ mma nto mapɛ wũ ata maɖoe awu.’
“Ɣɛɛ Bosate ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Ta kɛlɛ kadzorokɔ̃ ngbegɔ loapia-ɔ i mma loiɖe ma Yudase kɔrɛ!’ ”
Ɔwi gɔgbe ɔɖuɖu ne, maturi magbe ɔlo maɣɛ kananana mato makã Paulo atsue. Ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me tsɔra nɛgbe ne, ma ɔɖuɖu ɔtsɛ kulu teteree sɔ, “Aã! Miyura wũ mala! Miɖi wũ i karɔ̃ iso pelepele!”
Mato kulu teteree ne matsɛ ma awu ikɛkɛ, mato masa ɔsebu ana mapia i ɔwiri ame i sikpã ame.
Ne makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔɣere ma sɔ masu wũ mapia i iyo ame si mapɛ wũ fiɛ ɔ̃aɣere ma nnɛ ɔso fiɛ ma Yudase to mala kulu i ɔ̃ iti ngbɔ.
Ɔwi gɔ matsɛ wũ inyi ne, Paulo ɔkarɛ kpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɣɛ i mmɔ sɔ, “Ɔri pia sɔ mapɛ ɔ Romase gɔ maiɣɛgu atɔ̃me matã ipɔ?”
Ne ɔkpakpa gɔgbe ɔkɛlɛ ma tɔ̃ɖedze kɔrɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃akarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be ato abie sɔ abara i ngbe? Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne, ɔ Romase ɔɖe lo!”
Ne ɔso makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔkɛlɛ Paulo kɔrɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃akarɛ wũ sɔ, “Biele ne ɔ Romase aɖe?”
Ne Paulo ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ɔ Romase gɔdɛĩ loɖe!”
Ne tɔ̃ɖedze gɔgbe ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Mme wũ ne, ɔ Romase loɖe. Me ɣɛɛ ne, kuso lotã titiiti fiɛ lokpese ɔ Romase!”
Ne Paulo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Me ne, wũ maɣese ɔɖuɖu ne, ma Romase maɖe.”
Ɔluwɛ̃ gɔ mma ikote sɔ maakarɛ wũ atɔ̃me ɔnɔ sɔ ɔ Romase ɔɖe ne, ma ɔɖuɖu ɔkɛlɛ simasima. Gɔ ma tɔ̃ɖedze ɔtsue sɔ ɔ Romase ɔɖe ne, ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ gbaã, alasɔ ɔ̃ lotã ɔri fiɛ mapia wũ kugbagɔrɔĩ.

Makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃ɔtsue nnɛ loba ɔso fiɛ mato maɖaɛ Paulo kanya. Ne ɔso gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne ɔkpere ma Yudase masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma atɔ̃memaɣɛdze ɔɖuɖu maba maasakanya. Ɔtã sɔ maɖi Paulo mabɔ i ma katɔ̃ si mabo i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ame.
Gɔ Paulo ɔrara anɔ ɔnyɔ ma Yudase matɔ̃meɣɛdze ma loba maasɛ i atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ mmɔ kukaakɔ ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Wũ manyii, wũ ɔtu iitã me ipɔ i Ɣaa anɔmi ame iba iabo nɔme ikpɛnɛ nɛgbe iso.”
Gɔ Anania gɔ nɖe ma Yudase sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele i ma ndɛ̃ ɔnɔ Paulo ikaɖe ne, ɔɣere mma nɣɛ i Paulo kɔrɛ sɔ mapɛ wũ ɔrɔ̃ta i kanya.

Ne Paulo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɣaa si ɔpɛ-ɔ ɔrɔ̃ta fɔ wũ! Ibere nɛ makua futututu aɖe! Mme atɔ̃meɣɛdze igbã aɖe? Mmara mɛ iso asi sɔ ato aɣɛgu me atɔ̃me ne, me ame iso iɖe ato ata aya gɔ ato aɣɛ sɔ mapɛ me ne!”
Ne mma nɣɛ i Paulo kɔrɛ i mmɔ to makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ɣaa sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ato atia?”
Ne Paulo ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Manyii, loiɣe sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele, tee loiɖegu wũ ika ngbɔ. Alasɔ matsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, ‘Midaaɣɛ ira nyanyarĩa i mi tɔ̃ɖedze iso.’ ”

Gɔ Paulo ɔnya ɔɖi ite sɔ mma loba maasakanya ne, ma ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i ikuri nɛ marɔ ma Zadukise, fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana ɖe ma Farisise ne, ɔla kulu teteree sɔ, “Wũ manyii, ɔ Farisise loɖe, fiɛ ma Farisise ana loɣe me! Mato maɣɛgu me atɔ̃me alasɔ lofɔ loɖe sɔ makpise to maaledza ita!”
Gɔ ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, kakpadzɛ̃ ɔbo i aturikuri wagbe ndɛ̃, maɣɛ so aka anyɔ.
Alasɔ ma Zadukise sɛ maɣɛ sɔ makpise iisibata gu Ɣaa makpabo na gu siwarã agbãagbã ana na. Ɣɛɛ ma Farisise ɔfɔ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu maɖe.

Kulu siare ɔbo i ma ndɛ̃. Mmara matedze ma nɖe ma Farisise ɔya Paulo i kama sɔ gbaã iɖe. Matsɛ iɣɛ ku silɔ kpagɛa sɔ, “Boinya kuira nyanyarĩa i ɔ̃ iso! Siainyɔ Siwarã sirere ɣee Ɣaa kpabo loba ɔ̃ɔɖegu wũ ika!”

Kakpadzɛ̃ gagbe ɔkɔlɛ kato kabua. Ma ɔɖuɖu ɔmɔɛ̃ Paulo matsɛ wũ ikpakpadzɛ̃. Ne gɔ makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔnigã sɔ mato maakpadzɛ̃ wũ matutu ne, ɔɣere ɔ̃ makpakpɛ̃dze sɔ masɛ maafɔ wũ mabɔ maapia i iyo ame.
Iyi nɛmɔ kasɛ̃ ne, Bosate ɔba ɔ̃aya i Paulo kɔrɛ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Paulo, na ɔtu! Kumɛgɔ ame aɣɛ wũ iso itɔ̃me ngbe i Yerusalem ne, ngbɔ ame aaɣɛ i Roma ana ne.”
Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, ma Yudase mawɛ̃ ɔkã ndamu sɔ maibaɖe ɣee manɛ kuira si maiɖoe Paulo!
Mma lobara adzuni wagbe aaɖe lɛ marɛrɛ̃ sina gu kama.
Makɛlɛ masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma matɔ̃ɖedze kɔrɛ masɛ maaɣere ma sɔ, “Bokã ndamu sɔ boibaɖe ɣee bonɛ kuira si boiɖoe Paulo.
Ne ɔso mi gu atɔ̃memaɣɛdze si miɣere makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa sɔ ɔledza Paulo ikɔ ibɔ kasarɛkɔ̃ ngbe. Mibara lɛ mito mibie sɔ mikarɛ wũ atɔ̃me mibua. Si maɔɖi wũ mato mabɔ ne, iyɔ boɔɖoe wũ i ɔri.”
Ɣɛɛ gɔ Paulo ɔnyiiko ɔbirɛrɛĩ ɔnɔ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ne, ɔtere ɔkɛlɛ ngbegɔ mapia Paulo iyo ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere wũ.
Ne Paulo ɔkpere makpakpɛ̃dze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɣɛ i mmɔ ɔpia iyo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Kɔ ɔporoporoi gɔgbe kɛlɛgu mi tɔ̃ɖedze kɔrɛ. Ɔba itɔ̃me nyaa iwɛ̃ ɔ̃aɣere wũ.”
Ne ɔso kpakpɛ̃dze ɔkɔ ɔbi ɔkɛlɛgu ma tɔ̃ɖedze kɔrɛ. Ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Paulo gɔ mapia i iyo ngbe loɣere me sɔ lokɔ ɔbi gɔgbe lobɔ fɔ kɔrɛ si ɔba ɔ̃aɣere-ɔ itɔ̃me nyaa iwɛ̃.”
Makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔporoporoi gɔgbe i kɔrɔ̃, ne ɔkɔ wũ ɔkɛlɛgu kuruɛ ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be iɖe ato abie sɔ aaɣere me?”
Ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ma Yudase mawɛ̃ ɔbara kanya kawɛ̃ ku ma makpakpa sɔ maaba matã-ɔ iti sɔ miɖi Paulo mibɔ kasarɛkɔ̃ mmɔ kɔrãkaɖe ku adzuni sɔ maakarɛ wũ atɔ̃me awɛ̃.

Daakã ma atsue, alasɔ ma mawɛ̃ ma loaɖe lɛ maturi sina wɛrɛ i ɔri iso masia wũ. Mmagbe ɔkã ndamu sɔ maaɖoe Paulo fiɛ maaɖe ara ɣee maanɛ ndu. Ne ɔso ne, mato mabie fɔ ibuai. Maɔsɛ mawɛrɛ koko i ɔri iso, alasɔ mafɔ maɖe sɔ ato aatɔrã atã ma.”
Makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze gɔgbe ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã wũ sɔ, “Daatã sɔ kuwɛ̃ aakpese ɔnɔ itɔ̃me nɛ aba aaɣere me i ngbe ɖuɖuuɖu!” Ne ka ɔɖi wũ ɔri ne.

Ne makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔkpere ɔ̃ makpakpɛ̃dze makpakpa inyɔ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mibie makpakpɛ̃dze alafa anyɔ ma loakɛlɛ Kaisarea nɔme kasɛ̃ lɛ iɖɔwũ kaiwɛ̃ ame. Ibua ne mibie mma loala afele maturi alafa anyɔ gu mma loasɛ i apɔngɔ iso ma wũ ma sikɔdzɛ.
Mitã Paulo apɔngɔ si ɔ̃asɛ iso si mikɔ wũ pɔkɔsɔɔ mikɛlɛgu abã ɔkpakpa Felike kɔrɛ.”
Ne ɔtsɛrɛ ɔko gɔ nse i karɔ̃ ngbe ɔtã abã ɔkpakpa sɔ,
Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme Klaudio Lisia kɔrɛ losu losese-ɔ, wũ Sate Felike, loya-ɔ.
Ma Yudase ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe sɔ si maɖoe fiɛ lotã makpakpɛ̃dze ɔfɔ wũ, alasɔ lonɔ sɔ ɔ Romase ɔɖe.
Lokɔ wũ lokɛlɛgu ma kasarɛkɔ̃ sɔ si bonɔ nnɛ iɖe ɔbara.
Lonya sɔ ara wa mato maɣɛ ɔse i ma Yudase mmara ara iso gɔ iiɖe iɣɛrɛ nɛ loatã sɔ mapia wũ iyo ɣee maɖoe wũ iɖe.
Gɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣere me sɔ mato mabara adzuni i ɔ̃ iso sɔ maaɖoe wũ ne, lonyɔ sɔ loasu wũ lobɔ fɔ kɔrɛ si akpere ɔ̃ gu mma lona itɔ̃me sɔ masu ma itɔ̃me mabɔ fɔ kɔrɛ.
Ne ɔso kasɛ̃ gamɔ ne, makpakpɛ̃dze ɔbara nnɛ maɣere ma tutuutu, makɔ Paulo masɛ maabo Antipatri.
Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, makpakpɛ̃dze ma losɛ ngba ɔkpese makɛlɛ ma kawekɔ̃, ne matã mma nsi i apɔngɔ iso ɔkɔ Paulo makɛlɛgu Kaisarea ne.
Gɔ masɛ maabo ne, masu Paulo gu ɔko gɔ matã ma matã abã ɔkpakpa.
Ɔwi gɔ ɔto ɔka ɔko ne, ɔkarɛ Paulo ngbegɔ ɔbɔrɛ. Gɔ ɔtsue sɔ Paulo ɔbɔrɛ i Kilikia ne,
ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Loabo i fɔ itɔ̃me ame kukaakɔ si fɔ kanya maɖaɛdze ɔɔba.” Ne ka ɔtã ɔ̃ makpakpɛ̃dze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔsu Paulo mapia i iyo nɛ i Herodes ɔtsue ame si madzuɛ̃ wũ ne.
Ayi aru kama ne, Sɔrɛdzekpakpa Anania gu ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze gu atɔ̃me kanyaɖidze gɔ marɔ Tertulo ɔkɛlɛ Kaisarea. Makɛlɛ Felike kɔrɛ sɔ maaɖi Paulo aɣɛrɛ ɔɖuɖu mate.
Gɔ makpere Paulo ne, Tertulo ɔtsɛ ma kanya iɖi sɔ, “Ɔbea, ɔwi dzoroo nɖe ngɔgbe gɔ bopia i isobuɛ ame ala fɔ iwola nɛ asu aɖegu bo katɔ̃ ɔso. Boɔnya akpaki sɛɛ gbodzoo wa ana loɔba i bo karɔ̃ ame.
Kakɔi biara ne, ara wagbe sɛ abo bo anɔ, nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ bo ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu sɛ bopɛ-ɔ siba ne.
Loito lobie sɔ lonina-ɔ ɔwi ɔso ne, lotã-ɔ iti sɔ kã bo atsue si anɔ bo atɔ̃me wa boto boba bɔaɣɛ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe iso.
“Bonya ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe sɔ kulu piadze ɔɖe fiɛ ɔpia ɔki ɔwi biara ɔfinikira ma Yudase adzuni i kakɔi biara i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu. Ana ne, ɔɖe ikuri nɛ marɔ ma Nasaretse tɔ̃ɖedze.
Ɔbie sɔ si ɔpia ma Yudase isɔrɛyo anyini fiɛ bomɔɛ̃ wũ.
Ɣɛɛ makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze Lisia ɔba ɔ̃afɔ wũ ɔɖi i bo nrɔɔ̃ ame ku ɔle. Ne kama ne, ɔɣere bo sɔ boba boaɣɛ itɔ̃me i fɔ katɔ̃.
Ne ɔso fɔ mɔmɔ karɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe si anɔ si sila boto bola.”
Ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu ɔtɔrã masia sɔ nwa ɔɖuɖu i Tertulo ɔɣɛ pia i ne ame.
Gɔ abã ɔkpakpa gɔmɔ ɔkpa Paulo kɔrɔ̃ sɔ ka ɔɖe ika ne, Paulo ɔsɛ karɔ̃ sɔ, “Tete, loɣe sɔ ka asɛ aɣɛ ma Yudase atɔ̃me i akɔ gbodzoo wagbe ame. Ne ɔso iba me ɔmɛrɛ̃ sɔ loaɖi so kanya i fɔ katɔ̃.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ aatsue ne, iɖe lɛ akpɛnɛ aweo-anyɔ i ngbe gɔ loba Yerusalem sɔ si loba loasɔrɛ Ɣaa i Isɔrɛyo.
Kuwɛ̃ iinya me sɔ loto lobaragu kuwɛ̃ kakpadzɛ̃ ɣee kulu i isɔrɛyo ame ɣee ma Yudase kusarɛkɔ̃ kukawɛ̃ ɣee ɔmagɛ̃ ame kukakɔi.
Mmagbe kuwɛ̃ iibawo irɔĩ ɔkarã i kuira iso sɔ maɣe sɔ atɔ̃me wa mato maɣɛ ngbe ne, gbaã iɖe.
Ɣɛɛ ne, nnɛ lonɔgu ma karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ loto losɔsrɛ bo mawa Ɣaa i Ɔri gɔ ma mato marɔ ikuri nɛ lota iɣɛ ma iso. Lofɔ Mose mmara ɔɖuɖu loɖe gu ara wa matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze siko ame.
Wũ anɔ sia i Ɣaa iso lɛ kumɛgɔ ma wũ ma are sia sɔ maturi sɛɛ gu malalaa ɔɖuɖu to maaledza ita mabɔrɛ i makpise ame.
Ne ɔso losɛ lopia kubɛ sɔ wũ adzuni ame aakpa sekelee i Ɣaa gu maturi katɔ̃ ɔwi ɖaa ne.
“Akɔ gbodzoo i ngbe gɔ lona i Yerusalem ne. Losɛ kere sɔ loasu karatã lokɛlɛgu mawɛrɛba fiɛ ka loafɛ̃ ara lotã Ɣaa.
Ɔwi gɔ lokpakpa so loro ne, ma Yudase mawɛ̃ ɔba maanya me i isɔrɛyo mmɔ. Iiɖe bo gu kulu mabaradze kumawɛ̃ nsɛ, fiɛ loibara kulu ana.
Ma Yudase ma lobɔrɛ i Asia karɔ̃ iso ikote sɔ maaba fɔ kɔrɛ fiɛ si bo gu ma ba atɔ̃me arere i bo ndɛ̃ ne, iyɔ maɔɣɛ.
Fiɛ si abie ne, aawo tã mma nsi i ngbe ɔɣɛ ira lalaa nɛ manɔ i wũ iso ku ɔwi gɔ i ma Yudase matɔ̃meɣɛdze ɔɣɛgu me atɔ̃me.
Itɔ̃me iwɛ̃ saã lokɔlɛ silɔ kato loɣɛ i kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔwi gɔ mato maɣɛgu me atɔ̃me sɔ lofɔ loɖe sɔ makpise to maaledza ita. Ne ɔso fiɛ mito miɣɛgu me atɔ̃me ne?”
Mmɔ i Felike gɔ nɣe kafɔkaɖe ɔri ɣɛtɛ gɔgbe kukaakɔ ɔɣere ma Yudase sɔ, “Miya tɔtɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ ame i makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze Lisia aaba fiɛ loaɖaɛ mi itɔ̃me nɛgbe.”
Ɔɣere makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa sɔ masu Paulo mapia i iyo si madzuɛ̃ wũ ɣɛɛ mala wũ kukaakɔ si matã ɔ̃ malaa ɔri mala maɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ, maɔbara ɔ̃ ara nyaa matã wũ.
Ayi kɛkɛĩ kama ne, Felike gu ɔ̃ ɔre Drusila gɔ nɖe ɔ Yudase ɔba, ne matã sɔ maɖi Paulo mabɔ fiɛ ɔɣere ma itɔ̃me i Yesu Kristo kafɔkaɖe iso ne.

Gɔ ɔsɛ karɔ̃ ɔtsɛ ara karɔ̃ iɖi i ngbã sekelea isɛ gu iɖesoiso gu Ɣaa atɔ̃me iɣɛgu nɛ loaba i kayiiso karokɔ̃ ne, ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ Felike gbaã, ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ta si akɛlɛ. Si loɔna kɔrɔ̃ kukaakɔ ne, loatã makpere-ɔ matã me.”
Gɔ ɔla ɔ̃ɔnyɔ ɔri sɔ Paulo to ɔ̃abie ira ɔtã wũ ɔso ne, kɛkɛ ɔ̃ɔpia wũ ɔturi sɔ ɔba si maɖe ika.
Akɔ anyɔ kama ne, maɖi Felike, ne masu Porkio Festo masɛra i ɔ̃ kanya ne. Ɣɛɛ gɔ Felike to ɔbie sɔ ma Yudase si maɖɔɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔso ne, ɔnyua Paulo ɔpia i iyo.
Gɔ Festo ɔba ɔ̃ɔbo ibuiti nɛ iso ɔto ɔba ɔ̃aɖe ikpɛnɛ tɛare ne, ɔrui i Kaisarea ɔkɛlɛ Yerusalem.
Mmɔ i masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze ɔɣere wũ Paulo iso itɔ̃me, matã wũ iti sɔ,
ɔbualɛ ma si ɔɖi Paulo ɔbɔ i Yerusalem. Ma adzuni loɖe sɔ maawɛrɛ i ɔri iso maɖoe wũ.
Ɣɛɛ Festo ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Yorɛdze Paulo pia i Kaisarea, fiɛ mme wũ loto loakɛlɛ mmɔ i ɔwi kurukutu ame.
Ne ɔso mitã sɔ mi matɔ̃ɖedze si masiai me maba maɖi ɔ̃ aɣɛrɛ mate.”
Lɛ akpɛnɛ farafana ito ikɛlɛ aweo ame ne, Festo ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ Kaisarea. Iyi nɛ ɔbo mmɔ kaɖesɛ̃a ne, ɔsɛ i Paulo itɔ̃me iso.
Gɔ Paulo ɔba atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ ne, ma Yudase ma lobɔrɛ i Yerusalem ɔba maaki malɔ wũ matsɛ nnya siare gbodzoo iɖaɛ isia wũ iso i ara wa ma mɔmɔ maɣe sɔ ana i ne ame.
Paulo ɔɖi so kanya ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Loiɣɛrɛ ma Yudase mmara ɣee ma isɔrɛyo ɣee Igarakpakpa mmara iso.”
Ɣɛɛ gɔ Festo to ɔbie sɔ ma Yudase si maɖɔɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔso ne, ɔkarɛ Paulo sɔ, “Abie sɔ aakɛlɛ Yerusalem si losɛ loaɣɛgu-ɔ atɔ̃me i mmɔ?”
Paulo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ooɣo! Loɣɛ i karɔ̃ gagbe ɔɖuɖu igara mɔmɔ atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃, ngbegɔ ikote sɔ maaɣɛgu me atɔ̃me. Fɔ mɔmɔ aɣe sɔ loiɣɛrɛ ma Yudase.
Si lobara nnɛ lokote sɔ maaɖoe me ne, lotɔrã sɔ maɖoe me! Ɣɛɛ si loiɣɛrɛ ne, idaaba sɔ fɔ ɣee kuwɛ̃ aasu me ɔtã mmagbe. Ne ɔso nto lobie sɔ loasu wũ itɔ̃me lokɛlɛgu Igarakpakpa katɔ̃!”
Ne kama gɔ Festo ɔsɛ iti ame gu makpakpa ne, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Gɔ fɔ sɔ aasu fɔ itɔ̃me akɛlɛgu Igarakpakpa katɔ̃ ɔso ne, ɔ̃ katɔ̃ aakɛlɛ.”
Ayi arɛ̃saã kama ne, Igara Agripa gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiiko gɔ marɔ Bernike ɔba Festo kɔrɛ i Kaisarea sɔ si maba maya wũ.
Mawe i mmɔ ayi gbodzoo, ne ɔso Festo ɔsu Paulo itɔ̃me ɔɣere igara gɔgbe sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ pia i iyo ngbe gɔ Felike ɔnyua wũ ɔsɛ.
Gɔ losɛ Yerusalem ne, masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze ɔɣere me ara i ɔ̃ iso, maɣere me sɔ lotã wũ kukpi ipɔ.
“Loɖi karɔ̃ lote ma ɔluwɛ̃ sɔ ma Romase mmara iitã ɔri sɔ maatã ɔturi ipɔ fiɛ maaɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me. Ikote sɔ maatã wũ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃ gu mma lona atɔ̃me aasarɛ maɖi so kanya tɔtɔ.
Ne ɔwi gɔ maba ngbe, i itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔso ne, loinina ɔwi ɖuɖuuɖu. Iyi nɛmɔ ame kaɖesɛ̃a ne, losɛ i atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ iyara iso lotã sɔ maɖi ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe mabɔ me.
Ɣɛɛ ne, atɔ̃me wa maɣɛ masegu i ɔ̃ iso ne, iiɖe nwa lonyɔ ɔri lotã.
Ara wa iso maɖaɛ wũ kanya nɖe ma kafɔkaɖe iso gu ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Yesu gɔ lokpi, fiɛ Paulo to ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔpia ngbã iso!
Lokpɔkpɔtɔ alasɔ loiɣe kumɛgɔ loaɖaɛ itɔ̃me. Ne ɔso lokarɛ Paulo si ɔ̃atɔrã bokɛlɛ Yerusalem si boasɛ boafafarɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ame i mmɔ.
Ɣɛɛ Paulo ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔkɛlɛgu Igarakpakpa kɔrɛ. Ne ɔso lotã sɔ masu wũ mapia i iyo gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ loasese wũ Igarakpakpa kɔrɛ.”
Ne Igara Agripa ɔɣere Festo sɔ, “Lobie sɔ mme mɔmɔ loanɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me.”
Ne Festo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ato anɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me kɔrãkaɖe!”
Ne gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, Igara Agripa gu Bernike ɔpia ma agarara, fiɛ maba atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ mmɔ. Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa gu kaɖe makpakpa ɔsiai ma kama. Ne Festo ɔtã maɖi Paulo mabɔ ne.
Ne Festo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Igara Agripa gu mi ma losakanya ngbe, ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe nɖe ngɔ i ma Yudase ma i Yerusalem gu mma i Kaisarea ngbe ɔɖuɖu to mabie sɔ maɖoe ne.
Ɣɛɛ i wũ adzuni kanya ne, ɔ̃ibara kuira nɛ lokote itã sɔ maaɖoe wũ, ɣɛɛ gɔ sɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me si ikɛlɛ Igarakpakpa kɔrɛ ɔso ne, lonyɔ sɔ loasese wũ.
Ɣɛɛ lona kuira pɔtĩ nɛ loatsɛrɛ losese Igarakpakpa i ɔ̃ iso. Ne ɔso fiɛ loɖi wũ lobɔ mi ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃ titirio fɔ Igara Agripa sɔ iaki itɔ̃me nɛgbe ame irere ne, loana nnɛ loatsɛrɛ.
Alasɔ ne, iikote sɔ loasu yorɛdze losese Igarakpakpa atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ gɔ loitsɛrɛ ɔ̃ aɣɛrɛ losese igara.”
Ne Agripa ɔɣere Paulo sɔ, “Ɔri ka ɔpia, ɖi so kanya.”
Paulo ɔkɔlɛ kɔrɔ̃ kato ɔɖi so kanya ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Bo Igara Agripa, iti lɛ me sɔ loaɖi so kanya nɔme i fɔ katɔ̃ i ara wa iso i ma Yudase to maɖaɛ me kanya.
Alasɔ loɣe sɔ fɔ ne, aɣe ma Yudase mmara gu kubarara ɔɖuɖu kukaakɔ. Ne ɔso ne, lotã-ɔ iti, na ɔtu si akã me atsue.
“Ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu ɣe kumɛgɔ lomɔɛ̃ so lola kukaakɔ ita i wũ sibiɛtɛ ame i bo aɖe gu Yerusalem ana.
Ngbɔ ame si maaɖe so ɔnukuare ne, maɣe sɔ ɔ Farisise gɔ nsɛ ɔbara i mmara iso tutuutu loɖe.
Ara wa ɔso fiɛ mato maɖaɛ me kanya ngbe nɖe wũ ɔriinyɔ sɔ Ɣaa to ɔba ɔ̃abara ara wa ɔɣere bo mawa ɔsɛ.
Israel nlɛ miweo-minyɔ ɔɖuɖu ɔsu ma ɔle ɔɖuɖu i kasɛ̃ i kakɔme masumu Ɣaa sɔ si mawe ɔriinyɔ nɛ loba ngbe. Bo Igara Sɛɛ, nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ ma Yudase to maɖaɛ me kanya ne.
Be ɔso fiɛ ito iɖa mi karɔ̃ inɔ sɔ miafɔ miɖe sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atara makpise?
“Losu losia so iso sɔ loabara ira biara sɔ loatindza Yesu Nasaretse masiaidze karabara.
Ma Yudase sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔtã me ɔle lomɔɛ̃ maturi sekelea gbodzoo lopia i iyo i Yerusalem. Mma ana maɖoe ne, iɖe me isoɣɔ.

Lota loya ma iso, lokpɛ̃gu ma lobara ma ɔtile ala sikpã dzɛ loba i ma iso ɔso ne, lokɛlɛ abuiti gu simagɛ̃ dzɛ lodzoro ame. Lotã sɔ mabara ma ara boa i ma Yudase kusarɛkɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu. Lobie sɔ ma mɔmɔ si mawa kanya maɣɛ amusuora i Yesu iso.
“Adzuni wagbe igbã ɔso fiɛ lota sɔ losɛ Damasko gu ɔle gu ɔri gɔ lofɔ lobɔrɛgu i masɔrɛdze makpakpa kɔrɛ ne.
Igara Sɛɛ, gɔ losɛ i ɔri lɛ kakɔme ndɛ̃ ne, lonya ifiɛ teteree ɔbɔrɛ i kato nɛ loɖo kuɣɛ̃, ɔfiɛ ifere bo gu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ.
Gɔ bo ɔɖuɖu ɔbɔrɛ borɔ̃ ne, lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ dzɛ loɖe ika i ma Yudase siɖe ame siɣɛ sɔ, ‘Saulo, Saulo, be ɔso fiɛ ato akpɛ̃gu me ngbɔ? Si atura i siyu iso ne, ato aare igbɛ.’
“Ne lokarɛ wũ sɔ, ‘Tete, fɔ nna aɖe?’
“Ne silɔ dzɛmɔ to sitã me mmuai sɔ, ‘Mme nɖe Yesu gɔ ato akpɛ̃gu ngbɔ ne.
Ɣɛɛ ne, ta ya! Alasɔ loɖi so lote-ɔ si loasu-ɔ lobara wũ rabaradze. Ato aaɣere kayiiso ɔɖuɖu ara wa anya i ngbe gu nwa loaɖi lote-ɔ.
Ngbegɔ loapia-ɔ ne, loadzuɛ̃-ɔ i mi aɖe maturi ndɛ̃ gu mafɔ nrɔɔ̃ ame.

Loatã sɔ aasɛ aabusi ma anɔ sɔ maabɔrɛ i Ɔbosam ɔle gu idududu ame fiɛ maaba Ɣaa ɔle gu ikpawaĩ ame. Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ma akpi ɔtsɛ ma fiɛ ɔ̃abara ma Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ masɛdze gu mma ɔsekelera alasɔ mafɔ me maɖe ɔso.’
“Ne ɔso ne, Igara Agripa, loisɛ̃ kaɖikate ga lonya lobɔrɛgu i kato!

Lotsɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣere ma Damaskose gu ma Yerusalemse gu ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɔ mafiniki i ma siri nyanyarĩa iso si masu so matã Ɣaa si mabara ara sɛɛ wa loate sɔ maɔfiniki gbaã.
Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ ma Yudase ɔmɔɛ̃ me i ma isɔrɛyo gɔ loto loɣɛ atɔ̃me wagbe ne. Mabie sɔ si maɖoe me fiɛ.

Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i ma nrɔɔ̃ ame. Ne ɔso lokpese lopia ngbã sɔ loaɖiɖi ara wagbe ame lote mi makpakpa gu maturi ɔɖuɖu ne. Nnɛ loto loɣɛ ngbe ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze gu Mose ɔɖuɖu ɔɣɛ sɔ ito iaba ne.
Sɔ Kristo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔre gɔ ɔsia ikparĩ aaba ɔ̃awe inyɛ. Ɔ̃ ɔɖe loaɖe ɔturi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ loata ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame, fiɛ ɔ̃asu ikpawaĩ ɔbɔ ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu.”
Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Festo ɔla kulu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Paulo ka alala! Fɔ ɔko isuã kaɖu ɔɔnina-ɔ iti ame!”
Paulo ɔ̃ta wũ mmuai sɔ, “Tete Festo, loito lolala. Wũ adzuni ɔnyɔ waĩ. Gbagbaã nto loɣɛ.
Gbaã ne, Igara Agripa ɣe atɔ̃me wa loto loɣɛ ngbe ne ɔso loawo wã ɔɣɛ ku kagbegbe. Lofɔ loɖe sɔ ara wagbe kuiwɛ̃ iiwɛrɛ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃.
Igara Agripa, afɔ Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze magbe aɖe? Loɣe sɔ afɔ ma aɖe.”
Ne Agripa ɔkarɛ Paulo sɔ, “Abu sɔ akpesera me Kristo ɔre i ɔwi kurukutu gɔgbe ame?”
Ne Paulo to ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Kiniɔkiniɔ ɣee ɔwi gɔ nto ɔba iɖe o-o ne, nto lokparama kayi sɔ mi ma mpia i ngbe ɔɖuɖu aase lɛ kumɛgɔ lose iɖo kugbagɔrɔĩ gɔ lopia ngbe!”
Ne Igara Agripa gu Festo gu Bernike gu maturi tsɔra ɔɖuɖu ɔta ne.
Gɔ maɔbɔrɛ i mmɔ ne, maɖe ika i Paulo atɔ̃me wagbe iso maɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe iibara kuira nɛ loatã sɔ maaɖoe wũ ɣee mapia wũ iyo.”
Ne Igara Agripa to ɔɣere Festo sɔ, “Tee boawo wũ ɔnyua si iiɖe sɔ ɔ̃ɔsu ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔkɛlɛgu Kaisaro katɔ̃.”
Ɔwi gɔ masɛ sɔ boakɛlɛ Italia ne, masu Paulo gu mayorɛdze mama mapia i makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa gɔ marɔ Yulio nrɔɔ̃ ame. Ɔɖe ɔkpakpa i igarakpakpa makpakpɛ̃dze ikuri ame.
Bosu ɔkolo gɔ lobɔrɛ i Adramitio fiɛ ɔsɛ Asia ibuiti. Bo gu ɔ Makedoniase gɔ marɔ Aristarko fiɛ ɔbɔrɛ i Tesalonika losɛ i ɔkolo gɔgbe ame.
Kaɖesɛ̃a ne, boɔbore bobo Sidon ɔpo kanya. Yulio ɔbara Paulo kayiribielea ɔtã wũ ɔri sɔ ɔkɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ ame ɔsɛ ɔ̃anya ɔ̃ malaa si mabie ɔ̃ ara wa ɔ̃asu ɔsɛ ala ɔri matã wũ.
Ne gɔ boledza ita i mmɔ ne, ɔwiri gɔ nto ɔkpɛ̃ kanya ne, boki i Kipro ngbalɔ isɛ si boibabo i ɔ̃ ame.
Gɔ bofe mmɔ ne, bosɛ boaki i Kilikia gu Pamfilia ɔpo kanya bobore bomatã ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Mira i Likia ibuiti ame.
Kpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa gɔ nsɛgu bo ɔnya ɔkolo gɔ lobɔrɛ i Aleksandria fiɛ ɔsɛ Italia karɔ̃ iso. Ɔsu bo ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i ɔkolo gɔgbe ame.

Kumɛgɔ i ɔwiri to ɔkpɛ̃ ɔso ne, ifɔ ayi gbodzoo fiɛ bobore bobo Knido ɔmagɛ̃. Ɔwiri teteree gɔ nto ɔkpɛ̃ i mmɔ ɔso ne, boisɛ tɔrɔrɔ. Gɔ bobo Salmone ne, bolɔ boki i Kreta kuruɛ gɔ itã karɔ̃ ɔfɔ ɔwiri ɔle.
Ɔle ame bosɛ i ndu kuruɛ kuruɛ bosɛ boabo kakɔi ga marɔ “Sikolo Katuikɔ̃ Sɛɛ” gɔ loidzorogu ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Lasea.
Bonina ɔwi gbodzoo ne ɔso ma Yudase Kanya ɔnyiwi ɔɔfe. Ndu iso irisɛ ku ɔwi gɔgbe ame ba ɔle ibua, ne ɔso Paulo ɔtã ma adzuni sɔ,
“Tete mɛrɛ̃, lonya sɔ bo irisɛ ita i kiniɔ to iawe ɔle ibua, alasɔ ɔkolo gɔgbe to ɔ̃abo i kukpakpi ame fiɛ boto boayura ato gu maturi ana.”
Ɣɛɛ makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa ɔfɔ ɔkolo kãse gu ɔkolo sate adzuni ɔɖo nnɛ i Paulo ɔɣɛ.

Gɔ ɔkolo katuikɔ̃ gamɔ iilɛ katã sɔ maaya idzoro ala ɔyu ɔwi ka ɔba ɔso ne, marisɛdze ɔsia ita sɔ maarui makɛlɛ Foinike. Mmɔ ne, mato maawo ɔwe ku ɔyu ɔwi, alasɔ Foinike ɖe ɔmagɛ̃ i Kreta karɔ̃ iso gɔ mba sikolo kayakɔ̃ i kuɣɛ̃ iyo kabokɔ̃ isɛ ga loatɛ̃ ɔwiri ɔri.
Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔwiri sɛɛ ɔtsɛ ikpɛ̃ ibɔrɛ i kala isɛ gɔ lote lɛ ɔwi sɛɛ ɔɖe sɔ maasɛ ɔri. Ne ɔso maledza so marui maki i Kreta karɔ̃ kuruɛ.
Ɣɛɛ ɔluwɛ̃ ne, awɛ teteree ɔtsɛ ikpɛ̃ abɔrɛ i karɔ̃ iso asarɛgu bo gɔ bobɔrɛ i Kreta boro kere.
Awɛ ɔsarɛgu ɔkolo gɔ boisibawo wũ ɔfinikira ɔsɔ̃ karɔ̃ iso. Ne ɔso manyua wũ sɔ ɔwiri si ɔkpadzɛ̃ wũ ɔkɛlɛgu.
Kama ne, bosɛ boabo i karɔ̃ kɛkɛĩ kawɛ̃ ga i ndu ɔki milɔ ga marɔ Kauda kama. Ɔle ame fiɛ bowo ɔkolo kosoi gɔ bosɛgu ɔnyi ɔmatãra i ɔsiare gɔ ame bopia iso.

Gɔ manyi wũ maro ne, masu siwɛ̃ manyi ɔsiare ana. Gɔ ifɔ̃ to ma sɔ ɔwiri aasu wũ ɔkɛlɛgu iba wodoroa iso i Libia ɔpo kanya ɔso ne, masora sikati dzɛ nsɛ simɔɛ̃ ɔwiri i ɔkolo kato ɔɖuɖu. Ne ɔso ɔwiri ne, ɔsɛ kere ka ɔsɛgu ɔkolo i ndu iso.
Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ fiɛ ɔwiri iito ɔnyua ɔkpɛ̃ ne, matsɛ ato wa i ɔkolo sore iɖi iwiri i ndu ame.
Iyi tɛare iso ne, matsɛ ɔkolo mɔmɔ ana ara iɖi ipɛyu.
Awɛ wagbe ɔkpɛ̃ ayi gbodzoo sɔ boinya kuɣɛ̃ ɣee awãmi. Boyu ɔriinyɔ ɔɖuɖu!
Gɔ maɔsɛ ayi gbodzoo fiɛ maina kɔrɔ̃ maɖe ara ne, Paulo ɔta ɔya i ma katɔ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Manyii, si ɔkã mikã me atsue ne, tee boirui i Kreta fiɛ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu aba aabɔrɛ bo iso.
Lobie sɔ loaɣere mi sɔ mina ɔtu ne mi kuwɛ̃ iibakpi. Ɣɛɛ ɔkolo ne, ɔto ɔ̃awã ndu!
Kɔma kasɛ̃ ame ne, Ɣaa gɔ ɔre loɖe, fiɛ ɔ̃ nto losumu kpabo ɔba ɔ̃ɔya i wũ kɔrɛ.
Ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Paulo, daanigã. Ato aaya i Kaisaro katɔ̃ asu fɔ itɔ̃me asɛ wũ i katɔ̃. Ɣaa ɔɔsu mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i ɔkolo ame ngbã ɔpia-ɔ i nrɔɔ̃ ame, mi kuwɛ̃ iibakpi.’
Ne ɔso ne, wũ maturi, mina ɔtu. Lofɔ Ɣaa loɖe sɔ ira biara nɛ ɔɣere me sɛ iba i ne ame.
Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔwiri to ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ bo ɔkɛlɛgu ɔ̃amɔrɛ̃dza i karɔ̃ kawɛ̃ ga i ndu ɔki milɔ ɔkpokpo.”
Ɔwiri siare gɔgbe ɔfuri bo ɔsɛgu ɔkpesegu i Adria ɔpo iso ayi aweo ana. Iyi weo-naare kasɛ̃ ndɛ̃ ne, bo ɔkolo ame marabaradze ɔbu sɔ maɔbore mamatã karɔ̃ kawɛ̃.
Ne gɔ masusu ndu iwodoro manyɔ ne, manya sɔ miwodoro lɛ ngba kulafa gu sinyɔ ɔɖui. Gɔ makɛlɛ katɔ̃ kɛkɛĩ ana ne, maledza isusu manya sɔ ka miɖe ngba kasiwɛ̃.

Gɔ ifɔ̃ to ma sɔ ɔwiri to ɔ̃asore ɔkolo ɔsɛ ɔ̃awuĩ i ata siare arere iso ɔso ne, makpakpasera abɔra ana wa lobua aba ɔrɔrã fiɛ manyi wã siwɛ̃ mamatãra i ɔkolo iso mapia i ndu karɔ̃ sɔ si matindza ɔkolo maɣedza. Mawe i ɔriinyɔ ame teteree sɔ kaɖe si kasɛ̃ mala.
Gɔ ɔkolo ame marabaradze ɔbie sɔ maatere maɣɛ bo ɔso ne, mabara lɛ abɔra wa nsɛ amɔɛ̃ ɔkolo ala maakpasera mapia i ndu ame i ɔkolo katɔ̃.
Ɣɛɛ ne, Paulo ɔɣere makpakpɛ̃dze gu tɔ̃ɖedze sɔ, “Si mmagbe iiwe i ɔkolo ame ne, mito miawɔ.”
Ne ɔso makpakpɛ̃dze ɔtu ɔkolo kosoi gɔgbe siwɛ̃ dzɛ lomɔɛ̃ wũ manyua wũ mapia i ndu ame.
Ɔwi gɔ i kaɖe to kaba kaasɛ̃ ne, Paulo ɔtã ma ɔɖuɖu iti sɔ maɖe ara. Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ayi aweo-ana i ngbe gɔ bopia i itikpi nɛgbe ame fiɛ aɖera iipɛgu mi kuwɛ̃ kanya ne.
Ne ɔso loto mi i kukpa sɔ miɖe ara si miana ɔle fiɛ miibakpi. Alasɔ nane ɔnidzɔ iibasɛ i kuwɛ̃ iso.”
Ne gɔ Paulo ɔsu ɔ̃ aɖera ne, ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i wã iti i ma ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃, ne ɔkpɛti ɔɖe ne.
Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ma ɔɖuɖu ɔna ɔtu, ne matsɛ ara iɖe ne.
Mma mpia i ɔkolo ame aaɖe lɛ maturi alafa anyɔ gu sikɔdzɛ-ikuɔ.
Ɔwi gɔ maro aɖera ɔɖe ne, maledza aɖera sikoto tsɔra dzɛ mpia i ɔkolo ame iɖi ifere i ndu ame si mabara ɔkolo foforofo.
Ɔwi gɔ i kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ waĩ ne, mainya ɔpo kanya ga iɖe maɖi ite. Ɣɛɛ manya kamabokɔ̃ kawɛ̃ i ɔkpokpo gɔ mabu sɔ mawo ɔbo. Ne ɔso mabie sɔ si maawo ne, maasu ɔkolo mabogu i ɔpo ɔkpokpo mmɔ.
Ne ɔso matu siwɛ̃ dzɛ lomɔɛ̃ abɔra wa manyi mamatãra i ɔkolo iso, fiɛ ka makurisi ɔdziri gɔ masɛ madzuɛ̃ ala ɔkolo makɛlɛgu ngbegɔ masɛ. Makɔlɛ ɔkolo sikati kato sɔ ɔwiri si ɔbo ɔkpadzɛ̃ ma ɔkɛlɛgu.
Gɔ mato makɛlɛ katɔ̃ ne, ɔkolo katɔ̃ ɔsɛ iamɔrɛ̃ i iwarĩ ame sɔ ɔ̃isito ɔwo ɔsɛ. Ɔwiri gu ndu ɔba miabo wũ iso mibiɛbiɛ wũ buruburuburu.
Gɔ makpakpɛ̃dze ɔbu sɔ mayorɛdze to maatere ma iso ɔso ne, mabie sɔ maaɖoe ma.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ ma tɔ̃ɖedze ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃afɔ Paulo ngbã ɔso ne, ɔ̃itɔrãgu ma. Ne ɔso ɔtã silɔ sɔ mma loawo ndu ɔɣa ɔbɔrɛ si makɔlɛ mabo i ndu ame si maɣa makɛlɛ ɔkpokpo.
Mma ɔɖuɖu lokuti ana ne, mabie kukolo gu ara wa iso maasɛ mabo ɔkpokpo. Iki nnɛgbe ɔso ne, bo ɔɖuɖu ɔwo ɔkpokpo ɔbo sɔ kuwɛ̃ iikpi.
Gɔ boso i ɔkpokpo ne, botsue sɔ karɔ̃ gamɔ marɔ sɔ Malta ne.
Karɔ̃ gamɔ iso maturi ɔnyɔ bo nnya mafɔ bo kukaakɔ. Ɔyu pia fiɛ kado ana to ɔpɛ, ne ɔso mapia ɔtɔ i ɔpo kanya sɔ si boawa.
Gɔ Paulo ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔbodza kudzirikpai sɔ si ɔba ɔ̃asu ɔpia i ɔtɔ ame ne, aɣɛ lalaa ɔbɔrɛ amini wũ kɔrɔ̃ ala ɔtɔwiri ɔso.
Gɔ karɔ̃ gamɔ iso maturi ɔnya ne, maɣɛ sɔ, “Turiɖoese ɔɖe ngbe gbaã! Atoa sɔ ɔtere ndu iwã ne, Ɣaa iibatã wũ ɔsɛ ngbã.”
Ɣɛɛ Paulo ɔkpa aɣɛ ɔsisi so i kɔrɔ̃ ɔpia i ɔtɔ ame, aibara wũ kuira.
Karɔ̃ gamɔ maturi ɔbu sɔ Paulo aaɣe ɣee ɔ̃abɔrɛ ɔrɔ̃ ɔkpi. Ɣɛɛ gɔ ifɔ ɔwi fiɛ kuira iibara wũ ne, mafinikira ma adzuni sɔ kuɣɔ bowũ ɔɖe.
Nkpɛkɔ̃ miwɛ̃ pia i ngbegɔ boba boaso gɔ miɖe karɔ̃ gamɔ ɔkpakpa gɔ marɔ Publio mire. Ɔkpakpa gɔgbe ɔfɔ bo ku isoɣɔ, ɔnyɔ bo iso akpɛnɛ atɛ ɔɖuɖu.
Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Publio ɔse to ɔnyɛ. Ɔ̃ iso ɔbe ɔtɔ fiɛ ɔto ɔfedza kayiri ana. Gɔ Paulo ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔkparama kayi ɔtã wũ ɔsu nrɔɔ̃ ɔsia wũ iso ne, ɔsarɛ ɔluwɛ̃.
Gɔ manɔ ɔ̃ isosarɛ nɛgbe ne, manyɛse ma mpia i karɔ̃ gamɔ ɔɖuɖu iso ɔba Paulo kɔrɛ, ne ɔsa ma ne.
Ara wagbe ɔso ne, matã bo karatã gbodzoo fiɛ gɔ ɔwi ɔɣo sɔ boarui i mmɔ ne, masu ara wa ɔɖuɖu boala i ɔri matã bo.
Bowe i mmɔ awa atɛ fiɛ borui. Bo irui ame ne, bosɛ i ɔkolo gɔ marɔ sɔ Inyɔ Aɣɔ gɔ lobɔrɛ i Aleksandria fiɛ ɔya i karɔ̃ gamɔ iso ku ɔyu ɔwi.
Gɔ bota i mmɔ ne, ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ bosɛ boatui nɖe Sirakusa. Bowe i mmɔ ana ayi atɛ.
Gɔ borui i mmɔ ne, bosɛ boabo Regio. Ne kaɖesɛ̃a ne, ɔwiri sɛɛ ɔfuri ɔbɔrɛ i bo kama gɔ lobuai bo fiɛ ɔsu bo ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔbo Puteoli ku iyi nyɔare iso.
Mmɔ iɖe bosɛ boanya mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ fiɛ matã iti sɔ bowe i ma kɔrɛ ayi akɔdzɛ ne. Gɔ bota i ngbe kama ne, bosɛ boabo Roma.

Gɔ manyii ma mpia i Roma ana ɔnɔ sɔ bosɛ i ɔri boto boba ne, ma mawɛ̃ ɔba masarɛgu bo i Apia Kuɣa ame. Mawɛ̃ ana ɔba maatu bo i ngbegɔ marɔ Mafɔ Kubokɔ̃ Kutɛ. Gɔ Paulo ɔnya ma ne, ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba fiɛ ɔna katere ana ɔbua.
Gɔ bosɛ boabo Roma ne, maɖi Paulo ɔri sɔ ɔsɛgu so i ngbegɔ ɔɖɔɛ. Matã sɔ kpakpɛ̃dze ɔwɛ̃ si ɔla ɔ̃ɔdzuɛ̃ wũ.

Ayi atɛ kama ne, Paulo ɔkpere ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i mmɔ ɔsirakanya. Gɔ masarɛ ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Manyii, mamɔɛ̃ me i Yerusalem masu matã ma Romase abã sɔ maɣɛgu me atɔ̃me atoa sɔ loiɣɛrɛ bo maturi ɣee bo mawa kubarara kukuwɛ̃.
Ma Romase ɔɣɛgu me atɔ̃me fiɛ mabie sɔ si manyua me. Alasɔ mainya nnɛ iso maaya fiɛ maaɖoe me lɛ kumɛgɔ i ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze ma lomɔɛ̃ me ɔbie.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ ma Yudase ɔta maya ne iso ɔso ne, itã sɔ loɣere ma sɔ loasu wũ itɔ̃me lokɛlɛgu Igarakpakpa Kaisaro katɔ̃. Iiɖe sɔ lobie sɔ loaɖaɛ wũ aɖe maturi kanya.
Nnɛgbe ɔso lokpere mi si botsue so loɖegu mi ika ne. Ngɔ i Israel kaɖe to manyɔ ɔri ne, ɔ̃ ɔso fiɛ mapia me kugbagɔrɔĩ mito minya me ngbɔ ne.”
Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Bo ne, boinɔ kuira i fɔ iso. Boifɔ ɔko kuwɛ̃ ɣee kanya nyanyarĩa i fɔ iso ibɔrɛ i manyii ma lobɔrɛ i Yudea kɔrɛ.
Ɣɛɛ bobie sɔ boanɔ ira bosegu i fɔ kafɔkaɖe iso. Alasɔ gbaã ne, maito maɣɛ ira sɛɛ i ikuri nɛgbe iso i kukakɔi.”

Gɔ masɛ iyi ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Mmɔ ka ɔɣere ma Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso itɔ̃me. Ɔkɔ ma adzuni ɔkɛlɛgu ngbegɔ i Mose gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔtsɛrɛ ara masɛ i Yesu iso. Ɔɖe ma ika ita i kaya isɛ iabo kutsuɛ.
Ma ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ɔfɔ wũ maɖe, ɣɛɛ ma mawɛ̃ ana iifɔ wũ maɖe.
Kakpadzɛ̃ ɔbo i ma ndɛ̃ fiɛ matsɛ irui gɔ Paulo ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me tsɔra wagbe sɔ, “Gbagbaã iɖe i Siwarã Bielea ɔki i Yesaya iso siɣere bo mawa sɔ,
‘Kɛlɛ aaɣere ma Yudase sɔ,
“Mianɔ ɣɛɛ miibanɔ karɔ̃,
mito mianya ɣɛɛ miibanya miɖi ite.”
Alasɔ mmagbe situ ɔsɛ̃,
fiɛ ma atsue ana ba ɔle,
fiɛ mama anɔmi ana.
Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, tee ma anɔmi aanya ara,
fiɛ ma atsue ana aanɔ, fiɛ ma situ ana aanɔ ara karɔ̃
iyɔ maɔfiniki maba wũ kɔrɛ fiɛ mme, Ɣaa, loasa ma.’ ”
Ne Paulo ɔtsɔra ma ɔɣere sɔ, “Mitsue sɔ, itɔ̃me nɛ i Ɣaa sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔɖi ala maturi ne, maɔsu ne makɛlɛgu mma loiɖe ma Yudase. Ma ne, mato maafɔ ne!”
Ne Paulo ɔtsɔra ma ɔɣere sɔ, “Mitsue sɔ, itɔ̃me nɛ i Ɣaa sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔɖi ala maturi ne, maɔsu ne makɛlɛgu mma loiɖe ma Yudase. Ma ne, mato maafɔ ne!”
Paulo ɔwe i mmɔ akɔ anyɔ i iyo nɛ ɔfɔ ɔto ɔtã kuso ame ɔla ɔ̃ɔfɔ maturi ma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ maba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
Ɔɣere ma Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso itɔ̃me ku katetere, ɔte ma ara i Yesu Kristo iso, fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iitɛ̃ wũ ɔri.
Romans: Mme Paulo gɔ nɖe Yesu Kristo ɔsande gu katɔ̃mesɛdze gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖi sɔ lopɛ ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea imomo ne, mme lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe ne.
Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ i Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze iso ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɖi ɔte ne, matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame.
Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔse i Ɣaa Ɔbi gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo iso. Maɣe wũ lɛ ɔturi awune awe i David ɔɣekparɛ ame.
Iki i Ɣaa Siwarã iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi wũ ɔte maturi ku ɔle gɔ ɔtara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame.
Fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ iso ne, Ɣaa ɔnyɔ bo nnya ɔsu bo ɔbara katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔtã Kristo sɔ boatã abuiti ɔɖuɖu maturi afɔ wũ maɖe, matsue ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ.
Mi wũ ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi mi ɔbua i mma nɖe Yesu Kristo mare iso.
Nnɛgbe ɔso nto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã mi ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i Roma alasɔ Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ mi fiɛ ɔkpere mi sɔ miakpese ɔ̃ mare.
Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
Lobie sɔ loaki i Yesu Kristo iso lopɛ wũ Ɣaa siba i mi ɔɖuɖu kanya alasɔ kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔnɔ kumɛgɔ mifɔ Kristo miɖe.
Ɣaa gɔ karabara nto lobara ku wũ ɔtu ɔɖuɖu iki ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me nɛ loto loɣɛ i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso ne, ɔɣe sɔ loisɛ loɣara mi ku ɔwi kuwɛ̃ si loto lokparama kayi. Ɣaa ɖe me aɖansiɛ sɔ nnɛ loto loɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe.
Ɔwi biara nto lokparama kayi ne, nsɛ lotã Ɣaa iti sɔ si iɖe ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ne, ɔtã me ɔri sɔ loaba loanya mi.
Anɔ ɔrɛtɛ me gbaã sɔ loaba loanya mi fiɛ loabuai mi i Ɣaa nnyainyɔ ame sɔ miana ɔle i siwarã ame.
Nto lobie teteree sɔ loapia mi ɔle i mi kafɔkaɖe ame fiɛ mi wũ miapia me ɔle iyɔ bo aka wã anyɔɔ aaɖe ibuai botã so.
Wũ manyii, miɣe sɔ loɔbara adzuni ɔwi gbodzoo ame sɔ si loba mi kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ ara awɛ̃ ɔtɛ̃ me ɔri. Lobie sɔ loabuai maturi i mi ndɛ̃ makpese Kristo mare lɛ kumɛgɔ loɔbara i mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃.
Karabara gagbe nɖe kuso gɔ loto maturi ɔɖuɖu, mma anɔ lobusi gu mapoamese, manɔgbadze gu madzimifɔ ne.
Nnɛgbe ɔso i wũ anɔ ɔrɛtɛ gbaã sɔ loaɣere mi ma mpia i Roma ana Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe ne.
Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe iisɛ ikpɛ̃ me kunuarɛ alasɔ ne nɖe Ɣaa ɔle gɔ nsɛ ɔtã ɔturi biara gɔ lofɔ ɔɖe ɔna ngbã ne. Ma Yudase tɔtɔ gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana.

Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe sɛ iɖi ɔri gɔ iso i Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ ite. Ɔri sɛɛ gɔgbe ɔɖe ika ɔsegu i kafɔkaɖe itɔ̃me iso ita i karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃. Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ngɔ nse bɔlɔlɔ to ɔ̃asɛ i kafɔkaɖe ame.”
Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔ̃ sikpã kayi ɔbɔrɛgu i kato i ara wa lota aɣɛ wũ iso gu ɔtile ara wa nto atɛ̃ maturi ɔri sɔ maibatsue Ɣaa Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe.
Sikpã to wũ alasɔ maturi ɔɔnya Ɣaa kurabarara gɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔbara sekelee. Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɔɖi ɔte ma kukaakɔ.
Alasɔ ita i ɔwi gɔ ɔbara kayi ne, ɔ̃ ɔle gɔ nna katui gu ɔ̃ Ɣaa iɖe ɔɔɖi so ite i ara wa ɔɖuɖu ɔbara ɔpia i kayiiso ame. Ne ɔso ɔturi awune iisibawo ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃ifɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe.
Alasɔ atoa sɔ maturi ɣe Ɣaa ne, maisɛ mata wũ kuwarɛ gɔ lokotegu wũ lɛ Ɣaa, fiɛ maisɛ mapɛ wũ siba ana. Ɣɛɛ masɛ makɔlɛ so kato i ma adzuni ame mabara adzimira, idududu si ma iso.
Masɛ manyɔ so sɔ makpa anɔ ɣɛɛ makpesera so madzimifɔ.
Masɛ̃ sɔ maibasumu Ɣaa gɔ mpia ngbã ɔwi biara, mapia male ara mama wa loakpi. Masu ara lɛ maturi, ɣee kurodzai, ɣee mabɔi, ɣee ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ i karɔ̃ lɛ maɣɛ masu makpesera aɣɔ matã so.
Ne ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔnyua ma ɔtã sɔ mabara ɔnɔle ara wa loatã sɔ maapukutura so. Masɛ mabara anuarɛra i ma ndɛ̃.
Manyuarã Ɣaa Itɔ̃me Bielea ku sila ire fiɛ mato masɔrɛ ara wa i Ɣaa ɔbara. Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ikote sɔ mafɛ̃ ara matã alasɔ ɔ̃ i ile gu ibu ɔkote itã ɔwi ɖaa. Si iba ngbɔ!
Ara wagbe ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔnyua maturi ɔtã sɔ mabara ara wa loakpɛ̃ ma kunuarɛ. Itã sɔ ma marɔ̃go to marɛgu so lɛ marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go awe.
Ngbɔ ame ana i marɛrɛ̃ ana ɔnyua marɔ̃go masɛ mato mabara anuarɛra marɛgu ma marɛrɛ̃ laa lɛ ɔrã gu ɔre awe ne. Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛ loba ma iso ɔkotegu ma ngbã nyanyarĩa.
Gɔ masɛ̃ sɔ maibasuã ara wa maɣe ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔnyua ma ɔtã ɔtile ɔbo i ma adzuni ame. Masɛ mabara ara wa loikote sɔ maabara.
Ɔtile ara wa masɛ mabara ɔɔfɔ ma ima. Wã awɛ̃ nɖe, wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ, silalaa, ma anɔ sɛ arɛtɛ i maturi ara iso, ituriɖoe, kulu, mila gu manyii ndɛ̃ inina. Masɛ matsiri maturi, maɣɛ maturi iso ara.

Masɛ maɣɛ maturi iso ara nyanyarĩa. Maɖe maturi ma loisɛ maɖɔɛ Ɣaa. Masɛ matia ma manyii, maɖi ma malaa matã, makɔlɛ so kato, manyɔnyɔ siri ɣɛtɛ dzɛ iso maaki maabara ara nyanyarĩa. Maisɛ mawarɛ ma maɣese.
Maɖe maturi ma loiɣe ikpaki i isɛɛ gu ilalaa ndɛ̃. Maisɛ mamɔɛ̃ ma mɔmɔ itɔ̃me nɛ maɣɛ mala. Kuira iisɛ iɖo ma kayiri, fiɛ maisɛ manyɔ ɔturi nnya.
Maɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔtã bo mmara sɔ mma nsi ngbã mɛgbe igbã ne, ɔto ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue, ɣɛɛ ne, maɣɛ teteree i ara nyanyarĩa wagbe ame. Iiɖe sɔ nnɛgbe kere, ɣɛɛ masɛ mawarɛ mma nsɛ mabara wã ana.

Ne ɔso fɔ gɔ fɔ nto aɣɛgu ɔturi atɔ̃me fiɛ ato atã wũ ipɔ ne, aisibawo so kanya ɔɖi. I ɔri biara gɔ iso atã fɔ ɔlaa ipɔ ne, tsue sɔ fɔ mɔmɔ fɔ wũ aɖe ipɔ. Alasɔ ara wa ɔto ɔbara ne, wã ame igbã tutuutu fɔ̃ wũ ato abara ne.
Bo ɔɖuɖu ɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã mba ɔri sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛgu maturi ma nsɛ mabara ara wagbe atɔ̃me.
Si fɔ lɛ ɔturi awune gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara wagbe igbã to atã maturi mama ipɔ ne, afɔ aɖe sɔ aawo Ɣaa atɔ̃me iɣɛgu ɔtere?
Ɛɛbɛrɛ afɔ aɖe sɔ siefe kere iɖe i Ɣaa to ɔnyɔ bo nnya fiɛ ɔɣɔra so ɔtã bo? Mitsue sɔ Ɣaa to ɔbara bo kayiribielea gagbe alasɔ ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abuai bo sɔ boafiniki i bo situ ame.
Gɔ mi atsue ba ɔle fiɛ misɛ̃ sɔ miibafiniki i situ ame ɔso ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ mi kutsue gbaã ku iyi nɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu atɔ̃me i ɔ̃ ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso.
Fiɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã ɔbiara kuso i ɔ̃ kurabarara gɔ ɔbara iso.
Mma lopia kubɛ i ara sɛɛ ibara ame fiɛ masiai ikpawaĩ i ngbã mɛgbe ame ne, ngbã mɛ nto miba ame ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã mana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro.
Ɣɛɛ maturi ma nsɛ mabie ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ ire fiɛ masɛ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe fiɛ masiai ngbã nyanyarĩa ne, Ɣaa sikpã to siaba ma iso fiɛ ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue gbaã.
Mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ mabara ara lalaa ne, mato maana inyɛwe fiɛ maibana iwarã kuiwɛ̃. Ma Yudase loaɖe katɔ̃ mafɔ kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ fiɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase asiai.
Ɣɛɛ mma nsɛ mabara ara sɛɛ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã ma kuwarɛ, ɔtara ma anɔ kato ku isobuɛ. Ma Yudase loaɖe katɔ̃ mafɔ ara wagbe iyɔ mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔsiai.
Alasɔ Ɣaa iisɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi i katɔ̃ i atɔ̃me iɣɛ ame.
Mma ɔɖuɖu lobara ikpi fiɛ maiɣe Mose mmara ne, mato maawɔ. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa iibasu mmara ɔɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me. Mma mpia i Mose mmara kayirinɔ ne, si mabara ikpi ne, mmara mɛmɔ iso i Ɣaa aaɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me.
Alasɔ iiɖe mma nto manɔ nnɛ i mmara to miɣɛ nɖe maturi sɛɛ i Ɣaa anɔ. Ɣɛɛ mma nto mabara i nnɛ miɣɛ iso nɖe maturi sɛɛ.
Gbaã ne, mma loiɖe ma Yudase ne, maiɣe Mose mmara. Ɣɛɛ si i ma situ ame matsue ara wa mite ne, iyɔ ma kurabarara ɔɔte sɔ maba mmara i ma situ ame atoa sɔ mainɔ mmara mɛgbe iso itɔ̃me manɔ.

Nnɛgbe to ite sɔ Ɣaa ɔsu ara wa mpia i Mose mmara ame ɔpia i ma situ ame. Fiɛ ma situ ana ɔte ma sɔ gbaã ne, ngbɔ iɖe alasɔ ma kaɣere sɛ katã ma ipɔ si mabara ikpi fiɛ kasɛ katã ma ibɛ si mabara isɛɛ ana.
Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loto loɣɛ ɔte sɔ iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã Yesu Kristo ɔɣɛgu maturi atɔ̃me i ara wa mabara mawɛrɛ i ma adzuni ɔɖuɖu ame iso.
Fiɛ fɔ gɔ fɔ nsɛ aɣɛ sɔ ɔ Yudase aɖe ne, asu so asia i Mose mmara iso fiɛ asɛ akɔlɛ so kato sɔ Ɣaa ɔre aɖe.
Asɛ aɣɛ ana sɔ aɣe ara wa loabo Ɣaa anɔ, aɣe ira sɛɛ gu ilalaa alasɔ asuã ara sɛɛ i ara wa matsɛrɛ masɛ ame.
Afɔ so aɖe sɔ aɖe manɔbiɛdze kɔdze fiɛ aɖe ɔkaniɛ atã mma mpia i idududu ame.
Asɛ aɣɛ sɔ asɛ aka madzimifɔ fiɛ asɛ ate mabiɛtɛ ara. Afɔ aɖe gbaã sɔ Ɣaa mmara ame ne, fɔ inɔgba ɔyi pɔpɔɔpɔ.
Ɣɛɛ fɔ gɔ fɔ nsɛ ate maturi mama ara ne, aisɛ ate so ara wamɔ? Asɛ aɣere maturi Ɣaa Itɔ̃me sɔ madaayu kayu, ɣɛɛ fɔ mɔmɔ ato ayu kayu?
Asɛ aɣere maturi sɔ madaabara asɔrɔ̃ra ɣɛɛ fɔ asɛ aɖe asɔrɔ̃? Asɛ ata aya i aɣɔ kasumu iso gbaã, ɣɛɛ asɛ ayu ara i aɣɔ ayo?
Asɛ akɔlɛ so kato sɔ aɣe Ɣaa mmara, ɣɛɛ ato apia Ɣaa kunuarɛ alasɔ aisɛ abara i ɔ̃ mmara iso.
I Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, matsɛrɛ masɛ sɔ, “Mi ma Yudase nsɛgbai nyanyarĩa ɔso ne, mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɛ marɔ Ɣaa iyere lalaa.”
Si asɛ abara i mmara iso ne, iyɔ fɔ sirɛrɛ̃ itu ɖe ira nɛ mba kusia. Ɣɛɛ si aisɛ abara i me iso ne, iyɔ fɔ sirɛrɛ̃ itu na karɔ̃.
Si ngɔ loiɖe ɔ Yudase fiɛ ɔ̃itu sirɛrɛ̃ ɔbara i mmara iso ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ wũ lɛ ngɔ lotu sirɛrɛ̃.
Ngɔ lobara i mmara iso ɣɛɛ ɔ̃itu sirɛrɛ̃ ne, ɔto ɔ̃atã-ɔ ipɔ sɔ fɔ gɔ matã mmara fiɛ atu sirɛrɛ̃ ne, aibara i me iso.
Iiɖe siturina iso boanya ɔ Yudase mɔmɔ. Sirɛrɛ̃ itu mɔmɔ ne, iiɖe sosina ame karabara ga i maturi aanyɔ kere iɖe.

Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nɖe ɔ Yudase mɔmɔ nɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔte i ɔ̃ kurabarara ame sɔ ɔɔsu ɔ̃ ɔtu ɔtã Ɣaa. Iiɖe siturina dzɛ matu i mmara kanya iɖe lonya, ɣɛɛ nnɛ mabara i Ɣaa Siwarã ame. Iiɖe kuwɛ̃ nsɛ ɔkɔlɛ ɔturi iyere kato ɣɛɛ Ɣaa nsɛ ɔbara.
Si ise ngbɔ ne, iyɔ mme kusia i ɔ Yudase gɔ lotu sirɛrɛ̃ ba ɔɖo mma loiɖe ma Yudase?
I siri gbodzoo iso ne, kusia titiiti pia alasɔ ma Yudase nrɔɔ̃ ame i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔ̃ kaɖikate sekelea ga matsɛrɛ masɛ ɔpia.
Ɣɛɛ si iba sɔ ma mawɛ̃ iifɔ maɖe ne, iatã sɔ Ɣaa iibabara i ɔ̃ nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ iso?
Ooɣo! Si ɔturi biara ɖe ladze kɔra ne, tsue sɔ Ɣaa sɛ ɔbara i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iso. Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ,
“Ira biara ɔte sɔ fɔ kanya ame atɔ̃me ne,
atɔ̃me gbaã aɖe.
Fiɛ aaɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu ibɛ si maɣɛgu-ɔ atɔ̃me.”
Si bo nsɛgbai nyanyarĩa sɛ miɖi mite sɔ Ɣaa ɔkpɛ ɔya ne, boawo ɔɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa ɔbara ikpi si ɔkpadzɛ̃ bo kutsue? Kuɣɛme ne, ilɛ si boɣɛ ngbɔ?
Ooɣo! Si Ɣaa iise bɔlɔlɔ ne, be iso ɔ̃aya fiɛ ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu atɔ̃me?
Maturi mawɛ̃ sɛ makarɛ sɔ, “Si wũ sila ila sɛ iɖi Ɣaa ɔnukuare ite sekelee itã sɔ maale wũ ne, be ɔso fiɛ mato makpere me kpibaradze?”
Si ise ngbɔ ne, be ɔso boibakɛlɛ i katɔ̃ bobara ikpi sɔ si isɛɛ aabɔrɛ i ne ame? Mawɛ̃ to mala sila sɔ ngbɔ boto bote ne. Loito lote ngbɔ ne ɔso mma nto maɣɛ ngbɔ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã ma ipɔ.
Kiniɔ ne, be boaɣɛ i bo ma Yudase iso? Boba kayakpa sɛɛ boɖo mma loiɖe ma Yudase? Ooɣo! Alasɔ loɔɖi lote koko sɔ ikpi ɔɖe ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu iso.
Alasɔ ngbɔ matsɛrɛ i ngɔi miwɛ̃ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ,
“Ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iise bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ. Ooɣo, kuwɛ̃ na!
Ɔturi kuwɛ̃ na gɔ ɔto ɔnya ira sɛɛ ɔɖi ite.
Kuwɛ̃ ana na gɔ ɔto ɔnyɔnyɔ Ɣaa ɔri.”
Matsɛrɛ ana sɔ, “Maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔkora kama matã Ɣaa
fiɛ ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɣɛrɛ.
Kuwɛ̃ na gɔ ɔto ɔbara isɛɛ, kuwɛ̃ kere!”
Matsɛrɛ ana sɔ, “Ma nnya se lɛ ikpibiɔ nɛ lowarɛ ise.
Ma sinyagɛmi ɔta siɣɛ ala mila ɔso.
Fiɛ maɣɛ kabiɛtɛ pia ma i kanya.”
Maɣɛ ana sɔ, “Sigbarĩ dzɛ loaɖoe maturi ɔyi ma i kanya.”
Matsɛrɛ i kakɔi mama sɔ, “Ma ngba sɛ mita malamala i ituriɖoe iso.
Situ ibiɛ gu inyɛwe masɛ manyua masɛ i kakɔi biara.
Maiɣe kuira i isobuɛ ngbã iso.”
Matsɛrɛ ana sɔ, “Ma nsɛgbai ana ɔte sɔ mana Ɣaa kunigã.”
Kiniɔ ne, boɣe sɔ ara wa ɔɖuɖu maɣɛ masɛ i Mose mmara ɔko ame ɔmɔɛ̃ maturi ma mpia i mmara kayirinɔ sɔ kayiiso ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iibaɖe Ɣaa ibɛ. Alasɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso ɔɖuɖu atɔ̃me.
Ne ɔso ne, mmara isiai iibabara kuwɛ̃ bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa katɔ̃. Ɣɛɛ ne, misɛ mitã maturi ɔtsue sɔ makpibaradze maɖe.
Ɣɛɛ ɔri gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔte sɔ ɔ̃ iso i maturi aki fiɛ maase bɔlɔlɔ ne, iiɖe mmara iso ibara. Mmara mɔmɔ gu kanyamaɖidze ɔɖi ara wagbe mate sekelee.
Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã maturi ɔse bɔlɔlɔ si mafɔ Kristo maɖe. Fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔpia ikpaki i ma ndɛ̃.
Maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔbara ikpi. Ne ɔso maikote sɔ maabore mabo ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ.
Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔki i Kristo Yesu iso ɔtã kuso i bo iti. Ɔbara bo sɔ boase bɔlɔlɔ ala ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ ɔso.

Ɣaa ɔsu Yesu ɔtã ala bo ikpi iti. Fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ ima nɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ ɔso ne, maturi ɔna kasukatsɛ si mafɔ Kristo maɖe. Ɣaa ɔbara nnɛgbe ɔte bo sɔ ɔsɛ ɔbara ɔ̃ ara ɔɖuɖu i sibɔlɔlɔ ɔri iso. Ɔna ɔtu ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ame gɔ ɔ̃ikpadzɛ̃ bo kutsue gɔ bobara ikpi.
Ɔbara ngbɔ si ɔsu ɔte, sɔ ɔsɛ ɔbara ɔ̃ ira biara i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara mma ɔɖuɖu lofɔ Yesu maɖe bɔlɔlɔ.
Be iso boawo ɔya ɔtui kɔrɔ̃ i kagbegbe sɔ ne bobara fiɛ bona iɖi? Kuira na! Alasɔ ɔturi iisɛ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ iki i mmara iso ibara ame ɣɛɛ kafɔkaɖe ame.
Alasɔ boɣe kukaakɔ sɔ kafɔkaɖe kotoo ame i ɔturi aase bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ fiɛ iiɖe mmara iso ibara ame.
Ɛɛbɛrɛ Ɣaa ne, ma Yudase kere ɔre ɔɖe? Mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana ne, iiɖe ma Ɣaa ɔɖe? Aĩ, ma wũ ma ɔre ɔɖe.
Gɔ Ɣaa ɔwɛ̃ saã ɔɖe ɔso ne, ɔ̃ gɔ ame loabara ma Yudase bɔlɔlɔ iki kafɔkaɖe ame ne, ɔ̃ ame loabara mma loiɖe ma Yudase bɔlɔlɔ iki kafɔkaɖe ame ame ne.
Nnɛgbe karɔ̃ ɣɛɛ? Ito ite sɔ boɔnyua mmara bosɛ i kuruɛ sɔ kafɔkaɖe si ka fɔ me kanya? Ooɣo! Ɣɛɛ ara wa i mmara ɔte boledza isɛra.
Be nɖe nnɛ boawo ɔɣɛ sɔ bo ɔwa tɛtɛ Abraham ɔnya i Itɔ̃me nɛgbe iso?
Si sɔ kurabarara iso iki fiɛ Ɣaa ɔnya Abraham sɔ ɔbɔlɔlɔ ne, iyɔ ɔba nnɛ iso ɔ̃aya ɔ̃aɖe ndamu. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ibawo ndamu ɔɖe i Ɣaa anɔ alasɔ iiɖe ɔ̃ kurabarara kuɖe ɔnyɔ.
Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Abraham ɔfɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔnyɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.”
Ngɔ lobara karabara iisɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ kuso lɛ ira tsɛa, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ kuso lɛ ira nɛ nɖe ɔ̃ karabara kusia.
Ɣɛɛ mma losu so masia i kafɔkaɖe iso fiɛ iiɖe ma kurabarara iso, mafɔ Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ɔturi bɔlɔlɔ maɖe ne, ma i Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ sɔ mase bɔlɔlɔ ne.
Igara David ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔturi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔnyɔ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ iiɖe ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔso ne, ɔ̃awe isoɣɔ gbaã. David ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“So aaɣɔ
mma ikpi i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtsɛ
fiɛ ɔ̃ibakpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue.
So aɣɔ ngɔ
ikpi i Bosate ɔkpa ara ɔfu.”
Isoɣɔ nɛ iso Itɔ̃me i David to ɔɣɛ ngbe ne, mma lotu sirɛrɛ̃ ire kere iɖe? Ooɣo! Mma ɔɖuɖu loitu sirɛrɛ̃ ana ire iɖe alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Abraham ɔfɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe, ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔfɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.”
Mme ɔwi iɖe i Ɣaa ɔfɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ? Ɔwi gɔ ame ɔ̃itu sirɛrɛ̃ ɛɛbɛrɛ ɔwi gɔ ame ɔ̃ɔtu? Iiɖe ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃ɔtu sirɛrɛ̃, ɣɛɛ fiɛ ɔ̃atu.

Sirɛrɛ̃ itu kubarara gɔ i Abraham ɔbara ne, ikparĩ kere iɖe nɛ lote sɔ Ɣaa ɔfɔ wũ. Alasɔ ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe lotã sɔ Ɣaa ɔfɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ fiɛ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃atu sirɛrɛ̃. Iki kafɔkaɖe ame ne, Abraham ɔkpese mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ɔse. Ɣaa ɔki i Abraham iso ɔfɔ ma ɔɖuɖu sɔ mase bɔlɔlɔ atoa sɔ maitu sirɛrɛ̃.
Abraham ɖe ɔse ɔtã mma lotu sirɛrɛ̃ ana. Ɣɛɛ iiɖe gɔ matu sirɛrɛ̃ ɔso, ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ ngbã i kafɔkaɖe ame lɛ ma ɔse Abraham awe tɔtɔ fiɛ ɔ̃atu sirɛrɛ̃.

Ɣaa ɔkã ndamu ɔtã Abraham gu ɔ̃ mawa tɛtɛ sɔ maaɖe kayiiso ɔɖuɖu ara. Iiɖe kumɛgɔ i Abraham gu ɔ̃ mawa ɔsiai Mmara kama ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkã ndamu mɛgbe. Ɣɛɛ ɔkã ndamu mɛgbe alasɔ ɔfɔ Abraham sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ iki i ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe ɔso.
Si kayiiso ara iɖe ndamu mɛ i Ɣaa ɔkã ne mma lobara i mmara iso mire kere miɖe ne, iyɔ kafɔkaɖe ɖe siefe. Fiɛ iyɔ Ɣaa ndamu na kusia kukuwɛ̃.
Alasɔ mmara sɛ miɖi Ɣaa sikpã mite bo, fiɛ si mina ne, me ita iya iso ana iisɛ iwe.
Ne ɔso ndamu mɛgbe ne, kafɔkaɖe kama miɣɛ. Alasɔ iiɖe mma i Ɣaa ɔtã mmara ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe Abraham mawa. Ɣɛɛ mma losiai ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe kama ana. Alasɔ Abraham nɖe mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ɔse.

Alasɔ ngbɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loɔsu-ɔ lobara abuiti gbodzoo ɔse.” Ne ɔso ndamu mɛgbe ɔya i Ɣaa anɔ. Ɣaa gɔ i Abraham ɔfɔ ɔɖe ne, ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔtara makpise ɔbɔ ngbã ame, ɔkpere ara wa nna i kayi koko ɔbɔ kayi ne.
Ɔwi gɔ i ɔriinyɔ na kɔra ne, Abraham ɔya i kafɔkaɖe ame teteree. Ɔfɔ ɔɖe sɔ ɔto ɔ̃akpese abuiti gbodzoo ɔse lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Fɔ ɔɣekparɛ to ɔ̃asi gbodzoo lɛ awãmi.”
Abraham ɔɔfɔ lɛ akɔ kulafa, ɣɛɛ ne, nrɔɔ̃ ifɛfɛ̃ wũ i kafɔkaɖe ame atoa sɔ ɔnya sɔ ka ɔɣɛ i ikpibiɔ ɔkpokpo fiɛ Sara ana ɔɔfe ɔbi ɔɣewi.
Ara wagbe iifɛfɛ̃ wũ nrɔɔ̃ i kafɔkaɖe ame ɣɛɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ Ɣaa ndamu ɔla teteree fiɛ ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe ana ɔwe ɔle kabua ɔsu ile ɔtã Ɣaa.
Ɔtsue sekelee sɔ Ɣaa ba ɔle gɔ ɔ̃abara nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe gagbe ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔnyɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.
Fiɛ iiɖe ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã iso matsɛrɛ ara wagbe masɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa ɔnya wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.”
Ɣɛɛ ise i bo ma ana i Ɣaa aanya sɔ bose bɔlɔlɔ iki i kumɛgɔ bofɔ wũ boɖe sɔ ɔtara Bosate Yesu ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔso.
Ɣaa ɔtã maɖi Kristo matã ala bo ikpi ɔso. Fiɛ ɔtara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame sɔ si ɔ̃abara bo bose bɔlɔlɔ.
Kiniɔ gɔ Ɣaa ɔɔbara bo bɔlɔlɔ iki i bo kafɔkaɖe iso ne, isobuɛ ka ipia i bo gu wũ ndɛ̃ iki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso.
Gɔ bofɔ Kristo boɖe ɔso ne, itã sɔ bona Ɣaa nnyainyɔ nɛ ame bopia kiniɔ. So ɔɣɔ bo gbaã alasɔ boba ɔriinyɔ sɔ boasɛgu Kristo i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ dzɛ lokpa waĩ ame.
Fiɛ ana ne, so sɛ siɣɔ bo si bopia i imɔrɛ̃ ame alasɔ boɣe sɔ imɔrɛ̃ nɛgbe igbã sɛ itã boya teteree.
Fiɛ bo iya teteree ne, isɛ itã sɔ boana iwola sɛɛ nɛ loatã sɔ boana ɔriinyɔ.
Fiɛ ɔriinyɔ nɛgbe iibatã sɔ kunuarɛ aakpɛ̃ bo. Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ Siwarã Bielea dzɛ ɔfedza ɔfere bo iso ɔtã sɔ ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔyi bo situ ame ɔɖuɖu.
Ɔwi gɔ bona ibarara ne, Kristo ɔba ɔ̃akpi i makpibaradze iti. Iba ngbɔ ku ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ame.
Isɛ iwe ɔle sɔ ɔturi aakpi i ngɔ nse bɔlɔlɔ kanya. Ɣɛɛ iawo ɔɖe sɔ ɔrere aana ɔtu sɔ ɔ̃akpi i ɔturi sɛɛ iti.
Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔte bo kukaakɔ kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔɖɔɛ bo. Alasɔ ɔwi gɔ bopia i bo akpi ame ne, ɔtã sɔ Kristo ɔkpi i bo iti.
Si iki i ɔ̃ kukpi iso fiɛ ɔbara bo maturi bɔlɔlɔa i Ɣaa anɔ ne, iyɔ ɔto ɔ̃aɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i Ɣaa sikpã siare ame ana!
Si Ɣaa ɔfere bo gu wũ kanya ndu iki i ɔ̃ Ɔbi kukpi iso ku ɔwi gɔ boɖe ɔ̃ matsirise ne, kiniɔ gɔ i bo gu wũ ndɛ̃ ka ilɛ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃anyɔ bo nnya gbodzoo sɔ boana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro iki i Kristo iso.
Fiɛ iiɖe nnɛgbe kere, ɣɛɛ so ɔɣɔ bo gbaã alasɔ Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɔki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso ɔfere bo gu wũ kanya ndu.
Ikpi ɔki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ iso iba i kayiiso fiɛ ikpi nɛmɔ lobɔ kukpi ne. Fiɛ kukpi pia kutã ɔturi biara alasɔ ɔbiara ɔbara ikpi.
Ikpi ka ipia i kayiiso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔtã bo Mose mmara. Ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ i mmara na ne, Ɣaa ɔkpa anɔ ɔfu i maturi akpi iso.
Ita i Adam ɔwi isɛ iabo Mose ɔwi ne, kukpi ɔɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu iso. Mma loibara atsuele ikpi nɛ igbã i Adam ɔbara ana ɔkpi. Fiɛ Adam gɔgbe ɣɛ ɔtã ɔturi gɔ nto ɔ̃aba.

Ɣɛɛ ne, ma inyɔɔ iiɖe mawɛ̃. Alasɔ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ nɛ i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ ɔbɔ iiɖe ira nɛ i Adam ikpi ɔbara igbã. Adam ɖe ɔturi gɔ ikpi ibara lotã maturi gbodzoo ɔkpi. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã iɖi nnyainyɔ gbodzoo nɛ loaki i Yesu iso ikɔ maturi gbodzoo ibɔ ala ɔ̃ kayiribielea ɔso.
Lobie sɔ loɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ iise lɛ ikpi nɛ i ɔturi ɔbara. Alasɔ ikpi nɛmɔ ɔbɔ ipɔ. Ɣɛɛ akpi gbodzoo wamɔ kama ne, Yesu nnyainyɔ ɔbara maturi ɔkpese maturi bɔlɔlɔa.

Iki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ iso fiɛ kukpi ɔɖe maturi iso ala ɔ̃ ikpi ɔso. Ɣɛɛ nnɛ lobɔrɛ i Yesu Kristo kukpi ame ɔmɔ iɣede. Mma ɔɖuɖu lona Ɣaa nnyainyɔ ne, ɔbara ma bɔlɔlɔ sɔ maabo i ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame maɖegu wũ sigara iki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe Kristo iso.
Ne ɔso kumɛgɔ iki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ ikpi ibara ɔso i maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔɖe ipɔ ne, ngbɔ ame iki i ira sɛɛ iwɛ̃ ibara iso ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã maturi ɔɖuɖu ibɛ ne.
Kumɛgɔ ame iki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ atsuele ɔso fiɛ maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔkpese makpibaradze ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa aaki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ lokã Ɣaa atsue iso ɔtã sɔ maturi gbodzoo aakpese maturi bɔlɔlɔa ne.
