Gɔ mmara ɔba ne, itã sɔ maturi ɔnya ma akpi gbodzoo maɖi ite. Fiɛ si bonya bo akpi gbodzoo wa bobara ne, ne boanya Ɣaa nnyainyɔ nɛ ɔsu ɔtã bo ana boɖi ite ne.
Ne ɔso kumɛgɔ i ikpi ɔtã kukpi ɔɖe maturi iso ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa nnyainyɔ aatã sɔ boakpese maturi bɔlɔlɔa fiɛ boabo i ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iki i bosate Yesu Kristo iso ne.
Ne ɔso be boaɣɛ? Boakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ bobara ikpi sɔ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ si isi ibua?
Ooɣo! Gɔ boɔkpi ɔso ne, ikpi siina ɔle i bo iso! Ne ɔso be ɔso fiɛ boala boɔbara ikpi?
Ɔwi gɔ mabara bo Ɣaa itupie iki i Yesu Kristo ame ne, miitsue sɔ Ɣaa itupie ɔbara bo gu Kristo mawɛ̃ i ɔ̃ kukpi ana ame?
Iki i itupie nɛmɔ ame ne, ite sɔ bo wũ boɔkpi fiɛ mabiara bo gu wũ. Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ɔle iso ɔtara Yesu ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame sɔ si bo wũ boata boba boasɛgu wũ i ngbã ɣɛtɛ ame.
Fiɛ gɔ bobaragu wũ mawɛ̃ i ɔ̃ kukpi ame ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã sɔ boabaragu wũ mawɛ̃ i ɔ̃ ita ame ana.
Boɣe sɔ bo ngbã kuere ne, mapɛ me ku Kristo mamatãra i kudziri iso. Ne ɔso nsɛgbai mɛ nsɛ miɖɔɛ ikpi ibara iisibana ɔle i bo siturina iso sɔ boabara ikpi alasɔ boisiɖe ikpi masande.
Alasɔ si ɔturi ɔɔkpi ne, ikpi siina ɔle i ɔ̃ iso.
Ne ɔso si bo gu Kristo ɔkpi ne, bofɔ boɖe sɔ boasɛgu wũ ngbã.
Boɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔtara Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame fiɛ ɔ̃isibakpi ala kukpi siina ɔle i ɔ̃ iso.
Kristo kukpi gɔ ɔkpi ne, ɔkpi ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ sɔ si ikpi iisibaɖe wũ iso. Ngbã mɛ ka ɔsi kiniɔ ne, ɔsi ɔtã Ɣaa.
Ngbɔ ame ikote sɔ mi wũ mianyɔ so sɔ miɔkpi ne ɔso ikpi iisibaɖe mi iso ne. Ngbã mɛ misi kiniɔ ne, miasɛ mitã Ɣaa i mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo Yesu ame.
Midaatã sɔ ikpi aaɖe mi sosina dzɛ nto siakpi ngbe iso sɔ mianyua so mitã ara wa nsɛ awe sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃.

Midaatã ɔri sɔ ikpi aaɖe mi sosina iso i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso sɔ miabara ara lalaa. Ɣɛɛ misu so mitã Ɣaa lɛ mma ɔ̃ɔtara ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔbɔ ngbã ame. Minyua so i ɔri biara iso mitã wũ lɛ karabara abarara wa nse sekelee fiɛ ɔ̃asu ɔbara ɔ̃ karabara.
Ikpi siina ɔle i mi iso alasɔ mina i mmara kayirinɔ. Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa nnyainyɔ kayirinɔ mipia.
Be ka boaɣɛ? Sɔ bosiina i mmara kayirinɔ ne Ɣaa nnyainyɔ kayirinɔ bopia ɔso ne, boakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ bobara ikpi? Ooɣo!

Miiɣe gbaã sɔ si anɔ so karɔ̃ sɔ aasu so apia i ɔturi kayirinɔ ala ɔɔbara ɔ̃ karabara ne, iyɔ ɔkpesera so ngɔmɔ ɔsande? Ne ɔso midaakpesera so makpibaradze nɛ loakɔ ɔturi ikɛlɛgu kukpi ame. Misu so mikpesera ara sɛɛ mabaradze nɛ loakɔ ɔturi ikɛlɛgu ibɔlɔlɔ karabara ame.
Ɣɛɛ bopɛ Ɣaa siba alasɔ ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, miɖe makpibaradze. Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, miɔsu mi situ ɔɖuɖu mifɔ itɔ̃me nɛ lote mi miɖe.
Miɔbɔrɛ i ikpi nrɔɔ̃ ame alasɔ miɔsu so mitã sibɔlɔlɔ ara ibara.

Lobie sɔ loɣere mi i ɔturi kuɣɛme si mianɔ karɔ̃ pɔkɔsɔɔ sɔ ne, ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, minyua so pelepele mitã ikpi ibara nɛ lopukutura mi. Kiniɔ ne, ngbɔ ame si misu so mitã pelepele i ara bɔlɔlɔa ibara nɛ loabara mi sekelee itã ara sɛɛ ibara ne.
Ɔwi gɔ miɖe makpibaradze ne, sibɔlɔlɔ iiɖe mi iso.
Mme kusia mina i ara wa mila miɔbara wa nto akpɛ̃ mi kunuarɛ kiniɔ ame? Ara wamɔ ɔɖuɖu kusia nɖe kukpi ne.
Kiniɔ ne, miɔbɔrɛ i ikpi nrɔɔ̃ ame, ne ɔso miɔna iwarã. Misu so mibara Ɣaa masande. Alasɔ kusia gɔ miana miɖi si misu so mitã wũ pelepele fiɛ mibara so sekelee nɖe ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro minya.
Alasɔ ikpi kusia nɖe kukpi. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ ne, iatã bo ngbã mɛ loibaro minya iki Kristo Yesu gɔ nɖe Bokɔse iso.
Gbaã ne, manyii, mianɔ ara wa nto loɣɛ ngbe karɔ̃ alasɔ mi ɔɖuɖu ɣe mmara iso ara. Mmara ba ɔle i ɔturi iso ayi kumɛgɔ ɔsi ngbã.
Nto losu nnɛgbe lote sɔ, ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nsi i kurã iyo ne, kuyiri mmara ɔnyi wũ mimatã i ɔrã iso ayi kumɛgɔ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ si ngbã. Ɣɛɛ si ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔkpi ne, iyɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔmɔ siina i mmara kayirinɔ.

Ne ɔso si ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ɔsɛ ɔ̃ayiri ɔrɛrɛ̃ mama ku ɔwi gɔ i ɔ̃ ɔra si ngbã ne, maakpere wũ sɔ rãrɔdze ɔɖe. Ɣɛɛ si ɔ̃ ɔrã ɔɔkpi ne, iyɔ ɔsiina i mmara kayirinɔ. Ka ɔba ɔri sɔ ɔ̃ayiri kurã mama gɔ ɔ̃isiɖe rãrɔdze.
Wũ manyii, ngbɔ ame ise mi ana ne. Alasɔ i mmara kanya ne, ite sɔ mikpi ku ɔwi gɔ i Kristo ɔkpi. Ne ɔso mikpesera so mma i Ɣaa ɔtara ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame sɔ bo nsɛgbai ka miaɖe ira sɛɛ mitã Ɣaa.
Ɔwi gɔ bosɛ ngbã i siturina kanya ne, ikpi ɔwe ɔle i bo ame. Mmara ɔtara ara wagbe miɣedza sɔ bo siturina ɔrakolo ɔtã bobara akpi wa loakɔ bo akɛlɛgu kukpi ame.
Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, gɔ boɔkpi bobɔrɛ i ara wa lonyi bo mmɔ ame ne, mmara siina ɔle i bo iso. Alasɔ boisisɛ bobara kuira i ɔri kuere iso, ɣɛɛ ɔri ɣɛtɛ gɔ iso i Ɣaa Siwarã pia boto bobara karabara.

Si ise ngbɔ ne, boaɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa mmara nɖe ikpi? Ooɣo! Gbaã ne, mmara iso iki fiɛ botsue ara wa nɖe ikpi. Si mmara si midaaɣɛ sɔ, “Daatã fɔ anɔ si arɛtɛ-ɔ i ɔturi ira iso” ne, tee loibatsue nnɛ nɖe kanɔbɛbɛ.
Ɣɛɛ ne, ikpi ɔba iana ɔri iki mmara iso itã sɔ kanɔbɛbɛ agbãagbã ɔna ɔle i wũ ame. Si mmara na ne, ikpi na ɔle.
Mme wũ losɛ ngbã mɛgbe igbã ɔwi gɔ lofe gɔ loiɣe mmara. Ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ lotsue mmara fiɛ miitã me ɔri sɔ loabara ara gbodzoo ne, ikpi ibara ana ɔta iya i wũ ame.
Ne ɔso mmara mɛ loatã me ngbã fiɛ ne, mibɔ me kukpi bowũ.
Ikpi ɔna ɔri iki i mmara iso isɔsɔla me iɖoe.
Ne ɔso mmara mɔmɔ se sekelee, ara wa mite ana se sekelee, ise bɔlɔlɔ fiɛ ilɛ ana.

Ne iyɔ ɔte ito sɔ ira nɛ nsɛ ibɔ ira sɛɛ ɔbɔ me kukpi? Ooɣo! Iiɖe ngbɔ iɖe. Ɣɛɛ ikpi losu ira sɛɛ ikpadzɛ̃ kukpi ibɔ me. Iba ngbɔ si ite kumɛgɔ i ikpi ɔnyanyarĩ. Fiɛ iki i mmara iso ne, ikpi ɔɔɖi ne nsɛgbai mɔmɔ ite.
Boɣe sɔ mmara ne, Siwarã ame ira iɖe. Ɣɛɛ mme ne, sosina ame ɔturi loɖe fiɛ ikpi ɔɖe me iso.
Loisɛ lonɔ ara wa nsɛ lobara karɔ̃. Alasɔ ara wa nsɛ lobie sɔ loabara ne, iiɖe wã aɖe nsɛ lobara. Ɣɛɛ ara wa loisɛ loɖɔɛ ne, wã nsɛ lobara ne.
Fiɛ si ara wa loisɛ loɖɔɛ nsɛ lobara ne, iɔte sɔ lonɔ karɔ̃ sɔ mmara lɛ.
Ne ɔso ne, iɔte sɔ iiɖe mme mɔmɔ me nsɛ lobara ara wamɔ ɣɛɛ ikpi nɛ mpia i wũ ame nsɛ ibara.
Loɣe sɔ i wũ ame ne, ira sɛɛ kuiwɛ̃ na ayi kumɛgɔ loɖe ɔturi awune. Alasɔ losɛ lobie gbaã sɔ tee loabara isɛɛ fiɛ, ɣɛɛ loisɛ lowo ɔbara.
Alasɔ isɛɛ nɛ loto lobie sɔ loabara ne, iiɖe ne nsɛ lobara. Ɣɛɛ ikpi nɛ loito lobie sɔ lobara ne, ne iɖe losɛ lobara ne.
Ne ɔso si loto lobara ara wa loito lobie ne, iyɔ iiɖe mme mɔmɔ me nto lobara. Ɣɛɛ ne, ikpi nɛ mpia i wũ ame iɖe.
Ne ɔso lonya ira ɔ nɛgbe loɖi ite i wũ ame sɔ, si loto lobie sɔ lobara isɛɛ ne, ikpi ɔmatã me iso teteree.
Gbaã iɖe sɔ i wũ ɔtu ame tee ne, Ɣaa mmara sɛ mitã me isoɣɔ gbaã.
Ɣɛɛ lonya sɔ ara mama wa nsɛ abɔrɛ i wũ ame sɛ akpɛ̃gu ara wa i wũ adzuni ɔte me sɔ alɛ fiɛ. Ne ɔso atã sɔ ikpi ɔnyi me lɛ yorɛdze awe.
Wũ ara ba nnya gbaã. Nna loaɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ kuere gɔ nto me ikɔ isɛgu kukpi ame?
Lopɛ Ɣaa siba alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso ɔɖi me!
Kiniɔ ne, i wũ adzuni ame ne, loɖe Ɣaa mmara iso baradze. Ɣɛɛ i wũ sosina kurabarara kanya ne, loɖe kpibaradze.
Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, ipɔ kuiwɛ̃ siina itã mma lobara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu i ma kasɛ ame.
Alasɔ iki i Kristo Yesu iso ne, mmara mɛ nsɛ miki i Ɣaa Siwarã ame mitã maturi ngbã ɔtã sɔ loɔbɔrɛ i mmara mɛ loakɔ mɛ misɛgu ikpi ame.

Alasɔ ira nɛ i Ɣaa mmara mɛ ɔsu ɔtã Mose fiɛ boiwo ɔbara ana maturi iiwo me ɔɖe iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɔbara ne. Ɔpia ɔ̃ Ɔbi lɛ ɔturi gɔ mba sosina dzɛ ikpi ɔkpɛ̃gu. Ɔba ɔ̃atã kuso i bo iti, ɔtã ikpi ipɔ ɔle gɔ iba i bo iso ɔnina.
Ɣaa ɔbara nnɛgbe ɔtã bo ma nsi lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔɖɔɛ, iiɖe kumɛgɔ i siturina sɛ siɖɔɛ awe. Ɔbara ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso lɛ kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ mmara ɔte awe.
Mma nsɛ masɛ i ma sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ kanya ne, ma adzuni sia i ara wa i ma sosina sɛ siɖɔɛ iso. Ɣɛɛ mma nsi iki i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔso ne, ma adzuni sia i ara wa i Ɣaa Siwarã sɛ si ɖɔɛ iso.
Ɔturi gɔ adzuni nsia i sosina ara iso ne, kukpi ɔsɛ ɔna. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ adzuni nsia i Ɣaa Siwarã iso ne, ɔsɛ ɔna ngbã gu isobuɛ.
Ngɔ adzuni nsia i sosina ara kere iso ne, Ɣaa tsirise ɔɖe alasɔ ɔ̃isɛ ɔkã Ɣaa mmara atsue. Fiɛ gbaã ne, ɔ̃ibawo me iso ɔbara ana kuiyikuiyi.
Mma nsɛ mabara ma sosina kuɖɔɛ ne, maibawo Ɣaa anɔ ɔbo.
Si Ɣaa Siwarã ɔyi i mi ame ne, miibasɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i mi sosina nsɛgbai ɔte kanya, ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔɖɔɛ. Fiɛ si Kristo Siwarã na i ɔrere ame ne, ɔ̃iɖe Kristo ɔre.
Kiniɔ gɔ i Kristo pia i mi ame ne, mi siturina to siakpi ala ikpi ɔso. Ɣɛɛ mi Siwarã to siawe ngbã alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɔbara mi bɔlɔlɔ.
Fiɛ si Ɣaa Siwarã dzɛ lotara Yesu sibɔrɛgu i makpise ame pia i mi ame ne, ɔ̃ gɔ lotara Kristo Yesu ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame to ɔ̃atã mi siturina dzɛ loakpi ngbã iki i ɔ̃ Siwarã dzɛ mpia i mi ame ɔso.
Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii, boito sosina kuso sɔ boasɛ bobara sosina kuɖɔɛ.
Si misiai sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ nyanyarĩa kama ne, mito miakpi. Ɣɛɛ si miki i Ɣaa Siwarã iso miɖoe mi sosina ngbã kuere lalaa ne, mito miana ngbã.
Alasɔ mma i Ɣaa Siwarã to sikɔ ne, ma nɖe Ɣaa mabi ne.
Ɣaa iitã mi Siwarã dzɛ loatã sɔ miakpese masande mila miɔnigã. Ɣɛɛ ndzɛ loatã mikpese ɔ̃ mabi. Iki i Siwarã dzɛmɔ iso ne, bosɛ bokpere Ɣaa sɔ, “Abba” gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ Tete.
Ɣaa Siwarã gu bo siwarã ɔbara mawɛ̃ mato mate sɔ Ɣaa mabi boɖe.
Gɔ ɔ̃ mabi boɖe ɔso ne, bo loaɖe ɔ̃ ara ana. Bo gu Kristo loatoto boɖe Ɣaa ara. Fiɛ boafiɛ ana lɛ ɔ̃ si bowe inyɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔwe inyɛ.
I wũ itsue kanya ne, inyɛwe nɛ boba kiniɔ ne, iibawo ɔkategu Ɣaa ikpawaĩ gu isoɣɔ nɛ boana.
Ɣaa kurabarara ɔɖuɖu to kunyɔ ɔri totoroo kutã ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa aaɖi ɔ̃ mabi ɔte.
Ɣaa kurabarara gɔgbe ɔɖuɖu ɔbo i inyɛwe ame gɔ iiɖe kɔ̃ mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ ɔso. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa mɔmɔ lotã ɔri sɔ iba ngbɔ si ɔ̃atã ma ɔriinyɔ sɔ,
ɔto ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ ara wamɔ ɔɖuɖu ɔɖi i kukpi nrɔɔ̃ ame fiɛ aana iwarã afiɛ lɛ ɔ̃ mabi awe.
Boɣe sɔ ipɛ i kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa kurabarara ɔɖuɖu to kutɔrɛ̃ lɛ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nto ɔkpɛ̃ kuɣe.
Fiɛ iiɖe ara wamɔ kere, ta bo ma i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔtã ana to botɔrɛ̃ i bo ame bosu bo ɔriinyɔ bosia sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã bo ikpi iti kuso sɔ si boana iwarã lɛ ɔ̃ mabi.
Gɔ boba ɔriinyɔ nɛgbe ɔso ne, boba iɖi. Ɣɛɛ ɔriinyɔ nɛ boto bonya ala anɔ ne, iisiɖe ɔriinyɔ. Alasɔ ɔturi iisisɛ ɔnyɔ ira nɛ ɔto ɔnya ɔri.
Ɣɛɛ si bo anɔ sia i ara wa i bo anɔ iito anya iso ne, iyɔ boana ɔtu bonyɔ ɔri sɔ isɛ i ɔri.
I ɔri gɔgbe ame iso i Ɣaa Siwarã sɛ sibuai bo alasɔ bona ɔle fiɛ boiɣe kumɛgɔ boakparama kayi bokigu. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ Siwarã mɔmɔ sɛ si tɔrɛ̃ i bo ati kumɛgɔ ikote fiɛ boibawo ɔɖi ɔte.
Ɣaa gɔ nɣe maturi situ ame ne, ɔɣe ira nɛ mpia i Ɣaa Siwarã adzuni ame ana. Alasɔ Siwarã sɛ sitã Ɣaa iti i bo iti lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖɔɛ.
Boɣe sɔ ira biara nɛ i Ɣaa ɔbara ne, ilɛ itã maturi ma nsɛ maɖɔɛ wũ fiɛ ɔkpere ma sɔ mabara ɔ̃ karabara.
Fiɛ mma i Ɣaa ɣe ɔsɛ ne, ɔsia ma ikparĩ nɛ loatã sɔ maare ɔ̃ Ɔbi sɔ ɔ̃ Ɔbi aaɖe ɔɖeakatɔ̃ i manyiibi gbodzoo ndɛ̃.
Ne ɔso mma i Ɣaa ɔsia ikparĩ ne, ma iɖe ɔkpere ne. Mma ɔkpere ne, ɔbara ma bɔlɔlɔ. Fiɛ mma ɔbara bɔlɔlɔ ne, ma ati ɔtara kato ne.
Nwagbe ɔso ne, be iɖe boaɣɛ? Si Ɣaa ɣɛ bo i kama ne, nna loawo bo ɔkpɛ̃gu?
Si Ɣaa iisɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔsu ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɔtã i bo iti ne, be ɔso fiɛ ɔ̃ibasu ara ɔɖuɖu ɔtã bo i kayiribielea ame ala ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɔso?
Nna loawo Ɣaa maturi kanya ɔɖaɛ? Ɣaa mɔmɔ nɖe ma kanyaɖidze fiɛ ɔ̃inyagu ma ikpi kuiwɛ̃.
Nna ɔɖe loawo ma ipɔ ɔtã? Kristo Yesu nɖe ngɔ lokpi fiɛ Ɣaa ɔledza wũ itara ibɔrɛgu i makpise ame, ɔpia ngbã fiɛ ɔsi i Ɣaa kuɖearɔ̃ iso ɔto ɔpɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ i bo iti.
Nna ɔɖe loawo bo gu Kristo kuɖɔɛ gɔ mpia bo i ndɛ̃ ɔɖaɛ? Inyɛwe, ɛɛbɛrɛ ibo inɔ, ɛɛbɛrɛ ɔnyɛ, ɛɛbɛrɛ ita iya iso, kukã ɛɛbɛrɛ isɔ̃ isɛ, ɛɛbɛrɛ itikpi, ɛɛbɛrɛ kukpi iki i ipɛmi iso?
Ipia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ,
“Fɔ ɔso ne, bopia i kukpi ifɔ̃ ame iyi biara.
Masɛ mabara bo lɛ masɛrɛ ma masɛgu kaɖoekɔ̃.”
I nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ame ne, boɖo mma loɖe iso iki i Kristo gɔ loɖɔɛ bo ɔso.

Alasɔ ikpa me sekelee sɔ kuɖɔɛ gɔ mpia i bo gu Ɣaa ndɛ̃ iki i Kristo Yesu gɔ nɖe Bosate iso ne, kuira iibawo bo ndɛ̃ ɔɖaɛ. Kukpi o-o, ngbã o-o, Ɣaa makpabo o-o, siwarã lalaa o-o, ɔwi nyanyarĩa gɔ loaba o-o, ɔle ɔrere i kato o-o, karɔ̃ o-o ne, kuira na nɛ i Ɣaa ɔbara sɔ iawo bo ndɛ̃ ɔɖaɛ.

Alasɔ ikpa me sekelee sɔ kuɖɔɛ gɔ mpia i bo gu Ɣaa ndɛ̃ iki i Kristo Yesu gɔ nɖe Bosate iso ne, kuira iibawo bo ndɛ̃ ɔɖaɛ. Kukpi o-o, ngbã o-o, Ɣaa makpabo o-o, siwarã lalaa o-o, ɔwi nyanyarĩa gɔ loaba o-o, ɔle ɔrere i kato o-o, karɔ̃ o-o ne, kuira na nɛ i Ɣaa ɔbara sɔ iawo bo ndɛ̃ ɔɖaɛ.
Ayi kumɛgɔ loɖe Kristo ɔre ne, ɔnukuare loto loɣɛ, fiɛ loito lola sila. Siwarã Bielea ana to siɖe wũ ɔtu iso fiɛ loibala sila.
Lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ isoma pia i wũ ɔtu ame gbaã.
Alasɔ loto lobie sɔ loabuai wũ aɖe maturi. Si Ɣaa aanɔ karɔ̃ ne, ɔbɛse me i Kristo iso ɔfinikira wũ iɖi ɔtã wũ maturi si mme lowɔ pelepele.

Alasɔ Ɣaa maturi ma ɔɖi maɖe. Ɔsu ma ɔbara ɔ̃ mabi, fiɛ ɔɖi ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ɔte ma. Ma iɖe ɔnyigu kanya fiɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ mmara ana ɔtã. Ma iɖe i Ɣaa ɔte kumɛgɔ maafɛ̃ ara matã wũ fiɛ ma iɖe ɔtã ɔ̃ kaɣɛkasɛ ana.
Ma mawa nɖe Israel makpakpa ma i Ɣaa ɔɖi fiɛ ma ɔɣekparɛ ame i Kristo gɔ loba kayiiso lɛ ɔturi awe ɔbɔrɛ. Boale Ɣaa gɔ nto ɔɖe ara ɔɖuɖu iso ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ dzoroo. Si iba ngbɔ.
Iise lɛ sɔ Ɣaa kaɣɛkasɛ ga ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ne, ɔ̃ibara i kã iso. Alasɔ iiɖe ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu nɖe maturi ma i Ɣaa ɔɖi lɛ ɔ̃ mare.
Ite sɔ iiɖe Abraham mawa ɔɖuɖu nɖe Ɣaa mabi. Ɣaa ɔɣere Abraham sɔ, “Isak iso loaka-ɔ mawa.”
Nnɛgbe ɔte sɔ iiɖe Abraham mabi ɔɖuɖu ma ɔɣe nɖe Ɣaa mabi. Ɣɛɛ mabi ma maɣe iki i Ɣaa kaɣɛkasɛ ame ne, ma ɔsɛ ɔnyɔ lɛ Abraham mabi mɔmɔ ne.
Itɔ̃me nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i kaɣɛkasɛ ame nɖe sɔ, “Loakpese loba ku ikɔlɛaba ɔwi gɔgbe ame fiɛ Sara aaɣe ɔbirɛrɛĩ.”
Fiɛ iiɖe nnɛgbe kere. Ɣɛɛ Rebeka ɔɣe inyɔmabi gɔ maɖe mabirɛrɛĩ mabɔrɛ i ɔse ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ nɖe bo ɔwa Isak ame.

Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ba ɔri gɔ iso ɔsɛ ɔki ɔsɛ ɔɖi maturi. Fiɛ kumɛgɔ iba i ne ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ira ɔsɛ fiɛ maɣe inyɔmabi magbe kɔra fiɛ maatsue isɛɛ gu ikpi. Ɔri gɔ iso ɔki ɔɖi ma iiki ma karabara kukawɛ̃ iso. Alasɔ ɔɣere Rebeka sɔ, “Ɔbi kpakpare to ɔ̃akpese kosore ɔɖabo.”

Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ba ɔri gɔ iso ɔsɛ ɔki ɔsɛ ɔɖi maturi. Fiɛ kumɛgɔ iba i ne ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ira ɔsɛ fiɛ maɣe inyɔmabi magbe kɔra fiɛ maatsue isɛɛ gu ikpi. Ɔri gɔ iso ɔki ɔɖi ma iiki ma karabara kukawɛ̃ iso. Alasɔ ɔɣere Rebeka sɔ, “Ɔbi kpakpare to ɔ̃akpese kosore ɔɖabo.”
Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Yakob loɖi, fiɛ Esau losɛ̃.”
Iyɔ be boaɣɛ i nnɛgbe iso iyɔ? Boaɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa iibara ara i ɔri iso? Ooɣo! Iiɖe ngbɔ iɖe.
Ala ɔɣere Mose sɔ,
“Ngɔ loanyɔ nnya ne, loanyɔ wũ nnya.
Fiɛ ngɔ ara loaɖo me kayiri ne, ɔ̃ ara aaɖo me kayiri.”
Ne ɔso Ɣaa nnyainyɔ ne, iiɖe ɔturi karabara ɣee ɔ̃ kubɛ iso isɛ iki ɣɛɛ ise i Ɣaa mɔmɔ nnyainyɔ iso.
I Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɣere igara Farao sɔ, “Nnɛgbe ɔso losɛra-ɔ sigara sɔ si loaɖi wũ ɔle lote maturi i fɔ iso fiɛ maale wũ iyere teteree i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu ne.”
Ne ɔso Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ ngɔ ɔto ɔɖɔɛ nnya fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔgbã atsue ana i mma mba atsuele iso.
Mi ɔwɛ̃ to ɔ̃akarɛ me sɔ, “Si ise ngbɔ ne, lɛ ise ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa aakpese ɔtã ɔturi ipɔ? Alasɔ kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔta ɔya i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ iso.”
Fɔ nɖe nna fiɛ aaɖegu Ɣaa ika ngbɔ? Ibui sɛ ikarɛ pɔse gɔ lopɔ ne sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ apɔ me ngbɔ?”
Ne kama ne, pɔse ba ɔri ɔ̃asu sipɔse ɔbara ira biara nɛ ɔɖɔɛ. Ɔ̃awo abui anyɔ ɔpɔ ɔɖi i sise siwɛ̃ saã ame sɔ maasu ibui iwɛ̃ mabara ndu nɛa ire itsɔra ana masu mabara irubui.
Ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa ɔbara ne. Ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖi ɔ̃ sikpã ɔte sɔ maatsue ɔ̃ ɔle. Ɣɛɛ ɔɣara so ɔtã mma mpia i ɔ̃ sikpã kayirinɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃awɔra ma aaɣo.
Ngbɔ ame ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖi ɔ̃ ara sɛɛ wa mpia i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ gu isoɣɔ siare ame ɔte mma ɔ̃anyɔ nnya ne. Fiɛ bo nɖe mma ɔledza ɔsɛ ɔtã sɔ boaba boafiɛ.
Ne ɔso ɔɖi bo iiɖe ma Yudase kere, ɣɛɛ ta mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana ne.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i kanyaɖidze Hosea ɔko ame sɔ,
“Mma loiɖe wũ maturi ne, loakpere ma wũ mare.
Fiɛ mma loiɖe wũ maɖɔɛse ne, loakpere ma sɔ wũ maɖɔɛse.
Ngbegɔ ame loɣɛ sɔ,
Miiɖe wũ mare ne,
mmɔ ame i maturi aakpere ma sɔ Ɣaa gɔ nna karokɔ̃ mabi ne.”
Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔ̃ wũ ɔɣere ma Yudase ku sikpabo teteree sɔ,
“Si ma Yudase ɔsi lɛ ɔpo ame iwarĩ kɔra ne,
ma ndɛ̃ irɛ̃saã kere loana iɖi.
Alasɔ Bosate to ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu atɔ̃me mala ɔro.”
Ito iaba lɛ kumɛgɔ i Yesaya ɔɣɛ ɔwi gɔ lofe sɔ,
“Si Bosate Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate iikuti bo mabi
gu mawa kɛkɛĩ ne,
boto boawɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Sodom gu Gomora Simagɛ̃
ɔwɔ awe!”
Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, be boaɣɛ? Mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ maito makpɛ̃ sɔ maase bɔlɔlɔ ne, maba maakpese maturi ma nse bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ gɔ mafɔ wũ maɖe ɔso.
Ɣɛɛ ma Yudase ma nsiai mmara iso ibara kama teteree sɔ maase bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ ne, maiwo ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.
Be ɔso fiɛ maiwo? Alasɔ maiki i kafɔkaɖe iso sɔ kaabara ma bɔlɔlɔ ɣɛɛ maki i ma kurabarara iso.
Alasɔ matura i Kristo gɔ nse lɛ ita siare nɛ nse i ma ɔri iso lɛ kumɛgɔ ipia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ,
“Minyɔ! Losɛ ita iwɛ̃ i Sion nɛ loatã maturi ɔtura.
Maatura i ne iso marɔ̃.
Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ loafɔ wũ ɔɖe ne,
kunuarɛ iibakpɛ̃ wũ kunya ɖa.”
Wũ manyii, iɖe kuɖɔɛ gɔ lobɔrɛ i wũ ɔtu ame gu wũ kayi ikparama sɔ ma Yudase aana iɖi.
Loawo ma kanya ɔɣɛ sɔ ma anɔ ɔrɛtɛ̃ i Ɣaa kasumu iso gbaã. Ɣɛɛ ma anɔ irɛtɛ isia i ɔri gɔ lokote iso.
Alasɔ maiɣe ɔri gɔ iso i Ɣaa sɛ ɔki ɔbara ɔturi bɔlɔlɔ i ɔ̃ anɔ. Ɣɛɛ ma mɔmɔ masɛ mabie ma ɔri matã so. Alasɔ maito mabie sɔ maabɔ so karɔ̃ matã Ɣaa sɔ ɔ̃ate ma ɔri gɔ iso maaki fiɛ maase bɔlɔlɔ.
Alasɔ Kristo nɖe Mose mmara ɔɖuɖu kawirikɔ̃. Ne ɔso ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ Kristo ɔɖe ne, ɔɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa i Ɣaa anɔ.
Mose ɔtsɛrɛ i ɔturi biara gɔ loase bɔlɔlɔ iki i mmara iso sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ loabara i mmara mɛgbe iso ne, mmara aatã wũ ngbã.”
Ɣɛɛ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ i ngɔ loase bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ iki i kafɔkaɖe iso sɔ, “Daakarɛ so sɔ, ‘Nna loakɛlɛ kato?’ ” Ne karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ, nna loaya ɔkɛlɛ kato ɔ̃akɔ Kristo ɔbɔ?
“Daakarɛ so sɔ, ‘Nna loakɛlɛ karɔ̃ ame?’ ” Ne karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ nna loakɛlɛ makpise aɖe ɔ̃atara Kristo ɔbɔ?
Ɣɛɛ nnɛ ɔte nɖe sɔ, “Ɣaa Itɔ̃me ɔbore imatã- ɔ, ipia i fɔ kanya gu fɔ ɔtu ame.” Fiɛ ne nɖe kafɔkaɖe itɔ̃me nɛ imomo boto bopɛ ne.
Si abusi fɔ kanya aɣɛ sɔ Yesu nɖe Bosate fiɛ afɔ aɖe i fɔ ɔtu ame sɔ Ɣaa ɔtara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã-ɔ ngbã.
Alasɔ fɔ ɔtu ame iɖe aafɔ aɖe fiɛ aase bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ, ɣɛɛ fɔ kanya aasu abusi fɔ kafɔkaɖe ate fiɛ aana iɖi.
Alasɔ ngbɔ matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ wũ ɔɖe ne, kunuarɛ iibakpɛ̃ wũ kunya.”
Nnɛgbe ɔte sɔ ne, ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃. Bosate nɖe bo ɔɖuɖu ɔse fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ masiai wũ isɛɛ.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ ipia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ loakpere Bosate iyere aana iɖi.”
Fiɛ ngɔ maifɔ maɖe ne, nda maabara fiɛ maakarɛ wũ ira? Fiɛ ngɔ iso Itɔ̃me maiɣere ma manya ne, nda maabara maafɔ wũ maɖe? Fiɛ si kuwɛ̃ iipɛ imomo ɔtã ma i ɔwi gɔ lofe ne, nda maanɔ maɣɛ?
Fiɛ si maipia ma katɔ̃me sɔ maɣɛ ne, nda maaɣɛ ne maɣɛ? Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ sɔ, “Mma nsɛgu itɔ̃me sɛɛ ngba to milɛ ɔnyɔ ala ma itɔ̃me ba ɔmɛrɛ̃.”
Ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe ma ɔɖuɖu lofɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe. Alasɔ Yesaya ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Bosate, mabe lofɔ bo itɔ̃me maɖe?”
Ne ɔso ne, kafɔkaɖe sɛ kaya i itɔ̃me nɛ anɔ iso. Fiɛ itɔ̃me inɔ ɔse i Kristo itɔ̃me iɣɛ iso.
Ɣɛɛ ira nɛ lobie sɔ loakarɛ nɖe sɔ, ma Yudase ne, ɔnɔ mainɔ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me? Manɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Manɔ ma kulu i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu,
fiɛ ma Itɔ̃me ɔki ikã kayiiso.”
Lobie sɔ loaledza ikarɛ sɔ mainɔ karɔ̃? Mose mɔmɔ nɖe ngɔ loɖe katɔ̃ ɔtsɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me kanya iɖi fiɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, Ɣaa sɔ,
“Loatã sɔ mi anɔ aarɛtɛ i mma loiɖe ma Yudase iso.
Fiɛ loasu mma anɔ loibusi lopia mi sikpã.”
Fiɛ Yesaya ana ɔwe ɔtu ɔɣere ma sekelee sɔ Ɣaa sɔ,
“Maturi ma loinyɔnyɔ me ne, ma lonya me ne,
Fiɛ loɖi so lote mma loikarɛ wũ iti.”
Ɣɛɛ ma Yudase iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Lowarɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ losɔ̃ ma ikpɛnɛ ɔɖuɖu sɔ si lofɔ ma. Ɣɛɛ maɖi me atsue,
alasɔ maɖe maturi ma mba atsuele
fiɛ mata maɣɛ me iso.”
Lobie sɔ lokarɛ kiniɔ sɔ, Ɣaa ne, ɔsɛ̃ ɔsɛ̃ ɔ̃ maturi? Ooɣo. Alasɔ mme wũ ne, ɔ Yudase gɔ nɖe Abraham ɔwa fiɛ lobɔrɛ i Benyamin ɔɣekparɛ ame loɖe.
Ɣaa iisɛ̃ ɔ̃ maturi ma ɔɣe ɔsɛ koko. Miɣe ara wa matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame ɔwi gɔ i kanyaɖidze Eliya ɔtã Ɣaa iti i ma Yudase iso ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Bosate, maɔɖoe fɔ kanyamaɖidze mabiɛbiɛ fɔ isɔrɛkusege ɔɖuɖu. Wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ pɛ me loɔkuti fiɛ mato mabie sɔ maaɖoe me!” Ne be i Ɣaa ɔɣere Eliya?
Ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Lokɔla maturi kukpi kukɔdzɛ lotã so gɔ maipɛ igɛgɛ̃ matã Baal kuɣɔ.”
Ngbɔ ame ise kiniɔ ne. Maturi kɛkɛĩ to maakuti gɔ Ɣaa aaɖi ma ɔsɛ i kuruɛ ɔtã so iki i ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ ɔso.
Ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ iso ɔki ɔɖi ma gɔ iiɖe ma kurabarara kukuwɛ̃ ɔso. Alasɔ si Ɣaa ɔɖi maturi ala ma kurabarara kanya ne, iyɔ ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ iiɖe igbaãre.
Gbaã ne, ira nɛ iso i ma Yudase ɔriinyɔ sia teteree ne, maina ne. Ɣɛɛ mma i Ɣaa ɔɖi ne, ma lona ne. Fiɛ matsɔra ana ɔwe atsuele.
Ngbɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Ɣaa ɔnyua ma ɔtã sidzimi ɔmini ma situ gu adzuni ɔɖuɖu.
iba iabo nɔme ne,
maito makã atsue fiɛ maito manya fiɛ maatsue.”
Ne ɔso i igara David ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Ɣaa si ɔtã sɔ ma ɔpɔrɔ̃ katukɔ̃ si ikpese ma kagbaraĩ ga loapɛ ma.
Si ma isɛɛ si ikɔ ma ipia i itikpi ame.
Ɔtã sɔ ma anɔ abiɛ sɔ maibanya kuira maɖi ite,
si ɔtã sɔ ma inyɛwe aakpese ma ato masore ɔwi biara ame.”
Lokarɛ ana sɔ ɔwi gɔ i ma Yudase ɔtura fiɛ marɔ̃ ne, marɔ̃ mayu pelepele sɔ maisibaledza ita? Ooɣo! Ɣɛɛ iki i ma iɣɛrɛ ɔso ne, iɖi ɔba itã mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɔ ɔ̃atã anɔ ɔrɛtɛ ma Yudase.

Ma Yudase ikpi ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔtã sɔ kayi ɔɖuɖu ɔna kusɛkusɛ. Si ikpi aatã kusɛkusɛ gɔgbe igbã ɔba kayiiso ne, iyɔ ɔwi gɔ i ma Yudase tsɔra aaba maakpese Ɣaa mare pelepele ne, ɔ̃ kusɛkusɛ to kuabua kusi gbaã!
Mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ne, loto loɣere mi sɔ ayi kumɛgɔ loɖe mi katɔ̃mesɛdze ne, loana isoɣɔ kukaakɔ i wũ karabara iso.
Nto lonyɔ sɔ iaki nnɛgbe iso ne, wũ maturi anɔ arɛtɛ fiɛ ma mawɛ̃ ana ngbã.
Alasɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖi ma atsue ne, Ɣaa ɔfere ma gu kayiiso maturi kanya ndu. Ne ɔso be loaba ku ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa aaledza ma ifɔ? Ito iase lɛ kumɛgɔ i kpise ata ɔwe ngbã.
Alasɔ si boɖoboɖo kasɛi kawɛ̃ ga makpɛti mafɛ̃ ara matã Ɣaa ɔsekele ne, iyɔ boɖoboɖo tsɔra ana ɔsekele. Fiɛ si kudziri siɖu ɔsekele ne, iyɔ kudziri gɔmɔ akpa ana ɔsekele.
Si mabɛse akutu kudziri ikpa iwɛ̃ i kɔ̃ iso fiɛ matu mi lɛ ipo ame kudziri ikpa kosoi manyi mamatãra sɔ si mianɛ akutu kudziri gɔmɔ ndu ne, mitsue sɔ akutu kudziri gɔmɔ siɖu ndu mito minɛ.
Ne ɔso midaakɔlɛ so kato mipia idzirikpa nɛ mabɛse i mmɔ. Alasɔ si mibara ngbɔ ne, mitsue sɔ iiɖe mi lomɔɛ̃ siɖu mito. Ɣɛɛ siɖu siɖe lomɔɛ̃ mi sito.
Miawo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Adzirikpa wamɔ ɔbɛse sɔ si boamatã i ma kanya.”
Ise ngbɔ, ɣɛɛ mitsue sɔ ma idaafɔ iɖe lotã mabɛse. Mina kamatakɔ̃ ala mi kafɔkaɖe ɔso. Ɣɛɛ nnɛmɔ si idaatã sɔ miakɔlɛ so kato ɣɛɛ minigã bowũ.
Alasɔ si Ɣaa iimɔɛ̃ ma Yudase ma nɖe adzirikpa mɔmɔ ɔla fiɛ ɔbɛse ma ne, mibu sɔ ɔto ɔ̃aya ɔnyɔ mi kere?

Nnɛgbe ɔte bo Ɣaa kayiribielea gu kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me ba ɔle. Ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me ba ɔle i maturi ma lorɔ̃ kɔrɛ, fiɛ iɖe kayiribielea itã mi si miya i mi kafɔkaɖe gagbe iso teteree ɔwi ɔɖuɖu. Si miibara ngbɔ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃abɛse mi ɔɖi i kudziri gɔmɔ iso.
Si ma Yudase ana ɔnyua ma idaafɔ iɖe ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ma ana ɔba ɔ̃amatãra i kudziri gɔmɔ iso. Alasɔ Ɣaa ba ɔle sɔ ɔ̃akpesera idzirikpa ɔmatãra i kudziri iso imatã.

Mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ne, mise lɛ ipo ame kudziri gɔ matu maba maamatãra i akutu kudziri iso. Ma Yudase ɣɛɛ ne, mase lɛ akutu kudziri gɔ mapia, ne ɔso ise pɔkɔsɔɔ itã Ɣaa sɔ ɔ̃akpesegu kɔ̃ ikpa ɔmatãra i kɔ̃ iso.

Manyii, ara wɛrɛa wa lowɛrɛ ta makuere ɔwi fiɛ loito lobie sɔ miwe i idaatsue ame pelepele fiɛ miaba miatsɛ so kato ikɔlɛ nto loɣere mi ngbe. Ne nɖe sɔ, ma Yudase mawɛ̃ atsuele gɔ mabara ne, iibase ngbɔ ɔwi biara. Ɣɛɛ atsuele gɔmɔ to ɔ̃atui ku ɔwi gɔ ame i Ɣaa ɔɔsa mma ɔɖuɖu loiɖe ma Yudase kanya fiɛ maɔyi mma ɖoɖooɖo ɔto ɔbie.
Ɔri gɔgbe iso ne, ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu to maana iɖi lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ,
“Ɖidze to ɔ̃abɔrɛ i Sion
fiɛ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃aɖi ɔtile ɔbɔrɛgu i Yakob mawa ame.
Loamɔɛ̃ kanya ga lonyi gu ma lola
ku ɔwi gɔ loaɖi ma lobɔrɛgu i ma akpi ame.”
Ma Yudase ɖe Ɣaa matsirise alasɔ maifɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea maɖe. Ne ɔso ne, mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔna kayakpa. Ɣɛɛ gɔ Ɣaa ɔɖi ma ɔso ne, ɔto ɔɖɔɛ ma gu ma mawa kuerekuere.
Alasɔ si ɔɖi ɔturi ɔrere ɣee ɔbara wũ abualɛra arere ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔfinikira ɔ̃ adzuni i ngɔmɔ iso.
Mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ne, kumɛgɔ miɣɛrɛ Ɣaa ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔnyɔ mi nnya i ma Yudase atsuele ɔso ne,
ngbɔ ame ɔ̃anyɔ ma Yudase ma wũ nnya i ma atsuele ame ne.
Ɣaa ɔpia maturi ɔɖuɖu iyo ala ma atsuele ɔso sɔ si ɔ̃anyɔ ma ɔɖuɖu nnya.
Ɣaa ɔmɔ gbaã fiɛ ara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu ɔbɔrɛ i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Gbaã ne, ɔ̃ inɔgba ame ɔwodoro kukaakɔ.
Kuwɛ̃ iibatsue ɔri gɔ iso i Ɣaa sɛ ɔɣɛ ɔ̃ atɔ̃me ɔkigu karɔ̃.
Fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iibanɔ siri dzɛ iso ɔsɛ ɔbara ɔ̃ ara ɔkigu.
Ngbɔ ame i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Nna nɣe Bosate iti ame ɔwi gɔ lofe?
Fiɛ nna nɣe ɔ̃ adzuni?”
“Nna lotã Ɣaa ira ɔwi gɔ lofe sɔ
Ɣaa to wũ kuso?”
Ara ɔɖuɖu ne, Ɣaa are aɖe. Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ iso aki aba fiɛ ɔ̃ are aɖe.
Mitã bokɔlɛ ɔ̃ iyere ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ ɔɖuɖu.
Si iba ngbɔ.

Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii, kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔbara bo kayiribielea ɔso ne, loto mi i kukpa sɔ misu so mitã Ɣaa lɛ ara wa masu masɔrɛ wũ, wa losekele fiɛ abo wũ anɔ i mi ngbã isɛ ame. Nnɛmɔ nɖe mi siwarã ame karabara ne.

Midaasɛ ngbã sɔ miabara mawɛ̃ ku kayiiso kurabarara. Ɣɛɛ mitã sɔ Ɣaa afinikira mi adzuni ɔɖuɖu si mikpese maturi ɣɛtɛ. Ne loatã sɔ mianya ara wa nsɛ apia Ɣaa isoɣɔ gu nwa miabara fiɛ miabo wũ anɔ fiɛ ayi pɔpɔɔpɔ ne.

Iki i karabara ga ɔtã me i ɔ̃ abualɛra ɔso ne, nto loɣere mi ɔɖuɖu sɔ midaakɔlɛ so kato miɖo kumɛgɔ mise. Ɣɛɛ ne, i mi adzuni ame ne mite sɔ mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã ɔbiara kɛkɛ si miasu so mikoteragu kafɔkaɖe ga miba kanya.
Kumɛgɔ i bo kuturidziri ɖe kuwɛ̃ gɔ mba ngɔi gbodzoo mɛ loisɛ mibara karabara kawɛ̃ saã ne,
ngbɔ ame boɖe maturi gbodzoo i Kristo ame ɣɛɛ bo ɔɖuɖu ɔgɔgɔda so lɛ sosina siwɛ̃ dzɛ mma ngɔi gbodzoo ne.

Ne ɔso ne, mitã bosu Siwarã ame karatã agbãagbã wa i Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ abualɛra ame ɔsu ɔtã bo bobara ala karabara. Si ɔturi karatã nɖe sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛ ne ku kafɔkaɖe ga ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa ɔta wũ.
Si fɔ karatã nɖe maturi kasumu ne, pia kubɛ si asumu. Si ara ite ne, te ku fɔ iso ɔle ɔɖuɖu.
Si katetere ipia maturi ne, pia katetere. Si ara itã maturi ne, bara ne ku kayiri ɣɔa. Si maturi ikɔkɔ ne, su fɔ iwola ɔɖuɖu kɔ ma. Si nnyainyɔ ne, nyɔ nnya ku fɔ ɔtu ɔɖuɖu.
Miɖi mi kuɖɔɛ karabara mite maturi. Misɛ̃ ikpi si mimɔɛ̃ isɛɛ ibara mila.
Miɖɔɛ so ku ɔtu ɣɔa lɛ manyii fɔɖedze awe. Warɛ fɔ ɔlaa ɖo so.
Midaawe ndã ɣɛɛ mitã Siwarã Bielea si siyi mi ame pɔpɔɔpɔ i ɔ̃ karabara iso.
So si siɣɔ mi i mi ɔriinyɔ ame. Miya teteree i inyɛwe biara ame si mikparama kayi ɔwi biara iso.
Miɣɛ mi iso ara mitã Ɣaa maturi ma nna kuira, si miwarɛ nrɔɔ̃ mifɔ mafɔ.
Mma nto makpɛ̃gu mi ne, mitã ma kusɛkusɛ. Mitã ma kusɛkusɛ, midaagbarĩ ma.
Mina isoɣɔ ku mma nto mana isoɣɔ si mibiɛ ku mma nto mabiɛ.
Minɔgu mi manyii ara karɔ̃. Midaakɔlɛ so kato, mibɔ so karɔ̃ misakanya ku mma loire kuira i maturi anɔ. Daanyɔ so sɔ alɛ aɖo matsɔra.
Midaabara ikpi miti kuso. Mibara ara wa loakɔlɛ mi anɔ kato i maturi ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃.
Si iabɔrɛ i mi kɔrɛ ne, miwe i isobuɛ ame ku maturi ɔɖuɖu.
Manyii, midaasu kuwɛ̃ ikpi mitã wũ kuso ɣɛɛ mitã Ɣaa ɔri si ɔɖi ɔ̃ sikpã ɔte i ngɔmɔ iso, alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea me sɔ, “Mme nɖe ngɔ loakarɛ mi iti, mme nɖe ngɔ loati kuso.”
Ɣɛɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, maɣere bo sɔ,
“Si kukã to fɔ tsirise ne, tã wũ araɖea si ɔɖe.
Si ɔme to ɔkore wũ ne, tã wũ ndu ɔnɛ.
Alasɔ si abara ngbɔ ne, ato asia inyɛdu ɔtɔ i ɔ̃ iti iso.”
Midaatã ikpi si iɖe mi iso, ɣɛɛ misu isɛ miɖe ikpi iso.
Ikote sɔ ɔturi biara aasu kuwarɛ ɔtã karɔ̃ iso matɔ̃ɖedze. Alasɔ matɔ̃ɖedze ma mpia kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa mɔmɔ losɛra ma.
Si ɔrere ɔta ɔya ma iso ne, Ɣaa ira nɛ ɔsɛ iso iɖe ɔta ɔya. Fiɛ mma loabara ngbɔ ne, mato mabie atɔ̃me iɣɛgu matã so.
Maturi ma nsɛ mabara isɛɛ ne, maibanigã matɔ̃ɖedze, ɣɛɛ mma nsɛ mabara ara lalaa loanigã. Si mito mibie sɔ miibanigã tɔ̃ɖedze ne, mibara ara wa loatã sɔ ɔ̃ale mi.

Alasɔ Ɣaa rabaradze ɔɖe sɔ ɔ̃abara nnɛ loalɛ itã- ɔ. Ɣɛɛ si abara ikpi ne, iyɔ ikote sɔ aanigã wũ. Alasɔ iiɖe siefe kere iɖe matã wũ ɔle. Ɣaa ɔɖabo ɔɖe. Ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔnyɔ sɔ ɔbiara ɔbara ara i ɔri gɔ lokote iso fiɛ ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ matsuelese kutsue.
Ne ɔso mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã matɔ̃ɖedze. Iiɖe Ɣaa sikpã dzɛ loaba mi iso ɔso ɣɛɛ mi mɔmɔ kaɣere ɔso.
Nnɛgbe ana ɔso fiɛ misɛ mitã lampo mitã matɔ̃ɖedze alasɔ Ɣaa karabara mato mabara ne. Masu ma ɔwi ɔɖuɖu matã maturi ikɔkɔ.
Ne ɔso ne, mitã ɔbiara ɔ̃ kuso gɔ mito wũ. Si kaɖe toto masia ne, mitã, si lampo ɔɖe ana ne, ɔ̃ wũ mitã. Ngɔ lokote ɔtã iwarɛ ne, miwarɛ wũ. Ngɔ ile lokotegu ana ne, ɔ̃ wũ mile wũ.
Si mito ɔrere kuso ne, midaasɛ̃ sɔ miito mitã. Tã kɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu ro. Ɣɛɛ kuso gɔ si mila mi malaa nɖe kuɖɔɛ kuso. Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ mba kuɖɔɛ ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔlaa ne, ite sɔ ɔto ɔkã Ɣaa mmara atsue.

Mmara mɛ matã bo sɔ, “Daabara asɔrɔ̃ra, daaɖoe ɔturi, daayu kayu, fɔ anɔ si adaarɛtɛ i ɔturi kuira iso,” ku mmara mama mɛ lobua i mmɛgbe iso ne, me ɔɖuɖu itera nɛ lobua me iso kere nɖe sɔ, “Ɖɔɛ fɔ ɔlaa lɛ kumɛgɔ ato aɖɔɛ so.”
Kuɖɔɛ iisɛ kubara kɔ̃ ɔlaa ikpi. Ne ɔso kuɖɔɛ nɖe ira nɛ iso matsue mmara ɔɖuɖu masia.
Mirɛgɛ̃! Si misɛ i ɔri gɔgbe iso alasɔ miɣe ɔwi gɔ ame bopia. Ɔwi gɔ ame i Ɣaa aaɖi bo ɔɔbore ɔmatã ɔɖo ɔwi gɔ ame boɖe katɔ̃ bofɔ Kristo boɖe.
Kasɛ̃ ɔɔfe karo, ɔɖesɛrã ɔɔɣo. Ne ɔso minyua idududu ame ara ɔbara, si minyi so akpadza lɛ mma mpia i ikpawaĩ ame.
Mimɔɛ̃ so mila kukaakɔ lɛ mma nsɛ i ikpawaĩ ame. Iiɖe ɔɖegbodzo, itarɛ̃ gu asɔrɔ̃ra gu amumuɣɔ gu iɣɛɣɛ so gu anɔ ikɛkɛ ame.
Ɣɛɛ misu Yesu Kristo mipia lɛ awu si mimɔɛ̃ adzuni miɖi i sosina ɔrakolo gu ara wa nna kusia iso.
Miwarɛ nrɔɔ̃ mifɔ mi malaa ma loire siɖu i kafɔkaɖe ame. Midaawararãgu ma i ara wa i mi gu ma adzuni iibara awɛ̃ iso.
Ɔturi ɔmɔi kafɔkaɖe ɔtã wũ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ira biara. Ɣɛɛ ɔmama gɔ kafɔkaɖe nna ɔle ngbɔ ne, araɖea wa ame maipia sina kere ɔsɛ ɔɖe.
Ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖe ira biara ne, ɔdaanyɔ ɔ̃ ɔnyii gɔ nsɛ ɔrɛrɛ ara ala ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe ɔso sɔ ɔ̃iyi. Ngɔ nsɛ ɔrɛrɛ ara ana si ɔdaanyɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖe ira biara pupurii, alasɔ Ɣaa ɔfɔ wũ ɔ̃ wũ.
Nna lotã-ɔ ɔri sɔ aɣɛgu ɔturi mama ɔɖabo atɔ̃me? Ɔ̃ Ɣaa mɔmɔ loawo nyɔ si ɔɣɛ ɔtã wũ teteree ɣee ɔ̃iɣɛ. Fiɛ ɔɖabo gɔmɔ to ɔ̃aya alasɔ Bosate to ɔ̃awo tã sɔ ɔ̃aya teteree.
Ɔturi ɔmɔi sɛ ɔwarɛ iyi iwɛ̃ sɔ isekele iɖo imama. Ɔmɔi ana sɛ ɔnyɔ sɔ wã ɔɖuɖu ɔkote. Ira nɛ lonya iɖo nɖe sɔ ɔbiara aafɔ ɔɖe kukaakɔ i nnɛ ɔto ɔbara iso.

Ngɔ nsɛ ɔwarɛ iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Bosate ɔto ɔwarɛ ne ɔtã. Ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖe ira biara ana ne, Bosate ɔsɛ ɔwarɛ alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i wã iti. Ngɔ loisɛ ɔɖe ara awɛ̃ ana ne, ɔsɛ̃ ara wagbe si ɔsu ɔwarɛ Bosate. Ɔ̃ wũ ɔsɛ ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba.
Bo kuwɛ̃ iisi ngbã ɔtã so. Fiɛ bo kuwɛ̃ ana iibakpi ɔtã so.
Si bosi ngba ne, bosi botã Bosate. Si bokpi ana ne, bokpi botã Bosate. Ne ɔso ngbã bosi o-o, ɔkpi bokpi o-o ne, Bosate mare boɖe.
Nnɛgbe ana ɔso fiɛ Kristo ɔkpi fiɛ ɔledza ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ame ɔpia ngbã sɔ si ɔ̃akpese Ɔkɔse i makpise gu magbanadze ɔɖuɖu iso ne.
Be ɔso fiɛ ato atã fɔ ɔnyii ipɔ? Ɣee be ɔso fiɛ ato awɔdza fɔ ɔnyii irɔĩ sɔ ɔ̃iyi? Bo ɔɖuɖu to boaya i Ɣaa sigaraiyara katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃aɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me.
Alasɔ matsɛrɛ sɔ,
“Bosate sɔ, ‘Ayi kumɛgɔ losi ngbã ne, nto loɣere mi sɔ, ɔbiara to ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ ɔtã me
Fiɛ ɔbiara to ɔ̃akɔlɛ wũ iyere kato sɔ me nɖe Ɣaa.’ ”
Ne ɔso ne, bo ndɛ̃ ɔbiara to ɔ̃atã ɔ̃ ngbã iso akɔnta i Ɣaa kɔrɛ.
Ne ɔso mitã bonyua so atɔ̃me ɔɣɛgu. Si bonyɔ kumɛgɔ boabara mawɛ̃ sɔ boibaɖe ɔri itɛ̃ra botã kuwɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe sɔ ɔ̃atura ɔbo i ikpi ame.
Gɔ lopia i Bosate Yesu ame ɔso ne, loɣe kukaakɔ i wũ ɔtu ame sɔ araɖea kuawɛ̃ i wã mɔmɔ ame iipukutu. Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere ɔnya sɔ irere ɔpukutu ne, nnɛmɔ loapukutura wũ ne.
Si aɣe sɔ nnɛ ato aɖe to iɖaa fɔ ɔnyii ne, iyɔ iiɖe kuɖɔɛ ato aɖi ate wũ. Daatã sɔ nnɛ ato aɖe aanina fɔ ɔnyii kafɔkaɖe alasɔ Kristo ɔkpi i ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃ iti.
Midaatã sɔ maturi aɖe ika i ira nɛ i mi minyɔ sɔ ilɛ i Ɣaa maturi ndɛ̃ iso.
Alasɔ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame ne, iiɖe ɔɖe gu ɔnɛ ɔɖe. Ɣɛɛ sibɔlɔlɔ gu isobuɛ gu isoɣɔ i Siwarã Bielea ame iɖe.
Alasɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara Kristo karabara i ɔri gɔgbe iso ne, ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔbo Ɣaa gu maturi anɔ fiɛ masɛ wawarɛ wũ ne.
Ne ɔso mitã bonyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ boabara ara wa loabɔ isobuɛ fiɛ aabuai bopia so ɔle.
Midaanina Ɣaa karabara ala araɖea ɔso. Araɖea biara iso ɔkpa, ɣɛɛ ne, iilɛ si nnɛ aaɖe aatã sɔ ɔturi aatura ɔbɔrɛ ɔrɔ̃ ɔbo i ikpi ame.
Si aito aɖe sina ɣee anɛ ndã mɔɛ̃a ɣee abara kuira nɛ loatã sɔ fɔ ɔnyii aarɔ̃ ɔbo i ikpi ame ne, ibua ilɛ.
Ne ɔso ara wa afɔ aɖe i nwagbe iso ne, tã awe i mi gu Ɣaa inyɔ ndɛ̃. So to siaɣɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara wa i ɔ̃ kaɣere iisɛ katã wũ ipɔ.
Ɣɛɛ si ɔturi to ɔɖe ira fiɛ ɔ̃ kaɣere ɔta kaɣɛ i ne iso ne, ɔ̃ɔtã so ipɔ koko alasɔ, ɔ̃ikã ɔ̃ kaɣere atsue i kafɔkaɖe ame. Ira biara nɛ i ɔturi iibara i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, iɖe wũ ikpi.
Bo ma loɔmɔ i kafɔkaɖe ame koko ne, ikote sɔ boana ɔtu botã mma kafɔkaɖe loimɔ fiɛ mana ɔle bobuai ma. Iikote sɔ boabara ara wa loaɣɔ bo ɔnɔwɛ̃ so.
Ikote sɔ bo ndɛ̃ ɔbiara aabara ira nɛ loaɣɔ ɔ̃ ɔlaa so sɔ iatã sɔ ɔ̃are iti i Siwarã ame.
Alasɔ nane Kristo kɔra ne, iiɖe nnɛ loaɣɔ wũ so iɖe ɔbara. Ɣɛɛ matsɛrɛ i ɔ̃ iso sɔ ɔɣere Ɣaa sɔ, “Sitia dzɛ i maturi ɔtia-ɔ ne, sɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu ɔba i wũ iso.”
Ara wa ɔɖuɖu matsɛrɛ masɛ ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, matsɛrɛ masɛ sɔ si iate bo ara sɔ si boya teteree, si ila iɔpia bo ɔle sɔ bo anɔ aasia i nnɛ boto bonyɔ ɔri iso.
Nto lokarɛ Ɣaa sɔ ɔbuai bo sɔ boawo ɔya teteree i inyɛwe biara kanya sɔ boabara nnɛ i Bosate Kristo Yesu sɛ ɔɖɔɛ iso.
Iyɔ mi ɔɖuɖu situ gu kanya aaɖe kawɛ̃ sɔ miasu ile mitã Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo Ɔse.
Ne ɔso miwarɛ nrɔɔ̃ mifɔ mi manyii lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔwarɛ ɔ̃ mire ɔfɔ mi ala ne loatã Ɣaa kuwarɛ ne.
Lobie sɔ loɣere mi sekelee sɔ Kristo ɔba ɔ̃akpese ma Yudase ɔɖabo sɔ si ɔ̃aɖi kaɣɛkasɛ ga i Ɣaa ɔɣere ma Yudase mawa tɛtɛ ɔte sɔ Ɣaa sɛ ɔbara i ɔ̃ nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ iso.
Ɣaa Itɔ̃me nɛgbe aatã sɔ mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana aale Ɣaa i ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ ɔso. Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ,
“Nnɛgbe ɔso loale-ɔ i mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃ ne.
Loasu kafɔkaɖe sinɔ lole fɔ iyere.”
Fiɛ maledza iɣɛ sɔ,
“Mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase, minagu Ɣaa maturi isoɣɔ.”
Maledza iɣɛ ana sɔ,
“Mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu si mile Bosate.
Si mi abuiti ɔɖuɖu maturi si miɖi sinɔ dzɛ loale wũ.”
Yesaya ana ɔledza itsɛrɛ sɔ,
“Yese ɔdziriɖu to ɔ̃atata.
Fiɛ ɔ̃ loaɖe ngɔ loata ɔya ɔɖe sigara i abuiti ɔɖuɖu maturi iso ne.
Mma loiɖe ma Yudase to maawe ɔriinyɔ i ɔ̃ ame.”
Lokarɛ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe bo ɔriinyɔ sɔ ɔtã sɔ so aaɣɔ mi ta kame ame ɔɖuɖu si ɔtã mi isobuɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ misu so mitã wũ kanya sɔ, Siwarã Bielea ɔle si sitã sɔ miawe i ɔriinyɔ ame ɔwi biara.
Manyii, mme mɔmɔ lofɔ loɖe sɔ miyi ku ara sɛɛ ibara pɔpɔɔpɔ. Miɣe ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ne ɔso mite so.
I ɔko gɔgbe ame ne, loɣara so lotsɛrɛ ara wagbe sɔ si lonyigira mi ara wa iki i Ɣaa abualɛra ame lobara.

Alasɔ ɔbara me sɔ lokpese Kristo rabaradze lotã mma loiɖe ma Yudase. Lobara kasumu karabara ga nɖe Ɣaa Itɔ̃me iɣɛ itã mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɔ loakɔ ma loba loakpesera Ɣaa ara fɛ̃a wa i Siwarã Bielea ɔbara sekelee i Ɣaa anɔ.
Loawo ndamu ɔɖe i ara wa i Yesu Kristo ɔbara ɔkigu i wũ karabara ga loto lobara lotã Ɣaa ɔso.
Loibaɖe ndamu i kuira mama kuiwɛ̃ iso iɖo nnɛ i Kristo ɔbara ɔkigu i wũ iso. Ɔtã sɔ lokɔ mma loiɖe ma Yudase lobɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ sɔ si maaɖe Ɣaa mare iki ara wa loɣere ma fiɛ lobara ana ɔso.
Nnɛgbe ɔba i ne ame iki i awawãra wa manya gu Ɣaa ɔle karabara ga ɔtã lobara ɔso. Ne ɔso ita i Yerusalem isɛ iabɔrɛ i Iliriko ndɛ̃ mmɔ ɔɖuɖu ne, loɣɛ Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe.
Ta kokooko ne, anɔ ɔrɛtɛ me sɔ loaɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me i ngbegɔ maiɣe Kristo. Alasɔ loibie sɔ loatsue ibere losia i kuwɛ̃ kabereku ga ɔpia i karɔ̃ ame ɔsɛ iso.
Ɣɛɛ ira nɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ,
“Mma maiɣere ɔ̃ iso Itɔ̃me ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ne,
mato maatsue wũ.
Fiɛ mma loinɔ kuira ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ne,
ma loanɔ karɔ̃ ne.”
Karabara gagbe lotɛ̃ra me ɔri ɔso fiɛ loiwo mi kɔrɛ ɔba ne.
Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ gɔ loɔro karabara ga i ibuiti nɛgbe ame fiɛ akɔ gbodzoo nɖe nwagbe gɔ loto lobie sɔ loaba loanya mi ɔso ne,
lobara adzuni sɔ loaki i mi kɔrɛ si loto lofe Spania. Lobie sɔ loaki i mi kɔrɛ lowarã kɛkɛĩ bopia so ɔle fiɛ ka miaɖi me ɔri.
Ɣɛɛ tɔtɔ ne, losɛ Yerusalem losu karatã lokɛlɛgu Ɣaa maturi i mmɔ.
Alasɔ mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Makedonia gu Akaia ne, imɔɛ̃ ma ɔtu sɔ maato sikã matã mafɔɖedze wɛrɛba ma mpia i Yerusalem.
Iba ma ɔmɛrɛ̃ sɔ maabara ngbɔ. Fiɛ mato ma kuso gbaã! Alasɔ si mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔna kaɖekɔ̃ i ma Yudase siwarã ame ara sɛɛ ame ne, mitsue sɔ ma wũ ne, ikote sɔ maabuai ma Yudase ku ma karana.
Ne ɔso si losu ara wa mato ngbe lokɛlɛgu ma lokpese ne, loto loaki i mi kɔrɛ lokɛlɛ Spania.
Loɣe sɔ si loto loba mi kɔrɛ ne, loto loasɛgu Kristo kusɛkusɛ ɔɖuɖu lobɔ mi.
Manyii, loto mi i kukpa i Bosate Yesu Kristo iyere ame gu Siwarã Bielea kuɖɔɛ ame sɔ mibuai me i kakpã ga kanya loɣɛ sɔ loana ɔle iki i mi kayi ikparama ame.
Mikarɛ Ɣaa mitã me sɔ ɔ̃aɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i ma Yudase ma losɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ wũ karabara i Yerusalem aabo Ɣaa maturi anɔ.
Fiɛ si Ɣaa ɔbie ne, loaba loabo i mi ndɛ̃ ku isoɣɔ fiɛ loawarã i mmɔ.
Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtã isobuɛ si ɔwegu mi ɔɖuɖu. Si iba ngbɔ.
Loɖi bo ɔnyiiko Foibe lote mi. Ɔɖe buaidze i Kenkrea mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃.
Loto mi i kukpa sɔ miwarɛ nrɔɔ̃ mifɔ wũ i Bosate iyere ame i ɔri gɔ lokote Ɣaa maturi iso. Mitã wũ ibuai biara nɛ ɔ̃abie ɔbɔrɛgu i mi kɔrɛ alasɔ ɔbuai maturi gbodzoo gu me ana.
Loya Priska gu Akwila ma nɖe wũ marabaradze laa i Kristo Yesu ame.
Mayagu me teteree sɔ maakpi i wũ iti kɔra. Iiɖe wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ me nto lopɛ ma siba ɣɛɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu.
Loya mafɔɖedze ma nsɛ masarɛ i ma iyo mmɔ ana. Miya wũ ɔlaa Epaineto gɔ loɖe katɔ̃ ɔfiniki ɔfɔ Kristo i Asia karɔ̃ iso.
Loya Maria gɔ lobara karabara teteree i mi ndɛ̃.
Loya Androniko gu Yunia ma nɖe wũ aɖe maturi ma bo gu ma inyɔ lowe i iyo. Maturi ma lofɔ iyere maɖe i katɔ̃memasɛdze ndɛ̃. Maɖe me katɔ̃ i Kristo ifɔ ame.
Loya Amplia gɔ nɖe wũ ɖɔɛse i Bosate iyere ame.
Loya Urbana gɔ nɖe bo rabaradze laa i Kristo ame. Loya wũ ɔlaa Staki.
Loya Apele gɔ makere manyɔ fiɛ ɔya i Kristo ame. Loya Aristobulo iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu.
Loya Herodian, wũ aɖe ɔturi. Loya Narkiso iyo maturi ma losu so matã Bosate.
Ya Trifaina gu Trifosa, marɔ̃go rabaradze i Bosate ame. Loya wũ ɔlaa ɖɔɛse Persi gɔ nɖe ɔrɔ̃go mama gɔ nto ɔbara karabara teteree i Bosate ame.
Loya Rufo gɔ lofɔ iyere i Bosate ame gu ɔ̃ ɔnyi gɔ lomɔɛ̃ me lɛ ɔ̃ ɔbi awe.
Loya Asinkrito gu Flegon gu Herme gu Patroba gu Herma gu ma manyii fɔɖedze ma mpiagu ma.
Loya Fologo gu Yulia gu Nerea gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiiko gu Olimpa gu Ɣaa maturi ma mpiagu ma.
Miya so ku kɔrɔ̃ ipia i kuɖɔɛ gu isekele ame. Kristo mafɔɖedze akuri wa ɔɖuɖu mpia i Kreta sɔ maya mi o-o.
Manyii, lobie sɔ loka mi kukaakɔ sɔ minyɔ so i mma loasu iɣɛɣɛso mapia i maturi ndɛ̃ iso. Masu ara wa lota aɣɛ i nwa bote mi iso mato matɛ̃ mi ɔri. Mibɛse so i ma iso.
Alasɔ mmamɔ igbã ne, iiɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo karabara mato mabara. Ɣɛɛ ma mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ mato mabara. Maba ɔnyamɛrɛ̃ gu kasɔla ga maasu makpɔkpɔtɔra mma loiɣe kuira adzuni.
Ɔturi biara ɔnɔ kumɛgɔ mikã Itɔ̃me Bielea atsue, ne ɔso so ɔɣɔ me gbaã i mi iso. Ɣɛɛ nnɛ loto lobie lotã mi nɖe sɔ mi anɔ aabusi i isɛɛ ibara iso, ɣɛɛ ikpi iso ne, miaɖe mma loiɣe kuira.
Ɣaa gɔ nɖe isobuɛ tãse si ɔkɔtɛ Tsirise ɖɛkpɛrɛɛ si ɔtã sɔ miaɖe wũ iso i ɔwi kurukutu ame. Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu mi.
Timoteo gɔ nɖe wũ rabaradze laa ɔya mi. Ngbɔ ame ana i Lukio gu Yason gu Sosipatro ma nɖe wũ maturi ɔya mi ne.
Mme Tertio gɔ lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã Paulo ana loya mi i Bosate iyere ame.
Gaio gɔ lofɔ bo kukaakɔ ngbe gu mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ma nsɛ masarɛ i ɔ̃ iyo ɔya mi.
Erasto gɔ nɖe ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe sikãladze gu bo ɔnyii Kwarto sɔ maya mi.
Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu mi ɔɖuɖu. Si iba ngbɔ.

Kiniɔ ne, mitã bole Ɣaa. Ɔto ɔ̃awo mi ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔla teteree iki i Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ lobɔrɛ i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso. Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe ɔse i ara wɛrɛa wa i Ɣaa to ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i ngbegɔ awe akɔ gbodzoo wa lofe ame.

Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, maɔɖi wã mabɔ ɔgbami itã maturi ɔɖuɖu karɔ̃ inɔ, ara wa i kanyamaɖidze ɔtsɛrɛ masɛ. Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã ɔwi ɖaa kuɖɔɛ kuɖe sɔ maaɣɛ Itɔ̃me nɛgbe i abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame fiɛ maafɔ maɖe mabara i ne iso.
Ɣaa gɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ inɔgba loyi ne, ikote sɔ boale wũ ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ ɔwi ɔɖuɖu i Kristo Yesu iyere ame. Si iba ngbɔ.
I Corinthians: Mme Paulo gɔ iki i Ɣaa mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ ame loɖe Yesu Kristo Katɔ̃mesɛdze gu bo ɔnyiibi Sostene lotsɛrɛ mi ɔko gɔgbe.

Boto botsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe botã Korinto mafɔɖedze ma iki i Yesu Kristo iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi ma ɔsɛ ɔtã so. Ɔkpere ma sɔ maaɖe ɔ̃ maturi Sekelea lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔkpere mma ɔɖuɖu ana nsɛ makpere Bosate Yesu Kristo. Ɔ̃ nɖe bo gu ma ɔɖuɖu Ɔkɔse ne.
Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
Nsɛ lopɛ Ɣaa siba ɔwi biara i mi iti ala nnyainyɔ nɛ ɔtã mi iki i Yesu Kristo iso.
Gɔ mibara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo ɔso ne, miɔsɛ katɔ̃ i ira biara ame, ta ikaɖe ɔɖuɖu gu inɔgba ɔɖuɖu ame.
Kristo iso itɔ̃me ana ɔɔre siɖu i mi ame kukaakɔ.
Ne ɔso ne, siwarã ame karatã kukawɛ̃ iibo mi kusa gɔ misi misia Ɣaa sɔ ɔ̃atã Bosate Yesu Kristo ɔledza iba.
Ɔto ɔ̃adzuɛ̃ mi gɔ mimɔɛ̃ mi kafɔkaɖe mito sekelee isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃. Ɔto ɔ̃atã sɔ ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu Kristo aaba ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso atɔ̃me ne, ɔ̃atã mi ibɛ.
Ɣaa gɔ lokpere mi sɔ mibara mawɛ̃ gu ɔ̃ Ɔbi Bosate Yesu Kristo ne, ɔɖe ngɔ iso miawo iti ɔsia.

I ɔle gɔ i Bokɔse Yesu Kristo ɔtã me kanya ne, loto mi i kukpa teteree sɔ lɛ manyii awe ne, minɔgu so ara karɔ̃ sɔ iɣɛɣɛso kuiwɛ̃ iibawe i mi ndɛ̃. Minyɔ sɔ mi kanya aaɖe kawɛ̃ i ara wa misɛ mibu gu nwa misɛ misia ita iso.
Wũ manyii, bo manyii ma lobɔrɛ i Kloe iyo ame ɔɣere me sɔ kakpadzɛ̃ pia i mi ndɛ̃.
Nnɛ loto loɣɛ nɖe sɔ, mi ndɛ̃ ɔbiara to ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mme ne, Paulo kama losiai.” Ɔmama ana sɔ, “Mme, Apolo kama losiai.” Ɔmama ana sɔ, “Mme, Petro kama losiai.” Fiɛ mamama ana sɔ, “Mme, Kristo losiai.”
Lokarɛ mi ne, Kristo ne, ɔɣɛ maɣɛɣɛ wũ? Ɛɛbɛrɛ Paulo ɔɖe lokpi i kudziri iso i mi iti? Mapie mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ Ɣaa ndu i Paulo iyere ame? Ooɣo!
Lopɛ Ɣaa siba sɔ loibara Ɣaa itupie kubarara lotã mi kuwɛ̃ iɖo Krispo gu Gaio ɔnɔwɛ̃.
Ne ɔso kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔɣɛ sɔ wũ iyere ame ɔfɔ Ɣaa itupie.
Loɔnyigi sɔ Stefana gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ana ne, lotã ma Ɣaa itupie. Ne kama ne, loisito lonyigi kuwɛ̃ gɔ lobara ana.

Kristo iipia me sɔ loba loabara maturi Ɣaa itupie kubarara. Ɣɛɛ ɔpia me sɔ losɛ loaɣere kayiiso maturi Itɔ̃me Bielea. Loisɛ loɣɛ ne ku kayiiso inɔgba, alasɔ loito lobie sɔ ɔle gɔ mpia i Kristo kukpi gɔ ɔkpi i kudziri iso aayu kɔ̃ ɔle kukpese kukpi gɔ nna kusia.
Mma nsɛgbai lote sɔ maɔkpi i Siwarã ame ne, Kristo kukpi i kudziri iso itɔ̃me ɖe idzimira itã ma. Ɣɛɛ bo ma lona iɖi i Ɣaa ame ne, itɔ̃me nɛmɔ ɖe ɔle itã bo.
I Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Loanina manɔgbadze inɔgba.
Fiɛ loatã sɔ makotsuese inɔgba aakpese siefe.”
Iyɔ lɛ i kayi gagbe manɔgbadze pia? Lɛ i makotsuese pia? Fiɛ mma nsɛ makpadzɛ̃ atɔ̃me ne, lɛ mapia ma wũ? Ɣaa ɔɔte sɔ kayiiso gagbe inɔgba ne, sidzimi siɖe.

Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ iwola nɛgbe iso ɔbara maturi ngbɔ sɔ maibaki i kayiiso inɔgba iso matsue wũ. Ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ boto boɣɛ fiɛ ire sidzimi itɔ̃me i mawɛ̃ kɔrɛ i ngbe ne, ne iso i Ɣaa ɔki ɔtã mma lofɔ maɖe ngbã ne.
Ma Yudase to mabie iwawãra sɔ manya fiɛ ma Helase ana to mabie kayiiso inɔgba sɔ matsue.
Ɣɛɛ bo ne, Kristo gɔ mapɛ mamatãra i kudziri iso itɔ̃me boto boɣɛ. Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔta iya ma Yudase iso fiɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana ne, ire ma sidzimi itɔ̃me.
Ɣɛɛ ne, mma i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔtã so i ma Yudase gu ma Helase ndɛ̃ ne, Kristo iso itɔ̃me nɛ boto boɣɛ ɖe Ɣaa ɔle gu iwola itã ma.
Alasɔ nnɛ i maturi sɛ manyɔ sɔ iɖe Ɣaa sidzimi ne, iɖo ma inɔgba, fiɛ nnɛ nɖe Ɣaa ɔle idaawe ne, iba ɔle iɖo maturi ɔle.
Manyii, si Ɣaa aaɖi mi ne, minyigi kumɛgɔ mise i maturi anɔ. Mi gbodzoo iiɖe mma mba ɔle ɣee manɔgbadze fiɛ miibɔrɛ i siɣekparɛ dzɛ masɛ mawarɛ ame ana.
Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi mma loire kuira i kayiiso maturi anɔ sɔ si ɔ̃asu ɔpia kayi gagbe manɔgbadze kunuarɛ. Ɔɖi mma nna ɔle i kayiiso ara inyɔ kanya sɔ si ɔsu ɔpia kayi gagbe maturi ma mba ɔle kunuarɛ.
Ɣaa ɔɖi mma loire kuira i maturi anɔ i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso, fiɛ mana kuwarɛ kukuwɛ̃ sɔ si ɔsu ɔsopara mma nsɛ mabu so sɔ maba kuwarɛ.
Nnɛgbe loate sɔ ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iibawo so kato ɔkɔlɛ i Ɣaa katɔ̃ ne.
Ɣaa ɔtã sɔ miɔbara mawɛ̃ ku Yesu Kristo. Ɔ̃ nɖe bo iwola nɛ i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã bo. Iki i ɔ̃ iso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔnyɔ bo sɔ bose bɔlɔlɔ. Boɔkpese Ɣaa maturi sekelea fiɛ ɔ̃ɔtã bo akpi iti kuso.
Ne ɔso i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ngɔ loaɖe ndamu ne, ɔɖe ndamu i nnɛ i Bosate ɔbara iso ne.”
Manyii, ɔwi gɔ loba loaɣere mi Ɣaa itɔ̃me wɛrɛa ne, iiɖe ɔnyamɛrɛ̃ gu kayiiso inɔgba ame loba loaɣere mi.
Ɔwi gɔ lowe i mi kɔrɛ ne, loiɖe mi ika i kuira iso iɖo Yesu Kristo iso gu ɔ̃ kukpi i kudziri iso.
Ɔturi gɔ nna ɔle gu ngɔ nsɛ ɔnigã ɔti ɔkpakpa loɖe ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame.
Minya i wũ ara ite ame ɔɖuɖu sɔ loiɖe ɔturi gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me siare loɖe. Ɣɛɛ wũ itɔ̃me ɔte sɔ Ɣaa Siwarã ɔle pia gbaã.
Ne ɔso loibabie sɔ mi kafɔkaɖe si kasia i maturi inɔgba iso ɣɛɛ ne, kasia i Ɣaa ɔle iso.
Ɣɛɛ mma loɔmɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã ame ne, losɛ loɣere ma Ɣaa itɔ̃me i inɔgba kɔlɛa ame, iiɖe kayi gagbe inɔgba gu atakere ma ɔle maɔfɔ ma iso itɔ̃me nto loɣɛ.
Iwola nɛ loto loɣɛ ala ngbe ne, Ɣaa ɔfu ne ara, ɔkɔla ne i ɔ̃ ame. Ɣɛɛ ɔsia ne ita kokooko ta kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ sɔ ne iso ɔ̃aki fiɛ ɔ̃aɖi bo.
Kayi gagbe atakere kuwɛ̃ iiɣe iwola nɛgbe. Alasɔ si maɣe ne ne, tee maibapɛ Bosate mamatãra i kudziri iso.
Ɣɛɛ matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ,
“Ara wa i kuwɛ̃ iinya,
ɣee kutsue iinɔ
gu nnɛ i kuwɛ̃ iibu ɔnya ne, ne i Ɣaa
ɔledza ɔsɛ ɔtã mma nsɛ maɖɔɛ wũ ne.”
Ɣɛɛ bo ɔso i Ɣaa ɔɖi awɛrɛra wagbe ɔbɔ i ɔgbami iki i ɔ̃ Siwarã iso.
Ɣaa Siwarã sɛ sinyɔnyɔ ira biara sitsue fiɛ siɣe ta Ɣaa ara wɛrɛa.
Kumɛgɔ i ɔturi siwarã dzɛ mpia i ɔ̃ ame ɣe ira biara i ɔ̃ iso ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa Siwarã ɣe ira biara i Ɣaa iso ne.
Bo ne, iiɖe siwarã dzɛ nto siɖe kayi gagbe iso mpia i bo ame. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa Siwarã dzɛ nsɛ sitã bonɔ bo karatã ga i Ɣaa ɔtã bo karɔ̃ mpia i bo ame.
Ne ɔso ne, iiɖe kayi gagbe iwola nɛ bosuã bobɔrɛgu i maturi kɔrɛ ara boto bote mi. Ɣɛɛ bosɛ boɖi Siwarã ame ara karɔ̃ bote mi ma ame i Siwarã pia.
Ɔbiara gɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã iito siɖe iso ne, ɔ̃ibawo Ɣaa Siwarã karatã gagbe ɔfɔ. Ɔ̃ibanɔ kã karɔ̃ ana alasɔ kare adzimira i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Ngɔ ame i Ɣaa Siwarã pia to ɔ̃anɔ ara wagbe karɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ana wã kusia.
Ngɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɖe iso ne, ɔsɛ ɔnya isɛɛ gu ilalaa ɔɖi ite. Ɣɛɛ maturi iisɛ manya wũ maɖi ite.
Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Nna nɣe Bosate iti ame?
Fiɛ nna loate wũ ara?”
Ɣɛɛ bo ne, Kristo adzuni mpia i bo ame.
Manyii, i ɔnukuare ame ne, loiwo mi ika ɔɖe lɛ mma i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɖe iso. Ɣɛɛ loɖe mi ika lɛ kayiiso maturi awe. Loɖe mi ika lɛ mabiɛtɛ i Kristo kafɔkaɖe ame.
Wũ ara wa lote mi ne, ase ɖɔbɔrɔɔ lɛ inyɛdu mɛ i ɔbiɛtɛ sɛ ɔmeme, iiɖe makpakpa aɖera. Alasɔ ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, miimɔ mitã makpakpa aɖera fiɛ ipɛ i kiniɔ ana ne, miito miwo makpakpa aɖera ɔɖe.
Misi ngbã lɛ mma adzuni ɔɖuɖu nsia i kayi gagbe ara iso. Si mito mikpɛ̃gu so sirerɛ fiɛ mito milɔgu so ne, ne kerekere ɔɔte sɔ sosina ara kere misi mitã, fiɛ mikotegu kayi gagbe maturi.
Si mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ sɔ, “Mme, Paulo kama losiai.” Ɔmama ana sɔ, “Mme, Apolo kama losiai” ne, iyɔ mito mibara ara lɛ mma i kayiiso adzuni kere nto aɖe ma iso.
Fiɛ nwagbe ɔɖuɖu kama ne, nna nɖe Apolo fiɛ nna nɖe Paulo? Ɣaa marabaradze kere boɖe. Bo iso kere miki mifɔ miɖe fiɛ bo ndɛ̃ ɔbiara to ɔbara nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔtã wũ sɔ ɔbara.
Mme losɛ karabara karɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ mapɛ ɔraɖui fiɛ Apolo ka ɔfere ɔraɖui ndu. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɖe lotã sɔ ɔraɖui ɔre iti.
Ne ɔso ne, iiɖe ngɔ lopɛ ɔraɖui, ɣee ngɔ lofere ndu lonya, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔ lotã sɔ ɔre iti lonya ɔɖo.
Ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i ngɔ lopɛ ɔraɖui gu ngɔ lofere wũ ndu ame. Ɣaa loatã ma ɔɖuɖu kuso i ma karabara kanya.
Malaa boɖe i Ɣaa karabara ame fiɛ mi nɖe Ɣaa kakpɛkɔ̃. Ɣaa iyo ana miɖe.
Ɣaa ɔle gɔ ɔtã me kanya ne, nto lobara karabara lɛ yotsuese sɛɛ awe. Lopia iyo i karɔ̃ ame gu ata. Ɔmama ɔ̃ wũ ɔba ɔ̃atsue ɔsia iso. Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara si ɔnyɔ kukaakɔ kumɛgɔ ɔ̃atsue ɔsia iso.
Alasɔ Yesu Kristo nɖe lɛ ita nɛ mapia ala iyo i karɔ̃ ame fiɛ ɔturi biara aatsue ɔsia iso. Kuwɛ̃ iisibawo ita mama ɔpia i karɔ̃ ame.
Si ɔrere ɔsu sikãrɛtɛa ɣee sifudza ɣee ata wa lofɔ kuɣa ɣee sidziri ɣee katĩ ɔtsue iyo nɛmɔ ne,
ɔbiara karabara ga ɔbara to kaabɔrɛ kayi. Kristo iyi siare nɛmɔ loaɖi ɔbiara karabara ite. Iyi nɛmɔ ne, ɔtɔ loaɖi ɔbiara karabara ɔte. Ɔtɔ maasu makere ɔbiara karabara manyɔ si kasɛɛ kaɖe.
Si sɔ nnɛ i ɔturi ɔsu ɔtsue iyo ɔwo ɔtɔ gɔgbe ame ɔki ɔbɔrɛ fiɛ iitsue ne, ɔ̃afɔ kuso gɔ lokote.
Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere ara wa ɔtsue ala iyo ɔtsue i ɔtɔ ame ne, ɔ̃ibana kuso kukuwɛ̃ ɔfɔ. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ to ɔ̃ana iɖi lɛ ngɔ lotere ɔbɔrɛ i ɔtɔ ame.
Mitsue sɔ mi mɔmɔ nɖe Ɣaa isɔrɛyo fiɛ Ɣaa Siwarã pia i mi ame.
Ɣaa isɔrɛyo se sekelee fiɛ mi nɖe isɔrɛyo nɛmɔ. Si ɔrere ɔnina ne ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃awɔra ɔnyiiɔ gɔmɔ ɔ̃ wũ.
Mi ndɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaasɔsɔla so. Si mi ɔrere ɔbu so sɔ ɔɖe kayi gagbe iso nɔgbadze ne, ɔbara so lɛ dzimifɔ i maturi anɔ si ɔ̃akpese nɔgbadze bielea i Ɣaa anɔ.
Alasɔ ara wa i kayiiso maturi sɛ manyɔ sɔ aɖe iwola ne, wã nɖe adzimira i Ɣaa anɔ ne. Matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Manɔgbadze inɔgba i Ɣaa sɛ ɔsu ɔmɔɛ̃ ma i iyebi ame.”
Maledza itsɛrɛ ana sɔ, “Ɣaa ɣe sɔ manɔgbadze adzuni ne, siefe kere aɖe.”
Ne ɔso kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaakɔlɛ so kato i ara wa i maturi aawo ɔbara iso. Alasɔ ira biara se itã mi isɛɛ.
Paulo ɣee Apolo ɣee Petro ɣee kayi gagbe ɣee kukpi gu ngbã, kiniɔ ɣee ɔwi gɔ nto ɔba i katɔ̃ ne, wã ɔɖuɖu ɖe mi are.
Kristo mare miɖe, fiɛ Kristo ɔ̃ wũ Ɣaa ɔre ɔɖe.
Mila miɔnyɔ bo lɛ Kristo marabaradze ma nto manyɔ Ɣaa atɔ̃me wɛrɛa iso.
Nnɛ i ɔkɔse sɛ ɔbie ɔbɔrɛgu i marabaradze magbe igbã kɔrɛ nɖe sɔ maabara ma karabara i ɔnukuare ame.
Kiniɔ ne, iito iɖa me si mi ɣee ɔrere aaɣɛgu me atɔ̃me. Mme mɔmɔ kɔra loisɛ loɣɛgu so atɔ̃me.
Wũ kaɣere iisɛ katã me ipɔ i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso. Ɣɛɛ iiɖe ne nto ite sɔ loisɛ lobara ikpi alasɔ Bokɔse loaɣɛgu me atɔ̃me.

Ne ɔso ne, kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaaɣɛgu ɔ̃ ɔlaa atɔ̃me fiɛ ɔwi aaɣo. Ɔwi gɔ i Bosate ɔɔba ne, ɔ̃ loaɣɛgu ɔbiara atɔ̃me ku iyi tsɔra ne. Ɔ̃ nto ɔ̃aba ɔ̃aɖi awɛrɛra ɔɖuɖu ɔbɔ ɔgbami fiɛ ɔ̃aɖi ta nwa mpia i maturi adzuni ame ɔte. Mmɔ i Ɣaa aale ɔbiara gɔ lokote ɔtã ile ne.
Manyii, si mianɔ ara karɔ̃ ɔso fiɛ losu mme gu Apolo lotã mi ikparĩ. Misuã nnɛ itɔ̃me nɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ ngbe to ite sɔ, “Mibara ara i ɔri iso.” Ne ɔso midaanyɔ kuwɛ̃ sɔ ɔkɔlɛ ɔɖo ɔ̃ ɔlaa.
Nna lobara-ɔ fiɛ afɔ kuɣa aɖo fɔ ɔlaa? Ara wa ɔɖuɖu aba ne, Ɣaa losu ɔtã-ɔ. Si ngbɔ iɖe ne, be ɔso fiɛ ato akɔlɛ so kato lɛ iiɖe Ɣaa lotã-ɔ.
Ka miba ira biara nɛ mito mibie? Miɔkpese maranase miro? Miɔkpese magara ku ɔwi gɔ ame bo boikpese magara? Aĩ, wũ kayiri tee magara ka miɖe fiɛ bo wũ boaɖegu mi sigara.
Ibara me lɛ bo katɔ̃memasɛdze ne, kasɛkɔ̃ tsɔra i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã bo. Bo nɖe mma matã ipɔ gu ira nɛ i maturi aanyɔ botã kayiiso ɔɖuɖu fiɛ maaɖoe bo i kaɖe ɔɖuɖu gu Ɣaa makpabo anɔ.
Kristo ɔso ne, boɖe madzimifɔ. Ɣɛɛ mi ne, miɖe manɔgbadze. Boɔkpese maturi ɣɔa ma nna ɔle, ɣɛɛ mi ne, miba ɔle. Boire kuira i maturi anɔ, ɣɛɛ mi ne, masɛ mawarɛ mi.
Ta kiniɔ ne, kukã gu ɔme to ɔkore bo, bopia aradzɛ, maturi to mapɛ bo fiɛ bona kawekɔ̃ kukawɛ̃.
Bosu bo mɔmɔ arɔĩ boto bobara karabara bonyɔ so iso. Si magbarĩ bo ne, boɔtã kusɛkusɛ. Si mato mati bo kama i amumuɣɔ ɔri iso ne, bosɛ bopia so katetere.
Si maturi ɔtia bo ne, atɔ̃me wa loaɣɔra situ bosɛ boɣere ma. Boɔkpese kayiiso aku kawirikɔ̃ gu ara wa loisilɛ ipɛ i kiniɔ.
Iiɖe kunuarɛ nto lopia mi i ara wa nto lotsɛrɛ mi ngbe iso, ɣɛɛ ɔka loto mi lɛ wũ mabi ɖɔɛse awe.
Si miba nane maturi gbodzoo lɛ mi maratedze i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, ɔse ɔwɛ̃ saã kere ɔɖe mi. Alasɔ i mi ngbã mɛ ame miɖe mawɛ̃ ku Kristo ne, loɔkpese mi ɔse ala mme losu Itɔ̃me Bielea lobɔ mi.
Ne ɔso loto mi i kukpa sɔ misuã wũ nsɛgbai.
Nnɛgbe ɔso nto loapia Timoteo gɔ nɖe wũ ɔbi ɖɔɛse fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara Bosate Karabara i ɔnukuare ame ne. Ɔto ɔ̃anyigira mi Kristo ame ngbã mɛ losi fiɛ me nsɛ lote mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu i kakɔi biara ne.
Mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ to makɔlɛ so kato alasɔ mabu sɔ loibaba mi kɔrɛ mmɔ lonya.
Si Bokɔse ɔbie ne, nto loaba loanya mi i ɔwi kurukutu ame. Nto loabie sɔ loanya ɔle gɔ mmamɔ ba gu atɔ̃me wa mato maɣɛ.
Alasɔ Ɣaa sigara iɖe na i akaɖe kunu ame, ɣɛɛ ipia i ɔle ame.
Be mito mibie? Loba mi kɔrɛ ku kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ɛɛbɛrɛ loba ku kuɖɔɛ gu isobuɛ ame?
Maturi to maɣɛ sɔ mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ to mabara asɔrɔ̃ra wa lofe inyanyarĩ sɔ nane mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze iibabara wã igbã. Maɣere me sɔ ɔwɛ̃ pia i mi ndɛ̃ gɔ ɔto ɔrɛgu ɔ̃ ɔse ɔre.
Be iti mito mite so? Ikote sɔ miabiɛ. Fiɛ ngɔ lobara ira nɛgbe igbã ne, ipia sɔ miaɖi wũ mibɔrɛgu i mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃.
Atoa sɔ lodzorogu mi fiɛ boito bonya so anɔ ne, lopia i mi kɔrɛ i siwarã ame. Gɔ lopia i mi ndɛ̃ ɔso ne, loɔtã ngɔ lobara ikpi nɛgbe igbã ipɔ i
Bosate Yesu Kristo ɔle ame. Si misakanya ne, mitsue sɔ lopia i mi ndɛ̃ i Siwarã ame fiɛ Bosate ɔle ana pia i mi ndɛ̃.
Ikote sɔ miaɖi ngɔgbe mitã Ɔbosam ɔwɔra ɔ̃ sosina ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ siwarã aana iɖi ku iyi nɛ i Bosate Yesu aaba ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso atɔ̃me.
Iikote sɔ miate so ɖuɖuuɖu. Miiɣe sɔ inyagɛ̃ kua kɛkɛĩ gɔ mapia i mmɔre ame aatã mmɔre ɔɖuɖu ɔnyagɛ̃?
Ne ɔso miɖi inyagɛ̃ kua biara gɔ nɖe ikpi i mi ndɛ̃. Gbaã ne, mmɔre mɛ loinyagɛ̃ miɖe alasɔ maɔɖoe Kristo gɔ nɖe bo Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi Sɛrɛ.
Ne ɔso ne, midaatã sɔ boaɖe bo Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi boɖoboɖo kuere gɔ ame i ikpi gu ɔtile kurabara pia. Ɣɛɛ mitã boɖe mmɔre mɛ loinyagɛ̃ i ara bɔlɔlɔa ibara gu ɔnukuare iɣɛ ame bowũ.
I ɔko gɔ lotsɛrɛ mi ame ne, loɣere mi sɔ midaasakanya ku mma nsɛ maɖe asɔrɔ̃.

Ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze loto. Ma ne, masɛ maɖe asɔrɔ̃, ma anɔ sɛ abe arɛtɛ i maturi sikã iso, masɛ masu akpira mayu maturi, masɔrɛ aɣɔ ana. Si miɣɛ sɔ miabɛse so i ma iso pelepele ne, ikote sɔ miabɔrɛ i kayi gagbe ame!
Ɣɛɛ nnɛ nto lotsɛrɛ loɣere mi nɖe ngɔ nɖe ɔnyii fɔɖedze fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe asɔrɔ̃, ɔbɛbɛ anɔ, ɔsɔrɛ aɣɔ ɣee ɔrɔ maturi ayere lalaa, ɔrɛ̃ ndã, ɔyu kayu ne, mibɛse so i ɔ̃ iso. Midaaɖegu wũ nane aɖera.
Mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze ne, ma atɔ̃me iɣɛgu iiɖe wũ karabara, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso atɔ̃me. Ɣɛɛ mma nɖe mafɔɖedze boaɣɛgu atɔ̃me lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Misa ɔturi lalaa miɖi i mi ndɛ̃.”
Mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze ne, ma atɔ̃me iɣɛgu iiɖe wũ karabara, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso atɔ̃me. Ɣɛɛ mma nɖe mafɔɖedze boaɣɛgu atɔ̃me lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Misa ɔturi lalaa miɖi i mi ndɛ̃.”
Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ɔna itɔ̃me gu ɔ̃ ɔlaa fɔɖedze ne, iikote sɔ ɔ̃asu ne ɔkɛlɛgu mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze sɔ maɣɛ ne matã wũ. Ɣɛɛ miɣɛ ne i mi kerekere ndɛ̃.
Miiɣe sɔ mafɔɖedze loaɣɛgu kayiiso maturi atɔ̃me? Si mi loaɣɛgu kayiiso maturi atɔ̃me ne, be ɔso fiɛ miibawo kutɔ̃mei kpɔlɔkɔi gɔ mpia i mi ndɛ̃ ɔɣɛ?
Miiɣe sɔ bo mafɔɖedze loaɣɛgu kato makpabo atɔ̃me? Ne ɔso ikote sɔ boawo atɔ̃me wiriwiria wa i ngbã ame ngbe ɔɣɛ.
Si itɔ̃me ɔba i mi ndɛ̃ ne, be ɔso fiɛ miibasu mikɛlɛgu mma bosɛ bowarɛ i bo ndɛ̃ sɔ maɣɛ matã bo fiɛ boasu bokɛlɛgu kayiiso maturi sɔ maɣɛ ne?
Nto loɣere mi nnɛgbe sɔ kunuarɛ si kukpɛ̃ mi. Alasɔ bidɛ ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ saã pia i mi ndɛ̃ gɔ ɔɖe nɔgbadze ɔ̃awo mi ndɛ̃ atɔ̃me ɔɣɛ.
Ɣɛɛ ɔnyii fɔɖedze to ɔkɔ ɔ̃ ɔnyii fɔɖedze ɔkɛlɛgu mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze sɔ maɣɛ ma atɔ̃me.
Sɔ mito mikɔ so mikɛlɛgu atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ kerekere ɔɔte sɔ mi kafɔkaɖe ɔkuti. Be ɔso fiɛ miibatã sɔ maaɣɛrɛ mi? Be ɔso fiɛ miibatã sɔ maaɖe mi amumu?
Ɣɛɛ mito miɣɛrɛ so, miɖe so amumu.

Miiɣe sɔ maturi ma nsɛ mabara ara wa loikote iibana kaɖekɔ̃ i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃? Midaatã masɔsɔla mi! Mma nsɛ mabara ara lalaa, maɣɔsɔrɛdze, mma nsɛ maɖe asɔrɔ̃ marɔ̃go ma nsɛ marɛgu ma malaa ɣee marɛrɛ̃ ma nsɛ marɛgu ma marɛrɛ̃ laa, mayukukpe ɣee mma anɔ nsɛ abe i maturi ara iso, mma nsɛ marɛ̃ ndã, mma nsɛ matia maturi ɣee mma nsɛ mayu maturi I inɔgba ame iibana kaɖekɔ̃ i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃.

Miiɣe sɔ maturi ma nsɛ mabara ara wa loikote iibana kaɖekɔ̃ i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃? Midaatã masɔsɔla mi! Mma nsɛ mabara ara lalaa, maɣɔsɔrɛdze, mma nsɛ maɖe asɔrɔ̃ marɔ̃go ma nsɛ marɛgu ma malaa ɣee marɛrɛ̃ ma nsɛ marɛgu ma marɛrɛ̃ laa, mayukukpe ɣee mma anɔ nsɛ abe i maturi ara iso, mma nsɛ marɛ̃ ndã, mma nsɛ matia maturi ɣee mma nsɛ mayu maturi I inɔgba ame iibana kaɖekɔ̃ i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃.
Ngbɔ i mawɛ̃ ɔse ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ne, ɣɛɛ Bosate ɔɖi mi i mi akpi ame ɔpie mi ndu ɔbara mi sekelee ɔtã Ɣaa iki i Yesu Kristo iyere ame. Iki i ɔ̃ gu Ɣaa Siwarã ɔso ne, mi gu Ɣaa ndɛ̃ ka ilɛ.
Mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ to miɣɛ sɔ, “Loba ɔri loabara ira biara.” Gbaã iɖe. Ɣɛɛ ira biara iilɛgu-ɔ. Loawo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loba ɔri loabara ira biara.” Ɣɛɛ iikote sɔ loatã kuira ɔɖe me iso.

Ɔmama ana aaɣɛ sɔ, “Aɖera ɔso mabara iyiri fiɛ iyiri ɔso maɖi aɖera.” Gbaã iɖe, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã sɔ wã ɔɖuɖu ɔwi to ɔ̃aba ɔ̃afe. Iikote sɔ boasu bo sosina bobara asɔrɔ̃ra. Ɣɛɛ boasu bobara Ɣaa karabara fiɛ Ɣaa aatã sosina ira biara nɛ lonya sɛ̃.
Kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔtara Bosate ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ne, ɔto ɔ̃atara bo ana ku ɔ̃ ɔle gɔmɔ.
Miiɣe sɔ mi sosina ne, Kristo sosina kakpakpai miɖe? Fiɛ iikote sɔ miasu Kristo sosina kakpai kukawɛ̃ mimatãra i ngɔ losu asɔrɔ̃ra ɔbara ɔ̃ karabara.
Miiɣe ana sɔ si ɔturi ɔrɛgu ngɔmɔ igbã ne, ma gu wũ ɔɔkpese sosina siwɛ̃? Alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ma inyɔɔ aakpese sosina siwɛ̃.”
Ɣɛɛ ngɔ losu so ɔmatãra i Bosate iso ne, ɔ̃ɔbaragu wũ ɔwɛ̃ i Siwarã ame.
Miɖi so mibɔrɛgu i asɔrɔ̃ra ame. Ikpi igbã biara nɛ ɔturi sɛ ɔbara ne, iisɛ ibo i ɔ̃ sosina ame. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖe asɔrɔ̃ ne, ɔ̃ sosina mɔmɔ ɔsɛ ɔsu ɔbara ikpi nɛmɔ.
Miiɣe sɔ mi siturina nɖe isɔrɛyo itã Ɣaa Siwarã dzɛ ɔsu ɔtã mi sɔ siwe i mi ame? Iisiɖe mi mba so.
Ɣaa ɔtã kuso siare i mi iti. Ne ɔso misu mi siturina mibara ara wa loale Ɣaa.
I ɔko gɔ mitsɛrɛ me atɔ̃me iso ne, lobie sɔ loɣere mi sɔ si ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔrere pia gɔ ɔ̃ito ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃ayiri ɔrɔ̃go ne, ɔbara isɛɛ.
Ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ i asɔrɔ̃ra ɔɣede ɔso ne, ikote sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ biara si ɔwe ɔ̃ ɔre. Ɔrɔ̃go biara ana si ɔwe ɔ̃ ɔrã.
Iikote sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ aasɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔre sirɛ. Ngbɔ ame iikote sɔ ɔrɔ̃go ana aasɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔrã sirɛ ne. Mabara matã so kumɛgɔ iakote ma ɔbiara.
Alasɔ ɔrɔ̃go siturina iiɖe ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ sire. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ ɔrã ana sire siɖe. Ngbɔ ame i ɔrɛrɛ̃ siturina ana iiɖe ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ sire ne. Ɔ̃ ɔre ana ba ɔle i sɛ̃ iso.

Midaasɛ̃ sɔ miito mitã so sirɛ iɖo ɔwi gɔ miɖi misɛ sɔ miakparama kayi. Fiɛ si ayi wa misɛ sɔ miakparama kayi mmɔ ɔɔro ne, mikpese misɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ misi. Si mibara ngbɔ ne, Ɔbosam iibana ɔri i mi iso ɔla mi ɔnyɔ gɔ miisɛ miwo ɔɖe so iso.
Nnɛgbe iso ne, iiɖe mmara miɖe loto lotã mi, ɣɛɛ ɔka loto mi.
Gbaã ne, tee ibua ilɛ si mi ɔbiara se lɛ me. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔbiara ku nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔtã wũ. Ɔwɛ̃ ba karatã kawɛ̃, ɔmama ba kamama.
Mma loiyiri marã gu mare gu makuɛdze ne, lobie sɔ loɣere mi sɔ ialɛgu mi iɖo si miiyiri marã gu mare fiɛ mise lɛ kumɛgɔ lose.
Ɣɛɛ si miibawo so ɔɖe iso ne, miyiri marã gu marɔ̃go si minyua ɔtsue ala mi ɔrakolo ɔso.
Marã gu mare ne, mmara mɛ loto lotã ma ne, iiɖe wũ mɔmɔ mire miɖe, ɣɛɛ Bosate mire miɖe. Iikote sɔ ɔrɔ̃go aasɛ̃ kurã.
Ɣɛɛ si ɔsɛ̃ kurã ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ ɣee ɔkpese ɔ̃abara mawɛ̃ gu ɔ̃ ɔrã. Ngbɔ ame i ɔrɛrɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaasɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔre ne.
Ara tsɔra wagbe ne, mme ka nto loɣere mi, iiɖe Bosate mmara miɖe. Si fɔɖedze rɛrɛ̃ yiri ɔrɔ̃go gɔ loiɖe fɔɖedze fiɛ ɔrɔ̃go ɔnɔ karɔ̃ sɔ ɔ̃asɛ i kurã iyo ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ si ɔdaasɛ̃ wũ.
Ngbɔ ame si ɔrɔ̃go fɔɖedze yiri ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ loiɖe fɔɖedze fiɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ iibie sɔ ɔ̃asɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔre ne, ɔrɔ̃go si ɔdaasɛ̃ wũ.

Alasɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ loifɔ ɔɖe ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asekelera wũ iki i ɔ̃ ɔre gɔ nɖe fɔɖedze iso. Ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa to ɔ̃abara ɔrɔ̃go gɔ loifɔ ɔɖe sekelee ala ɔ̃ ɔrã gɔ lofɔ ɔɖe ɔso ne. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, ma mabi iito maase sekelee. Ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ miɣe ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔbara mabi Sekelee.
Ɣɛɛ si ngɔ loiɖe fɔɖedze to ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃asɛ̃ fɔɖedze ne, ɔ̃awo ɔrui faa. I ɔri gɔgbe igbã iso ne, ɔrɔ̃go fɔɖedze ɣee ɔrɛrɛ̃ fɔɖedze ba ɔri ɔ̃abara nnɛ ɔɖɔɛ. Ɣaa ɔkpere bo sɔ bowe i isobuɛ ame.
Fɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ fɔ nɖe fɔɖedze ne, iawo ɔki i fɔ iso sɔ aaɖi fɔ ɔrã gɔ loiɖe fɔɖedze. Ngbɔ ame i fɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ ana ne, iawo ɔɖe sɔ fɔ iso iaki i fɔ ɔre aana iɖi.
Nnɛ nsɛ lote i mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃ nɖe sɔ, ɔbiara si ɔsɛ ngbã lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bosate ɔsɛ fiɛ si ɔse lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔse fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere wũ.
Si ɔɔtu sirɛrɛ̃ fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere-ɔ ne, fɔ ne ngbɔ. Si aitu sirɛrɛ̃ fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere-ɔ ana ne, daaɣɛ sɔ aatu sirɛrɛ̃.
Alasɔ si atu sirɛrɛ̃ ɣee aitu ne, nnɛmɔ iito kuira. Ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ amɔɛ̃ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣere bo ato nɖe nnɛ lonya iɖo.
Ne ɔso mi ɔbiara si ɔse kumɛgɔ ɔse fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere wũ.
Si ɔsande aɖe atã ɔturi fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere-ɔ ne, idaaɖa-ɔ. Ɣɛɛ si ɔri pia sɔ aawo isɛguso ɔfɔ ne, bara ne karabara.
Si ɔsande aɖe fiɛ Bosate ɔkpere-ɔ ne, ka aɖe ngɔ mba iwarã i Ɣaa ame. Ngɔ ana nsigu so fiɛ Bosate ɔkpere wũ ne, ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃ɔkpese Bosate ɔsande.
Kuso siare i Ɣaa ɔtã i mi iti ne ɔso midaakpesera so maturi masande.
Manyii, mi ɔbiara si ɔse kumɛgɔ ɔse fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere wũ.
I nnɛ mi karɛ i mma loiyiri marã gu mare iso ne, loifɔ mmara kumiwɛ̃ lobɔrɛgu i Bosate kɔrɛ. Ɣɛɛ i Bosate nnyainyɔ nɛ nsia me iso ne, wũ adzuni ngbe ne fiɛ miawo wã ɔsiai.
Wũ adzuni kanya ne, kumɛgɔ i kayi to kawe ɔle ne, lofɔ loɖe sɔ ilɛ sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ aasɛ sɔ ɔ̃iyiri ɔrɔ̃go.
Si ayiri ɔrɔ̃go ne, daaɣɛ sɔ ato asɛ̃ wũ. Si aiyiri ana ne, daaɣɛ sɔ aabie ɔrɔ̃go ayiri.
Ɣɛɛ si ayiri ɔrɔ̃go ne, aibara ikpi. Si ɔbitɛ gɔ loiyiri kurã ɔsɛ ɔ̃ayiri kurã ne, ɔ̃ibara ikpi kuiwɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ lobie sɔ loɖi mi i inyɛwe nɛ mpia i kuyiri ame.
Nnɛ nto loɣere mi nɖe sɔ, ɔwi gɔ boba iisisi. Ita i kiniɔ ne, mi ma nyiri marɔ̃go si misɛ lɛ mma loiyiri awe.
Mma nto mabiɛ ana si masɛ lɛ mma i kuira iito. Mma nto mama ne, masɛ lɛ mma loito mana isoɣɔ. Mma nto maɣa ara ne, mabara lɛ ara wa maɣa iiɖe ma mɔmɔ are.
Mma nto mabie kayi gagbe karana ɔɖuɖu sɔ kakpese ma kare si madaasu ma ɔriinyɔ masia i karana iso. Alasɔ kayi gagbe karana iibase ɖaa i ɔwi gɔ nto ɔba ame.
Loito lobie sɔ mimararã so i kuira iso. Alasɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ loiyiri ɔrɔ̃go sɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ adzuni ɔsia i Bosate karabara iso fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abo wũ anɔ.
Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nyiri ɔrɔ̃go ne, ɔ̃ adzuni sɛ asia i kayiiso ara iso. Ɔsɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abara nnɛ loaɣɔ ɔ̃ ɔre kayiri.

Ne ɔso ne, ɔsɛ ɔwe i ara ka anyɔ ndɛ̃. Ngbɔ ame i ɔbitɛ gɔ loiyiri kurã ne, ɔsɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ adzuni ɔsia i Ɣaa karabara iso, ɔ̃ siwarã gu sosina ɔɖuɖu. Ɣɛɛ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nyiri kurã ne, ɔsɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ adzuni ɔsia i kayiiso ara iso, alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abo ɔ̃ ɔrã anɔ.
Lobie sɔ loabuai mi ɔso nto loɣɛ ara wagbe. Loito lobie sɔ lonyi mi ku mmara kumiwɛ̃. Misɛ ngbã i ɔri tɔrɔrɔa iso si miawo so ɔsu ɔtã Ɣaa pelepele ku mi situ ɔɖuɖu.
Si ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔrere ɔɔkarɛ ɔrɔ̃go fiɛ ɔnya sɔ ɔ̃ibawo ɔɖe so iso lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔbu ne, mayiri so faa. Maibara ikpi.
Ɣɛɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ i kuira iito iɖaa fiɛ ɔnyɔ sɔ ɔ̃awo ɔɖe so iso ne, ɔ̃awo ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔyiri ɔrɔ̃go. Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ana ɔbara isɛɛ.
Ne ɔso ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ loyiri ɔrɔ̃go ne, ɔbara isɛɛ. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ loiyiri ɔrɔ̃go ɔbara isɛɛ ɔɖo.
Ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nyiri kurã ne, ɔna ɔri ɔyiri kurã mama ku ɔwi gɔ i ɔ̃ ɔrã kuere si ngbã. Si ɔ̃ ɔrã gɔmɔ ɔkpi ne, ɔ̃awo kurã mama ɔyiri si ɔbie. Ɣɛɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ ɔ̃ayiri si ɔɖe fɔɖedze.
Ɣɛɛ i wũ adzuni kanya ne, si ɔsɛ ɔ̃isiyiri kurã ne, ngbã aawe wũ ɔmɛrɛ̃ miɖo. Wũ adzuni aɖe ngbe, ɣɛɛ lofɔ loɖe sɔ Ɣaa Siwarã pia i wũ ame mme wũ.
Kiniɔ ne, lobie sɔ loɣere mi ira i araɖea wa masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ iso. Boɣe sɔ bo ɔɖuɖu ba iwola, fiɛ boɣe ana sɔ iwola sɛ itã ɔturi ɔkɔlɛ so kato. Ɣɛɛ kuɖɔɛ ne, ɔle kusɛ kupia ɔturi.
Ɔbiara gɔ lobu sɔ ɔɣe ara ne, ɔtsue sɔ ɔ̃itsue ɔro pelepele.
Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ Ɣaa ne, Ɣaa ɣe wũ.
Nnɛ loto loɣere mi i araɖea wa masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ iɖe iso ne, boɣe sɔ aɣɔ kuawɛ̃ na i kayiiso fiɛ boɣe ana sɔ maɣaa kumawɛ̃ ana na, Ɣaa ɔwɛ̃ saã ɔɖe mpia.
Ɣɛɛ sɔ maturi sɛ maɣɛ sɔ aɣɔ gu masate pia i kato ɣee karɔ̃ ngbe fiɛ aɣɔ wagbe ɔsi gbodzoo ana ne,
bo boɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔwɛ̃ saã mpia. Ɔ̃ nɖe Ɔse gɔ lobara ara ɔɖuɖu fiɛ ɔ̃ bosi ngbã botã. Sate ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ mpia nɖe Yesu Kristo gɔ iso i Ɣaa ɔki ɔbara ara ɔɖuɖu fiɛ ɔ̃ iso iki bosi ngbã.

Iiɖe ɔbiara nɣe ɔnukuare gɔgbe. Ara wa i maturi ɔɖi masɛ mato masɔrɛ ne, si maɖe aɖera wa masu masɔrɛ wã ne, masɛ mabu sɔ aɣɔ aɖera aɖe. Ma kaɣere ga nna ɔle sɛ katã ma ipɔ sɔ maɔpukutura so i aɖera wa maɖe ɔso.
Iiɖe aɖera loatã sɔ bo gu Ɣaa inyɔ ndɛ̃ aanina. Fiɛ iito kuira si boiɖe ara wamɔ. Ngbɔ ame boibana kuira si boɖe ara wamɔ ana ne.
Ɣɛɛ minyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ mi isɛguso nɛ ame mipia iibakɔ ngɔ kafɔkaɖe nna ɔle ipia i ikpi ame.
Bu nyɔ sɔ si ngɔ kafɔkaɖe nna ɔle ɔnya fɔ gɔ fɔ mba ɔle i kafɔkaɖe ame to aɖe ara i kuɣɔ iyo ne, nda iabara wũ? Ɔ̃abu sɔ ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃awo aɖera ɔsɛ aaɖe i kuɣɔ iyo ame mmɔ faa.
Ne ɔso ne, fɔ ɔnyii gɔ iti i Kristo ɔkpi fiɛ ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe na ɔle to ɔ̃ayu ala nnɛ abara i fɔ iwola iti.
I ɔri gɔgbe iso ne, ato aɣɛrɛ Kristo sɔ atã manyii fɔɖedze ma kafɔkaɖe nna ɔle to maana imararãso i ma situ ame.
Ne ɔso si wũ aɖera atã wũ ɔnyii ɔbara ikpi ne, loibaɖe aɖera wa masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ lonya sɔ iibatã wũ ɔnyii ɔbo i ikpi ame.
Iiɖe ɔturi gɔ nsigu so loɖe ɣɛɛ? Iiɖe Bosate Yesu Katɔ̃mesɛdze nɖe? Loinya Yesu gɔ nɖe Bosate? Fiɛ iiɖe mi nɖe wũ karabara ga lobara lotã Bosate kusia ɖeakatɔ̃?
Si mawɛ̃ iibafɔ me lɛ Bosate Katɔ̃mesɛdze awe ne, mi mifɔ me ngbɔ. Mi mɔmɔ nɖe ikparĩ nɛ loate sɔ Bosate Katɔ̃mesɛdze loɖe.
Si maturi to mabie sɔ maakpadzɛ̃gu me atɔ̃me ne, nnɛgbe loaɖi so ala kanya ne.
I bo karabara kanya ne, boba ɔri sɔ maatã bo ɔɖe gu ɔnɛ.
Bo wũ boba ɔri sɔ boakɔ bo mare fɔɖedze bosɛgu lɛ katɔ̃memasɛdze tsɔra gu Bosate manyiibi gu Petro awe.
Ɛɛbɛrɛ mme gu Barnaba ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã loabara karabara bonyɔ so iso?
Kpakpɛ̃dze biara ana sɛ ɔfɔ kuso ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ karabara ame. Fiɛ Kpɛ̃dze biara ana ba ɔri sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔ̃ kakpɛkɔ̃ ame araɖea. Mabɔi kɔdze biara ana ba ɔri sɔ ɔ̃anɛ ɔ̃ mabɔi inyɛdu.
Iiɖe ara wa i maturi to maɣɛ ɔso kere nto loɣɛ ngbɔ. Ɣɛɛ ngbɔ i mmara ɔte ne.
Boka i Mose ɔko ame sɔ, “Bɔi gɔ nsɛ ɔkpɛ̃ ɔtã-ɔ ne, daanyi wũ kanya.” Ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe mabɔi iso i Ɣaa to ɔɖe ika.
Bo iso i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me nɛmɔ. Ngbɔ ame i kpɛ̃dze gɔ nsɛ ɔpɛ ɔraɖui gu ngɔ nsɛ ɔsɔrɛ̃ ɔbɔ kaa ne, ma inyɔɔ sɛ manyɔ ɔri sɔ maana kaɖekɔ̃ i ɔraɖui gɔmɔ ame.
Bopɛ siwarã ame ɔraɖui i mi ame. Ne ɔso si mitã bo sosina ame ara ne, iinina kuira.

Si maturi mama to mana kusia gɔgbe igbã i mi iso ne, iikote sɔ bo wũ boana ngɔ losi kuɖo? Ɣɛɛ sɔ boba ɔri gɔgbe ne, boisu bobara kuira. Bosu ira biara bosia so iso sɔ boibasu kuira botɛ̃ra Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔri kukakɔi.
Miɣe kukaakɔ sɔ mma nsɛ mabara karabara i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ne, mmɔ masɛ mafɔ ma araɖea mabɔrɛgu. Fiɛ mma nsɛ mafɛ̃ ara matã Ɣaa i isɔrɛkasege iso ne, mmɔ masɛ mafɔ ma aɖera mabɔrɛgu.
Ngbɔ ame kere i Bosate ɔtã sɔ mma nsɛ mapɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea imomo ne, itɔ̃me nɛmɔ iɣɛ ame maaɖe ara maɖi.
Atoa sɔ loba ɔri gɔgbe ne, loibara ɔ̃ karabara. Loito lotsɛrɛ mi ɔko gɔgbe sɔ si lowanyi mi nnɛ nɖe wũ ɔkpɛ. Si lokpi kɔra ne, ilɛ me iɖo sɔ ɔturi aanyɔ ira nɛ iso loawo ndamu ɔɖe pupurii.
Nna ɔri loakɔlɛ so kato i Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loto loɣɛ iso. Ndzo miɖe mitã me si losɛ̃ sɔ loito loɣɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me!
Si lobara wũ karabara ku ɔtu ɣɔa ne, iyɔ loanyɔ ɔri lotã kuso ifɔ. Ɣɛɛ ne, loto lobara kã ala Bosate lopia me sɔ lobara fiɛ Ɣaa loɣedza me i kã kanya.
Mme kuso loafɔ iyɔ? Wũ kuso nɖe sɔ loaɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛmɔ kere. Fiɛ loibara ɔle gɔ loba karabara lotã wũ kusia.
Ɔturi gɔ nsigu so loɖe fiɛ lona i kuwɛ̃ kayirinɔ. Ɣɛɛ lobara so ɔbiara ɔɖabo sɔ loawo maturi gbodzoo ɔkɔ ɔbɔ Bosate kɔrɛ.

Ɔwi gɔ loto lobara karabara i ma Yudase ndɛ̃ ne, losɛ ngbã lɛ ɔ Yudase awe sɔ loawo ma ɔɖi ɔtã Bosate. Ɣɛɛ sɔ lona i Mose mmara kayirinɔ ne, losɛ lɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara i mmara iso sɔ si loawo ma ɔkpadzɛ̃ ɔbɔ Bosate kɔrɛ.
Ngbɔ ame lobara i mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃ ne. Loisɛ lobara i ma Yudase mmara iso sɔ si loawo ma ɔɖi ɔtã Bosate. Nnɛgbe iite sɔ lota loɣɛ i Ɣaa mmara iso. Alasɔ gbaã ne, Kristo mmara iso nto loɖe.

Si lopia i mma kafɔkaɖe nna ɔle ndɛ̃ ne, losɛ lobara so lɛ ma awe sɔ loawo ma ɔkpadzɛ̃ ɔbɔ Bosate. Ne ɔso nsɛ lokpesera so ira biara lotã maturi ɔɖuɖu i ɔri biara iso sɔ si loawo mawɛ̃ ɔɖi ɔtã Bosate.
Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔso lobara nwagbe ɔɖuɖu sɔ loana isoɣɔ nɛ mpia i karabara ame.
Miɣe sekelee sɔ si mato matere ise ne, maturi gbodzoo nsɛ matere, ɣɛɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã pɛ nsɛ ɔɖe iso. Ne ɔso mitere ise sɔ miaɖe iso mifɔ ikoto.
Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔtere ise ne, ɔsɛ ɔfɔ ikpadzɛ̃ sɔ si ɔ̃aɖe iso. Ikoto nɛ masɛ fɔ ne, iisɛ ise dzoroo fiɛ isɛ inina. Ɣɛɛ bo ne, boaledza so botã ikoto nɛ loisɛ inina inya.
Nnɛgbe ɔso nsɛ lotere tɔrɔrɔ sɔ loaɖaɛ iwɛĩ ne. Ne ɔso ana lose lɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔkpɛ̃ imami ɣɛɛ loisɛ lopɛ akama i ɔwiri ame ne.
Nsɛ lotã wũ sosina ɔfɔ akama gbodzoo sɔ loabɔsɛ̃ karɔ̃. Alasɔ si loɣere maturi Itɔ̃me Bielea fiɛ mafiniki ne, loito lobie sɔ maaɣere me i kawirikɔ̃ sɔ loikote.
Wũ manyii, lobie sɔ mianyigi ara wa loba i bo mawa ma losiai Mose iso. Idɔdɔ ɔsɛgu ma, ikɔ ma ɔɖuɖu fiɛ maki i Ɔpo Rɛtɛa ndɛ̃ mafe.
Ɣaa ɔsu idɔdɔ gu Ɔpo Rɛtɛa ɔbara Ɣaa itupie kubarara ɔtã ma lɛ Mose masiaidze awe.
Ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɖe Siwarã ame araɖea awɛ̃ saã.
Fiɛ manɛ Siwarã ame ndu miwɛ̃ saã mɛmɔ. Manɛ ndu mɛ lobɔrɛ i Siwarã ame ita nɛ losiai ma ame. Ita nɛmɔ nɖe Kristo mɔmɔ ne.
Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame kɔra ne, so iiɣɔ Ɣaa i ma mawɛ̃ iso ala ma nsɛgbai ɔso. Ne ɔso ne, makpi i fafuĩ ame.
Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ɖe ara isuã si ite bo sɔ ara wa nsɛ abɔ ikpi si adaakpɛ̃ bo ɔkã lɛ ma awe,
ɣee bosu so botã aɣɔsɔrɛra lɛ ma awe. Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Maturi ɔba maasakanya sɔ mato mapia so isoɣɔ, ɣɛɛ ma isoɣɔ ɔba iakpese itarɛ̃ gu asɔrɔ̃ iɖe katɔ.”
Iikote sɔ boaɖe asɔrɔ̃ kumɛgɔ mabara fiɛ i iyi iwɛ̃ saã iso ne, maturi kukpi sinyɔ itɛ ɔkpi.
Midaatã bola Bosate bonyɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ mabara fiɛ maɣɛ ɔɖoɖo ma makpi.
Fiɛ midaatã bota boya Ɣaa iso lɛ kumɛgɔ i ma mawɛ̃ ɔbara fiɛ Ɣaa Kpabo gɔ nto kukpi ɔle ɔwɔra ma.
Ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔba ma iso si iaɖe ara isuã itã maturi. Matsɛrɛ wã masɛ ana sɔ si boasu boka so alasɔ kayiiso kawirikɔ̃ ɔwi ame bopia kiniɔ.
Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbu sɔ ɔɣɛ teteree ne, ɔnyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ ɔ̃ibabɔrɛ ɔrɔ̃.

Ilainyɔ igbã biara nɛ loɔba mi iso ne, nɛ ame kere nsɛ iba i ɔturi biara iso ne. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa sɛ ɔbara i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iso sɔ ɔ̃ibatã ilainyɔ ɔwe ɔle iɖo fɔ kafɔkaɖe. Fiɛ ana ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã-ɔ ɔle sɔ aawo ɔya teteree fiɛ ɔ̃ate-ɔ ɔri gɔ iso aaki fiɛ aabɔrɛ i ne ame.
Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii, miɖi so mibɔrɛgu i iɣɔsɔrɛ ame.
Nto loka mi lɛ manɔgbadze awe, ne ɔso mi mɔmɔ mikere ara wa nto loɣere mi minyɔ.
Ikɔi nɛ bosɛ bosɛ ala ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ fiɛ bosɛ bopɛ Ɣaa siba i ne iti ne, si bonɛ ara i ne ame ne, iɣɛ itã Bosate ima. Fiɛ boɖoboɖo gɔ bosɛ boɖe i ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ ana ne, ɔɣɛ ɔtã Bosate sosina.
Atoa sɔ bosi gbodzoo ne, gɔ boɖoboɖo ikuri iwɛ̃ i bo ɔɖuɖu sɛ boɖe ɔso ne sosina siwɛ̃ ka boɖe.
Mibu Israel mabi minyɔ. Mma nsɛ maɖe ara wa masu masɔrɛ Ɣaa ne, maɔbara mawɛ̃ ku Ɣaa i ma isɔrɛ ame.
Be ɔso nto loɣɛ ngbɔ? Ɔɣɛ loto sɔ aɣɔ wa mapɔ ɣee ara wa masu masɔrɛ wã ne, ira iwɛ̃ iɖe?
Ooɣo! Nnɛ loto loɣere mi nɖe sɔ, ara wa masɛ masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ ne, siwarã lalaa siɖe masu wã matã, iiɖe Ɣaa. Fiɛ loito lobie sɔ miɖe kulaa ku siwarã lalaa kusiwɛ̃.
Iilɛ sɔ mianɛ mibɔrɛgu i Bosate ikɔi ame miledza inɛ ibɔrɛgu i siwarã lalaa ana ikɔi ame. Iikote sɔ miaɖe ara i Bosate ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ i isɔrɛyo misɛ mialedza araɖea iɖe i siwarã lalaa kasɔrɛkɔ̃ ana.
Ɛɛbɛrɛ ɔbie boto sɔ Bosate si ɔna sikpã ɔkpɛ̃ sirerɛ? Bofɔ boɖe sɔ boba ɔle boɖo wũ?
Bosɛ boɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔri pia sɔ boabara ira biara.” Gbaã iɖe. Ɣɛɛ iiɖe ira biara nlɛ. Ɔri pia sɔ boabara ira biara, ɣɛɛ iiɖe ira biara nɖe kusia itã bo.
Fɔɖedze kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaabie ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ, ɣɛɛ ɔbie nnɛ loakote ɔ̃ malaa.
Aba ɔri aaɣa sina igbã biara dzɛ mato marɔdɛ̃ aɖe. Ɣɛɛ iikote sɔ ala ɔkarɛ sɔ sina sekelea siɖe ɛɛbɛrɛ kuɣɔ masu masɔrɛ.
Alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Kayi gu kã ara ɔɖuɖu wa mpia i kã ame ne, Bosate mba.”
Si ngɔ loiɖe fɔɖedze ɔkpere-ɔ sɔ ba ɖegu wũ ara fiɛ atɔrã sɔ aasɛ ne, ibiara nɛ ɔtã-ɔ sɔ ɖe ne, ɖe ɣɛɛ daakarɛ anɔ sɔ isekele ɛɛbɛrɛ iisekele.
Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere ɔɣere-ɔ sɔ kuɣɔ masu aɖera wamɔ masɔrɛ ala ne, daaɖe. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, kaɣere to kaaɖaa ngɔmɔ.
Iiɖe fɔ gɔ fɔ loɖe ara wamɔ i kaɣere aɖaa. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ lonya-ɔ fiɛ ɔɣere-ɔ i kaɣere aɖaa. Ɔrere aawo ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Si loba ɔri loabara irere ne, be ɔso fiɛ ɔturi mama kaɣere ɔso ne, loanyua ɔbara?
Si lopɛ Ɣaa siba i araɖea wa ɔtã me iti ne, be ɔso fiɛ ɔmama aabu sɔ loɣɛrɛ wũ i wã iti gɔ loɔpɛ Ɣaa siba?”
Ɣɛɛ i bo ɔɖe gu ɔnɛ ame ne, ikote sɔ boabara wã ɔɖuɖu botã Ɣaa iyere kato ikɔlɛ.
Midaabara kuira nɛ loatɛ̃ ma Yudase ɣee mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɣee mafɔɖedze Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔri.
Mibara lɛ kumɛgɔ nsɛ lobara wũ ira biara fiɛ loisɛ lota loya kuwɛ̃ iso. Loisɛ lobie wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ, ɣɛɛ nnɛ loabara fiɛ iaɖe isɛɛ itã ɔbiara iɖi.
Misore wũ nsɛgbai lɛ kumɛgɔ mme wũ nto losore Kristo nsɛgbai.
Nsɛ lole mi alasɔ misɛ minyigi me ɔwi biara ame fiɛ misɛ minyigi ara wa lote mi. Mito mibara i wã iso ɔwi biara.
Ɣɛɛ loto lobie sɔ minɔ karɔ̃ kukaakɔ sɔ ne, Kristo nɖe ɔturi biara iti. Ɔrɛrɛ̃ nɖe ɔ̃ ɔre iti fiɛ Ɣaa nɖe Kristo iti.
Ne ɔso ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ nsɛ ɔkparama kayi ɣee ɔpɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me imomo i Ɣaa iyo fiɛ ɔsu ira ɔfu so iti ne, ɔto ɔpia Kristo kunuarɛ.
Ɔrɔ̃go gɔ ana nsɛ ɔkparama kayi ɣee ɔpɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me imomo i Ɣaa iyo fiɛ ɔ̃inyi ɖuku iti ne, ɔto ɔpia ɔ̃ ɔrã kunuarɛ. Ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i ɔ̃ gu ngɔ lokparɛ̃ ɔ̃ iti ndɛ̃.
Si ɔrɔ̃go ɔrere sɔ ɔ̃ibanyi ɖuku iti ne, iyɔ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔkpariɛ̃. Fiɛ si iti ikparɛ̃ sɛ ibɔ ɔrɔ̃go anɔ karɔ̃ ne, iyɔ ɔnyi ɖuku iti.
Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɣɛɛ ne, iikote sɔ ɔ̃asu kuira ɔfu iti ala Ɣaa ɔbara wũ lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔse. Ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔɖi Ɣaa kuwarɛ ɔte ne. Fiɛ ɔrɔ̃go ana sɛ ɔɖi ɔrɛrɛ̃ kuwarɛ ɔte.
Alasɔ karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ne, iiɖe ɔrɔ̃go i Ɣaa ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔbara. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔbara ɔrɔ̃go ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ame.
Iiɖe ɔrɔ̃go ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔbara ɔrɛrɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ iso i Ɣaa ɔbara ɔrɔ̃go.
Kato makpabo ɔso ne, ikote sɔ ɔrɔ̃go aasu ɖuku ɔnyi iti si ɔte sɔ ɔpia i ɔ̃ ɔrã kayirinɔ.
Atoa sɔ ise ngbɔ ne, mafɔɖedze ma nɖe mawɛ̃ ku Kristo kasɛ iise ngbɔ. Ɔrɔ̃go iisigu so fiɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ ana iisigu so.
Alasɔ kumɛgɔ mabara ɔrɔ̃go maɖi i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ame ne, ngbɔ ame i ɔrɔ̃go ana sɛ ɔɣe ɔrɛrɛ̃ ne, ɣɛɛ ara ɔɖuɖu ne, Ɣaa kɔrɛ abɔrɛ.
Mi mɔmɔ minyɔ si ikote sɔ ɔrɔ̃go aaya ɔkparama kayi sɔ ɔ̃ifu so ara iti?
Ngbã mɔmɔ kɔra ɔte bo sɔ iilɛ sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ iti aafe iyi. Si ɔrɛrɛ̃ iti ɔyi kpitii ne, ka isɛ ikpɛ̃ wũ kunuarɛ.
Ɣɛɛ si ɔrɔ̃go iti ɔyi ne, iɖe kuwarɛ itã wũ. Alasɔ Ɣaa lotã wũ siwɛrɛ̃ tagbaraa sɔ ɔsu ɔfu iti.
Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere to ɔbie sɔ ɔkpadzɛ̃ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, nnɛ kotoo loaɣere wũ nɖe sɔ, kuira siina gɔ loaɣɛ iɖo nnɛgbe fiɛ mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ana iisitɔrã i kuira mama iso.
I ara wa nto loba loate ngbe ame ne, loibawo mi ɔle. Alasɔ si miba miasarɛ sɔ mito misɔrɛ Ɣaa ne, ara sɛɛ wa nsɛ abɔrɛ i mi isarɛ ame iisi lɛ ara lalaa.
Iɖeakatɔ̃ nɖe sɔ, lonɔ sɔ si misakanya lɛ mafɔɖedze ne, miɣɛɣɛ so i akuri ame. Lofɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe loɖe.
Ina ɣaa sɔ kakpadzɛ̃ pia i mi ndɛ̃ si iate ikpaki nɛ mpia i mma nɖe mafɔɖedze gbaã gu mma loiɖe ndɛ̃.
Si misakanya ne, iiɖe Bosate ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ aɖera misɛ miɖe.
Alasɔ si miba miasakanya ne, miisɛ miya misia so fiɛ misɛ mitsɛ aɖera iɖe. Ne ɔso ɔwi gɔ i kukã to mawɛ̃ ne, mawɛ̃ ka marɛ̃ ndã.
Mina ayo ngbegɔ miaɖe ara minɛ ndã? Be ɔso mito mibie sɔ miapia Ɣaa mafɔɖedze ikuri kunuarɛ mikuti misopara mafɔɖedze wɛrɛba? Be si nɣere mi? Loibawo mi ɔle i nnɛgbe ame. Ooɣo!
Alasɔ nnɛ lofɔ lobɔrɛgu i Bosate kɔrɛ nto lote mi ngbe. Kasɛ̃ ga ame maɖi Bosate Yesu matã ne, ɔsu boɖoboɖo.
Gɔ ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba ne, ɔbɛse boɖoboɖo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Wũ siturina dzɛ losu losɔrɛ Ɣaa lotã mi ngbe ne. Mifɔ miɖe si misu minyigi me.”
Ngbɔ ame gɔ maɖe ara maro ne, ɔsu ikɔi, ne ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ikɔi nɛgbe nɖe nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔto ɔnyigu mi kanya ɣɛtɛ ga wũ ima nɖe ikparĩ ne. Ɔwi biara gɔ mianɛ ne, misu minyigi me ala.”
Nnɛgbe ɔte sɔ ɔwi biara gɔ miaɖe ɣee mianɛ i ikɔi nɛgbe ame ne, mito mikama Bosate kukpi gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃aledza iba.
Ne ɔso ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɖe Bosate aɖera wagbe ɣee ɔnɛ i ikɔi nɛgbe ame i ɔri gɔ loikote iso ne, ɔɖe ipɔ ala ɔ̃iwarɛ Bosate siturina gu ɔ̃ ima.
Ne ɔso ɔbiara si ɔbo so ame kukaakɔ fiɛ ɔ̃aɖe boɖoboɖo gɔgbe fiɛ ɔ̃anɛ i Bosate ikɔi nɛgbe ame.
Alasɔ ngɔ loisɛ ɔwarɛ Bosate Siturina fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖe boɖoboɖo gɔgbe ɣee ɔnɛ i ikɔi nɛgbe kanya ne, ɔsɛ ɔɖe, ɔnɛ atɔ̃me iɣɛ ɔtã so.
Ne lotã sɔ gbodzoo i mi ndɛ̃ to manyɛ, somina na ma ɔle, fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana ɔɔkpi ne.
Si bobo so ame kukaakɔ bokpa so ne, Ɣaa iibaɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me.
Ɣɛɛ si Bosate ɔɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me fiɛ ɔkpadzɛ̃ bo kutsue ne, iyɔ Ɣaa iibawɔra bo gu mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze.
Ne ɔso ne manyii, si misakanya sɔ mito miba miaɖe Bosate aɖera ne, miya misia so.
Si kukã to ɔrere ne, ɔɖe ara i ɔ̃ iyo sɔ Ɣaa iibaɣɛgu mi atɔ̃me lɛ ikuri awe. Si loɔba ne, loaka mi i ara tsɔra iso.
Kiniɔ ne wũ manyii, i ɔko gɔ mitsɛrɛ me i Ɣaa Siwarã karatã iso ne, loito lobie sɔ kuira aawɛrɛ mi.
Miɣe sɔ ɔwi gɔ miɖe maɣɔsɔrɛdze ne, mitã ara wa nna ngbã ɔɖe mi iso fiɛ abara karabara i mi iso.
Ne ɔso lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ ɔbiara gɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɖe iso iibawo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Sigbarĩ si siba i Yesu iso.” Ngbɔ ame ana i kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Yesu nɖe Bosate,” si Siwarã Bielea iito siɖe wũ iso ne.
Siwarã karatã gbodzoo pia, ɣɛɛ Siwarã siwɛ̃ saã siɖe lotã kã.
Bosɛ bobara Ɣaa karabara i siri agbãagbã iso, ɣɛɛ Bosate ɔwɛ̃ saã karabara boto bobara.
Karabara agbãagbã ana pia, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔmɔ ame nsɛ ɔtã ɔle fiɛ maabara kã ne.
Karatã biara ga i ɔrere ba ne, Ɣaa Siwarã lotã wũ sɔ ɔsu ɔbara karabara ɔtã maturi ɔɖuɖu kusia.
Ɣaa Siwarã ɔtã ɔwɛ̃ iwola nɛ loatã sɔ ɔ̃awo maturi ika ɔɖe. Ɔmama ana ne, Siwarã ɔtã wũ inɔgba nɛ ɔ̃aɖe ala maturi ika fiɛ maanɔ karɔ̃.
Ɔmama ana ba kafɔkaɖe siare iki i Siwarã dzɛmɔ ame ame. Fiɛ ɔmama ne, Siwarã dzɛmɔ ame ɔtã wũ sinyɛ isa karatã.
Siwarã sɛ sitã ɔwɛ̃ ɔle sɔ ɔ̃abara awawãra, ɔmama ne, Ɣaa itɔ̃me iɣɛ, ɔmama ana ne, Siwarã agbãagbã itsue iɖi ite. Fiɛ ɔmama ɔ̃ wũ ne, siɖe agbãagbã iɣɛ. Ɔmama ana ne, siɖe agbãagbã karɔ̃ iɖi.
Ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ne, Ɣaa Siwarã siwɛ̃ saã dzɛmɔ karabara kaɖe. Sisɛ siɣɛ maturi karatã lɛ kumɛgɔ sibie.
Kuturidziri ɖe kuwɛ̃ ɣɛɛ ngɔi agbãagbã pia i kɔ̃ iso. Ngbɔ ame i Kristo ɖe ɔwɛ̃ ne, ɣɛɛ ɔba ngɔi agbãagbã.

Maki i Siwarã siwɛ̃ saã ame mabara bo kuturidziri kuwɛ̃. Ɔ Yudase aɖe o-o, aiɖe ɔ Yudase o-o, ɔsande aɖe o-o, asigu so o-o, bo ɔɖuɖu Ɣaa itupie kubarara kuwɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame i Siwarã ɔtã bo ne. Siwarã siwɛ̃ saã dzɛmɔ ame ndu masu matã bo bonɛ ne.
Kuturidziri ne, kuiɖe ira iwɛ̃ kere. Ɣɛɛ ara agbãagbã losakanya abara kuturidziri.
Si kukpa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Gɔ iiɖe kɔrɔ̃ loɖe ɔso ne, loiɖe kuturidziri kakpai ne, iyɔ kukpa iisibua i kuturidziri iso?”
Fiɛ si kutsue ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Gɔ iiɖe me nɖe inɔmi ɔso ne, loisibua i kuturidziri iso” ne, iite sɔ kutsue iisimatã i kuturidziri iso?
Si kuturidziri ɔɖuɖu ne inɔmi kuɖe ne, nda kuabara fiɛ kuanɔ ara? Si kutsue ana kere ana kuɖe ne, nda kuabara fiɛ kuasu ara ɔfiã?
Ɣɛɛ si bokarã inɔ ne, boanya sɔ Ɣaa ɔsu sosina ira biara ɔmatãra i ngbegɔ ɔɖɔɛ sɔ iwe.
Si kuturidziri ɔɖuɖu ne, ira ka iwɛ̃ kere iɖe ne, nda iase?
Ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ boɔnya ne, ɔturi iso ara ɔsi, ɣɛɛ kuturidziri ɖe kuwɛ̃.
Ne ɔso inɔmi iibawo kɔrɔ̃ ɔɣere sɔ, “Loito lobie-ɔ i wũ kuira ame.” Iti ana iibawo kukpa ɔɣere sɔ, “Ainya me i kuira ame.”
Kuturidziri ngɔi mɛ lonyɔ ɣɛkpɛtɛ miɖo ne, si mina boibawo kuira ɔbara.
Ngɔi mɛ boisɛ bowarɛ ne, me kɔra bosɛ bodzuɛ̃ kukaakɔ boɖo ne. Fiɛ ngɔi mɛ loikote sɔ boaɖi bosɔ̃ i ɔgbami ne, bosɛ bokɔla me kukaakɔ.
Boisɛ bobara ngbɔ botã ngɔi mɛ nto milɛ ɔnyɔ. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔfinikira nrɔɔ̃ i kuturidziri iso sɔ bosɛ bowarɛ ngɔi mɛ nna ɔle boɖo.
Ɔbara ngbɔ sɔ si iɣɛɣɛso iibawe i kuturidziri ame, ɣɛɛ kakɔi biara aawarɛ kã ɔlaa.
Fiɛ si kuturidziri kakɔi kawɛ̃ to kanya ibo ne, sosina ɔɖuɖu sɛ sinya ibo. Ngbɔ ame si male kakɔi kawɛ̃ ne, ngɔi tsɔra ɔɖuɖu sɛ mina isoɣɔ.
Ne ɔso mi ɔɖuɖu mamatã i Kristo kuturidziri iso fiɛ boɖe ɔ̃ sosina ngɔi iwɛ̃ iwɛ̃.

I mafɔɖedze ikuri ame ne, Ɣaa ɔsu bo ɔɖuɖu ɔsia i ngbegɔ lokote bo. Ma ɖeakatɔ̃ nɖe katɔ̃memasɛdze, manyɔa nɖe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze, matɛare nɖe maratedze, iyɔ mma nsɛ mabara awawãra fiɛ mma mba sinyɛ isa ɔle, iyɔ mabuaidze, iyɔ matɔ̃ɖedze gu mma nsɛ maɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã ana.
Iiɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu nɖe katɔ̃memasɛdze ɣee kanyamaɖidze ɣee maratedze. Ngbɔ ame iiɖe ɔbiara mba ɔle gɔ ɔ̃asu ɔbara ala awawãra ne.
Iiɖe ɔbiara mba ɔle gɔ masɛ masu masa sinyɛ ɣee maɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã ɣee maɖi ara wa maɣɛ karɔ̃.
Ne ɔso misu mi situ misia i karatã ga lokɔlɛ kato kaɖo iso.
Kiniɔ ne, loate mi nnɛ lonya iɖo wã ɔɖuɖu.
Si loawo siɖe agbãagbã wa i maturi gu Ɣaa makpabo ɔɖuɖu sɛ maɣɛ ɔɣɛ fiɛ loisɛ loɖɔɛ maturi ne, wũ kutsuɛ iɣɛ ɔɖuɖu ne, siefe kere iɖe lɛ ipoodzɛ mato masa.
Si loawo Ɣaa kanya ɔɖi fiɛ loanɔ awɛrɛra karɔ̃, loba inɔgba ɔɖuɖu fiɛ loba kafɔkaɖe ga loawo abe ɔrui fiɛ lona kuɖɔɛ ne, loiɖe kuira.
Si losu wũ karana ɔɖuɖu lotã mawɛrɛba fiɛ lotã matsuedza me ɣɛɛ lona kuɖɔɛ lotã maturi ne, loiɖe kuira.
Kuɖɔɛ sɛ kuɣara so, kuba kayiribielea. Kuisɛ kubɛbɛ anɔ, kuisɛ kukɔlɛ so kato, kuisɛ kuɖe ndamu.
Kuɖɔɛ na atsuele, kuisɛ kubie kɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ, kuisɛ kuna sikpã malamala. Kuɖɔɛ iisɛ kumɔɛ̃ akpi kupia i ɔtu ame dzoroo.
Kuisɛ kuna isoɣɔ i ikpi iso. Ɣɛɛ so sɛ siɣɔ kɔ̃ i isɛɛ iso.
Kuɖɔɛ sɛ kufɔ ira biara pɔkɔsɔɔ, nrɔɔ̃ iisɛ mifɛ̃ kɔ̃ i ɔriinyɔ gu kafɔkaɖe ame, kuɖɔɛ ba ɔdzini.
Kuɖɔɛ na kawirikɔ̃. Ɣaa kanya iɖi to iafe, siɖe agbãagbã iɣɛ to iafe, fiɛ inɔgba ana ɔwi to ɔ̃afe.
Alasɔ inɔgba gu kanya iɖi karatã ga i Ɣaa ɔtã bo ne, iiro ɔyi.
Ɔwi gɔ i nnɛ loyi iro aaba ne, iyɔ nnɛ loiro ɔyi ɔwi to ɔ̃afe.
Ɔwi gɔ loɖe ɔbiɛtɛ ne, loɖe ika lɛ ɔbiɛtɛ awe, lobu iti ame lɛ ɔbiɛtɛ fiɛ wũ ara karɔ̃ inɔ ana ɔse lɛ ɔbiɛtɛ. Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ gɔ loɔmɔ ne, loɔnyua sibiɛtɛ ɔwi ara losɛ ala ana me kusia.

Ara wa boto bonyɔ kiniɔ ne, boto bonya furufuru lɛ aɣɔɣɔɛ ame boto bonyɔ. Kama kama ne, boto boanya ara anɔ ku anɔ. Ara wa loɣe kiniɔ ne, aiyi pelepele ɣɛɛ kama kama ne, nto loatsue wã kukaakɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ ame i Ɣaa ɣe me kukaakɔ.
Ne ɔso ne, ara ka atɛ aɖe mpia. Wã nɖe kafɔkaɖe, ɔriinyɔ gu kuɖɔɛ. Ɣɛɛ nnɛ lomɔ iɖo i wã ɔɖuɖu ame nɖe kuɖɔɛ.
Ne ɔso kuɖɔɛ si kuɖe nnɛ miatere misiai miɖo, ɣɛɛ mibie siwarã ame karatã mama ana titirio Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya iɖi.
Ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã ne, iiɖe maturi ɔto ɔɖegu ika ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔto. Alasɔ kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔnɔ karɔ̃, ɣɛɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ ara wɛrɛa iki i Siwarã Bielea ɔle ame.
Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖi Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya ɔtã maturi ne, ɔsɛ ɔbuai ma sɔ maamɔ, ɔpia ma ɔle gu kaɣɔra.
Ngɔ nto ɔɣɛ siɖe dzɛ i kuwɛ̃ iito ɔnɔ karɔ̃ ne, ɔ̃ kere nto ɔbuai so. Ɣɛɛ ɔturi gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me ne, ɔsɛ ɔbuai mafɔɖedze ikuri ɔɖuɖu.

Ito me ɔkã sɔ mi ɔɖuɖu aawo siɖe agbãagbã ɔɣɛ. Ɣɛɛ si miawo Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya ɔɖi ɔtã maturi ne, iawe me ɔmɛrɛ̃ ibua.
