Alasɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖi Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya ɔtã maturi ne, ɔba kusia ɔɖo ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã, ɣɛɛ si ɔrere pia gɔ ɔ̃awo ara wa ɔto ɔɣɛ karɔ̃ ɔɖi ne, iyɔ mafɔɖedze ikuri to iana katɔ̃ isɛ.

Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii, si loba mi kɔrɛ fiɛ nto loɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã dzɛ miito minɔ karɔ̃ ne, mme kusia miana miɖi i ne ame? Ɣɛɛ si loba ku Ɣaa iɖi ite irere ɣee inɔgba irere ɣee Ɣaa itɔ̃me irere ɣee ara ite irere ne, iaɖe mi kusia.
Ngbɔ ame ise i kadadã gu ɔsango gɔ ame ngbã na ɣɛɛ si mafɛ̃ ne, isɛ iɖi silɔ. Si silɔ agbãagbã iibɔrɛ kukaakɔ ne, nda maabara maatsue kuka gɔ ɔturi to ɔfɛ̃?
Si ngɔ lofɛ̃ kadadã iifɛ̃ kukaakɔ ɔte nnɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ ne, nda i maturi aaledza so matã kakpã?
Ngbɔ ame ise i ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ ara i siɖe agbãagbã ame fiɛ maturi iito manɔ nnɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ karɔ̃ ne. Ɔwiri ame kere ɔto ɔɖe ika ɔpia.
Siɖe agbã gbodzoo pia i kayiiso fiɛ ku siɖe na dzɛ nna karɔ̃.
Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere iito ɔnɔ siɖe dzɛ nto loɣɛ ne, iyɔ loɖe ɔfɔ i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ wũ ɔɖe ɔfɔ i wũ kɔrɛ.
Gɔ anɔ ɔrɛtɛ mi mito mibie siwarã ame karatã ne, mitã sɔ mi anɔ aarɛtɛ i karatã ga loamɔra mafɔɖedze ikuri iso.
Ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã si ɔtã Ɣaa iti sɔ atã wũ siɖe karɔ̃ iɖi si ɔ̃awo nnɛ ɔɣɛ karɔ̃ ɔɖi.
Alasɔ si nto lokparama kayi i siɖe dzɛ loito lonɔ ame ne, wũ siwarã siɖe nto sikparama kayi ɣɛɛ iiɖe wũ adzuni.
Ne ɔso be loabara? Loakparama kayi gu wũ siwarã, ɣɛɛ loakparamagu wũ adzuni fiɛ loaka kuka ana ku wũ siwarã gu wũ adzuni.
Fiɛ si aɣɛ apɛ Ɣaa siba i fɔ siwarã ame kerekere ne, nda i fɔ ɔlaa gɔ nɣɛ i fɔ kɔrɛ aabara fiɛ ɔ̃anɔ nnɛ ato aɣɛ fiɛ ɔ̃atɔrã ɔsia sɔ iba ngbɔ gɔ ɔ̃inɔ nnɛ aɣɛ karɔ̃?
Iawo ɔɖe sɔ tee abua apɛ Ɣaa siba, ɣɛɛ maturi tsɔra iina kusia i fɔ kayi ikparama ame.
Nto lopɛ Ɣaa siba sɔ nsɛ loɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã loɖo mi ɔɖuɖu.
Ɣɛɛ i kasarɛkɔ̃ ne, loabie sɔ loaɣɛ atɔ̃me aru wa loasu lote maturi ara iɖo sɔ loaɣɛ atɔ̃me gbodzoo wa nna karɔ̃ i siɖe agbãagbã ame i maturi kɔrɛ.
Wũ manyii midaabara so mabiɛtɛ i mi adzuni ame. Miɖe mabiɛtɛ i akpi ibara ame ɣɛɛ i mi adzuni ame ne, miɖe mma loɔkpa anɔ.
I Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, Bosate ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Loaɖegu wũ maturi ika i
sifɔɖe ame gu iki i mafɔ iso.
Ɣɛɛ nnɛmɔ kɔra iibatã makã me atsue.”
Ne ɔso siɖe agbãagbã iɣɛ ne, ikparĩ iɖe itã mma loifɔ maɖe. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me iɣɛ ne, mafɔɖedze karabara kaɖe, iiɖe mma loifɔ maɖe.
Ne ɔso si mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ɔba maasakanya fiɛ ɔbiara ɔtsɛ siɖe agbãagbã iɣɛ fiɛ mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze pia i mi ndɛ̃ ne, maibaɣɛ sɔ mito milala?

Ɣɛɛ si mi ndɛ̃ ɔbiara to miɖi Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya fiɛ ɔturi fefea gɔ loiɖe fɔɖedze ɔba mi ndɛ̃ ne, ɔto ɔ̃ana ɔnɔ itɔ̃me iwɛ̃ ibara karabara i ɔ̃ iso. Ɔ̃asu itɔ̃me nɛ ɔnɔ ɔɣɛgu so atɔ̃me sɔ kpibaradze ɔɖe.
Ara wɛrɛa wa mpia i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame to aabɔrɛ aba ɔgbami itã sɔ ɔ̃abɔ sɔ karɔ̃ ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ ɔle Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Gbaã, Ɣaa pia i mi ndɛ̃!”

Wũ manyii, nnɛ lobie sɔ loaɣɛ lobua i mi isarɛ iso nɖe sɔ, si miba miasakanya sɔ miakparama kayi ne, ɔmɔi ba kuka, ɔmama ara ite, ɔmama ba iɖi ite. Ɔmɔi ana aaɣɛ itɔ̃me i siɖe agbãagbã ame, fiɛ ɔmama ana ba siɖe agbã mama karɔ̃ iɖi sɔ ɔ̃aɖi nnɛ maɣɛ karɔ̃. Minyɔ sɔ ira biara nɛ miabara ne, iatã mafɔɖedze ikuri aamɔ ibua.
Si ɔrere ba itɔ̃me i siɖe agbãagbã ame ne, ma inyɔ ɣee itɛ kere si ma nɣɛ isia isia. Ɣɛɛ ɔmama si ɔɖi nnɛ maɣɛ karɔ̃.
Ɣɛɛ si kuwɛ̃ na gɔ ɔ̃aɖi nnɛ mato maɣɛ karɔ̃ ne, iyɔ ma ɔbiara si ɔlo i kasarɛkɔ̃ si ɔɖegu Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ ika.
Maturi inyɔ ɣee itɛ ma lofɔ silɔ mabɔrɛgu i Ɣaa kɔrɛ kere si ma nɣɛ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣere ma. Ma tsɔra si marɛrɛ ne ame kukaakɔ manyɔ.
Si mma nsi i kasarɛkɔ̃ mmɔ ɔrere ɔfɔ silɔ ɔbɔrɛgu i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, ngɔ nto ɔɖe ika si ɔlo tɔtɔ si ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔlaa ɔri.
Ɔri pia sɔ mi ɔɖuɖu aaɣɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ miɣɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ si ɔbiara aawo ira ɔsuã fiɛ miapia so ɔle.
Ɔle gɔ masɛ maɣɛ ala Ɣaa itɔ̃me ne, ɔpia i ngɔ nto ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me ame sɔ ɔ̃awo ɔɖe so iso.
Alasɔ Ɣaa sɛ ɔbie sɔ bobara ira biara i ɔri iso gu isobuɛ ame.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ ise i mafɔɖedze ikuri biara ame ne,
marɔ̃go si malo i mi kasarɛkɔ̃ sɔ maibaɖe ika. Mana ɔri sɔ maaɖe ika, ɣɛɛ mabɔ so karɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa mmara ɔte awe.
Si mato mabie sɔ maakarɛ irere manɔ ne, makarɛ ma marã si maɔbo iyo. Alasɔ iba kunuarɛ sɔ ɔrɔ̃go ata ɔya ɔɖe ika i mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃.
Mi kɔrɛ i Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔgɔdɛ̃? Ɛɛbɛrɛ mi kɔrɛ pɛ i Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔɔbo?
Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ɔbu sɔ Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔɖe ɣee Siwarã Bielea pia i ɔ̃ ame ne, ɔ̃atsue sɔ nnɛ nto lote ne, ngbɔ i Ɣaa ɔbie sɔ ise ne.
Si ɔrere ɔsɛ̃ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, mi wũ misɛ̃ ɔnyiiɔ.
Ne ɔso wũ manyii, misu mi anɔ ɔɖuɖu misia i Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya iɖi iso, ɣɛɛ midaanyua siɖe agbãagbã iɣɛ.
Mibara ira biara i ɔri iso i isekele ame.
Wũ manyii, kiniɔ ne, lobie sɔ minyigi Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loɣere mi fiɛ mifɔ ne, fiɛ miɣɛ teteree i ne ame.
Si mimɔɛ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loɣere mi mila teteree ne, miana ngbã, si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, iyɔ mi kafɔkaɖe na kusia kukuwɛ̃.
Nnɛ lofɔ lobɔrɛgu i Bosate kɔrɛ losu nto lotã mi. Nnɛ lofɔ kuɣa iɖo pelepele nɖe sɔ, Kristo ɔkpi i bo akpi iti lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔte.
Mabiara wũ, fiɛ Ɣaa ɔtara wũ ɔɖi i makpise ndɛ̃ i akpɛnɛ atɛ kama i Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya.
Ɔɖi so ɔte Petro gu katɔ̃memasɛdze iweo-inyɔ.
Ne kama ne, ɔɖi so ɔte ɔ̃ masiaidze ma loɖo maturi alafa aru ana. Ma gbodzoo si ngbã ipɛ i nɔme ɣɛɛ ma mawɛ̃ ɔɔkpi koko.
Ne kama ne, ɔɖi so ɔte Yakobo gu katɔ̃memasɛdze tsɔra ɔɖuɖu.
Katsɔrakɔ̃ ne, ɔɖi so ɔte me gɔ maɣe kamakama.
Alasɔ mme nɖe ɔtsɔra i katɔ̃memasɛdze ndɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu, fiɛ loikote sɔ maarɔ me sɔ katɔ̃mesɛdze alasɔ loti mafɔɖedze kama lobara ma kako.

Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ ɔso fiɛ loɖe nnɛ loɖe kiniɔ. Ɔ̃ kayiribielea ana iiɖe siefe, alasɔ loɔbara karabara teteree loɖo katɔ̃memasɛdze tsɔra ɔɖuɖu, ɣɛɛ iiɖe mme mɔmɔ ɔle ame lobara, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔle gɔ nto ɔbara karabara i wũ ame ɔɖe.
Ne ɔso mme loɣere mi irere o-o, ma loɣere mi o-o ne, ira ka iwɛ̃ nɛmɔ kere boto boɣɛ fiɛ ne mifɔ miɖe ne.
Kiniɔ ne, gɔ bo itɔ̃me nɛ boto boɣɛ nɖe sɔ Ɣaa ɔtara Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ndɛ̃ ne, be ɔso i mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa iisibatara makpise ɔbɔ ngbã?
Si gbaã iɖe ne, ite sɔ Ɣaa iitara Kristo ɔ̃ wũ ɔɖi i makpise ndɛ̃.
Fiɛ si Ɣaa iitara Kristo ɔɖi i makpise ndɛ̃ ne, iyɔ bona kuira nɛ boapɛ imomo fiɛ mi kafɔkaɖe ana ɖe siefe.
Nnɛ lonyanyarĩ iɖo kɔra nɖe sɔ ne, ite sɔ boto bola sila bosia Ɣaa iso sɔ ɔtara Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ndɛ̃. Fiɛ si gbaã i makpise iibata ne, iyɔ ɔ̃itara Kristo ɔ̃ wũ.
Ne ɔso si makpise iibata ne, iyɔ mitsue sɔ Ɣaa iitara Kristo ana ɔɖi i makpise ndɛ̃.
Fiɛ si Ɣaa iitara Kristo ɔɖi i makpise ndɛ̃ gbaã ne, iyɔ mi kafɔkaɖe na kusia kukuwɛ̃, fiɛ mikpese mipia i mi akpi ame.
Ne karɔ̃ ana nɖe sɔ, Kristo mafɔɖedze ma loɔkpi ana ɔwɔ.
Si ngbã mɛgbe ame ɔnɔwɛ̃ boba ɔriinyɔ i Kristo ame ne, iyɔ bo nɖe mma mba nnya boɖo pelepele i kayiiso.
Ɣɛɛ gbagbaã iɖe sɔ Ɣaa ɔtara Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ndɛ̃. Ne nɖe bo ayaikama sɔ mma ɔɖuɖu lokpi ne, mato maaledza ita.
Alasɔ kumɛgɔ ame iki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ iso i kukpi ɔba i maturi ndɛ̃ ne, ngbɔ ame ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ndɛ̃ ana aaki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ iso iba ne.
Kumɛgɔ ame i kukpi ɔba maturi ɔɖuɖu iso alasɔ boɖe Adam mawa ɔso ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa to ɔ̃aledza maturi ɔɖuɖu itara ibɔrɛgu i makpise ndɛ̃ iki Kristo iso ne.
Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atara ɔbiara i ɔwi gɔ lokote iso. Kristo loɖe katɔ̃ iyɔ ne kama mma lofɔ wũ maɖe ata ku ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃aledza ikpese iba.
Ne kama ne, kawirikɔ̃ to kaaba, Kristo to ɔ̃awɔra atakere, maturi kanya mayadze, sile gu siwarã ame sile dzɛ nto siɖe iso ɔɖuɖu. Ɔto ɔ̃asu sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔpia i ɔ̃ Ɔse Ɣaa nrɔɔ̃ ame.
Alasɔ Kristo to ɔ̃aɖe iso gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa aasu ɔ̃ matsirise ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i Kristo ngba kayirinɔ.
Tsirise tsɔra gɔ ɔ̃awɔra nɖe kukpi.
Alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ara ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i ɔ̃ ngba kayirinɔ.” Fiɛ ikpa sekelee sɔ ara ɔɖuɖu ne, Ɣaa gɔ losu wã ɔpia Kristo kayirinɔ ne, Ɔ̃ibua i wã iso.
Fiɛ si Ɣaa ɔɔsu ara ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i Kristo kayirinɔ ɔro ne, Kristo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔbi ana to ɔ̃asu so ɔpia i Ɣaa kayirinɔ sɔ Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã aaɖe ara ɔɖuɖu iso.

Kiniɔ ne, mma lofɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara i mma loɔkpi koko iti ne, be loabɔrɛ i ne ame itã ma? Si gbaã iɖe lɛ kumɛgɔ i mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ sɔ makpise ita kuiwɛ̃ na ne, be ɔso i mmamɔ to mafɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara i mma loɔkpi koko iti?
Ana ne bo ɣɛɛ? Be ɔso fiɛ bo ngbã aawe i imɔrɛ̃ ame ɔwi biara?
Wũ manyii, kukpi to kugbere me kasɛ̃ i kakɔme! Wũ kato ikɔlɛso i mi iti sɔ miabara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu ɔso nto loɖi nnɛgbe loɣɛ.

Si maturi kuɣɛme kere ɔso fiɛ lokpɛ̃gu maturi ma nse lɛ mabɔi lalaa i Efeso ne, mme kusia lona loɖi i ne ame? Fiɛ si maturi iisibata mabɔrɛ i makpise ame gbaã ne, iyɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ mapɛ igbã sɔ ne, “Mitã boɖe si bonɛ, alasɔ kɔrãkaɖe boto boakpi,” ɖe ɔnukuare.
Midaassɔsɔla so. Kulaa nyanyarĩa sɛ kunina ɔturi sɛɛ.
Mikpese miba mi ame si minyua mi akpi siri misɛ si mibara ara i ɔri iso. Nto loɣere mi sekelee si kunuarɛ si kukpɛ̃ mi sɔ mi mawɛ̃ iiɣe Ɣaa.
Ɔwɛ̃ aakarɛ sɔ, “Nda i makpise aabara fiɛ maaledza ita? Siturina simele igbã maawe?”
Iikpa mi! Si mipia ɔraɖui i karɔ̃ ame ne, iisɛ ire si iiɖe katɔ̃ iburi.
Fiɛ ɔraɖui gɔ apia i karɔ̃ ame ne, ibi kere iɖe lɛ itita ɣee idziribi irere. Ɣɛɛ si ire ne, isɛ ikpaki ibɔrɛ i kumɛgɔ ise fiɛ apia ne i karɔ̃ ame.
Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã idziribi nɛgbe kumiamia gɔ ɔ̃ ɔɖɔɛ. Ɔsɛ ɔtã ɔraɖui biara kumiamia gɔ lokotegu wũ.
Ara wa ɔɖuɖu mba ngbã sosina iikote. Maturi awune sosina pia, ngbɔ ame nɖe mabɔi, kurodzai gu ndu ame kufarai sire ne, ira biara ku ne sire.
Ara wa i kuɖokpo ame pia fiɛ karɔ̃ iso are ana pia. Kato ara kulɛ ɔkpaki ibɔrɛ i karɔ̃ ara iso.
Kuɣɛ̃ ba kɔ̃ ifiɛ, fiɛ ɔgbaworeti ana ba ɔ̃ ifiɛ. Awãmi ifiɛ ana ɔkpaki. I awãmi kerekere ndɛ̃ ne, ibiara ba kumɛgɔ isɛ ifiɛ.
Ngbɔ ame kere iase ku kawirikɔ̃ gɔ Ɣaa aatara makpise mawe ngbã ne. Ɔwi gɔ mabiara ma ne, siturina dzɛ nsɛ siburi siɖe mawe, ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ ka maata ne, maisibakpi.
Ɔwi gɔ mabiara wũ ne, ɔnyɔ nyanyarĩ, ɖɔbɔrɔɔ, ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ ame ɔ̃ata ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ne, ɔ̃are situri fiɛ ɔ̃awe ɔle ana.
Ɔwi gɔ mabiara wũ ne, kayiiso siturina dzɛ loakpi siɖe.
Ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ ka ɔ̃ata ne, siwarã ame sosina ɔ̃atagu ala. Si kayiiso siturina pia ne, iyɔ siwarã ame sire ana pia.
Alasɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, ipia sɔ, “Ɔturi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ nɖe Adam ne, Ɣaa ɔbara wũ gbanadze.” Ɣɛɛ Adam tsɔra gɔgbe ne, ɔ̃ nɖe Siwarã dzɛ nsɛ sitã ngbã ne.
Iiɖe Siwarã ame ɔre kere loɖe katɔ̃, ɣɛɛ sosina ame ɔre fiɛ kini i siwarã ame ɔre ɔsiai.
Adam ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ i Ɣaa ɔbara ne, sise mapɔ wũ ala. Ɣɛɛ Adam tsɔra ne, Kato ɔbɔrɛ.
Mma nɖe kayiiso maturi ne, mase lɛ ngɔ mapɔ maɖi i sise ame. Ɣɛɛ mma nɖe kato mare ne, mase lɛ ngɔ lobɔrɛ i kato.
Ne ɔso kumɛgɔ ame bopia siturina lɛ ngɔ mapɔ maɖi i sise ame ne, ngbɔ ame boapia ngɔ lobɔrɛ i kato kumiamia ne.
Wũ manyii nnɛ nto loɣɛ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ, siturina gu ima iibawo Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame ɔbo. Ira nɛ nsɛ ikpi ne, iibawo ɔse sɔ iisibakpi inya.

Minɔ iwɛrɛra nɛgbe. Bo ɔɖuɖu iibakpi. Ɣɛɛ i kadadã tsɔra ire ame ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃afinikira bo kumiamia. Ɔ̃abara ne fiɛ aama inɔmi abusi. Alasɔ si kadadã ɔbɛ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atara makpise sɔ maisibaledza ikpi manya fiɛ ɔ̃afinikira bo kumiamia.

Minɔ iwɛrɛra nɛgbe. Bo ɔɖuɖu iibakpi. Ɣɛɛ i kadadã tsɔra ire ame ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃afinikira bo kumiamia. Ɔ̃abara ne fiɛ aama inɔmi abusi. Alasɔ si kadadã ɔbɛ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atara makpise sɔ maisibaledza ikpi manya fiɛ ɔ̃afinikira bo kumiamia.
Alasɔ ira nɛ nsɛ inina ne, maafinikira ne makpesera nnɛ loisɛ inina. Ira nɛ nsɛ ikpi ana ne, maafinikira ne nnɛ loisibakpi.
Ne ɔso si iɔba sɔ mafinikira ira nɛ nsɛ ikpi ikpese nnɛ loisɛ ikpi ne, iyɔ Ɔko Sekelea ame itɔ̃me nɛ loɣɛ sɔ, “Maɔwɔra kukpi, iɖe iso ɔɔba!” aaba i ne ame.
Matsɛrɛ ana sɔ.
“Kukpi, fɔ iɖe iso ɣɛɛ?
Fiɛ ɔle gɔ asɛ ata bo ala ɣɛɛ?”
Kukpi sɛ kuna kɔ̃ ɔle kuɖoe bo iki ikpi iso. Ikpi nɛ wũ ne, ne ɔle ɔbɔrɛ i mmara ame.
Ɣɛɛ bopɛ Ɣaa gɔ lotã bo iɖe iso iki i Bosate Yesu Kristo ame.
Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii ma loipia kuɣɛ, miya teteree sɔ miibarɔ̃. Mimɔɛ̃ Bosate karabara mila kukaakɔ alasɔ miɣe sɔ ira biara nɛ miabara mitã Bosate ne, iibaɖe siefe.
Kiniɔ ne, i nnɛ mitsɛrɛ mikarɛ me i karatã ga miasu mibuai mafɔɖedze akuri i Yudea iso ne, mibara nnɛ loɣere mafɔɖedze ma i Galatia sɔ mabara.
Kɔsiɖa biara ne, ɔbiara si ɔɖi ira ɔsɛ i ɔ̃ karabara kanya sɔ si loba ne, ara ito kuiwɛ̃ iisibawe.
Si loba ne, loatsɛrɛ ɔko lotã mma i mi mɔmɔ miɖi sɔ masu mi karatã makɛlɛgu Yerusalem.
Si inya sɔ mme wũ losiai ma ne, iyɔ bo ɔɖuɖu ka boakɛlɛ.
Nto loaki i Makedonia fiɛ loabo mi kɔrɛ alasɔ loɣɛ sɔ loaki i mmɔ tɔtɔ.
Ito ibara me sɔ nto loaɖe ayi arɛ̃saã i mi kɔrɛ mmɔ. Siainyɔ ɔyu ɔwi ɔɖuɖu ne, nto loawe i mi kɔrɛ fiɛ ka miaɖi me ɔri loakɛlɛ ngbegɔ loakɛlɛ.
Loito lobie sɔ loatere ise lorui i mi kɔrɛ ɣɛɛ loawe isɛ iabo ɔwi gɔ i Bosate aatã me.
Loawe i Efeso ngbe isɛ iabo Pentekoste iyi iso.
Ɔri siare ɔbusi ngbe ɔtã karabara ga lofɔ kuɣa gbaã atoa sɔ matsirise gbodzoo ɔta maɣɛ me iso.
Si Timoteo ɔba mi kɔrɛ ne, mifɔ wũ kukaakɔ alasɔ Bosate karabara kaɖe ɔto ɔbara lɛ kumɛgɔ nto lobara awe.
Midaanyɔ wũ lɛ ɔbiɛtɛ ɣɛɛ mibuai wũ sɔ ɔ̃ irisɛ aasɛ katɔ̃ i isobuɛ ame sɔ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃atu me alasɔ nto lonyɔ ɔri sɔ ma gu bo manyii tsɔra aaba.
I bo ɔnyii Apolo itɔ̃me iso ne, loɔɣere wũ ɔwi gbodzoo sɔ ɔ̃ gu mafɔɖedze mama si maba maanyɔ mi ɣɛɛ ɔ̃itɔrã sɔ ɔ̃aba kiniɔ. Si ɔna ɔri ɔwi mama ɣɛɛ ne, ɔto ɔ̃aba.
Midzuɛ̃ so si miya teteree i kafɔkaɖe ame. Mina ɔtu si miwe ɔle.
Mibara mi karabara ɔɖuɖu i kuɖɔɛ ame.
Miɣe Stefana gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi. Ma nɖe maturi ɖeakatɔ̃ ma lofiniki i Akaia ibuti ame. Masu so matã Ɣaa maturi ibuai. Wũ manyii, loto mi i kukpa
sɔ minyɔ mmagbe igbã nsɛgbai gu mama ma lobuai mapia kube i karabara ame si mitã sɔ ma igbã loakɔkɔ mi.
So ɔɣɔ me sɔ Stefana gu Fotunato gu Akaiko ɔba maabo alasɔ ise me lɛ mi loɔnya.
Matã sɔ so ɔɣɔ me gbaã ɔle ɣɛtɛ ɔba me lɛ kumɛgɔ iba-ɔ iso. Lɛ sɔ boasia maturi magbe igbã ikparĩ bowarɛ ma.
Mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Asia karɔ̃ iso ɔɖuɖu ɔya mi o-o! Akwila gu Priskila gu ikuri nɛ nsɛ isarɛ i ma iyo sɔ maya mi kukaakɔ i Bosate iyere ame.
Manyii ma ɔɖuɖu mpia ngbe ɔya mi o-o!
Miya so i kuɖɔɛ ame lɛ manyii awe.
Mme mɔmɔ kɔrɔ̃ losu lotsɛrɛ sɔ, “Mme Paulo mme nto loya mi o-o!”
Ɔturi biara gɔ loisɛ ɔɖɔɛ Bosate ne, sigbarĩ si siba i ɔnyiiɔ iso. O Bosate, ba!
Bosate Yesu nnyainyɔ si iwegu mi.
Wũ kuɖɔɛ si kuwegu mi i Yesu Kristo iyere ame. Si iba ngbɔ.
II Corinthians: Mme Paulo gɔ iki i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ame loɖe Bosate Kristo Yesu katɔ̃mesɛdze gu wũ ɔnyii Timoteo lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe botã Ɣaa mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Korinto gu mma ɔɖuɖu nɖe Ɣaa mare i Akaia karɔ̃ iso mmɔ.
Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
Mitã bopɛ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo Ɔse siba, nnyainyɔ Ɔse gɔ kɔrɛ i bo ibuai ɔɖuɖu sɛ ibɔrɛ.
Ɔsɛ ɔpia bo kɔrɔ̃ i kayiri i inyɛwe biara ame sɔ bo wũ boawo bo malaa ma mpia i inyɛwe biara ame ɔbuai. Ibuai nɛ igbã bofɔ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, ne ame igbã boasu bobuai maturi ne.
Kumɛgɔ ame boba kaɖekɔ̃ i Kristo inyɛwe gbodzoo ame ne, ngbɔ ame iki i ɔ̃ ame bosɛ bona Ɣaa ibuai siare ana ne.

Si mabara bo ɔtile ne, mabara ngbɔ sɔ si Ɣaa aabuai mi, ɔfɔ mi ɔpia ngbã. Si mabuai bo ne, mabara ngbɔ sɔ si Ɣaa aabuai mi sɔ miawo ɔya teteree i inyɛwe kanya lɛ kumɛgɔ bo wũ bosɛ boya teteree i inyɛwe nɛmɔ igbã kanya.
Boba ɔriinyɔ nɛ loibati inya i mi ame alasɔ boɣe sɔ kumɛgɔ ame miwe inyɛ lɛ bo ne, ngbɔ ame ana i Ɣaa aabuai mi lɛ ɔbuai bo ne.
Wũ manyii, bobie sɔ bonyigira mi inyɛwe nɛ bona i Asia karɔ̃ iso. Mabara bo amumuɣɔ sɔ ɔle ɔro bo iso fiɛ boyu ɔriinyɔ sɔ boakpese bowe ngbã kɔra.
Ibara bo lɛ kukpi ipɔ maɔtã bo! Ɣɛɛ iba ngbɔ sɔ si boasu bo ɔriinyɔ bosia i Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtara makpise ɔbɔ ngbã iso ne, iiɖe bo mɔmɔ iso.
Ɔɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i kukpi ɔgba ame fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃aɖi bo ana. Gbaã ne, boto bonyɔ ɔri sɔ ɔto ɔ̃aɖi bo ana,
ala miɣɛgu bo i kayi ikparama ame. Iyɔ maturi gbodzoo aapɛ Ɣaa siba i bo iti sɔ ɔnyɔ bo nnya ɔkã kayi ikparama gbodzoo atsue.

Nnɛ ɔso bosɛ boɖe ndamu nɖe sɔ, bo situ iisɛ sitã bo ipɔ alasɔ bomɔɛ̃ so bola i maturi ɔɖuɖu gu titirio mi ndɛ̃. Iiɖe maturi inɔgba ame i nnɛgbe ɔbɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa nsɛ ɔnyɔ bo nnya sɔ boabusi bo situ boɣere mi ɔnukuare.

Ara wa miawo ɔka ɔnɔ karɔ̃ kere aɖe botsɛrɛ botã mi. Atoa sɔ kiniɔ ne miinɔ bo karɔ̃ miro. Nto lonyɔ ɔri sɔ miaba mianɔ bo karɔ̃ ku ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu aaledza iba fiɛ miaɖe ndamu i bo iso lɛ kumɛgɔ bo wũ boaɖe i mi iso.

Ara wa miawo ɔka ɔnɔ karɔ̃ kere aɖe botsɛrɛ botã mi. Atoa sɔ kiniɔ ne miinɔ bo karɔ̃ miro. Nto lonyɔ ɔri sɔ miaba mianɔ bo karɔ̃ ku ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu aaledza iba fiɛ miaɖe ndamu i bo iso lɛ kumɛgɔ bo wũ boaɖe i mi iso.

Gɔ loɣe nnɛgbe kukaakɔ ɔso ne, lobara adzuni sɔ si loto lofe Makedonia ne, tee loaki i mi kɔrɛ fiɛ si loɔkpese ana ne, loaledza mmɔ iki sɔ miaɖi me ɔri fiɛ loakɛlɛ Yudea. Si iba ngbɔ ne iyɔ miana isoɣɔ ikpɛ inyɔ.

Gɔ loɣe nnɛgbe kukaakɔ ɔso ne, lobara adzuni sɔ si loto lofe Makedonia ne, tee loaki i mi kɔrɛ fiɛ si loɔkpese ana ne, loaledza mmɔ iki sɔ miaɖi me ɔri fiɛ loakɛlɛ Yudea. Si iba ngbɔ ne iyɔ miana isoɣɔ ikpɛ inyɔ.
Gɔ lobara adzuni wamɔ fiɛ lofinikira wã ne, iite sɔ nto lokpɔkpɔtɔra mi i wũ adzuni ifinikira malamala ame sɔ loɣɛ aĩ lokpese loɣɛ sɔ ooɣo lɛ kayiiso maturi awe.
Ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔbara i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iso gbaã ne, ngbɔ ame i nnɛ botsɛrɛ botã mi iiɖe aĩ gu ooɣo ne.
Ɣaa ɔbi Yesu Kristo gɔ iso itɔ̃me i mme gu Silvano gu Timoteo ɔɣere mi ne, ɔ̃iɖe aĩ gu ooɣo ɔturi ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ aĩ ɔwi biara ɔɖe.
Alasɔ ɔ̃ nɖe aĩ ɔtã Ɣaa itɔ̃me biara nɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ i bo iso. Ne ɔso fiɛ iki Yesu Kristo iso ne, bosɛ boɣɛ sɔ, “Si iba ngbɔ,” itã Ɣaa iyere kato ikɔlɛ.
Ɣaa ɔtã sɔ bo gu mi ɔɖuɖu ɖe mawɛ̃ ku Kristo fiɛ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ loɖi bo ɔsɛ ise sɔ boabara ɔ̃ karabara.
Ɔ̃ ɔɖe losɛ bo ikpo sɔ ɔ̃ mare boɖe gɔ ɔsu ɔ̃ Siwarã Bielea ɔpia i bo ame. Siwarã dzɛgbe nɖe ayaikama itã ara wa ɔledza ɔsɛ ɔtã bo ne.
Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɣe sɔ nto loɖɔɛ mi fiɛ nnya kere lonyɔ mi ɔso loiba Korinto.
Boito bobie sɔ nnɛ bofɔ boɖe ne, boasɛ̃ bopia mi, ɣɛɛ boto bobaragu mi karabara sɔ miana isoɣɔ alasɔ mi kafɔkaɖe ɣɛ teteree koko.
Ne ɔso lobara adzuni sɔ loito loba mi kɔrɛ loba loapia mi isoma ne.
Alasɔ si lopia mi isoma ne, nna loakpese ɔpia me isoɣɔ? Kuwɛ̃ siina iɖo mi ma ame lobiɛ situ.
Ne ɔso lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔmɔ losese mi ne. Ala loibie sɔ loaba loapia mma ame lopia me isoɣɔ isoma. Alasɔ lofɔ loɖe sɔ si loba isoɣɔ ne, iyɔ mi wũ miba isoɣɔ.
Gbaã ɔko gɔ lotsɛrɛ losese mi ne, lotsɛrɛ wũ ku iɖaa gbodzoo gu ɔtu gɔ mba ɔrɔrã gu nnɔmɛ gbodzoo. Iiɖe wũ adzuni loɖe sɔ loapia mi isoma, ɣɛɛ si lote mi kumɛgɔ loto loɖɔɛ mi.
Ne ɔso si ɔrere ikpi ibara ɔpia mi isoma ne, iiɖe wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ iɖe ɔpia isoma, ɣɛɛ boawo ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔpia mi ɔɖuɖu isoma. Loito lobie sɔ miafe wũ inyagalagu.
Ka ilɛ sɔ mi kasɛ siare ɔɔkpadzɛ̃ wũ kutsue koko.
Kiniɔ ne, ka misu mitsɛ wũ si mipia wũ katetere sɔ ɔ̃ibabo i imararãso ame itã ɔkpese kama pelepele.
Loto mi i kukpa sɔ miɖi mite wũ sɔ mito miɖɔɛ wũ ipɛ i kiniɔ.
Ne ɔso lotsɛrɛ mi ɔko sɔ si lodzuĩ kumɛgɔ miɣɛ teteree gu si mito mibie sɔ miabara i ara wa lote mi iso.
Si misu ɔrere ikpi mitsɛ wũ ne, iyɔ mme wũ losu lotsɛ wũ. Fiɛ si irere pia kɔra gɔ loasu lotsɛ ne, loasu lotsɛ i Kristo katɔ̃ ala mi ɔso.
Nnɛgbe loatã sɔ boatɛ̃ Tsirise ɔri sɔ ɔ̃ibana ɔri kuwɛ̃ i bo iso alasɔ boɣe ɔ̃ siri lalaa.
Ɔwi gɔ loba sɔ loaɣɛ Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea i Troa ne, lonya sɔ Bosate ɔbusi ɔri sɔ loabara ɔ̃ karabara i mmɔ.
Ɣɛɛ wũ ɔtu iitã me iwarã kuiwɛ̃ alasɔ loinya wũ ɔnyii Tito i mmɔ. Ne ɔso lomala ma so lorui lokɛlɛ Makedonia.

Ɣɛɛ bopɛ Ɣaa siba sɔ iki i kumɛgɔ bobara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo ɔso ne, ɔsɛ ɔkɔ bo ɔwi biara sɔ boasiai Kristo lɛ ɔ̃ maturi ma ɔmɔɛ̃ i kakpã ame. Fiɛ Ɣaa sɛ ɔki i bo iso ɔɖi Kristo ɔte kayiiso ɔɖuɖu lɛ kumɛgɔ ira sɛ ifɔrɛ̃ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃ i kakɔi biara.
Bose lɛ kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a gɔ i Kristo ɔtsuedza ɔtã Ɣaa fiɛ bo ifɔrɛ̃ sɛ iki i maturi ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃, mma lona iɖi gu mma nto mawɔ.
Mma lona iɖi ne, iɖe ifɔrɛ̃ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a nɛ nsɛ itã ngbã. Ɣɛɛ mma nto mawɔ ndɛ̃ ne, iɖe ifɔrɛ̃ nyanyarĩa nɛ nsɛgu kukpi. Nna lokote sɔ ɔ̃awo karabara gagbe ɔbara?
Boise lɛ maturi gbodzoo ma nsɛ maki masu Ɣaa Itɔ̃me maɖe ala kuɣa. Ɣɛɛ gɔ Ɣaa lopia bo katɔ̃me ɔso ne, boto boɣɛ Itɔ̃me i ɔnukuare ame lɛ Kristo maɖabo.
Nnɛgbe ɔte sɔ boto bole so? Boise lɛ mawɛ̃ ma nto mabie kakosɛi ga loaɖi ma kate mi ɣee nga boafɔ i mi kɔrɛ bote maturi mama.
Alasɔ mi mɔmɔ nɖe bo ɔko gɔ boba, ɔko gɔ matsɛrɛ masia i bo situ iso sɔ ɔbiara aatsue ɔnya ɔka.

Ite sekelee sɔ Kristo mɔmɔ lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe ɔsese ɔkigu i bo iso. Iiɖe ɔturi kɔrɔ̃ matsɛrɛ ala ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã Siwarã masu matsɛrɛ ala. Iiɖe ita ana iso iɖe matsɛrɛ masia ɣɛɛ maturi situ iso matsɛrɛ masia.
Boto boɣɛ ngbɔ ala katetere ga boba i Ɣaa ame iki i Kristo iso.
Bona kuira nɛ iso boaya fiɛ boaɣɛ sɔ ne ɔso bosɛ bowo karabara gagbe ɔbara. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa kɔrɛ i bo ɔle sɛ ɔbɔrɛ.
Ɔ̃ lotã bo ira biara nɛ lonya bo sɔ si boaɖe ndamu ɣɛtɛ maɖabo. Maitsɛrɛ ndamu ɣɛtɛ mɛgbe masɛ, ɣɛɛ Siwarã ame ipia. Ndamu mɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ ne, misɛ miɖoe ɔturi, ɣɛɛ Siwarã sɛ sitã ngbã.

Ɔwi gɔ i Mose ɔfɔ Ɣaa mmara ɔbɔ ne, mmɛ matsɛrɛ masia i ita iso fiɛ misɛ mitã bo kukpi ipɔ ne, ɔ̃ ifiɛ ɔtã sɔ Israel mabi iiwo wũ katɔ̃ ɔnyɔ. Atoa sɔ ifiɛ nɛmɔ sɛ iyu si iɔfɔ ɔwi. Si mmara mɛ nsɛ mitã kukpi ipɔ sɛgu ifiɛ siare nɛmɔ igbã ne,
nda i Siwarã ame kurabarara gɔ lomɔ kuɖo pelepele aafiɛ!
Fiɛ si mmara kuere mɛ nsɛ mitã ɔturi kukpi ipɔ to mifiɛ ngbɔ ne, iyɔ Itɔ̃me sɛɛ nɛ nsɛ ibara bo bɔlɔlɔ to iafiɛ teteree iɖo.
Boto boɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ ikpawaĩ siare nɛ ame bopia nɔme ɔmɔ iɖo ikuere nɛ lowe kokooko.
Fiɛ si ira nɛ ɔwi nsɛ ɔfe ɔfiɛ ngbɔ ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, iyɔ ira ɣɛtɛ nɛ ɔwi loisɛ ɔfe aafiɛ iɖo kokooko.
Ɔriinyɔ nɛgbe boba ɔso fiɛ kagbegbe iisɛ kati bo ne.
Bo boise lɛ Mose gɔ nsɛ ɔsu ɔkati ɔfu so katɔ̃ sɔ Israel mabi si madaanya sɔ Ɣaa ifiɛ nɛ mpia wũ i katɔ̃ to iro.
Gbaã iɖe sɔ ma adzuni ame iibusi alasɔ ipɛ i nɔme ne, ɔkati gɔmɔ fu ma i adzuni iso si mato maka ndamu kuere ɔko gɔmɔ. Ngɔ lobara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo ɔnɔwɛ̃ adzuni iso i ɔkati aabɛ.
Gbaã ipɛ i nɔme si mato maka Mose mmara ɔko ne, ɔkati fu i ma adzuni iso sɔ maisɛ manɔ nnɛ mato maka karɔ̃.
Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere ɔfiniki ɔbɔrɛ i ɔ̃ akpi ame ɔfɔ Kristo lɛ Bosate awe ne, ɔkati gɔmɔ sɛ ɔbɛ i ɔ̃ adzuni iso.
Kiniɔ ne, Bosate gɔ boto bokpere ngbe nɖe Ɣaa Siwarã, fiɛ ngbegɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã pia ne, maturi ba iwarã.
Bo ma ɔɖuɖu i kuira iifu i adzuni iso ne, bosɛ boɖi Bosate ikpawaĩ bote kukaakɔ. Fiɛ Bosate gɔ nɖe Ɣaa Siwarã ngbe ne, ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔfinikira bo nsɛgbai sɔ boare wũ bofiɛ teteree bobua ne.
Gɔ Ɣaa ɔnyɔ bo nnya fiɛ ɔsu karabara gagbe ɔpia bo i nrɔɔ̃ ame ɔso ne, nrɔɔ̃ iisɛ mifɛ̃ bo.

Ɣɛɛ boɔɖi atsue i awɛrɛra gu anuarɛra iso, ana ne, boisɛ bosɔsɔla maturi fiɛ boisɛ bofinikira Itɔ̃me Bielea. Ɣɛɛ bosɛ boɖe ɔnukuare fiɛ si maturi iibawe adzuni nyanyarĩa i bo iso ne, bosɛ bote nsɛgbai sɛɛ i ma anɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ boate i Ɣaa anɔ.
Si Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ boto boɣɛ ɖe iwɛrɛra ne, iɖe iwɛrɛra itã mma nto mawɔ.
Mma loifɔ maɖe ne, Ɔbosam ɔbiɛ ma anɔmi. Ɔbara ma ngbɔ si maibanya ikpawaĩ nɛ lobɔrɛ i Itɔ̃me Bielea ame ito ifiɛ ifere ma iso sɔ nnɛ boto boɣɛ i Kristo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa kumiamia iso ne, maanɔ karɔ̃.
Boisɛ bowe boki boɣɛ bo mɔmɔ iso itɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ Yesu Kristo iso itɔ̃me boɣere mi sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Bosate. Bo ne, mi maɖabo boɖe ala Yesu ɔso.
Ɣaa gɔ loɣɛ ku kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ sɔ, “Ikpawaĩ si iba i idududu ame” ne, ɔ̃ ame lotã ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ɔfiɛ ibo i bo situ ame ne. Nnɛgbe lotã bonya Ɣaa ikpawaĩ nɛ mpia i Kristo katɔ̃ boɖi ite ne.
Ɣɛɛ bo ma ame i Siwarã ame karana gagbe pia ne, bose lɛ abui wa mapɔ kere. Ne loatã ɔbiara ɔnya sɔ ɔle siare gɔgbe ne, iiɖe bo mɔmɔ ame ɔbɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔbɔrɛ.
Inyɛwe ɔmini bo ito i kakɔi biara, ɣɛɛ ɔle iiro bo. Masɛ makpɔkpɔtɔra bo, ɣɛɛ nrɔɔ̃ iisɛ mifɛ̃ bo.
Matsirise siai bo sɔ maaɖoe, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa iiɖi bo atsue. Mamɔɛ̃ bo mawuĩ i karɔ̃ sɔ si maɖoe bo, ɣɛɛ boikpi.
Ɔwi biara ne, boba inyɛwe nɛ lore Yesu kukpi sɔ ɔ̃ ngbã aate so i bo ame.
Gbaã, i bo ngbã mɛ bosi ɔɖuɖu ame ne, bosi i kukpi ifɔ̃ ame ala Yesu ɔso. Ne ɔso Yesu ngbã ana sɛ miɖi mite i bo siturina ame sɔ maturi aanya maɖi ite.
Ne ɔso kukpi to kuɖaa bo ɔwi biara, ɣɛɛ mi mito mina ngbã.
Matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Lofɔ Ɣaa loɖe, ne ɔso loto loɣɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ne.” Siwarã dzɛ ame lotã maturi ɔfɔ maɖe ne, sɛ̃ ame mpia i bo ame ɔso boto boɣɛ itɔ̃me ne.
Boɣe sɔ Ɣaa gɔ lotara Yesu ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ne, ɔto ɔ̃atara bo gu mi ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔsu ɔbɔ Ɣaa katɔ̃.
Mi isɛɛ ɔso i ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔba ngbɔ. Fiɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa abualɛra togu maturi ikɔ ibɔ Kristo kɔrɛ ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa iyere aafɔ kuwarɛ nɛ.
Adzuni wagbe ɔso boisɛ bofɛ̃ ne. Atoa sɔ bo siturina to sikpi pɔkɔsɔɔ pɔkɔsɔɔ ne, bo siwarã to sina ngbã ɣɛtɛ ɔwi biara.
Inyɛ kɛkɛĩ nɛ boto bowe kiniɔ iito iawe ɔwi biara. Ito iledza bo itã kuwarɛ siare gɔ maatã bo fiɛ maibawo kuira ɔsu ɔkoteragu.
Ne ɔso boisu bo anɔ bosia i ara wa boto bonya iso, ɣɛɛ nwa boito bonya. Ara wa bosɛ bonya ne, aisɛ ase ɔwi biara, ɣɛɛ nwa boisɛ bonya ne, asɛ ase ɔwi biara gɔ ana kawirikɔ̃.
Si bo siturina dzɛ nɖe iyo nɛ ame bosi i ngbã mɛgbe ame ɔbiɛ ne, boba iyo nɛ mba ɔle i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃. Iyo nɛ iiɖe nrɔɔ̃ masu matsue ala fiɛ iase ɔwi biara.
Ɔwi gɔ ame bopia i siturina dzɛgbe ame ne, bosɛ bowarã bokuti. Boto bonyɔ ɔri teteree iyi nɛ boasɛ boasu Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ siturina.
Si bokɛlɛ siturina dzɛmɔ ame ne, boisibasɛ isɔ̃.

Alasɔ gɔ bokpese bopia i kayiiso ikpayo nɛgbe ame ne, boto botɔrɛ̃, bomararã so. Iiɖe gɔ ito bo ɔkã sɔ boabɔrɛ i siturina dzɛgbe ame ɔso, ɣɛɛ gɔ boto bobie sɔ masu kato siturina dzɛ loisɛ sikpi mapia bo sɔ ira nɛ loisɛ ikpi aaba iasu nnɛ nsɛ ikpi imɛ pelepele.
Ɣaa ɔɖe loledza bo ɔsɛ ɔtã ikpaki nɛgbe igbã fiɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔtã bo lɛ ita isiara itã ara wa ɔledza ɔsɛ bo.
Ne ɔso boba ɔtu ne. Boɣe sɔ ayi kumɛgɔ bopia i sosina ame ne, boito bonya Bosate ku anɔ.
Kafɔkaɖe gagbe bosu bosi ala ngbã ne, iiɖe ara wa boto bonya ala anɔ kare kaɖe.
Boba katetere fiɛ ito bo ɔkã sɔ boabɔrɛ i siturina ame bokɛlɛ boawegu Bosate.
Ɣɛɛ nnɛ boto bobie boɖo nɖe sɔ, ngbe bopia o-o, kato bopia o-o ne, boabo Bosate anɔ.
Alasɔ bo ɔɖuɖu to boaya i Kristo anɔ ɔɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me fiɛ ɔbiara aafɔ ɔ̃ kuso gɔ lokategu ɔ̃ kurabarara. Isɛɛ o-o, ilalaa o-o ne, ɔbiara to ɔ̃afɔ nnɛ lokategu ɔ̃ ngbã mɛ igbã ɔsɛ.
Gɔ boɣe kumɛgɔ ikote sɔ boanigã Bosate ɔso ne, bosɛ bopɛ maturi nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ma wũ manigã wũ. Ɣaa ɣe bo kukaakɔ fiɛ lofɔ loɖe sɔ mi wũ miɣe bo nsɛgbai sekelee.
Iiɖe ɔle boto bole so ana bote mi, ɣɛɛ boto botã mi ɔri gɔgbe sɔ miasu bo miɖe ala ndamu. Boto bobara ngbɔ sɔ si miatsue nnɛ miaɣere mma nto masu ɔturi kumiamia makɔlɛ so kato fiɛ iiɖe ɔ̃ nsɛgbai.
Si bore mma nto malala gbaã ne, Ɣaa ɔso ise bo ngbɔ. Ɣɛɛ si boito bolala ne, iɖe kusia itã mi.
Kristo kuɖɔɛ nto kuɖe bo iso. Kiniɔ gɔ boɣe sɔ ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ lokpi i maturi ɔɖuɖu iti ɔso ne, ite sɔ bo ɔɖuɖu ɔɔkpi.
Kristo ɔkpi i maturi ɔɖuɖu iti, ne ɔso mma nsi ngbã ne, maisibasɛ ngbã matã so. Ɣɛɛ maasɛ ngbã matã wũ, alasɔ ma iti ɔkpi fiɛ Ɣaa ɔtara wũ ɔbɔ magbanadze ndɛ̃.
Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, boisɛ boɣɛgu kuwɛ̃ atɔ̃me i kayiiso ara inyɔ kanya. Si ɔwi gɔ lofe kɔra fiɛ boɣɛgu Kristo atɔ̃me ngbɔ ne, boisisɛ bobara ngbɔ kiniɔ.
Ne ɔso si ɔturi ɔsu so ɔmatãra i Kristo iso ne, ɔ̃ɔkpese ɔturi ɣɛtɛ. Ɔ̃ ngbã kuere ɔɔfe, miɣɛtɛ ka ɔsi.
Ɣaa ɔɖe lobara ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu. Ɔfere bo gu wũ inyɔ kanya ndu iki i Kristo iso. Ɔ̃ ame losu kanya ndu ifere kubarara ɔtã bo sɔ boakɔ maturi mama bobɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne.
Bo imomo nɛ boto bopɛ nɖe sɔ, Ɣaa ɔki i Kristo iso ɔto ɔledza ma gu maturi ɔɖuɖu inyɔ ndɛ̃. Ɔ̃ɔkpa atsue ɔfu ma akpi ɔɖuɖu iso fiɛ ɔsu itɔ̃me nɛ loaledza ma gu maturi ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃ ɔtã bo.
Bo nɖe mma nɣɛ i Kristo kanya, ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔki i bo iso ɔto ɔka mi. Ne ɔso boɣɛ i Kristo kanya lɛ Ɣaa mɔmɔ nto ɔtã mi iti sɔ mitã mafere mi gu wũ inyɔ kanya ndu.
Kristo iibara ikpi kuiwɛ̃, ɣɛɛ bo iti ne, Ɣaa ɔtã wũ ɔsore bo akpi. Iatã sɔ si bobaragu wũ mawɛ̃ ne, boaɖe maturi bɔlɔlɔa i Ɣaa anɔ.
Lɛ mma nto mabaragu Ɣaa karabara ne, boto mi i kukpa sɔ midaafɔ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ siefe.
Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Ɔwi gɔ lokote sɔ loanyɔ mi nnya ne, lokã mi atsue.
Fiɛ gɔ iyi ɔɣo sɔ loaɖi mi ne, lobuai mi.”
Mikã atsue! Kiniɔ nɖe ɔwi gɔ lokote sɔ Ɣaa aanyɔ mi nnya ne. Nɔme nɖe iyi nɛ ɔ̃aɖi mi ne.
Boito bobie sɔ kuwɛ̃ aanya iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ i bo karabara iso. Ne ɔso boisɛ bobara kuira nɛ loatɛ̃ maturi Ɣaa kɔrɛ iba ɔri ne.
Ɣɛɛ i ira biara nɛ bosɛ bobara ame ne, bosɛ boɖi bote sɔ Ɣaa marabaradze boɖe. Ne ɔso boya teteree i amɔrɛ̃ gu inyɛwe gu kama iti ame ne.
Mapɛ bo, mapia bo i iyo, mapiɛ bo fiɛ matã bo karabara maɖodza. Boina sirɛ borɛ fiɛ kukã ana ɔkpɛ̃ bo.
Ɣɛɛ iki i isekele gu inɔgba gu iɣaraso gu kayiribielea ame ne, boɔɖi bote sɔ Ɣaa marabaradze boɖe. Ibua i nwagbe iso ne, Siwarã Bielea gu bo kuɖɔɛ bielea gu
bo ɔnukuare itɔ̃me iɣɛ gu Ɣaa ɔle sɛ ɔbuai bo. Bo nsɛgbai sɛɛ nɖe bo kakpã akpɛ̃ra wa bosɛ bodzuɛ̃ so ala.
Mawɛ̃ sɛ mawarɛ bo fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana sɛ masopara bo, mawɛ̃ sɛ male bo fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana sɛ marɔ bo iyere lalaa, mawɛ̃ ana sɛ manyɔ bo lɛ maladze awe, ɣɛɛ ɔnukuare boto boɣɛ.
Maturi sɛ mabara lɛ maiɣe bo, ɣɛɛ maɣe bo i kakɔi biara, masɛ manyɔ bo lɛ boɔkpi ɣɛɛ lɛ miɣe ne, boba ngbã. Mapɛ bo, ɣɛɛ maiɖoe bo.
Atoa sɔ bopia i isoma ame ne, so ɔɣɔ bo ɔwi biara, bonyɔ lɛ mawɛrɛba, ɣɛɛ bosɛ botã maturi ɔkpese maranase. Bose lɛ mma nna kuira ɣɛɛ boba ira biara.
Manyii ma Korintose, boɣere mi ɔnukuare ta bo situ ame fiɛ bowarɛ nrɔɔ̃ bofɔ mi ana.
Iiɖe bo loɖi mi nrɔɔ̃ ne mi mɔmɔ nto mikora kama mitã bo lo!
Nto loɖe mi ika lɛ wũ mabi awe. Kumɛgɔ bowarɛ nrɔɔ̃ bosɔ̃ mi ne, mi wũ miwarɛ mi mire mitã bo ngbɔ.
Minyɔ sɔ mi gu mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze iibabara mawɛ̃ i kuira ame alasɔ iibawo ɔkate. Ira sɛɛ gu ilalaa iibawo mawɛ̃ ɔɖe ɖa. Ikpawaĩ gu idududu iibawo kakɔi kawɛ̃ ɔwe ɔnya.
Kristo gu Ɔbosam iibawo ara karɔ̃ ɔnɔgu so. Ngbɔ ame i fɔɖedze gu ngɔ loifɔ ɔɖe iibawo mawɛ̃ ɔbara ne.
Aɣɔ gu Ɣaa iyo na kuira maabara masiaidzo. Alasɔ bo nɖe Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã isɔrɛyo. Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loawe i ma ndɛ̃, losɛ i ma ame, loɖe ma Ɣaa fiɛ ma wũ maɖe wũ maturi.”
Ne ɔso i Bosate ɔɣere ɔ̃ maturi sɔ,
“Mibɔrɛ i ma ndɛ̃,
Si mibɛse so mibɔrɛgu i iɣɔsɔrɛ iso.
Midaapɛpɛgu ma anyanyara
iyɔ loafɔ mi.
Fiɛ loakpese mi Ɔse
Mi wũ mikpese me mabi birɛrɛĩ gu mabirɔ̃gomi.
Ngbɔ i Ɣaa Ɔlesate to ɔɣɛ ne.”
Gɔ maɣɛ ara wagbe masɛ i bo iso ɔso ne manyii, mitã bosekelera so boɖi i ira biara nɛ loapukutura bo sosina gu siwarã si bose sekelee i Ɣaa kuwarɛ gu kunigã ame.
Nto lobie sɔ miwarɛ mi nrɔɔ̃ mifɔ bo alasɔ boiɣɛrɛ mi kuwɛ̃ fiɛ boikpadzɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ bokigu i ɔri nyanyarĩa iso, ana ne, boiɖe kuwɛ̃ amumu.
Loito loɣɛ nnɛgbe sɔ si lotã mi ipɔ. Alasɔ loɔɣɛ lofegu sɔ mifɔ bo kuɣa gbaã fiɛ kukpi ame o-o, ngbã ame o-o ne, mawɛ̃ boɖe.
Lofɔ mi loɖe fiɛ nsɛ lopa so ala mi ɔso. I bo inyɛwe ɔɖuɖu ame ne, loba katetere fiɛ so ɔɣɔ me ala mi ɔso.
Gɔ boba boabo Makedonia ne, boina iwarã kuiwɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ amɔrɛ̃ ɔki alɔ bo i kakɔi biara gu kalɔ gɔ itã sɔ ifɔ̃ ɔwe i bo ame.
Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔpia mma lofɛfɛ̃ ɔtɔ ɔpia bo kɔrɔ̃ i kayiri iki i Tito iba ame.

Iiɖe Tito iba ɔnɔwɛ̃ lopia bo isoɣɔ ɣɛɛ ɔɣere bo kumɛgɔ mitã wũ katetere. Ɔɣere bo kumɛgɔ ito mi ɔkã sɔ mianya me, kumɛgɔ mito mimararã so i mi ikpi iti fiɛ miledza so sɔ miafɔ me kanya ne, itã so ɔɣɔ me gbaã.
Si wũ ɔko gɔ lotsɛrɛ mi ɔtã mi isoma ne, iiɖaa me. Ibo me so gɔ lonya sɔ iɖaa mi ɔwi kurukutu.
Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, so ɔɔɣɔ me, iiɖe sɔ lopia mi isoma ɔso, ɣɛɛ sɔ mi isoma ɔtã mifiniki ɔso. Ɣaa ɔsu mi isoma ɔfinikira mi ɔbɔ so i kɔrɛ ne ɔso iɖe mi kusia.
Alasɔ si ɔturi ɔmararã so i Ɣaa ɔri iso ne, isɛ ibɔ ifiniki nɛ loatã wũ ngbã fiɛ iibaɖaa wũ. Ɣɛɛ si ɔmararã so i kayiiso ara iso ne, kukpi ɔ̃ana.

Minyɔ karabara ga i Ɣaa ɔsu isoma nɛgbe ɔbara. Itã miɖo anɔ mibua. Itã sɔ mito mibie sɔ miase sekelee. Itã sɔ miisɛ minagu ara lalaa isoɣɔ. Itã ifɔ̃ pia i mi ame i ikpi iso. Itã mito minyɔ ara ɔri teteree. Itã misɛ mipia kubɛ, fiɛ itã sɔ misɛ mibie sɔ miakpadzɛ̃ kpibaradze kutsue. I ira biara ame ne, mite sɔ miisɛ mibara mawɛ̃ ku ira lalaa.
Ne ɔso atoa sɔ lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔmɔ ne, iiɖe ngɔ lobara iɣɛrɛ ɣee ngɔ maɣɛrɛ ɔso lotsɛrɛ. Ɣɛɛ lotsɛrɛ sɔ si loɖi lote mi sekelee i Ɣaa katɔ̃ kumɛgɔ misɛ mipia kubɛ i bo iti.
Nnɛgbe lotã bo katetere ne.
Ibua i katetere ga bona iso ne, so ɔɣɔ bo i isoɣɔ nɛ i Tito ɔna i kumɛgɔ mi ɔɖuɖu ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔtu ɔkpase ɔsɛ ɔso.
Losu mi loɖe ndamu lotã wũ fiɛ miipia me kunuarɛ ana. Ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i itɔ̃me biara nɛ loɣere mi ɖe ɔnukuare ne, ndamu mɛ loɖe i mi iso lotã Tito ana iiɖe sila
Si ɔnyigi mi ɔɖuɖu atsue ikã, mi kuwarɛ gu kuɖɔɛ gɔ misu mifɔ wũ ne, mi ara sɛ amɔɛ̃ wũ ɔtu teteree abua.
So ɔɣɔ me gbaã alasɔ losu iti losia i mi iso i ira biara ame.
Manyii, bobie sɔ mitsue ara wa i Ɣaa abualɛra ɔpia Makedonia mafɔɖedze ɔle fiɛ mabara.
Mawe i ilainyɔ gu inyɛwe teteree ame. Atoa sɔ mapia i kusa siare ame ne, maɖi kayiri matã ara ku isoɣɔ.
Loawo ita ɔsia ɔtã mi sɔ matã ara kumɛgɔ maawo. Loawo ɔɣɛ sɔ matã ara maɖodza kumɛgɔ i ma ɔle se kanya. I ma mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ ame ne,
matã bo iti teteree sɔ botã ma ɔri si ma wũ maɖi ma kayiribielea mate iki i karatã ame itã mafɔɖedze ma i Yudea.
Boinyɔ ɔri botã nnɛ mabara ngbe kɔra. Maɖe katɔ̃ masu so matã Bosate, ne kama iki i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ame ne, masu so matã bo bo wũ.
Nnɛgbe ɔso Tito gɔ losɛ karatã karabara gagbe karɔ̃ koko i mi ndɛ̃ ne, bopia wũ ɔtɔ sɔ ɔkɛlɛgu kã i katɔ̃ si ɔwiri.
Miɔsɛ katɔ̃ i ira biara ame. Mi kafɔkaɖe gu ikaɖe gu inɔgba ɔɔyi, misɛ mipia kubɛ i ira biara ame fiɛ mito miɖɔɛ bo ana. Ne ɔso kiniɔ ne, minyɔ sɔ miasɛ katɔ̃ i abualɛra wagbe ibara ame ana.
Iiɖe mmara miɖe nto lotã mi, ɣɛɛ maturi mama kubɛ ipia nto losɛ mi i katɔ̃ lonyɔ sɔ nda i mi kuɖɔɛ ɔsi.
Miɣe Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra. Ranase ɔɖe fiɛ, ɣɛɛ mi ɔso ne, ɔkpese wɛrɛba sɔ miaki i ɔ̃ siwɛrɛba ame mikpese maranase.
Wũ adzuni nɖe sɔ, karabara ga misɛ karɔ̃ ku igɔgɔwi ne, ialɛ sɔ miawiri kã. Mi nɖe maɖeakatɔ̃ ma lotã ara fiɛ mi kɔra loɖe katɔ̃ mibara adzuni wamɔ.
Kiniɔ ne, ikote sɔ miawiri karabara ga karɔ̃ misɛ. Ɔtɔ gɔ ame misu misɛ karabara karɔ̃ ne, misu ɔ̃ ame miwiri kã ala ara wa miba kiniɔ.
Alasɔ si iɖe mi kuɖɔɛ sɔ miatã ara ne, Ɣaa aafɔ nnɛ mitã, iiɖe nnɛ miina.
Iiɖe ɔbie loto sɔ si lopia mi ato lobua gɔ nto lobɛrɛkɛ mawɛ̃ are. Ɣɛɛ si ato iibaɖo kuwɛ̃ ne, mibuai ma kiniɔ gɔ miba, iyɔ ɔwi gɔ mi wũ miabo i imɔrɛ̃ ame ne, ma wũ maɔbuai mi, iyɔ ira biara ɔɔkote.
Iiɖe ɔbie loto sɔ si lopia mi ato lobua gɔ nto lobɛrɛkɛ mawɛ̃ are. Ɣɛɛ si ato iibaɖo kuwɛ̃ ne, mibuai ma kiniɔ gɔ miba, iyɔ ɔwi gɔ mi wũ miabo i imɔrɛ̃ ame ne, ma wũ maɔbuai mi, iyɔ ira biara ɔɔkote.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko sekelea ame sɔ, “Ngɔ losa ara gbodzoo kanya iife ina fiɛ ngɔ lona kɛkɛĩ ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃ ɔkpɛ iife ikoso.”
Siba boapɛ Ɣaa sɔ ɔtã Tito ɔpia so kubɛ sɔ ɔ̃abuai mi lɛ bo ame.
Gɔ boɣere wũ sɔ ɔba mi kɔrɛ si ɔ̃abuai mi ne, ɔtɔrã ala iɖe ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ koko sɔ ɔ̃aba.
Boto bopia ma gu bo ɔnyii ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i mafɔɖedze akuri ɔɖuɖu sɛ male ala kumɛgɔ ɔsɛ ɔpia kubɛ i Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣɛ ame.
Ibua i nwagbe ɔɖuɖu iso ne, mafɔɖedze akuri ɔɖi wũ sɔ ɔsiai bo i abualɛra karabara gagbe ibara ame. Karabara gagbe ne, ɔbara boto bobara sɔ si boɖi Bosate ile gu bo kuɖɔɛ gɔ boba sɔ boabuai bote.
Boto bodzuɛ̃ so sɔ boibatã kuwɛ̃ ɔɖe ika i kumɛgɔ bobara karatã ga i maturi ɔɖi kayiri matã iso.
Bo adzuni nɖe sɔ boabara nnɛ nlɛ i maturi gu i Bosate ɔɖuɖu anɔ.
Ne ɔso boto bopia bo ɔnyii gɔgbe bosiaira ma ne. Boɔkere wũ bonyɔ i siri agbãagbã iso fiɛ bonya sɔ ɔsɛ ɔpia kubɛ gbaã. Ibua i ne iso ne, ɔbua ɔfɔ mi ɔɖe gbaã ne ɔso ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abuai mi ne.
I Tito wũ burise kasɛ ne, marabaradze laa boɖe i mi ndɛ̃. Manyii tsɔra ne, mafɔɖedze akuri kanya maba fiɛ masɛ mawarɛ Kristo.
Miɖi mi kuɖɔɛ mite ma si mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu aatsue sɔ iiɖe ndamu siefe boto boɖe i mi iso.
Gbaã ne, iinya sɔ loatsɛrɛ mi ɔko i karatã ga boɣɛ sɔ boatã mafɔɖedze wɛrɛba ma i Yudea iso.
Loɣe sɔ mito mibie sɔ miabuai fiɛ loɔɖe ndamu i mi iso lotã Makedonia maturi sɔ, “Ta igɔgɔwi ne, manyii ma i Akaya ɔɔledza so sɔ maabuai.” Mi kuɖɔɛ gɔgbe ɔpia manyii tsɔra ɔtɔ.
Kiniɔ ne, nto lopia manyii magbe mi kɔrɛ si maanya sɔ bo ndamu mɛ boɖe i mi iso i ara wagbe ame iiɖe siefe. Lɛ kumɛgɔ bosɛ boɣere ma sɔ miɔledza so ne, loabie sɔ miledza so fiɛ maaba.
Ɣɛɛ si Makedonia maturi ɔsiai me maba maanya sɔ miiledza so ne, kunuarɛ to kuakpɛ̃ bo fiɛ mi kunuarɛ nto kuasi kuɖo alasɔ mato maabu sɔ bofe mi ifɔ iɖe kaɖu.
Ne ɔso inya sɔ loapia manyii magbe loɖegu katɔ̃ si mabuai mi mibie ara wa miɣɛ sɔ miatã misɛ. Si mibie karatã misɛ fiɛ boba ne, iate sɔ ɔɖɔɛ miɖɔɛ sɔ miatã ara ɔso fiɛ mitã ne iiɖe ɔɣiɛ ɔso mitã.
Mitã ikpa mi sɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔpɛ ɔraɖui garagara ne, ara kɛkɛĩ kere ɔ̃ana. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ lopɛ ɔraɖui gbodzoo ne, ɔto ɔ̃afɛ̃ ara gbodzoo.
Ne ɔso mi ndɛ̃ ɔbiara kɛkɛ si ɔtã nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ. Iiɖe ɔɣiɛ ɣee kaboso ame, alasɔ Ɣaa sɛ ɔɖɔɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔtã ara ku isoɣɔ.
Fiɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃awo mi ira biara ɔtã sɔ miana ara miɖo nwa ɔɖuɖu lonya mi sɔ ɔwi biara ne, miawo ɔbuai i karabara sɛɛ biara ame.
Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Ɔsɛ ɔkurisi ɔ̃ kɔrɔ̃ ame ɔtã mawɛrɛba,
fiɛ ɔ̃ kayiribielea na kawirikɔ̃.”
Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtã kpɛ̃dze ɔraɖui pɛa gu araɖea ne, ɔto ɔ̃atã mi ɔɖui gɔ miapɛ fiɛ ɔ̃atã ɔlɛ kukaakɔ sɔ miafɛ̃ ara gbodzoo ala kumɛgɔ mitã ara ku ɔtu ɔso.
Ɔto ɔ̃atã miɖe maranase siare sɔ miawo ara ɔtã ɔwi biara ame sɔ maturi aapɛ Ɣaa siba i mi karatã ga mafɔ mabɔrɛgu i bo kɔrɛ ɔso.
Alasɔ karabara ga mibara ngbe ne, iiɖe mafɔɖedze ɔnɔwɛ̃ inyaa kaɖaɛ, ɣɛɛ itã maturi gbodzoo ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba
Si mipia kubɛ mitã ibuai nɛgbe ne, maturi to maale Ɣaa sɔ mifɔ Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea, mikã atsue fiɛ mito ara mitã ma gu maturi mama.
Mato maasu situ ɣɔa makparama kayi i mi iti ala abualɛra siare wa i Ɣaa ɔtã mi ɔso.
Mitã bopɛ Ɣaa siba i karatã ga karɔ̃ boibawo ɔnɔ fiɛ ɔsu ɔtã bo iti.
Mme Paulo mɔmɔ losu Kristo karɔ̃ ibɔso gu ɔtu ɣɔa nto loka mi. Mme gɔ misɛ miɣɛ sɔ si lopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, loɖe ɔturi ɣɔa, ɣɛɛ si loɔrui i mi kɔrɛ ne, loɔkpese ɔturi gɔ mba ɔle.
Loto mi i kukpa sɔ midaatã lowe ɔle i mi iso si loba alasɔ lofɔ loɖe sɔ loawo ɔle ɔwe i mma nto maɣɛ sɔ sosina ame adzuni kanya boto bobara ara.
Gbaã iɖe sɔ kayi ame bopia ɣɛɛ boisɛ bokpɛ̃ ku ala kayiiso adzuni.
Alasɔ bo akpakpɛ̃ra iiɖe kayiiso are, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa akpakpɛ̃ra wa mba ɔle fiɛ asɛ awo tsirise kuwɛrɛkɔ̃ gɔ mba ɔle ɔbiɛbiɛ wɔsɔwɔsɔ aɖe.
Wã ame bosɛ bosu bonina mila kakpadzɛ̃ biara ana ne. Bosɛ bobiɛ ɔri atɛ̃ra wa ɔɖuɖu lota aɣɛ i Ɣaa itsue iso. Bosɛ bomɔɛ̃ adzuni ɔɖuɖu sisande sɔ aakã Kristo atsue.
Fiɛ si mi Kristo atsue ikã ɔɔyi ne, ka boto boawo atsue idaakã biara kutsue ɔkpadzɛ̃.
Mito minyɔ ara i siturina kanya. Mawɛ̃ pia i mmɔ gɔ masɛ mabu sɔ Kristo mare maɖe? Mitã mabu so ngbɔ alasɔ bo wũ Kristo mare boɖe lɛ ma ame.
Si loɔfe ndamu iɖe iɖo kumɛgɔ ikote i ɔle gɔ i Bosate ɔtã bo sɔ bosu bokararã mi iso fiɛ iiɖe sɔ bowɔra mi iso ne, kunuarɛ iibakpɛ̃ me.
Loito lobie sɔ ite lɛ ifɔ̃ nto lopia mi i wũ ɔko gɔ lotsɛrɛ ame.
Alasɔ mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ sɔ, “Paulo siko ba ɔrɔrã sitidza maturi, ɣɛɛ si ɔpia i bo kɔrɛ ne, ɔturi ɣɔa ɔɖe fiɛ ɔ̃ atɔ̃me ana na karɔ̃.”
Lobie sɔ mmamɔ si matsue sɔ ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i siko dzɛ bosɛ botsɛrɛ mi gu nnɛ bosɛ bobara si bopia i mi ndɛ̃ ame.
Iito bo ɔkã sɔ boasu so bokateragu mma nto makɔlɛ so kato sɔ mafe inya. Ma mɔmɔ losɛ akparĩ wa masu mato makere so ala, fiɛ si ma mɔmɔ akparĩ masu mato makere so ala ne, iyɔ iikpa ma.
Bo ne, boibaɖe ndamu bofe kumɛ, ɣɛɛ boatui i ngbegɔ i Ɣaa ɔsɛ ɔtã bo fiɛ karabara ga bobara i mi ndɛ̃ ana pia i ne ame.
Bo nɖe maturi ɖeakatɔ̃ ma losu Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea bobɔ mi. Ne ɔso si boto boɖe ndamu i mi iso ne, boiwara kumɛ alasɔ bobara karabara boba boabo i mi ndɛ̃.
Ne ɔso boisɛ boɖe ndamu miwara mibo i maturi mama karabara ame. Ɣɛɛ, i ne kanya ne, bo ɔriinyɔ nɖe sɔ mi kafɔkaɖe aamɔ fiɛ bo karabara i mi ndɛ̃ ana aamɔ kabua lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔbie.
Iyɔ boawo Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔɣɛ ɔfe mi bokɛlɛ nrɔ̃ mama iso gɔ iisibanya sɔ boaɖe ndamu i maturi mama karabara ga maɔbara iso.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Si ɔrere aaɖe ndamu ne, ɔɖe ndamu i Bosate iso.”
Alasɔ iiɖe ɔturi gɔ nsɛ ɔkɔlɛ so kato nɖe ngɔ lokote, ɣɛɛ ngɔ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔkɔlɛ kato.
Mikafara, nto lobie sɔ loabara idzimira iwɛ̃, ne ɔso mifɔ mitã me.
Nto lokpɛ̃ sirerɛ i mi iti lɛ kumɛgɔ ame i Ɣaa sɛ ɔkpɛ̃. Mise me lɛ ɔbitɛ gɔ loɔkarɛ lotã Kristo mɔmɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ayiri
Ɣɛɛ nto lonigã sɔ kumɛgɔ ame i aɣɛ ɔsu inɔgba asɔsɔla Eva fiɛ ɔbara ikpi ne, mi wũ mawɛ̃ to maakpɔkpɔtɔra mi adzuni sɔ miisibaɖe ɔnukuare misumu Kristo i ɔtu sekelea ame.
Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ loba mi kɔrɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ Yesu mama itɔ̃me nɛ boiba boaɣere mi ne, misɛ mifɔ wũ mala. Ngbɔ ame misɛ mifɔ siwarã gu itɔ̃me nɛ loiɖe Ɣaa Siwarã gu ɔ̃ itɔ̃me fiɛ iibɔrɛ i bo kɔrɛ miɖe ne.
Loifɔ loɖe sɔ mi katɔ̃memasɛdze kɔlɛa mamɔ lɛ maɖo me i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso.
Atoa sɔ ɔnyagɛmi iisɛ ɔta me kukaakɔ ne, loɣe ara gbodzoo. Gbaã ne, botã nnɛgbe ame ɔkpa mi i ɔri biara iso.
Loifɔ mi kuso kukuwɛ̃ ku ɔwi gɔ loba loaɣere mi Itɔ̃me Bielea. Ɣɛɛ lobɔ so karɔ̃ sɔ si maakɔlɛ mi kato, nnɛgbe ana ne ikpi lobara?
Ɔwi gɔ nto loɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i mi ndɛ̃ ne, mafɔɖedze mama karatã karabara lobara i mi iso, gɔ maawo ɔɣɛ sɔ loyu ma losu lobuai mi.
Ɔwi gɔ lopia i mi kɔrɛ fiɛ ara ɔnya me ne, loiɖaa mi kutsuɛ, ɣɛɛ manyii ma lobɔrɛ i Makedonia maba lotã me wũ ara nyaa. Ne ɔso loikpese kuwɛ̃ ato fiɛ loibabara ana.
Ayi kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔnukuare pia i wũ ame ne, kuwɛ̃ iibawo me ɔri ɔtɛ̃ sɔ lodaaɖe nnɛgbe ndamu i Akaya awo ame.
Be ɔso? Sɔ loito loɖɔɛ mi ɔso? Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɣe sɔ nto loɖɔɛ mi.
Loakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ sɔ loibafɔ kuira lobɔrɛgu i mi kɔrɛ. Iyɔ loibatã mma nsɛ makpere so sɔ katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔri kuwɛ̃ sɔ maakɔlɛ so kato sɔ mato mabara karabara lɛ kumɛgɔ ame boto bobara.
Mmagbe ne, mila katɔ̃memasɛdze gu mila marabaradze maɖe. Mabara so lɛ Kristo katɔ̃memasɛdze maɖe ɣɛɛ maiɖe.
Ɣɛɛ ina ɣaa alasɔ Ɔbosam kɔra sɛ ɔsɔsɔla maturi sɔ Ɣaa kpabo gɔ nsɛ ɔfiɛ ɔɖe.
Ne ɔso ina ɣaa sɔ ɔ̃ masiaidze to mate so lɛ sibɔlɔlɔ maɖabo maɖe. Ma kawirikɔ̃ to kaakategu ma kurabarara.
Lobie sɔ loledza mi iɣere sɔ kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaabu sɔ iikpa me. Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere ɔbu ngbɔ ne, mifɔ me lɛ ngɔ iikpa si mme wũ loakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ loɖe ndamu kɛkɛĩ.
Gbaã ne, nnɛ nto loɣɛ i ngbe ne, iiɖe Bosate lotã me ɔri sɔ loɣɛ ngbɔ, ɣɛɛ nto loɖe ika lɛ kumɛgɔ i ngɔ iikpa sɛ ɔna katetere ɔɖe ndamu.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ kayiiso ara i maturi gbodzoo sɛ masu maɖe ala ndamu ɔso ne, mme wũ loasu wã loɖe ala ndamu.
Gɔ mi mɔmɔ ɖe manɔgbadze kaɖu ɔso ne, misɛ mina ɔtu mikã mma iikpa atsue.
Fiɛ si ɔrere ɔsu mi ɔbara masande, ɣee ɔbara mi ira boa, ɣee ɔɖe mi amumu, ɣee ɔ̃iwarɛ mi ɣee ɔpɛ mi ɔrɔ̃ta i katɔ̃ ne, misɛ miɣara so mitã wũ.
Iɖe me kunuarɛ sɔ lotɔrã losia sɔ mafɔ̃dze boɖe ɔso boibara ara wagbe.
Ɣɛɛ ira biara nɛ i ɔrere aasu ɔɖe ala ndamu ne, mme wũ loawo ɔsu ɔɖe. Mme wũ ka loɖe ika lɛ ngɔ iikpa.
Si ma sɔ ma Hebrise maɖe ne, mme wũ ɔ̃ loɖe. Si ma sɔ ma Israelse maɖe ne, mme wũ ɔ̃ loɖe, fiɛ si ma sɔ Abraham mawa maɖe ne, mme wũ ɔ̃ loɖe.

Wũ ikaɖe to iare ngɔ nto ɔlala. Ma sɔ Kristo maɖabo maɖe? Loɖe Kristo ɔɖabo sɛɛ loɖo ma fiɛ loɔbara karabara loɖo ma ɔɖuɖu. Loɔrɛ i iyo loɖo ma, maɔpɛ me teteree maɖo ma fiɛ loɔbore lobo kukpi ɔwi gbodzoo.
Ikpɛ iru buu i ma Yudase ɔɔpɛ me ala iporoibi ikpɛ sitɛ-kaiwɛ̃.
Fiɛ ikpɛ itɛ i ma Romase ɔɔpɛ me ala ma kudzirii. Mapɛ me ata ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃. Ɔkolo ɔɔbiɛgu me i ndu iso ikpɛ itɛ. Fiɛ loɔwe i ndu ame kasɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu ku ikpɛnɛ iwɛ̃ buu.

I wũ irisɛ gbodzoo ame ne, loɔbo i amɔrɛ̃ agbãagbã ame. Siwore ɔɔyi simɔɛ̃ me ikpɛ sirɛ̃sirɛ̃, loɔbo i mayukukpe nrɔɔ̃ ame. Loɔbo i imɔrɛ̃ ame i ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase nrɔɔ̃ ame. Loɔbo i imɔrɛ̃ ame i simagɛ̃ ame, fafuĩ ame, ɔpo iso gu mila manyii nrɔɔ̃ ame.
Loɔpia kubɛ lobara karabara teteree, losɛ kasɛ̃ sirɛ idaarɛ ayi gbodzoo, losɛ kukã, ɔme ɔkore me, fiɛ loina nnɛ loaɖe. Ɔyu ɔkpɛ̃ me, lona kabokɔ̃ fiɛ lona nnɛ loapia ana.
Ibua i nwagbe ɔɖuɖu iso ne, wũ ɔtu ɔta ɔɣɛ so iso ala mafɔɖedze akuri atɔ̃me sia me iso.
Si ɔrere sɔ ɔ̃ɔfɛ̃ ne, me loɔfɛ̃ loɖo, fiɛ si makɔ ɔrere mapia i ikpi ame ne, isɛ ibiɛ me ɔtu.
Si inya sɔ loaɖe ndamu ne, ara wa ame nna ɔle loasu loɖe ala ndamu.
Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Ɔse fiɛ ɔ̃ boale ɔwi biara ne, ɔɣe sɔ nwa ɔɖuɖu nto loɣɛ ngbe ne, loito lola sila.
Ɔwi gɔ lowe i Damasko ne, abã ɔkpakpa gɔ nto ɔbara karabara i Igara Areta kayirinɔ ɔtã madzuɛ̃ ɔmagɛ̃ kuyogodɔ̃ sɔ si mamɔɛ̃ me.
Ɣɛɛ masu me mapia i isɛsɛ ame makigu i ibere iyoi ame lotere wũ iso.
Atoa sɔ kusia kukuwɛ̃ na i ndamu iɖe ame ne, ikote sɔ loaɖe ndamu. Kiniɔ ne, loakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ loɣɛ iɖi ite gu ara wɛrɛa wa i Bosate ɔɖi ɔte me iso.
Loɣe Kristo ɔre ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i Bosate ɔsu ɔkɛlɛgu kuɖokpo tɛare i akɔ aweo-ana wa lofe ame. Sosina ame ɔwe o-o siwarã ame ɔwe o-o ne, loibawo ɔtsue, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔ̃ ɔɣe.
Mme sɔ loɣe ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ masu makɛlɛgu kato. Ɣɛɛ lɛ nto loɣɛ ne, loiɣe si sosina ame iɖe ɔkɛlɛ, ɣee siwarã ame iɖe, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔ̃ ɔɣe.
I Paradiso mmɔ ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔnɔ ara wa maitã ɔri sɔ maɣɛ gu nwã karɔ̃ ɔ̃ibawo ɔɖi.
Ne ɔso loaɖe ndamu i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe iso, ɣɛɛ iiɖe mme mɔmɔ iso. Si loaɖe ndamu ne, ara wa lote sɔ lona ɔle kuwɛ̃ iso loaɖe.

Fiɛ si mme sɔ loaɖe ndamu kɔra ne, loibaɖe ngɔ loikpa anɔ, alasɔ loibaɣɛ ara wa loiɖe ɔnukuare. Ɣɛɛ loibaɖe ndamu fiɛ maturi aaba maabu sɔ loɖe ɔturi siare loɖo kumɛgɔ ikote i wũ ikaɖe gu kurabarara ame.
Ne ɔso si loibaɖe ndamu i awawãra gbodzoo wa lonɔ ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔsu ɔnyɛ gɔ nsɛ ɔbo lɛ siyu ɔpia i wũ ame. Ɔnyɛ gɔgbe se lɛ Ɔbosam kpabo sɔ ɔpɛ me si loibakɔlɛ so kato.
Ikpɛ itɛ lokparama kayi loɣere Ɣaa sɔ ɔɖi ɔnyɛ gɔgbe i wũ ame.
Ɣɛɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, “Wũ abualɛra nɖe nnɛ lonya-ɔ, alasɔ wũ ɔle sɛ ɔte i fɔ ɔle idaawe ame ɔbua.” Ne ɔso so aaɣɔ me fiɛ loawo ndamu ɔɖe i wũ ɔle idaawe iti si Kristo ɔle aawe i wũ ame.
Ne ɔso si lona ɔle fiɛ mato matia me, ɣee nto lowe inyɛ, ɣee mato mati me kama, ɣee ara to awe me ɔle ne, ɔtu sɛ ɔɣɔ me ala Kristo ɔso, alasɔ si lona wũ iso ɔle ne, ne nsɛ lona Kristo ame ɔle ne.
Nto lobara ara lɛ ngɔ iikpa, ɣɛɛ mi lotã nto lobara ngbɔ alasɔ mi ikote sɔ miale me fiɛ. Katɔ̃memasɛdze kɔlɛa mamɔ iilɛ maɖo me i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso atoa sɔ loiɖe kuira.
Awawãra siare gu akparĩ gu ɔle karabara ga lobara i mi ndɛ̃ ku ɔtu ɣɔa kerekere ɔɔte sɔ katɔ̃mesɛdze mɔmɔ loɖe.
Ira sɛɛ iwɛ̃ pia gɔ lobara lotã mafɔɖedze mama fiɛ loitã mi? Ɛɛbɛrɛ sɔ loikpese ato i mi iso ɔso? Misu iɣɛrɛ nɛmɔ mitsɛ me.
Ɔkpɛ tɛare nto lobie sɔ loba mi kɔrɛ ne, ɣɛɛ loito lobie mi ibuai kuiwɛ̃. Mi mɔmɔ nto lobie ne iiɖe mi sikã alasɔ iiɖe mabi nsɛ mabie karana mafu ma maɣese ɣɛɛ maɣese nsɛ mabie masɛ mabi.
Iba me ɔmɛrɛ̃ sɔ loabara wũ karana ɔɖuɖu gu ɔle karabara i mi iso. Be ɔso miibaɖɔɛ me si mme nto loɖɔɛ mi wodoroo ngbɔ?
Mianɔgu me karɔ̃ sɔ loikpese mi ato. Ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ aaɣɛ sɔ inɔgba losu nto losɔsɔla mi.
Loki i mma lopia mi ɔwɛ̃ iso loɖe mi amumu?
Lopɛ Tito nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ɔkɛlɛ fiɛ loɖi fɔɖedze ɔwɛ̃ ana losiaira wũ. Tito ɔba ɔ̃aɖe mi amumu? Iiɖe adzuni awɛ̃ aɖe bo, fiɛ iiɖe ɔbara ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖe bo?

Ɔbu mito sɔ ɔwi gɔgbe ɔɖuɖu ame ne kanya boto boɖi so? Ooɣo! Boto boɖe mi ika lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo aabie sɔ boɖe mi ika i Ɣaa katɔ̃. Fiɛ ira biara nɛ boabara ne, bo manyii, bosɛ bobara si bosu bobuai mi

Nto lonigã sɔ kumɛgɔ lonyɔ ɔri sɔ mise ne, loibaba loanya mi ngbɔ. Fiɛ mi wũ kumɛgɔ minyɔ ɔri sɔ lose ne, miibanya me ngbɔ. Nto lonigã sɔ loaba loatu kalɔ, kanɔbɛbɛ, sikpã, wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ, maturi iyere inina, maturi iso ara iɣɛ, kato ikɔlɛso gu iɣɛɣɛso i mi ndɛ̃.
Nto lonigã ana sɔ ɔwi gɔ loaledza mi kɔrɛ iba ne, wũ Ɣaa to ɔ̃abɔ me karɔ̃ i mi katɔ̃ sɔ loabiɛ i mma lobara akpi wa nɖe asɔrɔ̃ra, anyanyara mafegu fiɛ maifiniki iti.
Ɔkpɛ tɛare nto loba mi kɔrɛ ne. Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ ne, “Itɔ̃me biara nɛ maaɣɛ i ɔturi iso ne, ikote sɔ maɖansiɛ aaɖe maturi inyɔ ɣee itɛ ma nto maɣɛ itɔ̃me iwɛ̃ fiɛ miatã ɔnyiiɔ ipɔ.”

Gɔ loba mi kɔrɛ ɔkpɛ nyɔare ne, losɛ̃ lotã mma lobara ikpi mafegu fiɛ loka ɔbiara ana. Kiniɔ gɔ lona i mi kɔrɛ ne, loto loledza ma ika sɔ manyua alasɔ si lokpese loba ne, loto loakpadzɛ̃ ma ɔɖuɖu kutsue.
Mito miana ita isiara ɔɖuɖu nɛ mito mibie sɔ Kristo sɛ ɔki i wũ iso ɔɖe mi ika. Ɔ̃iɖe ɔturi gɔ nna ɔle alasɔ ɔ̃ ɔle to ɔbara karabara teteree i mi ndɛ̃.

Ɔwi gɔ mapɛ Yesu mamatãra i kudziri iso ne, ɔse nyɔkɔ̃tɔɔ̃, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔtara wũ ɔbɔ ngbã ku ɔle. Bo ma lobaragu wũ mawɛ̃ ne, bose nyɔkɔ̃tɔɔ̃, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔle ɔrɛgɛ̃ra bo, ne ɔso bo wũ boawo nnɛ ikote sɔ boabara i mi ndɛ̃ ɔbara.
Mikere so minyɔ sɔ mikpese miɣɛ i kafɔkaɖe ame ana. Mikpa so kukaakɔ. Miinya sɔ Kristo Yesu pia i mi ame? Si ɔna miina kayakpa ne, iyɔ ɔna i mi ame.
Ɣɛɛ lofɔ loɖe sɔ mito mianya sɔ boba kayakpa kukaakɔ.
Boto Ɣaa i kukpa sɔ ɔbuai mi sɔ miibabara iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃. Iiɖe sɔ si ite maturi sɔ bo ne, boba kayakpa, ɣɛɛ si miabara isɛɛ, atoa sɔ ite lɛ boɔnɔ isɛɛ ibara.
Alasɔ boibawo kuira ɔbara ɔta ɔya i ɔnukuare iso, ɣɛɛ boabara nnɛ loapuãra wũ bowũ.
So sɛ siɣɔ bo si bose nyɔkɔ̃tɔɔ̃ fiɛ mi miba ɔle i kafɔkaɖe ame, ne ɔso bosɛ bokparama kayi sɔ mikɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ mimɔ miyi pɔpɔɔpɔ.

Nnɛgbe ɔso loto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã mi gɔ lona i mi kɔrɛ sɔ si loba ne, wũ kɔrɔ̃ iibafe ɔrɔrã iwe i mi iso iki i ɔle gɔ i Bosate ɔtã me ala ɔ̃ karabara ɔso ne. Ɔtã me ɔle gɔgbe sɔ losu lobuai mi ne iiɖe sɔ losu lowɔra mi ala.
Kawirikɔ̃ ne, wũ manyii, miwe kukaakɔ, si miyi pɔpɔɔpɔ. Mibara i wũ kuka iso, mi adzuni si aɖe awɛ̃ si miwe i isobuɛ ame. Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ maturi awune fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔtã isobuɛ si ɔwegu mi.
Miya mi malaa i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ame.
Mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu sɔ maya mi o-o.
Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra, Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ gu Siwarã Bielea sinyii ibara si iwegu mi ɔɖuɖu.
Galatians: Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme Paulo gɔ nɖe katɔ̃mesɛdze kɔrɛ. Iiɖe ɔturi awune loɖi me, fiɛ iiɖe ɔturi iso iki fiɛ lokpese katɔ̃mesɛdze, ɣɛɛ Yesu Kristo gu bo Ɔse Ɣaa gɔ lotara Yesu ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame lokpere me.
Bo gu manyii ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i ngbe to boya mi Ɣaa mafɔɖedze akuri wa ɔɖuɖu mpia i Galatia abuiti ame.
Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra gu isobuɛ si iwegu mi.
Iki i Ɣaa gɔ nɖe bo Ɔse kuɖɔɛ ame ne, Yesu Kristo ɔsu so ɔtã i bo akpi iti sɔ si ɔɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i nɔme kayi nyanyarĩa gagbe ame.
Boale Ɣaa ita i nɔme ka ikpa! Si iba ngbɔ.
Ito ibara me ɣii sɔ iifɔ ɔwi ɖuɖuuɖu ne, ka mifiniki i Ɣaa gɔ lokpere mi ala ɔ̃ abualɛra ɔso i kama mifɔ itɔ̃me bielea mama miɖe.
Gbaã ne, itɔ̃me bielea mama kuiwɛ̃ siina, ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ to mabie sɔ makpɔkpɔtɔra mi si mafinikira Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea.
Ɣɛɛ si bo, ɣee kpabo gɔ lobɔrɛ i kato ɔɣere mi Itɔ̃me Bielea mama nɛ loikotegu nnɛ boɣere mi ne, Ɣaa si ɔwɔra wũ pelepele.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ boɔɣɛ bofe ne, loto loledza iɣɛ sɔ, si ɔrere ɔba ɔ̃aɣere mi itɔ̃me mama nɛ loiɖe Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ mifɔ ne, Ɣaa si ɔwɔra ɔnyiiɔ.
Itɔ̃me nɛ loto loɣɛ ne, ɔɣɛ loto sɔ si loabo maturi anɔ ɛɛbɛrɛ Ɣaa? Maturi loto lobie sɔ loabo anɔ? Si maturi loto lobie sɔ loabo anɔ ne, iyɔ loiɖe Kristo ɔɖabo.
Manyii, loto lobie sɔ mitsue kukaakɔ sɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loto loɣɛ ne, iiɖe ɔturi awune kɔrɛ ibɔrɛ.
Iiɖe ɔturi awune kɔrɛ lofɔ lobɔrɛgu, fiɛ iiɖe kuwɛ̃ ɔɖe lote me, ɣɛɛ Yesu Kristo mɔmɔ loɖi ɔte me.
Miɣe kumɛgɔ losɛ ngbã lɛ ɔ Yudase gɔdɛĩ. Minɔ kumɛgɔ loti Ɣaa mafɔɖedze ikuri kama ku anɔmi rɛtɛa fiɛ lokpɛ̃ sɔ si lowɔra ne.
Wũ anɔ ɔrɛtɛ i ɔwa mɛrɛ̃ kubarara iso kukaakɔ sɔ losɛ katɔ̃ loɖo wũ isɛlaa gbodzoo i kubarara itsue ame.
Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔɖi me ɔsɛ ta wũ ɔnyi kayiri ame fiɛ ɔɖe me bualɛ ɔkpere me.
Ɔbara me kayiribielea ɔɖi ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɔte me sɔ si lopɛ ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea imomo i mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃. Gɔ ɔkpere me ne, loikarɛ kuwɛ̃ sɔ ɔte me nnɛ loabara.
Fiɛ loikɛlɛ Yerusalem sɔ loanya mma loɔɖe me katɔ̃ lɛ katɔ̃memasɛdze awe, ɣɛɛ lokɛlɛ Arabia ɔluwɛ̃ fiɛ ne kama ne, lokpese loba loafe Damasko.
Akɔ atɛ kama fiɛ losɛ Yerusalem sɔ loanya Petro, fiɛ ka lowegu wũ ayi aweo-aru.
Ɣɛɛ loinya katɔ̃mesɛdze kuwɛ̃ iɖo Yakobo gɔ nɖe Bosate ɔnyiibi.
Ɣaa ɣe sɔ nnɛ loto lotsɛrɛ losese mi ngbe ne, gbaã iɖe ne iiɖe sila siɖe.
Ne kama ne, losɛ Siria gu Kilikia abuiti ame.
Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Kristo mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Yudea iinya me manya.
Ɔnɔ kere maɔnɔ i maturi kanya sɔ, “Ngɔ lola ɔ̃ɔti bo kama ku ɔwiɔ ne, ka ɔɣɛ kafɔkaɖe itɔ̃me nɛ ame sɔ bodaaɣɛ!”
Ne ɔso male Ɣaa ala wũ ɔso.
Akɔ aweo-ana kama ne, bo gu Barnaba ɔkpese bokɛlɛ Yerusalem fiɛ lokɔ Tito ana losɛgu.

Ɣaa loɖi ɔte me ɔso fiɛ lokɛlɛ. Gɔ losɛ loabo ne, losarɛgu mma lonya sɔ ma nɖe makpakpa i ma ndɛ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ fiɛ loɖi Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loto loɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase lote ma. Lobara ngbɔ sɔ karabara ga loɔbara lofegu gu nga loto lobara kiniɔ iibakpese siefe.
Atoa sɔ Tito gɔ lokɔ losɛgu iiɖe ɔ Yudase ne, kuwɛ̃ iiɣiɛ wũ sɔ ɔtu sirɛrɛ̃.
Ɣɛɛ maladze mawɛ̃ ma mpia i mafɔɖedze ikuri ame to mayu bo manyɔ sɔ isɛguso nɛ boba i Kristo ame ne, maamɔɛ̃ ne mafɔ, makpesera bo masande matã ma Yudase kubarara.
Gɔ ɔbie boto sɔ ɔnukuare ɔɖuɖu gɔ mpia i Itɔ̃me Bielea ame si ɔse ɔtã mi ɔso ne, boitɔrãgu ma ɖuɖuuɖu.
Mma lobu so sɔ makpakpa maɖe ne, maitã me adzuni ɣɛtɛ kuawɛ̃. Si maturi nyaa maɖe kɔra ne, iiɖe ne lonya me, alasɔ Ɣaa iisɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi i katɔ̃.
Ɣɛɛ manya maɖi ite sɔ Ɣaa karabara ga ɔtã me nɖe sɔ loaɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase Itɔ̃me Bielea lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔpia Petro ana sɔ ɔɣere ma Yudase.
Alasɔ Ɣaa gɔ loki i Petro iso ɔbara karabara i ma Yudase ndɛ̃ ne, ɔ̃ ame loki i wũ iso ɔbara karabara i mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃ ne.

Yakobo gu Petro gu Yohanes mɛrɛ̃ ma i maturi sɛ manyɔ lɛ mafɔɖedze makpakpa ne, mafɔ bo nrɔɔ̃ minyɔ gɔ manya sɔ Ɣaa abualɛra piagu me gbaã. Masia ita sɔ bokɛlɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase kɔrɛ boaɣere ma Itɔ̃me Bielea si ma wũ makɛlɛ ma Yudase kɔrɛ maaɣere ma.
Nnɛ kere makarɛ mabɔrɛgu i bo kɔrɛ nɖe sɔ, bonyigi mawɛrɛba ma mpia i ma ndɛ̃ fiɛ mme wũ ne, ngbɔ ame tutuutu nsɛ lobie sɔ loabara ne.
Gɔ Petro ɔba Antiokia ne, lonyagalagu wũ i maturi ndɛ̃ alasɔ ɔbara nnɛ loikote.

Alasɔ si mawɛ̃ aabɔrɛ i Yakobo kɔrɛ maba ne, ɔsɛ ɔɖe ara gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase. Ɣɛɛ gɔ mmagbe ɔba maabo ne, ɔbɛse so ɔɖi sɔ ɔ̃isito ɔɖe aɖera ku mma loiɖe ma Yudase alasɔ ɔto ɔnigã mma nsɛ maɣɛ sɔ inya sɔ maatu sirɛrɛ̃.
Mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ma nɖe ma Yudase ɔbuai ma i mila ara wagbe ame gɔ itã sɔ makpadzɛ̃ ta Barnaba mapia i ne ame.

Ɣɛɛ gɔ lonya sɔ nnɛ mabara iikotegu nnɛ mpia i Itɔ̃me Bielea ame ne, loɣere Petro i ma ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃ sɔ, “Si fɔ ngɔ fɔ nɖe ɔ Yudase ɔsɛ ngbã lɛ ngɔ loiɖe ɔ Yudase ne, be ɔso fiɛ ato aɣiɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɔ masɛ ngbã lɛ ma Yudase?”
I ɔnukuare ame ne, ma Yudase boɖe ta siɖu ame, boiɖe mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ maɖe makpibaradze.

Ɣɛɛ ne, boɣe sɔ iiɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara i mmara iso nɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa, ɣɛɛ ngɔ lofɔ Kristo Yesu ɔɖe. Ne ɔso bo wũ bofɔ boɖe sɔ Ɣaa aafɔ bo sɔ bose bɔlɔlɔ gɔ bofɔ Kristo boɖe ɔso, iiɖe kumɛgɔ bobara i mmara iso ɔso. Alasɔ kuwɛ̃ iibaɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa i Ɣaa anɔ iki i mmara ibara iso ame.
Ne ɔso si boto bopia kubɛ sɔ mafɔ bo sɔ bose bɔlɔlɔ alasɔ bobara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo fiɛ kama iba iate sɔ bosɛ bobara ikpi ne, ite sɔ Kristo ɔtɔrã ɔsia i ikpi ibara iso? Ooɣo!
Si lokpese loto lobara ira nɛ losɛ̃ sɔ iilɛ ne, iyɔ mme mɔmɔ loɔte so sɔ ngɔ loisɛ ɔbara i mmara iso loɖe.
I mmara kasɛ ne, loɔkpi lotã me sɔ si loasɛ ngbã lotã Ɣaa.

Bo gu Kristo ɔɖe mapɛ mamatãra i kudziri iso. Ne ɔso kiniɔ ne, iisiɖe mme mɔmɔ ka nsi ngbã, ɣɛɛ Kristo nsi ngbã i wũ ame. Ngbã mɛ losi kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa Ɔbi gɔ loɖɔɛ me fiɛ ɔsu so ɔtã i wũ iti kafɔkaɖe ame losi me.
Loito lokora kama lotã Ɣaa abualɛra. Alasɔ si mmara iso ibara ame i Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ ne, iyɔ Kristo kukpi ɖe siefe.
Mi ma Galatiase, miikpa anɔ! Nna ɔɖe lokpɔkpɔtɔra mi adzuni ngbɔ? Loɣere mi kumɛgɔ tutuutu mapɛ Yesu mamatãra i kudziri iso.
Lobie sɔ lonɔ ira iwɛ̃ karɔ̃ i mi kɔrɛ. Ɣaa Siwarã dzɛ mifɔ ne, nda ibara fiɛ mifɔ? Mmara iso mibara ɛɛbɛrɛ gɔ mifɔ itɔ̃me bielea miɖe ɔso?
Be ɔso mibo ndu ngbɔ? Mifɔ miɖe sɔ mi mɔmɔ miawo nnɛ karɔ̃ i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔsɛ ɔbara?
Inyɛwe nɛ ɔɖuɖu ame miki ne, siefe iɖe? Ooɣo! Iibaɖe siefe.
Kumɛgɔ mibara i mmara iso ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔsu ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔtã mi ɔto ɔbara awawãra i mi ndɛ̃, ɛɛbɛrɛ kumɛgɔ minɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me fiɛ mifɔ ne miɖe ɔso?
Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Abraham ɔfɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔnyɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.”
Ne ɔso ikote sɔ miatsue sɔ mma mba kafɔkaɖe nɖe Abraham mabi.

Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔɣɛ isɛ sɔ, Ɣaa to ɔ̃abara mma loiɖe ma Yudase bɔlɔlɔ iki i kafɔkaɖe ga maba ɔso. Ne ɔso i Ɣaa ɔɣere Abraham Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe kokooko sɔ, “Loatã kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu kusɛkusɛ iki i fɔ iso” ne.
Ne ɔso kiniɔ ne, mma ɔɖuɖu lofɔ maɖe ne, maafere ma kusɛkusɛ lɛ Abraham awe.
Ɣɛɛ mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i mmara kayirinɔ ne, sigbarĩ sia ma iso, alasɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɣaa itɔ̃me ame sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔbara i ara wa ɔɖuɖu matsɛrɛ mapia i mmara ɔko ame ne, sigbarĩ aasiai wũ.”
Iɔte sekelee kiniɔ sɔ Ɣaa iisɛ ɔnyɔ kuwɛ̃ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ alasɔ ɔbara i mmara iso ɔso, alasɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔturi gɔ nse bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ aasɛ ngbã iki i kafɔkaɖe ame.”
Ɣɛɛ mmara gu kafɔkaɖe iiɖe ira ka iwɛ̃ alasɔ matsɛrɛ masɛ sɔ, “Ngɔ loabara i ara wagbe iso aasɛ ngbã ala wã ɔso.”
Gɔ Kristo ɔkpese ngɔ iso i sigbarĩ sia i bo kanya ɔso ne, ɔ̃ɔɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i mmara sigbarĩ kayirinɔ alasɔ matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ lokpi i kudziri iso ne, Ɣaa sigbarĩ sia wũ iso.”
Ne ɔso iki i Kristo iso ne, maafere kayiiso ɔɖuɖu kusɛkusɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ mafere Abraham kusɛkusɛ iso fiɛ boasu kafɔkaɖe bofɔ Siwarã dzɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã bo.

Manyii, lobie sɔ loasu ngbã ame ara awɛ̃ lote mi ikparĩ. Si ɔturi ɔbara ɔko ɔsɛ i kumɛgɔ maaɣɛ ɔ̃ ara makigu si sɔ ɔkpi fiɛ ɔ̃ɔpia kɔrɔ̃ i ɔko ame ɔro ne, kuwɛ̃ iisibawo ɔpɛ ɔfinikira, fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iisibawo kuira ɔsu ɔbua.

Kaɣɛkasɛ ga i Ɣaa ɔbara ne, Abraham gu ɔ̃ ɔbi ɔɣere. Ɣaa iiɣɛ sɔ, Abraham gu ɔ̃ mabi. Si ngbɔ ɔɣɛ ne, tee iate sɔ maturi gbodzoo ɔto, ɣɛɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mi gu fɔ ɔbi” gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ ɔturi ɔwɛ̃, fiɛ ɔ̃ nɖe Kristo ne.

Nnɛ loto loɣɛ nɖe sɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔnyi kanya gu Abraham gu ɔ̃ ɔbi ɔsia kã ita akɔ alafa ana gu sitɛ fiɛ mmara ɔba. Ne ɔso mmara mɛgbe iibawo kanya ga i Ɣaa ɔnyigu ma ɔtindza ɣee mibara sɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ iibaba i ne ame.
Si Ɣaa karatã gagbe ne mmara ame kabɔrɛ ne, tee iisiɖe kaɣɛkasɛ. Ɣɛɛ ne, ira iɖe i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔkã ndamu ɔtã Abraham.
Ne ɔso kiniɔ ne, be ɔso i mmara se? Ɣaa ɔtã mmara sɔ si ɔturi aatsue nnɛ nɖe iɣɛrɛ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ maaɣe Abraham ɔɣekparɛ Ɔbi gɔ iso maɣɛ itɔ̃me masɛ. Ɣaa makpabo maɖe lokigu mmara i Mose iso matã maturi.
Kpuradze iisɛ ɔwe ɔtã ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ saã, ne ɔso gɔ Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ mpia ne, kpuradze iinya.
Mmara ne iyɔ ɔta mita miɣɛ i Ɣaa kaɣɛkasɛ iso? Ooɣo! Si mmara ne ɔle miba miatã ɔturi ɔsɛ ngbã ne, tee ɔturi aabara i mmara iso ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.
Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɔko Sekelea ɔɖi ɔte sɔ ikpi ɔnyi kayi ɔɖuɖu ito. Iba ngbɔ si Ɣaa kaɣɛkasɛ ga loki i Kristo kafɔkaɖe iso aakpese mma lofɔ Yesu Kristo maɖe karatã.
Si kafɔkaɖe gagbe aaba ne, mmara ɔbara bo ɔɖuɖu mayorɛdze gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa aaɖi Kristo kafɔkaɖe kayi.
Ne ɔso mmara ɔnyɔ bo iso gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ bofɔ Kristo sɔ si Ɣaa aatã bo ibɛ ala bo kafɔkaɖe ɔso.
Fiɛ kiniɔ gɔ kafɔkaɖe ɔɔba ɔso ne, iisiɖe mmara nto minyɔ bo iso.
Iki i Kristo Yesu kafɔkaɖe ɔso ne, mi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔkpese Ɣaa mabi.
Mi ma ɔɖuɖu mapie Ɣaa ndu fiɛ mibara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo ne, miɔpia Kristo lɛ awu awe.
Alasɔ ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ siina i ɔ Yudase gu ngɔ loiɖe ɔ Yudase ndɛ̃, ɔsande gu ngɔ nsigu so ndɛ̃, ɔrɛrɛ̃ gu ɔrɔ̃go ndɛ̃, ɣɛɛ mi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔkpese mawɛ̃ fiɛ mipia i sinyii ame ku Kristo.
Si miɖe Kristo mare ne, iyɔ Abraham mawa miɖe, fiɛ miaɖe ara wa i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ɔtã wũ.
Nnɛ loto loɣere mi nɖe sɔ, ayi kumɛgɔ i ngɔ nɖe biarase ɖe ɔbiɛtɛ ne, ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i ma gu maɖabo inyɔ ndɛ̃ atoa sɔ ɔ̃ mba ira biara fiɛ.
Alasɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ biarase ɔmɔ ne, ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ ɔse ara sɛ mawe i makararãse kayirinɔ isɛ iabo ɔwi gɔ i ɔ̃ ɔse ɔsɛ sɔ maasu ara wamɔ mapia wũ i nrɔɔ̃ ame.
Ngbɔ ame i bo wũ ne, bowe i kayiiso sile dzɛ lowe kayirinɔ lɛ masande awe fiɛ bomɔ i siwarã ame.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔsɛ ɔɣo ne, ɔpia ɔ̃ Ɔbi gɔ i ɔrɔ̃go ɔɣe, fiɛ ɔwe i mmara kayirinɔ.
Ɔ̃ i Ɣaa ɔpia sɔ ɔba ɔ̃atã kuso i mma mpia i mmara kayirinɔ iti si ɔfɔ bo ɔbara Ɣaa mabi ne.
Gɔ Ɣaa mabi miɖe ɔso ne, ɔsu ɔ̃ Ɔbi Siwarã dzɛ nsɛ sikparama kayi ku kuɖɔɛ siɣɛ sɔ, “Ao, Tete ɖɔɛse!” ɔpia i bo situ ame.
Ne ɔso ne, aisiɖe ɔsande, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔbi, fiɛ aafɔ ɔ̃ kaɣɛkasɛ lɛ biarase awe.
Ɔwi gɔ lofe fiɛ miiɣe Ɣaa ne, miɖe masande mitã sile dzɛ loiɖe Ɣaa.

Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ gɔ miɔba miatsue Ɣaa, ɣee loaɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa ka ɔɣe mi ne, be ɔso mito mibie sɔ miakpese mikɛlɛ siwarã nyanyarĩa fiɛ sina ɔle kɔrɛ sɔ miakpese sɛ̃ masande? Be ɔso mito mibie sɔ miakpese sɛ̃ masande ana?
Mikpese mito mitɛ ayi gu awa gu ɔwi gu akɔ minyɔ.
Ito me ifɔ̃ sɔ wũ ɔwi kere lonina i mi iso.
Wũ manyii, mise lɛ kumɛgɔ lose. Mme wũ ngbɔ ame kere lose lɛ mi ne, fiɛ loɣe sɔ miiɣɛrɛ me i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso.
Mianyigi sɔ ɔnyɛ ame loba mi kɔrɛ ɔkpɛ ɖeakatɔ̃ fiɛ loɣere mi Itɔ̃me Bielea.
Atoa sɔ wũ ɔnyɛ ɔɖaa mi ne, mifɔ me fiɛ miwarɛ me. Ana ne, mifɔ me lɛ Ɣaa kpabo, ɣee lɛ Kristo Yesu mɔmɔ!
Iɖe isoɣɔ gu kuɖɔɛ gɔ mina ku me? Lofɔ loɖe sɔ si ɔwo miawo kɔra ne, tee miɖi mi anɔmi mitã me.
Sɔ loɣere mi ɔnukuare ɔso ne, loɔkpese mi tsirise?
Mma nto mate sɔ mi ara ba ma ɔmɛrɛ̃ ne, ɔsɔsɔla kere mato mi. Mana kasusu sɛɛ i mi iso. Ɔbie kere mato sɔ si mabɛse mi mabɔrɛgu i wũ iso si mipɛ mimatã ma.
Ilɛ sɔ anɔ aarɛtɛ mi i ira sɛɛ ibara ame fiɛ ngbɔ ikote sɔ iase ɔwi biara ne, iiɖe ɔwi gɔ lopia i mi kɔrɛ kere.
Wũ mabi ɖɔɛse, nto lonya ibo i mi iti lɛ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nto ɔkpɛ̃ kuɣe gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Kristo kumiamia aate so i mi ame.
Wũ kayiri tee mi kɔrɛ lopia kiniɔ si loafinikira wũ silɔ lote kumɛgɔ mise mitã me. Loto lomararã so i mi iso gbaã.
Mi ma nto mibie sɔ mmara iso miabara ne, mitã me itɔ̃me nɛgbe mmuai. Miinɔ nnɛ i mmara ɔɣɛ?
Matsɛrɛ masɛ sɔ, mabi birɛrɛĩ inyɔ i Abraham ɔwe. Ɔwɛ̃ ɖe ɔsanderɔ̃go ɔbi fiɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɖe ɔsɛre ɔbi.
Ɔbi gɔ i ɔsanderɔ̃go ɔɣe ne, maɣe wũ kere lɛ kumɛgɔ i ɔturi sɛ ɔɣe ɔbi, ɣɛɛ ngɔ i ɔsɛre ɔɣe ne, maɣe wũ iki i Ɣaa kaɣɛkasɛ ame.
Ara wagbe to ate ara nyaa awɛ̃. Marɔ̃go inyɔ magbe ɣɛ matã ndamu aka anyɔ. Ngɔ mabi maɣe i sisande ame nɖe Hagar fiɛ ɔɣɛ ɔtã ndamu mɛ makã i Sinai Kube iso.
Hagar ɔkategu Sinai kube gɔ mpia i Arabia. Ɔ̃ nɖe Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ nse kiniɔ ne, alasɔ ɔ̃ gu maturi ma mpia i ɔ̃ ame ɔɖuɖu ɔkpese maɖe masande.
Ɣɛɛ Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ mpia i kato ne, ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ loiɖe ɔsande ɔɖe, fiɛ ɔ̃ nɖe bo ɔnyi ne.
Alasɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ,
“So si siɣɔ-ɔ fɔ ngɔ fɔ nɖe ɔlɛma,
fɔ ngɔ fɔ loiɣe ɔbi anya ne,
na isoɣɔ, si ala isoɣɔ kulu.
Alasɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ i ɔ̃ ɔrã ɔɖi atsue ne,
ɔ̃ mabi to maasi maɖo ngɔ ɔrã pia i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ɔwi biara.”
Kiniɔ ne wũ manyii, kaɣɛkasɛ mabi miɖe lɛ Isak awe.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ ise ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame gɔ ɔbi gɔ maɣe i ɔrã gu ɔre kuɖɔɛ kanya ɔti ɔbi gɔ maɣe i Siwarã ɔle kama ne, ngbɔ ame ise kiniɔ ana ne.
Ɣɛɛ ne, be i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ? Matsɛrɛ sɔ, “Sa ɔsanderɔ̃go gu ɔ̃ ɔbi, alasɔ ɔsandebi gu ɔsɛrebi iibaɣɛ so ara maɖe.”
Ne ɔso ne manyii, iiɖe ɔsanderɔ̃go loɣe bo, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛre mabi boɖe.
Isɛguso i Kristo to ɔbie sɔ bona ɔso fiɛ ɔɖi bo, ne ɔso mitã boya teteree i bo isɛguso ame. Midaatã kuwɛ̃ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃akpesera mi masande ana.
Mikã atsue, mme Paulo to loɣere mi sɔ, si mitã matu mi sirɛrɛ̃ ne, iyɔ Kristo iiɖe kusia kukuwɛ̃ ɔtã mi.
Fiɛ nto lobie sɔ ikpa mi ɔbiara sekelee sɔ, si ɔrere ɔtã matu wũ sirɛrɛ̃ ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃abara i mmara ɔɖuɖu iso.
Mi mma nto mibie sɔ manyɔ mi sɔ mise bɔlɔlɔ alasɔ mibara i mmara iso ne, mitsue sɔ miɔbɛse so i Kristo iso fiɛ miɔkora kama mitã Ɣaa sɔ ɔdaasinyɔ mi nnya.
Ɣɛɛ bo ne, gɔ bofɔ Siwarã Bielea boɖe ɔso ne, boɣara so pɔkɔsɔɔ boto bonyɔ ɔri sɔ Ɣaa aanyɔ bo sɔ bose bɔlɔlɔ.
Si bobara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu ne, iito kuira si matu-ɔ sirɛrɛ̃ ɣee maitu-ɔ. Nnɛ lonya kere nɖe sɔ boasu kafɔkaɖe boɖɔɛ bo manyii.
Mila miɔpia kubɛ gbaã ku ɔwiɔ, ɣɛɛ ne, nna kowũ ɔɖe lotɛ̃ mi ɔri sɔ midaakã nnɛ nɖe ɔnukuare atsue?
Iiɖe Ɣaa gɔ lokpere mi ɔɖe lofinikira mi adzuni kumɛgɔgbe.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ maɣɛ sɔ, “Inyagɛ̃ kua kɛkɛĩ kere iɖe nsɛ itã mmɔre ɔɖuɖu ɔnyagɛ̃.”
Loba kafɔkaɖe sɔ Bosate iibatã mifɔ kuwɛ̃ adzuni iɖo wũ are. Ɣɛɛ ɔnyiiɔ gɔ nto ɔfinikira mi adzuni ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ wũ kutsue.
Ɣɛɛ wũ manyii, si lokpese loto lote ara loɣɛ sɔ matu sirɛrɛ̃ ne, be ɔso fiɛ makpese mato mati me kama? Si ngbɔ loto lote ne, iyɔ wũ Ɣaa itɔ̃me iɣɛ i Kristo kukpi i kudziri iso iibata iya kuwɛ̃ iso.
Mma nto makpɔkpɔtɔra mi kumɛgɔgbe ne, magɔ̃ so kere si iro!
Manyii, ɔɖi i Ɣaa ɔɖi mi sɔ miasɛgu so, ɣɛɛ midaasu mi isɛguso mibara ikpi. Ɣɛɛ mitã bosu bo isɛguso bobuai so iso i kuɖɔɛ ame.
Mmara ɔɖuɖu ɔdziri nɖe sɔ, “Ɖɔɛ fɔ ɔlaa lɛ kumɛgɔ ato aɖɔɛ so.”
Nto loɣere mi sɔ si mito mikpɛkpɛti so mibara so ara boa lɛ mabɔi lalaa ne, mitsue sɔ mito miawɔra so.
Mitã Ɣaa Siwarã si site mi kumɛgɔ miasɛ ngbã, iyɔ miibabara ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ mi sosina ɔkã.

Alasɔ ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ sosina ɔkã ne, ata aɣɛ i nwa i Ɣaa Siwarã sɛ sibie iso. Fiɛ ara wa i Ɣaa Siwarã sɛ sibie ne, wã wũ ata aɣɛ i nwa i sosina sɛ sibie iso. Ara ka anyɔ wagbe ɔta aɣɛ so iso sɔ si midaabara nnɛ mito mibie.
Si Ɣaa Siwarã nsɛgu mi ne, iyɔ misiina i mmara kayirinɔ.
Ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ sosina ɔkã ne, ate so sekelee. Wã nɖe asɔrɔ̃ iɖe, anyanyara, asopara,
aɣɔ kasumu gu kabuɛ ikpɛ̃, ituritsiri, kalɔ ilɔ, sirerɛ, sikpã ina, fɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ ibie, maturi gu akuri ndɛ̃ iɣɛɣɛ,
kanɔbɛbɛ, ndã irɛ̃, isoɣɔ lala ina, gu ara mama wagbe igbã. Nto loɣere mi lɛ kumɛgɔ loɔɣere mi lofegu sɔ, mma nsɛ mabara ara wagbe igbã ne, maibasɛ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ manya.
Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa Siwarã ne, ara wa nsɛ abɔrɛ i sɛ̃ kɔrɛ nɖe kuɖɔɛ, isoɣɔ, isobuɛ, ɔtu ɣɔa, kayiribielea, ara sɛɛ ibara, ara ibara i ɔri iso,
karɔ̃ ibɔso gu iɖesoiso. Mmara kumiwɛ̃ iita miɣɛ i ara wagbe kuiwɛ̃ iso.
Mma nɖe Kristo Yesu mare ne, maɔpɛ ma iso sina mamatãra i kudziri iso gu sɛ̃ ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ sɛ̃ ɔkã ɔɖuɖu.
Ɣaa Siwarã lotã bo ngbã, ne ɔso mitã bosɛ ngbã i sɛ̃ kuɖɔɛ ame.
Midaatã bokɔlɛ so kato, ɣee bopia so sikpã, ɣee bokpɛ̃gu so sirerɛ.
Wũ manyii, si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ɔbara ikpi ne, mi ma i Ɣaa Siwarã sɛgu si miɣara so pɔkɔsɔɔ mika wũ sɔ ɔ̃akpese ɔya i kafɔkaɖe ame. Ɣɛɛ ne, nyɔ so kukaakɔ sɔ fɔ wũ ne, maibala-ɔ manyɔ.
Si mibuai so i imɔrɛ̃ ame ne, iyɔ mito mibara i Kristo mmara iso.
Si ɔrere ɔbu sɔ ɔɖe ira ku ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃iɖe kuira ne, ɔsɔsɔla kere ɔto so.
Ɔbiara si ɔkere ɔ̃ mɔmɔ kurabarara ɔnyɔ. Si ɔbara ngbɔ ne, ɔto ɔ̃anya si kulɛ fiɛ ɔ̃anya nnɛ iso ɔ̃aya ɔ̃aɖe ndamu. Iikote sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔkateragu ɔmama kure.
Alasɔ ɔbiara to ɔ̃asore ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ato.
Ngɔ nto ɔsuã kafɔkaɖe ara ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃atã ngɔ nto ɔte wũ ara ɔna kusia i ɔ̃ ara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu ame.
Midaasɔsɔla so. Kuwɛ̃ iibawo Ɣaa sɔsɔla. Nnɛ i ɔturi ɔpɛ i kakpɛkɔ̃ ame ne, ne ɔ̃abɛse ne.
Ngɔ lopɛ ara i sosina ɔkã kanya ne, kukpi nɖe nnɛ ɔ̃abɛse ɔɖi i ne ame. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ lopɛ ara i Siwarã ɔkã kanya ne, ngbã mɛ nna katui nɖe nnɛ ɔ̃abɛse ɔbɔrɛgu i Siwarã ame.
Midaatã ira sɛɛ ibara si itɔrɛ bo, alasɔ si iitɔrɛ bo ne, boto boana ne kusia i ɔwi gɔ lokote iso.
Ne ɔso gɔ bokpese boba ɔri ne, mitã bobara isɛɛ botã ɔbiara titirio mma nɖe bo manyii Kristo mafɔɖedze.
Mi mɔmɔ minyɔ atɔ̃me siare wa lotsɛrɛ losese mi ngbe ala wũ kɔrɔ̃!

Mma nto maɣiɛ mi sɔ ikote sɔ miatu sirɛrɛ̃ ne, ɔte kere mato so fiɛ mato makɔlɛ so kato ala sosina ame ara ɔso. Nnɛ ɔso mato mabara ngbɔ nɖe sɔ, maito mabie sɔ mati ma kama i Kristo kukpi i kudziri iso.
Alasɔ mma lotu sirɛrɛ̃ kɔra ne, maito mabara i mmara iso, ɣɛɛ mato mabie sɔ mitu sirɛrɛ̃ si maaɖe ndamu sɔ ma lotã mitu.
Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa si ɔbuai me sɔ loibaɖe ndamu i kuira iso iɖo Bosate Yesu Kristo kukpi i kudziri iso ame. Iki i ɔ̃ kukpi i kudziri iso ame ne, loɔkpi lotã kayiiso fiɛ kayiiso ana iisiɖe me kuira.
Matu-ɔ sirɛrɛ̃ o-o, maitu-ɔ sirɛrɛ̃ o-o ne, iiɖe ne lonya, ɣɛɛ nnɛ lonya iɖo nɖe sɔ aɖe ɔturi ɣɛtɛ.
Ɣaa si ɔnyɔ mma nsɛ masɛ i ɔri gɔgbe iso nnya si ɔtã ma isobuɛ. Ɔbara ngbɔ ɔtã Ɣaa maturi ɔɖuɖu ana.
Ita i kiniɔ kama ne, kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaasiɖaa me, alasɔ aɣɛipã wa nsia me iso ɔɔte sɔ Yesu ɔsande loɖe.
Wũ manyii, Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu mi ɔɖuɖu! Si iba ngbɔ.
Ephesians: Mme Paulo gɔ iki i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ɔso loɖe Yesu Kristo katɔ̃mesɛdze ɔɖe nto ɔtsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã mi ma masekelera i Efeso fiɛ mito mibara ara i ɔri iso i Kristo ame.
Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
Boto bopɛ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo Ɔse siba sɔ ɔtã bo siwarã ame kusɛkusɛ biara gɔ lobɔrɛ i kato iki i bo mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo ame.
Alasɔ iki i Kristo iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɔɖi bo ɔsɛ, fiɛ ɔbara kayiiso sɔ boase sekelee, ikpi kuiwɛ̃ iibawe bo iso i ɔ̃ katɔ̃.
Gɔ Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ bo ɔso ne, ɔ̃ɔsia ita koko sɔ iki i bo mawɛ̃ ibaragu Yesu Kristo ame ne, boakpese ɔ̃ mabi. Nnɛgbe nɖe Ɣaa adzuni koko ne.
Nnɛgbe ɔso ikote sɔ boale Ɣaa ne, alasɔ iba ɣaa sɔ ɔnyɔ bo nnya, ala ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɖɔɛse ɔso.
Alasɔ iki i Kristo kukpi iso ne, bona iɖi gɔ ite sɔ boɔna akpi isu itsɛ. Ɣaa abualɛra ɔmɔ kere!
Ɔ̃ abualɛra wa ɔba ɔtã bo ɔwodoro fiɛ i ɔ̃ iwola gu inɔgba ɔɖuɖu ame ne,
Ɣaa ɔbara nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ. Ɔɖi ɔ̃ ara wɛrɛa ɔte bo. Nwa ɔsia ita ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃abara ɔwiri ɔkigu i Kristo iso.
Nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃abara ɔwiri si ɔwi ɔɔɣo nɖe sɔ, ɔ̃akpere ɔ̃ kurabara ɔɖuɖu ɔsirakanya, ara wa mpia i kuɖokpo gu nwa mpia i karɔ̃ iso, sɔ wã ɔɖuɖu aawe i Kristo kayirinɔ.
Ɣaa ɔtã ira biara ɔba i ne ame lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔbie tutuutu. Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ loɖi bo ɔsɛ sɔ boabara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo,
sɔ bo ma nɖe maɖeakatɔ̃ i Kristo ɔriinyɔ ame kokooko aasɛ ngbã bole ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ.
Ne ɔso mi wũ mikpese Ɣaa maturi gɔ minɔ itɔ̃me gbaã, Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ lobɔ mi iɖi. Mifɔ Kristo miɖe, ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔsu Siwarã Bielea dzɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã ɔsia mi ikparĩ nɛ loate sɔ ɔ̃ mare miɖe.
Ɣaa Siwarã dzɛgbe nɖe ita isiara sɔ boto boafɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã ɔ̃ maturi ne. Ana ne, isɛ isia ita itã bo sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã mma nɖe ɔ̃ mare iwarã pelepele. Mitã bole ɔ̃ iyere!
Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, ita i ɔwi gɔ lonɔ mi kafɔkaɖe i Bosate Yesu ame gu mi kuɖɔɛ gɔ miba mitã Ɣaa maturi ɔɖuɖu ne,
loinyua Ɣaa siba ɔpɛ i mi iti fiɛ losɛ lokparama kayi i mi iti ɔwi biara.
Nsɛ lokarɛ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo Ɔse, ngɔ nɖe ikpawaĩ ɔɖuɖu Sate sɔ ɔtã mi siwarã dzɛ loatã mitsue ara, fiɛ siaɖi Ɣaa site mi mitsue wũ kukaakɔ.
Nsɛ lokarɛ wũ sɔ ɔbusi mi anɔ sɔ mianya nnɛ ɔso fiɛ ɔkpere mi ɔbɔ sɔ mianyɔ ne ɔri. Ɔbie sɔ si miatsue kumɛgɔ i nnɛ ɔledza ɔsɛ mma masekelera ɔfɔ kuɣa.
Ɔbie ana sɔ botsue kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ ɔle gɔ nto ɔbara karabara i bo ma lofɔ wũ boɖe ame ɔmɔ. Ɔle gɔ nto ɔbara karabara i bo ame teteree ngbe ne, ɔ̃ nɖe
ɔle gɔ i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtara ala Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛra i ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ iso i kato ne.

Kristo to ɔɖe sigara i sile dzɛ ɔɖuɖu nto siɖe iso i kato, ɔle gɔ i maturi ba i ara iso, sile agbãagbã dzɛ mpia gu sigarakuɖekɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso. Ɔ̃ iyere ɔɖe ayere wa ɔɖuɖu mpia kayi kiniɔ gu kayi ga nto kaaba iso.
Ɣaa ɔsu ira biara ɔpia i Kristo ngba kayirinɔ fiɛ ɔsu wũ ɔtã mafɔɖedze ikuri lɛ Sate gɔ mba ɔle i ira biara iso.
Mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛgbe nɖe Kristo siturina dzɛ lotã sɔ ɔyi fiɛ ɔpia i ira biara ame ne.
Ɔwiɔ ne, mikpi i siwarã ame ala mi atsuele gu akpi ɔso.
Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, misiai kayiiso ɔri lalaa gu Tsirise gɔ nto ɔɖe siwarã lalaa ɔɖuɖu iso i ɔwiri ame fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe matsuelese ɔɖuɖu ana iso kiniɔ.

Gbaã ne, bo ɔɖuɖu ɔse lɛ ma, fiɛ bosɛ ngbã lɛ kumɛgɔ i bo siturina sɛ siɖɔɛ fiɛ isɛ ipia bo adzuni ana isoɣɔ. Nsɛgbai mɛgbe igbã bosɛ ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔnagu bo sikpã lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔnagu kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu sikpã ne.
Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ nɛ ɔba ɔtã bo na katui fiɛ ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ana ɔmɔ gbaã.
Atoa sɔ bo akpi ɔso ne boɔkpi ne, ɔtã bota bobɔrɛ i makpise ame ku Kristo. Ɣaa abualɛra kere ɔso boba ngbã.
Gɔ bobara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔɔtara bo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame sɔ boaɖegu wũ sigara i ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ i kato.
Ɣaa ɔbara nnɛgbe si ɔsu ɔte ta mma maiɣe mabɔ kayi sɔ kuira na gɔ ikategu ɔ̃ abualɛra gu kayiribielea ga ɔba ɔtã bo ala Kristo Yesu ɔso.
Abualɛra ɔso kere ɔfɔ mi iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne iiɖe isɛɛ kuiwɛ̃ nɛ mibara ɔso, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa karatã kaɖe.
Iiɖe kuwɛ̃ kubɛ ipia ame ibɔrɛ sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔɖe ndamu.
Ɣaa ɔbara bo ala ɔ̃ arɔĩ, fiɛ iki i bo mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo Yesu ame ne, ɔ̃ɔbara bo ɔtã ara sɛɛ ibara nɛ ɔ̃ɔledza bo ɔsɛ ɔtã koko.
Minyigi sɔ mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ne, ɔwiɔ ne, ma Yudase ma matu sirɛrɛ̃ sɛ matia mi sɔ mma maitu sirɛrɛ̃, ɣɛɛ sirɛrɛ̃ itu nɛgbe ne, sosina ame kubarara kere kuɖe, fiɛ ɔturi kere lobara ala arɔĩ.
Minyigi sɔ ɔwi gɔ lofe ne, mibua midzorogu Kristo. Mafɔ miɖe, fiɛ miiɖe Ɣaa maturi. Mina kayakpa kukawɛ̃ i kaɣɛkasɛ ga i Ɣaa ɔtã ɔ̃ maturi ame. Miwe i ngbã ame gɔ miiwe ɔriinyɔ, ɣee Ɣaa.
Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, iki i mawɛ̃ ibaragu Yesu Kristo ame ne, maɔboregu mi ma lodzoro mabɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ iki i Kristo ima nɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ ame.
Alasɔ Kristo mɔmɔ ɔbɔ bo isobuɛ gɔ ɔbara ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase mawɛ̃. Iki i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ sosina isu itã ame ne, ɔɖi itsiri nɛ lowe i ma ndɛ̃ lɛ ibere.
Ɔɖi ma Yudase mmara gu kubarara sɔ iki i ɔ̃ ngbã mɛ ɔsɛ i sosina ame ne, ɔsa ma aka wã anyɔɔ kanya. Ɔkpesera ma ɔturi ɣɛtɛ sɔ maabaragu wũ mawɛ̃ fiɛ isobuɛ aaba.
Iki i kukpi gɔ i Kristo ɔkpi i kudziri iso ame ne, ɔwɔra itsiri nɛ lowe i ma ndɛ̃, fiɛ iki i kukpi gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔ̃ɔfere ma gu Ɣaa kanya ndu.
Ne ɔso ɔba ɔ̃aɣere maturi ɔɖuɖu isobuɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea. Ɔɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ madzorogu Ɣaa gu ma Yudase ma lobore mabo wũ.
Kristo iso iki fiɛ bo ɔɖuɖu, ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase aawo bo Ɔse kɔrɛ ɔba i Ɣaa Siwarã siwɛ̃ ame.
Ne ɔso miisiɖe mafɔ ɣee marisɛdze, ɣɛɛ mi gu Ɣaa maturi ɔɔkpese Ɣaa ɔmagɛ̃ gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi.
Mise lɛ ibere nɛ matsue masia i Katɔ̃memasɛdze gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze iso fiɛ Kristo Yesu mɔmɔ nɖe ita nɛ lonya iɖo.
Ɔ̃ lomɔɛ̃ kubereku ɔɖuɖu ɔsa fiɛ ikpese iyo iwɛ̃, fiɛ ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔtsue iyo ikpese Ɣaa isɔrɛyo sekelea.
Gɔ mibaragu Kristo mawɛ̃ ɔso ne, mato matsue mi gu matsɔra ɔɖuɖu makpesera iyo nɛ ame i Ɣaa aasɛ iki i ɔ̃ Siwarã ame.
Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ mme Paulo gɔ nɖe yorɛdze ala Kristo Yesu ɔso i mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase iti ne, nsɛ lokparama kayi lotã Ɣaa.
Gbaã ne, lofɔ loɖe sɔ miɔnɔ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔnyɔ me nnya fiɛ ɔtã me karabara gagbe i mi iti.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ lotsɛrɛ lotã mi kurukutu ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔ̃ nnɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abara ɔwɛrɛ ɔte me.
Si mika ɔko gɔgbe ne, mito miatsue kumɛgɔ lonɔ Kristo ara wɛrɛa karɔ̃.
Kokooko ne, Ɣaa iiɖi ara wɛrɛa wagbe ɔte maturi, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔki i ɔ̃ Siwarã iso ɔɖi ɔte ɔ̃ katɔ̃memasɛdze sekelea gu ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze.

Iwɛrɛra nɛgbe nɖe sɔ, iki i Itɔ̃me Bielea ame ne, mma loiɖe ma Yudase gu ma Yudase ka maatoto maɖe ɔ̃ ara. Maɔkpese sosina siwɛ̃ iso ara, fiɛ ka maba kaɖekɔ̃ i kaɣɛkasɛ ga i Ɣaa ɔtã ɔkigu i Kristo Yesu ame.
Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ ɔle ame ɔɖe me bualɛ gɔ ɔsu me ɔbara Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe ɔɖabo.
Atoa sɔ mme nɖe kosore i Ɣaa mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃ ne, ɔɖe me bualɛ sɔ losu ɔ̃ karana gbodzoo ga mpia i Kristo ame lopɛ imomo lotã mma loiɖe ma Yudase.
Ɔpia me sɔ lotã maturi ɔɖuɖu si matsue Ɣaa gɔ lobara ara ɔɖuɖu adzuni wɛrɛa wa ɔbara ɔsɛ ta kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.
Fiɛ iaki i mafɔɖedze iso ne, Ɣaa aaɖi ɔ̃ iwola siare i siri gbodzoo iso ɔte mma nto maɖe iso gu mma nɖe sile sate ma nto maɖe iso i kuɖokpo ame.
Nnɛgbe nɖe nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃abara kokooko fiɛ iibafe inya ne. Kiniɔ ne, ɔ̃ɔtã iba i ne ame iki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso.
Gɔ bofɔ Kristo boɖe fiɛ bobaragu wũ mawɛ̃ ɔso ne, ka boba katetere sɔ boabore bobo Ɣaa gɔ boisibanigã.
Ne ɔso loto mi i kukpa sɔ inyɛ nɛ loto lowe i mi kanya si idaafɛfɛ̃ra mi nrɔɔ̃ alasɔ isaruɛ kerekere iakpadzɛ̃ ibɔ mi.
Nnɛgbe ɔso loto lopɛ Tete nrɔɔ̃ ne,
ngɔ kɔrɛ i ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔɖuɖu gɔ i kato gu karɔ̃ ɔfɔ iyere kubɔrɛgu.
Loto lokparama kayi sɔ Ɣaa si ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔle gɔ mpia i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ siare ame ɔpia ta mi kame ame.
Ana ne, mi kafɔkaɖe si katã sɔ Kristo aana kasɛ i mi situ ame, si mi kuɖɔɛ si kure siɖu sɔ miaya teteree.
Fiɛ miawe ɔle sɔ mi gu mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu aanɔ kuɖɔɛ gɔ i Kristo ba ɔtã mi karɔ̃. Kuɖɔɛ gɔgbe ɔbɛ, kukarã, kukɔlɛ, fiɛ kuwodoroo.
Ibua i ne iso ne, Ɣaa si ɔtã mitsue Kristo kuɖɔɛ gɔ karɔ̃ i maturi iibawo ɔnɔ sɔ Ɣaa kumiamia aayi i mi ame pɔpɔɔpɔ.
Ɣaa nɖe ngɔ ɔle nto ɔbara karabara i bo ame. Ɔsɛ ɔwo ira biara ɔbara ɔtã bo ɔɖo kumɛgɔ bokarɛ ɣee bobu.
Ile nɖe ɔ̃ gɔmɔ ɔkpɛ i mafɔɖedze ikuri gu Kristo Yesu ame ɔwi biara ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ. Si iba ngbɔ.
Ne ɔso gɔ lorɛ i iyo ala Bosate karabara ɔso ne, loto mi i kukpa sɔ mi nsɛgbai si mikotegu ngbã mɛ ɔso i Ɣaa ɔkpere mi.
Mibɔ so karɔ̃ si miɖe maturi ɣɔa ana ne, mina ɔtu. Misu kuɖɔɛ mitã so i kumɛgɔ miafɔ mi malaa.
Gɔ Ɣaa Siwarã ɔɔbara mi mawɛ̃ ne, miki i ɔri biara iso sɔ miasɛgu so i isobuɛ ame.
Sosina siwɛ̃ gu Siwarã siwɛ̃ pɛ siɖe mpia, ngbɔ ame i ira ka iwɛ̃ pɛ i Ɣaa ɔkpere bo sɔ boanyɔ ɔri botã ne.
Sate ɔwɛ̃ gu kafɔkaɖe kawɛ̃ saã boba fiɛ Ɣaa itupie iwɛ̃ saã bofɔ.
Ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa gu Ɔse ɔwɛ̃ saã i maturi awune ɔɖuɖu ba ne. Ɔ̃ loɖe ira biara iso fiɛ ɔto ɔbara karabara ɔkigu i ira biara ame, ɔpia i ira biara ame ana.
Fiɛ Kristo ɔki i ɔ̃ kayiribielea iso ɔtã bo ɔbiara karatã.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Ɔwi gɔ ɔya ɔkɛlɛ kato ne,
ɔkɔ maturi gbodzoo ma iti ɔkpɛ̃ ɔfɔ ɔkɛlɛgu
fiɛ ɔtã maturi karatã.”
Ne ɔso gɔ maɣɛ sɔ ɔya ɔkɛlɛ kato ne, ite sekelee sɔ ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔso ɔkɛlɛ ta karɔ̃ ame ana.
Ne ɔso ngɔ loso ɔba karɔ̃ ne, ɔ̃ ame loya ɔkɛlɛ ta kato pelepele fiɛ ɔyi i kayiiso ira biara ame ne.
Ɔ̃ ɔɖe lotã maturi karatã ne. Ɔbara mawɛ̃ katɔ̃memasɛdze, mawɛ̃ kanyamaɖidze fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana mma nsɛ mawe maki maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea. Ɔbara mamama mafɔɖedze matɔ̃ɖedze gu maratedze.
Ɔtã ma karabara gagbe sɔ iaki ma iso ne, maaledza mafɔɖedze matã Ɣaa karabara matã Kristo masiaidze katɔ̃ isɛ.
Ɣaa ɔbara nnɛgbe sɔ bo ɔɖuɖu aaba boakpese mawɛ̃ i nnɛ bofɔ boɖe ame fiɛ boatsue Ɣaa Ɔbi pelepele. Boamɔ bokpese lɛ Kristo fiɛ ɔ̃ kumiamia aawe i bo ame.
Sɔ boisibaɖe mabiɛtɛ ma i ara ite ɣɛtɛ biara aafuri lɛ ɔwiri ɔsɛgu ɔkpesegu. Boibaɖe mma maaki i inɔgba ɔri masɔsɔla makɛlɛgu ikpi ame.
Ɣɛɛ i kuɖɔɛ ame ne, boaɖe ɔnukuare maɣɛse sɔ boamɔ i Kristo gɔ nɖe bo ɔɖuɖu iti ame.
Ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ lomɔɛ̃ kuturidziri ɔɖuɖu ita i akui, ibo i sitɔbɛ ame i ɔturi ame ɔsakanya. Ɔbara ngbɔ sɔ kuturidziri ngɔi ɔɖuɖu sɛ mibara karabara pɛpɛɛpɛ sɔ bo ɔɖuɖu aamɔ i kuɖɔɛ ame.
Ne ɔso i Bosate iyere ame ne, loto loka mi sɔ midaasɛ ngbã lɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ ma adzuni ɔnyanyarĩ,
ma adzuni ame se guduu. Mana kaɖekɔ̃ kukawɛ̃ i ngbã mɛ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã ame, maɖe matsuelese gu mma loisɛ mabɔ so karɔ̃.
Maisisɛ makpɛ̃ kunuarɛ i abarara pɛ̃ ibara iso, ne ɔso masɛ makɛkɛ anɔ mabara ara nyanyarĩa biara igbã.
Mi ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe ara wagbe misuã mibɔrɛgu i Kristo kɔrɛ!
Mme ne, losu sɔ miɔnɔ Yesu iso itɔ̃me, fiɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔɔte mi nnɛ nɖe ɔnukuare i ɔ̃ iso.
Ne ɔso minyua mi nsɛgbai kuere mɛ lowe i mi ame nnɛ lotã misɛ ngbã nyanyarĩa mifegu misɛ. Mila miɔbara ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ sosina ɔkã fiɛ asɛ akɔ ɔturi akɛlɛgu kasɔla ame.
Mifinikira mi adzuni gu nsɛgbai mibara ira ɣɛtɛ.
Misu nsɛgbai ɣɛtɛ mɛ mba Ɣaa kumiamia fiɛ mise bɔlɔlɔ gu sekelee mipia lɛ awu awe.
Ne ɔso minyua mila ɔla, si ɔbiara si ɔɣere ɔ̃ ɔlaa ɔnukuare alasɔ mi ɔɖuɖu ne, Kristo kuturidziri iso ara miɖe.
Midaatã mi sikpã ina si itã mibara ikpi, fiɛ midaatã kuɣɛ̃ si kubo iyo i mi sikpã ina ame.
Midaatã Tsirise ɔri.
Mma lola maɔyu kayu si manyua si masu ma nrɔɔ̃ mabara karabara sɔ maana aɖera maɖe makuti matã mawɛrɛba.
Midaatã atsuɛ pɛ̃ wa loibakɔ ɔturi asɛgu katɔ̃ si abɔrɛ i mi kanya ame, ɣɛɛ si miaɖe ika ne, ara wa loakɔ maturi asɛgu katɔ̃ fiɛ aabuai ma si abɔrɛ mi i kanya.
Midaabara ara wa loabo Ɣaa Siwarã so alasɔ sɛ̃ i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔsɛ mi ikpo sɔ ɔ̃afɔ mi ku iyi tsɔra iso ne.
Miɖi kaɖo gu sikpã gu itsiri ɔɖuɖu i mi ndɛ̃. Ana ne, minyua kulu gu iweweso gu adzuni nyanyarĩa biara ibu i mi malaa iso.
I nwagbe kanya ne, mi manyii ara si aɖo mi kayiri si mibara kayiribielea mitã so. Misu mi manyii akpi mitsɛ ma lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔsu mi are ɔtsɛ mi iki i Kristo iso.
Gɔ Ɣaa mabi ɖɔɛse miɖe ɔso ne, mipia kubɛ sɔ miare wũ.
Miɖi kuɖɔɛ mite i mi nsɛgbai ame lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔɖɔɛ bo fiɛ ɔsu so ɔsɔrɛ i bo iti, lɛ ira kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a nɛ mafɛ̃ matã Ɣaa fiɛ ibo wũ anɔ.
Gɔ Ɣaa mabi miɖe ɔso ne, iikote sɔ maakpese maɣɛ sɔ kuwɛ̃ i mi ndɛ̃ to ɔɖe asɔrɔ̃, ɣee ɔɖe nɔlese, ɣee ɔto ɔbɛbɛ anɔ.
Ana ne, iikote sɔ miaɣɛ situri pɛ̃ ara, ɣee ɔnɔle, ɣee atsuɛ pɛ̃, ɣɛɛ mipɛ Ɣaa siba.
Mitsue kukaakɔ sɔ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɖe asɔrɔ̃, ɣee ɔɖe nɔlese, ɣee ɔba kanɔbɛbɛ igbã biara nɛ lokotegu iɣɔsɔrɛ ne, ɔ̃ibakɛlɛ Kristo gu Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔnya.
Midaatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔsu sidzimi itɔ̃me kuiwɛ̃ ɔsɔsɔla mi alasɔ ara wamɔ igbã nsɛ atã Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ɔba mma mba atsuele iso ne.
Ne ɔso midaabaragu ma mawɛ̃.
Alasɔ ɔwiɔ ne, miwe i idududu ame, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ikpawaĩ ame ka mipia mito miɖegu Bosate kulaa. Ne ɔso misɛ ngbã lɛ ikpawaĩ ame maturi.
Alasɔ kusia gɔ i ngbã sɛɛ isɛ sɛ mikpadzɛ̃ mibɔ nɖe ara sɛɛ ibara, ara ibara i ɔri iso, gu ɔnukuare iɣɛ.
Ara wa loabo Bosate anɔ ne, mipia kubɛ sɔ miasuã wã ibara.
Midaabara mawɛ̃ ku ara wa i maturi sɛ mabara i idududu ame alasɔ ana kusia kukuwɛ̃, ɣɛɛ miɖi wã mite.
Alasɔ iba kunuarɛ sɔ maaɣɛ ara wa masɛ mabara i iwɛrɛ ame kɔra.
Fiɛ ira biara nɛ i ikpawaĩ ɔɖi ite ne, isɛ ite sekelee manya.
Alasɔ ira biara nɛ maɖi mate sekelee ne, isɛ ikpese ikpawaĩ, ne ɔso fiɛ maɣɛ sɔ,
“Fɔ gɔ fɔ nto arɛ sirɛ ne, ta i sirɛ
si ata abɔrɛ i makpise ame,
fiɛ Kristo ikpawaĩ aafiɛ ifere-ɔ.”
Ne ɔso minyɔ so kukaakɔ kumɛgɔ miasɛ ngbã. Midaasɛ lɛ mma loikpa anɔ, ɣɛɛ lɛ manɔgbadze awe.
Ɔri biara gɔ mina ne, mibara ɔ̃ karabara, alasɔ ɔwi nyanyarĩa ame bopia.
Midaaɖe mma loikpa anɔ, ɣɛɛ midzuĩ minyɔ sɔ be i Bosate to ɔbie sɔ mibara.
Midaanɛ ndã mirɛ̃, ala isɛ itã ɔturi ɔbara ara wa loilɛ, ɣɛɛ mitã Siwarã Bielea si siyi i mi ame.
Misu Ɔko Sekelea ame aka mipia so katetere, si misu aka sekelea igbã biara mile Bosate i mi situ ame.
Ɔwi biara ne, mila miɔpɛ bo Ɔse Ɣaa siba i ira biara iti iki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iyere ame.
Mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã so ala kuwarɛ gɔ miba mitã Kristo ɔso.
Marɔ̃go si mabɔ so karɔ̃ matã ma marã lɛ kumɛgɔ mabɔ so karɔ̃ matã Bosate awe.
Alasɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ nɖe iti i ɔ̃ ɔre iso lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɖe iti gu Ɖidze ɔtã mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ nɖe ɔ̃ kuturidziri.
Ne ɔso lɛ kumɛgɔ i mafɔɖedze ikuri ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ matã Kristo ne, ɔrɔ̃go biara si ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔrã i ira biara ame.
Marɛrɛ̃, mi wũ miɖɔɛ mi mare lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔɖɔɛ mafɔɖedze ikuri fiɛ ɔsu so ɔtã i ne iti.
Ɔbara ngbɔ sɔ si ɔsu ɔsekelera mafɔɖedze ikuri gɔ ɔ̃ɔpie ne ndu ala ɔ̃ itɔ̃me.
Ɔ̃ibie sɔ inyini, ɣee iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ aawe i mafɔɖedze ikuri iso. Ɔbie sɔ maakɛrɛ ne i isekele ame sɔ ikpi kuiwɛ̃ iibawe ne iso fiɛ ɔ̃abɔ ne i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
