Ikote sɔ marɛrɛ̃ aaɖɔɛ ma mare lɛ kumɛgɔ mato maɖɔɛ ma sosina. Ɔrɛrɛ̃ biara gɔ nto ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔre ne, ɔto ɔɖɔɛ so.
Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔtsiri ɔ̃ sosina, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔnyɔ sɛ̃ iso kukaakɔ, ɔtã sɛ̃ aɖera, ɔnyɔ sɛ̃ iso lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo sɛ ɔbara ɔtã mafɔɖedze ikuri.
Ala ɔ̃ kuturidziri iso ara boɖe.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Nnɛgbe ɔso i ɔrɛrɛ̃ aarui i ɔ̃ ɔse gu ɔnyi kɔrɛ ɔpɛ ɔmatã i ɔ̃ ɔre iso fiɛ ma inyɔɔ aakpese sosina siwɛ̃ ne.”
Itɔ̃me wɛrɛa nɛ mpia i Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛgbe ame ɔwodoro, ɣɛɛ mme lonya sɔ Kristo gu ɔ̃ mafɔɖedze iso iɖe ɔɖe ika.
Ɣɛɛ nnɛ loto loɣɛ nɖe sɔ, ikote sɔ mi ɔbiara aaɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔre lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔɖɔɛ so fiɛ ɔrɔ̃go biara ana si ɔnyɔ sɔ ɔsu kuwarɛ ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔrã.
Mabi, gɔ Bosate mare miɖe ɔso ne, mikã mi maɣese atsue ala ngbɔ ikote sɔ miabara ne.
Mmara ɖeakatɔ̃ mɛ iso i kaɣɛkasɛ ɔbua nɖe sɔ, “Warɛ fɔ ɔse gu fɔ ɔnyi.
Si ialɛgu-ɔ fiɛ aasɛ ngbã dzoroo i kayi gagbe iso.”
Mabi mase, midaapia mi mabi sikpã, ɣɛɛ minyɔ ma iso kukaakɔ si mikpadzɛ̃ ma sɔ maawo so ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔla mabara i mmara iso lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bosate ɔte awe.
Maɖabo, mikã mi karɔ̃ iso makɔse atsue i kunigã ku iti ikpakpa ame. Mibara ngbɔ ku mi situ ɔɖuɖu lɛ Kristo mito mibara mitã.
Iiɖe si mapia kotoo miabara isɛɛ sɔ si maɖɔɛ mi, ɣɛɛ ku mi ɔle ɔɖuɖu ne, mibara nnɛ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔɖɔɛ lɛ Kristo maɖabo awe.
Lɛ maɖabo ne, mibara mi karabara ku isoɣɔ lɛ Bosate karabara mito mibara ne iiɖe ɔturi kare.
Minyigi sɔ Bosate to ɔ̃atã ɔbiara kuso i karabara sɛɛ ga ɔbara ɔso, ɔɖabo aɖe o-o, iiɖe ɔɖabo aɖe o-o.
Makɔse, mi wũ mila mi maɖabo kukaakɔ si minyua ma ifɔ̃ ɔpia. Mitsue sɔ ngɔ nɖe mi gu ma ɔɖuɖu Ɔkɔse pia i kato, fiɛ ɔ̃ ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi i katɔ̃ ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me.
Kawirikɔ̃ ne, mawe ɔle i Bosate gu ɔ̃ ɔle siare ame.
Misu akpakpɛ̃ra wa ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa ɔtã mi mipia sɔ miawo ɔta ɔya i Tsirise kasusu nyanyarĩa iso.
Alasɔ iiɖe maturi awune boto bokpɛ̃gu, ɣɛɛ siwarã ame sile, siwarã ame mma nto maɖe iso, mma nto maɖe iso i idududu kayi ame gu ara lalaa ibara siwarã dzɛ nto sibara karabara i kato boto bokpɛ̃gu.
Ne ɔso misu Ɣaa akpakpɛ̃ra ɔɖuɖu mipia sɔ si iyikpi nɛmɔ ɔtu mi ne, miawo ɔya teteree mikpɛ̃ kakpã misɛ miabo kawirikɔ̃ sɔ ɔle iibaro mi iso.
Ne ɔso miya teteree si misu ɔnukuare minyi so sisɔ, misu ara sɛɛ ibara mifu so agbegbe lɛ ibɔra nɛ masɛ masu mafu igbegbe sɔ mirɛ̃ iibaɣo kpakpɛ̃dze awe.
Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ nsɛ ibɔ isobuɛ si iɖe mi kakpã ikpɛ̃ ndokota mɛ miapia i iledzaso ame.
Isu ibua i nwagbe ɔɖuɖu iso ne, mimɔɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe ga nɖe lɛ nnɛ nsɛ ifɔ akpira mila. Ne nɖe nnɛ miasu minidza Tsirise mirɛ̃ mɛ nto mitsue lɛ ɔtɔ ne.
Misu iɖi mitɔ̃me lɛ ibɔra ikoto si misu Ɣaa itɔ̃me mila lɛ siwarã ame itekpe.
Mitã Siwarã si sikɔ mi mila miɔkparama kayi ɔwi biara si mikarɛ Ɣaa ibuai. Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, minyɔ sɔ nrɔɔ̃ iibafɛ̃ mi, ɣɛɛ mikparama kayi ɔwi biara i Ɣaa maturi ɔɖuɖu iti.
Mme wũ mikparama kayi i wũ iti sɔ Ɣaa aasu ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔpia me i kanya loɣɛ ku katetere loɖi awɛrɛra wa mpia i ne ame lote.
Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe ɔso loɖe katɔ̃mesɛdze atoa sɔ lorɛ i iyo ne. Mikparama kayi i wũ iti sɔ loawo ne ɔɣɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ ikote.
Loto lopia bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse gɔ nɖe ɔɖabo sɛɛ i Bosate karabara ame fiɛ marɔ wũ Tihiko. Ɔto ɔ̃aɣere mi nnɛ loto lobara gu kumɛgɔ ise me i ngbe fiɛ ka ɔ̃apia mi ɔle ana.
Loto lopia bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse gɔ nɖe ɔɖabo sɛɛ i Bosate karabara ame fiɛ marɔ wũ Tihiko. Ɔto ɔ̃aɣere mi nnɛ loto lobara gu kumɛgɔ ise me i ngbe fiɛ ka ɔ̃apia mi ɔle ana.
Ɣaa gɔ nɖe bo Ɔse gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu isobuɛ gu kuɖɔɛ ku kafɔkaɖe.
Ɣaa abualɛra si awegu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ maɖɔɛ Bosate Yesu Kristo ku kuɖɔɛ gɔ loibaro.
Philippians: Mme Paulo gu Timoteo ma nɖe Kristo Yesu maɖabo lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe.
Botsɛrɛ boto botã mi matɔ̃ɖedze, mabuaidze gu mi ma ɔɖuɖu maɔsekelera fiɛ mipia i mafɔɖedze ikuri ame i Filipi fiɛ miɖe mawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu.
Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
Ɔwi biara i mi ara ɔbo me iti ame ne, losɛ lopɛ wũ Ɣaa siba i mi iti.
Fiɛ ɔwi biara loto lokparama kayi i mi ɔɖuɖu iti ne, losɛ lobara ku isoɣɔ,
ala kumɛgɔ mibuai me i Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣɛ ame ita i iyi ɖeakatɔ̃ ipɛ i nɔme.
Ne ɔso lofɔ loɖe sɔ Ɣaa gɔ losɛ karabara sɛɛ gagbe karɔ̃ i mi ame ne, ɔto ɔ̃abara kã ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo kawirikɔ̃ ku iyi nɛ i Kristo Yesu aaba iso.

Mi ara pia me i adzuni ame ɔwi biara. Ikote sɔ iase ngbɔ alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe bo gu mi ɔɖuɖu bualɛ sɔ miawegu me inyɛ atoa sɔ lorɛ i iyo. Ibua i ne iso ne, miyagu me ku ɔwi gɔ loto lokpɛ̃ i Itɔ̃me Bielea iti sɔ iaya teteree.
Ɣaa nɖe me aɖansiɛ sɔ gbaã loto ɣere mi sɔ wũ kuɖɔɛ gɔ loba lotã mi ne, kuse lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo Yesu mɔmɔ to ɔɖɔɛ mi.
Loto lokparama kayi sɔ mi kuɖɔɛ gɔ miba si kusi kubua, mitsue ɔnukuare mibua, ana ne, si miawo ikpaki ɔpia i ikpi gu isɛɛ ndɛ̃ sekelee.
Nnɛgbe loatã sɔ miawo nnɛ nlɛ iɖo ɔɖi, sɔ iyi nɛ i Kristo aaba ne, ɔ̃anya sɔ mise sekelee fiɛ ɔ̃ibanya ikpi kuiwɛ̃ i mi iso ne.
Mi nsɛgbai si miyi ku ara sɛɛ ibara. Yesu Kristo pɛ loawo ɔtã mabara ngbɔ sɔ iaki i ne iso ne, maasu kato ikɔlɛ gu ile matã Ɣaa.
Wũ manyii, loto lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ nnɛ lobɔrɛ me iso ne, ibua itã Itɔ̃me Bielea katɔ̃ isɛ.
Alasɔ iki i ne iso ne, makpakpɛ̃dze ɔɖuɖu ma nto madzuɛ̃ igara iyo gu maturi ɔɖuɖu i ngbe ɔɔtsue sɔ Kristo ɔɖabo loɖe ɔso lorɛ i iyo.
Fiɛ wũ iyo irɛ ana ɔɔtã manyii gbodzoo katetere i Bosate ame. Ka mato mawo Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔɣɛ ku ɔtu gɔ maisito manigã.
I ɔnukuare ame ne, mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ Kristo itɔ̃me ala sirerɛ gu kakpadzɛ̃ ɔso, ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ ana to maɣɛ itɔ̃me ku adzuni sɛɛ.
Mma nto maɣɛ itɔ̃me ku adzuni sɛɛ ne, kuɖɔɛ ɔso mato maɣɛ ne, alasɔ maɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔpia me sɔ lokpɛ̃ i Itɔ̃me Bielea iti.
Mma nto maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i adzuni lalaa ɔso ne, ma kuɖɔɛ mato mabara alasɔ mabu sɔ maawo itikpi ɔbie ɔtã me iki i ma itɔ̃me iɣɛ ame gɔ lorɛ i iyo.
Ɣɛɛ kumɛkumɛ ise o-o ne, iba me ɔmɛrɛ̃ alasɔ adzuni sɛɛ ame iɖe o-o, adzuni lalaa ame iɖe o-o ne, Kristo iso itɔ̃me mato maɣɛ.
Iba me ɔmɛrɛ̃ alasɔ loɣe sɔ iki i mi kayi ikparama i wũ iti gu ibuai nɛ lobɔrɛ i Yesu Kristo Siwarã kɔrɛ ɔso ne, mato maaɖi me i iyo.

Nnɛ nto me ɔkã kiniɔ teteree fiɛ iɖe wũ ɔriinyɔ ana nɖe sɔ, loibasɛ̃ wũ karabara lonya, ɣɛɛ i ɔwi biara ame, titirio kiniɔ ne, loawe katetere gbodzoo sɔ loasu wũ iso sina ɔɖuɖu lopia Kristo kuwarɛ si lopia ngbã ɣee ɔkpi lokpi.
Alasɔ i wũ kasɛ ne, Kristo losi ngbã lotã, ɣɛɛ si lokpi kɔra ne, iaɖe kusia gbodzoo itã me.
Si lokpese losi ngbã ne, loabara karabara ga loabɔ kusia gbodzoo. Ɣɛɛ imele si loɖi i kukpi gu ngbã inyɔ ndɛ̃? Loiɣe!
Lopia i ara ka anyɔ ndɛ̃. Ito me ɔkã sɔ loabɔrɛ i ngbã mɛgbe ame losɛ loawegu Kristo, fiɛ ne nlɛ iɖo ne.
Ɣɛɛ mi ɔso ne, ilɛ iɖo sɔ lopia ngbã.
Gɔ lofɔ nnɛgbe loɖe ɔso ne, loɣe sɔ loasɛ ngbã lobara karabara ga loto lobaragu mi ɔɖuɖu sɔ iatã mi katɔ̃ isɛ gu isoɣɔ i kafɔkaɖe ame.
Ne ɔso si lokpese lopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, miba ɔri biara sɔ miaɖe ndamu i wũ iso i mi ngbã ame i mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo Yesu ame.

Nnɛ lonya iɖo kiniɔ nɖe sɔ mi ngbã aakotegu nnɛ i Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea to ite sɔ si lowo mi kɔrɛ ɔba o-o, loiwo ɔba o-o ne, loanɔ sɔ miɣɛ teteree i siwarã ame ku adzuni awɛ̃. Ana ne, sɔ iakpɛ̃ mi ɔkã sɔ miawe kanya kawɛ̃ i mi ikpɛ̃ i Itɔ̃me Bielea kafɔkaɖe iti.
Midaanigã mi matsirise, ɣɛɛ miya teteree ɔwi biara ame. Nnɛgbe loate ma sɔ mato maawɔ, ɣɛɛ mi mito miana ngbã, alasɔ Ɣaa nsɛ ɔtã miɖe iso.
Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔtã mi ɔri sɔ miibasumu Kristo iki i kafɔkaɖe ame kere, ɣɛɛ sɔ miawe inyɛ i ɔ̃ iti ana.
Kiniɔ ne, ka mibuai me i kakpã ame. Kakpã ga minya sɔ loto lokpɛ̃ ku ɔwiɔ ne, lɛ kumɛgɔ mito minɔ ne, kã ame lotogu ikpɛ̃ ne.
Mi ngbã mɛ miba i Kristo ame sɛ mitã mi ɔle, fiɛ ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ana sɛ kutã mi katetere. Mibara mawɛ̃ ku Siwarã Bielea fiɛ miba kayiribielea gu nnyainyɔ mitã mi malaa.
Ne ɔso si wũ isoɣɔ aayi ne, mitã mi adzuni si aɖe awɛ̃, miwe kuɖɔɛ kuwɛ̃ mitã so, si mibara mawɛ̃ i mi siwarã gu kurabarara ame.
Midaabara kuira i fɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ ibie itã so, ɣee kato ikɔlɛ so ame, ɣɛɛ ne, mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã so si miwarɛ mi malaa miɖo so.
Mibie mi malaa isɛɛ ne iiɖe mi ɔnɔwɛ̃ ire kere.
Mi nsɛgbai si miɖe mmɛ i Kristo ɔwe.
Atoa sɔ ɔba Ɣaa kumiamia ne, ɔ̃isu so ɔle ɔte sɔ ma gu Ɣaa inyɔ ɔkate.
Ɣɛɛ i nnɛmɔ kanya ne, ɔbara so ngɔ loiɖe kuira, ɔkpesera so ɔɖabo. Ɔkpesera so ɔturi awune ɔba maɣe wũ.
Ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ lɛ ɔturi awe ɔkã atsue isɛ iabo ta kukpi ame, kunuarɛ kukpi gɔ ɔkpi i kudziri iso.
Ne ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔkɔlɛ wũ kato ɔɖo ira biara, ɔtã wũ iyere nɛ lokɔlɛ iɖo ayere ɔɖuɖu.
Ne ɔso si makpere Yesu iyere ne, mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i kato gu karɔ̃ gu kayi ga mpia i karɔ̃ kayirinɔ ɔɖuɖu aapɛ agɛgɛ̃.
Fiɛ maaɣɛ sɔ Yesu Kristo nɖe Sate itã Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔse kato ikɔlɛ.

Ne ɔso ne wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, lɛ kumɛgɔ misɛ mikã me atsue ɔwi biara gɔ lopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, inya kiniɔ iɖo gɔ lona i mi kɔrɛ sɔ miakã me atsue. Mikɛlɛ i katɔ̃ si mibara mi iɖi karabara i kunigã gu iti ikpakpa ame.
Alasɔ Ɣaa to ɔbara karabara i mi ndɛ̃ ɔwi biara sɔ miawo nnɛ nɖe ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔtsue, mibara i ne iso.
I ira biara nɛ miabara ame ne, midaakpadzɛ̃ so, ɣee mita miya so iso.

Si mibara ngbɔ ne, miaɖe Ɣaa mabi ma nse bɔlɔlɔ, mayi i ira biara ame fiɛ iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ na ma i iso atoa sɔ mapia i kayi nyanyarĩa ga loyi ku makpibaradze ame. Mifiɛ i ma ndɛ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i awãmi sɛ afiɛ i kuɖokpo ame.
Mimɔɛ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ nsɛ itã ngbã mila teteree sɔ iyi nɛ i Kristo aaba ne, loawo ndamu ɔɖe sɔ loitere ise, ɣee lobara karabara siefe.
Mi kafɔkaɖe i Bosate ame gu mi karabara se lɛ ara wa mafɛ̃ matã wũ, fiɛ wũ ima maasu mafere i ara fɛ̃a iso. Si iba ngbɔ kɔra ne, iawe me ɔmɛrɛ̃ fiɛ loanagu mi isoɣɔ.
Ngbɔ ame si mi wũ minagu me isoɣɔ si milɛlɛgu me ne.
Si Bosate Yesu ɔbie ne, loto loapia Timoteo mi kɔrɛ i ɔwi kurukutu ame sɔ nnɛ ɔ̃anya i mi kɔrɛ ɔba ɔ̃aɣere me aapia me katetere.
I ɔnukuare ame ne, losiina kuwɛ̃ gɔ i mi ara to aɖo kayiri lɛ ɔ̃ awe.
Alasɔ matsɔra ɔɖuɖu ne, ma ara nyaa matere masiai maɖo gɔ iisiɖe Yesu Kristo are.
Ɣɛɛ Timoteo ne, mi mɔmɔ miɣe sɔ miawo wũ ɔfɔ ɔɖe alasɔ ɔ̃ɔyagu me lɛ ɔbi gu ɔse i Itɔ̃me Bielea karabara ibara ame.
Ne ɔso loto lonyɔ ɔri sɔ si loɔnya kumɛgɔ i wũ atɔ̃me aakɛlɛ ne, loto loapia wũ mi kɔrɛ.
Lofɔ loɖe i Bosate iyere ame sɔ mme mɔmɔ to loaba mi kɔrɛ i ɔwi kurukutu ame.
Lonya sɔ inya sɔ loapia bo ɔnyii Epafrodito mi kɔrɛ. Ɔbaragu me karabara fiɛ ɔyagu me lɛ kpakpɛ̃dze awe. Ɔbara karabara ana lɛ mi katɔ̃mesɛdze gɔ mipia sɔ ɔbuai me.
Ito wũ ɔkã teteree sɔ ɔ̃anya mi alasɔ iɖaa wũ sɔ minɔ ɔ̃ ɔnyɛ.
Gbaã iɖe sɔ ɔnyɛ ɔro ɔkpi, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔnyɔ wũ nnya, fiɛ iiɖe ɔ̃ kere i Ɣaa ɔnyɔ nnya, ɣɛɛ mme wũ, alasɔ ɔɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i isoma siare nɛ tee loaba me iso ame.
Ne ɔso ito me ɔkã teteree sɔ loasese wũ mi kɔrɛ sɔ so aaɣɔ mi si minya wũ fiɛ mme wũ wũ nnya ka miaro.
Mifɔ wũ ku isoɣɔ lɛ ɔnyii i Bosate kafɔkaɖe ame si miwarɛ mma ɔɖuɖu nse lɛ ɔ̃ igbã.
Alasɔ ɔsu ɔ̃ ngbã ɔtã fiɛ ɔro ɔkpi ala Kristo karabara ɔso sɔ si ɔtã me ibuai nɛ i mi mɔmɔ iiwo me ɔtã.
Kawirikɔ̃ ne, wũ manyii, so si siɣɔ mi sɔ miɖe mawɛ̃ ku Bosate. Iitɔrɛ me sɔ loaledza ara wagbe itsɛrɛ itã mi, alasɔ ne loatã sɔ itikpi kuiwɛ̃ iibabɔrɛ mi iso ne.
Minyɔ so i maturi lalaa, mma nsɛ mabara ara lɛ makpɛkpɛ mmɔ iso. Mma nsɛ maɣɛ sɔ ngbɛsi matu sirɛrɛ̃ ne.
Bo nɖe mma lotu sirɛrɛ̃ i ɔnukuare ame, alasɔ boto bosɔrɛ Ɣaa i ɔ̃ Siwarã ame fiɛ boba isoɣɔ i ngbã mɛ bosi i mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo Yesu ame. Boisɛ bosiai sosina ame kurabarara kukuwɛ̃.
Mme ne, loawo ndamu ɔɖe i sosina kurabarara ame loɖo ɔbiara gɔ lobu sɔ ɔba ɔri gɔmɔ, fiɛ loba ara gbodzoo wa iso loaya.
Mme ne, wũ iyi farafanava iso matu me sirɛrɛ̃, Israelse mɔmɔ loɣe me, lobɔrɛ i Benyamin kakpa ame fiɛ loɖe ɔ Hebrise gɔdɛĩ. I Mose mmara iso ibara ame ne, ɔ Farisise loɖe.
Lowe ɔmɛrɛ̃ i mmara iso iɖe ame sɔ lota loya i mafɔɖedze ikuri iso. Si mmara maasu manya sibɔlɔlɔ ne, tee maibanya ikpi kuiwɛ̃ i wũ iso.
Ɣɛɛ ara wa ɔɖuɖu lola loɔnyɔ sɔ aɖe me kusia ngbe ne, aisire me kuira nɔme ala Kristo ɔso.
Fiɛ iiɖe nwagbe kere, ɣɛɛ ne, kuira iisifɔ me kuɣa iɖo sɔ loatsue Kristo Yesu lɛ Bosate. Ne ɔso fiɛ losɛ lobu wũ ira biara lɛ aku wa maasu maawiri sɔ Kristo aapɛgu me kɔrɔ̃ ne.

Fiɛ lobie sɔ bo gu wũ aabara mawɛ̃ pelepele. Losiina sibɔlɔlɔ kusiwɛ̃ dzɛ lofɔ lobɔrɛgu i mmara iso ibara ame. Kiniɔ ne, sibɔlɔlɔ dzɛ loba ne, lofɔ sɛ̃ lokigu i Kristo kafɔkaɖe ame, sibɔlɔlɔ dzɛ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, kafɔkaɖe iso siki.
Nnɛ pɛ ka loto lobie kiniɔ nɖe sɔ loatsue Kristo, ɔle gɔ lotara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame, sɔ loawegu wũ inyɛwe fiɛ loabaragu mawɛ̃ i ɔ̃ kukpi ame.
Fiɛ lobie sɔ loawe ɔriinyɔ sɔ mme wũ Ɣaa aatara me ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame losɛ ngbã.
Wũ kɔrɔ̃ iipɛgu nnɛ loto lonyɔ ɔri, fiɛ loiyi ana. Ɣɛɛ ne, loto lokpɛ̃ teteree sɔ iapɛgu me kɔrɔ̃, alasɔ Kristo Yesu ɔɔsu me ɔbara ɔ̃ ɔre.
Wũ manyii, loito loɣɛ sɔ nnɛgbe ɔɔpɛgu me kɔrɔ̃ koko, ira ka iwɛ̃ pɛ iso i wũ adzuni ka asia. Ne nɖe sɔ, loaɣara ira biara nɛ loɔfe, losu wũ ɔle ɔɖuɖu losia i nnɛ nse me i katɔ̃ iso.
Ne ɔso lotere ise teteree sɔ loaɖe iso lofɔ kuso gɔ i Ɣaa ɔkpere me ɔtã iki i Kristo Yesu iso i ngbã mɛ loaba i kato ame ne.
Mitã adzuni wagbe si awe i bo ma ɔɖuɖu loɔmɔ i Siwarã ame, ɣɛɛ si mi ɔrere ba adzuni mama ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɖi ɔte wũ.
Nda awe i nnɛmɔ aase o-o ne, mitã bokɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ i Siwarã siri dzɛ iso bosɛ.
Wũ manyii mikɛlɛ i katɔ̃ misore me si mikarã inɔ i mma nsi ngbã lɛ kumɛgɔ bosɛ bote mi iso.
Loɔɣere mi lonya, fiɛ loto loledza iɣɛ ku nnɔmɛ sɔ, maturi gbodzoo si ngbã mɛ nto mite sɔ matsiri kukpi gɔ i Kristo ɔkpi i kudziri iso.
I kawirikɔ̃ ne, mmagbe to maabo i itɔkpe nɛ loisɛ inyi ame alasɔ ma Ɣaa nɖe ma iyiri. Ara wa ikote sɔ aakpɛ̃ ma kunuarɛ ne, wã iso masɛ mana isoɣɔ fiɛ kayi gagbe iso ara pɛ iso i ma adzuni sia.
Bo ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ mare boɖe, fiɛ bosi bosia bo Ɖidze gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo sɔ ɔ̃abɔrɛ i kato ɔba.
Ɔto ɔ̃afinikira bo siturina dzɛ nna ɔle ngbe ɔbara lɛ ɔ̃ sire dzɛ nto sifiɛ iki i ɔle gɔ ɔsɛ ɔsu ɔkpadzɛ̃ ara ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i ɔ̃ kayirinɔ ame.
Ne ɔso wũ manyii ma losɛ loɖɔɛ, mi ma nsɛ mipia me isoɣɔ fiɛ mi nɖe wũ kuso, mi iti ame loto lobu ɔwi biara. Miya teteree i Bosate ame.
Loto Ewodia gu Sinteke i kukpa sɔ manɔgu so ara karɔ̃ lɛ manyiibi i Bosate ame.

Fiɛ fɔ ngɔ fɔ nɖe wũ rabaradze laa ana ne, buai marɔ̃go inyɔ magbe, alasɔ maɔbuai me gbaã i Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣɛ ame ku Klemens gu wũ marabaradze laa ɔɖuɖu ma ayere loibawo ɔrɔ, ɣɛɛ ma ayere pia i Ɣaa magbanadze ɔko ame.
So si siɣɔ mi ɔwi biara i mi mawɛ̃ ibaragu Bosate ame, loto loledza iɣɛ sɔ, so si siɣɔ mi!
Miwe ɔtu ɣɔa mitã maturi ɔɖuɖu alasɔ Bosate iba ɔɔbore ibo.
Midaaya so iso i kuira ame, ɣɛɛ si mito mikparama kayi ne, miɣere Ɣaa ara wa ɔɖuɖu mito mibie si mipɛ wũ siba i wã iti.
Iyɔ Ɣaa isobuɛ nɛ karɔ̃ i maturi iibawo ɔnɔ aadzuɛ̃ mi situ gu adzuni ɔɖuɖu gɔ mibara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu.

Kawirikɔ̃ ne wũ manyii, mitã mi adzuni si ayi ku ara wa nɖe asɛɛ, nwa lokote atã ile, nwa nɖe ɔnukuare, nwa lokote atã kuwarɛ, nwa loya, nwa iso i kuira iinina, ara wa nsɛ alɛ ɔnyɔ gu nwa lokote sɔ ɔturi aabara.
Misore wũ nsɛgbai i ara wa misuã gu nwa mifɔ mibɔrɛgu i wũ kɔrɛ, wũ ikaɖe gu kurabarara ame. Iyɔ Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtã isobuɛ aawegu mi.
So ɔɣɔ me gbaã i Bosate ame sɔ i ɔwi dzoroo kama ne, lofɔ karatã lobɔrɛgu i mi kɔrɛ. Atoa sɔ iiɖe ɔsɛ̃ misɛ̃ sɔ miito mibuai me ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, miina ɔri sɔ miasese me karatã.
Loito loɣɛ nnɛgbe si ite sɔ minyua me misɛ, alasɔ loɔsuã kumɛgɔ i ira biara nɛ loba aabo me anɔ.
Loɣe nnɛ nɖe kusa fiɛ loɣe nnɛ nɖe karana. I wã ɔɖuɖu ame ne, loɔsuã kumɛgɔ ikote sɔ ɔturi aase si kukã pia ɣee araɖea pia, si kusa pia, ɣee karana pia.
Ɔle gɔ i Kristo ɔtã me ɔso ne, loawo ira biara kanya ɔya.
Ɣɛɛ ibua ilɛ sɔ mibuai me i wũ amɔrɛ̃ ame.
Mi ma Filipise ɣe kukaakɔ sɔ karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ɔwi gɔ lobɔrɛ i Makedonia fiɛ losɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea imomo ipɛ karɔ̃ ne, mi ɔnɔwɛ̃ pɛ losese me karatã fiɛ mifɔ wũ kusɛkusɛ.
Gɔ lowe i Tesalonika ne, mila miɔsese me karatã ɔwi ku ɔwi.
Iiɖe karatã loto lobie lobɔrɛgu i mi kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ kusia gɔ miana i kato iki i karatã iso ɔso.

Miɔtã me kuso kɔra miɖodza. Karatã ga misese me mikigu i Epafrodito iso ɔba kaapɛgu me kɔrɔ̃, ne ɔso kuira iisinya me. Mi karatã gagbe to kafɔrɛ̃ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃ lɛ ara wa mafɛ̃ matã Ɣaa fiɛ abo wũ anɔ, apia wũ isoɣɔ.
Ne ɔso Ɣaa gɔ loto losɔrɛ aatã mi mi ara nyaa ɔɖuɖu wa loanya mi iki i Kristo Yesu karana gu ikpawaĩ ame.
Mitã bole bo Ɔse Ɣaa ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ. Si iba ngbɔ.
Loya Ɣaa maturi ma ɔɖuɖu nɖe Kristo Yesu mare. Manyii ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i ngbe ɔya mi o-o!
Ɣaa maturi ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i ngbe ɔya mi, titirio mma mpia i Roma Igarakpakpa iyo ame.
Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu mi.
Colossians: Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme Paulo gɔ iki i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ame loba loakpese Kristo Yesu katɔ̃mesɛdze gu Sostene kɔrɛ.
Boto botsɛrɛ botã bo manyii ma nɖe Ɣaa maturi fiɛ maɖe manukuarese fiɛ ana ne, maɖe Kristo mare i Kolose. Ɣaa gɔ nɖe bo Ɔse si ɔtã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
Bosɛ bopɛ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo Ɔse siba ɔwi biara si boto bokparama kayi i mi iti
Alasɔ bonɔ sɔ mifɔ Kristo Yesu miɖe fiɛ misɛ miɖɔɛ mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ana kukaakɔ.
Maledza nnɛ mito minyɔ ɔri masɛ mi i kato. Minɔ ɔriinyɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe koko ku ɔwi gɔ maɣere mi ɔnukuare itɔ̃me nɛ nɖe Itɔ̃me Bielea.
Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe togu imɔ, iɣɔ̃ abi i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu lɛ kumɛgɔ ito isɛ katɔ̃ i mi ndɛ̃ ita i ɔwi gɔ minɔ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔnyɔ mi nnya fiɛ minɔ ne karɔ̃ kukaakɔ.
Bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse Epafra nɖe ngɔ lote mi ara wagbe. Ɔɖe bo rabaradze laa gɔ lobara Kristo karabara i ɔnukuare ame i bo kanya.
Ɔ̃ loba ɔ̃aɣere bo kuɖɔɛ gɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔsu sipia i mi ame ne.
Ne ɔso ita i iyi nɛ bonɔ mi iso itɔ̃me ne, bosɛ bokparama kayi ɔwi biara i mi iti. Bosɛ botã Ɣaa iti sɔ ɔtã mitsue ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ, ɔtã mi iwola ɔɖuɖu gu ara karɔ̃ inɔ nɛ lobɔrɛ i ɔ̃ Siwarã ame.
Nnɛgbe loatã sɔ miawo ngbã mɛ loabo Bosate anɔ ɔsɛ fiɛ miabara nnɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ne. Iyɔ i mi ngbã ɔɖuɖu ame ne, ara sɛɛ kotoo ka miabara fiɛ miatsue Ɣaa ana mibua.
Loto Ɣaa i kukpa sɔ ɔtã mi ɔle ɔɖuɖu gɔ lobɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ɔle siare ame sɔ miawo ɔya teteree i ira biara kanya ku iɣaraso gu isoɣɔ ame.
Mipɛ bo Ɔse siba, ngɔ lobara mi sɔ mikote sɔ miana kaɖekɔ̃ ga ɔsɛ ɔ̃ maturi i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame.
Ɔɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i Ɔbosam ɔle gɔ nɖe idududu ame ɔbɔ ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɖɔɛse sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame.
Ɔ̃ Ɔbi gɔgbe ame bona iɖi fiɛ bona akpi kasukatsɛ.
Kristo nɖe Ɣaa gɔ boisɛ bonya kumiamia. Ɔ̃ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbirɛrɛĩ ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ nto ɔɖe Ɣaa kurabarara ɔɖuɖu iso.
Alasɔ ɔ̃ iso i Ɣaa ɔki fiɛ ɔbara ira biara i kato gu karɔ̃, nwa masɛ manya gu nwa maisɛ manya, siwarã ame sile, makɔse gu mma nto maɖe iso. Ɣaa ɔbara ara ɔɖuɖu ɔkigu i ɔ̃ iso fiɛ ɔ̃ iɖe ɔbara wã ɔtã.
Kristo ka ɔpia fiɛ Ɣaa ɔbara ira biara, fiɛ ɔ̃ iso iki fiɛ ibiara se i ne ɔri iso.
Ɔ̃ nɖe mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ nɖe ɔ̃ kuturidziri iti. Ɔ̃ ame i mafɔɖedze ngbã ɔbɔrɛ. Ɔ̃ nɖe Ɔbirɛrɛĩ ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ lota ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame sɔ ɔ̃afɔ kasɛkɔ̃ ɖeakatɔ̃ i ira biara ame.
Alasɔ Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ kuɖe sɔ ɔ̃ Ɔbi ame maanya ɔ̃ kumiamia ɔɖuɖu makigu.

Fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso ne, Ɣaa ɔfere kanya ndu ku kayiiso ɔɖuɖu. Iki i ɔ̃ Ɔbi ima nɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ iso ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɔkpesera ara wa mpia i kato gu karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu ɔbɔ so i kɔrɛ sɔ isobuɛ ka ipia i ɔ̃ gu ma ndɛ̃.
Ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, mikora kama mitã Ɣaa fiɛ miɖe ɔ̃ matsirise ala mi ara lalaa wa misɛ misusu gu nwa misɛ mibara ɔso.
Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ iki i ɔ̃ Ɔbi kukpi ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔɔboregu mi ɔbɔ so i kɔrɛ, ɔbara mi sekelee, miyi sɔ iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ na mi iso i ɔ̃ katɔ̃.

Ikote sɔ miamɔɛ̃ nnɛ mifɔ miɖe mila. Miya teteree si mire siɖu. Mi adzuni si asia i ɔriinyɔ nɛ i Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔsu ibɔ mi iso, ala Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe imomo mapɛ matã kayiiso ɔɖuɖu fiɛ mme Paulo ana ne, loɔba loakpese ne ɔɖabo.
Kiniɔ ne, iba me ɔmɛrɛ̃ sɔ lowe inyɛ i mi iti. Loto lowe inyɛ i wũ siturina ame sɔ si losu lowiri inyɛwe nɛ i Kristo ɔsɛ me i mafɔɖedze ikuri kanya.
Ɣaa lobara me sɔ loaɖe mafɔɖedze ɔɖabo si loapɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me imomo fiɛ miatsue ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iyi pɔpɔɔpɔ.
Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɖe itɔ̃me nɛ lowɛrɛ ta maturi ɔwi, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔɖi ɔte mma lofɔ wũ maɖe.
Ɣaa ɔɖɔɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɖi itɔ̃me wɛrɛa nɛ lofɔ kuɣa ngbe fiɛ iba kuwarɛ ɔtã kayiiso ɔɖuɖu. Itɔ̃me wɛrɛa nɛgbe nɖe sɔ, Kristo gɔ mpia i mi ame ne, ɔ̃ nɖe ɔriinyɔ ikpawaĩ siare nɛ nse isia mi ne.
Ne ɔso boto boɣere ɔbiara Kristo iso itɔ̃me ne. Ku iwola biara nɛ boba ne, bosɛ boka ma, bote ma ara sɔ si boakɔ ma bobɔ Ɣaa anɔ lɛ maturi ma loɔmɔ fiɛ maɖe mawɛ̃ ku Kristo.
Si loawo nnɛgbe ɔbara ɔso ne, losɛ lokpɛ̃, losu ɔle siare gɔ ɔɖuɖu i Kristo ɔtã me fiɛ ɔto ɔbara karabara i wũ ame.
Nto lobie sɔ mitsue kumɛgɔ loɔkpɛ̃ teteree i mi gu mma mpia i Laodikea gu matsɔra ma ɔɖuɖu loinya me manya kɔra iti.
Nto loɣɛ nnɛgbe si maana katetere fiɛ maabara mawɛ̃ gu ma malaa i kuɖɔɛ ame. Inyaare ne, si ma ara karɔ̃ inɔ aayi fiɛ maatsue Ɣaa ira wɛrɛa nɛ nɖe Kristo. Karana siare gbaã kaɖe ngbe.
Kristo ame i Ɣaa ɔsu karana siare ɔɖuɖu ga nɖe inɔgba gu iwola ngbe ɔkɔla.
Nto loɣere mi sɔ midaatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔsu ɔnyamɛrɛ̃ ɔkpadzɛ̃gu mi atɔ̃me ɔsɔsɔla mi.
Atoa sɔ lona i mi kɔrɛ i siturina ame ne, lopia i mi kɔrɛ i siwarã ame, fiɛ so ɔɣɔ me sɔ loto lonya kumɛgɔ i mi kanya ɖe kawɛ̃, fiɛ miɣɛ teteree i mi Kristo kafɔkaɖe ame.
Gɔ miɔfɔ Kristo Yesu lɛ mi Sate ne, mibaragu wũ mawɛ̃ i mi kasɛ ame.
Mire siɖu i ɔ̃ ame si mitsue mi ngbã misia i ɔ̃ iso. Mi kafɔkaɖe ana si kamɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ mate mi si miyi ku siba ipɛ.

Minyɔ so kukaakɔ sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibakpesera mi masande iki i kayiiso inɔgba gu kasɔla siefe ga matsue masia i maturi akisi iso, ɣee siwarã dzɛ nto siɖe kayiiso iso ame. Maitsue ara wagbe masia i Kristo iso.
Alasɔ Ɣaa nsɛgbai gu ɔ̃ kumiamia ɔɖuɖu pia i Kristo ame ku ɔwi gɔ ɔsi ngbã i sosina ame.
Gɔ mibara mawɛ̃ ku ɔ̃ gɔ nɖe iti ɔtã siwarã ame sile gu mma nto maɖe iso ɔso ne, mi wũ mi ngbã ɔɔyi.
I Kristo ame ne mise lɛ mma matu sirɛrɛ̃, fiɛ iiɖe kɔrɔ̃ masu matu, ɣɛɛ mi akpi wa manukutu maɖi mi iso nɖe sirɛrɛ̃ dzɛ matu mi i Kristo ame.
Gɔ mifɔ Ɣaa itupie ne, mabiara mi ku Kristo, ne ɔso ne, ɔtara mi gu wũ ana alasɔ mifɔ Ɣaa gɔ lotara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔle miɖe.
Ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, mikpi i siwarã ame, alasɔ miɖe makpibaradze fiɛ miɖe mma loiɖe ma Yudase, ana ne, miiwe Ɣaa mmara. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɔtara mi ɔbɔ ngbã ame iki i Kristo iso fiɛ ɔ̃ɔsu bo akpi ɖuɖu ɔtsɛ bo.
Ɣaa ɔnukutu ira biara nɛ matsɛrɛ fiɛ ita iɣɛ i bo iso atã bo ipɔ i mmara kanya pelepele gɔ ɔpɛ wã ɔmatãra i kudziri iso.
I kudziri iso mmɔ ne, Kristo ɔfɔ siwarã lalaa gu mma nto maɖe iso i siwarã ame ɔle iso fiɛ ɔpia ma kunuarɛ i ɔgbami. Ɔsu isoɣɔ gu ɔpe itu ɔkɔ ma lɛ mma mamɔɛ̃ i kakpã ame.
Ne ɔso midaasitã kuwɛ̃ si ɔtã mi mmara i nnɛ miaɖe, ɣee mianɛ, ayi sekelea, ɣee Ɔgbaworeti Ɣɛtɛ Iyi iɖe, ɣee Iwarãyi iso.
Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ne, ara wa loaba i katɔ̃ ɔkala kere aɖe, Kristo mɔmɔ nɖe ngɔ loba.

Midaatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔsɔsɔla mi sɔ miabɔ so karɔ̃ i mila ame, ɣee misɔrɛ Ɣaa makpabo. Mmamɔ igbã sɛ makɔlɛ so kato maɣɛ sɔ inya sɔ maanya ara i siwarã ame, ɣɛɛ mila miɖe, alasɔ maturi adzuni kere aɖe mmɔ. Si mikã mmamɔ igbã atsue ne, mi kɔrɔ̃ iibapɛgu nnɛ mito minyɔ ɔri.
Mmagbe iisimatã i Kristo gɔ nɖe iti iso. Ɣɛɛ ne, iti iso i akui gu sitɔbɛ ɔɖuɖu sɛ mana aɖera wa loamɔdza ma mabɔrɛgu lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔbie.
Gɔ miɔkpigu Kristo ɔso ne, misiina i kayiiso siwarã ɔle kayirinɔ. Ne ɔso midaatã matã mi akisi lɛ mikpese mipia i kayiiso ɔle kayirinɔ.
Be ɔso makpese mato maɣere mi sɔ daabara nnɛgbe, daati nnɛgbe anyɔ, ɣee daapɛgu nnɛgbe?
Akisi wagbe ɔɖuɖu pia i ara wa karabara bosɛ bobara aro iso. Maturi akisi gu ara ite kere iɖe.

I sosina ame ne, ite lɛ si ɔturi ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ ɔte ɔ̃ sosina ɔtile, ɔmɔɛ̃ maturi akisi ɔto teteree ne, inɔgba siare pia i ne ame. Ɣɛɛ ara wagbe ibara iisɛ ibuai ɔturi ɔbɔrɛ i ara nyanyarĩa wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ wũ ɔkã ame.
Gɔ Ɣaa ɔtara mi gu Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔso ne, mibie ara wa i kato, ngbegɔ i Kristo ɔkpase ɔsi i Ɣaa kuɖearɔ̃ iso.
Mi adzuni si asia i kato ara iso ne iiɖe kayiiso ara iso,
alasɔ miɔkpi, fiɛ mi ngbã wɛrɛgu Kristo i Ɣaa ame.
Mi ngbã mɔmɔ pia i Kristo ame, ne ɔso ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃abɔrɛ kayi ne, mi wũ miabɔrɛgu wũ i ikpawaĩ siare ame.
Ne ɔso miɖoe sosina ame ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ mi ɔkã lɛ asɔrɔ̃ iɖe, anyanyara ibara, ara nyanyarĩa wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ sosina ɔkã, sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ isiai gu kanɔbɛbɛ ga lokategu aɣɔ isɔrɛ.
Alasɔ ara wagbe ɔso i Ɣaa sikpã aaba i mma loisɛ makã wũ atsue iso ne.
Ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, ngbã mɛgbe igbã misɛ mi wũ ne.
Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ka minyua ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔbara. Wã nɖe sikpã, sikpã lalaa, ituritsiri, fiɛ iikote sɔ sitia, ɣee itsuɛ pɛ̃ kuiwɛ̃ aabɔrɛ mi i kanya.
Midaasisɔsɔla mi malaa alasɔ miɔnyua mi ngbã gu nsɛgbai kuere misɛ.
Kiniɔ ne, miɔsu nsɛgbai ɣɛtɛ mipia. Ɣaa to ɔkpesera nsɛgbai mɛgbe miɣɛtɛ ɔwi biara sɔ miare wũ fiɛ miatsue wũ kukaakɔ ana.

I mmɔ kasɛ ne, ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃, mma lotu sirɛrɛ̃ gu mma loitu sirɛrɛ̃, mafɔ, ngɔ anɔ loibusi, ɔsande gu ngɔ loiɖe ɔsande ndɛ̃. Mawɛ̃ ka maɖe i Kristo ame fiɛ Kristo pia i ma ɔɖuɖu ame.
Mi ne, Ɣaa maturi sekelea ma ɔto ɔɖɔɛ fiɛ ɔɖi ma ɔsɛ so miɖe. Ne ɔso misu nsɛgbai ɣɛtɛ mɛ loakotegu mi mipia. Me nɖe ibo inyagu ɔturi, kayiribielea, karɔ̃ibɔso, imɔɛ̃so ila gu iɣaraso.
Minɔgu so ara karɔ̃, fiɛ si ɔrere ɔɣɛrɛ mi ne, misu mitsɛ wũ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bosate ɔsu mi akpi ɔtsɛ mi.
Isu ibua i nwagbe ɔɖuɖu iso ne, misu kuɖɔɛ gɔ nsɛ kunyi ira biara kusakanya kukaakɔ mibua iso.
Kristo isobuɛ si iɖe iso i mi situ ame, alasɔ ne ɔso makpere mi mabɔ lɛ mafɔɖedze ikuri ne. Miɖe mma nsɛ mapɛ siba.
Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea si ina kasɛ i mi situ ame kukaakɔ. Mite so ara si mika so ku iwola wodoroa. Misu sinɔ, mafɔɖedze aka gu siwarã ame aka mipɛ ala Ɣaa siba i mi situ ame.
Ira biara nɛ miabara ɣee miaɣɛ ne, mibara ne i Bosate Yesu Kristo iyere ame si mipɛ Bo Ɔse Ɣaa siba mikigu i ɔ̃ iso.
Mi marɔ̃go ne, mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã mi marã, alasɔ ngbɔ lokote itã Bosate mafɔɖedze ne.
Mi marɛrɛ̃ mi wũ ne, miɖɔɛ mi mare si miɣara so mitã ma.
Mabi, mikã mi maɣese atsue i ira biara ame ala ne nsɛ iɣɔ Bosate so ne.
Mabi mase, mi wũ midaapia mi mabi sikpã sɔ nrɔɔ̃ afɛfɛ̃ ma.
Mi maɖabo ana ne, mikã mi karɔ̃ iso makɔse atsue i ira biara ame. Iiɖe si mapia i mi kɔrɛ kere sɔ si maɖɔɛ mi, ɣɛɛ mibara mi karabara i ɔnukuare ame lɛ mma nto mawarɛ Bosate.
Karabara biara ga mito mibara ne, mibara kã ku mi situ ɔɖuɖu. Mibara kã lɛ Bosate mito mibara mitã ne iiɖe maturi.
Minyigi sɔ mito miafɔ kaɖekɔ̃ lɛ mi kuso, alasɔ Bosate Kristo mɔmɔ mito mibara karabara mitã.
Ara nyanyarĩa mabaradze ma wũ mato maafɔ ma kuso alasɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã ɔbiara kuso gɔ ɔ̃ibanyɔ kuwɛ̃ i katɔ̃.
Mi ma nɖe makɔse ana ne, mila mi maɖabo kukaakɔ si minyigi sɔ mi wũ miba Ɔkɔse i kato.
Mila miɔkparama kayi ɔwi biara, fiɛ si mito mikparama kayi ne, mi adzuni ame si anyɔ tuee, mila miɔpɛ Ɣaa siba.
Ana ne, mila miɔkparama kayi i bo iti sɔ Ɣaa aatã bo ɔri sɔ boaɣɛ Kristo itɔ̃me nɛ lowɛrɛ ku ɔwiɔ ala ne iti lorɛ i iyo ne.
Mikparama kayi sɔ loawo Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔɣɛ ikpa waĩ lɛ kumɛgɔ ikote sɔ loabara.
Misɛgu mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze i inɔgba ame si mibara ɔri biara gɔ miana karabara kukaakɔ.
Miɖe ika ku kuwarɛ ɔwi biara ame sɔ ialɛ ɔnɔ si mitsue kumɛgɔ miatã ɔturi biara itɔ̃me mmuai.
Tihiko gɔ nɖe bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse fiɛ ɔɖe ɔɖabo nukuarese gu bo ɔlaa i Bosate karabara ame to ɔ̃aɣere mi ira biara nɛ nto me i ngbe.
Ne ɔso fiɛ loto lopia wũ mi kɔrɛ si ɔ̃apia mi ɔtɔ, ɔɣere mi nnɛ nto bo i ngbe ne.
Ma gu bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse Onesimo gɔ bofɔ boɖe fiɛ ɔɖe mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ to maba maaɣere mi ara wa ɔɖuɖu nto akɛlɛ i katɔ̃ ngbe.
Aristarko gɔ i bo gu wũ nrɛ i iyo ɔya mi. Ngbɔ ame ana i Marko gɔ nɖe Barnaba ɔnyiibi ana ɔya mi ne. Maɔɣere mi koko nnɛ si mibara mitã wũ, ne ɔso si ɔba ne, miwarɛ nrɔɔ̃ si mifɔ wũ.
Yosua gɔ masɛ marɔ sɔ Yusto ana ɔya mi o-o. Marɛrɛ̃ itɛ magbe pɛ nɖe ma Yudase fɔɖedze ma nɣɛgu me i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ karabara ame fiɛ mabua maɖe ibuai siare matã me.

Epafra gɔ nɖe mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ fiɛ ɔɖe Bosate Kristo Yesu ɔɖabo ana ɔya mi. Ɔsɛ ɔkparama kayi teteree ɔwi biara i mi iti sɔ Ɣaa aatã miya teteree, miɖe mma loɔkpa anɔ, mitsue nnɛ ɔso fiɛ mifɔ Ɣaa miɖe, fiɛ miakã wũ atsue pelepele ana.
Mme mɔmɔ loawo aɖansiɛ ɔɖe i ɔ̃ iso i karabara teterea ga ɔto ɔbara ɔtã mi gu Laodikea gu Hierapoli maturi.
Bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse Luka gɔ nɖe kuabaradze gu Dema sɔ maya mi o-o!
Boya bo manyii ma mpia i Laodikea. Boya bo ɔnyiiko Minfa gu mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ nsɛ masarɛ i ɔ̃ iyo.
Si mika ɔko gɔgbe miro ne, misu wũ misese mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ mpia i Laodikea sɔ ma wũ maaka. Ngbɔ ame ma wũ si masu ma ɔre gɔ mafɔ masese mi si mika ne.
Kawirikɔ̃ ne, miɣere Arkipo sɔ ɔbara Bosate kasumu karabara ga ɔsu ɔpia wũ i nrɔɔ̃ ame ɔwiri kukaakɔ.
Kaya tsɔra gagbe ne, mme Paulo mɔmɔ losu wũ kɔrɔ̃ lotsɛrɛ. Minyigi sɔ lokpese lorɛ i iyo. Ɣaa abualɛra si awegu mi.
I Thessalonians: Mme Paulo gu Silvano gu Timoteo lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe boto botã mi ma nɖe bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo mare i Tesalonika. Bokparama kayi sɔ Bosate abualɛra gu isobuɛ si awegu mi.
Ɔwi biara ne, bosɛ bopɛ Ɣaa siba i mi ɔɖuɖu iti, fiɛ ɔwi biara ana si boto bokparama kayi ne, bosɛ bonyigi mi.
Boisɛ boɣara sɔ boaɣere bo Ɔse Ɣaa kumɛgɔ mito mibara mi kafɔkaɖe karabara. Bosɛ boɣɛ ana kumɛgɔ mibua misɛ mibuai maturi i kuɖɔɛ ame fiɛ misu mi ɔriinyɔ mipia i Bosate Yesu Kristo ame teteree.
Manyii, boɣe sɔ Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ mi gbaã fiɛ ɔɖi mi lɛ ɔ̃ mare.
Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ boba boaɣere mi ne, iiɖe itɔ̃me kunu kere iɖe. Ɣɛɛ iba ku ɔle gu Siwarã Bielea gu ita isiara gbodzoo. Minya kumɛgɔ bomɔɛ̃ so bola i mi ndɛ̃, fiɛ mi isɛɛ ɔso bobara ngbɔ.
Gbaã ne, misore bo gu Bosate nsɛgbai. Atoa sɔ miwe inyɛ gbodzoo ne, mifɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ku isoɣɔ nɛ i Siwarã Bielea ɔtã mi.
Nnɛgbe ɔtã sɔ mikpese ikparĩ mitã mafɔɖedze ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i Makedonia gu Akaia.
Iiɖe Bosate itɔ̃me ɔnɔwɛ̃ lobɔrɛ i mi kɔrɛ ikɛlɛ Makedonia gu Akaia, ɣɛɛ mi Ɣaa kafɔkaɖe ana ɔɔkɛlɛ kakɔi biara gɔ iisiɖe bo loaɣɛ kuira alasɔ maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔnɔ.
Ma mɔmɔ to maɣɛ kumɛgɔ mifɔ bo ku ɔwi gɔ boba mi kɔrɛ gu kumɛgɔ minyua mi aɣɔ isɔrɛ fiɛ misu so mitã Ɣaa gbaã gɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ mba ngbã.
Fiɛ mito minyɔ ɔ̃ Ɔbi gɔ ɔtara ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔri mibɔrɛgu i kuɖokpo. Yesu gɔgbe lofɔ bo ɔbɔrɛgu i kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛ i Ɣaa to ɔsu ɔbɔ makpibaradze iso ame ne.
Manyii, mi mɔmɔ miɣe sɔ bo mi kɔrɛ iba ne, iiɖe siefe.
Miɣe kumɛgɔ boɖe ɔɣiã, mapia bo kunuarɛ i Filipi fiɛ boba boabo mi kɔrɛ i Tesalonika mmɔ. Atoa sɔ maɖaa bo ngbe ana teteree ne, Bosate ɔpia bo ɔle sɔ bowo mi ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔɣere.
Bo kuka gɔ boto botã mi ne, iiɖe kasɔla ɣee adzuni nyanyarĩa, ɣee sɔ si bokɔ mi bopia i iɣɛrɛ ame ɔso.
Ɣɛɛ ne, bosɛ boɣɛ itɔ̃me lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔbie sɔ bobara. Alasɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔnya sɔ bokote sɔ boaɣɛ ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea. Boisɛ bobie sɔ boabo maturi anɔ, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔko ɔbiara ɔtu ɔnyɔ.
Miɣe kukaakɔ sɔ iiɖe sinyamɛrɛ bosu bobɔ mi. Boiɣere mi Itɔ̃me Bielea i kanɔbɛbɛ ame sɔ si boana kusia kukuwɛ̃ i mi kɔrɛ. Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɣɛ bo i kama i itɔ̃me nɛgbe ame.
Boibie mi ɣee kumawɛ̃ ile.
Atoa sɔ boba ɔri lɛ Kristo katɔ̃memasɛdze sɔ boasu bo anyaa bokpesera mi ato ne,
bomɔɛ̃ so bola lɛ ɔtalɛpo gɔ nɣe ɔ̃ mabi inyaa.
Gɔ boto boɖɔɛ mi ku kayiri ɣɔa ɔso ne, bobie sɔ mi wũ mianɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea. Iiɖe Ɣaa Itɔ̃me kere ɣɛɛ ne, bosu bo ngbã ana botã i mi iti alasɔ mifɔ bo kuɣa gbaã.
Manyii, minyigi sɔ ɔwi gɔ bopia i mi kɔrɛ fiɛ boto boɣere mi Itɔ̃me Bielea ne, bonyɛdɛ̃ awururu kasɛ̃ i kakɔme bobara karabara sɔ si boibakpese ato bosia mi kuwɛ̃ iso.
Mi mɔmɔ gu Ɣaa ɖe bo aɖansiɛ i kumɛgɔ bola so sekelee i mi mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃. Bobara ara sɛɛ, fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iinya ikpi kuiwɛ̃ i bo iso i mi ndɛ̃.
Miɣe ana sɔ bomɔɛ̃ mi ɔbiara lɛ kumɛgɔ i ɔse sɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔ̃ mabi ɔla.
Bopia mi ɔtɔ, botã mi katetere fiɛ bopia mi kɔrɔ̃ i kayiri sɔ misɛ ngbã mɛ loabo Bosate anɔ. Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ lokpere mi sɔ miana iɖi fiɛ miakɛlɛ ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ gu ikpawaĩ ame.

Ira ka iwɛ̃ nɛ ana ɔso bosɛ bopɛ Ɣaa siba nɖe sɔ ɔwi gɔ boɣere mi Itɔ̃me Bielea ne, miifɔ ne lɛ itsuɛwo. Ɣɛɛ mifɔ ne lɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me fiɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iɖe gbaã, ne ɔso ibɔ ikpaki siare ana i mi mafɔɖedze ngbã ame.

Manyii, ara wa lobɔrɛ mi iso i ngbe ne, wã ame igbã lobɔrɛ Ɣaa maturi iso i Yudea karɔ̃ iso ne. Inyɛwe nɛ mina i mi maturi nrɔɔ̃ ame ne, ngbɔ ame i mma mpia i Yudea karɔ̃ iso fiɛ mafɔ Yesu maɖe ɔwe inyɛ i ma Yudase nrɔɔ̃ ame ne.
Ma Yudase ɔɖoe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze fiɛ matã sɔ maɖoe Bosate Yesu ana. Ma ame loti bo kama sɔ si maɖoe bo ne. Ma kurabarara ɔta kuya Ɣaa iso fiɛ maɖe ifɔ̃ra nɛ nto itɛ̃ maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔri.
Matɛ̃ bo ɔri sɔ bodaaɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase itɔ̃me nɛ loatã mana ngbã mɛ loibaro. Ma ara nyanyarĩa ibara ɔɔkɔlɛ isɛ iabo ngbegɔ i Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ɔɔba ma iso kiniɔ.
Manyii, ito ibo bo so sɔ iɔfɔ ayi gɔ boinya mi anɔ ku anɔ. Ɣɛɛ mipia i bo situ ame. Ito bo ɔkã sɔ boanya mi fiɛ boto bokpɛ̃ i ɔri biara iso.
Bobie sɔ boaba boanya mi. Mme Paulo ne, lokpɛ̃ i siri agbãagbã iso sɔ si loba ɣɛɛ Tsirise ɔtɛ̃ ɔri.
Mi nɖe bo ɔriinyɔ, bo isoɣɔ gu sigaraikoto alasɔ mi ɔso boakɔlɛ sirɔgɔgɔ̃ si Bosate Yesu ɔledza iba.
Gbaã ne, mi nɖe bo isoɣɔ gu nnɛ maakɛrɛ bo ala.
Gɔ mi inya ɔbua ito bo ɔkã ɔso ne, bonɔ karɔ̃ sɔ boawe i Atene bo ɔnɔwɛ̃.
Boto bopia Timoteo sɔ ɔba ɔ̃apia mi ɔle si ɔbuai mi i mi kafɔkaɖe ame. Ɔɖe bo ɔnyii gɔ nsɛ ɔbuai bo i Ɣaa karabara gu Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣɛ ame.
Boito bobie sɔ kama iti nɛgbe aatã sɔ kuwɛ̃ aakpese kama. Mi mɔmɔ miɣe koko sɔ kama iti nɛgbe ne, Ɣaa ɔɔsia ne ita ɔtã bo ɔɖuɖu.
Mianyigi sɔ ɔwi gɔ bopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, boka mi i ne iso boɖegu katɔ̃ sɔ ito iaba. Lɛ kumɛgɔ miɣe ne, iɔba ngbɔ ana.
Ara wagbe ɔso lopia Timoteo sɔ ɔba ɔ̃anyɔ si mikpese mimɔɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe mito ne. Wũ ifɔ̃ nɖe sɔ Ɔbosam to ɔ̃aba ɔ̃ala mi ɔnyɔ ɔtã bo karabara ɔkpese siefe.
Ɣɛɛ Timoteo ɔba ɔ̃ɔɣere bo ku isoɣɔ sɔ mi kafɔkaɖe gu mi ituriɖɔɛ iikpaki. Ɣɛɛ ne, mito minyigi bo gbaã fiɛ mito mibie sɔ mianya bo lɛ kumɛgɔ bo wũ ito bo ɔkã sɔ boanya mi.
Nwagbe ɔso ne, manyii, atoa sɔ boto bowe inyɛ fiɛ ara ɔnyi bo ato ne, mi kafɔkaɖe sɛ kapia bo isoɣɔ, kaɣɔra bo situ.
Ngbã ɣɛtɛ ɔbo i bo ame gɔ bonɔ kumɛgɔ miɣɛ teteree i Bosate kafɔkaɖe ame.
Boibawo Ɣaa siba ɔpɛ i mi iti siyi ala isoɣɔ nɛ mipia bo i ɔ̃ anɔ ɔso.
Boto botã Bosate iti kasɛ̃ i kakɔme sɔ ɔtã sɔ boaledza isarɛ sɔ ara wa lokuti fiɛ mi kafɔkaɖe aayi ne, boasu botã mi.
Bo Ɔse Ɣaa mɔmɔ gu Bosate Yesu si mabusi ɔri matã bo sɔ boaba mi kɔrɛ.
Bosate si ɔtã sɔ mi kuɖɔɛ gɔ miba mitã so gu maturi mama ɔɖuɖu si kusi kubua lɛ kumɛgɔ boɖɔɛ mi.
Nnɛgbe loatã bo ɔse Ɣaa ɔpia mi ɔle ɔɖi mi ɔbɔrɛgu i akpi ɔɖuɖu ame ɔbara mi sekelee i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ iyi nɛ i Bosate Yesu aaledza kayi gagbe iso iba ku ɔ̃ mare ne.
Manyii, wũ ira tsɔra nɛ loatã mi iti nɖe sɔ ne, misɛ ngbã mɛ loabo Ɣaa anɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ bote mi. Mito mipia kubɛ i awɛ̃ ame ɣɛɛ bobie sɔ boapia mi ɔtɔ i Bosate Yesu iyere ame sɔ mibara ngbɔ mibua.
Alasɔ miɣe ara wa bote mi i Bosate Yesu ɔle ame.
Ɣaa to ɔbie sɔ mibara so Sekelee si miɖi so mibɔrɛgu i marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go isiai akpi ɔɖuɖu ame.
Ɔrɛrɛ̃ biara si ɔtsue kumɛgɔ ɔ̃asɛgu ɔ̃ ɔre i isekele gu kuwarɛ ame.
Midaasiai sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ kama lɛ kumɛgɔ i mma loisɛ manigã Ɣaa sɛ mabara.
Ne ɔso ne, kuwɛ̃ anɔ si adaarɛtɛ i ɔ̃ ɔnyii ɔre iso sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛrɛ wũ. Boɣere mi fiɛ boka mi i ne iso teteree sɔ Bosate to ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ mma nto mabara ara wagbe kutsue gbaã.
Ɣaa iikpere bo sɔ boɖe asɔrɔ̃ maɖedze, ɣɛɛ sɔ boɖe maturi sekelea.
Ne ɔso si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere iikã kuka gɔgbe atsue ne, iiɖe maturi iso ɔta ɔya, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtã mi Siwarã Bielea iso iɖe ɔta ɔya.
I kumɛgɔ miaɖɔɛ mafɔɖedze iso ne, iikote sɔ loakpese lotsɛrɛ kuira i ne iso, alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɔte mi kumɛgɔ miaɖɔɛ so koko.
Gbaã iɖe sɔ mito miɖɔɛ mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ma mpia i Makedonia karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso, ɣɛɛ boto mi i kukpa sɔ mibara ngbɔ mibua!
Misɛ ngbã i karɔ̃ ibɔso ame, si ɔbiara si ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ karabara iso. Ɔbiara si ɔsu ɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ ɔbara karabara fiɛ ɔ̃aɖe ara lɛ kumɛgɔ boɣere mi.
Nnɛgbe aatã sɔ mma loifiniki aawarɛ mi fiɛ mi kuwɛ̃ ana iibapiɛtɛ i maturi iso ne.
Manyii, bobie sɔ mitsue ara wa loaba i maturi ma loɔkpi koko iso sɔ miibamararã so lɛ mma nna ɔriinyɔ.
Bofɔ boɖe sɔ Yesu ɔkpi fiɛ ɔledza ita ɔpia ngbã. Ne ɔso bofɔ boɖe sɔ mafɔɖedze ma loɔkpi fiɛ mafɔ Yesu maɖe ne, mato maakpese maba ku Yesu.
Nnɛ i Bosate mɔmɔ ɔte ne, ne iso boɣɛ boto boɣere mi sɔ, bo ma lokuti bopia ngbã fiɛ Bosate aaledza iba ne, boibaɖe mma loɔkpi katɔ̃ i kato ikɛlɛ ame.
Boto boanɔ Bosate iba kulu siare gu Ɣaa kpabokpakpa silɔ, fiɛ Ɣaa kadadã aare. Iyɔ Bosate mɔmɔ aaso ɔbɔrɛ i kuɖokpo. Mma lofɔ Kristo maɖe fiɛ makpi ne, ma loaɖe katɔ̃ mata maba ngbã ne.
Nnɛgbe kama ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃akɔ bo ma lokuti bopia ngbã ɔkɛlɛgu bosɛ boatu mma loɔta fiɛ boasɛ boasarɛgu Bosate i kuɖokpo. Ngbɔ boawegu Bosate ɔwi ɖaa ne.
Ne ɔso misu atɔ̃me wagbe mipia so kɔrɔ̃ i kayiri.
Manyii, iisinya sɔ loatsɛrɛ mi ɔko i ɔwi ɣee ayi ara wa loaba iso.
Alasɔ mi mɔmɔ miɣe sɔ Bosate ibayi to iaba lɛ kumɛgɔ i yukukpe sɛ ɔba ku kasɛ̃ ndɛ̃ awe.
Ɔwi gɔ ame i maturi to maɣɛ sɔ ira biara sɛ kukaakɔ ne, ɔwi gɔmɔ i ibo gu ibɛbɛrɛ nɛ igbã mainya manya aaba ma iso ne. Iaba lɛ kumɛgɔ i kuɣe iɖoɖo sɛ kupɛ yirise iso fiɛ maibawo ɔtere i ne kanya.
Ɣɛɛ manyii, mi ne, mina i idududu ame sɔ iyi nɛmɔ aapatura mi lɛ yukukpe awe.
Alasɔ mi ɔɖuɖu ne, ikpawaĩ ame mipia. Boiɖe mma mpia i kasɛ̃ ɣee idududu ame.
Ne ɔso midaatã sɔ sirɛ aasu mi lɛ mma loiɣe Bosate. Ɣɛɛ mitã bomɔɛ̃ so bola si bonyɔ tuee kukaakɔ.
Alasɔ mma nsɛ marɛ sirɛ ne, kasɛ̃ iɖe masɛ marɛ fiɛ mma nsɛ marɛ̃ ndã ne, kasɛ̃ masɛ marɛ̃ me.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ ikpawaĩ ame maturi boɖe ɔso ne, mitã bonyɔ tuee. Mitã bosu kafɔkaɖe gu kuɖɔɛ ibɔra awu bofu so igbegbe si botɔ̃me bo iɖi ɔriinyɔ ibɔra ikoto.
Alasɔ Ɣaa iiɖi bo ɔtã ɔ̃ sikpã dzɛ nto siba. Ɣɛɛ sɔ boaki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso bona iɖi.
Yesu ɔkpi i bo iti, ne ɔso ngbã bosi o-o ɔkpi bokpi o-o fiɛ ɔba ne, boawe i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
Ne ɔso mipia so ɔtɔ si mibuai so lɛ kumɛgɔ mito mibara kiniɔ.
Manyii, boto mi i kukpa sɔ misu kuwarɛ mitã mi matɔ̃ɖedze ma nto mapia kubɛ mate mi Kristo masiaidze ngbã isɛ ara.
Miwarɛ ma kukaakɔ si miɖɔɛ ma ala karabara ga mato mabara ɔso. Misɛgu so i isobuɛ ame.
Ana ne, manyii, boto bobie sɔ mibie itɔ̃me miɣere madãdze. Mitã mafɔ̃dze katetere. Mibuai mma lonya ibuai si mina ɔtu mitã ɔturi biara.
Minyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibasu ikpi ɔtã ikpi kuso, ɣɛɛ ɔwi biara ame ne, mibara ara sɛɛ mitã so gu maturi ɔɖuɖu.
Mitã sɔ so aaɣɔ mi i ɔwi biara ame.
Mikparama kayi ɔwi biara ame.
Misu siba ipɛ mitã Bosate i ira biara ame, alasɔ ngbɔ i Ɣaa ɔbie ɔbɔrɛgu i mi ma nsiai Yesu Kristo kɔrɛ ne.
Midaatɛ̃ Ɣaa siwarã ɔle ɔri i mi ndɛ̃.
Midaanyɔ Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze atɔ̃me pupurii.
Ɣɛɛ mifafarɛ ira biara ame si minyɔ nwa nɖe asɛɛ si mimɔɛ̃ wã mila.
Miɖi so mibɔrɛgu i ira lalaa biara ame.
Botã Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtã bo isobuɛ iti sɔ ɔbara mi sekelee i ɔri biara iso. Ɔdzuɛ̃ mi siwarã gu adzuni gu sosina ɔɖuɖu sɔ maibanya ikpi kuiwɛ̃ i mi iso ku ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu Kristo aaledza iba.
Ɣaa gɔ lokpere mi sɔ mikpese ɔ̃ mare aabuai mi ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo kawirikɔ̃. Alasɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɣɛ iso ɔɖe.
Manyii, mila miɔkparama kayi i bo iti.
Miya so ku kayiri ɣɔa.
Nto loɣere mi lɛ Bosate Yesu Kristo kanyayase sɔ mika ɔko gɔgbe mitã mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu.
Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu mi.
II Thessalonians: Mme Paulo gu Silvano gu Timoteo nto botsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe botã mi ma nɖe Bo ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo mare i Tesalonika.
Bo ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi isobuɛ gu abualɛra.
Manyii, ipia sɔ boapɛ Ɣaa siba ɔwi biara ala mi ɔso. Ikote ngbɔ alasɔ mi kafɔkaɖe to kamɔ fiɛ mi kuɖɔɛ gɔ miba mitã so ana to kumɔ.
Nnɛgbe ɔso boto borɔ mi iyere sɛɛ i mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃ ne. Bosɛ boɖe mi ndamu botã mafɔɖedze ala kumɛgɔ miɣɛ teteree fiɛ miba ɔle i kafɔkaɖe ame atoa sɔ mato makpɛ̃gu mi fiɛ mito miwe inyɛ.
Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu to ite sɔ Ɣaa atɔ̃me iɖaɛ ɣɛ tɔrɔrɔ, fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃atã mi kasɛkɔ̃ i ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ga ɔso mito miwe inyɛ.
Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɣɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri sɛɛ iso fiɛ ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ mma nto makpɛ̃gu mi ɔɖuɖu kutsue.
Ɔto ɔ̃atã sɔ bo gu mi ɔɖuɖu ma lowe inyɛ aana iwarã. Ɣaa to ɔ̃abara ara wagbe ku ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu gu Ɣaa makpabo aaɖusi mabɔrɛ i kuɖokpo i ɔle gu ɔtɔ sinyagɛmi ame.
Maturi ma loisɛ mawarɛ Ɣaa fiɛ maifɔ Bosate Yesu Itɔ̃me Bielea ne, ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue.
Bosate to ɔ̃asa ma ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ anɔ fiɛ maibanya ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ gu ɔle. Ɔ̃awɔra ma gu ma nsɛgbai.

Ara wagbe to aaba ku iyi siare nɛ iso i Yesu aaledza iba. Iyi nɛmɔ iso ne, ɔ̃ mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu to maasiai wũ mala maɔfa kayiɖu. Mi wũ mito miawe i ma ndɛ̃ alasɔ mifɔ ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ boɣere mi miɖe.

Nnɛgbe ɔso boto bokparama kayi i mi iti ɔwi biara ame ne. Botã Ɣaa iti sɔ ɔtã mi nsɛgbai si mikotegu nnɛ ɔso makpere mi. Ɔbuai mi, ɔsu ɔ̃ siwarã ɔpia mi ɔle sɔ adzuni sɛɛ wa miba sɔ miabara kafɔkaɖe karabara ne, iaba ngbɔ.
Boto bokarɛ ara wagbe botã mi sɔ si iakɔlɛ Bosate Yesu Kristo iyere kato ala mi ɔso. Ɔ̃ wũ ɔto ɔ̃akɔlɛ mi ayere kato ala Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo nnyainyɔ ɔso.
Manyii, bobie sɔ boɣere mi sekelee i Bosate Yesu Kristo iledza iba gu bo ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ikɛlɛ iso.
Si minɔ sɔ Bosate ibayi nɛmɔ ɔɔba ne, boito bobie sɔ mikpɔkpɔtɔ ɣee minigã ala ɔko ɣee kanya iɖi ɣee itɔ̃me ɔ nɛ sɔ bo loɣɛ iso.
Midaatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔsɔsɔla mi i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso alasɔ Bosate Iyi iibaba gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i maturi gbodzoo aasɛ̃ Ɣaa fiɛ ɔturi lalaa gɔ i Ɣaa aaɖi ɔte sɔ ɔ̃awɔra aaba tɔtɔ.
Ɔto ɔ̃ata ɔya ira biara nɛ masɛ masɔrɛ gu Ɣaa iso i ɔri biara iso. Ɔto ɔ̃akɔlɛ so kato ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ɔbara so sɔ ɔ̃ ka nɖe Ɣaa.
Minyigi sɔ ɔwi gɔ lopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, loɣere mi ara wagbe.
Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔle ɔwɛ̃ nto ɔtɛ̃ ara wagbe ɔri ku kiniɔ fiɛ mi mɔmɔ miɣe ɔle gɔ ɔɖe. Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɖi ɔturi lalaa gɔmɔ ɔte i ɔwi sɛɛ iso.
Ara nyanyarĩa wa mato mabara mawɛrɛ ɔɔsɛ karɔ̃ koko. Ara wa loaba ne, aibaba gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɔɖi ngɔ lotɛ̃ ɔturi lalaa gɔmɔ ɔri.
Ne kama ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɖi ɔturi lalaa gɔmɔ ɔte. Iyɔ ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu aaba ne, Ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ kanya ame ɔwiri gu ɔ̃ ifiɛ ɔtsuedza wũ, ɔwɔra wũ pelepele.
Ɔbosam to ɔ̃atã ɔturi lalaa gɔgbe ɔle ɔsu ɔbara mila akparĩ gu awawãra agbãagbã.
Ɔturi lalaa gɔgbe to ɔ̃asu kasɔla igbã biara ɔsɔsɔla mma loawɔ. Mato maawɔ alasɔ maifɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ loatã ma ngbã maɖe.
Ne ɔso Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu kasɔla siwarã ɔtã ma sɔ maafɔ sila maɖe.
Kawirikɔ̃ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã ma ɔɖuɖu ipɔ alasɔ maifɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me maɖe, ɣɛɛ mawe isoɣɔ i akpi ibara ame.
Ɣɛɛ ne, manyii, bosɛ bopɛ Ɣaa siba ɔwi biara ala mi ɔso. Boɣe sɔ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ mi gbaã alasɔ ɔɖi mi ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ sɔ miana ngbã. Ɔsu Siwarã Bielea ɔsekelera mi alasɔ mifɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea miɖe ɔso.
Iki i bo Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe iɣɛ ame ne, Ɣaa ɔkpere mi sɔ miaba miana iyere lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bosate Yesu Kristo ba iyere.
Ne ɔso ne, manyii, miya parataa si mimɔɛ̃ atɔ̃me wa bote mi i bo ɔko gɔ botsɛrɛ gu ara wa boɣere mi mila teteree.
Bosate Yesu Kristo gu bo Ɣaa gɔ loɖɔɛ bo i ɔ̃ abualɛra ame si ɔtã bo katetere ga loisɛ kafɛ̃ gu ɔriinyɔ teteree,
si ɔtã mi ɔle, ɔpia mi ɔtɔ i mi ikaɖe gu kurabarara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu ame.
Si loawiri ne, manyii, minyigi sɔ miala miɔkparama kayi i bo iti sɔ Bosate itɔ̃me aaki ikã kakɔi biara ifɔ kuwarɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ mifɔ ne awe.
Mitã Bosate iti i bo iti sɔ ɔ̃aɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i matilese gu makpibaradze nrɔɔ̃ ame alasɔ iiɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu lofɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me maɖe.
Bosate gɔ nɖe nukuarese si ɔpia mi ɔle, ɔdzuɛ̃ mi sɔ Tsirise iibawo mi ɔɖe iso.
Bosate ɔso boba ɔriinyɔ i mi ame sɔ mito miabara ara wa bote mi fiɛ boɣe sɔ miakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ mibara mibua.
Bosate mɔmɔ si ɔbusi mi situ sɔ miaɖɔɛ Ɣaa, miya teteree i kanya kawɛ̃ ame ku Kristo.
Manyii, boka mi i Bosate Yesu Kristo iyere ame sɔ mibɛse so miɖi i mafɔɖedze dãdze ma loisɛ i bo ara ite kanya iso.
Mi mɔmɔ miɣe kukaakɔ sɔ ikote sɔ miabara karabara lɛ kumɛgɔ bobara ku ɔwi gɔ bopia i mi kɔrɛ, boibara ndã.
Boisu bo ato bosia i mi kuwɛ̃ iso, ɣɛɛ bobara karabara kasɛ̃ i kakɔme sɔ bo inyɔ iso iibakpese mi ato.
Boba ɔri sɔ boasu bo ato bosia mi iso fiɛ. Ɣɛɛ gɔ bobie sɔ miasuã kumɛgɔ miasɛgu so, mibara karabara ne, boibara ngbɔ.
Mianyigi sɔ ɔwi gɔ bopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, boɣere mi sɔ ngɔ loibabara karabara ne, ɔdaaɖe ara.
Boto boɣere mi ara wagbe alasɔ bonɔ sɔ madãdze mawɛ̃ pia i mi ndɛ̃ maɣɛ ma manyii iso atɔ̃me.
Bobie sɔ ikpa maturi magbe sekelee i Bosate Yesu Kristo iyere ame sɔ masɛ ngbã sɛɛ si masu ma nrɔɔ̃ mabara karabara si maana aɖera maɖe.
Ɣɛɛ mi ne, manyii midaatã nrɔɔ̃ si mifɛ̃ mi i ira sɛɛ ibara ame.
Si ɔrere iibasiai atɔ̃me wa boɣere mi i ɔko gɔgbe ame ne, misia wũ ikparĩ si mibɛse so i ɔ̃ iso si kunuarɛ si kukpɛ̃ wũ.
Midaatsiri wũ, ɣɛɛ mitã wũ kuka lɛ mi ɔnyii awe.
Bosate mɔmɔ gɔ nsɛ ɔtã isobuɛ si ɔtã mi isobuɛ i mi ngbã ɔɖuɖu ame i ɔri biara iso si ɔwegu mi ɔɖuɖu.
Mme Paulo mɔmɔ mme nto losia atɔ̃me tsɔra wagbe ikparĩ ala wũ kɔrɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ losɛ lobara i wũ siko ɔɖuɖu dzɛ losɛ lotsɛrɛ ame.
Bosate Yesu Kristo si ɔmɔɛ̃ mi ɔɖuɖu ɔla i ɔ̃ abualɛra ame.
I Timothy: Mme Paulo gɔ nɖe Yesu Kristo Katɔ̃mesɛdze iki i bo Ɖidze Ɣaa gu Kristo Yesu gɔ iba boto bonyɔ ɔri lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe.
Nto losu lotã-ɔ Timoteo. Aɣe sɔ ɔbi aɖe me i kafɔkaɖe ame. Lokarɛ bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu sɔ matã-ɔ abualɛra, fɔ ara si aɖo ma kayiri si matã-ɔ isobuɛ ana.

Kiniɔ ne, lobie sɔ aakpese awe i Efeso lɛ kumɛgɔ loɣere-ɔ ku ɔwi gɔ loto lokɛlɛ Makedonia. Aɣe sɔ mawɛ̃ pia i mmɔ gɔ mato mate ara wa loakpɔkpɔtɔra bo ara ite i Kristo kafɔkaɖe iso. Lobie sɔ sɛ̃ tã ma sɔ manyua ara wamɔ ite.
Ɣere ma sɔ manyua akuerera wa nna karɔ̃ gu siɣekparɛ ifafarɛ. Ara wagbe igbã sɛ abɔ kakpadzɛ̃ i maturi ndɛ̃. Iiɖe Ɣaa adzuni iso mato mate ara. Adzuni wa nɖe kafɔkaɖe are lokote sɔ boatsue.
Nnɛ ɔso fiɛ loto losu karabara gagbe lopia i fɔ nrɔɔ̃ ame nɖe sɔ, boarɛgɛ̃ra kuɖɔɛ gɔ lobɔrɛ i kaɣere sekelea gu kayiribielea ame. Bo Kristo kafɔkaɖe ana aaɖe kagbaãre.
Maturi mawɛ̃ ɔɔfiniki mabɔrɛ i ara wagbe iso, ne ɔso maɔyu ɔri sɛɛ, masu so mapia i kakpadzɛ̃ ga nna karɔ̃ ame.
Mabie sɔ maakpese Mose mmara matedze ɣɛɛ ne, ma mɔmɔ iinɔ ara wamɔ karɔ̃. Masɛ maɖe ika teteree i ara wa mainɔ karɔ̃ iso.
Bo ɔɖuɖu ɣe sɔ Mose mmara lɛ, si boabara i me iso iyi pɔpɔɔpɔ.

Ikote sɔ boatsue ana sɔ iiɖe maturi sɛɛ ɔso matã mmara, ɣɛɛ matsuelese ma losɛ̃ Ɣaa mmara gu ara lalaa mabaradze ma ngbã loyi ku ara nyanyarĩa ibara. Maɖe maturi ma loisiai kafɔkaɖe kukawɛ̃ fiɛ maɖe ma maɣese gu maturi mama maɖoese ana.
Maturi ma nɖe manɔlese gu marɛrɛ̃ ma nsɛ marɛgu ma marɛrɛ̃ laa. Maturi ma nsɛ mayu maturi marɔdɛ̃ gu maladze gu mma nsɛ makã ndamu siefe. Mma ɔɖuɖu loisɛ masiai ara ite sɛɛ ne, ma ɔso matã mmara ne.
Itɔ̃me Bielea sekelea nɛ iɣɛ i Ɣaa gɔ maale ɔsu ɔpia me i nrɔɔ̃ ame i ara ite nɛgbe ɔbɔrɛ.
Lopɛ Bosate Yesu Kristo siba i ɔle gɔ ɔtã me sɔ loabara ɔ̃ karabara ɔso. Nto lopɛ wũ siba sɔ ɔnya me ɔturi gɔ lokote fiɛ ɔkpere me sɔ lobara kasumu karabara gagbe.
Atoa sɔ lokpɛ̃gu wũ, lotia wũ, fiɛ loɣɛ anyakpi i ɔ̃ iso ku ɔwi gɔ lofe fiɛ loaba loafiniki ne, Ɣaa ɔnyɔ me nnya alasɔ ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, loifɔ wũ loɖe fiɛ loiɣe nnɛ loto lobara.
Ɣɛɛ Bosate ɔfedza abualɛra gbodzoo ɔfere me iso fiɛ ɔtã me kafɔkaɖe gu kuɖɔɛ, ara wa nɖe bo are si bobara mawɛ̃ ku Yesu Kristo.

Itɔ̃me nɛ nto loɣɛ ngbe ne, gbaã iɖe fiɛ ikote sɔ ɔturi biara aafɔ ne ɔɖe sɔ Yesu Kristo nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi gɔ loba kayi gagbe ame sɔ si ɔba ɔ̃aɖi maturi ɔbɔrɛgu i ma akpi wa mato mabara ame. Makpibaradze magbe ame ne, mme nɖe ɔɖeakatɔ̃.

Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔnyɔ me nnya sɔ iaki i mme gɔ mme lonyanyarĩ loɖo ma ɔɖuɖu iso ne, Kristo Yesu aaɖi ɔ̃ iɣaraso ɔte maturi manya kumɛgɔ ɔsu kuɖɔɛ ɔtã makpibaradze ma lofɔ wũ maɖe sɔ ɔ̃atã ma ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro.
Ne ɔso ne, mitã sɔ boasu ile botã bo Igara gɔ i kato, ngɔ boito bonya ku bo anɔ fiɛ ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe Ɣaa. Boala boɔkɔlɛ ɔ̃ gɔ loibakpi ɔnya iyere kato ɖaa. Si iba ngbɔ.
Wũ ɔbi Timoteo, karabara ga lotã-ɔ ngbe ne, ise i ara wa i kanyamaɖidze ɔɣɛ masegu i fɔ iso ɔso. Mɔɛ̃ atɔ̃me wagbe la si aaɖe iso i Bosate kakpã gagbe ame.
Mɔɛ̃ fɔ kafɔkaɖe gu fɔ kaɣere la kukaakɔ alasɔ mawɛ̃ ma loikã ma situ atsue ne, mayu ngbã ɔri.
Ma ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ nɖe Himeneo gu Aleksandro ne. Losu ma lotã Tsirise sɔ ɔkpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue si maasuã sɔ maibala maɔɣɛ atsuɛ pɛ̃ i Ɣaa iso.
Ira ɖeakatɔ̃ nɛ lobie sɔ aabara nɖe sɔ, la ɔɔtã Ɣaa iti si ala ɔɔkparama kayi i maturi ɔɖuɖu iti. La ɔɔsu mi gu ma ɔɖuɖu ara nyaa ɔɔbɔ Ɣaa katɔ̃.
La ɔɔkparama kayi ɔɔtã magara gu mma ɔɖuɖu nto maɖe maturi iso sɔ boawe i isobuɛ gu isoɣɔ ame ɔwi biara sɔ boasumu Ɣaa i kuwarɛ ame i ɔri biara iso.
Kayi ikparama nɛgbe igbã nsɛ ibo bo Ɖidze Ɣaa anɔ ne.
Alasɔ ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃afɔ ɔbiara ɔbɔ ngbã fiɛ maatsue nnɛ nɖe ɔnukuare.
Gbaã ne, Ɣaa ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖe mpia. Kpuradze ɔwɛ̃ saã ana mpia gɔ ɔ̃ nɖe ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Kristo Yesu. Ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔledza bo gu Ɣaa inyɔ ndɛ̃ ne.
Ɔ̃ ɔɖe losu so ɔtã i kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu iti ne. Yesu ɔbara nnɛgbe si ɔte sɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɖi kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔɣo.
Nnɛgbe ɔso i Ɣaa ɔbara me ratedze gu katɔ̃mesɛdze ne. Gbaã iɖe, fiɛ iiɖe sila sɔ ɔɖi me sɔ loaɖe Katɔ̃mesɛdze gu ratedze gɔ loaɖi kafɔkaɖe ara karɔ̃ ɔte mma loiɖe ma Yudase.

I mafɔɖedze kasarɛkɔ̃ biara ne, lobie sɔ marɛrɛ̃ si makparama kayi ku situ sekelea sɔ si Ɣaa ɔnya ma nrɔɔ̃ sekelea ne, ɔ̃atsue sɔ maɔɖi so mabɔrɛgu i ara lalaa ame fiɛ sikpã gu kakpadzɛ̃ na i ma ndɛ̃.
Lobie ana sɔ marɔ̃go aanyɔ ma arapia iso sɔ aibatsue anɔ, nnɛgbe loate sɔ mabɔ so karɔ̃ ne. Iilɛ sɔ maanyi akpofa siare, makɛrɛ so gu sikãrɛtɛa ara agbãagbã wa lofɔ kuɣa gɔ loate kato ikɔlɛso.
Ɣɛɛ ne, ma sibara sɛɛ si siɖi site sɔ maɖe marɔ̃go ma nsiai Bosate.
Ɔrɔ̃go biara si ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ si ɔsuã ara i karɔ̃ ibɔso ɔɖuɖu ame.
Loitã ma ɔri sɔ mate marɛrɛ̃ ara, ɣee maɖe marɛrɛ̃ iso. Ɣɛɛ mama kanya si masɛ.
Alasɔ Adam i Ɣaa ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔbara fiɛ ɔbara Eva.
Fiɛ iiɖe Adam i Tsirise ɔsɔsɔla, ɣɛɛ ɔrɔ̃go ɔsɔsɔla fiɛ ɔtã sɔ ɔbara ikpi.
Ɣɛɛ si ɔrɔ̃go ɔya teteree i ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe ame ku kuɖɔɛ fiɛ ɔbara so sekelee ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ ne, ɔ̃aki i ɔ̃ kuɣe ame pɔkɔsɔɔ.
Gbaã iɖe sɔ si ɔturi to ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃akpese mafɔɖedze tɔ̃ɖedze ne, ɔto ɔbie karabara sɛɛ.
Mafɔɖedze tɔ̃ɖedze ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi gɔ atsuɛ na iso, fiɛ ɔɖe ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ yiridze, ɔ̃ anɔ ɔkpa, ɔsɛ ɔɖe so iso, fiɛ maturi sɛ mawarɛ wũ. Ɔ̃aɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔfɔ mafɔ fiɛ ɔɖe ratedze sɛɛ.
Ɔ̃ibaɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔnɛ ndã ɔrɛ̃, ɔ̃ibaɖe kulu baradze. Ɣɛɛ ikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi ɣɔa, ngɔ loisɛ ɔɖɔɛ atɔ̃me ikpadzɛ̃ fiɛ ɔna sikã kanɔbɛbɛ.
Ikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ngɔ nto ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ iyo iso kukaakɔ fiɛ ɔ̃ mabi sɛ makã itɔ̃me atsue i ɔri biara iso.
Si ɔturi gɔ loibawo ɔ̃ mɔmɔ iyo maturi iso ɔnyɔ ne, nda ɔ̃abara fiɛ ɔ̃awo Ɣaa mafɔɖedze ɔkɔkɔ?
Iikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe fɔɖedze ɣɛtɛ sɔ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃akɔlɛ so kato fiɛ iaki i ne iso sɔ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃akpase lɛ kumɛgɔ i Tsirise ɔkpase awe.
Ikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi gɔ mba iyere sɛɛ i mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze ana katɔ̃ sɔ maibaɣɛ ara nyanyarĩa i ɔ̃ iso fiɛ ɔ̃abo i Tsirise iyebi ame.
Mafɔɖedze kasarɛkɔ̃ mabuaidze ne, ma wũ ikote sɔ maaɖe maturi ma mba ngbã sɛɛ fiɛ maibaɖe sinyagɛmi inyɔ maturi, maaɖe mma loisɛ manɛ ndã marɛ̃ fiɛ ma anɔ iisɛ abe i sikã iso.
Ikote sɔ maamɔɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ mafɔ ngbe teteree ku situ dzɛ loibatã ma ipɔ.
Ipia sɔ aala ma ngbã anyɔ fiɛ si ainya iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ i ma iso fiɛ aatã sɔ maakpese mafɔɖedze mabuaidze.
Ma mare ana ne, ikote sɔ maaɖe marɔ̃go ma nsi ngbã sɛɛ fiɛ maisɛ maɣɛ maturi iso ara. Maaɖe marɔ̃go ma loisɛ marɛ̃ ndã fiɛ masɛ mabara ira biara kukaakɔ.
Nyɔ sɔ mabuaidze magbe ɔbiara yiri ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃, ɔto ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ mabi gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu iso kukaakɔ.
Mabuaidze ma lomɔɛ̃ ma karabara kukaakɔ ne, ma mɔmɔ ba kayakpa fiɛ masɛ mawo kafɔkaɖe gu Yesu Kristo iso itɔ̃me ɔɣɛ ku ɔle.
Atoa sɔ nto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã-ɔ ne, nto lonyɔ ɔri sɔ loaba fɔ kɔrɛ i ɔwi kurukutu ame.
Ɣɛɛ nto lotsɛrɛ sɔ si logbikama ne, aatsue kumɛgɔ ikote sɔ ɔturi aasɛ ngbã i Ɣaa iyo nɛ nɖe Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃. Mafɔɖedze magbe nɣɛ i ɔnukuare kama ne.
Ɣaa itɔ̃me wɛrɛa nɛ maɖi mate ne, iba kuɣa gbaã fiɛ ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iibawo ne ɔsɛ̃. Ne nɖe sɔ,
“Bosate ɔba lɛ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi.
Ɣaa Siwarã ɔkɔlɛ wũ lɛ ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa.
Ɣaa makpabo ɔnya wũ.
Maturi ɔɣɛ ɔ̃ iso itɔ̃me i abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame.
Maturi gbodzoo ɔfɔ wũ maɖe i kayiiso.
Fiɛ Ɣaa ɔsu wũ ɔkɛlɛgu kato i ikpawaĩ ame.”
Ɣaa Siwarã ɔɖi siɣere bo sekelee sɔ i ayi tsɔra ame ne, maturi mawɛ̃ to maabɔrɛ i kafɔkaɖe itɔ̃me mɔmɔ ame masiai kasɔla siwarã gu mma loasu so matã Ɔbosam ara ite.
Maturi magbe sɛ mate mila, alasɔ ma kaɣere ɔɔkpi lɛ ibɔra mapia i ɔtɔ masu mamatãra kã iso.
Masɛ mate sɔ iikote sɔ maturi ayiri marɔ̃go. Masɛ masɛ̃ aɖera agbã awɛ̃ ana. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa loɖi araɖea ɔɖuɖu sɔ mma lofɔ wũ maɖe gbaã fiɛ masiai ɔ̃ itɔ̃me si maaɖe ku siba ipɛ.
Ira biara nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɖi ne, ilɛ. Ne ɔso iikote sɔ maturi aasɛ̃ aɖera kuawɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ maafɔ ira biara ku siba.
Alasɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me gu bo siba ipɛ ɔsekelera iraɖea biara.
Si ate mafɔɖedze ara wagbe ne, ato aaɖe Yesu Kristo rabaradze sɛɛ gɔ nto ɔkararã so i kafɔkaɖe gu ɔnukuare itɔ̃me nɛ kama asiai ame.
Ne ɔso rera so kama i mawa anatika wa loikote sɔ maaɖe kɔrɛ si akpadzɛ̃ so atã ngbã sekelea isɛ.
Sosina ame ɔle lɛ kakaaka ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa itɔ̃me ifafarɛ sɔ aabara i ne iso ba kusia i ɔri biara iso. Alasɔ ito iatã-ɔ kusia i ngbã mɛgbe gu mmɛ nto miba ame.
Nnɛgbe nɖe itɔ̃me gbaã nɛ lokote sɔ ɔturi biara aafɔ ɔɖe ne.
Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ boto bokpɛ̃, boɣɛ i karabara iso teteree ne. Alasɔ bo ɔriinyɔ ɔɖuɖu sia i Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã fiɛ ɔɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu Ɖidze iso titirio mma lofɔ wũ maɖe.
Karã ara wagbe irɔĩ tã ma si ate wã.
Daatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔnyɔ-ɔ itititɛ̃ alasɔ abara ɔbiɛtɛ ɔso. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɖe ikparĩ tã mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu i fɔ ikaɖe gu nsɛgbai gu fɔ maturi kuɖɔɛ gu kafɔkaɖe ame gu fɔ ngbã sekelea isɛ ame.
Ya teteree si ala ɔɔka Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔɣere mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu. La ɔɔɖiɖi wã karɔ̃ ɔɔte ma gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ ame loaba.
Ɣaa siawarã ame karatã ga i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔpia i fɔ ame iki ɔ̃ kanya maɖidze nnɛ maɣɛ gu mafɔɖedze makpakpa ma losia-ɔ nrɔɔ̃ iso ne, daanyua kã karabara.
Bara ara wagbe si asu so atã wã pelepele sɔ maturi ɔɖuɖu aanya fɔ ngbã katɔ̃ isɛ.
Mɔɛ̃ so la kukaakɔ gu fɔ ara wa ato ate si aya i karabara iso teteree. Alasɔ si abara ngbɔ ne, ato aaɖi so gu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ makã fɔ itɔ̃me atsue abɔrɛgu i kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ame.
Daafafã ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ nɖe-ɔ ɔkpakpa. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɖi ara karɔ̃ te wũ ku ɔtu ɣɔa lɛ fɔ ɔse awe. La maporoporoi lɛ fɔ manyiibi awe.
La marɔ̃go ma nɖe-ɔ sikpakpa lɛ fɔ ɔnyi mɛrɛ̃ awe si ala mabitɛ ana lɛ fɔ manyiiko i isekele ɔɖuɖu ame.
Makuɛdze ma nna buaidze ne, la ma kukaakɔ ku kuwarɛ.
Ɣɛɛ si kuɛdze ɔrere ba mabi ɣee mawa ne, mabi mamɔ si masuã kumɛgɔ maanyɔ ma ayo maturi iso fiɛ maala ma maɣese lɛ mafɔɖedze karabara awe. Maɖi ma maɣese kulɛ ala nnɛgbe nsɛ ibo Ɣaa anɔ ne.
Kuɛdze gɔ nna buaidze ne, ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔriinyɔ ɔɖuɖu ɔsia i Ɣaa iso fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔkpere wũ kasɛ̃ i kakɔme sɔ ɔbuai wũ.
Ɣɛɛ kuɛdze gɔ nsi sɔ ɔto ɔɖe ngbã ne, ɔna ngbã i Ɣaa anɔmi ame atoa sɔ ɔsi ngbã.
Karã ara wagbe irɔĩ tã ma sɔ maasɛ ngbã mɛ i maturi iibaɖi ma iɣɛrɛ.
Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ɔsɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ iyo maturi iso kukaakɔ ne, mitsue sɔ ɔ̃isiai kafɔkaɖe fiɛ ɔnyanyarĩ kɔra ɔɖo ngɔ loifiniki.
Daasu kuɛdze gɔ loifɔ akɔ sikuɔ iyere abua i mafɔɖedze makuɛdze ikuri ame. Kuɛdze gɔ loabo ikuri nɛmɔ ame ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔrɔ̃go gɔ loyiri kurã kuwɛ̃ pɛ.

Ikote sɔ maturi aarɔ wũ iyere sɛɛ ala ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔso. Ɔ̃aɖe ɔrɔ̃go gɔ lokpadzɛ̃ ɔ̃ mabi kukaakɔ fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔfɔ mafɔ, ngɔ nsɛ ɔnyɔ mafɔɖedze anyaa iso kukaakɔ. Ɔ̃aɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔnyɔ maturi ma mpia i inyɛwe ame nnya fiɛ ɔsi ɔ̃ ngbã ɔɖuɖu ɔtã ara sɛɛ ibara.
Makuɛdze biɛtɛ ne, daasu ma ayere abua i makuɛdze ikuri iso. Alasɔ si kurã iyo isɛ ɔmɛrɛ̃ ɔtsɛ ma ɔkã ikpɛ̃ ne, mato maakpese i Kristo kama sɔ maayiri arã.
Nnɛgbe to iatã maɖe ipɔ ala matu ndamu mɛ makã matã Ɣaa.
Ne kama ne, masɛ manina ɔwi mawe maki i maturi ayo maɣɛ kutsuɛ kpɔlɔkɔi. Nnɛ lonyanyarĩ iɖo ɔɖuɖu nɖe sɔ ne, masɛ maɣɛ maturi iso ara, mma nsɛ mapia kulu i maturi ndɛ̃, maɖe aka wa loikote.
Ne ɔso loabie sɔ makuɛdze biɛtɛ si mayiri arã, maɣe mabi si manyɔ ma ayo iso bowũ. Nnɛgbe aatã sɔ maibabara ara wa loikote sɔ bo matsirise iibana ɔri masopara bo.
Nto loɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ makuɛdze mawɛ̃ ɔɔfiniki masiai Ɔbosam kama koko.
Si fɔɖedze rɔ̃go ɔrere ba makuɛdze iyo ne, ɔnyɔ ma iso sɔ makuɛdze mamɔ ato iibasia i Ɣaa mafɔɖedze iso. Ɔtã sɔ mafɔɖedze tsɔra si manyɔ makuɛdze ma nna buaidze iso.
Mafɔɖedze matɔ̃ɖedze ma nsɛ makɔkɔ maturi kukaakɔ ne, ikote sɔ maafɔ kuwarɛ gu kuso gɔ lokɔlɛ kato. Titiriu mma nto mate ara fiɛ mato maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea ana.
Alasɔ maɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Daanyi bɔi gɔ nto ɔbuai-ɔ i fɔ ɔkpɛ̃ ame kanya.” Ana ne, “Ikote sɔ rabaradze biara aafɔ ɔ̃ kuso.”
Si ɔrere ɔba ɔ̃aɣɛ ira i tɔ̃ɖedze iso ne, daafɔ aɖe si iiɖe maturi inyɔ ɣee itɛ loba.
Mma nto mabara ara lalaa ne, ɖi te ma i mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃ iyɔ matsɔra ka mato maanigã.
Nto loɣere-ɔ i Ɣaa gu Kristo Yesu gu Ɣaa makpabo sekelea katɔ̃ sɔ bara ara wagbe iso kukaakɔ sɔ aibanyɔ kuwɛ̃ i katɔ̃ akarã mawɛ̃ ana anɔmi.
Daatata so i nrɔɔ̃ isia maturi iso itã Ɣaa karabara. Daapia kɔrɔ̃ i maturi mama ara lalaa ibara ame bowũ ne, la so sekelee.
Fɔ kayiri ɔnyɛ ɔso ne, daala ɔɔnɛ ndu kunu. Lɛ sɔ aala ɔɔnɛ ndã kɛkɛĩ lɛ kua awe.
Maturi mawɛ̃ akpi wa masɛ mabara iisɛ awɛrɛ fiɛ isɛ ite sɔ maakpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue. Ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ ana ne, kama kama fiɛ ma akpi aabɔrɛ i ɔgbami.
Ngbɔ ame i ara sɛɛ wa i maturi sɛ mabara ana iisɛ awɛrɛ ne. Si aibɔrɛ i ɔgbami kiniɔ maturi ɔnya ne, ɔwi i katɔ̃ ame ne, ato aate manya.
Ɣere mafɔɖedze ma nɖe masande ɔɖuɖu sɔ mabɔ so karɔ̃ matã ma makɔse i karabara biara ame sɔ maturi iibaɖe ika nyanyarĩa i Ɣaa gu bo kafɔkaɖe ara ite iso.

Mafɔɖedze ma nɖe masande fiɛ ma makɔse ana ɖe mafɔɖedze ne, madaasu ma sinyii ibara mata maya ma makɔse iso. Ɣɛɛ ikote sɔ maabɔ so karɔ̃ matã ma mabuai ma mabua. Alasɔ mma mato mabuai ne, ma wũ mafɔɖedze maɖe. Fiɛ ma gu ma ɔɖuɖu nɖe Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ maturi ma ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ gbaã. Te ara wagbe si apia ma ɔtɔ sɔ mabara wã.
Ɔturi biara gɔ nsɛ ɔte ara wa loikotegu Bosate Yesu Kristo atɔ̃me ɣee kafɔkaɖe are ne,
kato kere ɔto ɔkɔlɛ so. Ɔ̃iɣe kuira fiɛ kakpadzɛ̃ siefe ɔɔkpese wũ ɔnyɛ. Ɔba sirerɛ ikpɛ̃, kalɔ, maturi sitia gu adzuni nyanyarĩa ibu i maturi iso.
Masɛ makpadzɛ̃ atɔ̃me ɔwi biara. Maturi magbe kaɣere ɔkpi fiɛ ɔnukuare ɔɔyu ma iso. Mabu sɔ masiai kafɔkaɖe ɔri iso si maana karana.
Gbaã iɖe sɔ kusia gbodzoo pia i Ɣaa kasumu ame itã bo si ara wa boba sɛ abo bo anɔ.
Alasɔ gɔ maɣe bo ne, boito kuira bobɔ kayiiso. Fiɛ ikpa sekelee ana sɔ si boarui ne, boibasu kuira bokɛlɛgu.
Ne ɔso mitã bo arapia gu aɖera wa boba si abo bo anɔ.
Ɣɛɛ mma anɔ nsɛ arɛtɛ i karana iso ne, masɛ makpase mabo i Ɔbosam ayebi ame. Masɛ mabo i adzimira ibara ame. Ara lalaa sɛ abɔrɛ ma iso fiɛ asɛ anina ma ngbã makpi mawɔ pelepele.
Alasɔ sikã kuɖɔɛ ame i ara lalaa agbãagbã sɛ abɔrɛ. Sikã kuɖɔɛ gɔgbe ɔso i maturi mawɛ̃ ɔɔyu ma kafɔkaɖe ɔri sɛɛ fiɛ ma ngbã ɔɖuɖu ɔbo i inyɛwe ame ne.
Gɔ aɖe Ɣaa ɔturi ɔso ne, ɖi so bɔrɛgu i ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ame si asiai isekele, Ɣaa kunigã gu kafɔkaɖe kama. Siai Bosate i kafɔkaɖe gu kuɖɔɛ ame. Na ɔtu si ala maturi ɔɖuɖu kukaakɔ.
Kpɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe kakpã teteree si ana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro. Ngbã mɛgbe ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere-ɔ ku ɔwi gɔ abusi fɔ kafɔkaɖe ame i mafɔɖedze mama katɔ̃ ne.
I Ɣaa Kato gu karɔ̃ Baradze gu Yesu Kristo katɔ̃, ngɔ lobusi ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe ɔte i Pontio Pilato katɔ̃ nto lotã-ɔ mmara mɛgbe.
Loɣere-ɔ sɔ mɔɛ̃ mmara mɛgbe la kukaakɔ sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibawo-ɔ iɣɛrɛ ɔɖi gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu Kristo aaledza iba.
Ɣaa gɔ lokote sɔ maale fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe ira biara iso, ɔ̃ nɖe magara ɔɖuɖu igara gu makɔse ɔɖuɖu ɔkɔse to ɔ̃atã Yesu ɔledza iba i ɔwi gɔ lokate wũ iso.
Ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe ngɔ nsi ngbã ɔ̃isɛ ɔkpi ɔnya. Ɔto ɔfiɛ sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibawo wũ ɔnyɔ ku anɔ. Kuwɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ iinya wũ ɔnya fiɛ kuwɛ̃ ana iibawo wũ ɔnyɔ. Ile gu ɔle ɔɖuɖu ne, ɔ̃ ɔre ɔɖe ɔwi biara. Si iba ngbɔ.
Ɣere mma mba kayiiso karana sɔ madaakɔlɛ so kato masu ma ɔriinyɔ masia i ara wa loibawo ma ɔɖi iso. Ɣɛɛ masu ma ɔriinyɔ masia i Ɣaa iso. Ɔsɛ ɔtã bo ira biara ku kayiribielea sɔ boana isoɣɔ.
Ɣere ma sɔ mala maɔbara isɛɛ sɔ maakpese maranase i ara sɛɛ ibara ame. Mala maɔtã mawɛrɛba ara ku ma situ faa.
Si mabara ngbɔ ne, mato maana karana ga loisɛ kanina fiɛ kase katã ma ɔwi biara, ana ne, mato maana ngbã sɛɛ mɛmɔ.
Timoteo, nyɔ sɔ aadzuɛ̃ ara wa i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã-ɔ kukaakɔ. Sɛ̃ akaɖe wa nna karɔ̃ fiɛ aite Ɣaa kunigã si arera so kama i kakpadzɛ̃ ga nna karɔ̃ ga i mawɛ̃ ɔsu masɔsɔla maturi lɛ inɔgba atɔ̃me iɖe.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ mawɛ̃ ɔbu sɔ maɣe ara wagbe ɔso ne, maɔyu kafɔkaɖe ɔri.
Lokarɛ sɔ Ɣaa abualɛra si awegu mi.
II Timothy: Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme Paulo gɔ nɖe Kristo Yesu Katɔ̃mesɛdze iki i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ame. Ɔpia me sɔ lopɛ ngbã mɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã bo i bo mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo Yesu imomo.
Wũ ɔbi ɖɔɛse Timoteo, Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu-ɔ si fɔ ara si aɖo ma kayiri ana si matã-ɔ isobuɛ.
Nto lopɛ Ɣaa gɔ losɛ losumu lɛ kumɛgɔ i wũ mawa ɔbara siba. Fiɛ nsɛ lobara ngbɔ i ɔtu gɔ lokpa ame. Ana ne, nsɛ lopɛ wũ siba kasɛ̃ i kakɔme i fɔ iti si loto lokparama kayi.
Losɛ lonyigi fɔ nnɔmɛ mɛ abiɛ gɔ boto bosame fiɛ loto lobie gbaã sɔ loaledza-ɔ inya si wũ isoɣɔ ayi.
Nto lonyigi fɔ kafɔkaɖe teteree ga aba. Nga igbã lowe i fɔ ɔwarɔ̃go Lois gu fɔ ɔnyi Eunike mɛrɛ̃ ame fiɛ lofɔ loɖe sɔ fɔ̃ wũ aba kã.
Adzuni wagbe ɔso fiɛ loto lotsɛrɛ-ɔ ɔko sɔ si amɔɛ̃ karatã ga i Ɣaa ɔtã-ɔ ku ɔwi gɔ losia-ɔ nrɔɔ̃ iso lokparama kayi ala teteree ne.
Alasɔ Ɣaa iisu ifɔ̃ siwarã ɔtã bo. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔtã bo siwarã dzɛ loatã bona ɔle gu kuɖɔɛ gu kumɛgɔ boamɔɛ̃ so bola ana.

Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, daatã sɔ kunuarɛ aakpɛ̃-ɔ sɔ aaya i Ɣaa itɔ̃me kama, ɣee sɔ kunuarɛ aakpɛ̃-ɔ i wũ iso lɛ ngɔ nrɛ iyo ala Kristo ɔso. Ɣɛɛ ne, fɔ wũ ya i fɔ inyɛwe kanya teteree si aɖi Bosate Itɔ̃me Bielea ate. Ɣaa ɔtã-ɔ ɔle sɔ aawo nnɛgbe ɔbara.

Bosate ɔɖe lotã bo ngbã fiɛ ɔkpere bo sɔ bokpese ɔ̃ maturi. Iiɖe bo ara sɛɛ wa bobara ɔso. Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa mɔmɔ adzuni gu ɔ̃ abualɛra wa ɔba ɔtã bo ɔso. Fiɛ iki i Yesu Kristo iso fiɛ bona abualɛra wagbe fiɛ mabara kayiiso.
Kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi nnyainyɔ nɛgbe ɔte bo sekelee i Ɖidze Yesu Kristo iba ame. Ɔ̃ ɔɖe loɖe kukpi ɔle iso. Fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea iso ne, ɔɖi ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro ɔte.
Ɣaa ɔsu me ɔbara ɔ̃ isãyase gu katɔ̃mesɛdze gu Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe ratedze.

Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ loto lowe inyɛ ne. Ɣɛɛ kunuarɛ iito me alasɔ lofɔ loɖe kukaakɔ fiɛ loɣe ngɔ iso i wũ ɔriinyɔ sia. Loɣe ana sɔ ɔto ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ ira nɛ losu lopia i ɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ ame ɔla kukaakɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ iabo iyi tsɔra nɛmɔ iso.
Mɔɛ̃ atɔ̃me bielea ɔɖuɖu wa lote-ɔ la kukaakɔ lɛ fɔ ɔsɛdziri si abara wã iso. Ya teteree i kafɔkaɖe gu kuɖɔɛ ame, ara wa nɖe bo are si bobara kanya kawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu.
Iki i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔle gɔ mpia i bo ame iso ne, mɔɛ̃ ara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu wa i Bosate ɔsu ɔpia i fɔ nrɔɔ̃ ame la kukaakɔ.
Aɣe sɔ Asia mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ɔrui manyua me fiɛ Figelo gu Hermagene ana ɔnyua me masɛ.
Lokarɛ sɔ Ɣaa aanyɔ Onesiforo gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi nnya alasɔ ɔ̃ikpɛ̃ kunuarɛ i wũ iso lɛ yorɛdze, ɣɛɛ ne, ɔwegu me ɔbuai me kukaakɔ.
Ɔwi gɔ ɔba Roma ne, ɔnyɔnyɔ me gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔba ɔ̃anya me.
Lotã Ɣaa iti sɔ ɔnyɔ wũ nnya ku atɔ̃me iɣɛyi iso. Fɔ mɔmɔ aɣe siri agbãagbã wa iso ɔbuai me i Efeso.
Fɔ ne, wũ ɔbi, we ɔle i bo kanya kawɛ̃ ibara ku Kristo i ɔ̃ abualɛra wa ɔtã bo ame.
Ara wa anɔ sɔ lote i maturi gbodzoo katɔ̃ ne, wã si asu apia i maturi ma lofɔ maɖe nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ ma wũ maasu mate maturi mama ana ne.
Ya teteree i inyɛwe kanya lɛ kpakpɛ̃dze sɛɛ gɔ nɣɛ ɔtã Yesu Kristo.
Kpakpɛ̃dze gɔ nɣɛ i ɔ̃ karabara iso gbaã ne, ɔsɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃ kurabarara aapia ɔ̃ tɔ̃ɖedze isoɣɔ. Ne ɔso ɔ̃isɛ ɔpia mma loiɖe makpakpɛ̃dze atɔ̃me kanya.
Ngbɔ ame i iseterese gɔ nto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖe iso ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃abara i mmara ɔɖuɖu iso kukaakɔ.
Kpɛ̃dze gɔ nsɛ ɔbara karabara ku kubɛ i ɔ̃ kakpɛkɔ̃ ame ne, ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔɖe ɔturi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ loaɖe aɖera ɖeakatɔ̃ ne.
Ara wa nto loɣere-ɔ ngbe ɔɖuɖu ne, dzuĩ wã nyɔ alasɔ loɣe sɔ Bosate to ɔ̃atã-ɔ karɔ̃ inɔ i wã ɔɖuɖu ame.
Nyigi Yesu Kristo gɔ lobɔrɛ i David ɔɣekparɛ ame, ngɔ i Ɣaa ɔtara ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame lɛ kumɛgɔ i Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loto loɣɛ ɔte.
Nto lowe inyɛ ala Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loto loɣɛ ɔso. Fiɛ mapia me kugbagɔrɔĩ lɛ ɔturi lalaa awe. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me na i kugbagɔrɔĩ ame.
Nnɛgbe ɔso lofɔ ira biara lome ala Ɣaa maturi ma ɔɖi ɔso sɔ si maana iɖi nɛ i Kristo Yesu iso ɔnɔwɛ̃ maaki fiɛ maana gu isoɣɔ nɛ loyi i ngbã ɔɖuɖu ame.
Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, gbaã iɖe sɔ,
“Si bobaragu Bosate mawɛ̃ i ɔ̃ kukpi ame ne,
boata bosɛgu wũ ngbã.
Si bowo ɔya teteree i inyɛwe biara ame ne,
boaɖegu wũ sigara.
Fiɛ si bosɛ̃ wũ ne,
Ɔ̃ wũ ɔto ɔ̃asɛ̃ bo.
Si bosɛ̃ wũ i bo kafɔkaɖe ame ne,
Ɔ̃ ɔ̃ibawo ɔkpese i ɔ̃ atɔ̃me kama.
Alasɔ ɔ̃ibawo so ɔsɛ̃ ɔnya.”
La ɔɔnyigira fɔ maturi ara wagbe si aka ma kukaakɔ i Ɣaa katɔ̃ sɔ maibapia kakpadzɛ̃. Alasɔ isuɖea kuiwɛ̃ na i ne ame. Ɣɛɛ iatã sɔ mma loanɔ ara wagbe kafɔkaɖe aakpase.
Mɔɛ̃ so la kukaakɔ i ɔri biara iso sɔ aabo Ɣaa anɔ. Bara fɔ karabara sɔ kunuarɛ iibakpɛ̃-ɔ. Ɣɛɛ ɖe ngɔ loate Ɣaa itɔ̃me kukaakɔ.
Ɖi so bɔrɛgu i atsuɛ pɛ̃ gu ara wa nna karɔ̃ iɣɛ ame. Alasɔ maturi ma nsɛ mabara ara wagbe igbã ne, isɛ iɖi ma adzuni ibɔrɛgu i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ikɛlɛgu dzoroo.
Ara wagbe igbã ite se lɛ imaɣɛi nɛ nto ifɔrɛ̃. Maturi inyɔ ma nto mate wã nɖe Himeneo gu Fileto.
Maɔfiniki mabɔrɛ i Itɔ̃me Bielea kɔrɛ mapia makpɔkpɔtɔra mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ adzuni sɔ bo iledza ita ibɔrɛ i kukpi ame iwegu Ɣaa ɔba iafe koko.

Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa iyo ita nɛ iso matsue ne masia ne, kuira iibawo ne ɔtidza. Ita nɛgbe iso matsɛrɛ atɔ̃me wagbe masia sɔ, “Bosate ɣe mma nɖe ɔ̃ mare” fiɛ “Ngɔ nto ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔsiai Bosate ne, ɔfiniki ɔnyua akpi ɔbara.”

I ranase iyo ne, arɔi agbãagbã se. Awɛ̃ mabara ala sikãrɛtɛa fiɛ awɛ̃ ana sikãfudza. Mapɔ awɛ̃ ala sise fiɛ awɛ̃ ana ne, kudziri mawe ala. Arɔi wagbe ne, masɛ mabara awɛ̃ karabara ku ayi iɖe ame. Fiɛ awɛ̃ ana ne, masɛ mabara wã karabara iyi biara.
Ne ɔso si ɔturi ɔɖi so ɔbɔrɛgu i anyanyara ame fiɛ ɔsekelera so ne, ɔfɔ kuɣa ɔtã Bosate. Ne ɔso maawo wũ ɔsu ɔbara karabara sɛɛ biara.

Ɖi so bɔrɛgu i ara lalaa wa nsɛ awe maporoporoi ɔmɛrɛ̃ ame. Bara ira biara i ɔri iso si asɛ ngbã lɛ fɔɖedze. Ɖɔɛ maturi si asɛgu ma i isobuɛ ame. Siai ara wagbe gu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ makpere Bosate ku ɔtu sekelea.
Ɖi so bɔrɛgu i kakpadzɛ̃ ga nna karɔ̃ ame, alasɔ ara wamɔ igbã sɛ abɔ kulu.
Iikote sɔ fɔ lɛ Bosate ɔɖabo ne, aala ɔɔlɔ kalɔ. Ɣɛɛ ipia sɔ aala ɔɔbara ara sɛɛ gu kayiribielea ɔɔtã maturi ɔɖuɖu fiɛ aaɖe ratedze sɛɛ gu ɔturi ɣɔa.
Mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ mata maya Itɔ̃me Bielea iso ne, la ɔɔɖi ara karɔ̃ ɔɔte ma ku ɔtu ɣɔa siainyɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã sɔ maafiniki maba maatsue ɔnukuare.
Ne ɔso ma adzuni to aabusi sɔ maabɔrɛ i Satana gɔ lobara ma ɔ̃ ara lalaa mabaradze iyebi ame.
Tsue sɔ, i ayi tsɔra ame ne, ɔtile to ɔ̃atã sɔ kayi to kaawe ɔle kukaakɔ.
Maturi to maaɖɔɛ ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ, maɖɔɛ sikã. Mala maɔɖe ndamu maɔkɔlɛ so kato. Maaɖe maturi ma loaɣere maturi atsuɛ pɛ̃ gu mma loibawarɛ maɣese. Maaɖe mma loibapɛ siba gu manyanyase.

Mato maaɖe mma i ɔturi mama ara iisɛ aɖo kayiri gu mma loisɛ manyɔ nnya. Maaɖe mma loala mila masia maturi iso fiɛ maaɖe mma loisɛ maɖe so iso. Mato maaɖe maturi ma mba silalaa. Maaɖe mma loisɛ maɖɔɛ ira sɛɛ.
Mato maaɖe maturi ma loaɖi ma malaa matã. Mma loabara ira maro fiɛ maabu iti ame, gu maturi ma loabu sɔ ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe manɔgbadze gu mma loaɖɔɛ kayiiso isoɣɔ maɖo Ɣaa.
Maturi magbe sɛ mate so lɛ mafɔɖedze, ɣɛɛ masɛ̃ Ɣaa ɔle sɔ ɔdaaɖe ma iso. Ɖi so bɔrɛgu i maturi magbe igbã kɔrɛ.
Alasɔ mmagbe igbã ne, masɛ mawɛrɛ mabo i maturi ayo mafinikira marɔ̃go ma loisɛ mawo so iso ɔɖe adzuni ala ma akpi ɔɔɖo ma iti gɔ masiai sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ agbãagbã ɔso.
Marɔ̃go magbe to masuã ara ɔwi ɖaa, ɣɛɛ maito matsue ɔnukuare.

Kumɛgɔ i Yane gu Yambre ɔta maya Mose iso kokooko ne, ngbɔ ame i mila maratedze magbe to maata maya Itɔ̃me Bielea iso ne. Maɖe maturi ma i ara lalaa ɔyi ma adzuni ɔɖuɖu ame fiɛ maɔyu kafɔkaɖe ɔri mɔmɔ.
Ɣɛɛ ne, maibaɖe iso, alasɔ ma ara lalaa to aabɔrɛ i ɔgbami gɔ maturi ɔɖuɖu to maanya maturi ma igbã maɖe lɛ kumɛgɔ ibɔrɛ Yane gu Yambre iso.
Fɔ ne, ɔɔnya wũ ara ite fiɛ aɣe wũ nsɛgbai gu wũ adzuni gu wũ kafɔkaɖe gu wũ ikpɛ̃gu wũ kuturiɖɔɛ gu kumɛgɔ loya teteree.
Aɣe kumɛgɔ masiai me maɖaa me fiɛ lowe inyɛ. Aɣe nnɛ loba me iso i Antiokia gu Ikonion gu Listra. Bu kama iti nɛ ame loki lofe. Ɣɛɛ i wã ɔɖuɖu ame ne, Bosate ɔɖi me.
Gbaã iɖe sɔ, mma ɔɖuɖu loasɛ ngbã sɛɛ i Kristo ame ne, mato maate ma ɔɣiã makpɛ̃gu ma.
Ɣɛɛ mila maratedze gu maturi lalaa ne, ma inina to iakɛlɛ katɔ̃. Mato maasɔsɔla maturi, ɣɛɛ ma wũ ɔsɔsɔla ma to ma.
Fɔ ne, lobie sɔ aaya teteree i ara wa asuã fiɛ afɔ aɖe ana iso. Alasɔ aɣe mma kɔrɛ asuã wã abɔrɛgu.
Gɔ ita i fɔ sibiɛtɛ ame ne, aɣe ɔko sekelea ame atɔ̃me wa loatã sɔ aakpa anɔ, iatã ana iɖi iki i Kristo Yesu kafɔkaɖe ame.
Ɣaa Siwarã lotã mma ɔɖuɖu lotsɛrɛ Ɔko Sekelea iwola fiɛ matsɛrɛ. Ara wa matsɛrɛ lɛ atã ɔturi ara ite, kuka, aɣɛrɛ iledza gu ikararã itã ngbã sɛɛ isɛ.
Matsɛrɛ sɔ si ɔbiara gɔ losu so ɔtã Ɣaa aayi fiɛ ialedza wũ itã karabara sɛɛ biara ibara.
Loɣɛ i Ɣaa gu Kristo Yesu gɔ loaledza iba iaɣɛgu magbanadze gu makpise atɔ̃me kanya. Ngɔ loaledza iba iaɖe sigara nto loka-ɔ teteree sɔ,
kɔrɔ̃ pia o-o, kɔrɔ̃ na o-o ne, daama Itɔ̃me Bielea kanya. Ka maturi si asɛ̃ ma, pia ma ɔtɔ si aɖiɖi ara karɔ̃ ate ma ku ɔtu ɣɔa.
Alasɔ ɔwi to ɔba gɔ maturi iibamɔɛ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea mala, ɣɛɛ mato maabara nnɛ maɖɔɛ fiɛ maabie maratedze matã so, mma loaɣere ma ara wa maabie sɔ manɔ i ma ɔrakolo kanya.
Mato maafiniki i Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe kama masiai anatika.
Fɔ ɣɛɛ ne, mɔɛ̃ so la kukaakɔ i ɔri biara iso si awe ɔle i inyɛwe biara ame. Bara Itɔ̃me Bielea ɣɛdze karabara. Si abara mafɔɖedze tɔ̃ɖedze karabara kukaakɔ.
Alasɔ mme ne, ɔwi ɔɔɣo gɔ wũ ngbã aaro lɛ nnɛ masu masɔrɛ Ɣaa. Wũ ɔwi ɔɔɣo gɔ loabɔrɛ i kayi gagbe ame.
Loɔkpɛ̃ ikpɛ̃ sɛɛ fiɛ loɔro wũ karabara lɛ iseterese sɛɛ awe. Lomɔɛ̃ wũ kafɔkaɖe i Kristo ame lola isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃.

Ita i kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔledza sigaraikoto sekelea ɔsɛ me. Ikoto nɛ i Bosate gɔ nɖe atɔ̃meɣɛdze i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso aatã me ku iyi tsɔra nɛmɔ. Fiɛ iiɖe wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ me loafɔ ne, ɣɛɛ bo gu mma ɔɖuɖu ana losu ma ɔriinyɔ masia i Bosate iledza iba iso.
Ki i ɔri biara iso si aba aanya me mala.
Alasɔ Dema ɔɔrui i wũ kɔrɛ sɔ ɔ̃asiai kayiiso ara i Tesalonika. Kreske ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Galatia fiɛ Tito ɔ̃ wũ ɔkɛlɛ Dalmatia.
Luka ɔnɔwɛ̃ loɔkuti i wũ kɔrɛ. Ne ɔso kɔ Marko bɔ alasɔ ɔto ɔ̃aɖe me bualɛ gbaã.
Losese Tihiko Efeso.
Si ato aba ne, su wũ ɔyu awu tagbaraa wa lonyua losɛ i Karpo kɔrɛ i Troa bɔ me. Su wũ siko gu titirio ndzɛ nɖe mabɔi siko sire kukosɛi ana.
Aleksandro gɔ nɖe ratoredze ɔbara me ara boa gbaã. Bosate mɔmɔ to ɔ̃atã wũ ara wa ɔbara kuso.
Ne ɔso fɔ̃ wũ dzuɛ̃ so i ɔ̃ iso alasɔ ɔta ɔɣɛ i bo ara wa boto bote iso gbaã.
Ɔkpɛ ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ maɣɛ wũ itɔ̃me ne, kuwɛ̃ iiba ɔ̃ayagu me, ma ɔɖuɖu ɔnyua me masɛ. Ɣɛɛ lotã Ɣaa iti sɔ ɔdaakpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue i ne iti.
Ɣɛɛ ne, Bosate ɔya me i kɔrɛ ɔpia me ɔle fiɛ lowo Bosate itɔ̃me ɔɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase i mmɔ. Bosate ɔɖi mɛ ɔbɔrɛgu i kukpi ame.
Bosate to ɔ̃aɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i itikpi biara ame fiɛ ɔ̃asɛgu me i isobuɛ ame gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loabo Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ i kato. Ile bosu botã Ɣaa ita i kiniɔ ikɛlɛ kawirikɔ̃. Si iba ngbɔ.
Loya Priska gu Akwila gu Onesiforo iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu.
Erasto pia i Korinto, ana ne, Trofimo to ɔnyɛ, ne ɔso lonyua wũ losɛ i Mileto.
Pia kubɛ sɔ aaba aabo wũ kɔrɛ ngbe fiɛ ɔyu ɔwi aaɣo. Eubulo gu Pude gu Lino gu Klaudia gu manyii fɔɖedze tsɔra ɔɖuɖu ɔya mi o-o!
Bosate si ɔwegu fɔ siwarã si ɔ̃ abualɛra si awegu mi.
Titus: Mme Paulo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa rabaradze gu Yesu Kristo katɔ̃mesɛdze ne, mme nto lo tsɛrɛ-ɔ ɔko gɔgbe ne. Ɣaa ɔɖi me fiɛ ɔpia me sɔ lobuai ɔ̃ maturi ma ɔɖi sɔ ma kafɔkaɖe aamɔ si lote ma ɔri sɛɛ gɔ mpia i bo Ɣaa itɔ̃me ame.
Itɔ̃me nɛgbe sɛ itã ɔriinyɔ nɛ mpia i ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro iso. Ɣaa gɔ loisɛ ɔla sila mɔmɔ ɔsia bo itɔ̃me nɛgbe ita fiɛ ɔbara kayiiso.
Ɔɖi ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro itɔ̃me ɔte bo i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ loto loɣɛ ngbe ame i ɔwi gɔ lokote wũ iso. Nnɛgbe ɔsu ɔpia i wũ nrɔɔ̃ ame fiɛ nto loɣere maturi ne. Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɖidze lopia me sɔ loɣɛ ne.
Wũ ɖɔɛse Tito, nto lotsɛrɛ-ɔ ɔko gɔgbe alasɔ ɔbi bielea aɖe me i kafɔkaɖe ga ame bopia ame. Lokarɛ Ɣaa gu Yesu Kristo gɔ nɖe bo Ɖidze sɔ ɔmɔɛ̃-ɔ ɔla i ɔ̃ abualɛra ame si ɔtã-ɔ isobuɛ.
Lotã-ɔ sɔ we i Kreta si aledza ara wa lokuti sɔ maaledza asɛ. I ɔmagɛ̃ biara ame ne, sɛra matɔ̃ɖedze ma loaya i mafɔɖedze kanya lɛ kumɛgɔ loɣere-ɔ sɔ bara awe.
Mafɔɖedze tɔ̃ɖedze ne, iikote sɔ katɔ̃mei kukawɛ̃ aamɔɛ̃ wũ kala. Ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi gɔ nɖe ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ yiridze. Ɔ̃ mabi ana aaɖe mma lomɔɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe kukaakɔ fiɛ maiɖe matsuelese, masɛ mawarɛ ma maɣese.

Mafɔɖedze tɔ̃ɖedze gɔ nto ɔnyɔ Ɣaa karabara iso ne, iikote sɔ itɔ̃me kuiwɛ̃ aagɔda wũ, ɣee ɔkɔlɛ so kato, ɣee ɔna sikpã malamala. Iikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe tarɛ̃dze, ɔ̃ibaɖe kulu baradze ɣee ngɔ anɔ nsɛ abe i sikã iso.
Ɔ̃aɖe ngɔ loafɔ mafɔ fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ira sɛɛ ibara fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖe so iso. Ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi gɔ mba ngbã sɛɛ, ɔsekele fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ so ɔla kukaakɔ.
Ɔ̃aɖe ngɔ lomɔɛ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔto teteree lɛ kumɛgɔ i kafɔkaɖe ɔri ɔte. Mmɔ ɔ̃awo maturi mama ɔtɔ ɔpia i kafɔkaɖe itɔ̃me ame fiɛ ɔ̃aɖi mma lota maɣɛ i Itɔ̃me Bielea iso iɣɛrɛ ɔte ne.
Nto loɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ matsuelese gu atsuɛ pɛ̃ maɣɛdze gu maladze mawɛ̃ pia maɖaa maturi. Mma nto mabara ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu nɖe ma Yudase ma lofiniki.
Tɛ̃ra ma ɔri i ara wagbe ite iso, alasɔ ara wamɔ sɛ apia kafɔkaɖe ikpɔkpɔtɔ i ayo ame. Maratedze ma nto mate ara nyanyarĩa ngbe ne, kusia mato mabie ɔso fiɛ mato mate ara wagbe.
Ma Kretase mɔmɔ ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe kanyaɖidze ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ma Kretase ne, mila maladze gu mabɔi lalaa, gu maɖeɖei gu madãdze ana maɖe.”
Ira nɛ i kanyaɖidze gɔgbe ɔɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe. Ne ɔso sɛ̃ tã ma sɔ manyua nsɛgbai mɛmɔ si mafɔ kafɔkaɖe sɛɛ gagbe.
Nnɛgbe loatã sɔ maanyua ma Yudase anatika gu mma loɔkpese ɔnukuare i kama mato mate mila ara atsue ɔkã ne.
Ira biara se sekelee itã maturi ma losekele. Ɣɛɛ mma nɖe maturi lalaa fiɛ maifɔ maɖe ne, kuira iiɖe ira sekelea, alasɔ ma adzuni ame ɔyigu ara lalaa fiɛ maisɛ manya ira sɛɛ gu ilalaa maɖi ite.
Ma mɔmɔ sɛ maɣɛ sɔ mafɔ Ɣaa maɖe, ɣɛɛ ma kurabarara iite ngbɔ. Maɖe maturi ma lopukutura so gu matsuelese ma loikote matã kuwarɛ kukuwɛ̃.
Ɣɛɛ fɔ ne, te ara wa nsia i kafɔkaɖe sɛɛ ɔri iso.
Te marɛrɛ̃kpakpa sɔ mamɔɛ̃ so mala, mabara adzuni karabara si maɖe so iso. Mamɔɛ̃ ma kafɔkaɖe mala, maɖɔɛ so si maya teteree i ira biara ame.
Ngbɔ ame i marɔ̃gokpakpa ana ne, te ma sɔ masɛ ngbã mɛ loate sɔ mase sekelee. Madaaɖe mma loala maɔsɛ maturi karɔ̃. Madaaɖe matarɛ̃dze. Ɣɛɛ mate maturi ara sɛɛ.
Mate marɔ̃go biɛtɛ ma nsi i arã ayo kumɛgɔ maaɖɔɛ ma marã gu ma mabi. Ana ne, sɔ

maɖe mma loamɔɛ̃ so mala si mabara so sekelee. Mate ma sɔ maɖe mma loabara ma ayo karabara, mawe kayiribielea, mabɔ so karɔ̃ matã ma marã. Nnɛgbe loatã sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibawo ara lalaa ɔɣɛ i Ɣaa Itɔ̃me iso ne.
I ɔri gɔmɔ ame iso ne, pia maporoporoi ɔle sɔ mamɔɛ̃ so mala kukaakɔ.
Ara ɔɖuɖu ame ne, fɔ mɔmɔ ikote sɔ aaɖe ɔturi gɔ nsɛgbai i maturi mama anyɔ masuã ara mabɔrɛgu. Ya teteree i ara ite ame kukaakɔ.
Pia kusɛ̃ i fɔ ikaɖe ame sɔ maturi awɛrɛ-ɔ fiɛ maibana iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ i fɔ iso iyɔ kunuarɛ aakpɛ̃ fɔ matsirise ala maina kuira nɛ maaɣɛ i bo iso.
Maɖabo si mabɔ so karɔ̃ matã ma makɔse si ma kurabarara si kupia ma makɔse isoɣɔ i ira biara ame. Madaakpadzɛ̃gu ma atɔ̃me.
Madaayu ma ana, ɣɛɛ mate ma sɔ maturi sɛɛ gu mma iso maawo iti ɔsia maɖe. Nnɛgbe aatã sɔ maturi aanya sɔ bo ara ite i Ɣaa gɔ nɖe bo Ɖidze iso ne, ara sɛɛ aɖe.
Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔ̃ abualɛra ɔte bo sɔ iaki i wã iso ne, kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ana iɖi.
Abualɛra wagbe to ate bo sɔ boabɔrɛ i ngbã nyanyarĩa isɛ ame, bokpese kayiiso ara isiai kama. Boamɔɛ̃ so bola kukaakɔ, bosɛ ngbã sɛɛ, bobara ara sɛɛ i kayi gagbe ame.
Ngbɔ boase fiɛ boawe i ɔriinyɔ ame itã Iyi siare nɛ iso i bo Ɣaa gu Ɖidze siare Yesu Kristo aaba ne.
Ɔsu so ɔtã i bo iti sɔ si ɔ̃aɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i ikpi biara ame bokpese maturi sekelea ma nɖe ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ mare itã ara sɛɛ ibara.
Te ara wagbe ku ɔle gɔ i Ɣaa ɔtã-ɔ si apia maturi ɔɖuɖu ma nsɛ makã-ɔ atsue ɔle si alɔgu mma loisɛ i ɔri iso ana. Daatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔnyɔ-ɔ pupurii.
Nyigira fɔ maturi sɔ mabɔ so karɔ̃ matã matɔ̃ɖedze gu mma nto maɖe ma iso si makã ma atsue mabara isɛɛ ɔwi biara.
Ɣere ma sɔ madaarɔ kuwɛ̃ iyere lalaa. Ɣɛɛ mabara sinyii si masɛ i isobuɛ ame. Mawarɛ maturi i ɔri biara iso.

Alasɔ bo wũ bowe i adzimira wamɔ gu atsuele gu ɔri iyu, ku ɔwi gɔ lofe. Boɖe masande botã sosina ɔrakolo gu isoɣɔ lala ina agbãagbã ame. Bonina ɔwi i ɔtile ara iso gu kanɔbɛbɛ ame. Botsiri maturi fiɛ maturi ana ɔtsiri bo.
Ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ i bo Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɖidze ɔɖi ɔ̃ abualɛra gu kuɖɔɛ ɔte bo ne,
ɔfɔ bo. Iiɖe bo ara sɛɛ ibara ɔso, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa mɔmɔ abualɛra wa ɔtã bo sɔ ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔba bo iso ɔso. Siwarã dzɛ lotã maledza bo iɣe fiɛ sitã bo ngbã ɣɛtɛ, sifore bo bokpese sekelee.
Ɣaa ɔsu ɔ̃ Siwarã gbodzoo ɔtã bo gu sɛ̃ ɔle gɔ lobɔrɛ i bo Ɖidze Yesu Kristo iso.
Iki i ɔ̃ abualɛra ame ne, bo gu wũ ndɛ̃ ka ilɛ sɔ boɔna ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro, nnɛ iso i bo ɔriinyɔ sia.
Itɔ̃me gbaã iɖe mmɔ, fiɛ lobie sɔ aapia ne ɔrɔrã. Mma lofɔ Ɣaa maɖe si masu ma ɔwi matã ara sɛɛ wa mba kusia itã maturi ɔɖuɖu ibara.
Daabo i kakpadzɛ̃ ame kukuwɛ̃. Daanina ɔwi i siɣekparɛ ikaka gu maturi iɣɛɣɛ gu kalɔ ilɔ gu Mose mmara iso ibara ame. Ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu na kusia kukuwɛ̃.
Mma nsɛ mapia ikpɔkpɔtɔ i mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃ ne, ka ma ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɣee ikpɛ inyɔ ne kama ne, ɖi ma arɔĩ.
Mmamɔ igbã ne, akpi ɔɔɖe ma iso fiɛ maɔtã so ipɔ ana koko.
Si lopia-ɔ Artema ɣee Tihiko ne, pia kubɛ si aba wũ kɔrɛ i Nikopoli alasɔ mmɔ lobara adzuni sɔ loawe ku ɔyu ɔwi ne.
Pia kubɛ si aɖi atɔ̃meɣɛdze Zena gu Apolo ɔri. Si abie ara wa loanya ma atã ma.
Ikote sɔ mafɔɖedze asuã kumɛgɔ maasu ma ɔwi ɔɖuɖu mabara ara wa mba kusia. Mala maɔbuai maturi mama. Ana ne, madaabara ndã.
Manyii ma mpia i wũ kɔrɛ ngbe ɔɖuɖu ɔya mi. Fɔ wũ si aya mafɔɖedze tsɔra atã bo.
Ɣaa si ɔmɔɛ̃ mi ɔɖuɖu ɔla i ɔ̃ abualɛra ame.
Philemon: Mme Paulo gɔ nrɛ i iyo ala Bosate Kristo Yesu itɔ̃me iɣɛ ɔso gu bo ɔnyii Timoteo lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe bosese-ɔ, bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse Filemon.
Boya bo ɔnyiiko Apia gu bo kpakpɛ̃dze laa Arkipo gu mafɔɖedze ikuri ma nsɛ masarɛ i fɔ iyo.
Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
Bo ɔnyii Filemon, ɔwi biara loto lokparama kayi ne, losɛ lonyigi-ɔ, fiɛ losɛ lopɛ wũ Ɣaa siba ɔwi biara i fɔ iti.
Nsɛ lobara ngbɔ alasɔ lonɔ kumɛgɔ afɔ Bosate Yesu aɖe fiɛ asɛ aɖɔɛ mma ɔɖuɖu nɖe Ɣaa maturi.
Nto lokparama kayi sɔ bo kanya isa lɛ mafɔɖedze awe aawe ɔle ibua sɔ boanɔ ara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu wa mpia i mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo ame karɔ̃.
Wũ ɔnyii, loto lona isoɣɔ fiɛ wũ ɔtu ana ɔkpase ɔsɛ alasɔ fɔ kuɖɔɛ ɔɔpia Ɣaa maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔle.
I nnɛgbe ɔso ne, loba ɔle lɛ fɔ ɔɖeatɔ̃ i Kristo ame loaɣere-ɔ sɔ bara nnɛ lokote.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ loto loɖɔɛ-ɔ ɔso ne, iti loto lotã-ɔ. Mme Paulo mɔmɔ gɔ nɖe Bosate Kristo Yesu katɔ̃mesɛdze fiɛ lorɛ i iyo ala ɔ̃ iti ne,
loto-ɔ i kukpa i wũ ɔbi Onesimo iti alasɔ loɔkpese ɔ̃ ɔse i Kristo ame gɔ lorɛ i iyo ngbe.
Atoa sɔ ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, ɔna kusia kukuwɛ̃ ɔtã-ɔ ne, kiniɔ ne, ka ɔba kusia ɔtã bo gu-ɔ, alasɔ gbaã ɔ̃ iyere karɔ̃ nɖe Kusia.
Lokpesera wũ loto losese-ɔ, ɣɛɛ wũ ɔtu ana siai wũ.
Tee loabie sɔ ɔkpese ɔwe i wũ kɔrɛ i ngbegɔ lorɛ i iyo ala Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔso si ɔbuai me i fɔ kanya.
Ɣɛɛ ne, loibabie sɔ loɣiɛ-ɔ sɔ buai me, ɣɛɛ loabie sɔ aabuai me ku fɔ ɔtu faa. Ne ɔso loibabara kuira si ainɔ karɔ̃.
Siainyɔ nnɛ ɔso i Onesimo ɔrui i fɔ kɔrɛ ɔwi kurukutu nɖe sɔ si ɔ̃akpese ɔba ɔ̃awe i fɔ kɔrɛ pelepele.
Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ɔ̃isiɖe ɔsande kere ɔtã-ɔ, ɣɛɛ ɔnyiibi ɖɔɛse gɔ loipia kuɣɛ ka ɔɖe! Lofɔ loɖe sɔ ɔto ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi bielea ɔtã-ɔ lɛ ɔsande gu ɔnyii i Bosate ame ana.
Ne ɔso si afɔ me lɛ fɔ rabaradze laa ne, fɔ wũ lɛ kumɛgɔ aafɔ me.
Si ɔɣɛrɛ-ɔ ɣee ɔto-ɔ kuso kurere ne, su kɔ̃ pia i wũ iyere ame.
Mme Paulo mme losu wũ kɔrɔ̃ loto lotsɛrɛ losese-ɔ sɔ, loto loatã-ɔ kuso gɔmɔ. Loito lobie sɔ loanyigira-ɔ sɔ fɔ mɔmɔ ne, ato me fɔ ngbã kuso i Kristo ame.
Ne ɔso wũ ɔnyii, bara me kayiribielea gagbe ala Bosate iti si apia me isoɣɔ lɛ ɔnyii fɔɖedze awe i Kristo ame.
Loto lotsɛrɛ-ɔ ɔko gɔgbe ku kafɔkaɖe sɔ ato aakã me atsue fiɛ lofɔ loɖe sɔ ato aabara aɖo nnɛ loto lokarɛ lobɔrɛgu i fɔ kɔrɛ.
Ana ne, lobie sɔ bie iyo sɛ me alasɔ lofɔ loɖe sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃akã mi ɔɖuɖu atsue ɔnyua me ɔtã mi.
Epafra, gɔ bo gu wũ nrɛ i iyo ala Kristo Yesu ɔso sɔ ɔya-ɔ.
Marko, Aristarko, Dema gu Luka ma nɖe wũ mabuaidze ana ɔya-ɔ o-o.
Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu mi ɔɖuɖu.
Hebrews: I ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɖe bo mawa ika gbodzoo i siri agbãagbã iso ɔkigu i kanyamaɖidze iso.
Ɣɛɛ i ayi tsɔra wagbe ame ne, ɔ̃ɔɖe bo ika ɔkigu i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso. Ɔ̃ iso i Ɣaa ɔki fiɛ ɔbara kayiiso fiɛ ɔ̃ iɖe ɔɖi sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔ̃ ara ku kawirikɔ̃ ne.

Ɔbi gɔgbe nsɛ ɔɖi ɔ̃ Ɔse ikpawaĩ ɔte fiɛ ɔɖe ɔ̃ ɔse kumiamia tutuutu ne. Ɔmɔɛ̃ kayi ɔto ala ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ mba ɔle. Gɔ ɔfɔ kasukatsɛ ɔtã maturi awune akpi ɔro ne, ɔkpase ɔsɛ i Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate kuɖearɔ̃ iso i kato.
Ɣaa ɔkɔlɛ Ɔbi kato ɔɖo Ɣaa makpabo lɛ kumɛgɔ ame i Ɣaa ɔtã wũ iyere nɛ lomɔ iɖo Ɣaa makpabo ire.
Alasɔ Ɣaa iiɣere ɔ̃ kpabo kuwɛ̃ ku ɔwi gɔ lofe sɔ,
“Wũ Ɔbi aɖe.
Nɔme ne, loɔkpese fɔ Ɔse.”
Fiɛ ɔ̃iɣere ɔ̃ kpabo kuwɛ̃ ana sɔ,
“Loaɖe fɔ Ɔse,
fiɛ aɖe wũ Ɔbi.”
Ɣɛɛ gɔ Ɣaa to ɔba ɔ̃apia ɔ̃ Ɔbi biete ɔwɛ̃ saã kayi gagbe iso ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Ɣaa makpabo ɔɖuɖu si masɔrɛ wũ.”
I makpabo iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Losu wũ makpabo lobara lɛ ɔwiri
fiɛ wũ maɖabo magbe ne, lobara ma lɛ ɔtɔ sinyagɛmi.”
Ɣɛɛ i Ɔbi iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Ɣaa, fɔ sigara ɔɖewi iibafe ɔnya.
Fiɛ asɛ aɖe fɔ maturi iso i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso.
Asɛ aɖɔɛ ira nɛ nse bɔlɔlɔ fiɛ atsiri nwa loiya tɔrɔrɔ.
Ne ɔso i fɔ Ɣaa ɔsɛra-ɔ sigara, ɔtã-ɔ kuwarɛ isoɣɔ nɛ lomɔ
iɖo fɔ malaa ire ne.”
Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ana i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso sɔ,
“Bosate, i karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ne, fɔ lobara karɔ̃
fiɛ fɔ arɔĩ asu abara ala kuɖokpo.
Ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu to aawɔ, ɣɛɛ fɔ ne, apia ɔwi biara,
ara wagbe to aaburi lɛ arapia.
Ato aakarĩ wã lɛ akatisɛ
fiɛ aafinikira wã lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ mafinikira arapia.
Ɣɛɛ fɔ ne, ngbɔ ame aase ɔwi biara ne.
Fɔ akɔ na kawirikɔ̃.”
Ɣaa iiɣere ɔ̃ kpabo kuwɛ̃ sɔ,
“Sɛ i wũ kuɖearɔ̃ iso ngbe
gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loatã atara ngba asia i fɔ matsirise iso.”
Iyɔ be i makpabo ɖe? Ma nɖe Siwarã dzɛ nsɛ sisɔrɛ Ɣaa fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔpia ma sɔ masɛ maabuai mma loana iɖi ne.
Nnɛgbe ɔso ikote sɔ boamɔɛ̃ ɔnukuare ara wa ɔɖuɖu mate bo bola teteree sɔ boibayu ɔri ne.
