Alasɔ si mmara mɛ i Ɣaa makpabo ɔfɔ mabɔ bo mawa ɖe migbaãre fiɛ si ɔrere ɔta ɔya me iso masɛ makpadzɛ̃ wũ kutsue gɔ lokate ne,
nda boabara fiɛ boatere i kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛ loaba bo iso si bosɛ̃ iɖi siare nɛgbe? Bosate Yesu mɔmɔ ɔɖe loɖe katɔ̃ ɔpɛ iɖi nɛgbe imomo fiɛ mma lonɔ ne fiɛ boawo ma ɔfɔ ɔɖe ɔba maaɣere bo.
Ɣaa ɔsu akparĩ gu awawãra agbãagbã gu Siwarã Bielea karatã ga ɔɣɛ ɔtã maturi i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ kanya ɔsia iɖi siare nɛgbe ita.
Ɣaa iisu kayi ɣɛtɛ ga iso itɔ̃me boto boɣɛ ngbe ɔpia i makpabo kayirinɔ.
Ɣɛɛ Ɔko Sekelea ame kakɔi kawɛ̃ ne, matsɛrɛ sɔ,
“Be i ɔturi awune ɖe ɔso fiɛ fɔ anɔ sia wũ iso?
Be kowũ i ɔturi awune ɖe ɔso ato adzuɛ̃ wũ ngbɔ?
Abɔ wũ karɔ̃ kɛkɛĩ i ɔwi kurukutua ame aɖo Ɣaa makpabo.
Asu ikpawaĩ gu kuwarɛ atɔmedza wũ lɛ sigaraikoto.
Fiɛ asu ira biara apia wũ i kayirinɔ.”
Si Ɣaa ɔsu ira biara ɔpia i ɔ̃ kayirinɔ ne, iyɔ kuira na nɛ iso ɔna ɔle. Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, boito bonya sɔ ira biara pia i ɔturi kayirinɔ.

Ɣɛɛ bonya Yesu gɔ i ɔwi kurukutu ame ne, Ɣaa ɔbɔ wũ karɔ̃ ɔɖo makpabo, sɔ iki i Ɣaa nnyainyɔ ame ne, ɔkpi i maturi ɔɖuɖu iti. Bonya sɔ iki i ɔ̃ kukpi gɔ ɔkpi ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɔtɔmedza wũ ikpawaĩ gu kuwarɛ sigaraikoto.
Ikote sɔ Ɣaa gɔ lobara ira biara fiɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ wã ɔɖuɖu ɔto ɔtã sɔ Kristo ɔyi iki i ɔ̃ inyɛwe ame sɔ ɔ̃akɔ maturi gbodzoo ma nɖe Ɣaa mabi ɔbɔ sɔ maana kaɖekɔ̃ i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ame.
Ɔsekelera maturi ɔbɔrɛgu i ma akpi ame, fiɛ ma gu mma ɔsekelera ne, Ɔse ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖe ma. Ne ɔso iito ikpɛ̃ Yesu kunuarɛ sɔ ɔ̃akpere ma sɔ ɔ̃ manyiibi ne.
Ɔɣere Ɣaa sɔ,
“Loaɣere wũ manyii nnɛ abara.
Fiɛ loale-ɔ i ma kasarɛkɔ̃.”
Ɔɣɛ ana sɔ,
“Loasu wũ anɔ losia i Ɣaa iso.”
Fiɛ ɔledza iɣɛ sɔ,
“Ɔɔnya me gu mabi ma i wũ Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã me.”
Gɔ mma ɔto ɔkpere sɔ mabi ɖe sosina gu ima ɔso ne, Yesu ɔ̃ wũ ɔkpesera so lɛ ma ɔwɛ̃ awe i siturina ame. Ɔbara ngbɔ sɔ iaki ɔ̃ kukpi ame ne, ɔ̃awɔra Ɔbosam gɔ mba kukpi ɔle.
Iki i nnɛgbe ame ne, ɔkurisi mma ɔɖuɖu nɖe masande matã ifɔ̃ i ma agbanayi ɔɖuɖu ame gɔ mato manigã kukpi ɔso.
Ite sekelee sɔ iiɖe Ɣaa makpabo maɖe ɔsɛ ɔbuai, Ɣɛɛ Abraham mawa maɖe ɔsɛ ɔbuai

I ɔri biara iso ne, ɔkpese lɛ ɔ̃ manyiibi awe fiɛ ɔwo sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele nnyanyɔdze gu ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri iso i Ɣaa karabara ame ɔɖe. Ngɔ losu so ɔsɔrɛ ɔtã Ɣaa sɔ maturi ɔɖuɖu aana ma akpi isu itsɛ.
Ne ɔso si ɔrere to ɔki i kalakanyɔ ame ne, ɔ̃awo wũ ɔbuai alasɔ ɔ̃ wũ mala wũ manyɔ fiɛ ɔwe inyɛ.
Ne ɔso wũ manyii sekelea ma mba kaɖekɔ̃ i Ɣaa ikpere ame, minyɔ Yesu gɔ nɖe bo kafɔkaɖe ga itɔ̃me bosɛ boɣɛ Katɔ̃mesɛdze gu sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele.
Ɔbara ara i ɔri iso ɔtã Ɣaa gɔ lokpere wũ sɔ ɔbara ɔ̃ karabara, lɛ kumɛgɔ ame i Mose ɔbara i ɔri iso i ɔ̃ karabara ame i Ɣaa iyo.
Ngɔ lotsue iyo sɛ ɔwe kuwarɛ ɔɖo iyo nɛ ɔtsue. Ngbɔ ame i Yesu ba kuwarɛ gɔ lomɔ kuɖo Mose kure ne.
Iyo biara ba ngɔ lotsue ne, ɣɛɛ gbaã ne, Ɣaa nɖe ngɔ lotsue ira biara.
Mose ɔbara ira biara i ɔri iso i Ɣaa iyo lɛ ɔɖabo awe, fiɛ ɔɖe ika i ara wa i Ɣaa aaɣɛ i ɔwi gɔ i katɔ̃ iso.
Ɣɛɛ Kristo to ɔbara ira biara i ɔri iso lɛ Ɔbi gɔ mba ɔle i Ɣaa iyo iso. Bo nɖe ɔ̃ iyo si bomɔɛ̃ bo katetere gu kafɔkaɖe i nnɛ boto bonyɔ ɔri bola teteree.
Ne ɔso lɛ kumɛgɔ i Siwarã Bielea ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Nɔme si minɔ Ɣaa silɔ ne,
midaabara atsuele
lɛ kumɛgɔ i mi mawa ɔbara
ku ɔwi gɔ mata maya Ɣaa iso, mala wũ manyɔ i fafuĩ ame.
Mmɔ mala me manyɔ ne
atoa sɔ manya ara wa lobara i akɔ sina ame.
Ne ɔso lonagu ɔwi gɔmɔ maturi sikpã
fiɛ loɣɛ sɔ, ‘Maɖe maturi ma iso aibawo iti ɔsu ɔsia.
Fiɛ masɛ̃ sɔ maibakã wũ mmara atsue.’
Lonagu ma sikpã lokã ndamu sɔ,
‘Maibabo i karɔ̃ ga iso tee loatã ma iwarã manya!’ ”
Wũ manyii fɔɖedze, minyɔ so kukaakɔ sɔ kuwɛ̃ i mi ndɛ̃ iibawe ɔtu gɔ lonyanyarĩ fiɛ ɔna kafɔkaɖe sɔ ɔ̃afiniki i Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã kama.
Ɣɛɛ si ikpi iibasɔsɔla mi kuwɛ̃ itã mikpese matsuelese ne, mibuai so ayi kumɛgɔ miɣe sɔ iyi biara ne Nɔme iɖe.
Boba kaɖekɔ̃ ku Kristo si bomɔɛ̃ bo ɔriinyɔ nɛ boba ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ bola teteree isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃.
Ngbɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Nɔme si minɔ Ɣaa silɔ ne,
midaabara atsuele
lɛ kumɛgɔ i mi mawa ɔbara gɔ mata maya Ɣaa iso.”
Mabe nɖe mma lonɔ Ɣaa silɔ fiɛ mata maya wũ iso? Mma ɔɖuɖu i Mose ɔkɔ ɔbɔrɛgu i Egipte karɔ̃ iso maɖe.
Mabe i Ɣaa ɔnagu sikpã akɔ sina? Mma lobara ikpi, fiɛ makpi i fafuĩ ame.
Gɔ Ɣaa ɔkã ndamu teteree sɔ maibabo i karɔ̃ ga ame ɔ̃atã ma iwarã manya ne, mabe maɖe ɔto? Mma loikã wũ atsue ɔto.
Ite sekelee sɔ nnɛ ɔso maibo i karɔ̃ gamɔ iso nɖe sɔ maifɔ Ɣaa maɖe.
Ne ɔso gɔ ɔri ɔkpese ɔpia sɔ maturi aakɛlɛ iwarã nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ame ne, mitã bodzuɛ̃ so. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, mi mawɛ̃ iito maakate matã iwarã nɛmɔ ame ikɛlɛ.
Alasɔ bo wũ ne, maɣere bo itɔ̃me lɛ kumɛgɔ maɣere mmamɔ ana. Manɔ itɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ maina kusia kukuwɛ̃ alasɔ maifɔ ne maɖe.
Bo ma lofɔ boɖe ne, bo mba iwarã nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ne. Lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Lokã ndamu i sikpã ame sɔ,
‘Ma kukpa iibane karɔ̃ ga iso maana wũ iwarã manya!’ ”
Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ngbɔ atoa sɔ ɔ̃ɔro ɔ̃ mɔmɔ karabara ku ɔwi gɔ ɔbara kayiiso.
Alasɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, matsɛrɛ i kakɔi kawɛ̃ sɔ,
“Iyi kɔdzɛva iso ne,
Ɣaa ɔwarã fiɛ ɔ̃isibara karabara kukawɛ̃.”
Ɔledza iɣɛ i itɔ̃me nɛgbe ame sɔ, “Ma kukpa iibane karɔ̃ ga iso tee maana wũ iwarã manya!”
Atoa sɔ mma loɖe katɔ̃ mafɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea iiwo iwarã ame ɔbo alasɔ maikã Ɣaa atsue ne, ɔri ɔkpese ɔpia ɔtã maturi mawɛ̃ sɔ maabo iwarã nɛmɔ ame.
Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔsɛ iyi mama nɛ ɔto ɔrɔ sɔ Nɔme fiɛ ɔɖe ika ɔkigu i David gɔ maɣe kamakama iso sɔ,
“Nɔme si minɔ Ɣaa silɔ ne,
midaabara atsuele.”
Alasɔ si Yosua lowo ma ɔkɔ ɔbogu iwarã ame ne, tee Ɣaa iisibaɖe ika i iyi mama iso.
Ne ɔso iwarãyi iwɛ̃ ɔkpese ise gɔ Ɣaa maturi aawarã i ne iso.
Alasɔ mma loabo i Ɣaa iwarã ame ne, mato maawarã lɛ kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ wũ ɔwarã i ɔ̃ karabara ame.
Ne ɔso mitã sɔ bo wũ boakpɛ̃ sɔ boabo iwarã nɛmɔ ame sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibakpase i kafɔkaɖe ame ala atsuele ɔso lɛ mma loibo.

Alasɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me ba ngbã, ito ibara karabara, iba ɔbe iɖo ibe inyɔ ipɛmi biara. Isɛ ibo i ɔturi ame dzoroo iɣɛ sosina gu siwarã ndɛ̃, iɣɛ akui kusakɔ̃ gu akui ame iɖa ndɛ̃. Isɛ ifafarɛ ɔturi adzuni gu ɔ̃ ɔtu ame ara wa ɔto ɔbu ame pelepele.
Ara wa ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa ɔbara ne, kuiwɛ̃ iiwɛrɛ wũ. Ira biara se pefee i ɔ̃ katɔ̃, fiɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ i bo ɔɖuɖu aatã akɔnta.
Gɔ boba sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele siare gɔ lokɛlɛ kato i Ɣaa iyotɛ̃ gɔ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi Yesu ɔso ne, mitã bomɔɛ̃ bo kafɔkaɖe ga itɔ̃me boto boɣɛ bola teteree.
Alasɔ ɔ̃iɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele gɔ i bo ara iibaɖo kayiri. Ɣɛɛ ne, ngɔ mala manyɔ i ɔri biara iso lɛ bo ame ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ibara ikpi kuiwɛ̃ ɔɖe boba.
Ne ɔso mitã bosu katetere bobore bobo Ɣaa i ɔ̃ sigaraiyara iso ngbegɔ ɔ̃anyɔ bo nnya fiɛ boana abualɛra sɔ inyaa iyi ne, Ɣaa aanyɔ bo nnya.
Sɔrɛdzekpakpa biara kɛkɛ ne, ɔ̃ manyii ndɛ̃ masɛ maɖi wũ mabɔrɛgu sɔ ɔsɔrɛ Ɣaa i ma kanya, ana ne, ɔsɛ ɔsu ma karatã gu ara fɛ̃a ɔtã Ɣaa i ma akpi iti.
Gɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ba aɣɛrɛ i siri agbãagbã iso ɔso ne, ɔsɛ ɔna ɔtu ɔtã mma loiɣe nnɛ maabara gu mma nto mayu ɔri.
Fiɛ gɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ba akpi ɔso ne, iiɖe maturi iti ɔnɔwɛ̃ ɔsɛ ɔfɛ̃ ara, ɣɛɛ ku ɔ̃ mɔmɔ akpi iti.
Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔɖi so, ɔkɔlɛ so ɔkpesera sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele. Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ nsɛ ɔɖi ɔturi lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔɖi Aaron.
Ngbɔ ame i Kristo iikɔlɛ so kato ɔkpesera so sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ne. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɣere wũ sɔ,
“Fɔ nɖe wũ Ɔbi.
Nɔme ne, loɔkpese fɔ Ɔse.”
Ɔɣɛ ana i kakɔi mama sɔ,
“Aaɖe sɔrɛdze ɔwi ɖaa
lɛ Melkisedek awe.”
Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu ɔwe i karɔ̃ iso ngbe ne, ɔkparama kayi ɔkarɛ ara ku kulu gu sikpabo teteree gu nnɔmɛ ɔtã Ɣaa gɔ loawo wũ ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i kukpi ame. Gɔ ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ fiɛ ɔsu so ɔtã ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔnɔ wũ.
Atoa sɔ Ɣaa ɔbi ɔɖe ne, iki i ɔ̃ inyɛwe ame ne, ɔsuã sɔ ɔ̃akã Ɣaa atsue.
Gɔ Ɣaa ɔɔbara wũ ɔkote i ɔri biara iso ɔro ne, ɔba ɔ̃akpese ngɔ iso i mma nto makã Ɣaa atsue aaki maana iɖi.
Fiɛ Ɣaa ɔɔsia ita ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele lɛ Melkisedek awe.
Atɔ̃me gbodzoo pia tee boaɣere mi i ara wagbe iso, ɣɛɛ wã iɣɛ ba ɔle alasɔ miito minɔ ara karɔ̃ malamala.
Gbaã ne, ikote sɔ tee ka miakpese maratedze, ɣɛɛ ne, mikpese miɣiã ɔturi mama gɔ loate mi ara ɖeakatɔ̃ i Ɣaa ara ame. Gɔ tee ka miaɖe aɖera wa mba ɔle ne, mikpese mitogu inyɛ imɛmɛ.
Ɔbiara gɔ lokpese ɔto ɔmeme inyɛ ne, ɔbiɛtɛ gɔ nna iwola i isɛɛ gu ikpi ndɛ̃ ɔɖe.
Aɖera wa mba ɔle ne, makpakpa aɖera aɖe, mma iki i ma ara isuã ɔso ne, ka maba iwola i isɛɛ gu ikpi ndɛ̃.
Ne ɔso mitã bokɛlɛ katɔ̃ si bonyua sibiɛtɛ ɔwi ara wa bosuã i Kristo ame bosɛ. Mitã sɔ boabɔrɛ i karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ara ite i kumɛgɔ boafiniki i ara wa nna kusia kama gu kumɛgɔ boafɔ Ɣaa boɖe iso.
Mitã bonyua karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ara ite i Ɣaa itupie gu nrɔɔ̃ isia maturi iso gu makpise ita gu kawirikɔ̃ atɔ̃me iɣɛgu iso.
Ne ɔso mitã bokɛlɛ katɔ̃, fiɛ si Ɣaa ɔtɔrã ne ngbɔ boabara ne.
Mma loɔwe i kafɔkaɖe ame manya fiɛ makpese kama ne, nda maabara fiɛ maakpese mafiniki? Maɔti Ɣaa karatã manyɔ fiɛ Siwarã Bielea ana ɔɔwe i ma ame sinya.
Iki i ma ara inya ame ne, maɣe sɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me lɛ, fiɛ maɔti kayi ga nto kaba ɔle manyɔ,
si makpese i ma kafɔkaɖe kama ne, maisibawo ɔfiniki ɔsiai Ɣaa alasɔ mato maledza Ɣaa Ɔbi ipɛ imatãra i kudziri iso, mapia wũ kunuarɛ i maturi ndɛ̃.
Si kado ɔpɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ fiɛ kanɛ ndu, katã aɖera ɔlɛ atã mma ɔso makpɛ̃ ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã karɔ̃ gamɔ kusɛkusɛ.
Ɣɛɛ si karɔ̃ gamɔ ne miyu gu atongbã lore i kã iso ne, kana kusia kukuwɛ̃. Kabore kabo sigbarĩ fiɛ katsɔrakɔ̃ ne, mato maapia kã ɔtɔ.
Manyii, atoa sɔ boɖe ika kumɛgɔgbe ne, mi ɣɛɛ ne, bofɔ mi boɖe sɔ miɣe ara sɛɛ iki i kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa aafɔ mi iso.
Alasɔ Ɣaa ne, ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa ɔɖe gɔ ɔ̃ibaɣara mi karabara sɛɛ, mi kuɖɔɛ gɔ miɖi mite wũ gu ibuai nɛ mitã mafɔɖedze fiɛ mitogu itã ipɛ i kiniɔ.
Ɣɛɛ boto bobie teteree sɔ mi ɔbiara aapia kubɛ ngbɔ mila miɔnyɔ ɔri ku ɔtu ɔɖuɖu isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃.
Ne ɔso midaaɖe madãdze, ɣɛɛ boto bobie sɔ miasore mma losu kafɔkaɖe gu iɣaraso mifɔ kaɣɛkasɛ ga i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ.
Ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔkã ndamu ɔtã Abraham ne, ɔtarĩgu so alasɔ kuwɛ̃ na gɔ lomɔ ɔɖo wũ fiɛ ɔ̃atarĩgu.
Ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Gbaã ne, loatã-ɔ kusɛkusɛ, lotã fɔ mawa ɔsi gbodzoo.”
Ne ɔso gɔ Abraham ɔɣara so pɔkɔsɔɔ ɔmɔɛ̃ so ɔla ne, nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ɔpɛgu wũ kɔrɔ̃.
Maturi sɛ matarĩgu ara wa lomɔ aɖo ma mɔmɔ si mato mabie sɔ masia ita i nnɛ mato maɣɛ iso sɔ gbaã iɖe ne kakpadzɛ̃ kukawɛ̃ na iso.
Ne ɔso i Ɣaa ɔtarĩgu ira ɔsu ɔsia ita i nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃abara iso ne. Alasɔ ɔbie sɔ ikpa mma loafɔ ɔ̃ kaɣɛkasɛ sɔ nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ iisɛ ifiniki.

Ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔbara ara ka anyɔ wa loibafiniki, wã nɖe kaɣɛkasɛ gu ndamu mɛ ɔkã fiɛ wã aka wã anyɔ wagbe iibawo sila ɔɖe. Nwagbe ɔso i bo mma lotere botarĩgu wũ na ifɔ̃ ɖuɖuuɖu ne, alasɔ boto bonyɔ ara wa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ɔri.
Ɔriinyɔ nɛgbe lomɔɛ̃ bo ngbã ito lɛ kumɛgɔ i siɖu sɛ simɔɛ̃ kudziri sila i karɔ̃ ame. Isɛ ikɔ bo ikigu i ɔkati gɔ masa i isɔrɛyo ame ikɛlɛ kasɔrɛkɔ̃ kasekelekɔ̃ ga mpia i kame ame.
Mmɔ i Yesu ɔbo i bo kanya lɛ ɔɖeakatɔ̃ ne. Fiɛ ɔ̃ loba ɔ̃akpese sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele lɛ Melkisedek gɔ nna kawirikɔ̃ ne.
Melkisedek gɔgbe loɖe Salem igara gu Ɣaa gɔ i Kuɖokpo Sɔrɛdze ne. Ɔsarɛgu Abraham ku ɔwi gɔ i Abraham ɔse i kakpã ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɖoe magara fiɛ ɔtã wũ kusɛkusɛ.
Mmɔ i Abraham ɔsu ira biara nɛ ɔna ika weova ɔtã wũ.
Iɖeakatɔ̃ ne, Melkisedek karɔ̃ nɖe igara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso. Inyɔare ne, Salem Igara karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ Isobuɛ Igara.
Maiɖe ika i ɔ̃ ɔse ɣee ɔ̃ ɔnyi iso fiɛ maiɣɛ kuira ana i ɔ̃ ɔɣekparɛ iso. Maiɣɛ kuira i ɔwi gɔ maɣe wũ ɣee ɔwi gɔ ɔkpi iso. Nnɛgbe ɔso ɔre Ɣaa Ɔbi fiɛ ɔɖe Sɔrɛdze gɔ nna kawirikɔ̃ ne.
Minyɔ kumɛgɔ i Melkisedek gɔgbe ɖe ɔturi nyaa! Abraham gɔ nɖe bo ɔwakpakpa ɔtã wũ ara ɔɖuɖu wa ɔna i kakpã ame ika weova.
Levi mawa ma nɖe masɔrɛdze ne, mmara ɔtã ma ɔri sɔ mafɔ ara ika weova i ma manyii Israel mabi ɔɖuɖu kɔrɛ atoa sɔ ma wũ ne, Abraham mawa maɖe.
Ɣɛɛ Melkisedek gɔ loibɔrɛ i Levi ɔɣekparɛ ame ne, ɔfɔ ara ika weova i Abraham kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔtã ngɔ i Ɣaa ɔtã kaɣɛkasɛ kusɛkusɛ.
Kakpadzɛ̃ kukawɛ̃ na sɔ ngɔ lokɔlɛ ɔɖo nsɛ ɔtã ngɔ mpia wũ i kayirinɔ kusɛkusɛ.
I masɔrɛdze kasɛ ne, ɔturi awune gɔ nsɛ ɔkpi nsɛ ɔfɔ ara ika weova, ɣɛɛ i Melkisedek kasɛ ne, ɔturi gɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔpia ngbã ɔɖe lofɔ ara ika weova.
Ne ɔso boawo ɔɣɛ sɔ gɔ Abraham ɔtã Melkisedek ara ika weova ne, ta Levi mawa ma nsɛ mafɔ ara ika weova ma wũ matã.
Alasɔ maiɣe Levi ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame, ɣɛɛ kuɣɛme ne, ɔpia i ɔ̃ ɔwa ima ame.

Levi mabi sɔrɛdze iɖe ame i mmara ɔki miba mitã Israel kaɖe. Ne ɔso si kuira iinina i Levi mabi masɔrɛdze iɖe nɛgbe iso ne, be ɔso inya sɔ sɔrɛdze mama gɔ nse lɛ Melkisedek awe aaba i Aaron mawa kanya?
Alasɔ si mafinikira masɔrɛdze ne, iyɔ ikate sɔ maafinikira mmara.
Bosate gɔ iso maɣɛ ara wagbe ne, kalɛ mama ame iɖe ɔbɔrɛ fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iibɔrɛ i kalɛ gamɔ ame ɔɖe sɔrɛdze ɔnya.
Boɣe kukaakɔ sɔ Yuda kalɛ ame maɣe wũ mapia, fiɛ Mose iiɣɛ kuira i kalɛ gagbe masɔrɛdze iɖe iso.
Itɔ̃me ame ɔɔkpa ibua gɔ sɔrɛdze mama gɔ nse lɛ Melkisedek ɔɔba.
Iiɖe ɔ̃ ɔɣekparɛ ɣee mmara iso manyɔ fiɛ mabara wũ sɔrɛdze, ɣɛɛ iki i ɔle gɔ mpia i ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro ame.
Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Aaɖe sɔrɛdze ɔwi ɖaa
lɛ Melkisedek awe.”
Makpa mmara kuere masɛ i kuruɛ alasɔ mina ɔle gu kusia kukuwɛ̃,
fiɛ miibara kuira iyi. Kiniɔ ne, boto bonyɔ ira nɛ nlɛ iɖo ɔri, nnɛ loaboregu bo ibo Ɣaa.
Ana ne, ndamu ɔbua i sɔrɛdze ɣɛtɛ gɔgbe iso. Kokowi ne, Ɣaa iikã ndamu i masɔrɛdze kuere iso.
Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔkpese sɔrɛdze gɔ Ɣaa ɔkã ndamu ɔtã wũ sɔ,
“Bosate ɔkã ndamu teteree
fiɛ ɔ̃ibafinikira me sɔ,
‘Aaɖe sɔrɛdze ɔwi ɖaa.’ ”
Nnɛgbe ɔtã sɔ Yesu ɔkpese ayaikama ɔtã ndamu mɛ nlɛ miɖo kokooko.
Masɔrɛdze kuere ɔsi gbodzoo alasɔ masɛ makpi maɣɛ karabara.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ Yesu iibakpi ɔnya ɔso ne, ɔ̃aɖe sɔrɛdze ɖaa.
Ɔsɛ ɔwo mma loki i ɔ̃ iso maba Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔfɔ pelepele alasɔ ɔsi ngbã ɔwi biara fiɛ ɔto ɔtã Ɣaa iti ɔtã ma.
Ne ɔso Yesu nɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele gɔ igbã lonya bo. Ɔsekele fiɛ ɔna ikpi kuiwɛ̃, ɔna iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃, matɛ wũ mabɔrɛgu i makpibaradze ame, fiɛ makɔlɛ wũ kato maɖo kuɖokpo.
Ɔ̃ise lɛ ma sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele tsɔra alasɔ ɔ̃isɛ ɔfɛ̃ ara i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ akpi iti iyi biara tɔtɔ fiɛ ɔ̃afɛ̃ ara i maturi tsɔra akpi iti. Nnɛgbe ɔbara ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã i ɔwi ɔɖuɖu kanya gɔ ɔsu so ɔsɔrɛ.
Mose mmara sɛ mibara ɔturi awune gɔ mba aɣɛrɛ sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ndamu mɛ ɔkã i Mose mmara kama ɔbara Ɣaa Ɔbi sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele gɔ loibakpi ɔnya fiɛ mibara wũ ɔyi pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Itɔ̃me nɛ boto boɣɛ ɔdziri kere nɖe sɔ, boba Sɔrɛdzekpakpa gɔgbe. Ɔsi i Ɔlesate sigaraiyara kuɖearɔ̃ iso i kato.
Sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele gɔgbe sɛ ɔbara ɔ̃ kasumu karabara i kasekelekɔ̃ ga nɖe sikati ikpayo mɔmɔ ame. Bosate mɔmɔ lopɛ ikpayo nɛgbe ne iiɖe maturi.
Masɛ masɛra sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele biara sɔ ɔ̃asu karatã gu ara fɛ̃a, ɔtã Ɣaa. Ne ɔso ikote sɔ sɔrɛdze gɔgbe ana ne, ɔ̃awe nnɛ ɔ̃asu ɔtã Ɣaa.
Si karɔ̃ iso ngbe iɖe ɔpia ne, ɔ̃ibana ɔri ɔbara sɔrɛdze karabara, alasɔ masɔrɛdze ma nsɛ masu karatã mabɔ i mmara kanya pia koko.
Masɔrɛdze karabara ga masɛ mabara ne, kare nga mpia i kato i ɔri ɔwɛ̃ iso fiɛ iɖe ira nɛ mato masore.
Alasɔ gɔ Mose to ɔba ɔ̃apɛ sikati ikpayo ne, Ɣaa ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ sɔ aabara ira biara i kumɛgɔ maɖi mate-ɔ i kube iso pɛpɛɛpɛ.”

Ɣɛɛ masɔrɛdze karabara ga i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔpia Yesu nrɔɔ̃ ame lɛ kaɖo kakuere kokooko lɛ kumɛgɔ ame i ndamu ɣɛtɛ mɛ ɔkã i Ɣaa gu ɔ̃ maturi ndɛ̃ lɛ miɖo mikuere alasɔ matsue kã masia i kaɣɛkasɛ ga nlɛ kaɖo iso.
Si kuira iinina i ndamu ɖeakatɔ̃ iso ne, tee iisibanya sɔ maakã minyɔare.
Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔnya iɣɛrɛ i ɔ̃ maturi iso gɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Bosate sɔ,
ɔwi to ɔba gɔ loanyi kanya ɣɛtɛ
ku Israel kaɖe
gu Yuda kaɖe.
Fiɛ kaibase lɛ kanya inyi ɖeakatɔ̃
ga lonyigu ma mawa
ku ɔwi gɔ lomɔɛ̃ ma i kɔrɔ̃
lokɔ ma lobɔrɛgu i Egipte karɔ̃ iso.
Gɔ maibara i kanya ga lonyigu ma iso ɔso ne,
mme wũ loikpa ma.
Bosate ɔledza iɣɛ sɔ kanya ɣɛtɛ ga loanyigu Israel kaɖe i ngbe ne,
ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne,
Loasu wũ mmara lopia i ma adzuni ame
fiɛ loatsɛrɛ me losia i ma situ iso.
loaɖe ma Ɣaa
fiɛ ma wũ maaɖe wũ maturi.
Kuwɛ̃ iisibate ɔ̃ ɔlaa
ɣee ɔte ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi sɔ ɔtsue Ɣaa.
Alasɔ ma ɔɖuɖu to maatsue me
ita i ɔbiɛtɛ kosoi tsɔra isɛ iabo makpakpa pelepele iso.
Loanyɔ ma nnya losu ma akpi lotsɛ ma
fiɛ loisibanyigi wã lonya.”
Gɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe ika i kanya inyi ɣɛtɛ iso ne, ite sɔ kaɖeakatɔ̃ ɔɔkpese kakuere, fiɛ ira biara nɛ nsɛ ikuere ne, isɛ inina iwɔ pelepele.
Ndamu kuere ɔwi ne, Ɣaa isɔrɛ mmara ɔwe, fiɛ kasɔrɛkɔ̃ ana ɔwe.
Mapɛ sikati ikpayo fiɛ maɣɛ ne ame aka anyɔ ala ɔkati. Masɛ makpere kaɖeakatɔkɔ̃ sɔ Kasekelekɔ̃. Ngbe masɛ sikaniɛdziri gu ɔpɔrɔ̃ gu isɔrɛ aɖera ne.
I ɔkati gɔ loɣɛ ikpayo kama ne, iyo nɛ mpia i kame masɛ marɔ sɔ Kasekelekɔ̃ ame Kasekelekɔ̃.

Mmɔ i sikãrɛtɛa isɔrɛkasege ga iso masɛ matsuedza kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a gu Ndamu aɖaka wa mafere sikãrɛtɛa iso se ne. Sikãrɛtɛa irɔi nɛ ame i Ɣaa aɖera wa marɔ sɔ mana pia i aɖaka wagbe ame. Ana ne, Aaron ɔsɛdziri gɔ lofere aɣɔ̃la gu ata wa iso matsɛrɛ Ɣaa mmara masia pia i aɖaka wagbe ame.
Aɖaka wagbe itititɛ̃ ne, mabara ma Kerubi ma nto maɖi Ɣaa ikpawaĩ mate masia. Mawarɛ ma abue mafu ngbegɔ i maturi sɛ mana nnyainyɔ. Iiɖe ɔwi gɔgbe ame boafafarɛ ara wamɔ ame pelepele.
Kumɛgɔgbe masɛ ara wagbe i mmɔ ne. Masɔrɛdze sɛ mabo i ikpayo nɛ i katɔ̃ ame maabara ma isɔrɛ karabara iyi biara.

Ɣɛɛ iyo nɛ i kame ame ne, sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔnɔwɛ̃ pɛ nsɛ ɔbo i mmɔ fiɛ ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã ɔsɛ ɔbo mmɔ i ikɔ ame. Si ɔ̃abo i mmɔ ne, inya sɔ ɔ̃asu ima ɔla, nnɛ ɔ̃asu ɔsɔrɛ Ɣaa i ɔ̃ gu maturi mama ma lobara aɣɛrɛ i idaatsue ame iti.
Siwarã Bielea ɔte sekelee sikigu i ara wagbe ame sɔ ayi kumɛgɔ i sikati ikpayo ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔnya iɣɛ ne, ɔri iibusi sɔ kuwɛ̃ aabo i Kasekelekɔ̃ ame Kasekelekɔ̃.
Nnɛgbe nto ite ara i kiniɔ ɔwi gɔgbe iso ne. Atoa sɔ masɛ matã karatã gagbe, masɔrɛ Ɣaa i ɔri gɔgbe iso ne, maisɛ mawo maturi situ ɔbara sɔ siase bɔlɔlɔ.
Alasɔ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ne, ɔɖe gu ɔne gu kubarara agbãagbã wa loasekelera siturina iso kere aɖe. Masɛ kubarara gɔgbe ɔɖuɖu matã maturi awune gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ maaba maaledza ira biara aaɣo.

Ɣɛɛ Kristo ɔɔba lɛ sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele awe ɔtã ara sɛɛ wa loɔba. Ɔɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele i ikpayo nɛ lofɔ kuɣa fiɛ ikote iɖo iɖeakatɔ̃ ame. Ikpayo nɛgbe ne, iiɖe ɔturi lopɛ, gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ iiɖe karɔ̃ iso ngbe ire iɖe.
Kristo ɔbo i Kasekelekɔ̃ ame Kasekelekɔ̃ ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã i ɔwi ɔɖuɖu kanya. Iiɖe kutepuĩ ɣee manantsuĩ ima iɖe ɔsu ɔkɛlɛgu, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ire iɖe! Ne ɔso ɔtã sɔ Ɣaa aafɔ bo ɔwi ɔɖuɖu.
Si kutepuĩ gu manantsuĩ ima gu inantsuĩbi nɛ matsuedza ndɔ̃ masɛ masu mawɛwɛ̃ i makpibaradze iso masekelera ma fiɛ ma iso aakpa ne,

iyɔ Kristo gɔ loki i Ɣaa Siwarã iso ɔsu so ɔsɔrɛ ɔtã Ɣaa fiɛ iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ na iso ɣɛɛ? Nda iabara fiɛ ɔ̃ ima iibawo bo kaɣere ɔfore ɔɖi i kurabara gɔ nna kusia kukuwɛ̃ ame sɔ boawo Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã ɔsumu ɔbua?

Nwagbe ɔso ne, Kristo nɖe ngɔ losu kanya inyi ɣɛtɛ ɔfere bo gu Ɣaa kanya ndu sɔ mma i Ɣaa ɔkpere aafɔ kusɛkusɛ gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ fiɛ kuna katui. Nnɛgbe ɔba ngbɔ alasɔ ɔturi lokpi fiɛ ɔki i ɔ̃ kukpi ame ɔɖi aɣɛrɛ wa lowe i kanya inyi kuere ame.
Si ɔturi iikpi ne, maisɛ mabara ɔ̃ ɔko gɔ ɔbara ɔsɛ ɔtã ɔ̃ karana iɣɛ karabara.
Ayi kumɛgɔ i ngɔ lobara ɔko ɔtã ɔ̃ ara iɣɛ si ngbã ne, maibawo ɔko gɔmɔ karabara ɔbara.
Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ ima iɖe masu masia kanya inyi kuere kɔra ita ne.
Gɔ Mose ɔɔpɛ mmara ɔɖuɖu imomo ɔtã maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔro ne, ɔsu manantsuĩ ima gu kutepuĩ nɛ masakanya ku ndu gu sɛrɛ siwɛrɛ̃ rɛtɛa gu iɣatati iwɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ima ɔfere i mmara ɔko gu maturi ɔɖuɖu iso.
Ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ima nɛgbe losia ita i kanya inyi nɛ i Ɣaa ɔnyi sɔ mibara i kã iso ne.”
Ngbɔ ame i Mose ɔwɛwɛ̃ ima ɔfere i ikpayo sekelea gu ne ame ara ɔɖuɖu wa masɛ masu masɔrɛ Ɣaa iso ne.
I ɔnukuare ame i mmara kanya ne, ima masɛ masu masekelera ala ira biara fiɛ akpi isu itsɛ iisɛ iba si ima iifere i karɔ̃.
Ne ɔso masɛ mabara kubarara gɔgbe masu masekelera ara wa lore kato are. Ɣɛɛ kato kasumu ara ne, ara wa nlɛ aɖo masɛ masu masekelera wã.
Alasɔ Kristo Kasekelekɔ̃ ga ɔbo ne, iiɖe nga masu nrɔɔ̃ matsue ala fiɛ kare kato kare kaɖe. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔkɛlɛ Ɣaa iyotɛ̃ ngbegɔ ɔsi i Ɣaa anɔ i bo kanya.
Ma Yudase sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele sɛ ɔkɛlɛ iyo nɛ losekele iɖo ame ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ i ikɔ biara ame ku mabɔi ima. Ɣɛɛ Kristo iisɛ ɔ̃asu so ɔsɔrɛ ikpɛ gbodzoo.
Si ise ngbɔ ne, iyɔ inya sɔ Kristo aasu so ɔsɔrɛ ikpɛ gbodzoo ita i kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɖi wũ ɔte ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã ku kayi kawirikɔ̃ gagbe sɔ iaki i ɔ̃ isu so isɔrɛ ame ne, ɔ̃aɖi ikpi biara.
Ipia sɔ ɔbiara aakpi ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã, ne kama ne, Ɣaa aaɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me.
Ne ɔso Kristo ɔ̃ wũ ne, ɔsu so ɔsɔrɛ ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã sɔ ɔ̃aɖi maturi gbodzoo. Ɔto ɔ̃aledza ikpese iba, iisiɖe akpi isu itsɛ ɔso, ɣɛɛ ɔba ɔ̃aɖi mma nsi masia wũ.
Ma Yudase mmara ne, ara wa nto aba i katɔ̃ kere ɔkala miɖe. Iiɖe ara sɛɛ wa nto aba mɔmɔ miɖe alasɔ miibawo ɔturi ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i ikpi ame iki i ara wa masɛ mafɛ̃ ikɔ biara ame.
Si gbaã ne mma nto masumu Ɣaa to mana isekele ibɔrɛ i ma akpi ame ne, tee ma kaɣere iiba kɛlɛ i katɔ̃ kala kaɔɖaa ma, iyɔ tee ara ifɛ̃ itã Ɣaa ana ka iatui.
Ɣɛɛ ikɔ biara ara wa masɛ mafɛ̃ sɛ anyigira maturi ma akpi.
Alasɔ manantsuĩ gu kutepuĩ ima iibawo akpi ɔfore ɔɖi ma iso.
Ne ɔso fiɛ si Kristo aaba kayi gagbe iso ne, ɔɣere Ɣaa sɔ,
“Iiɖe ara fɛ̃a gu karatã nsɛ katã-ɔ isoɣɔ.
Ɣɛɛ siturina aledza asɛ me.
Ara wa maafɛ̃ matã-ɔ gu karatã ga i maturi sɛ mabara itã ma akpi kasukatsɛ
iisɛ ipia-ɔ isoɣɔ.
Mmɔ loɣɛ sɔ, ‘Nya me, loɔba lobara fɔ kuɖɔɛ
lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ masɛ i wũ iso i Ɔko Sekelea ame.’ ”
Ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Karatã ga masu mabɔ-ɔ gu ara wa mafɛ̃ matã-ɔ i akpi isu itsɛ iti iisɛ apia-ɔ isoɣɔ.” Ɔɣɛ ngbɔ atoa sɔ ara ifɛ̃ nɛgbe ɔɖuɖu ne, masɛ mabara wã i mmara kanya.
Fiɛ ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, “Nya me, loɔba lobara fɔ kuɖɔɛ.” Iki ne iso ne, Ɣaa ɔkpa ara ifɛ̃ kubarara ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔsɛ i kuruɛ fiɛ ɔsu Kristo ɔkpɛ ɔsɛ i ne kanya ne.
Gɔ Yesu Kristo ɔbara nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔbie sɔ ɔbara ɔso ne, ɔsekelera bo ɔɖi i bo akpi ame ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ i ɔwi ɔɖuɖu kanya.
Ma Yudase masɔrɛdze sɛ mabara ma isɔrɛ kubarara kuwɛ̃ saã gɔmɔ iyi biara, ɣɛɛ ma ara ifɛ̃ iisɛ iwo akpi ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i maturi iso.
Ɣɛɛ Kristo ɔba ɔ̃abara kaɣɔra ga loyi i akpi iti itã ɔwi biara, gɔ ɔro ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i Ɣaa kuɖearɔ̃ iso.
Fiɛ ita i ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, ɔsi ɔsia ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa aasu ɔ̃ matsirise ɔpia i ɔ̃ ngba kayirinɔ.
Alasɔ iki i ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ɔsu so ɔsɔrɛ ne, ɔ̃ɔbara mma akpi maɔsu matsɛ sɔ mayi ɔwi ɔɖuɖu.
Siwarã Bielea ana ɔɣere bo sɔ Bosate ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Kanya ɣɛtɛ ga i mme Ɣaa loanyigu ma
i ɔwi gɔ loaba ame ne,
loasu wũ mmara lopia i ma situ ame.
Fiɛ loatsɛrɛ losia i ma adzuni ame.”
Fiɛ ɔɣɛ ana sɔ,
“Loisibanyigi ma akpi gu ma aɣɛrɛ.”
Si Ɣaa ɔɔsu ara wagbe ɔtsɛ ne, iisinya sɔ maabara akpi kasukatsɛ kubarara.
Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii, ka boba ɔri sɔ boabo i Kasekelekɔ̃ ame Kasekelekɔ̃ iki i Kristo ima nɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ ame.
Ala ɔsu ɔ̃ siturina dzɛ nɖe lɛ ɔkati gɔ loɣɛ ikpayo ame ɔɖi ngbã ɔri ɣɛtɛ ɔtã bo.
Ne ɔso gɔ boba sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele siare i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ɔso ne,
mitã bobore bobo Ɣaa ku ɔtu gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ ɔnukuare, kafɔkaɖe ga nɣɛ i ngba iso teteree gu ɔtu gɔ kaɣere nyanyarĩa maɔfore gu sosina dzɛ mapie ndu sekelee.
Mitã boya teteree i bo ɔriinyɔ nɛ itɔ̃me boto boɣɛ ame, alasɔ ngɔ lotã bo kaɣɛkasɛ ne, ɔnukuarese ɔɖe.
Mitã bo malaa ara si aɖo bo kayiri si bopia ma ɔle i kuɖɔɛ ame i ara sɛɛ ibara ame.
Midaatã bosɛ̃ bo kasarɛkɔ̃ isɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i mawɛ̃ sɛ mabara. Ɣɛɛ mitã bopia so katetere bobua gɔ boɣe sɔ Bosate ɔbawi ɔɔpɛtɛpɛtɛ.
Alasɔ si ka boɣe ɔnukuare boro fiɛ bokpese boto bobara ikpi ne, ara ifɛ̃ kuiwɛ̃ siina i akpi iti.
Ɣɛɛ nnɛ loɔkuti nɖe sɔ boawe i ifɔ̃ ame bosia atɔ̃me iɣɛgu gu itɔkpe siare nɛ loatsuedza mma lota maɣɛ Ɣaa iso.
Ɔbiara gɔ lota ɔya Mose mmara iso ne, maisɛ manyɔ wũ nnya, masɛ maɖoe wũ si maɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me fiɛ maturi inyɔ ɣee itɛ ɔɖe aɖansiɛ sɔ ɔbara ira lalaa.

Be maabara mma lonyɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi pupurii, fiɛ mainyɔ ɔ̃ ima nɛ nɖe Ɣaa kanya inyi nɛ losekelera ma ibɔrɛgu i akpi ame lɛ ira nɛ lofɔ kuɣa? Masɛ masopara nnyainyɔ Siwarã ana. Makote matã kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ siare nɛ lobua imɔ.
Alasɔ boɣe ngɔ loɣɛ sɔ, “Loakpadzɛ̃ mma lobara ikpi kutsue fiɛ loabara ma loti kuso.” Ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, “Bosate to ɔ̃aɣɛgu ɔ̃ maturi atɔ̃me.”
Ifɔ̃ra iɖe sɔ ɔturi aabo i Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã sikpã ame.
Midaaɣara inyɛwe gbodzoo nɛ ɔɖuɖu ame miki ku ɔwi gɔ mitsue Ɣaa kere.
Ɔwi ɔmɔi ne, matia mi i maturi ndɛ̃ fiɛ mimɔrɛ̃ ana. Ɔwi ɔmɔi ana ne, masɛ maka mi mabua i mma mato mabara ɔtile iso.
Miwe kayiribielea i mayorɛdze iso fiɛ atoa sɔ mafɔ mi mi karana iso ne, minyua mitã ma miikpɛ̃gu ma. Alasɔ mi mɔmɔ ɣe sɔ karana ga nlɛ kaɖo ngamɔ fiɛ kaibanina se katã mi.
Ne ɔso midaatã nrɔɔ̃ si mifɛ̃ mi gɔ miɣe sɔ kuso siare se kusia mi.
Ikote sɔ miana ɔtu sɔ miawo Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ɔbara fiɛ miafɔ nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ.
Alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Ikuti kɛkɛĩ fiɛ ngɔ loaba aaba, ɔ̃isibanina ɔwi.
Ngɔ nse bɔlɔlɔ to ɔ̃asɛ i kafɔkaɖe ame.
Ɣɛɛ si ɔkpese kama ne,
So iibaɣɔ me i ɔ̃ iso.”
Bo ɣɛɛ ne, bona i mma nsɛ makpese kama fiɛ masɛ mawɔ ndɛ̃, ɣɛɛ mma lofɔ maɖe fiɛ masi ngbã ndɛ̃ bopia.
Kafɔkaɖe nɖe anɔ isu isia i ira nɛ ato anyɔ ɔri iso teteree, fiɛ aasu fɔ ɔtu asia i ira nɛ aito anya, ɣɛɛ aɣe sɔ ipia iso.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i makuere ɔbo Ɣaa anɔ.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame bofɔ boɖe sɔ Ɣaa ne, ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iɖe ɔsu ɔbara kayi. Ne ɔso ɔsu nnɛ boisɛ bonya ala anɔ ɔbara nnɛ bosɛ bonya.

Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i Abel ɔfɛ̃ ara sɛɛ wa lobo Ɣaa anɔ aɖo Kain are. Iki i ne iso ne, Ɣaa ɔnyɔ wũ sɔ ɔɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa. I kafɔkaɖe ame ne, atoa sɔ Abel ɔɔkpi ne, ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe togu bo ika iɖe iki i ɔ̃ kurabarara ame.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i Ɣaa ɔsu Enok nyɔa ɔkɛlɛgu kato sɔ ɔ̃ikpi. Maisinya wũ ala Ɣaa ɔsu wũ ɔruigu. Si ɔ̃akɛlɛ kato ne, maɣɛ i ɔ̃ iso sɔ ɔbo Ɣaa anɔ.
Si ɔturi na kafɔkaɖe ne, ɔ̃ibawo Ɣaa anɔ ɔbo alasɔ si aaba Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, ikote sɔ aafɔ aɖe sɔ ɔpia, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔnyɔnyɔ wũ dzinitii sɛ ɔnya wũ.

Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, Noa ɔkã Ɣaa atsue gɔ ɔɣere wũ sɔ nnɛ i ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iinya ɔnya to iaba. Ɔwe aɖaka ɔkolo gɔ ame i ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔna iɖi. Iki i nnɛgbe ame ne, ɔtã kayiiso maturi ipɔ fiɛ ɔfɔ kaɖekɔ̃ ga nse katã maturi sekelea ma lofɔ maɖe.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i Abraham ɔkã atsue gɔ Ɣaa ɔkpere wũ sɔ ɔkɛlɛ karɔ̃ ga ɔ̃atã wũ lɛ ɔ̃ kaɖekɔ̃ iso. Ɔkã Ɣaa atsue atoa sɔ ɔ̃iɣe ngbegɔ sɔ ɔkɛlɛ.

Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, Abraham ɔwe i karɔ̃ ga i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔtã wũ iso lɛ ɔfɔ awe. Ɔsɛ i akpayo ame lɛ Isak gu Yakob ɔsɛ i akpayo ame atoa sɔ karɔ̃ ga iso masi ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔtã ma.
Abraham ɔbara ngbɔ alasɔ ɔto ɔnyɔ ɔri ɔtã ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ i Ɣaa mɔmɔ loɖaɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ kubereku gɔ mapia i karɔ̃ ame ba ɔle.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, atoa sɔ Sara ɔɔbe ɔfe ɔbi iɣe ne, ɔna ɔle ɔla kayiri alasɔ ɔfɔ Ɣaa gɔ lokã ndamu ɔtã wũ sɔ ɔɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara i nnɛ ɔɣɛ iso.
Ne ɔso iki i Abraham ɔnɔwɛ̃ gɔ loɔbe iso ne, ɔɣekparɛ gɔ losi ɔgɔdɛ̃. Masi lɛ awami i kuɖokpo ɣee ɔpo ame iwarĩ nɛ maibawo ɔka.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i magbe ɔɖuɖu ɔsɛ ngbã gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ makpi, maifɔ ara wa i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã ma. Manya wã dzoroo fiɛ matofora wã. Matɔrã masia sɔ mafɔ gu marisɛdze maɖe i kayi gagbe ame.
Fiɛ maturi ma nto maɣɛ ara wagbe ne, maɔte sekelee sɔ ma mɔmɔ karɔ̃ mato mabie.
Si karɔ̃ ga iso i Ɣaa ɔkpere ma ɔruigu mato mabie ne, tee maba ɔri sɔ maakpese makɛlɛ mmɔ.

Ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ ise ne, mato mabie ma mɔmɔ aɖe karɔ̃ ga nlɛ kaɖo nga iso mase. Karɔ̃ ga mato mabie nɖe Kato. Ne ɔso iisɛ ikpɛ̃ Ɣaa kunuarɛ sɔ ɔ̃ɔɖe mmagbe Ɣaa, alasɔ ɔto ɔledza ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ nlɛ ɔɖo ɔsɛ ma.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, Abraham ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔbi Isak ɔtã gɔ Ɣaa ɔla wũ ɔnyɔ. Atoa sɔ ɔbi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã wũ ɔɖe ne, ɔtɔrã sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ ɔbi birɛrɛĩ ɔwɛ̃ saã ɔfɛ̃ ara ɔtã Ɣaa.
Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame ɔɖegu katɔ̃ i Isak iso sɔ, “Isak mabi ame maaka-ɔ mawa.”
Abraham ɔfɔ ɔɖe sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃awo Isak ɔtara ɔɖi i makpise kɔra ame, fiɛ gbaã ne, ɔfɔ wũ lɛ ngɔ lota ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame.
Iki kafɔkaɖe ame i Isak ɔtã Yakob gu Esau kusɛkusɛ i nnɛ maaba maakpese iso.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, gɔ Yakob ɔɔro ɔkpi ne, ɔtã Yosef mabi birɛrɛĩ kusɛkusɛ. Ɔpiɛtɛ i ɔ̃ ɔsɛdziri iso ɔbɔ iti karɔ̃ ɔle Ɣaa.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, gɔ Yosef ɔkpiwi ɔɔɣo ne, ɔɖe ika ɔɣere Israel mabi i ma irui i Egipte iso fiɛ ɔɣere ma kumɛgɔ maabiara wũ ana.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i Mose maɣese ɔkɔla wũ awa atɛ i kuɖokpo ku ɔwi gɔ maɣe wũ. Manya sɔ ɔbi ɔre situri fiɛ mainigã Egipte igarakpakpa mmara mɛ ɔtã.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame gɔ Mose ɔmɔ ne, ɔsɛ̃ sɔ madaarɔ wũ sɔ Egipte igarakpakpa ɔbirɔ̃gomi ɔbi.
Ɔtɔrã sɔ ɔ̃awe inyɛ ku Ɣaa maturi ɔɖo sɔ ɔ̃anagu makpibaradze isoɣɔ ɔwi kurukutu.
Mose ɔnyɔ sɔ kunuarɛ gɔ maapia wũ i Kristo iti ɔfɔ kuɣa kuɖo karana ga mpia i Egipte alasɔ ɔnyɔ kuso gɔ ɔto ɔba ɔ̃afɔ ɔsese.
Kafɔkaɖe ame ɔrui i Egipte fiɛ ɔ̃inigã igara sikpã alasɔ ɔfɔ Ɣaa gɔ ɔ̃ito ɔnya ɔɖe teteree lɛ ɔnya ɔto wũ awe.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i Mose ɔsɛ Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi. Ɔtã Israel mabi ɔsu ima manukutu i ma ayo akui iso sɔ Kukpi Kpabo gɔ loawɔra Egipte abiete si ɔdaabara ma ikpi kuiwɛ̃.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i Israel mabi ɔsɛ mawara Ɔpo Rɛtɛa lɛ karɔ̃ korea iso masɛ, ɣɛɛ gɔ Egipte maturi ma ntere masiai ma ɔbo i ɔpo ame ne, mawã ndu makpi.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i ibere nɛ matsue maki malɔ Yeriko ɔbiɛ gɔ Israel mabi ɔsɛ maki malɔ ne akpɛnɛ akɔdzɛ.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame fiɛ maiɖoe Rahab gɔ nɖe asɔrɔ̃ɖedze ku ɔwi gɔ maɖoe mma loifɔ Ɣaa maɖe alasɔ ɔfɔ marɛrɛ̃ ma losɛ maala karɔ̃ manyɔ kukaakɔ.
Be loakpese loɣɛ ana? Alasɔ ɔwi na gɔ loaɖe ika i Gideon gu Barak gu Samson gu Yefta gu David gu Samuel gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze iso.
Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i mmagbe mawɛ̃ ɔkpɛ̃gu sigarakuɖekɔ̃ kuwɛ̃ maɖe ma iso, ma mawɛ̃ ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri iso, mawɛ̃ ɔfɔ ara wa maɣɛ masɛ matã ma, fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana ɔsɛ̃ ma dzata nnya.

Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, mawɛ̃ ɔnidza itɔkpe nɛ nto itsue ku ɔle, kã ame lotã sɔ maiɖoe mawɛ̃ i kakpã ame ne. Kafɔkaɖe lotã mawɛ̃ ma nse nyɔkɔ̃tɔɔ̃ ɔkpese mma mba ɔle fiɛ katã mawɛ̃ ana ɔbara kagbegbe i kakpã ame. Kã ame losamarã makpakpɛ̃dze mama ne.
Kafɔkaɖe lotã matara marɔ̃go ma manyii lokpi matã ma. Mawɛ̃ ana ɔtɔrã sɔ maawe inyɛ makpi ne maibasɛ̃ Ɣaa, si maata mabɔrɛ i makpise ame masɛ ngbã mɛ nlɛ miɖo mmɛgbe.
Mabara mawɛ̃ aɣiãra, mapɛ mawɛ̃, mapia mawɛ̃ kugbagɔrɔĩ fiɛ marara ma iyo.
Mapɛ mawɛ̃ ata, fiɛ makɛ mawɛ̃ ana ala saa. Maɖoe mawɛ̃ ala ipɛmi, mawɛ̃ ɔkpese mawɛrɛba ma lowe i imɔrɛ̃ ame fiɛ mawe i masɛrɛrerɔ̃ gu kutepuĩ siko ame, maturi ɔte ma ɔɣiã.
Ma sibiele ɔso ne, maina kasɛkɔ̃ i kayiiso maturi ndɛ̃, ne ɔso mawe maki i fafuĩ ame gu abe iso gu sikpolo gu awo ame i karɔ̃ ame.
Atoa sɔ mmagbe ɔɖuɖu kafɔkaɖe ɔɖe aɖansiɛ sɛɛ i ma iso ne, maifɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ i ma iso.
Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔledza ira sɛɛ iwɛ̃ nɛ nlɛ iɖo ɔsɛ bo, ne ɔso si boiba boabua i ma iso ne, ɔ̃ibabara ma mayi pɔpɔɔpɔ.

Ne ɔso gɔ boba maturi gbodzoo magbe fiɛ maki malɔ bo lɛ idɔdɔ mato mapia bo ɔle ɔso ne, mitã boɖi ɔri itɛ̃ra biara titirio ikpi nɛ nsɛ iɖaa bo iɖo sɔ boawo anɔ ɔkarã ɔtere ise nɛ nse bo i katɔ̃ ku ɔdzini.

Mitã bo anɔ si asia i Yesu iso ala ɔ̃ losɛ bo kafɔkaɖe ɔri karɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ ame lowiri ne. Ɔya teteree i kunuarɛ kukpi gɔ ɔkpi ame gɔ mapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso ala ɔɣe isoɣɔ nɛ nse wũ i katɔ̃ fiɛ kiniɔ ne, ka ɔsi i Ɣaa kuɖearɔ̃ iso.
Nrɔɔ̃ iibafɛ̃ mi si misu mi adzuni misia i Yesu iso. Ngɔ i atoa sɔ makpibaradze ɔtia ne, iiɖaa wũ.
Atoa sɔ mito mikpɛ̃gu ikpi kɔra ne, iibo ngbegɔ ianya sɔ miafere mi ima i karɔ̃.
Miɔɣara katetere ipia itɔ̃me nɛ ame makpere bo sɔ Ɣaa mabi? Ne nɖe sɔ,
“Wũ ɔbi, daanyɔ Ɣaa ikpadzɛ̃ pupurii.
Fiɛ si ɔnyagalagu-ɔ ne, nrɔɔ̃ si midaafɛfɛ̃-ɔ.
Alasɔ ngɔ i Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ ne, ɔ̃ ɔsɛ ɔkpadzɛ̃ i ɔri iso ne.
Fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ ɔfɔ lɛ ɔ̃ ɔbi awe ne, ɔ̃ ɔsɛ ɔkpadzɛ̃ kutsue ne.”
Si mato makpadzɛ̃ mi ne, mina ɔtu alasɔ Ɣaa ne, ɔkpadzɛ̃ ɔto mi lɛ mabi awe. Bɛrɛ mme ɔbi mpia sɔ ɔ̃ ɔse iisɛ ɔkpadzɛ̃ wũ?
Si makpadzɛ̃ ɔbiara ɣɛɛ mi maikpadzɛ̃ mi ne, ite sɔ ɔmagɛ̃ ame mabi miɖe ne miiɖe mabi mɔmɔ.
Ne kama ana ne, boba maɣese i kayiiso ma nsɛ mate bo ara, ɣɛɛ bosɛ bowarɛ ma. Iyɔ boibabɔ so karɔ̃ botã ngɔ nɖe bo siwarã ame Ɔse fiɛ boasɛ ngbã?
Bo mase sɛ makpadzɛ̃ bo ɔwi kurukutu gɔ lokote ma ame. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa sɛ ɔkpadzɛ̃ bo sɔ si ialɛgu bo fiɛ boase sekelee lɛ ɔ̃.
Ɔnukuare iɖe sɔ si ato akpadzɛ̃ ɔturi kiniɔ ne, iisɛ iwe wũ ɔmɛrɛ̃, ɣɛɛ isɛ ibo wũ. Ɣɛɛ kama ne, ikpadzɛ̃ nɛgbe sɛ itã sɔ ɔ̃abara ara sɛɛ, ɔsɛ ngbã i isobuɛ ame.
Ne ɔso mi nrɔɔ̃ mɛ loɔfɛfɛ̃ gu agɛgɛ̃ wa lobara nyɔkɔ̃tɔɔ̃ ne, mipia wã ɔle.
Mikpɛ̃ siri ɖɛkpɛrɛɛ mitã so si mabafã sinyɛ iibanyagɛ̃ ma, ɣɛɛ maana isosarɛ.
Mikpɛ̃ sɔ isobuɛ aawe i mi gu ɔbiara ndɛ̃. Mipia kubɛ sɔ miase sekelee alasɔ ngɔ loisekele iibanya Bosate.
Minyɔ sɔ ɔbiara aana Ɣaa abualɛra. Inyaare ana ne, minyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ kaɖo kukawɛ̃ iibawe i mi ame nɛ loapukutura maturi gbodzoo.
Mi kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaakpese asɔrɔ̃ɖedze ɣee ngɔ nɖe tsuelese lɛ Esau awe. Ɔsu ɔ̃ siɣekpakpa ɔɣa aɖera iɖe iwɛ̃ saã.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ miɣe ne, kama ne, ɔbie teteree sɔ matã wũ kusɛkusɛ lɛ ɔbikpakpa fiɛ ɔbiɛ kaku teteree, ɣɛɛ maitã wũ kusɛkusɛ alasɔ nnɛ i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔbara ne, ɔ̃isibawo ɔfinikira.
Alasɔ iiɖe Sinai kube gɔ i ɔturi aawo ɔpɛgu ɔnyɔ kɔrɛ iɖe miba. Kayi ɔsɛ̃ kpirikpirikpiri ibara guduu, awɛ to akpɛ̃ fiɛ ɔtɔ to ɔtsue.
Kadadã to kakparɛ̃ fiɛ silɔ dzɛ nto siɖe ika ana to sibɔrɛ. Mma lonɔ ara wagbe ɔtã iti sɔ maisito mabie sɔ manɔ kuira mabua.
Alasɔ maibawo mmara mɛ matã ma iso ɔɖe sɔ, “Si bidɛ bɔi lopɛgu kube ne, maapɛ wũ ata maɖoe.”
Ara wa manya ɔkpɛ̃ ma ifɔ̃ itã sɔ Mose ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ifɔ̃ to me nto loti lokpakpa!”
Ɣɛɛ mi ne, Zion kube kɔrɛ iɖe miba. Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã ɔmagɛ̃, Yerusalem gɔ nɖe kato ɔre gu Ɣaa makpabo ma losakanya fiɛ maibawo ma ɔka kɔrɛ mipia.
Mi ne, miba Ɣaa mabi ɖeakatɔ̃ ma ayere matsɛrɛ mapia i kato mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ losarɛ kɔrɛ. Mipia i Ɣaa gɔ nɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu atɔ̃meɣɛdze gu maturi sɛɛ ma siwarã maɔfere sekelee anɔmi ame.
Mmɔ ne, Yesu gɔ nɖe kanya inyi ɣɛtɛ kpuradze ana pia. Ana ne, ɔ̃ ima nɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ fiɛ ito iɣɛ ara sɛɛ iɖo Abel ire pia i mmɔ.
Minyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ miibasɛ̃ ngɔ nto ɔka mi. Ala si maiwo ɔtere i ngɔ loka ma i karɔ̃ iso ngbe kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ kanya ne, nda boabara fiɛ boatere i ngɔ nto ɔka bo ɔbɔrɛgu i kato kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ kanya?
Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔ̃ silɔ ɔtidza kayiiso, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ɔ̃ɔkã ndamu sɔ, “Nto loba loaledza karɔ̃ itidza ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana, kiniɔ ne, iisiɖe kayiiso kere loatidza, ɣɛɛ ta kuɖokpo.”
Sɔ “Loaledza itidza ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana” ɔte sɔ ara wa loawɔ loati, Ɣaa to ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ wã ɔɖi ikuti nwa loiti gɔ ɔtidza kayi.
Ne ɔso mitã bopɛ Ɣaa siba sɔ boba sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ga loibati. Mitã bosu kuwarɛ gu kunigã bosɔrɛ wũ si boabo wũ anɔ.
Alasɔ bo Ɣaa ne, ɔtɔ gɔ nsɛ ɔtsuedza ara pelepele ɔɖe.
Mitã sinyii kuɖɔɛ si kuyi mi ame ɔwi biara lɛ mafɔɖedze.
Midaasɛ̃ mafɔ ifɔ ala iki i ne iso ne, maturi ɔfɔ Ɣaa makpabo lɛ mafɔ gɔ ma mɔmɔ iiɣe.
Minyigi mma nrɛ i iyo lɛ mi wũ ne, mayorɛdze miɖe gu mma mato mate ɔɣĩa lɛ mi gu ma ne, siturina siwɛ̃ siɖe mi.
Mipia kuwarɛ i kuyiri iso si mma nyiri so si maɖe ɔnukuare matã so ala Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɣɛgu masɔrɔ̃ɖedze gu mma nsɛ mafe ma marã ɣee ma mare kama atɔ̃me.
Miɖi sikã kanɔbɛbɛ biara i mi ngbã ame si nnɛ miba si ibo mi anɔ alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Loibanyua-ɔ losɛ,
ɣee loɖi-ɔ atsue kuiyikuiyi.”
Ne ɔso boawo ɔɣɛ ku katetere sɔ,
“Bosate nɖe wũ buaidze, ne ɔso loibanigã.
Be i ɔturi awune aawo me ɔbara?”
Minyigi mi matɔ̃ɖedze ma loba maaɖe katɔ̃ maɣere mi Ɣaa itɔ̃me si minyɔ kumɛgɔ masɛ ngbã. Minyɔ ma Ɣaa kafɔkaɖe si misore ma.
Yesu Kristo iisɛ ɔfiniki. Ɔ̃ gɔ ame lowe ku kɔmakaɖe ne, ɔ̃ ame mpia nɔme fiɛ ɔ̃awe ɔwi biara ne.
Midaatã ara ite agbãagbã wa nna karɔ̃ si akɔ mi ayura. Ɣaa pɛ nsɛ ɔbualɛ bo ɔtã bo siwarã ame ɔle, ne iiɖe araɖea itsiri mmara mɛ loibabuai bo fiɛ miisɛ mibuai mma nsɛ mabara i mɛ iso.
Boba isɔrɛkasege ga iso boawo aɖera ɔɖe, ɣɛɛ ma Yudase masɔrɛdze ma nsɛ mabara karabara i ma kasɔrɛkɔ̃ na ɔri sɔ maaɖe kã iso ara.
Ma Yudase masɔrɛdze ɔkpakpa pelepele sɛ ɔsu bɔi ima ɔkɛlɛgu Kasekelekɔ̃ ame Kasekelekɔ̃ lɛ nnɛ mato masu masɔrɛ i maturi akpi iti awe, ɣɛɛ masɛ matsuedza bɔi mɔmɔ i kabenya.
Ngbɔ ame i Yesu ɔɖe ɔɣiã i kabenya si ɔsu ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ima ɔsekelera maturi ɔbɔrɛgu i ma akpi ame ne.
Ne ɔso bo wũ mitã bokɛlɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ i kabenya si mapia bo kunuarɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ mapia wũ kunuarɛ faa.
Alasɔ bona ɔmagɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ i kayi gagbe iso gɔ ɔ̃ase ɔtã bo ɔwi biara, ɣɛɛ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔba boto bobie.
Ne ɔso mitã boki i Yesu iso bosu ile nɛ nse lɛ ara ifɛ̃ bola boɔtã Ɣaa ɔwi biara. Ne nɖe nnɛ nsɛ ibɔrɛ i mma lofɔ ɔ̃ iyere maɖe kanya ame ne.
Midaaɣara ara sɛɛ ibara gu ara itã maturi alasɔ nnɛgbe nɖe lɛ ara ifɛ̃ nɛ nsɛ ibo Ɣaa anɔ ne.
Mikã mi matɔ̃ɖedze atsue si mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã ma, ala ma nto madzuɛ̃ mi fiɛ maatã Ɣaa mi ngbã iso akɔnta ne. Mitã sɔ maabara nnɛgbe ku isoɣɔ ne iiɖe ku ɔtu gɔ mba ɔrɔrã ala nnɛmɔ iibabuai mi.
Mila miɔkparama kayi i bo iti alasɔ boɣe sɔ bo situ ame ɔkpa fiɛ boto bobie sɔ boabara ira biara ku kuwarɛ
Nto lokarɛ lobɔrɛgu i mi kɔrɛ sɔ mikparama kayi teteree sɔ Ɣaa aatã loledza mi kɔrɛ iba mala.
Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtã isobuɛ, ngɔ lotara Bosate Yesu gɔ nɖe Masɛrɛkɔdze Siare ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame, iki i ɔ̃ ima kanya inyi nɛ nna katui ame,
si ɔsu ara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu ɔtã mi kere sɔ miawo ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔbara. Ɔki i Yesu Kristo iso ɔbara nnɛ loabo wũ anɔ i bo ndɛ̃. Ɔ̃ ɔkpɛ nɖe ile ita i kiniɔ ikpa daaro daaro. Si iba ngbɔ.
Manyii, loto mi i kukpa sɔ miɣara so si mikã atsue atoa sɔ ɔko gɔ lotsɛrɛ losese mi iikarã.
Nto lotã mi itsue sɔ maɔɖi bo ɔnyii Timoteo i iyo. Si ɔwula wũ kɔrɛ ɔba ne, iyɔ bo gu wũ loaba mi kɔrɛ.
Loya mi matɔ̃ɖedze gu mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu. Mma ɔɖuɖu lobɔrɛ Italia maba sɔ maya mi.
Ɣaa abualɛra si awegu mi ɔɖuɖu. Si iba ngbɔ.
James: Mme Yakobo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo ɔɖabo lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe nto lotã Ɣaa maturi ma lobiɛ makã kayiiso ɔɖuɖu. Loya mi ɔɖuɖu.
Manyii, si amɔrɛ̃ agbãagbã ɔtu mi ne, mina isoɣɔ gbaã.
Alasɔ miɣe sɔ si mala mi kafɔkaɖe manyɔ fiɛ miya ne, miaki i ne ame mire siɖu teteree.
Mitã mi iya teteree si ite i mi kurabarara ame sɔ miaɖe mma loyi i ira biara ame fiɛ kuira iisinya ma.
Si iwola ɔnya mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ne, ɔkarɛ Ɣaa gɔ loatã wũ, alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔɖi kayiri ɔtã mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ makarɛ wũ ara gɔ ɔ̃isɛ ɔnyɔ kama.
Ɣɛɛ si ɔto ɔkarɛ Ɣaa ira ne, iwararã kuiwɛ̃ si idaawe i ɔ̃ ame, ɔfɔ ɔɖe. Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔwararã Ɣaa ne, ɔse lɛ ɔpo gɔ nto ɔpɛ ɔfe ɔkpese.
Ngɔ adzuni nsɛ afiniki malamala, fiɛ ɔ̃iɣɛ teteree i ɔ̃ kurabarara ame si ɔdaanyɔ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃afɔ kuira ɔbɔrɛgu i Bosate kɔrɛ.
Ngɔ adzuni nsɛ afiniki malamala, fiɛ ɔ̃iɣɛ teteree i ɔ̃ kurabarara ame si ɔdaanyɔ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃afɔ kuira ɔbɔrɛgu i Bosate kɔrɛ.
Si Ɣaa ɔtara ɔnyii gɔ nɖe wɛrɛba iti kato ne, ɔna isoɣɔ.
Ngbɔ ame si Ɣaa ɔbɔ fɔɖedze gɔ nɖe ranase karɔ̃ ne, ɔna isoɣɔ. Alasɔ maranase ne, ɔse mase lɛ sikua aɣɔ̃la wa loakpa ayu.
Si kuɣɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ fiɛ kaɖe ɔɔbe ne, kusɛ kuɖe sikua siɣɔ, iyɔ aɣɔ̃la ɔɔkpa gɔ aisisɛ alɛ ɔnyɔ. Ngbɔ ame i ranase sɛ ɔtere ɔfe ɔkpese gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔkpi kere ɔ̃akpi ne.
Kusɛkusɛ kutã ngɔ nsɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ so ɔla i kalakanyɔ ame alasɔ si ɔki ne ame ɔbɔrɛ ne, Ɣaa aasu ngbã daaro kaɣɛkasɛ ga i Bosate ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã mma nsɛ maɖɔɛ wũ ɔtã wũ lɛ iɖeiso kuso.
Si kalakanyɔ gamɔ igbã ɔba ɔturi iso ne, ɔdaaɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ kabɔrɛ, alasɔ maibawo Ɣaa ɔla ɔnyɔ sɔ ɔbara ikpi fiɛ Ɣaa mɔmɔ ana iisɛ ɔla ɔturi ɔnyɔ sɔ ɔbara ikpi.
Ɣɛɛ ne, sosina ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ ɔturi ɔkã nsɛ akpadzɛ̃ wũ apia i kalakanyɔ ame.
Ara ɔkã ikpɛ̃ sɛ imɔ ikpese ikpi, fiɛ si ikpi ɔɔmɔ iro ne, isɛ ikpese kukpi.
Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, midaatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔsɔsɔla mi.
Ara sɛɛ gu karatã sɛɛ ga lokate ɔɖuɖu ne, Ɣaa kɔrɛ kabɔrɛ. Kabɔrɛ i ikpawaĩ ɔɖuɖu baradze gɔ nɖe Ɔse kɔrɛ. Ɔ̃isɛ ɔfiniki fiɛ idududu na i ɔ̃ ame.
Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ ame ɔtã bo ngbã iki i ɔnukuare itɔ̃me ame sɔ boana kasɛkɔ̃ ɖeakatɔ̃ i ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔɖuɖu ame.
Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, minyɔ sɔ mi ɔbiara aaɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔpɛ siwa i ara inɔ ame, ɣɛɛ miɖe mma nsɛ maɣara so i ikaɖe gu sikpã ina ame.
Alasɔ sikpã iisɛ sitã ɔturi ɔbara nnɛ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔbara.
Ne ɔso miɖi inyanyara gu ngbã nyanyarĩa igbã biara i mi ame. Mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã Ɣaa sɔ miawo ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ ɔpɛ i mi ame fiɛ iawo mi ngbã ɔtã ɔfɔ.
Mibara i Itɔ̃me Bielea iso. Midaaɖe mma nsɛ makã itɔ̃me atsue kere mila miɔsɔsɔla so.
Alasɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔnɔ itɔ̃me fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔbara i ne iso ne, ɔse lɛ ngɔ lonyɔ so katɔ̃ i aɣɔɣɔɛ ame kere.
Si ɔ̃afiniki ɔrui ne, ɔ̃ɔɣara kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ se.

Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔkarã inɔ i Ɣaa mmara mɛ loyi fiɛ misɛ mikurisi ɔturi ɔna isobuɛ, ɔbara i me iso ana fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔnɔ ala atsue kere ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔfere wũ kusɛkusɛ i ira biara nɛ ɔ̃abara ame. Ɔ̃ise lɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔnɔ itɔ̃me kere.
Si ɔrere to ɔbu sɔ ɔɖe Ɣaa fɔɖedze fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔpia ɔnyagɛmi i irɛkpo ne, ɔto ɔsɔsɔla so fiɛ ɔ̃ kasumu ana ɖe siefe.

Kasumu ga lokote fiɛ iɣɛrɛ na i kã iso i Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔse anɔ nɖe sɔ, boabuai makpise mabi, gu makpise mare i ma amɔrɛ̃ ame, ana ne, bobore so boɖi i ira biara nɛ loapukutura ɔturi i kayi gagbe iso kɔrɛ.
Wũ manyii, lɛ mma lofɔ Bosate Yesu Kristo gɔ nɖe ikpawaĩ Sate maɖe ne, midaanyɔ maturi i katɔ̃ i mi kurabarara ame.
Mitã bosu sɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔfu so ɔkati gɔ lofɔ kuɣa, ɔpia sikãrɛtɛa isukpɛ ɔba mi kasarɛkɔ̃, fiɛ ɔmama ana ɔfu so ɔkati kɛkɛa ɔba.
Si mitã ngɔ loledza so kukaakɔ kuwarɛ miɣere wũ sɔ, “Ba sɛ i iyara sɛɛ nɛgbe iso,” fiɛ miɣere wɛrɛba sɔ, “Ya i mmɔ, ɣee ba sɛ i wũ ngbatɔ̃ i karɔ̃ ngbe” ne,
ite sɔ mito mipia ikpaki i mi ndɛ̃, miɖaɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri gɔ loilɛ iso.
Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, mikã atsue si minɔ. Ɣaa ɔɖi kayi gagbe mawɛrɛba sɔ maaɖe mafɔɖedze siare gu mma ɔ̃asu sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ga ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã mma nsɛ maɖɔɛ wũ ɔtã.
Ɣɛɛ misɛ minyɔ mawɛrɛba pupurii! Iiɖe maranase maɖe nsɛ mabara mi kako, makpadzɛ̃ mi makɛlɛgu atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃?
Ma ame maɖe nsɛ maɣɛ anyakpi i iyere sɛɛ nɛ masu matã mi gɔ mikpese Kristo mare iso ne.
Si mibara i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ mmara iso pɛpɛɛpɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, iyɔ mibara nnɛ lokote. Nnɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ nɖe sɔ, “Ɖɔɛ fɔ ɔlaa lɛ kumɛgɔ ato aɖɔɛ so.”
Ɣɛɛ si mito mipia ikpaki i maturi ndɛ̃ i ma arapia kanya ne, mito mibara ikpi, fiɛ mmara ɔɔtã mi ipɔ sɔ mita miya me iso.
Ɔbiara gɔ lobara i mmara ɔɖuɖu iso fiɛ ɔta ɔya miwɛ̃ iso ne, ɔta ɔya i me ɔɖuɖu iso.
Alasɔ Ɣaa gɔ lotã mmara sɔ, “Daaɖe asɔrɔ̃” ne, ɔ̃ ame loɣɛ sɔ, “Daaɖoe ɔturi” ne. Ne ɔso si aiɖe asɔrɔ̃, ɣɛɛ aɖoe ɔturi ne, atu mmara.
Ne ɔso mitã sɔ mi akaɖe gu mi kurabarara si kute sɔ mmara mɛ loatã isɛguso miɖe i Ɣaa aasu ɔɣɛgu mi ala atɔ̃me.
Alasɔ ngɔ loisɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi nnya ne, atɔ̃me ɔɣɛwi ne, Ɣaa iibanyɔ wũ nnya ɔ̃ wũ. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa iibatã ngɔ nsɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi nnya ipɔ.
Wũ manyii, si ɔrere ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔba kafɔkaɖe, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ kurabarara iisɛ kute ne, mme kusia ɔba? Ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe aawo wũ ngbã ɔtã?
Mitã bosu sɔ ɔnyii ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɣee ɔrɔ̃go gɔ i arapia ɔɔkpi iso, ana ne, ɔna nnɛ ɔ̃aɖe.
Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Kɛlɛ i isobuɛ ame, ɔyu si ɔdaakpɛ̃-ɔ, ɖe ara si ami,” fiɛ ɔ̃itã wũ nnɛ lonya itã wũ ne, mme ibuai iɖe ɔtã wũ?
Ne ɔso si ɔrere ba kafɔkaɖe fiɛ kurabarara iibua iso ne, kafɔkaɖe kpia kere kaɖe wũ.
Ɣɛɛ ɔwɛ̃ aawo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ ba kafɔkaɖe fiɛ ɔmama ana ba kurabarara.” Mmuai mɛ loatã ngɔmɔ nɖe sɔ, “Te me fɔ kafɔkaɖe ga nna kurabarara sɛɛ si mme wũ lote-ɔ wũ kare iki i kurabarara sɛɛ ame.”
Afɔ aɖe sɔ Ɣaa ɔwɛ̃ saã pɛ mpia. Ibua ilɛ, gbaã iɖe ana! Ta siwarã lalaa ɔfɔ siɖe ngbɔ, fiɛ sisɛ siti sikpakpa ku ifɔ̃.
Itɔ aɖe! Ɔbie ato sɔ loɣere-ɔ sɔ kafɔkaɖe ga nna kurabarara sɛɛ na kusia?
Be ɔso i Ɣaa ɔnyɔ bo ɔwa Abraham sɔ ɔɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa? Ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔso. Alasɔ ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔbi Isak ɔkɛlɛgu sɔ ɔ̃asu wũ ɔfɛ̃ ara ɔtã Ɣaa.
Miinya ngbɔ? Ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe gu ɔ̃ kurabarara losɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ kurabarara lotã ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe ɔkote.
Ne ɔso nnɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ ɔba i ne ame sɔ, “Abraham ɔfɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe, ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔnyɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.” Ne ɔso i Ɣaa ɔkpere wũ sɔ ɔ̃ ɔlaa ɔɖe ne.
Miɔnya kiniɔ sɔ Ɣaa iisɛ ɔnya ɔturi kafɔkaɖe kere ɔnyɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ si ɔ̃ kurabarara iibua iso.

Ngbɔ ame ana i Ɣaa ɔnyɔ Rahab gɔ nɖe asɔrɔ̃ɖedze sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ iki i ɔ̃ kurabarara iso ne. Nnɛ i Rahab ɔbara nɖe sɔ, gɔ ɔfɔ Israel mabi ma loba maala karɔ̃ manyɔ ne, ɔbuai ma sɔ maki i ɔri mama matere.
Ne ɔso iɔte sekelee sɔ kumɛgɔ ame i ɔturi ɖe kpise si siwarã na i ɔ̃ ame ne, ngbɔ ame i kafɔkaɖe ɖe ira kpia si kurabarara iibua iso ne.
Wũ manyii, midaatã sɔ mi ndɛ̃ maturi gbodzoo akpesera so maratedze. Lɛ kumɛgɔ miɣe ne, bo maratedze atɔ̃me iɣɛgu to iawe ɔle iɖo marasuãdze ɔkpɛ.
Bo ɔɖuɖu sɛ boɣɛrɛ. Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere pia fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔɣɛrɛ i ɔ̃ ikaɖe ame ne, iyɔ ɔɖe ngɔ loyi fiɛ ɔ̃awo so iso ɔɖe pelepele.
Bosɛ bosu ɔwɛ̃ bopia i ipɔngɔ kanya botã ne ibara bo kuɖɔɛ. Ana ne, bosɛ bowo ipɔngɔ ɔfinikira isɛ ngbegɔ boɖɔɛ.
Minyɔ ndu iso iyebi ana, atoa sɔ imɔ pawũ fiɛ ɔwiri siare nsɛ ɔsɛgu ne ne, ibɔra kɛkɛĩ kere iɖe i iyebikãdze sɛ ɔsu ɔfinikira iyebi ɔkɛlɛgu ngbegɔ ɔto ɔbie sɔ iki.
Ngbɔ ame i ɔnyagɛmi se ne. Atoa sɔ ɔse kɛkɛĩ ne, ɔsɛ ɔɖe ndamu i ara siare iso.
Nyɔ kumɛgɔ i ipo ɔmɔ, ɣɛɛ katɔmɛrɛmɛrɛĩ kɛkɛĩ kere nsɛ katsuedza ne.
Ɔnyagɛmi se lɛ ɔtɔ. Kayi ga i ara lalaa ibara ɔyi i ɔnyagɛmi ɖe i bo siturina ame. Ɔsɛ ɔɣɛra kuturidziri ɔɖuɖu, ɔtsuedza ɔturi ngbã, fiɛ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ne, Ɔbosam itɔkpe nsɛ itsue i ɔ̃ ame.
Bosɛ bowo mabɔi lalaa gu kurodzai ɔɣedza, mabɔi ma nsɛ mabore i karɔ̃ gu ndu ame mabɔi ɔɖuɖu, fiɛ i ɔnukuare ame ne, ɔturi sɛ ɔɣedza mabɔi magbe ɔɖuɖu.
Ɣɛɛ ɔnyagɛmi ɖe ira nɛ i ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iiwo ɔbara sɔ ɔ̃akã wũ atsue. Ɔnyanyarĩ, ikpi ibara iisɛ iɖa wũ, fiɛ kabiɛtɛ ga nsɛ kaɖoe maturi ɔyi i ɔ̃ ame.
Bosɛ bosu wũ bole bo Ɔse Ɣaa fiɛ bosɛ bosu wũ bogbarĩ maturi mama ma i Ɣaa ɔbara i ɔ̃ kumiamia ame.
Kanya kawɛ̃ ga ame nto kale Ɣaa ame nto ka gbarĩ maturi ne. Wũ manyii iikote sɔ iase ngbɔ!
Ndu mɛ mba ɔmɛrɛ̃ gu mmɛ mba mma iibawo itubu iwɛ̃ ame ɔwe.
Wũ manyii, kubo aawo abɛrɛ ɔɣɔ̃ ɣee kaɣakpei ɔɣɔ̃ aboi? Ngbɔ ame i mma ndu gu ndu mmɛ mba ɔmɛrɛ̃ iibawo itubu iwɛ̃ ame ɔwe ne.
Ɔwɛ̃ pia i mi ndɛ̃ gɔ ɔɖe nɔgbadze gu ngɔ nsɛ ɔnɔ ara karɔ̃? Ngɔmɔ si ɔsu ngbã sɛɛ mɛ ɔsi i karɔ̃ ibɔso gu iwola ame ɔte.
Ɣɛɛ si mito mikpɛ̃ sirerɛ i mi situ ame, miba kaɖo fiɛ misɛ mibie mi ɔnɔwɛ̃ ɔkpɛ ne, midaabara ikpi i ɔnukuare iso miɖe ndamu i mi iwola iso.
Iwola nɛmɔ igbã ne, iiɖe kato ibɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ kayiiso ire nɛ loiɖe Siwarã Bielea ire fiɛ ibɔrɛ i Ɔbosam kɔrɛ iɖe.
Alasɔ ngbegɔ i kanɔbɛbɛ pia fiɛ maturi sɛ mabie ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ ɔkpɛ ne, iweweso gu ara nyanyarĩa igbã biara ana sɛ iwe i mmɔ.

Ɣɛɛ iwola nɛ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, iɖeakatɔ̃, ikpa, isɛ ibie isobuɛ, isɛ imɔɛ̃so ila, isɛ inɔgu maturi ara karɔ̃, iyi ku nnyainyɔ, ara sɛɛ sɛ abɔrɛ i ne ame, iisɛ ipia ikpaki i maturi ndɛ̃ fiɛ sila ana na i ne ame.
Mma nsɛ makpura fiɛ masɛ makpadzɛ̃ isobuɛ mabɔ sɛ mapɛ ɔraɖui gɔ abi nɖe sibɔlɔlɔ ara ibara.
Amami gu kalɔ ga mpia i mi ndɛ̃ ne, lɛ abɔrɛ? Mi sosina ara nyanyarĩa wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ mi ɔkã nsɛgu wã.

Mito mibie ara wa lonya mi, ɣɛɛ miito mina, ne ɔso misɛ miɖoe maturi. Misɛ mibɛbɛ anɔ sɔ miafɔ ara i ɔturi kɔrɛ, gɔ miina mifɔ ɔso ne, misɛ milɔ kalɔ mikpɛ̃gu so. Miisɛ mina nnɛ mito mibie, alasɔ miisɛ mikarɛ Ɣaa.
Fiɛ si mikarɛ Ɣaa ana ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔtã mi alasɔ miisɛ mikarɛ ala adzuni sɛɛ. Misɛ mikarɛ ara sɔ si miasu nwa miafɔ mibara ala mi kuɖɔɛ.
Mma nsɛ mafe Ɣaa kama miɖe! Miiɣe sɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖegu kayiiso kulaa ne, Ɣaa tsirise ɔɖe? Ne ɔso ɔbiara gɔ losu kayiiso ara ɔbara ɔ̃ ɔlaa ne, Ɣaa tsirise ɔɖe.
Mibu sɔ ɔtsɛrɛ kere matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ɣaa sɛ ɔkpɛ̃ sirerɛ teteree i ɔ̃ Siwarã dzɛ ɔsu ɔpia bo ame kanya.”
Ɣɛɛ ɔle gɔ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã kɔra ɔsi ɔɖo. Ne ɔso i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa iisɛ ɔtɔrãgu mma nsɛ makɔlɛ so kato, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔnyɔ mma lobɔ so karɔ̃ nnya.”
Ne ɔso mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã Ɣaa, mita miya Ɔbosam iso si ɔ̃are mi kama.
Mibore mibo Ɣaa si ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃abore ɔbo mi. Makpibaradze, mifore nrɔɔ̃! Mi ma nsɛ mifinikira adzuni malamala, mi sekelera mi situ.!
Minya ibo, mimararã so si mibiɛ kaku. Mitã mi sima si sikpese kaku, si isoɣɔ si ikpese ɔtu ibiɛra!
Mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã Bosate si ɔ̃akɔlɛ mi kato.

Manyii, midaakidza mi malaa malamala. Ngɔ loɣɛ ira nɛ loikote i ɔ̃ ɔnyii fɔɖedze iso, ɣee ɔɣɛgu ɔ̃ ɔnyii atɔ̃me ne, ɔɣɛ nnɛ loikote i mmara iso, fiɛ ɔɣɛgu mmara atɔ̃me. Fiɛ si mmara aɣɛgu atɔ̃me ne, iyɔ aito abara i mmara iso, ɣɛɛ ngɔ nto ɔɣɛgu mmara atɔ̃me aɖe.
Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔsi mmara gu atɔ̃meɣɛdze. Ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ loawo ɔturi ngbã ɔtã, fiɛ ɔ̃awo wũ ɔwɔra ana. Fɔ nɖe nna fiɛ ato aɣɛgu fɔ ɔlaa atɔ̃me?
Milo si minɔ, mi mma nsɛ miɣɛ sɔ, “Nɔme, ɣee kɔrãkaɖe loasɛ ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔgbe ɣee ngɔmɔ, boawe i mmɔ ikɔ iwɛ̃ boɖe kuɣa bona kusia.”
Ɣɛɛ nto loɣere mi sɔ miiɣe nnɛ loabɔrɛ mi iso ku kɔrãkaɖe. Ɔse kere mise lɛ kuɣɔ gɔ losakɛ kiniɔ ɣɛɛ ito ibara kere kuɔyu.
Nnɛ ikote sɔ miaɣɛ nɖe sɔ, “Si Bosate ɔtã bo ngbã fiɛ boikpi ne, boabara nnɛ gu nnɛ.”
Ɣɛɛ misɛ mikɔlɛ so kato, miɖe ndamu gɔ iilɛ.
Ne ɔso ngɔ loisɛ ɔbara isɛɛ nɛ ɔɣe sɔ ɔ̃abara ne, ikpi iɖe itã wũ.
Kiniɔ ne, mi mma nɖe maranase si mikã me atsue. Mibiɛ si miwana so ala ira boa nɛ loaba mi iso ɔso.
Mi karana ɔɔɣɛ fiɛ kukorokpɛbubui ana ɔɔɖe mi arapia.
Mi sikãrɛtɛa gu sifudza ɔɔpɛ matɔ fiɛ matɔ ma i sikã ɔpɛ ngbe to iaɖe aɖansiɛ i mi iso, ibɛbɛ mi lɛ ɔtɔ ku atɔ̃me iɣɛyi. Mito misa karana kanya mifu ku ayi tsɔra wagbe ame.
Mi marabaradze ma misɛ̃ sɔ miito mitã aso ne, minɔ ma kaku. Mma losa ɔraɖui kanya matã mi sitɔrɛ̃ ɔɔbo Bosate gɔ nɖe Kpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa i kutsue.
Miɖe ngbã i kayi gagbe ame, misu ara wa lofɔ kuɣa miminidza so ɔwi biara, miɖe ara mina iɖa mitã mi iɖoeyi.
Mma loiɣɛrɛ mi ne, miɔtã ma kukpi ipɔ, miɖoe ma ato sɔ maita maya mi iso.
Ne ɔso wũ manyii, miɣara so pɔkɔsɔɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ Bosate aaba. Minyɔ kpɛ̃dze! Si ɔto ɔnyɔ kamɔ ga ɔ̃apɛ ne, ɔsɛ ɔɣara so ɔtã Butu gu Sala makado sɔ mapɛ si kalɛ.
Ne ɔso mi wũ miɣara so ngbɔ si mina ɔtu alasɔ Bosate ɔbawi ɔɔro ɔɣo.
Midaanyagalagu so si Ɣaa iibaɣɛgu mi atɔ̃me. Atɔ̃meɣɛdze ɔɔro ɔba.
Wũ manyii, minyigi kanyamaɖidze ma loɖe ika i Bosate iyere ame. Misu ma ngbã lɛ ikparĩ awe i kumɛgɔ maɣara so i ma inyɛwe ame.

Bosɛ bonyɔ mma lona ɔtu i inyɛwe ame sɔ kusɛkusɛ sia ma iso. Minɔ kumɛgɔ i Hiob ɔna ɔtu i inyɛwe ame, fiɛ minɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔbara ɔtã wũ i kawirikɔ̃. Ɔturi ara sɛ aɖo Bosate kayiri, fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi nnya.
Inyaare ne wũ manyii, midaala miɔtarĩgu ara. Midaatarĩgu kato, ɣee karɔ̃, ɣee kuira mama, ɣɛɛ mitã mi aĩ si iɖe aĩ, si mi ooɣo si iɖe ooɣo, iyɔ Ɣaa sikpã iibaba mi iso.
Si mi ɔrere pia i imɔrɛ̃ ame ne, ɔkparama kayi, fiɛ si mi ɔrere to ɔna isoɣɔ ana ne, ɔka aka ɔle Ɣaa.
Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere to ɔnyɛ ne, ɔpia si makpere mafɔɖedze matɔ̃ɖedze si makparama kayi i ɔ̃ iti, masɔla wũ nnɔĩ i Bosate iyere ame.
Kayi ga makparama i kafɔkaɖe ame to kaasa ngɔ nto ɔnyɛ, Bosate ɔtara wũ ɔɣedza. Fiɛ si ɔbara ikpi ne, Ɣaa aasu ɔtsɛ wũ.
Ne ɔso mibusi mi akpi miɣere so si mikparama kayi i mi malaa ati si miana isosarɛ. Ɔle siare pia i ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa kayi ikparama ame.
Eliya ɔ̃ wũ ɔturi kere ɔɖe lɛ bo. Ɔkparama kayi teteree sɔ Ɣaa si ɔdaatã kado si ɔpɛ, fiɛ gbaã ne, akɔ atɛ awa akuɔ ne, kado iifere i karɔ̃.
Kama ne, ɔkparama kayi fiɛ kado ka ɔpɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ iso ɔraɖui ɔlɛ.
Wũ manyii, si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ɔyu ɔri, ɔre ɔnukuare kama fiɛ mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔkpesera wũ ɔbɔ ne,
minyigi sɔ ɔbiara gɔ lofinikira kpibaradze ɔbɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, ɔto ɔ̃atã kpibaradze gɔmɔ ɔna ngbã gu akpi gbodzoo ana kasukatsɛ.
I Peter: Mme Petro gɔ nɖe Yesu Kristo katɔ̃mesɛdze lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe nto lotã mma i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔtã so fiɛ masasame mapia lɛ mafɔ i Ponto gu Galatia gu Kapadokia gu Asia gu Bitinia nrɔ̃ iso.
Bo Ɔse Ɣaa mɔmɔ loɖi mi i ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ kanya fiɛ ɔtã sɔ ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔbara mi sekelee itã atsue ikã Yesu Kristo itɔ̃me. Ɔ̃ ima ana ɔsekelera mi.
Bosate si ɔbualɛ mi si ɔtã mi isobuɛ si isi ibua.
Mitã bopɛ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo Ɔse siba! Ɔnyɔ bo nnya gbaã gɔ ɔtã bo ngbã ɣɛtɛ iki i Yesu Kristo ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ame. Nnɛgbe ɔtã bo ɔriinyɔ nɛ mba ngbã.
Ne ɔso bo anɔ sia i ara wa i Ɣaa ɔledza ɔsɛ ɔtã ɔ̃ maturi iso. Ɔledza wã ɔsɛ i kato ngbegɔ aibaburi, ɣee anina, ɣee akpi anɔmi.
Mi ma lofɔ miɖe fiɛ Ɣaa ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔle ɔledza mi ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã mi ngbã ɣɛtɛ ku ɔwi tsɔra ame ɔkpɛ nɖe ara wa ɔledza ɔsɛ ngbe.
So si siɣɔ mi i nnɛgbe iti atoa sɔ mito miki i inyɛwe gu kalakanyɔ agbãagbã ame i ɔwi kurukutua gɔgbe ame.

Ara wagbe to aaba mi iso si ite sɔ kafɔkaɖe bielea miba. Sikãrɛtɛa dzɛ nsɛ sinina kɔra ne, masɛ mafore sɛ̃ i ɔtɔ ame, ne ɔso mi kafɔkaɖe ga lofɔ kuɣa kaɖo sikãrɛtɛa ana ne, inya sɔ maakere kã manyɔ sɔ kaaya. Si kaya ne, mito miafɔ ile, ikpawaĩ gu kuwarɛ ku iyi nɛ i Bosate Yesu Kristo aaba.
Atoa sɔ miinya wũ ne, mito miɖɔɛ wũ, mifɔ wũ miɖe atoa sɔ miito minya wũ kiniɔ ana. Ne ɔso miba isoɣɔ nɛ nna katui.
Mi kafɔkaɖe ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔɔtã mi ngbã daaro daaro.
Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ma lopɛ bo iɖi nnyainyɔ nɛgbe imomo ɔnyɔnyɔ ara wagbe ame totoroo, fiɛ maɣɛ ara masɛ i karatã ga i Ɣaa aasu ɔtã mi ngbe iso.
Maki i ɔri igbã biara iso sɔ si matsue ɔwi gɔ iso gu kumɛgɔ i ara wagbe aaba. Ɔwi gɔgbe ame i Kristo Siwarã ɔki i ma iso sitã maɣɛ ara masɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo aawe inyɛ fiɛ ne kama, ɔ̃ana ikpawaĩ siare.

Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔte kanyamaɖidze mamɔ sɔ iiɖe ma mɔmɔ karabara mato mabara ne, mi mato mabara matã. Maɖe ika i ara wa i Itɔ̃me Bielea maɣɛdze to maɣere mi kiniɔ iki i Siwarã Bielea dzɛ i Ɣaa ɔsese ɔbɔrɛgu i kato ɔle iso. Ikpɛ̃ ta Ɣaa makpabo ɔkã sɔ maatsue ira i ara wagbe iso.
Ne ɔso miledza so mitã karabara. Midzuɛ̃ so si misu mi ɔriinyɔ ɔɖuɖu misia i kusɛkusɛ gɔ i Ɣaa aatã mi ku ɔwi gɔ i Yesu Kristo aaledza iba iso.
Lɛ mabi ma nsɛ makã Ɣaa atsue ne, minyua ara wa lola ɔɔkpɛ̃ mi ɔkã ku ɔwi gɔ miiɖe mafɔɖedze ɔbara.
Ɣɛɛ ne, mise sekelee i mi kurabarara ɔɖuɖu ame lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa gɔ lokpere mi se sekelee.
I Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɣere ɔ̃ maturi sɔ, “Mise sekelee alasɔ lose sekelee.”
Misɛ mikpere Ɣaa gɔ loisɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi i katɔ̃ i atɔ̃me iɣɛ ame sɔ, “Bo Ɔse” si mito mikparama kayi. Ne ɔso misu mi ngbã ayi tsɔra i kayiiso ngbe mipia Ɣaa kuwarɛ.
Miɣe sɔ iiɖe sikãfudza, ɣee sikãrɛtɛa dzɛ nsɛ sinina siɖe i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã mi iti kuso fiɛ ɔɖi mi ɔbɔrɛgu i ngbã mɛ i mi mawa ɔsɛ fiɛ mina kusia kukuwɛ̃ ame.
Ɣɛɛ Kristo ima nɛ lofɔ kuɣa iɖe. Ɔ̃ nse lɛ sɛrɛrerɔ̃ ibi nɛ lokote fiɛ ina iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ ana ne.
Ɣaa ɔɔsia Kristo ikparĩ ɔsɛ fiɛ ɔbara kayiiso, ɣɛɛ ɔɖi wũ ɔte ku ayi tsɔra wagbe ame i mi iti.
Iki i Kristo iso ne, miɔfɔ Ɣaa miɖe. Ɔ̃ lotara Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame fiɛ ɔtã wũ kuwarɛ kasɛkɔ̃. Ne ɔso mi kafɔkaɖe gu anɔ ka asia i Ɣaa iso.
Kiniɔ gɔ miɔkã ɔnukuare atsue fiɛ miɔki i ɔ̃ ame misekelera so mito miɖɔɛ mi mafɔɖedze laa ne, miɖɔɛ mi manyii ta situ ame.
Alasɔ iki i Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ mba ngbã fiɛ ina katui ame ne, Ɣaa gɔ nɖe ɣese gɔ loisɛ ɔkpi ɔɔledza mi iɣe.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Maturi ɔɖuɖu se lɛ sikua
fiɛ ma kuwarɛ ɔɖuɖu se lɛ aɣɔ̃la.
Sikua sɛ siɣɔ, fiɛ aɣɔ̃la ana sɛ akpa.
Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me pia ɔwi biara.”
Itɔ̃me nɛgbe nɖe Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ mapɛ imomo maɣere mi ne.
Ne ɔso minyua ikpi igbã biara ɔbara. Mila gu adzuni nyanyarĩa ite maturi, sirerɛ ikpɛ̃ gu sitia si sidaawe i mi ndɛ̃.
Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ mailupu kuira si ikpɛ̃ mi ɔkã teteree lɛ kumɛgɔ i inyɛdu sɛ ikpɛ̃ mabi ɣɛtɛ ɔkã si miamɔ i mi iɖi ame.
Alasɔ mi mɔmɔ ɔɔti Bosate kayiribielea minyɔ sɔ ilɛ.
Ne ɔso mibore mibo Bosate gɔ nɖe ita nɛ mba ngbã fiɛ iire kuira i mayotsuedze anɔ, ɣɛɛ ne i Ɣaa ɔɖi, fiɛ ɔ̃ katɔ̃ ne, ne lofɔ kuɣa iɖo.
Misu so mitã lɛ ata wa mba ngbã si Ɣaa si ɔsu mi ɔtsue Siwarã ame isɔrɛyo nɛ ame miaɖe masɔrɛdze ma nse sekelee. Misu siwarã ame ara wa lokote misɔrɛ Ɣaa iki i Yesu Kristo iso.
Alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Loɖi ita nɛ mba kuɣa,
fiɛ losu ne lobara Sion ɔyokã ame ita.
Ɔbiara gɔ loafɔ wũ ɔɖe ne,
kunuarɛ iibakpɛ̃ wũ kunya.”
Ita nɛgbe ɔfɔ kuɣa gbaã i mi ma lofɔ miɖe kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ mma loifɔ maɖe ne, matsue sɔ,
“Ita nɛ i mayotsuedze ɔsɛ̃ ne,
ne loba iakpese ita nyaa iɖo pelepele ne.”
Ɔko Sekelea kakɔi kawɛ̃ ana ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Ita nɛgbe loatã maturi ɔtura,
fiɛ iatã marɔ̃.”
Mato maatura alasɔ maifɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me maɖe, fiɛ ngbɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i ma iso ne.

Ɣɛɛ mi ne, maturi ma i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔsɛ miɖe, masɔrɛdze ma nsɛ male Igara, kaɖe ga nse sekelee, Ɣaa mɔmɔ maturi ma ɔɖi ɔsɛ sɔ maapɛ ɔ̃ awawãra imomo miɖe. Mma i Ɣaa ɔkpere ɔbɔrɛgu i idududu ame ɔbɔ ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ siare ame.
Ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, miiɖe Ɣaa maturi, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ɔ̃ maturi ka miɖe. Ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, Ɣaa iinyɔ mi nnya, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔnyɔ mi nnya.
Manyii ɖɔɛse, lɛ mma nɖe mafɔ gu marisɛdze i kayi gagbe ame ne, nto loka mi sɔ midaabara i sosina ara lalaa wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ mi ɔkã fiɛ ata aɣɛ i mi ɔkala iso.
Mi nsɛgbai i mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃ si mise sekelee sɔ atoa sɔ masɛ maɣɛ sɔ mito mibara ara lalaa ne, maanya mi ara sɛɛ wa mito mibara sɔ maasu ile matã Ɣaa ku ɔ̃ iyi nɛ ɔ̃aledza iba iso.
Bosate gɔ boto bosɔrɛ ɔso ne, mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã mma ɔɖuɖu nto maɖe mi iso gu Roma Igarakpakpa ana.
Mibɔ so karɔ̃ ana mitã makpakpa ma i Igarakpakpa sɛ ɔpia sɔ makpadzɛ̃ ara lalaa mabaradze kutsue si male mma nto mabara ara sɛɛ.
Alasɔ Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ nɖe sɔ miabara isɛɛ sɔ mma loikpa anɔ sidzimi aate. Iyɔ maibaɣɛ inyakpi kuiwɛ̃ i mi iso.
Misɛ ngbã lɛ mma nsigu so, ɣɛɛ midaasu mi isɛguso mibara ara lalaa. Misɛ lɛ mma nɖe Ɣaa masande.
Miwarɛ maturi ɔɖuɖu si miɖɔɛ mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu. Minigã Ɣaa, si miwarɛ Igarakpakpa ana.
Mi ma nɖe maɖabo ne, mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã mi makɔse si miwarɛ ma. Iiɖe makɔse ma nsɛ maɖɔɛ mi fiɛ masɛ manyɔ mi nnya kere, ɣɛɛ ta mma nɖe matilese ana.
Si ɔturi to ɔwe inyɛ nɛ loikote alasɔ ɔto ɔbara Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã wũ kusɛkusɛ.
Si mibara ara lalaa fiɛ mina ɔtu miya mapɛ mi ne, mme ile mpia i ne ame? Ɣɛɛ si mina ɔtu miwe inyɛ i isɛɛ ibara ame ne, Ɣaa aanagu mi isoɣɔ.
Nnɛgbe ɔso i Ɣaa ɔkpere mi ɔbɔ ne, alasɔ Kristo ɔ̃ wũ ɔwe inyɛ i mi iti ɔnyua ikparĩ ɔsɛ sɔ miasiai ɔ̃ ngbama.
“Ɔ̃ibara ikpi kuiwɛ̃,
fiɛ ɔ̃ila sila ɔnya ana.”
Gɔ matia wũ ne, ɔ̃itia ɔti kuso, mma lote wũ ɔɣiã ne, ɔ̃igbarĩ ma, ɣɛɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔtu ɔsia i Ɣaa iso, ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri iso.
Kristo mɔmɔ lofɔ bo akpi ɔsore ku ɔwi gɔ mapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso. Ɔbara nnɛgbe sɔ si boabɔrɛ i ikpi nrɔɔ̃ ame, ɣɛɛ boasɛ ngbã botã isɛɛ ibara, fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ aɣɛi wa ɔfɔ ame ne, miɔna isosarɛ.
Ɔwiɔ ne, mise lɛ masɛrɛrerɔ̃ ma loyu ɔri, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔkpesera mi ɔbɔ Masɛrɛkɔdze gu ngɔ nto ɔdzuɛ̃ mi kɔrɛ.
Mi marãyiridze mi wũ ne, mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã mi marã sɔ si ma ɔrere iiɖe fɔɖedze ne, mi nsɛgbai aatã sɔ maafiniki bidɛ miiwa kanya miɣɛ kuira.
Alasɔ mato maanya mi karɔ̃ ibɔso gu mi ngbã sekelea.
Iiɖe mi siwɛrɛ̃ ibara gu sikãrɛtɛa ara ipia gu arapia wa lofɔ kuɣa ipia loaɖi mi kulɛ ite.
Ɣɛɛ ne, mi kulɛ si kute so i mi kame ame, ɔtu ɣɔa gu karɔ̃ ibɔso nɛ nɖe kulɛ gɔ loisɛ kuro fiɛ kufɔ kuɣa ta Ɣaa anɔ ana.
Marɔ̃go sekelea ma losu ma situ masia i Ɣaa iso ku koko ɔwi ne, ngbɔ makɛrɛ so iki i karɔ̃ ibɔ so itã ma marã ame ne.
Ngbɔ i Sara ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ ɔtã Abraham fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔkpere wũ sɔ, “Wũ iyo Ɔse.” Sara mabi birɔ̃gomi ka miɖe mi wũ si mibara ara sɛɛ fiɛ kuira iisɛ ipia mi ifɔ̃.
Mi marɔ̃goyiridze ana ne, mitsue sɔ mi mare na ɔle makategu mi. Misɛgu ma i kuwarɛ ame alasɔ mi gu ma i Ɣaa aatã ngbã karatã. Si mibara ngbɔ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃akã mi atsue si mikparama kayi.
Kawirikɔ̃ ne, mitã mi ɔɖuɖu adzuni si aɖe awɛ̃, mi manyii ara si aɖo mi kayiri, miɖɔɛ so lɛ manyiibi awe, mibara kayiribielea mitã so si mibɔ so karɔ̃.
Midaabara ikpi miti kuso, si magbarĩ mi ana ne, midaagbarĩ miti kuso, ɣɛɛ i wã kanya ne, mitã kusɛkusɛ ala gɔ Ɣaa ɔkpere mi ne, kusɛkusɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã mi.
Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Ɔbiara gɔ nto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃anya ngbã ɔmɛrɛ̃
fiɛ ɔto ɔbie sɔ so si siɣɔ wũ ne,
ɔnyua maturi ara lalaa iɣɛ
si ɔnyua mila ana.
Ɔnyua ikpi ɔbara si ɔbara isɛɛ.
Ɔbie isobuɛ ku ɔ̃ ɔtu ɔɖuɖu.
Alasɔ Ɣaa anɔ sia i maturi ma nsɛ mabara
sibɔlɔlɔ ara iso,
fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔkã ma atsue si makparama kayi.
Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa sɛ ɔkarã makpibaradze anɔ.”
Nna loabara mi ira boa si anɔ ɔrɛtɛ mi i isɛɛ ibara iso?
Ɣɛɛ si miwe inyɛ ala isɛɛ ibara ɔso ne, mitã so si siɣɔ mi. Midaanigã kuwɛ̃, fiɛ midaamararã so ana.
Ɣɛɛ i nnɛgbe kanya ne, misu kuwarɛ ɔɖuɖu mitã Kristo lɛ Bosate i mi situ ame. Miledza so ɔwi biara sɔ miawo ɔbiara gɔ loakarɛ mi itɔ̃me irere i ɔriinyɔ nɛ miba iso mmuai ɔtã.
Ɣɛɛ mibara ne ku karɔ̃ ibɔso gu kuwarɛ. Mitã sɔ mi kaɣere ame aakpa sɔ mma nto matia mi sɔ misiai Kristo ne, kunuarɛ aakpɛ̃ ma i anyakpi wa mato maɣɛ iso.
Alasɔ ilɛ sɔ aawe inyɛ i isɛɛ ibara ame si ngbɔ nɖe Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ iɖo sɔ aawe inyɛ lɛ kpibaradze.

Alasɔ Kristo ɔkpi i makpibaradze iti ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã i ɔwi ɔɖuɖu kanya. Atoa sɔ ɔɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa ne, ɔkpi i makpibaradze iti sɔ iaki i ne iso ne, ɔ̃awo bo ɔkɔ ɔbɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ. Maɖoe wũ i siturina ame, ɣɛɛ iki i Ɣaa Siwarã ame ne, ɔta ɔpia ngbã.
I Siwarã ame ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere siwarã dzɛ mapia iyo i ikpibiɔ ame Ɣaa itɔ̃me.
Ma nɖe mma loikã Ɣaa kuka atsue ku ɔwi gɔ i Noa to ɔwe aɖaka ne. Ɣaa ɔna ɔtu ɔtã ma. Maturi irɛ̃saã pɛ ma nɖe ma farafana lona iɖi i ndu mɛ loyi minina kayi mmɔ ame.

Ndu mɛgbe se lɛ Ɣaa itupie nɛ loɔfɔ mi ipia i ngbã ame kiniɔ. Iiɖe ndu mɛ loafore anyini iɖi maturi iso miɖe, ɣɛɛ iɖe ndamu ikã itã Ɣaa i kaɣere ga lokpa ame. Ɣaa itupie lofɔ mi itã ngbã iki i Yesu Kristo ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ame iso.
Kristo ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i Ɣaa kuɖearɔ̃ iso i kato, fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe Ɣaa makpabo, mma nto maɖe iso gu sile dzɛ mpia i kato ɔɖuɖu iso.
Ne ɔso gɔ Kristo ɔwe inyɛ lɛ ɔturi awe ɔso ne, miledza mi adzuni ame misɛ lɛ ɔ̃, alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔwe inyɛ lɛ ɔturi iisisɛ ɔbara ikpi.
Ne ɔso ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ ne, misɛ ngbã i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ kanya ne iiɖe ɔturi ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ wũ ɔkã kanya.
Miɔnina ɔwi gbodzoo ku ɔwi gɔ lofe mibara ara wa i maɣɔsɔrɛdze sɛ maɖɔɛ ibara. Wã awɛ̃ nɖe kulaa nyanyarĩa iɖe, ɔrakolo, itarɛ̃, ɔɖegbodzo, ɔnɔle, gu ira lalaa biara lɛ aɣɔ isɔrɛ.
Gɔ miisisɛ misiai ma i ara lalaa kaɖukaɖu wamɔ ibara ame ne, isɛ ibara ma ɣii ne ɔso masɛ matia mi ne.
Ɣɛɛ mato maaɖi so kanya i Ɣaa gɔ loɔledza so ɔtã atɔ̃me iɣɛgu maturi nyɔa gu makpise katɔ̃.
Nnɛgbe ɔso i Kristo ɔɣere makpise ana Itɔ̃me Bielea sɔ atoa sɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me i maturi kasɛ lɛ ɔturi biara ne, i siwarã kasɛ ne, maasɛ ngbã lɛ Ɣaa awe.
Ara ɔɖuɖu kawirikɔ̃ ɔɔro ɔɣo, ne ɔso minyɔ so si mimɔɛ̃ so mila kukaakɔ sɔ miawo kayi ɔkparama.
Ɣɛɛ nnɛ lonya iɖo i wã ɔɖuɖu ame nɖe sɔ miaɖɔɛ so kukaakɔ alasɔ kuɖɔɛ sɛ kusu akpi gbodzoo wa i ɔturi ɔbara kutsɛ.
Si mi malaa ɔbo mi lɛ mafɔ ne, mifɔ ma, ɣɛɛ midaaɣɛ kusakuso.
Mi ndɛ̃ ɔbiara ɔfɔ karatã ɔbɔrɛgu i Ɣaa kɔrɛ, ne ɔso lɛ maturi sɛɛ ma nto manyɔ Ɣaa karatã agbãagbã iso matã wũ ne, mibara karatã gagbe karabara kukaakɔ sɔ kaaɖe kusia katã mi ɔɖuɖu.

Si mi ɔrere to ɔɣɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me ne, ɔɣɛ ne lɛ ngɔ i Ɣaa ɔpia silɔ i kanya sɔ ɔɣere maturi. Ngɔ nto ɔbuai maturi si ɔbuai ma ku ɔle ɔɖuɖu gɔ i Ɣaa ɔtã wũ sɔ i ara ɔɖuɖu ame ne, maale Ɣaa iki i Yesu Kristo iso. Ɔ̃ ɔkpɛ nɖe kuwarɛ gu ɔle ɔwi daaro. Si iba ngbɔ.
Manyii ɖɔɛse, idaabara mi ɣii i inyɛwe siare nɛ ame mito miki lɛ ira nɛ loiba inya iɖe nto iba mi iso.
Ɣɛɛ i ne kanya ne, mina isoɣɔ sɔ mito miwe inyɛ lɛ Kristo awe sɔ ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃aledza iba i ɔ̃ ɔle ame ne, so aaɣɔ mi kukaakɔ.
Si mato matia mi sɔ miɖe Kristo masiaidze ne, mina isoɣɔ alasɔ ikpawaĩ Siwarã dzɛ nɖe Ɣaa Siwarã sia mi iso.
Ɣɛɛ mi ndɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaawe inyɛ lɛ turiɖoese, ɣee yukukpe, ɣee ɔturi lalaa, ɣee ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ maturi iso ara awe.
Ɣɛɛ si mito miwe inyɛ alasɔ miɖe Kristo mare ne, kunuarɛ si kudaakpɛ̃ mi, ɣɛɛ mipɛ Ɣaa siba sɔ Kristo iyere sia mi iso.
Ɣaa atɔ̃me iɣɛyi ɔɔɣo, fiɛ Ɔ̃ maturi iso iasɛ karɔ̃. Fiɛ si isɛ karɔ̃ i bo iso ne, nda iawirigu mma loifɔ Ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea maɖe?
Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ,
“Si iba ɔle fiɛ Ɣaa aafɔ maturi bɔlɔlɔa ne,
nda iase mma loiɣe Ɣaa gu makpibaradze?”
Ne ɔso mma nto mawe inyɛ i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ kanya si makɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ mabara isɛɛ. Masu so mapia i ma baradze nrɔɔ̃ ame alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri iso.
Mme lɛ mafɔɖedze tɔ̃ɖedze gɔ lonya Kristo inyɛwe ku anɔ, fiɛ loto loana kaɖekɔ̃ i ikpawaĩ nɛ loaba ame ne, loto matɔ̃ɖedze ma mpia i mi ndɛ̃ i kukpa.

Mimɔɛ̃ Ɣaa maturi ma ɔsu ɔpia mi i nrɔɔ̃ ame mila ku mi situ lɛ kumɛgɔ i masɛrɛkɔdze sɛ ɔnyɔ masɛrɛ iso. Ngbɔ i Ɣaa to ɔbie ne iiɖe ku ɔɣiɛ. Midaabara mi karabara ala sosina ame kuso gɔ miafɔ kere ɔso, ɣɛɛ kuɖɔɛ gɔ miba mitã karabara ɔso.
Midaaɖe sigara i Ɣaa maturi ma mpia i mi kayirinɔ iso, ɣɛɛ miɖe ikparĩ sɛɛ mitã ma.
Iyɔ ɔwi gɔ i Masɛrɛkɔdzekpakpa aaba ne, mito miafɔ sigaraikoto nɛ loafiɛ ɔwi biara.
Mi makoso ana ne, mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã makpakpa. Mi ɔɖuɖu si misu karɔ̃ ibɔso mipia lɛ arapia si mibuai so ala maɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ,
“Ɣaa sɛ ɔkarã mma lokɔlɛ so kato anɔ,
ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔnyɔ mma lobɔ so karɔ̃ nnya.”
Ne ɔso misu so mipia i Ɣaa kɔrɔ̃ teterea kayirinɔ i karɔ̃ ibɔso ame si ɔ̃akɔlɛ mi kato i ɔ̃ ɔwi sɛɛ iso.
Misu mi ara wa ɔɖuɖu nto aɖaa mi mipia wũ i nrɔɔ̃ ame alasɔ ɔ̃ anɔ sia i mi iso ɔwi biara.
Midzuɛ̃ so si minyɔ waĩ! Alasɔ mi tsirise Ɔbosam pia ɔki lɛ dzata ɔfafã ɔbie ngɔ ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ ɔwe.
Miya teteree i mi kafɔkaɖe ame si misɛ̃ wũ alasɔ miɣe sɔ mi malaa fɔɖedze i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu to mawe inyɛ ngbɔ.
Ɣɛɛ si miwe inyɛ ɔwi kɛkɛĩ kere ne, Ɣaa gɔ nɖe nnyainyɔ Ɔse gɔ lokpere mi sɔ mi gu Kristo aana kaɖekɔ̃ i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ nɛ nna katui ame si ɔbara mi sekelee, ɔtã miya teteree, ɔtã mi ɔle, mire siɖu.
Ɔ̃ ɔkpɛ nɖe ɔle gɔ loibaro ɔnya. Si iba ngbɔ.
Silvano gɔ losɛ lowarɛ lɛ fɔɖedze gɔ nɣɛ teteree lobuai me lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe. Lobie sɔ lopia mi ɔle iki i nnɛ lonya ku wũ anɔ sɔ Ɣaa abualɛra bielea aɖe ngbe, ne ɔso miya i wã ame teteree.
Mi manyii fɔɖedze ikuri nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɖi i Babilonia karɔ̃ iso gu wũ ɔbi Marko sɔ maya mi o-o.
Miya so ku mafɔɖedze ikuri ame kuɖɔɛ.
Isobuɛ si iwegu mi ma ɔɖuɖu nɖe Kristo mare.
II Peter: Mme Simon Petro gɔ nɖe Yesu Kristo ɔɖabo gu katɔ̃mesɛdze lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe nto lotã mma ɔɖuɖu iki i Ɣaa gu bo Ɖidze Yesu Kristo sibɔlɔlɔ ame ne, maba kafɔkaɖe ga lofɔ kuɣa lɛ bo kare.
Ɣaa si ɔtã sɔ mi abualɛra gu mi isobuɛ si isi ibua gɔ mito mitsue wũ gu Yesu gɔ nɖe Bosate.

Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔle ame ɔsu ara wa ɔɖuɖu lonya bo i ngbã mɛgbe ame ɔtã bo sɔ boasɛ ngbã mɛ lokote lɛ mafɔɖedze. Ɔbara ngbɔ alasɔ boɣe ɔ̃ gɔ lokpere bo sɔ boba boana kaɖekɔ̃ i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ gu ɔ̃ isɛɛ ibara ame.
Fiɛ iki i ara wagbe iso ne, ɔtã bo karatã ga ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ fiɛ kafɔ kuɣa sɔ boaki i kã iso ne, boana ɔ̃ kumiamia boabɔrɛ i ara nyanyarĩa wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ kayiiso maturi ɔkã fiɛ iawɔra ma ame.
Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, mipia kubɛ sɔ miasu isɛɛ ibara mibua i mi kafɔkaɖe iso, misu inɔgba mibua i mi isɛɛ ibara iso.
Si misu iɖesoiso mibua i mi inɔgba iso, misu kanɔnyi mibua i iɖesoiso iso, si misu Ɣaa kunigã mibua i kanɔnyi iso.
Misu mafɔɖedze kuɖɔɛ mibua i Ɣaa kunigã iso si ka misu kuɖɔɛ mibua i mi mafɔɖedze kuɖɔɛ iso.
Alasɔ si miba ara wagbe fiɛ asi gbodzoo i mi ame ne, iatã sɔ mi kurabarara ame aakpa, mito miaɣe misia i Bosate Yesu Kristo itsue ame.
Mma nna ara wagbe ne, maisɛ manya dzoroo, fiɛ maɔɣara kɔra sɔ Ɣaa ɔɔfore ma akpi wa mabara mafegu ɔɖi ma iso.
Ne ɔso manyii, mipia kubɛ teteree iɖo ɔwiɔ misu misia mi ikpere nɛ i Ɣaa ɔkpere mi ita. Alasɔ si mibara ngbɔ ne, miibakpese kama minya i kafɔkaɖe ame minya.
Si mibara ngbɔ ne, mito miana ɔri mibo i Bosate gu Ɖidze Yesu Kristo sigarakaɖekɔ̃ dzɛ nna katui ame.
Atoa sɔ ka miɣe ara wagbe koko fiɛ miɔre siɖu i mi kafɔkaɖe ga mifɔ ame ana ne, ikote sɔ loanyigira mi ɔwi biara.
Lonyɔ sɔ ikote sɔ loala loɔnyigira mi ara wagbe ayi kumɛgɔ losi ngbã.
Loɣe sɔ iisibadzoro fiɛ loaɖi sosina dzɛ nsɛ sikpi ngbe losɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bosate Yesu Kristo ɔɣere me ɔɖi.
Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ loto lobie sɔ loanyɔ sɔ i wũ kukpi kama ne, miala miɔnyigi ara wagbe ɔwi biara.
Itɔ̃me nɛ boɣere mi i Bosate Yesu Kristo iledza iba ku ɔle iso ne, iiɖe inatika nɛ i ɔturi ɔɖe i inɔgba ame iɖe boɖi ne bobɔrɛgu. Bo mɔmɔ lonya ɔ̃ kuwarɛ gu ɔ̃ ɔle ku anɔ fiɛ boɣere mi.
Bopia i mmɔ ku iyi nɛmɔ fiɛ Bo Ɔse Ɣaa ɔsu kuwarɛ gu ifiɛ ɔtã wũ. Silɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Ɔlesate kɔrɛ sitã wũ sɔ, “Wũ Ɔbi ɖɔɛse i ngbe ne, ɔ̃ ara ɔbo me anɔ.”
Bo mɔmɔ lonɔ silɔ dzɛgbe ɔbɔrɛ i kato ku ɔwi gɔ bopia i Yesu kɔrɛ i kube sekelea iso.
Nnɛgbe ɔso bofɔ kanyamaɖidze kaɣɛkasɛ boɖe teteree ne. Mipia kubɛ si mimɔɛ̃ kaɣɛkasɛ gamɔ mila lɛ ɔkaniɛ gɔ nto ɔfiɛ i idududu ame gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔɖesɛrã aaɣo fiɛ ɔɖesɛrã iwãmi aafiɛ i mi situ ame.
Ira nɛ lonya iɖo fiɛ ikote sɔ miatsue nɖe sɔ, kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔta i ɔ̃ ɔle iso ɔɖi kaɣɛkasɛ ga matsɛrɛ masɛ karɔ̃.
Alasɔ kuwɛ̃ iiɣɛ Ɣaa kaɣɛkasɛ i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔle ame ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me ɔsɛ ɔnya, ɣɛɛ Siwarã Bielea lotã maturi ɔle fiɛ maɣɛ nnɛ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ masɛ.

Lɛ kumɛgɔ i mila kanyamaɖidze ɔwe ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, ngbɔ ame i mila maratedze ana to maabɔrɛ i mi ndɛ̃ ne. Mato maabɔ mila ara ite wa loawɔra maturi, masɛ̃ ta Bosate gɔ loɖi ma gɔ iaki i ne iso ne, maawɔra so mala.
Maturi gbodzoo to maasiai ma ara nyanyarĩa ibara itã sɔ ne ɔso ne, maturi aaɣɛ anyakpi i Kristo kafɔkaɖe iso.
Gɔ maɖe mma nsɛ makɛkɛ anɔ ɔso ne, mato maasu mila atɔ̃me mana kusia i mi iso. Ɣaa ɔɔtã ma ipɔ ɔsɛ koko, fiɛ ɔ̃ɔledza so ɔtã ma iwɔra.
Ɣaa iinyɔ ɔ̃ makpabo ma lobara ikpi nnya, ɣɛɛ ɔnyi ma ɔfuĩdza ɔpia i itɔkpe nɛ loisɛ inyi ame, i iwo gudua ame ɔsɛ ɔtã iyi nɛ ɔ̃aɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me.
Ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa iinyɔ mma losɛ ngbã ku Noa ɔwi fiɛ maisɛ manigã wũ nnya ne. Ɔtã ndu ɔyi miwɔra ma. Noa gɔ lopɛ sibɔlɔlɔ imomo gu maturi ikɔdzɛ mama pɛ lona iɖi.
Fiɛ Sodom gu Gomora simagɛ̃ ana ne, Ɣaa ɔtã ma ipɔ gɔ ɔwɔra ma ku ala ɔtɔ si ɔsu ɔte mma loasɛ ngbã fiɛ maibasu kunigã matã Ɣaa.
Ɣaa ɔɖi Lot gɔ nɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa fiɛ ara nyanyarĩa wa i mamɔ to mabara ɔbiɛ wũ ɔtu.
Ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa gɔgbe ɔsɛ i ma ndɛ̃ fiɛ iyi biara ne, ɔla ɔ̃ɔnɔ fiɛ ɔla ɔ̃ɔnya ma ara lalaa ibara nɛ nsɛ ibiɛ wũ ɔtu.
Ne ɔso Ɣaa ɣe kumɛgɔ ɔ̃aɖi maturi bɔlɔlɔa i ma amɔrɛ̃ ame fiɛ ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ malalaa ɔpia i kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ame ɔsɛ ɔtã atɔ̃me iɣɛyi.
Titirio mma nsɛ makã ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ ma sosina ɔkã fiɛ maisɛ mawarɛ Ɣaa ɔle gɔ nto ɔɖe ma iso. Mila maratedze magbe ba ɔtu maisɛ manigã si mato matia ta sile sekelea dzɛ mpia i kato.
Ɣɛɛ ta Ɣaa makpabo ma mba ɔle fiɛ makɔlɛ maɖo mila maratedze magbe ne, maisɛ maya i Ɣaa katɔ̃ matia sile sekelea dzɛgbe.
Ɣɛɛ maturi magbe sɛ mabara ara lɛ ipo ame mabɔi ma loiɣe ara fiɛ maawo ma ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔɖoe. Masɛ maɣɛ anyakpi i ara wa mainɔ karɔ̃ iso fiɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃awɔra ma lɛ ipo ame mabɔi awe.

Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã mawe inyɛ i ɔɣiã gɔ mate maturi kanya. Kunuarɛ iisɛ kukpɛ̃ ma sɔ maabara ara wa loawe ma sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ ku anɔwã. Masɛ mabara anuarɛra gu anyanyara. Masɛ maɖegu mi kulaa i ayi iɖe ame, ɣɛɛ ɔsɔsɔla mato so.
Asɔrɔ̃ iɖe iisɛ itɔrɛ ma, fiɛ ikpi ibara ana iisɛ imi ma. Masɛ masɔsɔla mma loire siɖu i kafɔkaɖe ame fiɛ maɔsɛ katɔ̃ i kanɔbɛbɛ ame, ne ɔso Ɣaa sigbarĩ sia ma iso.
Maɔyu ɔri alasɔ masɛ̃ ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso iki. Masiai Ɣaa kanyaɖidze Balam gɔ nɖe Boer ɔbi fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ kuso gɔ ɔ̃afɔ i ikpi ibara ame.
Ɣaa ɔnyagalagu wũ i ɔ̃ ikpi iti gɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔfirimu ɔɖegu wũ ika ku siturilɔ ɔtindza wũ i ɔ̃ alalara wa ɔto ɔbara ɔso.
Mmagbe se lɛ siwore dzɛ losɔ̃ ɣee adɔdɔ wa i ɔwiri teregu ɔkigu. Ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔledza kakɔi ɔsɛ ma i iwo gudua ame.
Masɛ makɔlɛ so kato maɣɛ atsuɛ pɛ̃ fiɛ masɛ masu ma sosina ɔrakolo makpadzɛ̃ mma nto mafiniki mabɔrɛ i ikpi ame mapia i kasɔla ame.
Masɛ masɔsɔla maturi sɔ maatã ma iɖi ku ɔwi gɔ ame i ma mɔmɔ ɖe masande matã ikpi. Ira biara nɛ nto iɖe ɔturi iso ne, ɔ̃ɔkpese ne ɔsande.

Si maturi ɔki Bosate gu Ɖidze Yesu Kristo itsue ame matere mabɔrɛ i kayiiso ara wa nsɛ apukutura ma kɔrɛ, fiɛ kama ara wamɔ ɔkpese aba aamɔɛ̃ ma aɖe ma iso ne, ma ngbã kawirikɔ̃ sɛ inyanyarĩ iɖo karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.
Si madaatsue kuira i sibɔlɔlɔ ara ibara iso kɔra ne, tee ilɛ ma iɖo sɔ maatsue ngbã ɔri maledza ikpese i mmara mɛ i Ɣaa ɔtã kama.
Nnɛ loba ma iso ɔte sekelee sɔ igbã nɛgbe ɖe ɔnukuare sɔ, “Kpɛkpɛ ɔkpese ɔkpa ɔ̃aɖe ɔ̃ kura,” fiɛ “Kparako gɔ mapie ndu ɔɔkpese ɔkpa ɔ̃apie iba.”
Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, ɔko nyɔare loto lotsɛrɛ mi i ngbe ne, fiɛ i sɛ̃ inyɔɔ ame ne, lorɛgɛ̃ra mi adzuni i ara sɛɛ ibara iso.
Lobie sɔ minyigi ara wa i kanyamaɖidze sekelea ɔɣɛ masɛ koko gu Bosate gu Ɖidze mmara mɛ i mi katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔsu matã mi.
Iɖeakatɔ̃ ne, lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ i ɔwi tsɔra gɔgbe ame ne, maturi ma i ma sosina ara nto aɖe ma iso fiɛ masɛ mabara maturi aɣiãra to maaba.
Mato maakarɛ mi sɔ, “Ne ngɔ loɣɛ sɔ ɔto ɔ̃aledza iba ɣɛɛ? Alasɔ ita i ɔwi gɔ ɔwa mɛrɛ̃ ɔkpi iba iabo nɔme ne, ira biara to ikɛlɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ ise ta kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.”
Masɛ̃ sɔ maito mafɔ maɖe sɔ ta kokooko ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me fiɛ kato gu karɔ̃ ɔgɔdɛ̃. Karɔ̃ ne, ɔbara kã ɔbɔrɛgu i ndu ame fiɛ ndu iso kaɣɛ.
Fiɛ ndu ame iɖe i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔwɔra ala kayi kuere ne.
Ɣaa itɔ̃me ame iɖe lomɔɛ̃ kato gu karɔ̃ ito ipɛ i kiniɔ fiɛ ɔledza wã ɔsɛ ɔtã itsuedza ne. Ɔledza wã ɔsɛ ɔtã atɔ̃me iɣɛyi nɛ ɔ̃awɔra mma loisɛ manigã wũ.
Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, loito lobie sɔ miɣara ira ka iwɛ̃! I Bosate anɔ ne, ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i ikpɛnɛ gu akɔ kakpi ndɛ̃. I ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne, wã anyɔɔ ne, ira ka iwɛ̃ kere iɖe.
I mawɛ̃ kasusu kanya ne, Ɣaa iito ɔpɛ siwa i nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ iso, ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe ngbɔ iɖe. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔto ɔɣara so pɔkɔsɔɔ ɔtã mi alasɔ ɔ̃ito ɔbie sɔ kuwɛ̃ si ɔwɔ, ɣɛɛ sɔ ɔbiara si ɔfiniki ɔna iɖi.
Ɣɛɛ Bosate iyi nɛmɔ to iaba lɛ kumɛgɔ i yukukpe sɛ ɔba. Iyi nɛmɔ iso ne, kuɖokpo to kuayu ku kulu teteree, fiɛ ara wa mpia i kato to aatsue anina, karɔ̃ ku ira biara nɛ mpia i kã iso to iayu.
Gɔ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu to aawɔ lɛ ngbe ɔso ne, mme maturi igbã ikote sɔ miaɖe? Ikote sɔ miasɛ ngbã sekelea minigã Ɣaa.
Gɔ misi misia Bosate iyi nɛmɔ ne, mipia kubɛ sɔ miatã ne iba mala. Iyi nɛ i kato aatsue fiɛ kato ara ɔɖuɖu aawɛnɛkɛ̃ ala ɔtɔwiri ɔso.
Ɣɛɛ bosi bosia nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ gɔ ne nɖe Kato ɣɛtɛ gu Karɔ̃ ɣɛtɛ ngbegɔ i sibɔlɔlɔ aawe.
Ne ɔso wũ manyii, gɔ misi misia iyi nɛmɔ ne, mipia kubɛ sɔ miase sekelee i Ɣaa anɔ miwe i isobuɛ ame gu wũ.
Misu Bosate iɣaraso lɛ ɔri gɔ ɔtã mi sɔ miana iɖi. Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ame i bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse Paulo ɔtsɛrɛ ɔsese mi i inɔgba nɛ i Ɣaa ɔtã wũ kanya ne.

Nnɛgbe iɖe ɔɣɛ i ɔ̃ siko ɔɖuɖu ame i itɔ̃me nɛgbe iso ne. Ara awɛ̃ pia i ɔ̃ siko ame gɔ aba ɔle ku karɔ̃ inɔ. Wã i maturi mawɛ̃ ma loikpa anɔ fiɛ maiɣɛ teteree to maɖi karɔ̃ i mila ame lɛ kumɛgɔ ame masɛ mafinikira Ɣaa atɔ̃me mama. Nnɛgbe nto iawɔra ma ne.
Ɣɛɛ mi wũ maɖɔɛse ne, ka miɣe ara wagbe koko, ne ɔso midzuɛ̃ so sɔ mma loisɛ mabara i mmara iso kurabarara iibapuri mi kuwuĩ i karɔ̃.
Bosate gu Ɖidze Yesu Kristo si ɔbualɛ mi sɔ miatsue wũ gbodzoo mibua. Ɔ̃ ɔkpɛ nɖe ile ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ ɔwi daaro. Si iba ngbɔ.
I John: Boto botsɛrɛ mi ɔko gɔgbe i Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ mba ngbã fiɛ ipia ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ iso. Bonɔ ne, bonya ne ku anɔ, fiɛ bopɛgu ne ana.
Gɔ Ɣaa ɔɖi ngɔ nɖe itɔ̃me nɛ nsɛ itã ngbã kayi ne, bonya wũ fiɛ boɖe ɔ̃ iso ika. Bopɛ imomo i ngbã mɛ nna katui iso botã mi. Ɣaa bo Ɔse ɔɖi wũ ɔte bo fiɛ ɔpia i Ɣaa kɔrɛ.
Nnɛ bonya fiɛ bonɔ ne, ne boto boɣere mi ne, sɔ mi wũ miabua i bo iso fiɛ boabara sinyii ku Bo Ɔse gu ɔ̃ Ɔbi Yesu Kristo.
Boto botsɛrɛ nnɛgbe botã mi si bo isoɣɔ aayi.
Itɔ̃me nɛ bonɔ bobɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ Ɔbi kɔrɛ nɖe nnɛ boto bopɛ imomo sɔ, Ɣaa nɖe ikpawaĩ, fiɛ idududu kuiwɛ̃ na i ɔ̃ ame ɖuɖuuɖu.
Ne ɔso si boɣɛ sɔ boto boɖegu wũ kulaa, ɣɛɛ bosi ngbã i idududu ame ne, iyɔ boto bosɔsɔla so i ikaɖe gu kurabarara ame.
Ɣɛɛ si bosi ngbã i ikpawaĩ ame lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔ̃ wũ ɔpia i ikpawaĩ ame ne, iyɔ boto boɖegu so kulaa fiɛ ɔ̃ Ɔbi Yesu ima sɛ ifore bo iɖi i ikpi biara ame.
Si boɣɛ sɔ ikpi kuiwɛ̃ na i bo iso ne, boto bosɔsɔla so, iyɔ ɔnukuare kuwɛ̃ na i bo ame.
Ɣɛɛ si bobusi bo akpi boɣere Ɣaa ne, ɔɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔ̃ kaɣɛkasɛ ɔla fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara isɛɛ, ɔ̃asu bo akpi ɔɖuɖu ɔtsɛ bo fiɛ ɔ̃afore bo ɔɖi i bo ara nyanyarĩa wa ɔɖuɖu bobara ɔɖi bo iso.
Si bosɛ̃ sɔ boibara ikpi ne, boto bosu Ɣaa bobara ladze iyɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me na i bo ame.
Wũ mabi ɖɔɛse, nto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã mi sɔ si miibabara ikpi, ɣɛɛ si ɔrere ɔbara ikpi ne, boba ngɔ nsɛ ɔtã Ɣaa iti i bo kanya gɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Yesu Kristo gɔ nɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa.
Fiɛ Kristo mɔmɔ nɖe ngɔ iso bosɛ bona bo akpi kasukatsɛ, fiɛ iiɖe bo are kere, ɣɛɛ kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu.
Si boto bobara i Ɣaa mmara iso ne, iyɔ ite sekelee sɔ boɣe wũ.
Si ɔrere ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔɣe wũ, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔbara i ɔ̃ mmara iso ne, ladze i ɔnyiiɔ ɖe, fiɛ ɔnukuare na i ɔ̃ ame.
Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔla ne, ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ gɔ ɔba ɔtã Ɣaa ɔyi gbaã. Nnɛ boabara fiɛ boatsue sɔ bopia i ɔ̃ ame ngbe ne.
Ɔbiara gɔ loaɣɛ sɔ ɔpia i Ɣaa ame ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃asɛ ngbã lɛ kumɛgɔ i Yesu Kristo ɔsɛ.
Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, nnɛ loto lotsɛrɛ losese mi ngbe ne, iiɖe mmara ɣɛtɛ miɖe, ɣɛɛ mikuere mɛ mpia ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ miɖe. Mmara kuere mɛgbe nɖe itɔ̃me nɛ miɔnɔ koko ne.
Ɣɛɛ gbaã ne, mmara mɛ loto lotsɛrɛ losese mi ngbe ne, miɣɛtɛ miɖe, fiɛ ɔnukuare gɔ mpia i me ame sɛ ɔte so i Kristo gu bo ame ɔɖuɖu. Alasɔ idududu kato ife iro fiɛ ikpawaĩ mɔmɔ ka ito ifiɛ koko.
Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔpia i ikpawaĩ ame fiɛ ɔtsiri ɔ̃ ɔnyii ne, ɔkpese ɔpia i idududu ame ipɛ i kiniɔ.
Ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyii ne, ikpawaĩ ame ɔsɛ, fiɛ kuira na gɔ iatã ɔbo i ikpi ame.
Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ lotsiri ɔ̃ ɔnyii ne, ɔpia i idududu ame. Idududu ame iɖe ɔsɛ, ne ɔso ɔ̃isɛ ɔtsue ngbegɔ ɔsɛ ala idududu ɔbiɛ wũ anɔmi.
Wũ mabi ɖɔɛse, nto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã mi alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɔsu mi akpi ɔtsɛ i Kristo iti.
Mase, nto lotsɛrɛ losese mi alasɔ miɣe Kristo gɔ mpia ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃. Nto lotsɛrɛ losese mi maporoporoi alasɔ miɔɖe Tsirise iso.

Wũ mabi, nto lotsɛrɛ losese mi alasɔ miɣe Bo Ɔse. Mase, loto lotsɛrɛ losese mi alasɔ miɣe Kristo gɔ mpia ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃. Maporoporoi nto lotsɛrɛ losese mi, alasɔ miba ɔle, ana ne, Ɣaa itɔ̃me pia i mi ame fiɛ miɔɖe Tsirise iso.
Midaaɖɔɛ kayiiso ɣee ira biara nɛ nɖe kayiiso ire alasɔ si mito miɖɔɛ kayiiso ne, iyɔ miito miɖɔɛ Bo Ɔse.

Alasɔ ara wa ɔɖuɖu mpia i kayiiso, ara nyanyarĩa wa i maturi ɔtere masiai, nwa i maturi sɛ manyɔ fiɛ asɛ akpɛ̃ ma ɔkã gu nwa iso i maturi sɛ makɔlɛ so kato ɔɖuɖu iibɔrɛ i Bo Ɔse kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ kayiiso abɔrɛ.
Kayiiso gu kã ara wa ɔɖuɖu nsɛ akpɛ̃ maturi ɔkã ɔwi ka ɔto ɔfe, ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ to ɔ̃asɛ ngbã daaro daaro.
Wũ mabi, kayiiso kawirikɔ̃ ɔɔro ɔɣo! Miɣe sɔ Kristo ɔ̃ Tsirise to ɔ̃aba, fiɛ kiniɔ ne, Kristo matsirise gbodzoo ɔɔba gɔ ito ite sɔ kawirikɔ̃ ɔɔbore kabo.
Gbaã ne, iiɖe bo ndɛ̃ maturi maɖe, ne ɔso fiɛ mabɔrɛ i bo ame ne. Si bo ndɛ̃ maturi maɖe gbaã ne, tee makpese mapia i bo ndɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ mabɔrɛ i bo ndɛ̃ si ite sekelee sɔ ma kuwɛ̃ iiɖe bo ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃.
Ɣɛɛ Kristo ɔfedza Siwarã Bielea ɔfere mi iso, ne ɔso mi ɔɖuɖu ɣe ɔnukuare.
Iiɖe gɔ miiɣe ɔnukuare ɔso loto lotsɛrɛ mi ɔko gɔgbe, ɣɛɛ ala kumɛgɔ miɣe ɔnukuare fiɛ miɣe sekelee sɔ sila kusiwɛ̃ iiɖe Itɔ̃me Bielea.
Nna kowũ nɖe ladze? Ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ iiɖe Yesu nɖe Kristo gɔ Ɣaa ɔsɔla nnɔĩ. Ɔ̃ gɔmɔ nɖe Kristo ɔ̃ tsirise ne. Ɔ̃ ɔɖe losɛ̃ Ɔbi gu Ɔse ɔɖuɖu ne.
Ɔbiara gɔ losɛ̃ Ɔbi ne, ɔsɛ̃ Ɣaa ana, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ Ɔbi ne, ɔfɔ Ɔse ana.
Minyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ nnɛ minɔ ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ aawe i mi ame. Si mibara ngbɔ ne, iyɔ mito miawe i sinyii ame ku Ɔse gu Ɔbi inyɔ.
Kristo ne, ngbã mɛ nna katui miɖe ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã bo.
Mma nto mabie sɔ maakɔ mi mayura ɔso fiɛ loto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe losese mi.

Ɣɛɛ mi ne, Kristo Siwarã dzɛ mifɔ mibɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ pia i mi ame. Ne ɔso miibabie kuwɛ̃ sɔ ɔte mi ara ala kumɛgɔ ɔ̃ Siwarã dzɛgbe to site mi ira biara i ɔnukuare ame fiɛ iiɖe sila Siwarã siɖe ɔso. Mikɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ i sɛ̃ ara ite ame miwe i ɔ̃ ame.
Wũ mabi ɖɔɛse, mikɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ miwe i ɔ̃ ame sɔ si ɔwi gɔ ɔɖusi ɔbɔrɛ ne, boawo ɔya i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ ku katetere fiɛ kunuarɛ iibakpɛ̃ bo.
Si miɣe sɔ Kristo ɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa ne, ikote sɔ miatsue sɔ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara sibɔlɔlɔ ara ne, Ɣaa ɔbi ɔɖe lɛ Kristo.
Minyɔ kuɖɔɛ wodoroa gɔ igbã i Bo Ɔse ba ɔtã bo! Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ bo kaɖu sɔ ɔsɛ ɔkpere bo sɔ ɔ̃ mabi, fiɛ gbaã ne, ɔ̃ mabi boɖe. Nnɛ ɔso i kayiiso iiɣe bo nɖe sɔ kaiɣe Ɣaa.
Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa mabi boɖe, fiɛ nnɛ tutuutu boaba boakpese ne, iite kukaakɔ, ɣɛɛ boɣe sɔ si Kristo ɔba ne, boto boase lɛ ɔ̃, fiɛ kumɛgɔ ɔse ne, ngbɔ boanya wũ ne.
Ɔbiara gɔ mba ɔriinyɔ nɛgbe i Kristo iso sɛ ɔbara so sekelee lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo se sekelee.
Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ikpi ne, Ɣaa mmara iso iɖe ɔta ɔya, alasɔ ikpi nɖe Ɣaa mmara iso idaabara.
Miɣe sɔ Kristo ne, ɔba sɔ si ɔba ɔ̃asu kayiiso akpi ɔkɛlɛgu, fiɛ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ na ikpi kuiwɛ̃.
Ɔbiara gɔ mpia i kulaa ame ku Kristo iisɛ ɔkɛlɛ i katɔ̃ ɔbara ikpi. Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔna isoɣɔ i ikpi ibara ame ne, ɔ̃inya Kristo fiɛ ɔ̃atsue wũ ɖuɖuuɖu.
Midaatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔsɔsɔla mi, wũ mabi ɖɔɛse! Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara isɛɛ ne, ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa ɔɖe lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo se bɔlɔlɔ.
Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ikpi ne, Ɔbosam ɔre ɔɖe alasɔ Ɔbosam ne, ikpi ɔsɛ ɔbara ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃. Nnɛgbe tutuutu ɔso i Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔba ne, sɔ si ɔnina Ɔbosam kurabarara.
Ɔbiara gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔbi iisɛ ɔna isoɣɔ i ikpi ibara ame, alasɔ Ɣaa nsɛgbai pia i ɔ̃ ame. Ɔ̃isisɛ ɔkɛlɛ i katɔ̃ ɔbara ikpi ala Ɣaa nɖe ɔ̃ ɔse.
Ikpaki siare nɛ mpia i Ɣaa mabi gu Ɔbosam mabi ndɛ̃ nɖe sɔ, ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔbara isɛɛ, fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyii ne, ɔ̃iɖe Ɣaa ɔbi.
Itɔ̃me nɛ minɔ ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ nɖe sɔ, mitã boɖɔɛ so.
Iikote sɔ boase lɛ Kain gɔ nɖe Tsirise ɔbi fiɛ ɔɖoe ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi. Be ɔso ɔɖoe ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi? Ɔɖoe wũ alasɔ ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi ɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ ɔɖe ɔturi lalaa.
Ne ɔso wũ manyii, idaabara mi ɣaa si kayiiso maturi ɔtsiri mi.
Boɣe sɔ boɔbɔrɛ i kukpi nrɔɔ̃ ame bobo i ngbã ame, boɣe ngbɔ alasɔ bosɛ boɖɔɛ bo manyii. Ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyii pia i kukpi nrɔɔ̃ ame kokooko.
Ɔbiara gɔ lotsiri ɔ̃ ɔnyii ne, turiɖoese ɔɖe, fiɛ miɣe sɔ turiɖoese na ngbã mɛ nna katui i ɔ̃ ame.
Kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔsu ɔ̃ ngbã ɔtã i bo iti lote bo nnɛ kowũ nɖe kuɖɔɛ. Ne ɔso ikote sɔ bo wũ boasu bo ngbã bosɔrɛ i bo manyii ngbã iti.
Si ranase ɔnya sɔ ira ɔnya ɔ̃ ɔnyii, ɣɛɛ iibɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame sɔ ɔ̃abuai wũ ne, nda ɔ̃abara fiɛ ɔ̃aɣɛ sɔ ɔto ɔɖɔɛ Ɣaa?
Wũ mabi, midaatã boɖɔɛ so ala kanya kunu, ɣɛɛ bo kuɖɔɛ si kuɖe kuɖɔɛ mɔmɔ gɔ loate so i kurabarara ame.
Iki i nnɛgbe ame bonya sɔ ɔnukuare mabi boɖe, fiɛ boawe katetere i Ɣaa anɔ ne.
Si bo ɔtu ɔtã bo ipɔ ne, boɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔmɔ ɔɖo bo ɔtu fiɛ ɔɣe ira biara.
Ne ɔso wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, si bo ɔtu iitã bo ipɔ ne, boba katetere i Ɣaa anɔ.
Fiɛ ira biara nɛ bosɛ bokarɛ bobɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne, bosɛ bofɔ, alasɔ boto bobara i ɔ̃ mmara iso fiɛ bobara ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ.
Mmara mɛ ɔtã bo nɖe sɔ bofɔ ɔ̃ Ɔbi Yesu Kristo boɖe si boɖɔɛ bo manyii lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔɣere bo ɔfegu.
Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara i Ɣaa mmara iso pia i Ɣaa ame fiɛ Ɣaa ɔ̃ wũ ɔpia i ɔ̃ ame. Iki i ɔ̃ Siwarã dzɛ ɔtã bo ame ne, boɣe sɔ Ɣaa pia i bo ame.
Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, midaafɔ ɔbiara gɔ loɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa Siwarã pia i ɔ̃ ame miɖe, ɣɛɛ mifafarɛ minyɔ sɔ Siwarã dzɛmɔ ne, Ɣaa kɔrɛ sibɔrɛ, alasɔ mila kanyamaɖidze gbodzoo ka mapia i kakɔi biara.
