Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ Kristo Yesu ɔba kayiiso lɛ ɔturi awune ne, ɔba Siwarã dzɛ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ. Ɔri gɔgbe iso miaki fiɛ miatsue ngɔ mba Siwarã dzɛ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne.
Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ loaɣɛ sɔ Yesu iiba kayi lɛ ɔturi awune awe ne, siwarã dzɛmɔ iibɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ, Kristo ɔ̃ tsirise sire siɖe. Minɔ sɔ siwarã dzɛmɔ to siaba kayiiso fiɛ kiniɔ ne, ka sipia i ngbe koko.
Ɣɛɛ mi wũ mabi ɖɔɛse ne, Ɣaa kɔrɛ mibɔrɛ fiɛ miɔɖe mila kanyamaɖidze mamɔ iso. Alasɔ Ɣaa Siwarã dzɛ mpia i mi ame ɔmɔ siba ɔle siɖo ndzɛ mpia i kayiiso maturi ame.
Kayiiso maturi maɖe, fiɛ masɛ maɖe ika i kayiiso ara iso, ne ɔso kayiiso maturi sɛ makã ma itɔ̃me atsue.
Ɣɛɛ bo ne, Ɣaa mare boɖe. Ɔbiara gɔ nɣe Ɣaa sɛ ɔkã bo itɔ̃me atsue, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ loibɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔkã bo itɔ̃me atsue. Nnɛgbe boasu bonya ɔnukuare Siwarã gu mila sire boɖi ite ne.
Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, mitã boɖɔɛ so alasɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ i kuɖɔɛ ɔbɔrɛ. Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ maturi ne, Ɣaa ɔbi ɔɖe fiɛ ɔɣe Ɣaa.
Ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔɖɔɛ maturi iiɣe Ɣaa, alasɔ Ɣaa nɖe kuɖɔɛ.
Ɔri gɔ iso i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔte bo nɖe sɔ, ɔpia ɔ̃ Ɔbi Ɔwɛ̃ saã kayi ame sɔ iaki i ɔ̃ iso ne, boana ngbã mɛ nna katui.
Mitã loɣere mi nnɛ nɖe kuɖɔɛ. Iiɖe kumɛgɔ boto boɖɔɛ Ɣaa nɖe kuɖɔɛ, ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ ɔɖɔɛ bo fiɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɔsese bo sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ngɔ iso iaki fiɛ boana akpi kasukatsɛ ne, ne nɖe kuɖɔɛ ne.
Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, si ngbɔ i Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ bo ne, iyɔ ikote sɔ boaɖɔɛ so.
Kuwɛ̃ iinya Ɣaa ɔnya. Si boto boɖɔɛ so ne, iyɔ Ɣaa pia i bo ame fiɛ ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔyi i bo ame.
Boɣe sɔ Ɣaa pia i bo ame fiɛ bo wũ bopia i ɔ̃ ame alasɔ ɔsu ɔ̃ mɔmɔ Siwarã ɔpia i bo ame.
Boɔnya, fiɛ boɔsu ne bopɛ imomo boɣere maturi sɔ, Bo Ɔse ɔpia ɔ̃ Ɔbi sɔ ɔba ɔ̃akpese Ɖidze ɔtã maturi i kayi ame.
Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ Yesu ne Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔɖe ne, Ɣaa pia i ɔ̃ ame, fiɛ ɔ̃ wũ ɔpia i Ɣaa ame.
Bo mɔmɔ ɣe, fiɛ bofɔ kuɖɔɛ gɔ i Ɣaa ba ɔtã bo boɖe.
Ɣaa nɖe kuɖɔɛ, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ maturi ne, ɔpia i Ɣaa ame fiɛ Ɣaa ana pia i ɔ̃ ame.
Nnɛgbe ɔso ikote sɔ kuɖɔɛ aayi i bo ame sɔ atɔ̃me iɣɛyi ne, boawe katetere, alasɔ bo ngbã i kayi ame ɔkotegu Kristo mire.
Ifɔ̃ kuiwɛ̃ na i kuɖɔɛ ame, ɣɛɛ kuɖɔɛ gɔ loyi sɛ kusa ifɔ̃ kurera kama. Ne ɔso ngɔ nsɛ ɔnigã ne, ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ iiyi, alasɔ ifɔ̃ sɛgu kutsue ikpadzɛ̃.
Bosɛ boɖɔɛ Ɣaa alasɔ ɔ̃ loɖe katɔ̃ ɔɖɔɛ bo.
Si ɔrere ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ Ɣaa, ɣɛɛ ɔtsiri ɔ̃ ɔnyii ne, ladze i ɔnyiiɔ ɖe. Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ loito ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyii gɔ ɔto ɔnya ala anɔ ne, ɔ̃ibawo Ɣaa gɔ ɔ̃ito ɔnya ɔɖɔɛ.
Ne ɔso mmara mɛ i Kristo ɔtã bo nɖe sɔ, ɔbiara gɔ nto ɔɖɔɛ Ɣaa si ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyii ana.
Ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ ɔɖe sɔ Yesu nɖe Kristo gɔ i Ɣaa ɔsɔla nnɔĩ ne, Ɣaa ɔbi ɔɖe, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔse sɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔbi ana.
Ne ɔso si boto boɖɔɛ Ɣaa fiɛ boto bobara i ɔ̃ mmara iso ne, iyɔ boɣe sɔ boto boɖɔɛ Ɣaa mabi ana.
Si bobara i Ɣaa mmara iso ne, ite sɔ boto boɖɔɛ wũ, fiɛ ɔ̃ mmara iso ibara na ɔle.
Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔbi sɛ ɔɖe kayi iso. Nnɛ bosu boɖe ala kayi iso nɖe bo kafɔkaɖe.
Ngɔ pɛ loawo kayiiso ɔɖe nɖe ngɔ lofɔ ɔɖe sɔ Yesu nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi.

Yesu Kristo nɖe ngɔ loba fiɛ bonya wũ boɖi ite iki i ɔ̃ Ɣaa itupie kubarara gu ɔ̃ ima nɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ iki i ɔ̃ kukpi ame. Ɔ̃iba ku ndu kere, ɣɛɛ ndu gu ima, fiɛ Ɣaa Siwarã mɔmɔ ɔɖe aɖansiɛ sɔ gbaã iɖe alasɔ nnɛ i Siwarã ɔɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe.
Maɖansiɛ itɛ maɖe mpia.
Ma nɖe Siwarã, ima gu ndu, fiɛ ma itɛ ɔɖuɖu aɖansiɛ ɖe awɛ̃.
Bosɛ bofɔ maturi aɖansiɛ boɖe, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa aɖansiɛ ba ɔrɔrã aɖo, fiɛ ɔsia itɔ̃me nɛgbe ita i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso.
Ne ɔso ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔɖe ne, ɔfɔ aɖansiɛ wagbe ɔpia i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame. Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ loifɔ aɖansiɛ ɔɖe to ɔsia Ɣaa sila alasɔ ɔ̃ifɔ aɖansiɛ wa i Ɣaa ɔɖe i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso ɔɖe.
Aɖansiɛ nɖe sɔ, Ɣaa ɔsu ngbã mɛ nna katui ɔtã bo, fiɛ ɔ̃ Ɔbi ame i ngbã mɛgbe pia.
Ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi ne, ɔba ngbã mɛgbe, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ loifɔ Ɔbi ne, ɔna ngbã.
Loto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã mi ma lofɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi miɖe si mitsue sɔ miba ngbã mɛ nna katui.
Nnɛ ɔso bosu bo iti bosia i Ɣaa iso nɖe sɔ ira biara nɛ boakarɛ i ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ kanya ne, ɔsɛ ɔkã bo atsue.
Si boɣe sɔ ɔsɛ ɔkã bo atsue i ira biara nɛ bosɛ bokarɛ wũ ame ne, iyɔ boɣe sɔ ira biara nɛ bosɛ bokarɛ ne, bosɛ bofɔ ne i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.

Si mi ɔrere ɔnya mi ɔnyii fɔɖedze to ɔbara ikpi nɛ loibakpadzɛ̃ wũ ikɛlɛgu kukpi ame ne, mikparama kayi i ɔ̃ iti si Ɣaa aatã wũ ngbã. Ngɔ lobara ikpi nɛ loibakpadzɛ̃ kukpi ibɔ itɔ̃me iɖe ngbe. Ɣɛɛ ikpi iwɛ̃ igbã pia gɔ iakpadzɛ̃ kukpi ibɔ, iiɖe ne igbã loto loɣɛ sɔ mikparama kayi.
Ira biara nɛ loikote ne, ikpi iɖe, ɣɛɛ akpi awɛ̃ pia wa loibakɔ ɔturi akɛlɛgu kukpi ame.
Boɣe sɔ ɔbiara gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔbi iisɛ ɔkɛlɛ i katɔ̃ ɔbara ikpi, alasɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi sɛ ɔdzuɛ̃ wũ fiɛ Tsirise iibawo wũ ira boa kuiwɛ̃ ɔbara.
Boɣe sɔ Ɣaa mare boɖe atoa sɔ kayiiso ɔɖuɖu pia i Tsirise ɔle kayirinɔ.

Boɣe sɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔba kayiiso fiɛ ɔtã bonɔ ara karɔ̃ botsue Ɣaa gɔ nɖe ɔnukuarese. Fiɛ ɔ̃ gɔ nɖe ɔnukuarese gu ɔ̃ Ɔbi Yesu Kristo ame bosi ngbã. Gbaã ne, Ɣaa nɖe nukuarese fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔtã bo ngbã mɛ nna katui.
Ne ɔso wũ mabi mirera so kama i iɣɔsɔrɛ kɔrɛ.
II John: Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme gɔ mme nɖe mafɔɖedze ɔkpakpa kɔrɛ nto losese ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɖɔɛse gu ɔ̃ mabi ma nto loɖɔɛ i ɔnukuare ame. Iiɖe wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ me nsɛ loɖɔɛ mi, ɣɛɛ mma ɔɖuɖu nɣe ɔnukuare.
Alasɔ ɔnukuare pia i bo ame fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃awe ɔwi biara.
Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Yesu Kristo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi si matã bo ma nto boɖɔɛ manyii i ɔnukuare ame abualɛra gu nnyainyɔ gu isobuɛ.
So ɔɣɔ me gbaã gɔ lonya sɔ fɔ mabi mawɛ̃ si ngbã i ɔnukuare ame lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bo Ɔse ɔte bo.
Ne ɔso loto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe losese mi Bokɔnyi ɖɔɛse sɔ mitã boɖɔɛ so. Iiɖe mmara ɣɛtɛ loto lotã mi, ɣɛɛ mmɛ bofɔ ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ miɖe.
Kuɖɔɛ gɔ itɔ̃me boto boɣere mi nɖe sɔ boabara Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ. Mmara mɛ minɔ ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ nɖe sɔ, mi ɔɖuɖu si misɛgu so i kuɖɔɛ ame.
Maturisɔsɔladze gbodzoo ka mapia i kayi ame. Mato mate sɔ Yesu Kristo iiba kayi lɛ ɔturi awune awe. Maturisɔsɔladze nɖe mmagbe igbã fiɛ maɖe Kristo matsirise.
Minyɔ so kukaakɔ sɔ nnɛ iti mito mikpɛ̃ iibayu, ɣɛɛ miafɔ mi kuso ɔɖuɖu pɔpɔɔpɔ.
Ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ Kristo ara ite ɔla fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔte ara mama ne, ɔna i Ɣaa ame. Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ lomɔɛ̃ wã ɔto ne, Ɔse gu Ɔbi ɔɖuɖu pia i ɔ̃ ame.
Si ɔrere ɔba mi kɔrɛ fiɛ iiɖe Kristo ara ite iɖe ɔsu ɔbɔ ne, midaafɔ ɔnyiiɔ, midaatofora wũ kɔra.
Alasɔ ngɔ lowarɛ nrɔɔ̃ ɔfɔ ngɔmɔ ne, ɔbaragu wũ mawɛ̃ i ɔ̃ ikpi ame.

Atoa sɔ ara gbodzoo pia gɔ lobie sɔ loatsɛrɛ losese mi ne, loito lobie sɔ loatsɛrɛ wã i ɔko ame. Ɣɛɛ i ne kanya ne, nto lonyɔ ɔri sɔ mme mɔmɔ loaba mi kɔrɛ loba loanya mi ku anɔ fiɛ ka loaɣere mi fiɛ bo isoɣɔ aayi.
Fɔ ɔnyiibi rɔ̃go gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔturi mabi sɔ maya-ɔ kukaakɔ.
III John: Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme mafɔɖedze ɔkpakpa kɔrɛ nto losese-ɔ, Gayo wũ ɔnyii gɔ lobua nsɛ loɖɔɛ.
Wũ ɔnyii ɖɔɛse, nsɛ lokparama kayi ɔwi biara sɔ kayi si kalɛgu-ɔ, si awe i isosarɛ ame lɛ kumɛgɔ ilɛgu ta fɔ ɔkala.
So ɔɣɔ me gbaã gɔ manyii fɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ɔba maaɣere me sɔ akpese amɔɛ̃ ɔnukuare ato teteree lɛ kumɛgɔ amɔɛ̃ ala kokooko.
Gɔ lonɔ sɔ wũ mabi si ngbã i ɔnukuare ame ne, so ɔɣɔ me gbaã.
Wũ ɔnyii ɖɔɛse, asɛ abara nnɛ lokote i kumɛgɔ asɛ afɔ manyii fɔɖedze titirio mafɔ.
Maɔba maaɣere mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ mpia i ngbe kumɛgɔ asɛ aɖɔɛ ma. Loto-ɔ i kukpa sɔ kɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ si abuai ma kumɛgɔ lokote i Ɣaa karabara ame sɔ maakɛlɛgu ma irisɛ i katɔ̃.
Alasɔ Ɣaa iyere ame iɖe maɣo ɔri fiɛ maifɔ kuira mabɔrɛgu i mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze kɔrɛ.
Ne ɔso ikote sɔ bo ma nɖe Kristo mare aabuai mmagbe si iate sɔ mawɛ̃ boɖe i ɔnukuare karabara ame.
Lotsɛrɛ ɔko kurukutua ɔwɛ̃ losese mafɔɖedze ikuri, ɣɛɛ Diotrefo gɔ losu so ɔbara ma tɔ̃ɖedze iiwarɛ me ɔpia i kuira ame.

Si loba loabo ne, loaɣere mi ara nyanyarĩa wa ɔɖuɖu ɔto ɔɣɛ i bo iso, gu mila mɛ ɔsɛ ɔla. Fiɛ iiɖe ne kere, ɣɛɛ si manyii fɔɖedze ɔba ne, ɔsɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃isibafɔ ma. Nnɛ lobua inyanyarĩ iɖo nɖe sɔ, ɔ̃isɛ ɔtã manyii mama ɔri sɔ mafɔ mafɔ, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔsa mma lobie sɔ maafɔ ma ɔɖi i mafɔɖedze ikuri ame.
Wũ ɔnyii ɖɔɛse, daasuã ira lalaa ibara, ɣɛɛ suã isɛɛ ibara, alasɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara isɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔre ɔɖe fiɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara lalaa ne, ɔ̃iɣe Ɣaa.
Ɔbiara to ɔɖe ika sɛɛ i Demetrio iso, fiɛ ɔ̃ nsɛgbai sɛɛ mɔmɔ ana kɔra to miɣɛ ara sɛɛ i ɔ̃ iso. Bo wũ boto boɖe aɖansiɛ sɛɛ i ɔ̃ iso fiɛ miɣe sɔ nnɛ boto boɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe.
Atoa sɔ ara gbodzoo pia loabie sɔ loɣere-ɔ ne, loibaɣere-ɔ iki i ɔko ame.
Ɣɛɛ lofɔ loɖe sɔ iibadzoro ne, boto boasarɛ anɔ ku anɔ fiɛ boaɖe ika.
Isobuɛ si iwegu-ɔ. Fɔ malaa ɔɖuɖu sɔ maya-ɔ o-o. Mme wũ loya bo malaa ɔɖuɖu i mmɔ kukaakɔ.
Jude: Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme Yuda kɔrɛ, ngɔ nɖe Yesu Kristo rabaradze fiɛ loɖe Yakobo ɔnyiibi. Nto lotsɛrɛ lotã mma i bo Ɔse Ɣaa ɔkpere fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ kukaakɔ, ɔto ɔdzuɛ̃ ma ɔsɛ ɔtã Yesu Kristo.
Ɣaa nnyainyɔ gu ɔ̃ isobuɛ gu kuɖɔɛ gɔ ɔba ɔtã mi si kusi kubua.

Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, tee lobie sɔ si lotsɛrɛ mi ɔko i kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔfɔ bo ɔɖuɖu ɔpia ngbã iso, ɣɛɛ ne, iba ianya sɔ loatsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe losu lopia mi ɔle sɔ mikpɛ̃ i kafɔkaɖe iti. Kafɔkaɖe ara ite wa i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã ɔ̃ maturi ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã.

Alasɔ mawɛ̃ ma loisɛ manigã Ɣaa ɔɔɖu mabo i bo ndɛ̃ i iwɛrɛ ame. Mmagbe ɔɔfinikira Itɔ̃me nɛ bofɔ i Ɣaa abualɛra iso makpesera ira mama si ikategu ma nsɛgbai nyanyarĩa. Masɛ̃ bo Igarakpakpa ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo. Gbaã ne, Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɔɔɣɛ ɔsɛ koko sɔ ɔ̃atã mmagbe ipɔ.
Atoa sɔ miɣe ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu koko ne, lobie sɔ loanyigira mi sɔ Ɣaa gɔ mɔmɔ loɖi Israel kaɖe ɔbɔrɛgu i sisande ame i Egipte karɔ̃ iso ne, ɔwɔra mma loifɔ wũ maɖe i ɔwi kama.

Minyigi sɔ Ɣaa makpabo ma loibara ɔle gɔ matã ma karabara kukaakɔ fiɛ marui i ma kayakɔ̃ ne, ɔpia ma kugbagɔrɔĩ ɔsɛ ta ɔwi gɔmɔ fiɛ ɔsu ma ɔpia i idududu kpirikpirikpiri ame sɔ maawe i mmɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔ̃aɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me ɔtã ma ipɔ ku Iyi Tsɔra Siare nɛmɔ.

Ngbɔ ame si minyigi Sodom gu Gomora gu simagɛ̃ dzɛ loki silɔ ma ne. Sɛ̃ maturi ɔsɛ ngbã nyanyarĩa maɖe asɔrɔ̃ lalaa gɔ ta ma marɛrɛ̃ to marɛgu so, ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtɔ gɔ loisɛ ɔnyi ɔtsuedza ma sɔ maaɖe ikparĩ matã maturi ɔɖuɖu.
Ngbɔ ame i mmagbe sɛ masɛ̃ arɛ mabara ara nyanyarĩa i ma mɔmɔ siturina iso ne. Maisɛ makã Ɣaa ɔle gɔ nto ɔɖe ma iso atsue fiɛ masɛ maɣɛ anyakpi i mma nto maɖe ma iso iso.
Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa Kpabokpakpa Mikael kɔra iibara ngbɔ. Ɔwi gɔ mato mawararã so i Mose kpise iso sɔ nna loasu wũ ne, Mikael iiɣɛ kuira nyanyarĩa i Ɔbosam iso iɖo sɔ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bosate si ɔnyagalagu-ɔ!”
Ɣɛɛ mmagbe sɛ matiatia, magbarĩ ara wa karɔ̃ mainɔ fiɛ ara wa maɣe ta ma karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ ipo ame mabɔi ɣee kurodzai iiɣe kuira ne, wã ame loaɖoe ma ne.
Ndzo miɖe mitã ma! Masɛ Kain nsɛgbai. Kusia gɔ maana ɔso ne, mabɛbɛ anɔ fiɛ mabara iɣɛrɛ lɛ Balam awe. Mata maya maturi iso lɛ Kora awe fiɛ maawɔ ngbɔ ame.

Si misakanya i kuɖɔɛ ame mito misɛ ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ ne, mmagbe anuarɛra sɛ akpese inyini isia mi iso. Ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã isoɣɔ pɛ masɛ mabie. Mase lɛ adɔdɔ wa i ɔwiri sore ɔkigu fiɛ kado na i wã ame, ɣee adziri wa loisɛ aɣɔ̃ abi nane kusɛ ɔwi. Adziri wa maɔrui ta siɖu ame fiɛ ɔɔkpi.
Makategu ɔpo ame ndu mɛ nto mipɛ fiɛ ma anuarɛra se lɛ ɔpo ndu mɛ nto mifu sirarã. Maɖe awami wa loiɣɛ kayakɔ̃ kawɛ̃, fiɛ Ɣaa ɔɔledza kasɛkɔ̃ ɔtã ma i idududu kpirikpirikpiri ame ɔwi daaro.
Mmagbe iso iɖe i Enok gɔ nɖe Adam ɔɣekparɛ kɔdzɛva ɔbi ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Bosate gu ɔ̃ makpabo kukpi kukpi to maba.

Fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃aɣɛgu maturi ɔɖuɖu atɔ̃me. Ɔ̃aɣɛgu mma ɔɖuɖu loisɛ manigã Ɣaa atɔ̃me i ara lalaa wa ɔɖuɖu mabara iti. Ibua i nwagbe iso ne, maaɣɛgu makpibaradze ma loisɛ manigã Ɣaa atɔ̃me i anyakpi wa ɔɖuɖu maɣɛ i ɔ̃ iso iti.”
Maɖe maturi ma nsɛ maɖe aka i ɔme ame, maɖi maturi matã. Masɛ mabara i ma ara nyanyarĩa wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ ma ɔkã iso. Masɛ maɖe ndamu fiɛ masɛ masu ɔnyamɛrɛ̃ masɔsɔla maturi si maana nnɛ mato mabie.
Ɣɛɛ mi wũ manyii ɖɔɛse ne, minyigi ara wa i Bosate Yesu Kristo katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔɣere mi koko.
Maɣere mi sɔ, “I ayi tsɔra ame ne, maturi to maaba fiɛ maabara mi aɣiãra, mabara ara wa nto ma ɔkã gɔ maibanigã Ɣaa.”
Ma nɖe mma nsɛ manina maturi gu maturi inyɔ ndɛ̃ ne, ma adzuni sia i kayiiso ara ɔnɔwɛ̃ iso, fiɛ Ɣaa Siwarã na i ma ame.
Ɣɛɛ mi wũ maɖɔɛse ne, mitã mi kafɔkaɖe ga nɖe ira sekelea si kamɔ kabua si mikparama kayi i Siwarã Bielea ɔle ame.
Mikɔla so i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ame si mila miɔnyɔ ɔri sɔ Bosate Yesu Kristo aanyɔ mi nnya ɔtã mi ngbã mɛ nna katui.
Ma ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ma nto mawararã ne, minyɔ ma nnya.
Mma nto mabo i ɔtɔ ame ne, mipɛ ma mifɔ mipia i ngbã ame. Minyɔ mawɛ̃ nnya, ɣɛɛ minigã ma nsɛgbai nyanyarĩa mɛ loawo mi ɔpukutura.
Ɣaa gɔ loawo mi ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔla sɔ miibarɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃akɔ mi mila miɔna isoɣɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ miasɛ miabo ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ame si ɔbara mi sɔ iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ iibawe mi iso.
Ɣaa ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ nɖe bo Fɔdze iki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso boasu kuwarɛ botã, bokɔlɛ wũ kato. Ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ loaɖe bo iso, ɔwe ɔle i bo iso, ɔwi biara ita i kiniɔ ikpa ɔwi daaro. Si iba ngbɔ!
Revelation of John: Ɔko gɔgbe nɖe ara wa i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔte ɔ̃ maɖabo iki i Yesu Kristo iso sɔ aaba i ɔwi kurukutua ame ne. Kristo ɔɖe loɖi wã kayi ɔte ɔ̃ ɔɖabo Yohanes iki i Ɣaa kpabo gɔ ɔpia iso.
Mme Yohanes lotsɛrɛ ara wa lonya fiɛ loto loɖe aɖansiɛ i Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɖi ɔte iki i Yesu Kristo iso.
So aaɣɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔka ɔko gɔgbe ame atɔ̃me gu mma nsɛ makã ara wa maɣɛ masɛ ngbe atsue fiɛ masɛ mabara i wã iso alasɔ ɔwi gɔ ame aaba ɔɔpɛtɛpɛtɛ.
Mme Yohanes lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe nto lotã mi mafɔɖedze akuri akɔdzɛ wa mpia i Asia karɔ̃ iso.
Abualɛra gu isobuɛ nɛ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa gɔ mpia kiniɔ fiɛ ɔ̃ɔwe ɔnya, fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃aledza iba gu ɔ̃ Siwarã aka akɔdzɛ wa mpia i ɔ̃ sigaraiyara katɔ̃,

gu ɔ̃ ɔbi Yesu Kristo gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri iso si awegu mi. Ɔ̃ nɖe ɔɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ lota ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe kayiiso magara iso. Ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ bo fiɛ iki i kumɛgɔ ɔsu so ɔsɔrɛ i bo iti ne, ɔ̃ɔɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i bo akpi ame.
Ɔ̃ɔbara bo masɔrɛdze kaɖe sɔ boasɔrɛ Ɣaa gu ɔ̃ Ɔse. Yesu Kristo ɔkpɛ nɖe ifiɛ gu ɔle ita i kiniɔ ikpa ɔwi daaro! Si iba ngbɔ.
Minyɔ! Ɔto ɔba i adɔdɔ iso!
Ɔturi biara to ɔ̃anya wũ
gu mma ɔɖuɖu lobara wũ kako.
Kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu to maabiɛ nnɔmɛ i ɔ̃ iti.
Si iba ngbɔ.
Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔle ɔɖuɖu Sate nto ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mme nɖe Karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ gu Kawirikɔ̃. Mme mpia kiniɔ fiɛ loɔwe lonya fiɛ loto loaledza iba.”

Mme, mi ɔnyii Yohanes gɔ mi gu wũ losiai Yesu fiɛ bosɛ boɣara so i inyɛwe ame ala ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔso, mme nto loɣɛ itɔ̃me nɛgbe. Mamɔɛ̃ me masɛ maasɛ i karɔ̃ ga i ndu ɔki milɔ fiɛ marɔ kã sɔ Patmos iso alasɔ loto loɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me gu ɔnukuare gɔ i Yesu ɔɖi ɔte iso.
I iyi nɛ i bo mafɔɖedze sɛ bosarɛ bole Bosate iso ne, Siwarã Bielea ɔbo i wũ ame fiɛ lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ dzɛ nto sire teteree lɛ kadadã i wũ kama.
Siɣere me sɔ, “Tsɛrɛ ara wa anya sɛ si asu ɔko asese mafɔɖedze akuri akɔdzɛ wa mpia i Efeso, Smirna, Pergamo, Tiatira, Sardis, Filadelfia gu Laodikea.”
Gɔ lofiniki sɔ si lonyɔ ngɔ nto ɔɖegu me ika ne, lonya sikãrɛtɛa sikaniɛdziri ikɔdzɛ.
I sikaniɛdziri ikɔdzɛ dzɛmɔ ndɛ̃ ne, lonya ɔturi lɛ ɔturi awune ɔbi gɔ ɔɣɛ. Ɔpia awu tagbaraa wa lobo wũ ta ngbatɔ̃ fiɛ ɔsu sikãrɛtɛa kafiami ɔtɔ so i igbegbe.
Ɔ̃ iti gu siwɛrɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu ɔfudza futututu lɛ sɛrɛrerɔ̃ siwɛrɛ̃, ɣee lɛ sno fiɛ ɔ̃ anɔmi se lɛ ɔtɔ gɔ nto ɔtsue awe.
Ɔ̃ ngba to mifiɛ lɛ ibɔra rɛtɛa mapia i ɔtɔ ame fiɛ ɔ̃ silɔ ana se lɛ ndu mɛ nto mikpase i ata iso teteree.
Ɔto awami akɔdzɛ i kuɖearɔ̃ ame, ibe inyɔ ipɛmi nɛ mba ɔbe ɔbɔrɛ wũ i kanya ame fiɛ ɔ̃ katɔ̃ to kafiɛ lɛ kuɣɛ̃ ku kakɔme.
Gɔ lonya wũ ne, lobɔrɛ lofere i ɔ̃ ngbatɔ̃ lɛ kpise, ɣɛɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ ɔsia me iso ɔɣere me sɔ, “Daanigã! Mme nɖe Ɔɖeakatɔ̃ gu Ɔtsɔra.
Mme nsi ngbã! Loɔkpi lonya, ɣɛɛ ne, ka losi ngbã mɛ nna katui. Kukpi gu ikpibiɔ sibɔi pia me i nrɔɔ̃ ame.
Kiniɔ ne, tsɛrɛ ara wa anya, nwa mpia kiniɔ gu nwa nto aaba i ɔwi kama sɛ.
Iwɛrɛra nɛ i awami akɔdzɛ gu sikaniɛdziri ikɔdzɛ dzɛmɔ to ite nɖe sɔ awami akɔdzɛ nɖe Ɣaa makpabo ma nto manyɔ mafɔɖedze akuri akɔdzɛ iso fiɛ sikaniɛdziri ikɔdzɛ dzɛmɔ nɖe mafɔɖedze akuri akɔdzɛ.”
“Tsɛrɛ itɔ̃me nɛgbe tã Efeso mafɔɖedze ikuri kpabo sɔ,
Mme Yesu gɔ lomɔɛ̃ awami akɔdzɛ ɔto i kuɖearɔ̃, fiɛ ɔsɛ i sikãrɛtɛa sikaniɛdziri ikɔdzɛ ndɛ̃ itɔ̃me i ngbe ne.

Loɣe fɔ kurabarara. Loɣe fɔ kubɛ gu kumɛgɔ asɛ ana ɔtu i inyɛwe ame. Loɣe sɔ aisɛ anagu ara lalaa mabaradze isoɣɔ. Mma nsɛ makpere so sɔ katɔ̃memasɛdze maɖe, ɣɛɛ maiɖe ne, ɔɔkere ma anyɔ fiɛ atsue sɔ maladze maɖe.
Loɣe kumɛgɔ aɣara so ana ɔtu i inyɛwe ame ala wũ iyere ɔso fiɛ iiɖa-ɔ.
Ɣɛɛ iɣɛrɛ nɛ lonya i fɔ iso nɖe sɔ, aisito aɖɔɛ me lɛ ɔwi gɔ lofe ame.
Ne ɔso nyɔ fɔ kayakɔ̃ ngbegɔ akpase abɔrɛ si afiniki abara ara wa ala ɔɔbara ku ɔkpɛ ɖeakatɔ̃. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, loto loaba loamɔɛ̃ fɔ ɔkaniɛdziri loɖi i ɔ̃ kayakɔ̃.
Ɣɛɛ ira ka iwɛ̃ nɛ mba me ɔmɛrɛ̃ i fɔ iso nɖe sɔ, aisɛ aɖɔɛ ma Nikolaise kurabarara lɛ kumɛgɔ mme wũ loisɛ loɖɔɛ kɔ̃.
Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri. Ngɔ loɖe iso ne, loatã wũ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃aɖe idziribi nɛ nsɛ itã ngbã fiɛ ipia i Ɣaa Paradiso ame.”
Ne ɔɣere me sɔ, “Tsɛrɛ sese kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ Smirna mafɔɖedze ikuri iso sɔ,
Mme Yesu gɔ nɖe Ɔɖeakatɔ̃ gu Ɔtsɔra, ngɔ loɔkpi ɔnya fiɛ ɔta ne, mme nto loɣɛ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne.
Loɣe fɔ inyɛwe gu fɔ siwɛrɛba, ɣɛɛ ranase aɖe fiɛ. Loɣe kumɛgɔ i mma nsɛ makpere so sɔ ma Yudase maɖe, ɣɛɛ maiɖe to manina-ɔ iyere. Ɔbosam masiaidze maɖe ne iiɖe Ɣaa masiai.

Midaanigã inyɛwe kuiwɛ̃ nɛ loaba mi iso. Minyɔ! Ɔbosam to ɔ̃ala mi mawɛ̃ ɔnyɔ ɔtã mamɔɛ̃ mi mapia i iyo fiɛ maabara mi ɔtile ayi aweo. Miya teteree i wũ iyere ame si inya kɔra sɔ miakpi fiɛ loatã mi ngbã mɛ nna katui lɛ mi kuso.
Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri. Ngɔ loɖe iso ne, kukpi nyɔare iibana ɔle i ɔ̃ iso.”
Ne ɔɣere me sɔ, “Tsɛrɛ sese kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ Pergamo mafɔɖedze ikuri iso sɔ,
Mme Yesu gɔ mba ibe inyɔ ipɛmi nɛ mba ɔbe itɔ̃me nɛ loɣɛ i ngbe ne.

Loɣe sɔ ngbegɔ misi nɖe Ɔbosam sigarakaɖekɔ̃, ɣɛɛ mimɔɛ̃ wũ iyere mito teteree. Mi kafɔkaɖe i wũ ame ana iiti nane ɔwi gɔ ame maɖoe wũ ɔɖabo bielea Antipa gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ wũ itɔ̃me i ngbegɔ i Ɔbosam si i mmɔ.

Ɣɛɛ aɣɛrɛ awɛ̃ wa lonya i mi iso nɖe sɔ, mawɛ̃ ma nsɛ masiai Balam ara ite pia i mi ndɛ̃. Balam gɔgbe ɔɖe lote Balak kumɛgɔ ɔ̃abara fiɛ Israel mabi aaɣɛrɛ fiɛ maaɖe ara wa masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ makuti maɖe asɔrɔ̃ ne.
Ngbɔ ame i maturi pia i mi ndɛ̃ gɔ masiai ma Nikolaise ara ite ne.
Mifiniki mibɔrɛ i mi ikpi ame, si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, loto loaba mi kɔrɛ mala loba loakpɛ̃gu mmamɔ ala wũ kanya ame itɔ̃me nɛ nse lɛ ipɛmi awe.

Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri. Ngɔ loɖe ikpi iso ne, loatã wũ mana gɔ i Ɣaa ɔkɔla ɔɖe fiɛ loatã wũ ita fudza nɛ iso matsɛrɛ iyere ɣɛtɛ nɛ i kuwɛ̃ iiɣe iɖo ngɔ matã ɔnɔwɛ̃ loatsue ne.”
“Tsɛrɛ tã kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ Tiatira mafɔɖedze ikuri iso sɔ,
Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i Ɣaa Ɔbi gɔ anɔmi nse lɛ itɔkpe fiɛ ɔ̃ ngba to mifiɛ lɛ ibɔra rɛtɛa kɔrɛ.
Loɣe fɔ kurabarara. Loɣe fɔ kuɖɔɛ gu kumɛgɔ asɛ abara ara i ɔri iso gu fɔ karabara gu fɔ iɣaraso. Loɣe sɔ ato apia kubɛ kiniɔ aɖo ɔwiɔ.
Ɣɛɛ iɣɛrɛ nɛ lonya i fɔ iso nɖe sɔ, atã ɔrɔ̃go Isabel gɔ nsɛ ɔkpere so sɔ Ɣaa kpabo ɔri. Iki i ɔ̃ ara ite ame ne, ɔtã sɔ wũ maɖabo to maɖe asɔrɔ̃ fiɛ mato maɖe aɖera wa masu masɔrɛ ala aɣɔ.
Lotã wũ ɔwi sɔ ɔfiniki, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ibanyua asɔrɔ̃ iɖe.
Ne ɔso loto loapɛ wũ lorara i ɔnyɛkala iso fiɛ ma gu mma loɖe asɔrɔ̃ aawe inyɛ teteree. Loto loabara ma ngbɔ si maifiniki mabɔrɛ i ɔtile ara wa mato mabaragu wũ ame.
Loto loaɖoe ɔ̃ masiaidze ana si mafɔɖedze akuri ɔɖuɖu aatsue sɔ, mme nsɛ lonyɔnyɔ ɔturi biara iti gu ɔtu ame pelepele fiɛ loatã ɔbiara kuso i nnɛ ɔbara kanya.
Ɣɛɛ mi matsɔra i Tiatira ma loifɔ Isabel ara ite wa mato marɔ sɔ Ɔbosam ara ite nɛ lobua iwodoro ne, lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ loisibasia mi ato mama iso.
Ɣɛɛ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loaba ne, mɔɛ̃ nnɛ aba la teteree.
Ngɔ lomɔɛ̃ wũ karabara ɔla ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo kawirikɔ̃ fiɛ ɔɖe iso ne, loatã wũ ɔle i kayiiso nɖebi iso.
‘Ɔ̃aɖe ma iso ala ibɔradziri
fiɛ ɔ̃abiɛbiɛ ma wɔsɔwɔsɔ
lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ mabiɛ ibui.’
Loto loatã wũ ɔle lɛ kumɛgɔ i wũ Ɔse ɔtã me.
Loatã mafiɛ lɛ kaya iwãmi.
Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri.”
“Tsɛrɛ sese mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ i Sardis kpabo sɔ,
Ngɔ mba Ɣaa Siwarã aka akɔdzɛ gu awami akɔdzɛ sɔ,
Loɣe fɔ karabara ga abara. Loɣe sɔ afɔ iyere sɔ apia ngbã, ɣɛɛ ne, ɔɔkpi.
Rɛgɛ̃ si apia nnɛ lokuti fiɛ iakpi ɔle. Alasɔ lonya sɔ fɔ karabara iikote i wũ Ɣaa katɔ̃.
Ne ɔso nyigi ara wa mate-ɔ gu nwa anɔ. Mɔɛ̃ wã la si afiniki. Nyɔ tuee, alasɔ aibatsue ɔwi gɔ loaba lobɔrɛ-ɔ iso lɛ yukukpe awe
Ɣɛɛ maturi irɛ̃saã ɔkuti mapia i Sardis gɔ maiɣɛra ma awu. Mato maapia ma awu fudza masiai me alasɔ ma lokote ne.
Ngɔ loɖe iso ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃apia wũ awu fudza ngbɔ fiɛ loibanukutu ɔ̃ iyere loɖi i magbanadze ɔko ame. Loaɖi wũ kanya i wũ Ɔse gu ɔ̃ makpabo katɔ̃ sɔ wũ ɔlaa ɔɖe.
Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri.”
“Tsɛrɛ sese Filadelfia kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ mafɔɖedze ikuri iso sɔ,
Ngɔ nɖe Ɔturi Sekelea gu Ɔnukuarese fiɛ David ɔbɔi pia wũ i nrɔɔ̃ ame, ngɔ si ɔsese kukui ne, kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔsɛ̃, fiɛ si ɔsɛ̃ ana ne, kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔsese ne, ɔ̃ nto ɔɣɛ sɔ,
Loɣe fɔ karabara ga abara. Nyɔ! Losɛ-ɔ kayogodɔ̃ ga losese kase i fɔ katɔ̃ ga i kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔsɛ̃. Alasɔ atoa sɔ ɔle kɛkɛĩ kere aba ne, amɔɛ̃ wũ itɔ̃me ato fiɛ aisɛ̃ me ana.
Minyɔ, mawɛ̃ pia gɔ maɖe Ɔbosam ikuri ame maturi. Mmagbe sɛ maɣɛ sɔ ma Yudase maɖe, ɣɛɛ maiɖe ma Yudase, maladze maɖe. Nyɔ, mato maaba maapɛ agɛgɛ̃ i fɔ ngbatɔ̃ fiɛ ma ɔɖuɖu aatsue sɔ loto loɖɔɛ-ɔ.
Gɔ amɔɛ̃ wũ itɔ̃me ala fiɛ ana ɔtu i fɔ inyɛwe ɔɖuɖu ame ɔso ne, mme wũ loaɖi-ɔ i kalakanyɔ ga mba ɔle fiɛ kaaba i kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu iso ame.
Loto loba i ɔwi kurukutu ame. Ne ɔso mɔɛ̃ nnɛ aba la teteree sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibafɔ-ɔ fɔ sigaraikoto iso.

Ngɔ loɖe iso ne, loasu wũ lobara ikpa i wũ Ɣaa kasɔrɛkɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃isibabɔrɛ i mmɔ ɔnya. Loatsɛrɛ wũ Ɣaa iyere gu wũ Ɣaa ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ nɖe Yerusalem ɣɛtɛ gɔ loso ɔbɔrɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ i kato iyere losia wũ iso, fiɛ loatsɛrɛ mme mɔmɔ iyere ɣɛtɛ ana losia wũ iso.
Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri.”
“Tsɛrɛ ɔko tã Laodikea mafɔɖedze ikuri kpabo sɔ,
Ngɔ nsɛ ɔtã ira biara ɔba i ne ame fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri iso gu aɖansiɛ nukuarese, ngɔ iso i Ɣaa ɔki ɔbara ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔɖuɖu itɔ̃me i ngbe ne.
Loɣe fɔ kurabarara. Ana ɔtɔ, fiɛ aiɣɔ ana. Ɔbie lobie sɔ aawe ɔtɔ ɣee aaɣɔ.
Ɣɛɛ gɔ ase kpiɛkpiɛ fiɛ ana ɔtɔ, aiɣɔ ana ɔso ne, loatua-ɔ loɖi i wũ kanya ame!
Asɛ aɣɛ sɔ ranase aɖe, aba ara fiɛ kuira iinya-ɔ. Ɣɛɛ aiɣe sɔ wɛrɛba gu ngɔ ara mba nnya gu ngɔ mpia i kusa ame gu nɔbiɛdze gu ngɔ nsɛ isɔ̃ aɖe.
Ne ɔso loto loka-ɔ sɔ ba ɣa sikãrɛtɛa sɛɛ dzɛ mawɛnɛkɛ̃ra i ɔtɔ ame i wũ kɔrɛ si aakpese ranase. Ɣa ɔkati fudza nyɔmɛ si aibasɛ isɔ̃ kunuarɛ ɔkpɛ̃-ɔ. Si aɣa anɔmi kua ana pia fɔ anɔmi si aanya ara.
Mma loto loɖɔɛ ne, ma losɛ lonyagalagu fiɛ ma losɛ lokpadzɛ̃ kutsue ne. Ne ɔso pia kubɛ si afiniki.
Nyɔ! Loɣɛ i kayogodɔ̃ loto lokpukpura kukui kɔrɔ̃. Si ɔrere ɔnɔ me silɔ fiɛ ɔsese me ne, loabo i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Loaɖegu wũ aɖera, ɔ̃ wũ ɔɖegu me aɖera.
Ngɔ loɖe iso ne, loatã ɔsɛgu me i wũ sigaraiyara iso lɛ kumɛgɔ mme wũ loɖe iso fiɛ losi i wũ Ɔse kɔrɛ i ɔ̃ sigaraiyara iso.
Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri.”
Nwagbe kama ne, lonya kayogodɔ̃ ga losese kase i kato.
Ne silɔ dzɛ loɖe katɔ̃ siɖegu me ika fiɛ sire lɛ kadadã ɔkpere me siɣere sɔ, “Ya ba i kato ngbe si loɖi ara wa loaba i nwagbe kama lote-ɔ.”
Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Ɣaa Siwarã ɔbo i wũ ame lonya sigaraiyara i kato nɛ iso i ɔwɛ̃ si.
Ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso to ɔfiɛ lɛ yaspa gu sardis ata wa lofɔ kuɣa fiɛ ɔbebei gɔ nto ɔfiɛ teteree lɛ emerald ita ɔki ilɔ sigaraiyara.
Sigaraayara sinyɔ-ana mama ana ɔki alɔ sigaraiyara nɛgbe fiɛ makpakpa sinyɔ-ina ma mpia awu fudza fiɛ matɔ̃me sikãrɛtɛa sigaraikoto si i sigaraiyara wagbe iso.
Kado imama gu kado iɖu gu silɔ agbãagbã to abɔrɛ i sigaraiyara ame. Sikaniɛ aka akɔdzɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ sito i sigaraiyara katɔ̃. Nwagbe nɖe Ɣaa Siwarã aka akɔdzɛ ne.
I sigaraiyara katɔ̃ ne, ira iwɛ̃ nɛ nse lɛ ɔpo nɛ masu aɣɔɣɔɛ wa ame lobua akpa mabara ala se, fiɛ ne ame ɔkpa waĩ.
Ara ana awɛ̃ wa mba ngbã fiɛ anɔmi ɔyi wã iso katɔ̃ gu kama ɔki alɔ sigaraiyara kakɔi biara.
Ara wa mba ngbã ngbe iɖeakatɔ̃ se lɛ dzata, inyɔare se lɛ nantsuĩrɛrɛ̃, itɛare katɔ̃ se lɛ ɔturi kare fiɛ inaare se lɛ finikpo gɔ nto ɔfɛrɛrɛ awe.
Ara ana wa mba ngbã ngbe ɔɖuɖu ba abue akuɔ akuɔ, fiɛ wã iso kakɔi biara ɔyi ku anɔmi. Kasɛ̃ i kakɔme ne, ato kuka gɔ aisɛ alo sɔ,
“Isekele, isekele, isekele
nɖe Bosate Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate
ngɔ loɔsɛ ngbã ɔnya, fiɛ ɔsi ngbã, fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃aledza iba.”
Ɔwi biara ne, ara wa mba ngbã ngbe to asu ile gu kato ikɔlɛ gu siba ipɛ atã ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso fiɛ ɔ̃ibakpi ɔnya.
Si ato abara ngbɔ ne, makpakpa sinyɔ-ina mamɔ sɛ makɔlɛ mafu i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ masɔrɛ ɔ̃ gɔ nsi ngbã ɔwi biara. Masɛ maɖi ma sigaraikoto masɛ i sigaraiyara katɔ̃ maka kuka male wũ maɣɛ sɔ,
“Bosate gu Ɣaa!
Isekele, kuwarɛ gu ɔle ɔkotegu-ɔ.
Alasɔ fɔ lobara ara ɔɖuɖu,
abara wã fiɛ atã apia ngbã
i fɔ kuɖɔɛ kanya.”
Nwagbe kama ne, lonya ɔko ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔto i kuɖearɔ̃. Matsɛrɛ ara masia i katɔ̃ gu kama ɔɖuɖu, ɣɛɛ masɛ̃ wũ ala atsuebi akɔdzɛ sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔbusi.
Lonya Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ gɔ mba ɔle to ɔya isã teteree sɔ, “Nna lokate sɔ ɔ̃aɖi atsuebi fiɛ ɔ̃abusi ɔko gɔgbe?”
Ɣɛɛ mainya kuwɛ̃ i kato, ɣee karɔ̃ iso, ɣee karɔ̃ ame gɔ loawo ɔko ɔbusi ɣee ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ ame.
Lobiɛ kaku gbaã alasɔ kuwɛ̃ iikate sɔ ɔ̃abusi ɔko, ɣee ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ ame.
Mmɔ i makpakpa mamɔ ɔwɛ̃ to ɔɣere me sɔ, “Daabiɛ! Nyɔ! Dzata gɔ lobɔrɛ i Yuda kalɛ ame fiɛ ɔɖe David ɔwa tɛtɛ ɔɔɖe iso fiɛ ɔkate sɔ ɔ̃aɖi atsuebi akɔdzɛ wa masu masɛ̃ ala ɔko fiɛ ɔ̃abusi wũ.”

Lonya gɔ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi iwɛ̃ ɣɛ i sigaraiyara ndɛ̃ndɛ̃ fiɛ ara wa mba ngbã aka ana wamɔ gu makpakpa ɔki malɔ ne. Ibara lɛ ɔɖoe maɔɖoe Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi manya. Iba asa akɔdzɛ gu anɔmi akɔdzɛ. Anɔmi akɔdzɛ wagbe nɖe Ɣaa Siwarã aka akɔdzɛ dzɛ ɔsese kayiiso ɔɖuɖu ne.
Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔsɛ ikɛlɛ isɛ iafɔ ɔko i ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso kuɖearɔ̃ ame.

Gɔ ifɔ ɔko ne, ara wa mba ngbã aka ana wamɔ gu makpakpa sinyɔ-ina ɔkɔlɛ mafu i Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi katɔ̃. Sisango gu sikãrɛtɛa arɔi pia i ma ɔbiara nrɔɔ̃ ame. Kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a gɔ nɖe Ɣaa maturi kayi ikparama ɔyi sikãrɛtɛa arɔi wagbe pɔpɔɔpɔ.
Maka kuka ɣɛtɛ kuwɛ̃ sɔ,
“Fɔ lokate sɔ aafɔ ɔko gɔgbe
fiɛ aaɖi ɔ̃ atsuebi gbaã
Alasɔ fɔ maɖoe,
fiɛ iki i fɔ ima nɛ asu asɔrɛ ame ne,
afɔ maturi aɣa atã Ɣaa.
Afɔ maturi abɔrɛgu i ɔkparɛ biara, kaɖe biara, siɖe biara,
gu maturi agbãagbã ndɛ̃.
Asu ma abara masɔrɛdze kaɖe sɔ maasɔrɛ bo Ɣaa,
fiɛ maaɖe sigara i kayiiso.”
Si loledza inyɔ kere ne, lonɔ Ɣaa makpabo kukpikukpi ma i kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔka ɣɛ maki malɔ sigaraiyara, ara wa mba ngbã aka ana gu makpakpa sinyɔ-ina, to maɖi silɔ.
I kuka teteree ame sɔ,
“Fɔ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nɛ maɖoe ne,
fɔ lokate sɔ aafɔ ɔle, karana, inɔgba, iwobara,
kuwarɛ, ile gu katoikɔlɛ.”
Ne lonɔ ara wa ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa ɔbara, nwa mpia i kato gu karɔ̃, karɔ̃ ame, ɔpo ame gu ara wa ɔɖuɖu mpia i wã ame to aɣɛ sɔ,
“Ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔkpɛ nɖe ile, kuwarɛ, ikpawaĩ gu ɔle kayi daaro.”
Ara wa mba ngbã aka ana wamɔ ɔfɔ kanya sɔ, “Si iba ngbɔ!” Ɔluwɛ̃ makpakpa ɔkɔlɛ mafu katɔ̃ i karɔ̃ masɔrɛ Ɣaa gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ ibi.
Lonya Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi atsuebi akɔdzɛ wamɔ iɖeakatɔ̃. Ne lonɔ ara wa mba ngbã aka ana wamɔ iwɛ̃ ɔɖe ika lɛ kado loɖu iɣɛ sɔ, “Ba!”
Lonyɔ ne, ipɔngɔ fudza iwɛ̃ ɣɛ. Ngɔ nsi i ne iso to kuta fiɛ masu sigaraikoto iwɛ̃ matã wũ. Ɔbɔrɛ lɛ ngɔ loɔɖe iso awe, fiɛ ɔbɔrɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɖe iso.
Ne kama ne, Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi itsuebi nyɔare, ne lonɔ ara wa mba ngbã inyɔare ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ba!”
Ipɔngɔ mama nɛ lorɛtɛ pɛɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ. Ɣaa ɔtã ngɔ nsi i ne iso ɔle sɔ ɔmɔɛ̃ isobuɛ ɔɖi i kayiiso sɔ maturi aaɖoe so. Ne Ɣaa ka ɔsu ipɛmi siare iwɛ̃ ɔtã wũ ne.
Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi itsuebi tɛare, ne lonɔ ara wa mba ngbã itɛare ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ba!” Lonyɔ ne, ipɔngɔ kpinakpina iwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ iya. Ngɔ nsi i ne iso to ikerera.
Lonɔ nnɛ lore silɔ ɔbɔrɛ i ara wa mba ngbã aka ana ndɛ̃ siɣɛ sɔ, “Kakpã igaku si ifɔ ikpɛnɛ kuso si arĩ agaku atɛ si afɔ ikpɛnɛ kuso, ɣɛɛ daanina nnɔĩ gu ndã!”
Nnɛgbe kama ne, Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi itsuebi naare, ne lonɔ ara wa mba ngbã inaare ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ba!”

Lonyɔ ne, ipɔngɔ nɛ iso nse lɛ ndɔ̃ ɔbɔrɛ. Ngɔ nsi i ne iso iyere nɖe kukpi fiɛ ikpibiɔ siai wũ i kama. Ɣaa ɔtã ma ɔle i kayiiso maturi ma ɔɖuɖu mpia si maɣɛ ma aka ana ika iwɛ̃ iso sɔ masu kakpã, kukã, sinyɛ lalaa gu mabɔi lalaa maɖoe maturi.
Gɔ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi itsuebi ruva ne, lonya mma maɖoe alasɔ mato maɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me ɔso gu mma loɖe aɖansiɛ i ɔ̃ iso sikala i Isɔrɛkasege kayirinɔ.
Mmagbe sikala ɔla kulu teteree sɔ, “Bosate gɔ nto ɔɖe iso, sekelese gu nukuarese, ku mme ɔwi kowũ aaɣɛgu mma loɖoe bo i kayiiso atɔ̃me fiɛ aakarɛ bo iti?”
Masu awu fudza tagbaraa matã ma ɔbiara. Ne maɣere ma sɔ maɣara so kɛkɛĩ si masu ma manyii gu ma maɖabo laa ma maaɖoe sikala mabua i ma sire iso sɔ maayi mma ɖoɖooɖo lokote sɔ maaɖoe lɛ ma.
Ne kama ne, lonya Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi itsuebi kuɔva. Karɔ̃ ɔti teteree, kuɣɛ̃ ɔbara kpinakpina lɛ aɣɔgɛrɛĩ, fiɛ ɔgbaworeti ɔkpese lɛ ima.
Awãmi ɔkpase afere i karɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i adziribi yuɛ sɛ akpa si awɛ ɔkpɛ̃.
Kuɖokpo ɔkarĩ lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ makarĩ ɔko fiɛ marui abe gu kubemi gɔ ɔɖuɖu i ndu ɔki milɔ i kɔ̃ kuwekɔ̃.
Kayiiso magara, mma nto maɖe iso, makpakpɛ̃dze makpakpa, maranase, sile masate gu maturi tsɔra ɔɖuɖu, masande gu mma loiɖe masande ɔkɔla so i sikpolo ame gu atawo wa mpia i abe ndɛ̃ ame.
Maɣere abe gu ata siare sɔ, “Mibiɛ mifu bo iso si boawɛrɛ i ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi sikpã kanya.
Alasɔ ma sikpã iyi lalaa ɔɔba fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iibawo ne kanya ɔya!”

Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya Ɣaa makpabo ina ma nɣɛ i kayiiso akpakpai ana iso. Matɛ̃ ɔri sɔ ɔwiri kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaasikpɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i akpakpai ana wagbe iso i karɔ̃ iso o-o, ɔpo iso o-o, ɣee nane kudziri kukuwɛ̃ ame.
Loledza Ɣaa kpabo mama inya gɔ ɔbɔrɛ i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃ isɛ fiɛ ɔto Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã ikparĩ isiara. Ɣaa kpabo gɔgbe ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣere Ɣaa makpabo ina ma maɖi ɔri sɔ maate karɔ̃ gu ɔpo inyɛwe,
maɣɛ sɔ, “Midaabara karɔ̃ ɣee ɔpo, ɣee adziri kuira boa gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ bosu ikparĩ isiara bosia bo Ɣaa maɖabo ikparĩ i atɔngbo tɔtɔ.”
Ne marɔ maturi ma matã Ɣaa ikparĩ ala Ɣaa ikparĩ isiara i Israel nlɛ miweo-minyɔ ame lonɔ ne. Ma nɖe maturi kukpi kulafa sina-ina.
Maturi kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Yuda kalɛ ame.
Ma kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Ruben kalɛ ame.
Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Gad kalɛ ame.
Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Aser kalɛ ame.
Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ i Naftali kalɛ ame,
fiɛ kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Manase kalɛ ame.
Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Simeon kalɛ ame.
Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Levi kalɛ ame.
Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Isak kalɛ ame.
Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Zebulon kalɛ ame.
Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Yosef kalɛ ame.
Fiɛ kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Benyamin kalɛ ame.

Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya iturikuri siare nɛ i kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔka fiɛ mabɔrɛ i maturi agbãagbã ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃. Mabɔrɛ i kalɛ biara gu kaɖe biara gu siɖe biara dzɛ masɛ maɣɛ ame. Maya i sigaraiyara gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi katɔ̃. Ma ɔɖuɖu pia awu fudza tagbaraa fiɛ mato sikɛ.
Mato mala kulu teteree maɣɛ sɔ,
“Bo Ɣaa gɔ nsi
i sigaraiyara iso
gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nsɛ matã maturi ngbã.”
Ɣaa makpabo ɔɖuɖu ɣɛ maki malɔ sigaraiyara gu makpakpa gu ara ka ana wa mba ngbã, mapɛ agɛgɛ̃ mafu katɔ̃ i karɔ̃ i sigaraiyara katɔ̃ masɔrɛ Ɣaa
maɣɛ sɔ,
“Si iba ngbɔ!
ile gu ikpawaĩ,
gu iwola gu siba,
gu kuwarɛ gu ɔle gu kato ikɔlɛ nɖe bo Ɣaa ɔkpɛ,
ita i kiniɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ kayi daaro daaro!
Si iba ngbɔ.”
Makpakpa mamɔ ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔkarɛ me sɔ, “Mabe maɖe mpia awu fudza tagbaraa fiɛ lɛ mabɔrɛ?”
Ne lotã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Bosate, loiɣe, fɔ nɣe.”
Mmɔ ɔto ɔɣere me sɔ, “Mmagbe nɖe mma loki i inyɛwe siare ame mabɔrɛ ne. Mafore ma awu i Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ima ame afudza futututu.
Ne ɔso ne,
maɣɛ i Ɣaa sigaraiyara katɔ̃
mato masɔrɛ wũ kasɛ̃ i kakɔme i ɔ̃ isɔrɛyo.
Fiɛ ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso aawe i ma ndɛ̃ ɔdzuɛ̃ ma.
Ɔtukã ɣee kukã
iisibakpɛ̃ ma kunya.
Fiɛ kuɣɛ̃ ana iisibabɛbɛ ma kunya.
Alasɔ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nɛ mpia i sigaraiyara ndɛ̃ nɖe makɔdze.
Ɔto ɔ̃akɔ ma ɔkɛlɛgu ngbegɔ i ndu mɛ nsɛ mitã ngbã ɔgɔdɛ̃,
fiɛ Ɣaa aanukutu ma nnɔmɛ ɔɖuɖu i katɔ̃.”
Ɔwi gɔ i Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi itsuebi kɔdzɛva ne, kato ɔlo kananana lɛ ɔɖɔwũ ɔfã.
Ne lonya Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ ma nɣɛ i Ɣaa katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔtã ma kudadã kukɔdzɛ mato ne.

Ɣaa kpabo mama gɔ nto sikãrɛtɛa irɔi nɛ ame masɛ matsuedza kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a ɔba ɔ̃aya i isɔrɛkasege kɔrɛ. Masu kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a gbodzoo matã wũ sɔ ɔsu ɔbua i Ɣaa maturi ɔɖuɖu kayi ikparama iso si ɔtsuedza i sikãrɛtɛa isɔrɛkasege ga nɣɛ i sigaraiyara katɔ̃ iso.
Kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a gɔ mapia ɔtɔ ɔbɔrɛ kuɣɔ isakanya ku Ɣaa maturi kayi ikparama i Ɣaa kpabo gɔ nɣɛ i Ɣaa katɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ ame kukɛlɛ kato.

Ne kama ne, Ɣaa kpabo ɔɖi ɔtɔ i isɔrɛkasege iso ɔpia i irɔi nɛ ame masɛ matsuedza kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a ame ɔfuĩdza ɔsɛ i karɔ̃ iso. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, kado ɔɖu teteree, silɔ agbãagbã ɔre, kado ɔmama, fiɛ karɔ̃ ɔti.
Ne Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ ma nto kudadã ɔledza so matã kudadã ifɛ̃ ne.

Gɔ Ɣaa kpabo ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne, atumagɛrɛĩ gu ɔtɔ gɔ losakanya ku ima ɔpɛ ifere i karɔ̃ iso. Si maɣɛ karɔ̃ aka atɛ ne, ika iwɛ̃ ɔtsue. Si maɣɛ adziri wa nɣɛ i karɔ̃ iso aka atɛ ne ika iwɛ̃ gu sikua yuɛ ɔɖuɖu dzɛmɔ ana ɔtsue pelepele.
Gɔ Ɣaa kpabo nyɔare ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne, masu ira iwɛ̃ nɛ nse lɛ kube siare gɔ nto kutsue mafuĩdza mapia i ɔpo ame.
Si maɣɛ ɔpo aka atɛ ne, ika iwɛ̃ ɔkpese ima, ira biara nɛ mpia i ɔpo ame fiɛ iba ngbã ika tɛare ɔkpi fiɛ sikolo siare dzɛ ɔɖuɖu nsia i ɔpo iso ana ika tɛare ɔnina.
Gɔ Ɣaa kpabo tɛare ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne, iwãmi siare nɛ nto ifiɛ lɛ kaka ga matsue ɔkpase ibɔrɛ i kato ibo i siwore gu atubu ɔɖuɖu ika tɛare ame.
Iwami nɛgbe iyere nɖe kudziri gɔ mba ɔɖo. Siwore ika tɛare ame ndu ɔbara ɔɖoɖo fiɛ kabiɛtɛ ana ɔbo i me ame gɔ itã sɔ maturi gbodzoo ɔkpi.
Ne Ɣaa kpabo naare ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ira ɔ ɔwuĩ kuɣɛ̃ ika tɛare gu ɔgbaworeti ika tɛare gu awami ika tɛare ɔnyua ifiɛ. Nnɛgbe ɔtã sɔ ikpɛnɛ ika tɛare gu kasɛ̃ ika tɛare iisina ikpawaĩ.

Nwagbe kama ne, lonya finikpo ɔwɛ̃ to ɔfɛrɛrɛ i kato dzoroo fiɛ lonɔ ɔto ɔɣɛ teteree sɔ, “Ndzo, ndzo, ndzo miɖe mitã mi ma nsi i kayiiso, alasɔ kudadã tsɔra gɔ i Ɣaa makpabo itɛ ma lokuti aafɛ̃ ɔnyanyarĩ kuɖo.”
Gɔ Ɣaa kpabo ruva ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne, lonya iwãmi iwɛ̃ ɔkpase ibɔrɛ i kato iba iawuĩ i karɔ̃. Ɣaa ɔsu iwo gudua nɛ lobua iwodoro sibɔi ɔpia i iwãmi nrɔɔ̃ ame.
Gɔ ɔbusi iwo nɛgbe kanya ne, kuɣɔ lipii ɔtsɛ isakɛ ibɔrɛ lɛ ikpo siare ame kuto kubɔrɛ. Kuɣɔ ɔku kuɣɛ̃ ifiɛ ala kumɛgɔ kusi ɔso.
Kugbadzedzei ɔso kubɔrɛ i kuɣɔ ame kuba karɔ̃ iso, fiɛ Ɣaa ɔtã kɔ̃ kabiɛtɛ ga mba ɔle lɛ siboitɛtɛ ɔre.
Ɔɣere kɔ̃ sɔ kudaabara sikua, karɔ̃, aɣatati ɣee adziri kuira, ɣɛɛ kubara mma ɔɖuɖu nna Ɣaa ikparĩ i itɔngbo ɔtile.
Ɣaa ɔtã kɔ̃ ɔri sɔ kute maturi ɔɣiã awa aru, ɣɛɛ kudaaɖoe ma. Si kuta ɔturi ne, isɛ ibo lɛ ɔboitɛtɛ ibo awe.
I awa aru wagbe ame ne, maturi to maabie kukpi sɔ maakpi, ɣɛɛ maibana, kukpi to kuakpɛ̃ ma ɔkã, ɣɛɛ kuatere kuɣɛ ma.
Kugbadzedzei kumiamia se lɛ apɔngɔ wa manyi akpadza matã kakpã. Ira ɔ sia kɔ̃ ati lɛ sikãrɛtɛa sigaraikoto fiɛ kɔ̃ katɔ̃ se lɛ maturi kure.
Kɔ̃ iti siwɛrɛ̃ ɔkarã lɛ ɔrɔ̃go sire fiɛ kɔ̃ anyɛ se lɛ dzata are.
Kɔ̃ agbegbe akolo se lɛ ibɔra nɛ masɛ mafu igbegbe i kakpã ame. Kɔ̃ abue ipɛ to ire lɛ ibɔra makeke gu apɔngɔ gbodzoo wa nto akɛlɛ kakpã ame.
Kugbadzedzei gɔgbe sikã gu ara wa kusɛ kuta ala maturi se lɛ siboitɛtɛ sire fiɛ kɔ̃ sikã ame i nnɛ kuasu kute ala maturi ɔɣiã awa aru pia.
Kuba igara gɔ nɖe kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ iwo gudua nɛ lobua iwodoro iso. Ɔ̃ iyere nɖe Abadon i si Hebrise ame fiɛ masɛ makpere wũ sɔ Apolion i si Helase ame gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ raninadze ne.
Inyɛwe ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔɔfe, nyɔ, ikuti wã anyɔ mama wa nsɛ i kama.
Gɔ Ɣaa kpabo kuɔva ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne, lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i asa ana wa nɣɛ i sikã isɔrɛkasege ga nɣɛ i Ɣaa katɔ̃ ame.
Silɔ ɔɣere Ɣaa kpabo kuɔva gɔ nto kadadã sɔ, “Kurisi Ɣaa makpabo ina ma manyi masɛ i Frat ɔwore katɔ̃!”
Ne ɔso makurisi Ɣaa makpabo mamɔ. Maledza ma fiɛ ma wũ maledza so matã ɔɖɔwũ, iyi, kuwa gu ikɔ sɔ si maaɖoe kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ika tɛare.
Lonɔ sɔ makpakpɛ̃dze ma nsi i apɔngɔ iso kukame nɖe kukpi kuweo aka kukpi kuweo aka anyɔ.

Kumɛgɔ lonya apɔngɔ gu mma nsi wã iso i kaɖikate ame ngbe ne. Mapia abɔra i agbegbe, awɛ̃ ɔrɛtɛ lɛ ɔtɔ gɔ lowara, awɛ̃ ana se lɛ kuɖokpo gɔ lokpa, fiɛ awɛ̃ ana se lɛ iyata nɛ lorɛtɛ. Apɔngɔ ati se lɛ madzata fiɛ ɔtɔ gu kuɣɔ gu atɔgɛrɛĩ to abɔrɛ wã i kanya ame.
Masu ara ka atɛ wa maasu mate ala ɔturi ɔɣiã, wa nɖe ɔtɔ, kuɣɔ gu atɔgɛrɛĩ wa nto ɔbɔrɛ i apɔngɔ kanya ame maɖoe ala kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ika tɛare
Apɔngɔ ɔle pia i wã kanya ame gu wã sikã ame. Wã sikã se lɛ aɣɛ fiɛ aba iti. Sikã dzɛgbe asɛ asu ate ala maturi ɔɣiã ne.

Mma ɔɖuɖu lokuti fiɛ maikpi i inyɛwe nɛgbe ame ne, masɛ̃, maifiniki manyua ma ara wa masu ma arɔĩ mabara ɔsɔrɛ. Mainyua siwarã lalaa, sikãrɛtɛa gu sikãfudza, ibɔra rɛtɛa gu ara wa mawe ala kudziri wa loisɛ anya ara, ɣee anɔ ara, ɣee asɛ isɔrɛ.
Maifiniki manyua ma ituriɖoe, sibɔ ipɛ, asɔrɔ̃ iɖe gu kayu.
Ne kama ne, lonya Ɣaa kpabo mama gɔ mba ɔle ɔso ɔbɔrɛ i kato. Ɔɣɛ i adɔdɔ ndɛ̃ fiɛ ɔbebei ɔki ɔlɔ ɔ̃ iti. Ɔ̃ katɔ̃ to kafiɛ lɛ kuɣɛ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ ngba se lɛ ɔtɔ akpa.
Ɔmɔɛ̃ kakoi kawɛ̃ ga mabusi ɔto i kɔrɔ̃. Ɔsu ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃kpa ɔɣedza i ɔpo iso fiɛ kubenakpa ana ɣɛ i karɔ̃ iso.
Ne ɔfã teteree lɛ dzata nto ɔfafã. Gɔ ɔfã ne, kado iɖu ikpɛ ikɔdzɛ silɔ ɔre.
Gɔ kado iɖu ikpɛ ikɔdzɛ silɔ ɔre ne, lobie sɔ si lotsɛrɛ ara wa lonɔ losɛ, ɣɛ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔɖe me ika sibɔrɛgu i kato sɔ, “Sɛ̃ ara wa i kado iɖu aka akɔdzɛ ɔɣɛ sɛ ne daatsɛrɛ wã asɛ.”
Kere ne, Ɣaa kpabo gɔ lonya ɔɣɛ i ɔpo gu karɔ̃ iso ɔkɔlɛ ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ kato.
Ɔkã ndamu i Ɣaa gɔ nna kawirikɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ lobara kato gu kã ara ɔɖuɖu, karɔ̃ gu kã iso ara ɔɖuɖu, ɔpo gu ɔ̃ ame ara ɔɖuɖu iyere ame ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔwi inina kuiwɛ̃ iisibawe.
Si Ɣaa kpabo kɔdzɛva ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne, iyɔ Ɣaa adzuni wɛrɛa wa imomo i ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze ma nɖe ɔ̃ maɖabo ɔpɛ aaba i ne ame.”
Ne kama ne, silɔ dzɛ lonɔ lobɔrɛgu i kato ɔledza me ika iɖegu sɔ, “Kɛlɛ aafɔ kakoi ga mabusi fiɛ kapia i Ɣaa kpabo gɔ nɣɛ i karɔ̃ gu ɔpo iso nrɔɔ̃ ame.”
Ne ɔso lokɛlɛ Ɣaa kpabo kɔrɛ loɣere wũ sɔ ɔsu kakoi ɔtã me. Ɔɣere me sɔ, “Fɔ si awe. Ito iawe ɔɖo i fɔ kayiri ame, ɣɛɛ i fɔ kanya ame ne, iawe ɔmɛrɛ̃ lɛ maɣendu.”
Lofɔ kakoi i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ lowe. I wũ kanya ame ne, iwe me ɔmɛrɛ̃ lɛ maɣendu, ɣɛɛ gɔ lome ne, iwe ɔɖo i wũ kayiri ame.
Ne ɔɣere me sɔ, “Ikate sɔ aapɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me imomo atã nɖebi gbodzoo, maturi agbãagbã, siɖe agbãagbã, gu magara gbodzoo.”
Nnɛgbe kama ne, masu ɔdziri gɔ nse lɛ ngɔ masɛ masusu ala ara matã me ne Ɣaa ɔɣere me sɔ, “Kɛlɛ aasusu wũ isɔrɛyo gu isɔrɛkasege si aka mma nto masɔrɛ me i isɔrɛyo ame.
Ɣɛɛ daasusu isɔrɛyo katɔ̃, alasɔ masu mmɔ matã mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ maatutui sikpatɔrɛ̃ i ɔmagɛ̃ sekelea iso awa sina-inyɔ.
Loatã wũ maɖansiɛ inyɔ ɔle maɣɛ wũ Itɔ̃me i ayi kakpi gu alafa anyɔ gu sikuɔ ame mapia ara kpinakpina.”
Maɖansiɛ inyɔ magbe nɖe nnɔĩsidziri inyɔ gu sikaniɛdziri inyɔ dzɛ nɣɛ i karɔ̃ Sate anɔmi ame ne.
Si ɔrere ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abara ma ira boa ne, ɔtɔ sɛ ɔbɔrɛ i ma kanya ame ɔwɔra matsirise. Ngɔ loabie sɔ ɔ̃abara ma ira boa ne, ngbɔ maaɖoe wũ ne.
Maba ɔle sɔ gɔ mato maɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me ne, maasɛ̃ kuɖokpo sɔ kado iibapɛ. Maba ɔle ana sɔ maafinikira ndu mikpese ima fiɛ maakpadzɛ̃ inyɛwe biara igbã mabɔ i kayiiso ɔwi biara gɔ maɖɔɛ.
Si maɔɣɛ ma itɔ̃me maro ne, iyɔ bɔi lalaa gɔ lobɔrɛ i iwo gudua nɛ lowodoro ame to ɔ̃akpɛ̃gu ma ɔɖe ma iso fiɛ ɔ̃aɖoe ma.
Mato maanyua ma makpise masɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ iyere i igbã ame nɖe Sodom gu Egipte siri iso. Ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe ame iɖe mapɛ ma Ɔkɔse mamatãra i kudziri iso ne.
I ayi atɛ ku ɔfã ame ne, maturi to maabɔrɛ i kaɖe biara, kalɛ biara, siɖe biara gu maturi igbã biara ndɛ̃ maba maanyɔ ma makpise fiɛ maibatã ɔri sɔ mabiara ma.
Kayiiso maturi to maana isoɣɔ i maɖansiɛ inyɔ magbe kukpi iso. Mato maalɛlɛ, masese so ara alasɔ Ɣaa maɖansiɛ magbe ɔkpadzɛ̃ inyɛwe gbodzoo mabɔ kayiiso maturi iso.
I ayi atɛ ku ɔfã wamɔ kama ne, siwarã dzɛ nsɛ sitã ngbã ɔbɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ siba siabo i ma ame fiɛ mata maya! Ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ mma ɔɖuɖu lonya gbaã.
Ne kama ne, maɖansiɛ inyɔ magbe ɔnɔ silɔ teteree siwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i kato siɣere ma sɔ, “Miba i kato ngbe!” Ne ɔso i ma matsirise anɔmi ame ne, mabo i idɔdɔ iwɛ̃ ame makɛlɛ kato.
Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame tutuutu ne, kayi ɔti teteree gɔ itã ɔmagɛ̃ kusɛ kuweo ame iwɛ̃ ɔbiɛbiɛ wɔsɔwɔsɔ. Maturi kukpi kukɔdzɛ ɔkpi i karɔ̃ iti nɛmɔ ame. Ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ maturi tsɔra ne ɔso male Ɣaa gɔ mpia i kato.
Inyɛwe nɛ mba ifɔ̃ nyɔare ɔɔfe, nyɔ itɛare to iba kiniɔkiniɔ.
Ne kama ne, Ɣaa kpabo kɔdzɛva ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã. Silɔ agbãagbã ɔre teteree i kato sɔ,
“Kayi gagbe sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔɔkpese Bo Ɣaa
gu ɔ̃ Kristo ɔkpɛ,
fiɛ ɔ̃aɖe sigara ita i kiniɔ ikpa kayi daaro.”
Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, makpakpa sinyɔ-ina ma nsi i ma sigaraiyara iso i Ɣaa katɔ̃ ɔta makɔlɛ mafu i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ male Ɣaa.
Maɣɛ sɔ,
“Bosate Ɣaa ɔle ɔɖuɖu Sate gɔ mpia fiɛ ɔ̃ɔwe ɔnya,
boto bopɛ-ɔ siba,
alasɔ asu fɔ ɔle siare
ato aɖe kayi iso.
Sikpã ɔkpɛ̃ mma loiɖe ma Yudase, fiɛ fɔ sikpã ɔwi ɔɔɣo.
Ɔwi ɔɔɣo gɔ aaɣɛgu makpise atɔ̃me,
fiɛ aakpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue.
Ɔwi ɔɔɣo ana gɔ aatã fɔ kanyamaɖidze,
ma losɔrɛ-ɔ, fɔ maturi gu mma nsɛ manigã fɔ iyere ɔɖuɖu kuso,
maturi nyaa gu mma nna i kuira ame,
fiɛ aawɔra mma nto manina kayiiso.”
Ɣaa isɔrɛyo nɛ i kato ɔsese fiɛ lonya kanya inyi aɖaka i isɔrɛyo ame. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, kado ɔma silɔ agbãagbã ɔre, kado ɔɖu, karɔ̃ ɔti, fiɛ atumagɛrɛĩ ɔpɛ teteree!
Iwawãra siare iwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i kuɖokpo. Ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ gɔ losu kuɣɛ̃ ɔpia lɛ awu ɔbɔrɛ. Ɔgbaworeti pia wũ i ngbatata fiɛ sigaraikoto nɛ masu awami aweo-anyɔ mabara sia wũ iti.
Ɔto kayiri fiɛ kuɣe to kuɖoɖo wũ. Kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔnya ibo kaɖu ɔso ne, ɔto ɔla kulu teteree.
Iwawãra mama ana ɔledza ibɔrɛ i kato gɔ nɖe la siare rɛtɛa ɔwɛ̃. Ɔba ati akɔdzɛ, ɔre asa aweo fiɛ ɔtɔ̃me sigaraikoto akɔdzɛ.
Ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔkã ɔfiɛ awami wa ɔɖuɖu mpia i kato si maɣɛ wã aka atɛ ika iwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃afere i karɔ̃. Ne ɔso la ɔba ɔ̃aya i ɔrɔ̃go gɔ i kuɣe to kuɖoɖo katɔ̃ sɔ si ɔnya ɔɣe ɔbi ne, si ɔ̃asu ɔbi ɔme.
Ɔrɔ̃go ɔba ɔ̃aɣe ɔbirɛrɛĩ. Ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ loasu ibɔradziri ɔɖe kayiiso ɔɖuɖu iso ne. Mapɛ ɔbi mafɔ ɔluwɛ̃ makɛlɛgu Ɣaa gu ɔ̃ sigaraiyara katɔ̃.
Ne ɔrɔ̃go ɔtere ɔkɛlɛ fafuĩ ame ngbegɔ i Ɣaa ɔledza kasɛkɔ̃ ɔsɛ wũ sɔ maanyɔ wũ iso ayi kakpi gu alafa anyɔ gu sikuɔ ne.
Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, kakpã ɔpɛ i kato. Mikael gu ɔ̃ makpabo laa ɔrɔ aɣɛ kakpã, fiɛ aɣɛ gu ɔ̃ maɖabo ma wũ masarɛgu ma i kakpã ame.
Maɖe aɣɛ gu ɔ̃ maɖabo iso fiɛ maisina kasɛkɔ̃ i kato.
Ne ɔso masu aɣɛ siare mafuĩdza masese karɔ̃ iso. Wã nɖe aɣɛ kuere wa lofɔ iyere sɔ Ɔbosam gu Satana gɔ losɔsɔla kayiiso ɔɖuɖu ne. Ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ maɖabo mafuĩdza masese kayiiso ne.
Ne lonɔ silɔ ɔre teteree i kato sito siɣɛ sɔ,
“Kini i bo Ɣaa iɖi gu ɔ̃ ɔle gu sigara ɔɖewi ɔɣo ne.
Fiɛ ɔ̃ Kristo ɔle ana ɔɔba.
Alasɔ maɔsu ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖaɛ bo manyii kanya kasɛ̃ i kakɔme ɔtã Ɣaa mafuĩdza mabɔrɛgu i kato.
Maɖe wũ iso
iki i Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ima iso
gu Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ mapɛ imomo ame.
Alasɔ matɔrã kere sɔ maakpi
fiɛ ma ngbã iisu ma kuira.
Ne ɔso so si siɣɔ
kato gu mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i mmɔ.
Ɣɛɛ ndzo miɖe mitã karɔ̃ gu ɔpo!
Alasɔ Ɔbosam ɔso ɔba mi kɔrɛ
fiɛ sikpã to wũ gbaã,
alasɔ ɔɣe sɔ ɔ̃ ɔwi iisisi.”
Gɔ la ɔnya sɔ maɔfuĩdza wũ mabɔ karɔ̃ iso ne, ɔti ɔrɔ̃go gɔ loɣe ɔbirɛrɛĩ kama.
Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔsu finikpo siare abue anyɔ ɔtã ɔrɔ̃go sɔ ɔfɛrɛrɛ ɔɣɛ la ɔkɛlɛ fafuĩ ame ngbegɔ maledza masɛ wũ fiɛ maakararã wũ akɔ atɛ gu awa akuɔ sɔ la iisibawo wũ kutsuɛ ɔɖaa.
Ne la ɔra ndu mɛ losi lɛ ɔwore siare sɔ si misore ɔrɔ̃go ne,
ɣɛɛ karɔ̃ ɔfɔgu ɔrɔ̃go gɔ kawarɛ kanya kanɛ ndu mɛ ɔɖuɖu i la ɔra.

Sikpã lalaa ɔmɔɛ̃ la i ɔrɔ̃go iso, ne ɔso ɔkɛlɛ sɔ ɔ̃akpɛ̃gu ɔ̃ mabi gu mawa ma lokuti. Ma nɖe mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ mabara i Ɣaa mmara iso fiɛ mamɔɛ̃ ɔnukuare itɔ̃me nɛ maɖi mate ma i Yesu iso mato i ɔnukuare ame ne.
Ne la ɔsɛ ɔ̃aya i ɔpo kanya ne.
Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya bɔi lalaa ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ɔto ɔbɔrɛ i ɔpo ame. Ɔba asa aweo, fiɛ ɔba ati akɔdzɛ. Ana ne, isa biara tɔ̃me sigaraikoto fiɛ matsɛrɛ mmusuo iyere masia i ɔ̃ ati iso.
Bɔi gɔ lonya se lɛ ɔgidi. Ɔ̃ ngba se lɛ iketeke mire fiɛ ɔ̃ kanya se lɛ dzata kare. La ɔsu ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔle gu ɔ̃ sigaraiyara gu ɔle siare gɔ ɔto ɔɖe iso ala ɔtã bɔi lalaa gɔgbe.
Bɔi iti iwɛ̃ ɔbara lɛ maɔɖoe ne manya, ɣɛɛ igbɛ siare nɛmɔ ɔɔkpi. Ne ɔso ɔ̃ ara ɔbara kayiiso maturi ɣii gɔ itã sɔ masiai wũ.
Maturi ɔsɔrɛ la alasɔ ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔle gɔ ɔba ɔtã bɔi gɔgbe. Masɔrɛ bɔi ana maɣɛ sɔ, “Nna nse lɛ bɔi gɔgbe? Nna loawo wũ ɔkpɛ̃gu?”
Matã bɔi ɔle sɔ ɔ̃akɔlɛ so kato ɔɣɛ amusuora gbodzoo fiɛ ɔ̃aɖe iso awa sina-inyɔ.
Ɔbusi kanya ɔɣɛ amusuora i Ɣaa gu ɔ̃ iyere gu ɔ̃ kasɛkɔ̃ gu mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i kato iso.
Matã wũ ɔri ana sɔ ɔkpɛ̃gu Ɣaa maturi si ɔɖe ma iso. Matã wũ ɔle ana i kalɛ biara, kaɖe biara, siɖe biara gu maturi igbã biara iso.
Mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i kayiiso fiɛ ma ayere na i Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nɛ maɖoe ngbã ɔko ame ita i kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ to maasɔrɛ bɔi.
Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ!
Si ɔrere ɔkate sɔ maamɔɛ̃ wũ sisande ne,
maamɔɛ̃ wũ sisande.
Si ɔrere ɔkate ɔtã iɖoe ala ipɛmi ne,
ipɛmi maaɖoe wũ ala.
Maɣɛ nnɛgbe sɔ Ɣaa maturi aawe ɔdzini i ma inyɛwe ame ku kafɔkaɖe.
Ne kama ne, lonya bɔi lalaa mama gɔ losakɛ ɔbɔrɛ i karɔ̃ ame. Ɔba asa anyɔ i iti lɛ kakpalasai fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe ika lɛ la awe.
Ɔbara ɔle gɔ ɔɖuɖu i bɔi lalaa ɖeakatɔ̃ ba karabara i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔɣiɛ kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu sɔ masɔrɛ bɔi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ lofɔ igbɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ iɣɛi ɔɔkpi.
Bɔi nyɔare gɔgbe ɔbara awawãra siare. Ɔtã ɔtɔ ɔkpase ɔbɔrɛ i kato ɔba karɔ̃ i maturi ɔɖuɖu anɔ.

Fiɛ ɔki i ɔ̃ awawãra ibara ame ɔsɔsɔla kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu i bɔi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔmɔ katɔ̃. Bɔi gɔgbe ɔɣere mma mpia i kayiiso sɔ mapɔ bɔi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ maɖi igbɛ ala ipɛmi fiɛ ɔpia ngbã kumiamia itĩ si masu mapia wũ kuwarɛ.
Matã bɔi lalaa nyɔare gɔgbe ɔle sɔ ɔwarã siwarã ɔpia i bɔi ɖeakatɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ nɛ mapɔ ame sɔ iawo ika ɔɖe, ana ne, iatã maɖoe mma losɛ̃ sɔ maito masɔrɛ ne.
Bɔi gɔgbe ɔɣiɛ maturi ɔɖuɖu, masiare gu ma nna i kuira ame, maranase gu mawɛrɛba, masande gu mma loiɖe masande sɔ mafɔ ikparĩ i ma kuɖearɔ̃ ɣee ma itɔngbo.
Ɔbiara gɔ loifɔ bɔi ikparĩ nɛ nɖe ɔ̃ iyere ne, ɣee ara kukame gɔ nɣɛ kutã ɔ̃ iyere ne, maitã wũ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃arɔdɛ̃ ara, ɣee ɔ̃aɣa kuira.
Iwola itɔ̃me iɖe i ngbe! Ɔbiara gɔ ikpa aanɔ ara kukame gɔ nɣɛ kutã bɔi gɔgbe karɔ̃, alasɔ ɔturi iyere iɣɛ itã. Kukame nɖe 666.
Ne kama ne, lonya Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi gɔ iɣɛ i Zion kube iso. Maturi kukpi kulafa sina-ina ma atɔngbo iso matsɛrɛ ɔ̃ iyere gu ɔ̃ Ɔse iyere masia ɣɛ wũ i kɔrɛ.
Lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ dzɛ nto sire lɛ ndu nto mikpase i ata iso, ɣee kado nto ɔɖu teteree i kato. Silɔ dzɛ lonɔ ɔre lɛ maturi sisango ifɛ̃ silɔ ana.
Mato maka kuka ɣɛtɛ i sigaraiyara gu ara wa mba ngbã aka ana gu makpakpa katɔ̃. Kuwɛ̃ iibawo kuka gɔmɔ ɔsuã iɖo maturi kukpi kulafa sina-ina ma iti ɔtã kuso i kayiiso ɔnɔwɛ̃.

Ma nɖe marɛrɛ̃ ma loirɛgu ɔrɔ̃go manya lɛ marɔ̃go ma loirɛgu ɔrɛrɛ̃ manya. Ma nɖe mma nsɛ masiai Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi makɛlɛ kakɔi biara ga ɔsɛ ne. Ma iti iɖe ɔtã kuso i maturi awune ndɛ̃ fiɛ ma nɖe maturi ɖeakatɔ̃ ma masu matã Ɣaa gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ne.
Maila sila manya, fiɛ mainya iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ ana i ma iso.

Lonya Ɣaa kpabo mama ana gɔ nto ɔfɛrɛrɛ i kato gu karɔ̃ ndɛ̃. Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ nna kawirikɔ̃ pia wũ i nrɔɔ̃ ame ɔ̃apɛ ne imomo ɔtã kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu, maturi agbãagbã, kalɛ biara, siɖe biara gu kaɖe biara.
Ɣaa kpabo ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Minigã Ɣaa si misu kuwarɛ mitã wũ, alasɔ ɔwi ɔɔɣo sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso maturi atɔ̃me. Misɔrɛ ɔ̃ gɔ lobara kato gu karɔ̃, ɔpo gu siwore dzɛ nto sibore sife ɔɖuɖu!”
Ɣaa kpabo nyɔare siai ɔɖeakatɔ̃ ɔto ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔ̃ɔbiɛ o-o! Babilonia gɔ lofɔ iyere ɔɔbiɛ o-o! Ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ lomidza nɖebi ɔɖuɖu ɔ̃ asɔrɔ̃ iɖe ndã fiɛ ɔkpadzɛ̃ Ɣaa sikpã ɔbɔ ma iso ɔɔbiɛbiɛ wɔsɔwɔsɔ!”
Ɣaa kpabo tɛare gɔ nsiai ngɔmɔ ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Si ɔrere ɔsɔrɛ bɔi lalaa ɣee ɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ, ɣee ɔfɔ ɔ̃ ikparĩ i itɔngbo, ɣee karɔtɔ̃ ne,
ɔ̃anɛ Ɣaa sikpã siare gu kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ndã mɛ mailupu ndu fiɛ mafere me i ibui ame miyi. Ɣaa aasu ɔtɔ gu atumagɛrɛĩ mabara ngɔmɔ kako i ɔ̃ makpabo sekelea gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi katɔ̃.
Kuɣɔ gɔ loabɔrɛ i ikpo nɛ ame ɔ̃ate ma kako iibanyi kunya! Mma losɔrɛ bɔi lalaa gu ɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ gu mma lofɔ ɔ̃ iyere ikparĩ iibana iwarã manya kasɛ̃ i kakɔme.
“Maɣɛ nnɛgbe sɔ si mma nɖe Ɣaa maturi fiɛ mamɔɛ̃ Ɣaa itɔ̃me mato fiɛ mafɔ Yesu maɖe ana aana ɔtu i inyɛwe ame.”

Ne lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i kato sito siɣɛ sɔ, “Tsɛrɛ nnɛgbe Ita i kiniɔ ne, so aaɣɔ mma mpia i Bosate ame fiɛ makpi.” Ne Ɣaa Siwarã ɔfɔ kanya sɔ, “Gbaã ne, maatã ma kusɛkusɛ fiɛ maana iwarã i ma inyɛwe ame, alasɔ ma kurabarara to kuasiai ma.”
Ne kama ne, lonya idɔdɔ fudza iwɛ̃ nɛ iso i ɔwɛ̃ si lɛ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi awe. Ɔtɔ̃me sikãrɛtɛa ikoto fiɛ ɔnyɔĩ gɔ mba ɔbe pia wũ i kɔrɔ̃ ame.
Ɣaa kpabo mama ɔbɔrɛ i Isɔrɛyo ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣere ngɔ nsi i idɔdɔ iso sɔ, “Ɔraɖui ɔsɔrɛ̃wi ɔɔɣo! Nabarã ɔnyɔĩ si asɔrɛ̃ ɔraɖui alasɔ kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔkote matã isɔrɛ̃.”
Ne ɔso ngɔ nsi i idɔdɔ iso ɔnabarã ɔ̃ ɔnyɔĩ ɔsese kayiiso ɔsɔrɛ̃ kã ɔraɖui.
Lonya Ɣaa kpabo mama ɔbɔrɛ i isɔrɛyo nɛ i kato ame. Ɔ̃ wũ ɔto ɔnyɔĩ gɔ mba ɔbe i kɔrɔ̃.

Ɣaa kpabo mama gɔ mba ɔle i ɔtɔ iso ɔbɔrɛ i isɔrɛkasege ame. Ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣere kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔĩ gɔ mba ɔbe i kɔrɔ̃ sɔ, “Adziribi wa loɣɔ̃ ɔɔbe! Nabarã fɔ ɔnyɔĩ si asɔrɛ̃ adziribi wa i kayiiso ndã kawakɔ̃ ame.”
Ne ɔso Ɣaa kpabo ɔnabarã ɔ̃ ɔnyɔĩ ɔsese i kayiiso ɔɖaɛ wain abi wa mpia i karɔ̃ iso. Ɔbodza wã ɔfere i nnɛ ame masɛ makã wain ame gɔ nnɛgbe nɣɛ i Ɣaa sikpã siare kanya.
Mabio adziribi i kabenya fiɛ ima to ibore ibɔrɛ i nnɛ ame masɛ makã adziribi. Iwodoro lɛ ngba miru fiɛ ibore agu alafa anyɔ.
Nwagbe kama ne, lonya iwawãra mama i kato nɛ mba ɣii gbaã. Ne nɖe Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ ma nrɔɔ̃ ame i inyɛwe aka akɔdzɛ pia ne. Inyɛwe akɔdzɛ wagbe nɖe atsɔra wa loaɖi Ɣaa sikpã tsɔra ate ne.
Lonya ɔpo gɔ nse lɛ aɣɔɣɔɛ wa ame lorɛtɛ lɛ ɔtɔ. Mma loɖe bɔi lalaa gu ɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ gu ɔ̃ iyere ara kukame iso ɣɛ i aɣɔɣɔɛ katɔ̃ fiɛ Ɣaa ɔpia ma sisango i nrɔɔ̃ ame.
Maka Mose gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔɖabo gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi kuka sɔ,
“Bosate Ɣaa gɔ nɖe ɔle ɔɖuɖu Sate, fɔ kurabarara ɔmɔ fiɛ kuse ɣaa gbaã.
Fɔ gɔ fɔ nɖe kayiiso ɔɖuɖu igara,
fɔ siri se bɔlɔlɔ
fiɛ aɖe ɔnukuarese.
Nna mpia fiɛ ɔ̃ibanigã-ɔ Bosate?
Fiɛ nna loibapia fɔ iyere kuwarɛ?
Alasɔ fɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ fɔ nse sekelee
fiɛ maturi ɔɖuɖu aabɔ ma ati karɔ̃ matã-ɔ.
Alasɔ maɔnya fɔ sibɔlɔlɔ kurabarara.”
Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya isɔrɛyo nɛ mpia i kato gu Ɣaa sikati ikpayo nɛ ame ɔsɛ ɔsɛ ɔsese ise.
Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ ma nto inyɛwe aka akɔdzɛ ɔbɔrɛ i isɔrɛyo. Mapia awu fudza wa nse sekelee fiɛ ato afiɛ gelegelegele. Masu sikãrɛtɛa kufiami matɔ so i agbegbe.
Ne ara wa mba ngbã aka ana iwɛ̃ ɔsu sikãrɛtɛa arɔi akɔdzɛ wa ame i Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã fiɛ ɔpia ɔwi biara sikpã pia ɔtã Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ magbe ne.
Kuɣɔ gɔ nto kubɔrɛ i Ɣaa ikpawaĩ gu ɔ̃ ɔle ame ɔyi Ɣaa isɔrɛyo kpitii. Kuwɛ̃ iiwo isɔrɛyo ame ɔbo gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ inyɛwe aka akɔdzɛ wa i Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ mamɔ ɔbɔ ɔfe aro.
Ne lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔre teteree si bɔrɛ i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ame si to siɣere Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ mamɔ sɔ, “Mikɛlɛ miafedza nnɛ mpia i Ɣaa sikpã arɔi ame mifere i kayiiso!”
Ne ɔso Ɣaa kpabo ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔsɛ ɔ̃afedza nnɛ mpia i ɔ̃ irɔi ame ɔfere i kayiiso. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, adzalebi aɣɛi wa nsɛ afɔrɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ afere i mma iso i bɔi lalaa ikparĩ sia gu mma losɔrɛ ɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ.
Ɣaa kpabo nyɔare ɔfedza nnɛ mpia i ɔ̃ irɔi ame ɔfere i ɔpo ame. Ndu mɛ mpia i ɔpo ame ɔkpese lɛ kpise ima, ne ɔso ara wa ɔɖuɖu mba ngbã i ɔpo ame ɔkpi.
Ɣaa kpabo tɛare ɔfedza ɔ̃ irɔi ɔfere i siwore gu atubu ame, ne sɛ̃ ndu ɔkpese ima ne.
Ne lonɔ kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ ndu iso ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Fɔ gɔ fɔ mpia fiɛ ɔɔwe anya fiɛ aɖe ngɔ losekele.
Aɖaɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri sɛɛ iso lo!
Mmagbe ɔɖoe fɔ maturi gu fɔ kanyamaɖidze.
Ne ɔso atã ma ima sɔ manɛ ne.
Kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛgbe ɔkategu ma!”
Ne lonɔ isɔrɛkasege to kaɣɛ sɔ, “Aĩ, Bosate Ɣaa, Ɔlesate, asɛ aɣɛ ɔnukuare fiɛ asɛ aɖaɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri iso.”
Ɣaa kpabo naare ɔfedza nnɛ mpia i ɔ̃ irɔi ame ɔfere i kuɣɛ̃ iso itã kutsuedza maturi ala kɔ̃ ɔtɔwiri.
Kuɣɛ̃ ɔbɛbɛ maturi teteree sɔ maɣɛ amusuora i Ɣaa gɔ mba ɔle i inyɛwe nɛgbe iso, ɣɛɛ masɛ̃ sɔ maibafiniki masu kuwarɛ matã wũ.
Ɣaa kpabo ruva ɔfedza ɔ̃ irɔi ɔfere i bɔi sigaraiyara iso. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, idududu ɔba i bɔi sigarakaɖekɔ̃. Maturi to mawe kanya ala ibo nɛ mato manya ɔso.
Maɣɛ amusuora i Ɣaa gɔ mpia i kato iso ala adzalebi aɣɛi wa nsia ma iso gu ibo nɛ mato manya ɔso. Ɣɛɛ masɛ̃ sɔ maibafiniki i ma kurabarara nyanyarĩa kama.
Ɣaa kpabo kuɔva ɔfedza nnɛ mpia i ɔ̃ irɔi ame ɔfere i Frat ɔwore siare ame gɔ itã sɔ ɔsɔ̃ ɔkpese kakorekɔ̃ gu ɔri ɔtã magara ma lobɔrɛ i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃.
Lonya siwarã lalaa aka atɛ wa nse lɛ akɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i la, bɔi lalaa gu mila kanyaɖidze kanya ame.
Siwarã aka atɛ dzɛgbe nɖe siwarã lalaa dzɛ nsɛ sibara awawãra ne. Siwarã dzɛgbe loabɔrɛ sikɛlɛ kayiiso magara ɔɖuɖu kɔrɛ sɔ siasa ma kanya sitã Ɣaa Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate Iyi siare nɛmɔ kakpã.
“Nyɔ! Loto loba lɛ yukukpe. So aaɣɔ ngɔ lonyɔ tuee fiɛ ɔledza ɔ̃ awu ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃ibasɛ isɔ̃ i maturi ndɛ̃ kunuarɛ ɔkpɛ̃ wũ.”
Ne ɔso siwarã lalaa dzɛgbe gu magara ɔba maasikanya i ngbegɔ masɛ marɔ i si Hebrise ame sɔ Armagedon.
Ɣaa kpabo kɔdzɛva ɔfedza nnɛ mpia i ɔ̃ irɔi ame ɔfere i ɔwiri ame. Ne silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔre sibɔrɛ i sigaraiyara iso i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ame sɔ, “Iɔro o-o!”

Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, kado ɔtsɛ imama, silɔ agbãagbã to sire teteree kado to ɔɖu teteree fiɛ karɔ̃ ɔtsɛ iti ku ifɔ̃. Ita i ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔbara ɔturi ne, karɔ̃ iiti ngbɔ kanya, nnɛgbe nɖe karɔ̃ iti nɛ lonyanyarĩ iɖo ne.
Ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ lofɔ iyere ɔbɛse aka atɛ, fiɛ nɖebi simagɛ̃ siare ana ɔbiɛbiɛ. Ɣaa ɔnyigi Babilonia ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ lofɔ iyere, ne ɔso ɔsu ɔ̃ sikpã ndã ikɔi nɛ ɔto ɔtã wũ ɔnɛ ɔtara karɔ̃.
Nrɔ̃ mɛ ɔɖuɖu i ndu ɔki milɔ ɔyu pelepele fiɛ kube kukuwɛ̃ ana iisiwe maanya.
Atumagɛrɛĩ wa lomɔ lɛ mma ɔkoto ɔba aapɛ. Awuĩwuĩ maturi gbaã ne ɔso maɣɛ amusuora i Ɣaa iso. Inyɛwe nɛgbe ɔnyanyarĩ gbaã.
Mmɔ i Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ ma nto arɔi akɔdzɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɔba wũ kɔrɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, “Ba nyɔ kumɛgɔ maakpadzɛ̃ asɔrɔ̃ɖedze siare gɔ nsi i ndu gbodzoo iso kutsue.
Kayiiso magara ɔɖegu asɔrɔ̃ɖedze gɔ lofɔ iyere ngbe asɔrɔ̃, fiɛ ɔ̃ asɔrɔ̃ iɖe ɔmɔɛ̃ kayiiso maturi lɛ ndã.”
Kpabo gɔgbe ɔkɔ me i siwarã ame ɔkɛlɛgu fafuĩ ame ngbegɔ i maturi na. Lonya ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nsi i bɔi lalaa rɛtɛa ɔwɛ̃ iso. Mmusuo ayere gbodzoo sia i bɔi iso, fiɛ ɔba ati akɔdzɛ gu asa aweo.

Ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe pia awu kpinakpina gu arɛtɛa, fiɛ ɔkɛrɛ so ala sikãrɛtɛa ara, anyi wa lofɔ kuɣa gu ata wa lofɔ kuɣa. Ɔto sikãrɛtɛa itunɛra nɛ loyigu anyanyara gu ara nyanyarĩa wa ɔna ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ asɔrɔ̃ iɖe ame.
Matsɛrɛ iyere nɛ karɔ̃ lowɛrɛ masia i ɔ̃ itɔngbo sɔ,
Babilonia gɔ lofɔ iyere,
Masɔrɔ̃ɖedze ɔnyi, kayiiso anyanyara ɔnyi.
Lonya sɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ɔɔnɛ Ɣaa maturi gu mma maɖoe ala ma Yesu kafɔkaɖe ɔso ima ɔto ɔrɛ̃ lɛ ndã. Gɔ lonya wũ ne, ibara me ɣaa gbaã.
Ne Ɣaa kpabo to ɔkarɛ me sɔ, “Nda ɔso ito ibara-ɔ ɣaa? Loaɣere-ɔ iwɛrɛra i bɔi gɔ mba ati akɔdzɛ gu asa aweo gu ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nsi wũ iso iso.

Bɔi gɔ anya ne, ɔ̃ɔsɛ ngbã ɔnya, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ɔ̃ɔkpi. Ɔto ɔ̃abɔrɛ i iwo gudua nɛ lobua iwodoro ame ɔba fiɛ maawɔra wũ. Mma nsi ngbã i kayiiso fiɛ ma ayere na i magbanadze ɔko ame ta kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ne, ito iabara ma ɣii si manya bɔi, alasɔ ɔɖe ngɔ loɔsɛ ngbã ɔnya fiɛ ɔkpi, fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃aledza iba ana.
“Ngɔ mba iwola gu ara karɔ̃ inɔ pɛ loanɔ nnɛgbe karɔ̃. Ati akɔdzɛ ɖe kubemi kukɔdzɛ gɔ iso i ɔrɔ̃go si,
ana ne, alɛisi magara maɖe gɔ ma ndɛ̃ iru sigara ɔɖewi ɔɔfe koko. Ɔwɛ̃ to ɔɖe iso kiniɔ, fiɛ ɔtsɔra ɔwi iiɣo. Si ɔ̃ ɔwi ɔɣo ne, ɔwi kurukutu kere ɔ̃aɖe sigara.
Bɔi lalaa gɔ loɔsɛ ngbã ɔnya fiɛ ɔsiina kiniɔ nɖe igara farafanava, ɣɛɛ ɔɖe magara ikɔdzɛ ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i Ɣaa to ɔ̃awɔra.
“Asa aweo wa anya ne, magara iweo ma sigara ɔɖewi loiɣo maɖe, ɣɛɛ maana ɔle ɔɖɔwũ ɔwɛ̃ sɔ maɖegu bɔi lalaa sigara.
Adzuni awɛ̃ saã aɖe magara iweo magbe ɔɖuɖu fiɛ maasu ma kayakpa gu ɔle matã bɔi lalaa.
Mato maakpɛ̃gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi, ɣɛɛ ito iaɖe ma iso, alasɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Makɔse ɔɖuɖu Ɔkɔse, gu magara ɔɖuɖu igara. Ɔ̃ masiaidze ma Ɣaa ɔkpere, ɔtɛ ma ɔsɛ fiɛ masiai wũ i ɔnukuare ame to maawegu wũ.”
Ɣaa kpabo ɔledza me iɣere sɔ, “Ndu mɛ anya asɔrɔ̃ɖedze si iso nɖe nɖebi, maturi akuri, maturi agbã, gu siɖeɣɛa agbãagbã.
Asa aweo wa anya gu bɔi to maatsiri asɔrɔ̃ɖedze. Mato maafɔ wũ ira biara iso ɔsɛ isɔ̃. Maawe ɔ̃ sina matsuedza wũ.

Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔsu nnɛgbe ɔpia i ma situ ame sɔ mabara ngbɔ si adzuni wa ɔbara ɔsɛ iso iki i mawɛ̃ ibara ame sɔ maasu ma ɔle gɔ mato maɖe iso ala matã bɔi lalaa gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa itɔ̃me aaba i ne ame.
Ɔrɔ̃go gɔ anya ne, ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ lofɔ iyere fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe kayiiso magara iso ɔɖe.”
Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya Ɣaa kpabo mama gɔ loso ɔbɔrɛ i kato ɔto ɔba. Ɔba ɔle gbaã fiɛ ɔ̃ ifiɛ to iɣo karɔ̃.
Ne ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Ɔ̃ɔbiɛ o-o! Babilonia gɔ lofɔ iyere ɔɔbiɛbiɛ wɔsɔwɔsɔ!
Ɔ̃ɔkpese siwarã lalaa gu siwarã dzɛ loisekele,
kurodzai gɔ loisekele gu ngɔ maiɖe kawekɔ̃.
Alasɔ nɖebi ɔɖuɖu
ɔnɛ ɔ̃ asɔrɔ̃ iɖe ndã. Kayiiso magara ɔɖegu wũ asɔrɔ̃,
fiɛ kayiiso kuɣamaɖese ana ɔkpese maranase iki i ngbã nyanyarĩa isɛgu wũ ame.”
Ne lonɔ silɔ mama to siɖe ika sibɔrɛgu i kato sɔ,
“Wũ maturi, mibɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame, si iiɖe ngbɔ ne,
mi wũ miaba miabara akpi wa igbã ɔbara.
Fiɛ Ɣaa aasu inyɛwe ɔkpadzɛ̃ mi kutsue lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔkpadzɛ̃ wũ!
Alasɔ maɔfu ɔ̃ akpi ikpe akɔlɛ asɛ aabo ta kato,
fiɛ Ɣaa ɔnyigi ara lalaa wa i ɔ̃ maturi ɔbara.
Mibara wũ miti kuso!
Nwa ɔbara mi ne, mibara wũ miti kuso ikpɛ inyɔ.
Ikɔi nɛ ame ɔka ɔtile ndã ɔtã mi ne, mika ne ame ikpɛ inyɔ mitã wũ ɔnɛ!
Mitã ɔwe inyɛ,
si ɔmararã so lɛ kumɛgɔ ikote i ɔ̃ ikɛrɛso gu inyɔso kaɖukaɖu kanya.
Alasɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔmɔ to ɔɣɛ i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame sɔ,
‘Marɔ̃go igara loɖe i ngbe.
Loiɖe kpise ɔre fiɛ loibamararã so lonya!’
Ne ɔso iyi iwɛ̃ saã i inyɛwe aaba wũ iso,
kukpi, imararãso gu kukã.
Fiɛ ɔtɔ aatsuedza wũ,
alasɔ Bosate Ɣaa gɔ nto ɔɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me ne,
Ɔlesate ɔɖe.
“Si kayiiso magara ma loɖegu wũ asɔrɔ̃ ɔnya kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔtsue ɔbɔrɛ kuɣɔ ne, mato maapɛ sikpabo mabiɛgu wũ kaku.
Ɔ̃ inyɛwe to iakpɛ̃ kayiiso magara mamɔ ifɔ̃, ne ɔso mato maaya dzoroo mala maɔɣɛ sɔ,
‘Ndzo lo! Ndzo lo! Fɔ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ lofɔ iyere!
Babilonia gɔ mba ɔle!
Ɔɖɔwũ ɔwɛ̃ saã kere makpadzɛ̃-ɔ kutsue kumɛgɔgbe!’
“Kuɣamaɖese siare ma mpia i kayiiso ana ɔbiɛ kaku mamararã so alasɔ kuwɛ̃ siina gɔ loaɣa ma ara.

Ara wa mato marɔdɛ̃ nɖe sikãrɛtɛa, sikãfudza, ata wa lofɔ kuɣa, anyi, sikati fudza, siɖɔbɔrɔa, ɔgo rɛtɛa gu ɔkati kpinakpina, adziri agbãagbã wa nsɛ ɔfɔrɛ̃ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃, ara wa mabara ala sisogbɛ̃, ara wa ɔɖuɖu mabara ala ibɔra nɛ masɛ mabara ala ayiwa, ibɔra mɔmɔ gu adziri wa lofɔ kuɣa gbaã gu ata wa nto alɛ ɔnyɔ.

Ara mama ana nɖe adzirikolo kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a wa masɛ marɔ sɔ sinamɔn, kutu awara, kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a, ɔlufui, korobo, ndã, nnɔĩ mɛ masɛ maɖe, ɔraũ gɔ lobe ɖɛkpɛrɛɛ, kakpã, ayo ame mabɔi gu manantsuĩ, apɔngɔ, makeke ma i apɔngɔ sɛ akpadzɛ̃, masande, gu ta maturi ma maasu masɔrɛ ala ma aɣɔ.
“Kuɣamaɖese ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ara sɛɛ wa i fɔ ɔkala sɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔɔre-ɔ nrɔɔ̃. Fɔ karana ɔɖuɖu gu fɔ kulɛ ana ɔɔyu gɔ aisibanya wã anya.’
Mma lokpese maranase iki i kuɣa gɔgbe iɖe ame ɣɛ dzoroo alasɔ mato manigã inyɛ nɛ ɔto ɔwe. Mabiɛ kaku ku sikpabo, mamararã so, maɣɛ sɔ,
‘Ndzo lo! Ndzo lo! Ɔmagɛ̃ siare,
fɔ gɔ manyɔmɛdza ɔkati fudza gu ɔrɛtɛa gu ɔgo kpinakpina,
fiɛ asu sikãrɛtɛa ara gu ata wa lofɔ kuɣa gu anyi akɛrɛ so.
Karana gagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔwɔ i ɔɖɔwũ ɔwɛ̃ saã ame!’
“Sikolo siare makãdze gu sɛ̃ makpakpa, sirimasɛdze, gu maturi tsɔra ɔɖuɖu ma nsɛ masɛ i sikolo ame maɖe kuɣa ɔya dzoroo,
mabiɛ kaku ku sikpabo gɔ manya kumɛgɔ i ɔmagɛ̃ to ɔtsue fiɛ kuɣɔ to kubɔrɛ maɣɛ sɔ, ‘Mme ɔmagɛ̃ lokategu ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔgbe?’
Mabodza ɔsebu mafere so iti ame mabiɛ kaku mamararã so maɣɛ sɔ,
‘Ndzo lo! Ndzo buɛ buɛ boatã-ɔ, fɔ ɔmagɛ̃ siare.
Ngbegɔ i mma mba sikolo siare
sɛ mana ma karana mabɔrɛgu.
Ɔɖɔwũ ɔwɛ̃ saã ne, ɔɔkpese ikpakpi!
So si siɣɔ mi ma mpia i kato.
Mi Ɣaa maturi, katɔ̃memasɛdze gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze, so si siɣɔ mi sɔ makpadzɛ̃ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe kutsue ngbɔ!
Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɔɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me ɔtã wũ ipɔ i ara wa ɔbara mi iti.’ ”
Ne lonya Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ gɔ mba ɔle ɔputa ita siare ɔfuĩdza ɔpia i ɔpo ame ɔɣɛ sɔ,
“Ngbɔ i Ɣaa
aafuĩdza Babilonia ɔmagɛ̃ siare ɔwuĩ i karɔ̃
sɔ maisibanya wũ manya ne.
Sisango gu aruei gu kudadã gu kuka makadze silɔ
iisibare i fɔ ame inya.
Mma nsɛ mabara kusɛ̃
iisibawe i fɔ ame.
Ngbɔ ame ana maisibanɔ kukɔtɛ silɔ ana i fɔ ame ne.
Sikaniɛ iisibasa i fɔ ame,
fiɛ ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze silɔ iisibare i fɔ ame sinya.
Mma nsɛ maɣa-ɔ ara
nɖe kayiiso maturi ma mba ɔle
fiɛ asu fɔ sibɔ ipɛ asɔsɔla nɖebi ɔɖuɖu.
Babilonia ɔmagɛ̃ ame manya Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze gu ɔ̃ maturi ima.
Fiɛ iiɖe ma ɔkpɛ kere, ɣɛɛ manya mma ɔɖuɖu maɖoe i kayiiso ima i mmɔ.”
Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonɔ silɔ dzɛ lore maturi gbodzoo sire i kato sito siɣɛ sɔ,
“Aleluya!
Iɖi gu ifiɛ gu ɔle nɖe Bo Ɣaa ɔkpɛ.
Alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri iso
fiɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɖe ɔnukuare.
Ɔtã asɔrɔ̃ɖedze siare gɔ lonina kayiiso
ku ɔ̃ asɔrɔ̃ iɖe ipɔ.
Ɣaa ɔkarɛ so iti alasɔ asɔrɔ̃ɖedze gɔgbe loɖoe Ɣaa maturi ne.”
Maledza kulu ila iɣɛ sɔ,
“Aleluya!
Ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔmɔ kuɣɔ aala kuɔkɛlɛ kato ɔwi biara.”
Makpakpa sinyɔ ina gu ara ana wa mba ngbã ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ matã Ɣaa gɔ nsi sigaraiyara iso maɣɛ sɔ,
“Si iba ngbɔ! Aleluya!”
Ne silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔre sibɔrɛ i sigaraiyara kɔrɛ sɔ,
“Mile bo Ɣaa,
mi ma nɖe ɔ̃ maɖabo ɔɖuɖu,
maturi nyaa gu mma loinya,
gu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ manigã wũ.”
Ne kama ne, silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ dzɛ lore maturi gbodzoo sire ɣee ndu gbodzoo mɛ nto mikpase i ata iso, ɣee kado iɖu teteree sɔ,
“Aleluya!
Alasɔ Bosate Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate to ɔɖe sigara.
Mitã bona isoɣɔ, so si siɣɔ bo,
si bokɔlɛ ɔ̃ iyere kato.
Alasɔ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔrɔ̃go ikɔyi ɔɔɣo
fiɛ ɔ̃ ɔre ɔɔledza so ɔsɛ.
Ɣaa ɔsu awu fudza wa nto afiɛ ɔtã ɔrɔ̃go sɔ ɔpia.”
Awu fudza wagbe nɣɛ atã Ɣaa maturi kurabarara sɛɛ ne.
Ne Ɣaa kpabo ɔɣere me sɔ, “Tsɛrɛ sɛ sɔ, so aaɣɔ mma makpere sɔ maba Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔrɔ̃go ikɔ ɔpɔrɔ̃ katukɔ̃.” Ɔledza iɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa kanya ame atɔ̃me tutuutu i ngbe ne.”
Lopɛ agɛgɛ̃ sɔ si loto iti i karɔ̃ lotã wũ, ɣɛɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, “Daabara ngbɔ! Maɖabo kere i bo gu-ɔ gu manyii ma nto maɖe aɖansiɛ i Yesu iso ɖe. Pɛ agɛgɛ̃ tã Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃!”
Alasɔ aɖansiɛ wa mato maɖe i Yesu iso lopia Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔle.
Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya kato ɔbusi fiɛ lonya ipɔngɔ fudza iwɛ̃ ɣɛ. Ngɔ nsi i ne iso iyere nɖe Ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri iso gu Ɔnukuare. Ɔsɛ ɔkpɛ̃ kakpã, ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso.
Ɔ̃ anɔmi se lɛ ɔtɔ sinyagɛmi fiɛ ɔtɔ̃me sigaraikoto gbodzoo. Matsɛrɛ iyere iwɛ̃ masia wũ iso nɛ i kuwɛ̃ iiɣe iɖo ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã.
Ɔpia awu wa mawarã mapia i ima ame fiɛ ɔ̃ iyere nɖe Ɣaa Itɔ̃me.
Kato makpakpɛ̃dze pia ɔkati ɖɔbɔrɔa fudza sekelea fiɛ masi i apɔngɔ fudza iso masiai wũ i kama.
Kakpã ipɛmi nɛ mba ɔbe pia wũ i kanya nɛ ɔ̃asu ɔwɔra nɖebi. Ɔ̃aɖe ma iso ku ibɔra ɔtsiamidziri fiɛ ɔ̃abiobio ara ku Ɣaa Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate sikpã lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ mabio adziribi i itawo ame.
Iyere nɛ matsɛrɛ masia i ɔ̃ awu tagbaraa iso gu ɔ̃ ikpabɔ iso nɖe sɔ,
MAGARA AME IGARA GU MAKƆSE AME ƆKƆSE.
Ne kama ne, lonya Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ɔɣɛ i kuɣɛ̃ iso. Ɔla kulu teteree ɔkpere kurodzai gɔ ɔɖuɖu nsɛ kufɛrɛrɛ i ɔwiri ame ɔɣere kɔ̃ sɔ, “Miba o-o! Miba miasakanya si miɖe Ɣaa kutsuɛ aɖera siare.
Miba miaɖe magara, makpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa, makpakpɛ̃dze, apɔngɔ, gu mma nsɛ masɛ i apɔngɔ iso mina. Ɔbiara igbã sina pia, mma loiɖe masande, masande, maturi nyaa, gu ta mawɛrɛba sire.”
Ne lonya sɔ bɔi lalaa gu kayiiso magara gu ma makpakpɛ̃dze ɔrɔ ngɔ nsi i ipɔngɔ iso gu ɔ̃ makpakpɛ̃dze kakpã ne.

Mamɔɛ̃ bɔi lalaa gu mila kanyaɖidze gɔ lobara awawãra i bɔi ɔle ame. Awawãra wamɔ ɔsu ɔsɔsɔla mma iso i bɔi ikparĩ sia gu mma losɔrɛ ɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ ne. Masu bɔi lalaa gu mila kanyaɖidze mafuĩdza mapia i itɔkpe nɛ nto itsue ame manyɔa.
Matsɔra ne, ngɔ nsi i ipɔngɔ iso ɔɖoe ma ala ipɛmi nɛ lobɔrɛ i ɔ̃ kanya ame fiɛ kurodzai ɔba kuaɖe ma sina kumɛgɔ kuawo ne.
Ne lonya Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ ɔso ɔbɔrɛ i kato ɔto ɔba ɔto iwo gudua wodoroa sibɔi gu kunyiborei siare i kɔrɔ̃.
Ɔmɔɛ̃ aɣɛ wa nɖe aɣɛ kuere wa mpia ta kokowi fiɛ masɛ makpere wã sɔ Ɔbosam gu Satana. Ɣaa kpabo ɔnyi wũ ɔsɛ akɔ kakpi.
Ɔfuĩdza aɣɛ ɔpia i iwo gudua wodoroa ame, ɔsɛ̃ ne kanya kpa, fiɛ ka ɔsu itsuebi ɔsɛ̃ iwo kanya sɔ si ɔ̃isibana ɔri ɔkɔ nɖebi ɔyura gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ akɔ kakpi kama. Ne kama ne, maaɖi wũ ɔwi kɛkɛĩ kere.

Ne kama ne, lonya maturi mawɛ̃ si i sigaraiyara iso fiɛ matã ma ɔle sɔ maɣɛ atɔ̃me. Ma nɖe mma maɖoe alasɔ maɖe aɖansiɛ i Yesu gu Ɣaa itɔ̃me iso sikala ne. Mmagbe iibɔ ma ati karɔ̃ matã bɔi lalaa, ɣee ɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ, fiɛ maifɔ ɔ̃ ikparĩ i itɔngbo ɣee kɔrɔ̃ iso. Mata masɛ ngbã fiɛ maɖegu Yesu sigara akɔ kakpi.
Makpise ita ɖeakatɔ̃ i ngbe ne. Makpise tsɔra iita gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ akɔ kakpi ɔfe.
So aaɣɔ makpise ɖeakatɔ̃ ma loata fiɛ maase sekelee. Kukpi nyɔare iisibawe ɔle i ma iso. Maaɖe Ɣaa gu Kristo masɔrɛdze fiɛ maaɖegu wũ sigara akɔ kakpi.
Si akɔ kakpi ɔɔfe ne, mato maaɖi Ɔbosam i iwo gudua wodoroa ame.
Ɔ̃abɔrɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɔsɔla kayiiso akpakpai aka ana maturi ɔɖuɖu ma nɖe Gog gu Magog. Ɔto ɔ̃asa ma kanya ɔtã kakpã fiɛ mato maasi lɛ ɔpo ame iwarĩ.
Masɛ maki i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu fiɛ maba maaki malɔ Ɣaa maturi gu ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔɖɔɛ. Ɣɛɛ ɔtɔ ɔbɔrɛ i kato ɔba ɔ̃atsuedza ma pelepele.
Masu Ɔbosam gɔ losɔsɔla ma mafuĩdza mapia i itɔkpe siare nɛ atɔgɛrɛĩ lowara ame. Ngbe masu bɔi lalaa gu mila kanyaɖidze mafuĩdza mapia mafegu ne. Maate ma ɔɣiã i ngbe kasɛ̃ i kakɔme ɔwi daaro.
Ne lonya Sigarayara fudza siare iwɛ̃ nɛ iso i ɔwɛ̃ si ne. Kato gu karɔ̃ ɔyu i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ fiɛ maisina kawekɔ̃.

Lonya makpise, maturi nyaa gu mma loinya gɔ maɣɛ i sigaraiyara katɔ̃. Mabusi siko, fiɛ maledza ɔko mama ibusi, ɔ̃ nɖe ngbã ɔko ne. Masu ara wa matsɛrɛ mapia i siko ame maɣɛgu makpise atɔ̃me i ma kurabarara kanya.
Ɔpo ɔɖi makpise ma mpia i ɔ̃ ame ɔtã fiɛ kukpi gu ikpibiɔ ana ɔɖi makpise ma mpia i ma ame matã fiɛ Ɣaa ɣɛgu ɔbiara atɔ̃me i ara wa ɔbara kanya.
Ne kama ne, masu kukpi gu ikpibiɔ mafuĩdza mapia i itɔkpe siare ame. Itɔkpe siare nɛgbe nɖe kukpi nyɔare ne.
Ɔbiara gɔ iyere mainya matsɛrɛ i ngbã ɔko ame ne, masu wũ mafuĩdza mapia i itɔkpe siare ame.
Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya kato ɣɛtɛ gu karɔ̃ ɣɛtɛ alasɔ kato ɖeakatɔ̃ gu karɔ̃ ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔɔfe, fiɛ ɔpo ana siina.
Ne lonya Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ ɣɛtɛ sekelea ɔso ɔbɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔto ɔba. Makɛrɛ wũ lɛ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ makɛrɛ matã kurã iyiri.
Ne lonɔ silɔ siare siwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i sigaraiyara kɔrɛ siɣɛ sɔ, “Minyɔ! Ɣaa kasɛkɔ̃ ka kapia i maturi ndɛ̃. Ɔ̃awe i ma ndɛ̃ fiɛ maaɖe ɔ̃ kaɖe. Ɣaa mɔmɔ aawe i ma kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔ̃aɖe ma Ɣaa.
Ɔto ɔ̃anukutu ma nnɔmɛ biara i katɔ̃, fiɛ kukpi iisibawe. Ngbɔ ame i imararãso, kaku gu ibo iisibawe alasɔ ara wa lowe ku ɔkpɛ ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔɔfe.”
Ne ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Minyɔ! Loɔkpesera ira biara iɣɛtɛ.” Ne ɔledza iɣɛ ana sɔ, “Tsɛrɛ sɛ ne atɔ̃me biele wa maafɔ maɖe aɖe.”

Ne ɔɣere me sɔ, “Ira biara ɔɔkote kini. Mme nɖe Ɔɖeakatɔ̃ gu Ɔtsɔra, karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ gu kawirikɔ̃. Ngɔ i ɔme to ɔkore ne, loatã wũ ndu mɛ nsɛ mitã ngbã fiɛ migɔdɛ̃ i itubu nɛ loisɛ isɔ̃ ame gɔ ɔ̃ibatã kuso.
Ngɔ loɖe iso ne, kuso gɔ loatã wũ ngbe ne. Ana ne, loaɖe ɔ̃ Ɣaa fiɛ ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃aɖe me ɔbi.

Ɣɛɛ mafɔ̃dze, mma loifɔ maɖe, anyanyara mabaradze, maturiɖoese, asɔrɔ̃maɖedze, sibɔ mapɛdze, maɣɔsɔrɛdze, gu maladze ɔɖuɖu ne, maafɔ ma kuso i itɔkpe siare nɛ atɔgɛrɛĩ lowara ame. Nnɛgbe nɖe kukpi nyɔare ne.”
Nnɛmɔ kama ne, Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ ma nto arɔi akɔdzɛ wa loyi ku inyɛwe aka akɔdzɛ tsɔra ɔwɛ̃ ɔba wũ kɔrɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, “Ba si lote-ɔ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔrɔ̃go gɔ ɔto ɔba ɔ̃akɔ.”
Ɣaa siwarã ɔbo i wũ ame fiɛ Ɣaa kpabo ɔkɔ me ɔkɛlɛgu kube kɔlɛa kuwɛ̃ iso. Ɔte me Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ sekelea gɔ loso ɔbɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ i kato ɔto ɔba.
Ɔto ɔsa ku Ɣaa ifiɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ ifiɛ se lɛ ata wa lofɔ kuɣa. Ɔse lɛ yaspa ita awe fiɛ ɔ̃ ame ɔkpa lɛ aɣɔɣɔɛ awe.
Ibere nɛ loki ilɔ wũ ɔkɔlɛ fiɛ ibɛ ana. Kuyogodɔ̃ kuweo-kunyɔ pia i ibere nɛgbe ame. Ɣaa makpabo iweo-inyɔ ɣɛ i kuyogodɔ̃ fiɛ matsɛrɛ Israel kalɛ kawɛ̃ iyere masia i kayogodɔ̃ biara iso.
Kuyogodɔ̃ kutɛ pia i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃, kutɛ pia i kato isɛ, kutɛ pia i kala isɛ fiɛ kutɛ pia i kuɣɛ̃ iyo kabokɔ̃ isɛ.
Ata aweo-anyɔ masu mapia ala ɔmagɛ̃ abere i karɔ̃ ame fiɛ matsɛrɛ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi katɔ̃memasɛdze iweo-inyɔ ayere masia i wã iso.
Ɣaa kpabo gɔ loɖegu me ika ɔmɔɛ̃ sikãrɛtɛa ɔdziri gɔ maasu masusu ala ɔmagɛ̃, ɔ̃ kuyogodɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ kubereku ɔto i kɔrɔ̃.

Ɔmagɛ̃ ba abesɛ aka ana, fiɛ ɔ̃ kukarãme gu ɔ̃ kubɛme ɔɖuɖu ɔkote. Ɣaa kpabo gɔgbe ɔsu ɔ̃ sikãrɛtɛa ɔdziri ɔsusu ala ɔmagɛ̃, ne ɔnya sɔ kasɛ kawɛ̃ ɔkarã maili kakpi gu alafa aru. Ɔmagɛ̃ kukarãme, kubɛme gu ku kɔlɛme ɔkate.
Ɣaa kpabo ɔsusu ibere ana fiɛ ɔnya sɔ ibɛ mita sikuɔ i ɔdziri gɔ ɔto ɔsusu ala ara kanya.
Yaspa ata masu matsue ala abere fiɛ sikãrɛtɛa dzɛ nlɛ siɖo sito sifiɛ lɛ aɣɔɣɔɛ masu matsue ala ɔmagɛ̃.
Masu ata wa lofɔ kuɣa agbãagbã mapia ala ɔmagɛ̃ abere i karɔ̃ ame.
Ita ɖeakatɔ̃ marɔ sɔ yaspa,
inyɔare nɖe safir.
Itɛare nɖe halkedon,
fiɛ inaare nɖe smaragdo.
Iruvare nɖe sardonik,
ikuɔvare nɖe sardis.
Ikɔdzɛvare nɖe krisolit,
fiɛ farafanavare nɖe beril.
Kaiwɛ̃vare nɖe topas.
Iweovare nɖe krisopras.
Iweowɛ̃vare nɖe yiakint,
fiɛ iweonyɔare nɖe ametist.

Ɔmagɛ̃ kuyogodɔ̃ kuweo-kunyɔ ɔɖuɖu ne, anyi aweo-anyɔ wa lofɔ kuɣa mabaragu ala. Kayogodɔ̃ biara ne, inyi siare iwɛ̃ mabaragu ala. Ɔmagɛ̃ ɔri siare ne, sikãrɛtɛa sɛɛ mabaragu ala fiɛ si asɛ ne, ato anya so i ɔ̃ ame.
Loinya Isɔrɛyo kuiwɛ̃ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame alasɔ Ɣaa Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nɖe Isɔrɛyo.
Kuɣɛ̃ ɣee ɔgbaworeti iinya i ɔmagɛ̃ ame, alasɔ Ɣaa ikpawaĩ sɛ ifiɛ ifere wũ iso fiɛ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nɖe ɔ̃ ɔkaniɛ.
Ɔmagɛ̃ ikpawaĩ ame i kayiiso nɖebi aasɛ fiɛ kayiiso magara aasu ma karana mabɔ ɔ̃ ame.
Maibasɛ̃ ɔmagɛ̃ kuyogodɔ̃ ku anɔwã fiɛ kaɖe iibaro i ɔ̃ ame kanya.
Nɖebi to maasu ma agagã gu karana mabɔ ɔ̃ ame.
Ɣɛɛ ira nɛ loisekele kuiwɛ̃ iibabo i ɔmagɛ̃ ame. Maladze gu mma nsɛ mabara anuarɛra iibawe i ɔ̃ ame. Mma ayere matsɛrɛ mapia i Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ngbã ɔko ame pɛ loawe i ɔ̃ ame.
Ne kama ne, Ɣaa kpabo gɔmɔ ɔte me ɔwore gɔ ame ndu nsɛ mitã ngbã. Ndu ɔrɛ kpɛnɛnɛnɛ lɛ aɣɔɣɔɛ wa ame losekele gbaã. Ɔwore gɔgbe ɔgɔdɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i Ɣaa gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi sigaraiyara ame.
Ɔbore ɔki i ɔmagɛ̃ ɔri siare ndɛ̃. Kudziri gɔ nsɛ kutã ngbã ɣɛ i ɔwore sikpokpo inyɔɔ iso fiɛ kusɛ kuɣɔ̃ i kuwa biara iso i ikɔ ame. Kɔ̃ aɣata ɖe kua gɔ nsɛ kusa sinyɛ itã nɖebi.
Maisibanya imusuora kuiwɛ̃ i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame. Ɣaa gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi sigaraiyara aawe i mmɔ fiɛ ɔ̃ maɖabo aasɔrɛ wũ.
Mato maanya wũ katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ iyere to iasia ma i atɔngbo.
Kaɖe iisibaro i mmɔ, fiɛ ɔkaniɛ ɣee kuɣɛ̃ ana iisibanya ma alasɔ Bosate Ɣaa loaɖe ma ikpawaĩ fiɛ maaɖe sigara kayi daaro daaro.
Ne Ɣaa kpabo ɔɣere me sɔ, “Ɔnukuare atɔ̃me wa maawo ɔfɔ ɔɖe aɖe i ngbe. Bosate Ɣaa gɔ losu ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔpia i ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze ame lopia ɔ̃ kpabo sɔ ɔɖi ara wa loaba i ɔwi kurukutu ame ɔte ɔ̃ ɔɖabo.”
“Minyɔ! Nto loba i ɔwi kurukutu ame. So aaɣɔ mma lomɔɛ̃ atɔ̃me wa matsɛrɛ i ɔko gɔgbe ame mato.”
Mme Yohanes nɖe ngɔ lonɔ ara wagbe fiɛ lonya wã ana. Gɔ lonɔ ara wagbe fiɛ lonya wã ne, lopɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Ɣaa kpabo gɔ loɖi wã ɔte me ngbatɔ̃ si losɔrɛ wũ.
Ɣɛɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, “Daabara ngbɔ! Fɔ gu fɔ manyii ma nɖe kanyamaɖidze gu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ makã ɔko gɔgbe ame ɔtɔ̃me atsue ɔɖabo laa loɖe. Sɔrɛ Ɣaa!”
Ne Ɣaa kpabo ɔɣere me sɔ, “Daakɔla atɔ̃me wa matsɛrɛ mapia i ɔko gɔgbe ame alasɔ ato aaba i ne ame i ɔwi kurukutu ame.

Ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara nyanyarĩa si ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ si ɔbara, ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara anyanyara si ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃, ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara isɛɛ si ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ ɔbara, fiɛ ngɔ nse sekelee ana si ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ ɔse sekelee.”
Yesu sɔ, “Minyɔ! Nto loba kiniɔkiniɔ! Losɛgu wũ kuso loto lobɔ, fiɛ loatã ɔbiara kuso i ɔ̃ kurabarara kanya.
Mme nɖe Ɔɖeakatɔ̃ gu Ɔtsɔra, Karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ gu Kawirikɔ̃.
“So aaɣɔ mma lofore ma awu tagbaraa, sɔ Ɣaa aatã ma ɔri maɖe kudziri gɔ nsɛ kutã ngbã abi, fiɛ maaki i kayogodɔ̃ ame mabo i ɔmagɛ̃ ame.

Ɣɛɛ mma nsɛ mabara ara lɛ makpɛkpɛ gu mma nsɛ mapɛ sibɔ gu masɔrɔ̃ɖedze gu maturiɖoese gu maɣɔsɔrɛdze, gu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ maɖɔɛ mila fiɛ masɛ mala mila ne, maibabo i ɔmagɛ̃ ame, maawe i ɔmagɛ̃ ibere kama.
“Mme Yesu, mme lopia wũ kpabo sɔ ɔɖe ara wagbe aɖansiɛ ɔtã mi si mafɔɖedze akuri aanɔ. Mme nɖe David Ɔɖu gu ɔ̃ ɔwa tɛtɛ, fiɛ mme nɖe ɔɖesɛrã iwãmi nɛ nsɛ ifiɛ ne.”
Ɣaa Siwarã gu ɔrɔ̃go gɔ mato makɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ba!”
Ngɔ nto ɔnɔ ana si ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ba!”
Ngɔ i ɔme to ɔkore si ɔba ɔ̃afɔ ndu mɛ loatã ngbã ɔnɛ kuso idaatã.
Nto loka mma ɔɖuɖu lonɔ atɔ̃me wa mapɛ imomo i ɔko gɔgbe ame sɔ, si ɔrere ɔsu irere ɔbua i wã iso ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu inyɛwe nɛ matsɛrɛ mapia i ɔko gɔgbe ame ɔbua i ɔ̃ inyɛwe iso.

Ngbɔ ame si ɔrere ɔɖi irere ɔbɔrɛgu i atɔ̃me wa mapɛ imomo i ɔko gɔgbe ame ne, Ɣaa iibatã ɔ̃ kɔrɔ̃ ɔpɛgu ara sɛɛ wa matsɛrɛ, ɔ̃ibana kaɖekɔ̃ i kudziri gɔ nsɛ kutã ngbã gu ɔmagɛ̃ sekelea gɔ i kato ame.
Yesu gɔ loɖe ara wagbe aɖansiɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Aĩ, nto loba kiniɔkiniɔ!”
Ne lotɔrã sɔ, “Si iba ngbɔ, Bosate Yesu, ba!”
Bosate Yesu Kristo si ɔbualɛ mi ɔbiara.
